descriptions: Easygoing, compact counter-serve cafe offering ample coffee & tea drinks, plus baked goods.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fresh Press Coffee Bar is a small, cozy coffee shop with only 4-5 tables, making it an intimate spot to relax. While the selection of breads and cakes is limited, the staff is super friendly and welcoming. It’s a great place to meet and chat with friends in a laid-back environment. The iced Americano is excellent—strong and flavorful, served without ice. Perfect for those who appreciate a no-frills but high-quality coffee experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgvULm6KW7HGHHIs-RRWmijS9e1gtCjRw8pdrz&fid=0x0:0x3f4bee2892bdb814"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Kevin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxvGWHzty62wmu2rgWrgLMwpjq1Hu5-aBq1q1sn2-6u6hihjlf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute cosy coffee shop. Perfect stop for a rainy day. I really enjoyed the matcha latte and their waffles ! They put a generous amount of matcha in their drinks so it feels a bit more premium!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDR11-KKOymjyDnOL7fsdvdlDbsp-cUCtd8CFE&fid=0x0:0x3f4bee2892bdb814"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Timothy Chan (TimTim)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURIoSl-5oBZzcRd91bCuWm5mXoW-rsGa8ZawpNSjddYI4bCo-k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent desserts and coffee, always! Their unique cookie boxes are best for gifting and I always buy it for my students when they finish their course. These cookie gift boxes are handmade, which is something unique that they cannot buy anywhere else.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJUDyEnCNEvQqYFWOS4Sb0IFATy4LpkDFH-29K&fid=0x0:0x3f4bee2892bdb814"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Nav Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpOkQtsUC22WCPGRCMmg57CDBnQpd4cvYOpO1Jwd0uVmfb_aFM2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely little cafe in Richmond with a great owner.

I ordered a macchiato and the owner, Jen, recommended the caramel one.

Jan/Jen was super courteous, told me about the cafe and business surviving Covid19 and still running successfully.

She made recommendations, and when my guest didn't like how bitter her drink was, Jen surprised us with a different drink at no extra cost.

Thank you, Jen! Blessings and great luck!
Navjot Gahley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6R27gRhVGCoueGr3BzPn_l_hbDbRUNDrytdpW&fid=0x0:0x3f4bee2892bdb814"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Jenn Charlebois","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKRrj9O2TC4Z43Klxsjk99MP2rrYMQXqnf50KZjyWmfrAj08VLNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just wanted to ride my bike for coffee and picked this place because it looked simple and cute. It is a small coffee shop with not a lot of seating. I loved their selection of unique drinks and pastries. I will definitely be bringing my girls back. The 2 women making the drinks were friendly and kind. I had their homemade iced salted caramel machiato (not sure if that's the correct spelling). It was delicious! So much better than starbucks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaZaCukjXkSW7w1oZQ1I3cz2VaOGPKdcJvnOv-&fid=0x0:0x3f4bee2892bdb814"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Gurv","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhwceJhFcjYo11eH0UjktVpbt4vgW7SS5aHechrSipNjogSGM7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had some time to kill while in Richmond recently, and popped into this quaint little coffee shop. The barista was friendly and created a nice flat white. Price was reasonable. Place is a little tucked away. Seat isn’t the most comfortable and the shop is a bit compact.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8XxTJHFT0upHx_RlHTMQ9iUOV4fU2SZoBPF0Q&fid=0x0:0x3f4bee2892bdb814"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Michael Walsh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXf-RHCWsSL2gHl89Wr-twYc-9P7esLzzR5WoMGY6_n-m_AFSao=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update: I came again two years later and it’s still amazing with lovely service!

First time visitor this morning from Victoria. I love supporting small independent coffee spaces especially when the owners really care — like Fresh Press. I had a wonderful triple-shot Oat Milk Latte (I found out after they make their own almond milk which I will try next time.) Their in-house almond cookies were exceptional. Thank you and look forward to seeing you next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6inkRg34OXxO4M7a1a8tQnEJZOypppsWKV-G9&fid=0x0:0x3f4bee2892bdb814"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Rose Kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQ5BkGWS5p3ZTOvHrPnu2rKTCvYS8W1e5KCNPC7IuXTcdkMWSu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have been wanting to try this coffee shop for awhile and it didn’t disappoint
Enjoyed the most delicious Vanilla Latte hand delivered to me while sitting outside on the cute bistro table with my puppy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNg8TpRbIw2G8vij5_2PDeCcTuzNEUvMFnEwtZX&fid=0x0:0x3f4bee2892bdb814"],"When":"2024-10-2"}]

title: R Ki Coffee Lab
address: British Columbia, Richmond, Lansdowne Rd, R Ki Coffee Lab邮政编码: V6X 0B2
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"R Ki Coffee Lab in Richmond is a fantastic spot for coffee lovers. Their Latte is smooth and rich, and the Cappuccino is perfectly crafted with a balanced flavor. The staff is incredibly friendly, making you feel right at home. The atmosphere is laid-back, both inside and outside, perfect for a relaxing break or catching up with friends. They also offer a great selection of coffee accessories for sale, making it a one-stop shop for enthusiasts. Definitely a must-visit for anyone in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4xWWG_ZYQd3Cqn7zVxN-Ra1FnR3rEdJDyUz7y&fid=0x0:0xb480a42a61340ed4"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"tavers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVC7ILtSlxfdDxb6V9J462gwa1fPiceOnM23OIRkX4ftST7PlY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best cappuccino in Richmond. The texture was so smooth and silky. Served in a handmade pottery cup, with coffee aroma all around in a cozy sitting area, made the experience even better. I liked their no laptop policy today (Saturday).
excited to check out their other location for baked goods (updated after helpful reply:))","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBTJhTKZuYhVBPz0ahF7KezZjq_ie6_TDFQxav&fid=0x0:0xb480a42a61340ed4"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Snoopy Kitchen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3h-I-trbYva-Tzrs-UNhkQe4Nn1jgsblAcoQ0hPrnUWvugM3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Barista is professional in his coffee ☕️ and at the same time has his particular mood if you are beginner.  I did ask stupid question but learn a lot at the cafe about coffee.  Do coffee research before visit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8L0Q1kBdF2itWisUdIAoCIvInRjmrF5MAnX9Y&fid=0x0:0xb480a42a61340ed4"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Ann Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvn-xEzewwzi5MnaSg9fqfqC8GocNLnb-uO3tOtU-odVbwqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They provide super good quality coffee and coffee bean, probably the best we tried so far. But the coffee lab is a little small. If you are coffee enthusiast, you will like R Ki because the owner is a coffee purist. They also provide self brew.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbq3QHNtDZ-T7Ta20sBL417TMFwsqiZg0xwXwa&fid=0x0:0xb480a42a61340ed4"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Sweets Fanatic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKT4q9vq4bFnKURKLo-IuFZkNgSUZrYyHCHwVq7PvVTaTofHHc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A bit small but very cozy and comfortable. Also, they have really good coffee.

Love the music that they play, and the service is very nice.

Coffee taste: 4.5/5
Atmosphere: small but cozy 4.2/5
Price: 5-8$

Comeback rate: 100%","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5KyamU3BMtnxdnD47ZVapX1paMss_REbEc1mb&fid=0x0:0xb480a42a61340ed4"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Jot Chahal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpnXi_n9yiT0nmD6X8P6QtG1E6RalEF4ZZ4sP9wqUVP9FCngI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Got an iced latte on a super hot day.
They have no syrup at all or any kind of sweetener for iced drinks. So you are forced to have just espresso and milk for a latte ! I would understand this is to preserve the real taste of coffee only to find that the actual taste of esspresso is not even very smooth.
Wouldn’t recommend this place go somewhere else for iced drinks i cannot comment on hot ones since i havnt tried them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAYDFYdS2ZhzsBzt-kAqLVCY1uOTmXPnGw8UsA&fid=0x0:0xb480a42a61340ed4"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Gerald Fitzroy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJk0_NogsG-VLkHYij2MqtewQOHgfTJHtqoQwlBnYf62UzoYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yeah the barista (I assume he is the owner), he is a bit geeky.
But the coffee speaks itself enough for me.

The espresso was on point, I would visit for a pour-over next time when I’m around the neighbourhood and have more time.

If you like Tim’s, Starbucks, dark roast, bitter coffee or anything like that. I recommend you to pass here, this place is more for nerdy coffee drinkers who enjoy different fragrances and tastes from each coffee.

By the way, it gets quite busy on the weekends and the place is small.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amberly Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXB_nT7s1agwGSt7_KB7WpomU2EA9RCaAQwI1astIS3IsbEnEWZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don't usually enjoy lattes with no sweetener, however, I thoroughly enjoyed the hot latte here with oat milk. Not bitter, smooth, and just delectable. I love how quaint and comfortable this cafe is. The coffee is roasted perfectly with the ideal temperature to enjoy right away. The staff is very kind as well. You can tell that people enjoy coming here as though it's their own home.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jimmy Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX72ZuhWzFJa-dvzhpIYEgFMddZHT0-fUecIaPoe_e7xYZfxGcl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This cafe is located a few minutes away from a lot of accommodations and hotels. I would say it's worth it to grab lunch here, especially if you're nearby on a visit.

The overall atmosphere was warm and inviting, and the host and servers were kind and prompt.

I would say that it took around 40 minutes for our food to come after we had ordered it, so it's a bit slow. I can understand because we did come during the lunch rush and they were slammed.

I had a salad and the vegetables were a bit wet still, but the balsamic dressing and choice of vegetables was decent. The sweet potato yum fries were a bit cold by the time they arrived to use, but they were seasoned well and still fairly crispy.

My girlfriend had an eggs Benedict dish and I think the execution of it was fairly well done. They didn't ask for how she wanted her eggs done though, so definitely inform them if you specifically want a doneness. The other execution or weird decision was putting arugula underneath hot bacon. It was wilted, unseasoned, bitter and a bit wet. That was a fairly weird decision instead of quickly dressing it with something and putting it off to the side so it wouldn't wilt. I could understand if it was cooked or quickly tossed in a pan, but it was just raw arugula.

My absolute favourite thing here was the Danish. It was warm, just sweet enough, and had delicious blueberries on top.

Overall a good experience and definitely worth a visit if you're in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnmrQb7SginX-ZnuQRw7Ox30xls5Z42hUTjFsr&fid=0x0:0x63843290b0d51c86"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Salicious Kim (Sally)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInfzvmZm95_WrqVSbcEKA0Tgk4zl4fxg9m-xCs8Eo9eA95Zg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing time at this brunch spot! The vibe is fantastic, and the fresh fruit and veggies were a highlight. The homemade cinnamon scones were absolutely delicious! Can’t wait to come back and try their dinner menu next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6C_G78w9JDmilB6xzIlq7xpWXGVJYH3I1FcJa&fid=0x0:0x63843290b0d51c86"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Arturs Mons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVynJ4wFaO1n4O08x-FxTv1KPmlWKP1TXMDnyQPLz_hUxyhn-oQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Story Cafe in Vancouver is a charming spot with a lot of potential. The ambiance is cozy, and the menu offers a nice variety of options. We visited during the Taylor Swift concert weekend, and while it was clear they were overwhelmed and understaffed, the staff were doing their best to keep up.

The food arrived a bit cold, which was disappointing, but given the situation, I understand it was a tough night for the team. Based on the quality of the dishes and the overall vibe, I’m confident that under normal circumstances, this would be a five-star experience. I’d love to return on a quieter day to enjoy everything as it’s meant to be!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV1mNxPTn5IitYwtvs1dKRCN9iQbVRShN2bDvl&fid=0x0:0x63843290b0d51c86"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Robby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJ-mLrUBAdbxFI-rq7JMdzcjfcQ46QLRBeK1iakz6QSOQJV1hw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was looking for a great place to eat since my hotel didn't have any restaurants there.  I ended up finding this little gem in Richmond. What an amazing place to eat. The food was delicious, the servers were amazing. Plus they had someone playing live music.  I definitely recommend the lobster tail fettuccine. The beef Wellington that I had the day before was delicious. Calamari was to die for. I definitely recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3Y3i2NiQ5Ll3-WdLWOW6lbCurWY-kZk8T8Z0r&fid=0x0:0x63843290b0d51c86"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Ken B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKi0UHEqvrtK9b7zXvBSni89V4qdFRQmlmzKuNqGFJ9iPTWGGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good burger, patty was perfectly cooked, soft and juicy with a nice seared crust. Very thick portion as well. Mushrooms were good wish they added a bit more but were perfectly cooked. Bun was very good, nice quality brioche bun. Fries were perfectly cooked but wished the portion was a bit larger. Sat in the patio section, was very nice with a cool breeze and shaded. Staff were very friendly and tentative. Parking is tricky, there’s free street parking but very limited and gets filled up quick. There’s paid parking across the street for $3 for the day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ0me9deJmUNU93PUsM5nFaqD92ygjHQtOHtT-&fid=0x0:0x63843290b0d51c86"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Brian Elliot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5nmQDckWv_Feg-5tMfrYNL52aqQJp-RBmsekEQHclKwYnQYxK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a delicious brunch here recently so came back to try their dinner. The food did not disappoint. Everything was outstanding, exceeding expectations. In particular, the bone-in pork chop was probably one of the best I’ve ever had. My one complaint is their reservation cancellation policy - $25 per head if you cancel in less than 24 hours before your reservation. If they credited that towards your next meal that wouldn’t be so bad but this just feels like highway robbery. Sometimes things happen and you cannot make your dinner reservation. The penalty should not be so steep.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAiu92LuOVzg7wBL0_wMs7Rh7yqCWoN6MRLpFy&fid=0x0:0x63843290b0d51c86"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Liu Michael","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHubzgRvxrqGivghxc_d32W51utoPqDbWe9VZ4ufHewZxCA8BM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hosted a small birthday party here with my friends. The overall experience was very good.

Food ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️:
-The appetizers were generally good, how ever the portion of the beef carpaccio was slightly disappointing.
-Clam chowder was praised by my wife and her friends!
-main courses were very delicious. The duck breast was sensational. The Beef wellington was cooked properly and had a rich mushroom flavour. Albeit the lamb rack had great flavours and was cooked to perfection, portions were lacking in terms of the price of it.

Overall a very happy experience! Would definitely try their brunch options next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-vk1kLtJRHHTjuSBG59tWSqYARUOwH2OetbEp&fid=0x0:0x63843290b0d51c86"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Jeff Seto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXN5eSiEJJYqhpXbvL8bGaB50DfYGUdv8NYlxsNP3x_sp8eEujrRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always came for brunch so first time having dinner and it was on point! Charred octopus was full of flavour and tender and the beef pappadelle was yum. Lava cake was a nice finish to a great evening. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMk-V2jz6Ev71SeoA-nXD-xMls-dvB5vWXHr69o&fid=0x0:0x63843290b0d51c86"],"When":"2024-12-14"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Darren Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvUBmoxE9uJp1WwiFyAz0q4XdpeiKr4m1jXWgytOKo6-P_Lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time being here, best blueberry scone I ever have. Crunchy on the outside and soft n the inside. Sweetness is just right. Coffee taste good and the foam from the Latte is extraordinary, so sweet and thick. Proportion is just perfect mix pof Espresso, milk and foam.\nBoss is very sincere and the environment is relaxing. Seems to have huge election of food as a coffee cafe.\nLooking forward to try on their lunch menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrNEIjZsJzNRxK9qFohPzdgXDamIoHL2OZRzcm\u0026fid=0x0:0xfffc169896c3a4c2"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Tom C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu7-x1C_vGSR8RFpXXLL4aWcckP60Q_Uh5PeKCoFJgirZoTeuM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Newly renovated cafe, very clean and well kept. Great selections of breakfast and lunch menus, lots of baked goods for a quick snack. Reasonably priced! The owner is very friendly and introduced me to a Korean dessert. It’s filled with strawberry cream, very interesting! Oat milk latte tastes great too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf_X5I9cEFO8wnWpw0nFQuJlv-jrisQvOWMzPt\u0026fid=0x0:0xfffc169896c3a4c2"],"When":"2023-8-17"},{"Name":"simon coulombe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5aarMi9uhyRBkuy2cKDGrXKjN67KAaYtizOGI8oqTeoU-qA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stayed at the accent Inn right next to this place. Popped in cause of the great reviews. I understand why. Great coffee (and I'm coffee picky) and lots of yummy looking food options. We tried a breakfast flatbread and croissant sandwich,  both were delicious.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lauren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKcmcYrQq7eAmMEmZz-zo090VWkAVpsIZrhRtfafCaD8qq9sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Surprisingly good, and not expensive. Definitely worth a stop if you're in the area, much better than the chain restaurants in the neighborhood","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Joo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWs6YhV91uAHIDH6GYGPQksWRdNvO5pbVe5mWizKjBWVhP8qRRx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I often visit this cafe when I'm in the area! There's a variety of freshly made, readily available foods, desserts and so on. This place seems to have been renovated so the space is very clean. The owner is also very kind! A small tip for others: if you're lucky, you'll have to try their Korean bibimbap! They don't make it everyday, however it is a must try!!! Will definitely be back and stay as a long term customer!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lavinnia Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXytPpxtt_BOGVIbOVTW5hN7yzG0ZsVtbgutPke8rAU5QXXkZjn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing Korean special for lunch. Korean sauce is a must for tang and flavour. Yum! Yum!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIddGKDnQePke0ahR1j6qscm_-c4tqwmaTSiED\u0026fid=0x0:0xfffc169896c3a4c2"],"When":"2023-8-29"},{"Name":"Brad Tipler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUz2CHPTZeD5soGJBAO6ZQdPKPEaP3uLRbdtF0A8scHbKm-fYc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a total find. It is an extremely short walk from the accent inn we are staying. Nice simple breakfast and lunch menu items without the hassle of a sit down restaurant. Quiet friendly atmosphere with extremely nice owners, free Wi-Fi. It will be our home away from home for food while we are staying in Richmond.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rene Cormier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUb25DG_zmXkNMwUtRLl6K28d25_wVpnHjV-VT1H9rj_tmdA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot for healthy eats! Owner is very friendly.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"P “Parzoufoodie”","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpYsHJI-HGZ5HmjNzl1zm2547VHqdjsVYHTlkyZ6YUBXjop2w9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From outside, you'd think this non descript building houses a run off the mill simple cafe that would get you a quick sandwich on your way to work, but you'd be 100% wrong. This place is a hidden brazilian oasis which offers specialities made with care which you cannot find anywhere else in Metro Vancouver. The staff is super nice and the sandwiches and fried starters are super good. Definetely worth checking!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYNv-P7h0xUQj2oY6PwUFd1ZmSuckPW9hOOKKM&fid=0x0:0x326a40c0d35f6ab3"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Denis Santos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXF32K7mKkPkKCpGUSEjmRXhqYloH84bwlSW6sQJ_X-vjOnAtXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"River Road is a very nice small Brazilian restaurant located at a kind of remote area of Richmond. The restaurant has the same vibe as family owned restaurants in Brazil, very chill. I’ve tried most of their snacks and they are really good. I really love their esfihas, and French bread which are hard to find. They also sell a variety of frozen snacks that are just as good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4zGoAWW3NaSRkzrsqc2m7NQ63-UZiXiMXVWzs&fid=0x0:0x326a40c0d35f6ab3"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Lilibeth Tieng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUShr3XIBaO8Xa9M2ZDOUsmQG10OzRy9XuCEAMqf3Jh3JVoBhU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious for a first timer like me to try Brazilian food. Beef and Cheese Pastel is one of my favorite and the 3 sampler snacks (3rd photo) he let us try which I forgot the name (chicken filling, beef filling and cheese filling), all yummy. Must try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMj0Kf6JKCjeKoedTLCu3LoWvVyWtllIr5tmYx5&fid=0x0:0x326a40c0d35f6ab3"],"When":"2024-5-4"},{"Name":"david nh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxODajACDs08ZzEMwt9AznrI_obwc8lap5cs3krz-WmaBiagTG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was great. Best Brazilian restaurant in Vancouver. Lio is extremely friendly and made my visit even better. Everything is a must try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGukGMW5moSry3LZssddtAz03iyaUPeq1pXAF1&fid=0x0:0x326a40c0d35f6ab3"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"cara warrington","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLptCURfxal6fvf4sLSHHkeO1EdlxI_g_kHpQfEkU33CdIKtg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Such a great tucked away the little gem. Friendly service, great coffee, and the cheese puffs are gluten-free and so yummy! This is definitely worth a visit. Unlike that large chain that starts with 'S', you can get good coffee but also really good food!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Percy Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpYfKBRmcbCv3QlJ6bZXmv0ly8_CocIf_lBOXCAlxRrZaEag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A thank you to Roggerio for introducing this cafe/diner.  A low key place with friendly staff.
I had a great breakfast that started off with a ground beef pastel, thin steak and onions, sausage & eggs breakfast and the owner threw in his house special bean stew for me to try.   Everything was yummy and they sell other products there.   Cheese balls  and mini churros I baked at home and their pickled chillis are all really good as well.  Thank you to the owner for giving me a sample of the house special bean stew.  It was really good and it was a generous size.  I will definitely be visiting again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1gIn-H0dvPitjI5poOGcaJGcrP65zVUwPMPim&fid=0x0:0x326a40c0d35f6ab3"],"When":"2023-7-28"},{"Name":"Francis Tiernan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMbg2ExfRMiohZpNiD-2D5_ODLhMJNN03ikJ4uUL-GuDT41kxSSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Popped in for a breakfast and it was lovely. Really tasty sausages, amazingly fresh eggs,  perfect potatoes cube hash brown,  beautiful toast and a spectacular coffee.
The service was so friendly and full of smiles,  GREAT PLACE!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nancy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWA4ejh4lO-tY_eoGTxmCCJv76K8jBUalBI7YiJcE-rigM7HxeT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fixing my car near by and found a Brazilian cafe by River rd to have lunch. Friendly service. They sale frozen packaged food, dry goods and sauces. Like a mini Brazilian market with a cafe.

We ordered the Feijoada and coxinha. So far the best Feijoada I have tasted! Rice, kale salad and crispy fries on the side. So luck to find a place to wait for my car to be fix and have a decent meal. A hidden gem 👏🏻 for sure will go back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcrg1Ei3Oqs5CWiNBpe0yOz-Hy_XOsLNebK6cU&fid=0x0:0x326a40c0d35f6ab3"],"When":"2023-11-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Grace Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJv2Qb5BK8BlHD8B-fNqpMIiwBP96of3n6s7qsHpu4xPXVSJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Smoked salmon on an everything bagel! Perfect place for a brunch date! The food was a bit pricey but I felt like it was reflected in the quality of the product. The staff were friendly, we dined in and had a great time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7WAzukkZhnO10WGnYjZXhjYqVgOU1zeU103U5&fid=0x0:0x7f4ac9ac429b2ab3"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"DLH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNxoVJChN19TlxEyh2PqXcySZWcsWGp-pw0aGewSStRgeU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"What am I missing here, was it an off day?

My friend invited me along to this Montreal-style honey water boiled, baked in a stone-hearth open-flamed oven making the outer layer crispy.

I bought 1 fresh Rosemary/Rock Salt ($1.95) and from the day-old bin, 1 dozen ($10.95) which is a good price.
We did a squeeze test to compare freshness and didn’t feel any difference between the two.

Cream cheese selections were very limited considering the long list posted on the counter with only 1 Spinach/Feta and no more available from the back of store.
Price for flavoured cream cheese: $8.95/200gr.

I had a couple bites out of the fresh bagel in the car on the way home, it was chewy but not crispy.
I had (the remainder) for lunch upon getting back to N.Delta with a smear.
I had high hopes for my first Montreal-style bagel, unfortunately I felt underwhelmed by all of it and it’s not enough to  encourage a return trip.

As mentioned by others there is a sign posted on the door as well as at the till “Debit or Credit Card Only….No Cash”.
I find that odd.

Located in a shopping plaza with plenty of parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1Jke4C71uKmZV981zgd-9U-5I2lHc96AS5tU&fid=0x0:0x7f4ac9ac429b2ab3"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Albert Luk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaD3o96lx5KFqGPVNTfbIw-nZHFFA950dd8GZz9qbGbOe0Sjog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"3.5/5. Hastings Sunrise breakfast bagel review with signature Rosemary Rocksalt bagel: small amount of food and expensive for what it is. Tiny portion of smoked meat, meh eggs, and seems like processed cheese. Avoid the coffee: weak. Recommend just having a bagel with butter or cream cheese.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJkW_xbHmncDubnCvMLI41-JNpp_TQg3OAHbR8&fid=0x0:0x7f4ac9ac429b2ab3"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Victoria Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnCpSANfEAxNFydcSQd0MMqdR55AH3KrnFZDH8jiUz-K7sHa40=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s a Bagel shop, it’s pricey but good. It more for grab and go than a sit down. They don’t take cash only card so keep that in mind before going.
Be specific about what you want and how you want things, they’re willing to do that for you.
If you come in here expecting anything else you’re dumb. It’s a bagel shop not a coffee shop. The cream cheeses are nice. Try one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiORap_csuY_828mUjEe7XLsPhLp1ZOBFXmuAT&fid=0x0:0x7f4ac9ac429b2ab3"],"When":"2024-2-2"},{"Name":"suman bilkhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIEAc81ORva2b5wIuWh6RFZz_BnlpNbMQe1iawoib5pAtd2Gw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I’m a little confused about how I feel about this place. The staff is super friendly and the variety of bagels is awesome. The seating is stools and metal chairs so not too comfy...maybe they don’t want you to sit around or hang out for too long.
I was hoping they would have something other than bagels too as my little one is not always a fan of bagels....but no luck.  I order the “rosemary rock salt” bagel with the vegetable cream cheese, my daughter got the plain bagel with the plain cream cheese and we got a bowl of the “tomato roasted garlic” soup. The soup came full to the brim and steaming hot just the way it should be-and it was delicious!!!
The presentation is great.
The plain bagel I thing tasted better than the other. The rosemary bagel itself was good but the vegetable cream cheese tasted sweet and as if it was vegetables mixed into salted margarine..I would like to come back and try one of the bagel sandwiches on there menu but it seems a little too pricey for just a tiny bagel sandwich.
I think they could do much better if they added just a little more variety to there menu so that when family’s come with a picky eater there are just a few more options.
Maybe a grilled cheese or muffins.
I get it-it’s a bagel place but it should really expand the menu just a tad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzMe-XVxomb9fCxNNp5Cvnl6HRGRyCqB96OuQu&fid=0x0:0x7f4ac9ac429b2ab3"],"When":"2018-5-18"},{"Name":"Hardev","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVioI76T16utuNqtfSmdtejt-4wYHrD-9idqbyMl6GNmlkdyFV55g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They don't accept cash... But they have a cash tip Jar?

it's cheaper for a business to accept cash and puts money back in the community quicker.
Rather supporting the community, it's supporting big banks.

Definitely won't be back to this mismanaged shop.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Naumann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSqHdPVDLr7nLtDUnE5vKc93YTqnTvOv5M73le5mndP1fkkVul=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came by to try a bagel with butter. Had the Everything with sesame,  poppy, sunflower, and flax seeds, barley, oat, and rye flakes, and onion, millet, and rosemary. Lightly sweet outside, and nice and chewy inside. The baker told me they boil the bagels in honey and water first. We've bought a few 12 piece bags of 'leftover' bagels, and cut and froze them.They tasted absolutely great. Got a bag of Everything this time to take home and have with smoked salmon for NYE.
These are smaller than the bagels we usually get from a grocery store but Rosemary's are Montreal-style. I like all types.
They do have gluten-free (we prefer regular), so if you grab one of the bags, ask if they are gluten-free or not. We've had all but the cinnamon so next time.

*Sorry, I responded 'No' to a question if Rosemary Rocksalt delivers. The correct answer is 'Yes' you can order online for delivery.

To add from my last trip, they also have other products they see in a cooler next to the cash. They sell their own cookies and pickles that are made offsite.

Daniel","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBQKqD3AHSaMPHelRfhNM8-fiY5AlNRHX49Jxn&fid=0x0:0x7f4ac9ac429b2ab3"],"When":"2021-1-3"},{"Name":"Merlin Jose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcYx_3Zvjc8iJkthMK_lV6pMFulyPn4wKtWzuvrlUZ1YHIl40JLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Montreal bagel shop!!Bagels are good!!they have so many different flavoured cream cheese.Staffs are friendly!!Fast service!!bagels maintains quality
Will visit the place again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7Fyw6nSmWBw7o8cDut3z5AXhzlpRQebsiJgfo&fid=0x0:0x7f4ac9ac429b2ab3"],"When":"2024-2-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shery On The Move","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmAA3VItm5d-LzZjMzSS_FZs12aHSse1X5w-nXQqVmdbUvhBBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was passing through this cafe many times but i didn't intend to come. Just until yesterday (Dec 15)  i decided to try.

I ordered two hot mocha and i got complimentary biscuits. I'm very impressed with the service because the server sent my drinks to the table and it served in a ceramic cup. To me, it's way better than a paper cup.

This cafe is very unique and has a special theme (bicycle). I didn't get a chance to take a proper video because lots of customer inside the cafe.

On the other note, restrooms are clean.

I'll definitely come again and this time around i'll hang out a little bit longer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNtguQLDEsETINUS7pXvirwMYq7sXPX2WvBwmk&fid=0x0:0x57d16da93a75024a"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Akhil Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmbmpTyLoaL98m64cZ3--AmwKl728g1HC-Q-80jP3jiw1P5nxH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing hot chocolate and outstanding customer service! The drink was perfectly made, rich, and comforting. The staff was warm, attentive, and made the experience even better. Highly recommend Sanctuary Cafe for anyone looking for a cozy spot with excellent service!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqA5t_F6713uEKDvPX3o5RsDB403z_HAyPFoW5&fid=0x0:0x57d16da93a75024a"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Frank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV32Dl3aDuecVTKkUVDILvrpBYb8ATjyfxIGWGxKJriKTeCzCiJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sanctuary Coffee offers an intriguing specialty coffee experience. I tried their Ethiopian blend which delivered interesting complexity - distinct strawberry notes up front with a pleasant chestnut undertone and a lingering sweetness. The acidity was pronounced, which might not be everyone's preference but showcases the beans' character.

The café's rustic wooden interior with exposed brick and Edison lighting creates a welcoming atmosphere. Their South American and Colombian offerings round out a thoughtfully curated selection.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlEWniLP1u-dc7-snudWEGim009y3OOnR0Pa5n&fid=0x0:0x57d16da93a75024a"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Richard Douglas Griffin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV94QelTxvB8upo_neBNBQ1v4cITUgRFE_sO2u2iSoqQqC-_B-1CA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I didn't eat just had chamomile tea. It is only a block from the Fraser River. It is a place where pedal bikes go for coffee or something to eat and hang out. Pleasent atmosphere sit outside or inside. Plenty of room to park your bike.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2W14FN_1w4aR7ee33UhkL5WiTXBGju_Xtcpb2&fid=0x0:0x57d16da93a75024a"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Grace Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJv2Qb5BK8BlHD8B-fNqpMIiwBP96of3n6s7qsHpu4xPXVSJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place to make a stop while biking. Clean facilities, friendly staff, coffee and treats. I have joined the annual fundraiser with the Rotary for their 105km ride for hearing previously and this is our midway pit stop!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMz-kZHLsoJyAjZ-Uw-MvLlxJ7358levrT8yoLp&fid=0x0:0x57d16da93a75024a"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Khushpreet Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJHdofGDw7ZA4fIhXAdyKnDBNfZ5Wn0U3HyAnyx1Wn248q7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super friendly staff…. In love love with the white chocolate mocha …. And the wilder lemon cookie is a must try… OVERALL : 10/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsCRtERRn2Ebu7HIhxOf1oRyvlQRu47gRcgheS&fid=0x0:0x57d16da93a75024a"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Jonathan Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHfpGA7JKvrEVjVOSDM5w-pnz0OF8A1w0PXOnjivD3Mi9QFfOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always come here when I have my annual Vancouver visit. Lovely spot, always friendly staff, great coffee. Good tables to sit and work at, or read. I only wished they opened a little longer each day :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"DK NG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDL3iKzA-KwRBp_QW-T4bxIzouYpU82YVrkKDRjecsEEcAnsE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried the black sesame croissant, cinnamon bun, flat white & hot chocolate, all decent food and drinks! If you love black sesame, you got to try the black sesame croissant! It is so tasty! The environment is very nice too!

Update: Their sesame croissant look even more nice right now, and of course still tasty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4daGYBdqIU5Se0HiZxT6nz9HhFU_6yHkF05sY&fid=0x0:0x57d16da93a75024a"],"When":"2018-12-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"This food","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaxcCslaGrcC0u202g67ni7XJGWWGyPYtSKkUjWo5gpcXXO0Yv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A hidden gem in Steveston, Richmond. Korean-Western cuisine that’s a must try. We had the fried chicken waffles and Korean bugolgi eggs benny including their strawberry matcha cold latte beverage - all a must try! Decent pricing for the portions (approx. under $25 per our dishes). They have a camera Photo Booth where you can print your photo. They have maximized the seating space all the way to the door. Hopefully one day they will open a second location or a larger restaurant as this branch will get even more popular in no time. Will be returning and recommending to other locals! Truly a Korean restaurant just like back in Seoul, Korea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKEzOp_7WZFQcJraDUbUZp_CKN5d9ggsRsJ_Ef&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Kelly Argue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHguvt2mUYK3ZLLT7t42H3YMBdzPp4wF0FbC-_ZBGyrnECZG3faw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We happened upon this place after coffee, at 1:30 on a Tuesday we walked right in and got seated immediately. Loved the ambiance. We were served immediately, and our food came out very fast. I got the avocado eggs Benedict, and it tasted good but my only complaint was that it was not warm - the eggs or the bread and the holiday sauce was a smidge above room temperature. My friend had the salad and she absolutely devoured it. All in all really good experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLwQAyDLFgsIsGk68YJAGW1O89CJjtgaq6Hxx2&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Josh Kitagawa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCvbFsAmQKXq7eYwIwTFh7lGkN3BybRNmerg8V0KRS7uDJMw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A certain return to spot! Had a great morning walking along the Richmond Dyke, and for brunch afterwards we stopped at Toast to Coast. We weren’t too sure what to expect going in, but were both super super impressed with the food. We got the walk around the block and the Super Bowl and both were outstanding in their own way. Honestly one of the better if not best meals out we had both had in a while. Looking forward to the next time we drop in :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOpsYpHqKZreGxWznBhe6Fsq7uDnWIfyJh5IjP&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Holly Woosey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV2lbZeCEe9uk_tp5v5HeEBpd05cOkWx2bWGKGCFJqdBVjRakcIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time at Toast to Coast and were not disappointed. Really tasty food with large portions (definitely worth the price) we shared the Fisherman's Feast and the Pancakes and we were both stuffed! Loved the atmosphere/music was real chill and the staff were very attentive and helpful. Great place for a lovely brunch","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJoSR1iRK-O7LnHIv_yzY-DpOM75-6HHVnLRe8&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Hanson Kang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU05sdPHWWx_fwM9XAZhPqjZSqP90re58KpNh9FAdqd8EPWk7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There are quite a few brunch spots in Steveston but I came to this one due to the reviews -- did not disappoint! It's a must-visit for any enjoyers of a unique brunch experience. The Korean-inspired menu adds a fun twist to Canadian classics, and the ambiance is top-notch. The interior feels clean and well-planned out, with a cute photo booth, too.

I tried the Fisherman's Feast and the Korean Fried Chicken & Waffles, and the latter was especially delicious. The portions are great, and each dish comes with very nice complementary sides, like the hash brown blocks, assorted house-made pickles, and creative sauces (the waffles came with a gochujang-inspired syrup).

I've read a few comments about service, but it's probably as good as it can be with the limited staff and busy clientele, as there was a line to get in. Our orders were promptly taken, and food arrived quickly.

I will be revisiting the next time I visit Steveston!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT-px7rpGMDAN_Q6N5eJ_VeYO5L1eoPiUmd2lg&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"good times","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlXM1yie2CwXWjZm6fYTFK1Gh8ZCQs6kWWZyWD3G60SgLd8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A small place, so with a party of 4 you will have to wait.  They told us 30mins. (but it was 10min) We gave them our number, and walked around town. Plenty of places to visit.
Received the call and got seated. Servers were very nice.  The food was fantastic.  I had eggs benny with the aged bacon and a strawberry spiked lemonade.

Very nice town many places to visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0lAtKIzEjRbjKuz-nAu34SbyVvDsZN6_2J6QI&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Jah Baraquiel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdBuhq7i5xDfhlyZYWuv00vGsCGhiHgFR8xbt2-zWDkYkrepBh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"foods are superb 👌 staffs are also accommodating especially the owner. She’s one of the kindest person we’ve met. We’ll definitely come back and recommend it to our fam ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOF0bBO-e5spip9tHXr-4ztmNTb9t8TNoHJ5OIK&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Validorae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrAD3iajv4Yp09hKvvxZPV0GJ9zhq3gwKPSikmfm1tkCKmtL8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been here many times, and the food quality has always been excellent. The flavors are particularly amazing. I especially love their matcha latte, it’s the best I've had in Vancouver!
Today, on this cold rainy day, we came back, and the owner warmly welcomed us with two drinks, making us feel truly warm inside. Thank you Toast to Coast, you made my day :)  Will come back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeidmk9WirpC76rMyBM7mEMEOrouYzSMx6jkQB&fid=0x0:0x62e8906acb6e4b73"],"When":"2024-10-20"}]

title: Miion Café
address: 6386 Number 3 Rd Unit 130, Richmond, BC V6Y 0L8

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"REGGIE NRI MAH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwcAfVQbjygBNPR1GqmfGPlFduk4OQyY-y__TAVw60yM9C12J_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming here weekly since they’ve opened. Never disappoints and it was much needed for Richmond to finally have an aesthetic, small business owned coffee bar / shop.

My go to is the Matcha Latte with Oat Milk with along with a UBE Cream Cheese Muffin !!

I’ve had their sandwich bagels as well as cookies which was also great.

5 stars for Food
5 stars for Service
4 stars for Atmosphere only because they could potentially have a bit more seating, I know it’s a small space but there is space to add seating I feel but I do like the clean look. Perhaps when it’s nicer weather again they will be allowed to have outdoor seats as well ?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOttJmlQq3t0bPIg8dyBRqECOB04XyyTKKXZOMI&fid=0x0:0x8ba9cd64a6ece30"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Seraphina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkUUpLfIdziS9KQIoAUfw5pPG8kKZVUvuFTWQGL9Uwp22V6WPi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I really loved Miion cafe's food and drinks, but I have to give them 3 stars because of the subpar service/workflow. I met up with a friend to catch up, and we made a spontaneous decision to go to Miion instead of the cafe next door, drawn in by the cute interior. However, we started to regret our decision decieved by appearance as we sat in the cafe and witnessed multiple (10+) errors with peoples' orders and transactions. There is no doubt that the staff were kind, but the service was just not efficient. Many times staff would make a drink and call out to ask who ordered it, finding out nobody did. They brought drinks to other tables in to-go cups when the customers had asked to dine in. They also brought a steamed milk to another customer who did not order it and did not realize he was accidentally charged for it. Although they do have the confusion of take out and dine-in customers, there are only 3 small tables in the cafe. I think they need a better system, i.e order numbering system to keep track of who ordered what items. We also observed that the staff kept switching roles from making drinks to working as cashier, so there was not smooth communication and knowledge of orders.

My friend and I had ordered a matcha cream cheese muffin to share and two drinks. They had brought the muffin first but we wanted to wait for the drinks to have it together. It reached the 1hr mark of us sitting in the cafe and we still had not received our drinks (it already took 30mins to receive the muffin despite them only needing to remove it from the display case, not reheat). We asked the staff where the drinks were, and they told us that they were still making them. The woman we had asked returned to us 5 minutes later and ask us what we ordered because they had in fact not started making the drinks. She then asked us to go pay for them, when I explained that I already had. After this, we recieved the drinks about 10mins later.

I have never seen genmaicha so green before and I initially thought they had mistakenly made a matcha. I was amazed that it tasted so fresh yet had the nuttiness of the roasted rice. The matcha was even more vibrant and smooth, not astringent at all. The matcha cream cheese muffin was cold but moist and creamy, and the matcha flavour was actually strong, leaving a nice aftertaste. In many other matcha desserts, they taste too sweet with too little flavour even if it appears green. If their food/drinks weren't so good I think I would've had to give them 2 stars.

The seating of the cafe was very limited with about three 2-person sized tables. There wasn't much space to put our jackets or bags either, so we both held everything in our laps. They decorate the space to be very clean and homey so I hope they continue to update the seating/environment to reflect that!

I understand that there are often little errors and miscommunications in customer service, but it felt like Miion was just continually making them due to systematic problems. I hope this feedback can allow them to improve, especially in such a high traffic and competitive location. I would love to come back to try more of their drinks, but only if I know I can receive what I ordered without so much confusion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_NQYKlN5Ok6PvPSnzy8VHoYhGt_ky3ynDhM8m&fid=0x0:0x8ba9cd64a6ece30"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Nick Go","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWy1wVzdpckJ20S9UmFPOeDxIPDcWXe0ZStOYXqUqdan15D_SEi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Richmond finally has a good independent coffee shop!

Miion is super cute, the branding, interior design, furniture selection and overall vibe are "chef's kiss". The jazz music is a nice touch.

I love that they have tea lattes like jasmine, hojicha and genmaicha versus  just the regular matcha. Pastries are tasty as well.

Service is friendly.

On top of all that, they also have free parking.

My only nitpicks are that the seating is limited and once more people know about this place, they will likely be very busy. The latte art could also be improved.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVtGpTydZM-aw2dEFiFk6_Ldjv9OiascGcXYQt&fid=0x0:0x8ba9cd64a6ece30"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Will Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGDD7brNtaOWSPrb4kG9HB25Ge1x-VU_HZtlpi-qzw-EVvrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another solid coffee shop that offers a good pour over product. The bean quality was nice with a good selection.

Only gripe is the sitting is limited, so if you are looking for place to sit and relax then you might run into problems.

Overall a solid new coffee shop in Richmond which is good for all the coffee lovers","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhIEkRgA-99FZQcquntTnGlRJWZRo-3F5g1TTd&fid=0x0:0x8ba9cd64a6ece30"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Kenny Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCkKTuOESfGudPEm0-BDzQVkIamalgjsSUzE_II9VRplB0iEEX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went to this coffee shop in late November 2024.
It was a Friday afternoon, non-peak hours.
Ordered a piece of Ube Loaf and a 12oz hot latte.

From what I see on the shelves, Pallet would be the roaster for their espresso-based coffee.

My latte was slightly over extracted (hence a bit of a burnt bitterness, just slightly), but the Ube Loaf was pretty nice.

I bet coffee is relatively subjective, however, I believe a bit more fruity flavour would make the latte more balanced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxkawQ7R68fwbqwHLZwFVHvr-IXJ1gEidNVpA-&fid=0x0:0x8ba9cd64a6ece30"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"LZ Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVmt10h3Padiemooh7l_BPncjSnKmk7S4h0ehSk8XAV7E3a0gw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered a latte, and it turned out to be the best I’ve ever had in Richmond—perfectly balanced and smooth. I also tried their purple muffin, and the texture was absolutely amazing. Will definitely come back to try out other items on their menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLaFTvgNQzT1QZc7eHuBg5zad4HHTlQ-egArSQ&fid=0x0:0x8ba9cd64a6ece30"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Nick W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOcgvTDQITdk_BEgCLNEAQLcZlpaTdHgED_a7ulSMJTMBCipLl5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend and I visited there on Christmas. One of the few places open, glad we went, got a matcha latte, the matcha was just perfect not bitter at all. Also picked up an ube loaf, it was perfectly moist, and the very sweet guy working behind the counter warmed it up and brought it right out to me. Definitely made a great start to my holiday!! The look of the place is quite bright and clean. Would definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGckhA5KFR1EGzO0pHJfE8Yh1O-ryiSnFjZKwX&fid=0x0:0x8ba9cd64a6ece30"],"When":"2024-12-27"},{"Name":"Ollie Han","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqsdJoI5woZm4pgC3eKJ2ZbPOuqBtbPMv1lNO5Rg9CYTAl1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super charming café with thoughtful decor and a vibrant theme! So glad Richmond has a new coffee spot. The pastries are cute, the ube muffin is truly unique","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9NjG4nkUT4wuW25y347FA2G9AiAe5pykWhFJE&fid=0x0:0x8ba9cd64a6ece30"],"When":"2024-12-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mehr Poulad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnMmsASCmXLOvaFhR1RoQ03vxNx7oVUBdwy_npEYvb7k7uZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good coffee and a great space to be in.
Ordered an americano, double espresso and an ice coffee. All three were great and the coffee is strong which I like. Lots of seating inside with high ceilings making it welcoming. Only issue is parking as it is on a very busy corner in a very busy area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNh08BJWTaqqYz8XcF4bOOIW0ETKZChiBHoLTx&fid=0x0:0xd56b9b190e08affe"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Thomas Vigneras","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJvDiINYP35wd3GhLGnyiOKFGZdLMj1Qu_huXskJeuw6aCOxDDMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place. Been here multiple times and the coffee is always on point. Got really good mokas this time as shown in the photo. Basque cheese cake was fabulous and the ham and cheese croissant quite good although the croissant quality doesn't match that of a real French bakery (hard to find good quality croissants in B.C. anyways).
Nice vibes for a little coffee brunch with friends and family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkic-X_U7cvvXdvEWLeEmqmPWjj4yaw1WI9fEx&fid=0x0:0xd56b9b190e08affe"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Yumi Nagahara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1l7716Bdm3-_SmQySMKOTNUKz4oK28vziry7XdxpvYW3NMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently enjoyed a delightful passion fruit tea, and it was such a comforting experience. The space has plenty of seats, making it a wonderful spot to unwind and truly relax. It’s nice to have a place where you can take a moment to yourself!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-S2fkzaQb_hdgsZpEI0k81yy1ZFlfuMhjta38&fid=0x0:0xd56b9b190e08affe"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Justin Stauffer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVkFmxVsaPtl5lwafZaRPB8PoSFeUaNgiBHp6zFo-x6C4-0pLN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Super cool place for a small bite to eat and coffee/tea. The food and drinks are excellent. That being said the service was a bit below par, just slightly ignorant staff and the need to bring our dishes to a bin (which I don’t mind doing, however they should make the bin area a bit more nice and more obvious to the entire cafe).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXv-8kLcR5LIh8Ode9hJ1xDwiU1e0cahz644Ol&fid=0x0:0xd56b9b190e08affe"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rocanini Coffee has always been our go-to spot when we're in Steveston. It’s hands down the #1 café in the area in terms of coffee, vibe, and service! Every time we’re nearby, we make it a point to stop by. The Aeropress coffee is my personal favorite, and their mocha, latte, and coffee jelly are all top-notch. Their croissants and sandwiches are always fresh and make for a perfect pairing with the coffee. The cozy ambiance and friendly staff make it an even better experience. We'll definitely be back again and again! Highly recommend this gem.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2ZxQYLDHk2Is_JTpZHeJoj71ueET2Np-oDnYX&fid=0x0:0xd56b9b190e08affe"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Marcos Alejandro Badra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTLtd9nTY-LLq4HPTmhq6AheFYUM0AowvvUad4ue9KcNlgdemgnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I visit Rocanini Cafe at least once a week, and while it has its charms, there are a few areas that could use improvement. The location is generally great, and I've noticed a positive change in the service lately. The attendants and servers have become friendlier and more engaging, making an effort to connect with customers and smile, which enhances the overall experience.However, the cafe could benefit from better cleanliness. The tables are often sticky, and the worn table finishes make it difficult to maintain a clean appearance.

Additionally, the tables are quite wobbly, leading to spilled beverages, which can be frustrating.While the food is quite expensive, I feel the quality of the products used doesn't fully justify the high prices. Some improvement in this area would make the experience much more satisfying.

Rocanini has potential and provides a pleasant atmosphere, but addressing these issues would greatly enhance the experience for regular customers like myself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuJr6I4KnHvpGaQ6plwSLTYfxa_35aphV0eb1n&fid=0x0:0xd56b9b190e08affe"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Paulina Pedrero Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoiOld2vaC2Dv18bWNi8EDRiykD7MSCRsU3RK7RESh6xQghXxb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The place is a nice coffee shop, yesterday was a rainy and chilly day, we go for a drink, we ordered a cold yuzu honey tea that was really good!, but the blue matcha latte was so bland that the only flavor you can perceive was milk, i didn’t drink totally it wasn’t worth it, the restrooms were also so dirty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6YsKaSnUNic2EPJ86TqA7h9Z3YHBw6WWbatUE&fid=0x0:0xd56b9b190e08affe"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Barbara Heller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyc8ymVKjSMQliaWvMZrRZBuD4gNfPzFaJuyTEEGYXXqehUXq7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a lovely place! I came back a 2nd time before flying home because I enjoyed the first trip here so much! I enjoyed the Hojicha latte!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVOZ1iPQfRoo-Bs4_Sw4_9YHGc5eiRFb5XS9rA&fid=0x0:0xd56b9b190e08affe"],"When":"2024-9-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Look Look","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFnkEC0Vtlns3Rc_vpXyJoBK911s7R33e1juwoNfOw_Qrl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a family run restaurant and located inside the Steveston paramount.
As to support our neighbourhood restaurants, we want to try this for long time. However, their open hours are almost similar as my working hours and we can only try on Saturday (Sunday - off)!
Finally, we come today for late lunch. The owner are friendly and the foods are good. We try Pho/Coffee today and they also serve burgers, western breakfast too.
Sure will come again and highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPS1--Bia62cs6TVnicIpLFJfMgdTUY__WwetM&fid=0x0:0x896f80681144e16c"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"paul grewal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLL_5gAyVLhbsVHe22HJLiK-LIuUTj6EISuJJYPFgPYOIZ2KQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Greasy spoon/ Vietnamese
Fast and friendly service, the staff is great. I'm a breakfast fan so I came for that and it was good,  I would have given 5 stars but the hashbrowns are a potato patty. That being said, the Vietnamese food looked pretty good and my friend was quite satisfied with it.
Will return again and again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrew Castillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnBmb0w8cIZ9ukxl51-xBtxseYbfuNhDleoZneQ-8UT_K7VCq_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been here multiple times, and I've never had a bad experience. The food is always great and the service is equally as good. I would highly recommend eating here if you are considering trying a new place for Vietnamese food or just in the area for a snack","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Desy Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrUNUi5nBlBmUQMOU2Lo2Yu5SjMGgKZ2L2N1xVRXSvhFjaBcU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Riverside Cafe!  Hidden away inside the Steveston Harbour, is this family-run Vietnamese / American restaurant.

Another hole in the wall! Food was good, but nothing to rave too much about.  It is COLD inside so you might want to keep your jacket on for your meal!

1) Lemongrass Chicken on Rice with a Spring Roll
Overall it was a tasty dish, but I prefer ones from Pho 37, Thai Son, Com, Bonjour Vietnam, etc.  Despite being quite a bit cheaper than those other places, it does have less meat than the others.  Spring roll was decent!
4/5

2) Pho
Pho was standard, nothing to rave about.  Meat was a bit too lean and tough.  Broth was good and flavourful.
3.5/5

This cafe is situated right inside the Steveston Harbour, so feeding the cold fishermen with a nice home-style meal is perfect.  Would I come back? Yes!  But don't expect anything too fancy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYMlXQa9_bHdHFTKbDGB248ZcIFaPOt3VZ_tg&fid=0x0:0x896f80681144e16c"],"When":"2022-12-5"},{"Name":"Clara C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmc5kzCO5tkFsn4680DdIqFR890DxrKckFqBbF2fQo-K5WEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great hidden gem! Fantastic noodle soups and staff is friendly. I don't drink coffee but the Viet coffee is a must! Wish they opened for dinner as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Percy Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpYfKBRmcbCv3QlJ6bZXmv0ly8_CocIf_lBOXCAlxRrZaEag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was a little hard to find but glad we found it.   Nice little place with good all day breakfast and Vietnamese food.   We had the eggs, sausage,toast and hashbrown, rare beef, beef ball pho, lemon grass chicken, fried egg, spring roll on rice and lemon grass chicken, spring roll vermicelli bowl.  The food was very good and service was great.   Will come again...great find!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOc4hEPcv63VHIUJry-IGKT5pMyEODEj8e8nTzJ&fid=0x0:0x896f80681144e16c"],"When":"2022-9-20"},{"Name":"W T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdu0TMV7B9Y2mJkSC3Cb_ZRin-xtIVsRd9t2JXcXN3mCCzpbY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is made with love.  Good portions and tastes great. Staff is friendly.

Went back for takeout. Food still made with love. Eating it makes me happy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORckN6FU0wNOvDZzmckccpe7k0nj1hjuI2eSXy&fid=0x0:0x896f80681144e16c"],"When":"2022-11-12"},{"Name":"priscilla luarca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcHPyL4PQvXbHxJODS88u4f2xMg0a4bTylbgmnRVCK_Dsnqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a hole in the wall hidden gem. Came here for lunch with the kiddos. Ladies working were friendly and vietnamese food was good. Exceeded my expectations, given the location.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Erin Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNddZXBvjo1lM53d1JsGHCCAsJEWmjzWHaoOXhqaaioyHgIgaf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for lunch around noon on a weekday and it wasn't busy. The patio is clean and comfortable. Our server was nice and attentive.

We ordered eggs benedict with garlic shrimp, and another benedict with fried chicken. The fried chicken is well battered and fried, and was juicy since it was dark meat. The garlic shrimp was good, but if I'm honest I was a bit disappointed by the small size of the shrimp and the eggs that were used.

They were generous with the roasted potatoes and our meals tasted good, but for the price point it felt a bit underwhelming and the overall portion size for the eggs benedicts themselves has left me less than enthused to try this cafe again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtWcduJACjN62oAr55sTFfkUQMyOaymDFgDP3n&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Jennifer Osuna Ausa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTgleJyQy49XcPyy0x9GmD2FZbgVovfYE7EubdT6hoNd08zgl3SA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was our first time dining here, and we were not disappointed. We will surely return.The breakfast paella is a fusion dish, and the orzo rice is well prepared. They add a lot of shrimp, and the flavours combine nicely. The calamari was tender, and the flavour met my preferences.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp_4vdbbuq2tc_DUI7IbtdJ_WZx5MQmN7UzA3D&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Mochichi Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFyjPl7H-V7mWpuOxmhOZJlef_eIhgoybBQQCMDjX3GS8zgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is my first visit: Cannery cafe has  clean and comfortable outdoor seating.  Love their dishes with very good quality and presentation. Their spare ribs are so juicy, waffle with deep fried cod and poached egg is so good, Granny's clam chowder is extra yummy with the fresh bread. We also enjoyed their fresh brewed organic coffee, with hot milk and cream. Smart and courteous staff marks a great experience at the restaurant.  We'll definitely visit again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnMjBhICueHZW4mFKOtAtFIXY1vC8tsfHrnDd1&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"Ciaociao k","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXC98o0SMyIGT6PBDZZ1upK5e-wMdf2iaJ8WiCTjsLkNTDWJTYB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Patio season! We visited at Steveston early in May,of course no patio that time. Super nice weather no complain outside patio! Cafe is cute and cozy, not fancy but comfortable. Do not expect same as SFO or Seattle clam chowder. Soup is not enough. They have 3 options pay, cash, debit and credit. Cash and debit are better for pay.credit has to pay extra dollar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIGps6B6xh1GlixVEitud73CAC-hmcKS-qaeWD&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Ryan Dai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvz_7CRNc0uzQynlzLBSk6wo_JRdBk-3lTZRZl_hkyJTXWois=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely brunch spot in Steveston, offering a lot of options and great portion size. Plating and presentation was a pleasant surprise, had a wonderful time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuWezNJHt4pq31mT2OYMj2oKszPkY-DifGrhLL&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Mike Hassard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH-ZkQW5qJlRiHy-FNQ8xn3HmqC9mLEUcZ168947ILG-lhIDuY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Enjoyable relaxing breakfast. Food was great service was great cute restaurant with history. Make sure to check out the wall of famous patrons.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMK6wko7OMh1XCyrSjN3djzqlKSneNKNDCMyhWR&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Erica Ngan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxiFAMX-8U6Hf7I7ySV2AT1mYgYdeBidCPp2cDYnZKccTLsR17eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Liked the brunch options, their fries were unique, the food was displayed nicely as presentation is important. It's a small place that seems a bit crowded. It's busy on a sunny day, but didn't like that the building was old and glad we sat by the door for air circulation. Servers were nice and can customize your meal. Steak and lobster were surprisingly good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmWFDYqwWFxnXqha36ZojG88iuXufxmwP9-55D&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-3-4"},{"Name":"Sophie Song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYv0ajQfaQ3wgEOSuA8kGAiDy6DmnBuYNOsG4Nm-68UM6xqw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We gathered at Cannery Cafe on June 23, which is our yearly gathering and already keep going 6 years. We love the Cafe's environment, we choosed to sit at patio, beautiful view. And great service, when we told them that day is the birthday of one of our friends. The lady offered us beautiful cake. Nice experience and food, we love the granny chowder , and granny hot chocolate and salad.Back home, I started to watch the TV show: once upon a time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6_4KrXIH2SK-Ilu4hdG00CLlpIWpRl4y9uXba&fid=0x0:0x5ec0be08a92b9444"],"When":"2024-6-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sweets Fanatic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKT4q9vq4bFnKURKLo-IuFZkNgSUZrYyHCHwVq7PvVTaTofHHc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Note: this place is a canteen.

To people who are curious about here, this is located inside the building. You can ask the front desk and she'll direct you towards the area. Other than that, this is more of a canteen rather than a cafe.

The prices are great- 9.50$ for pasta and the portions are pretty large. A dish plus coffee is around 13.50$ and is enough for a single person. The cook is extremely nice, bringing all the food to your table and it's very empty during the day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwCLdsusfWm7EmhFeaJ4scZrQuVuCAEtB9lXaF&fid=0x0:0xa0e0e69c36f1056d"],"When":"2022-9-2"},{"Name":"Yi_ J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHUXHovF57HcrSFDyXujlPq3t3zLZCyvg_2vlqvtyKyTzEUi0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Clean and nice place
Price is great.
Around $12 for one person for the lunch
Coffee is from Pedro’s Organic Coffee","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOSIVeFEW1EdjhiSRBLF7X2KtbAgTdEngPMsun&fid=0x0:0xa0e0e69c36f1056d"],"When":"2023-9-15"},{"Name":"Petr Yan-Volkanovski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmwdQPJePPvpk70RoeGwUbkonpEBcLlkVqVZXU6pQ9_d9bVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a local hidden Gem! Great food at a very fair price point. Bolognese pasta is the best must try.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelly Henderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0NMQRsnCmQ5CzLv7U3dYAYMasCpYKEnyAL1koo1E6BnIhLrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I used to frequent this place nearly every other day, however, even though their prices are unbeatable within this area, it obviously adds up. I still make an effort to hit it up on my lunch break at least once a week and am NEVER disappointed. The portions are huge, the prices are more than reasonable, and the ingredients are fresh... not to mention, they make the burger patties in house.

Great and friendly staff who really accommodate your every request with a smile.

In my opinion, these guys set the bar for local mom and pop run joints for some great fare!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zach Holt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXERLVsgo4CCvD1x1hPc-62goI9Azy8MpQa30rq64_qCLX6Bw8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered a burger and linguine Alfredo.
Burger was ok. But the linguine was spaghetti… and the Alfredo was water from poorly drained pasta with creamer and maybe .05oz of cheese so I ate the burger the threw out the pasta after two bites trying to give them the benefit of the doubt. Doubt won, there were 4 people in there counting me.
Good prices. Pick off the menu wisely.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris Gigliotti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEmcKv4pqJ9onKpSJLGgpnJSmyJooI7FSpr1wMj9DrWqutZD_JHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best comfort ever! The meatball sub and beef dip with fries are simply divine, as are the the various pasta dishes. The turkey club, however, is my go to favorite. Service is always prompt and friendly, too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"brandon doupe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX26WWKFgigUYYQnTm37hvIu7ZRWnQeqMiXrn-20kX4_LJNWCM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The London Cafe is a little gem of a cafe.

I've been there a dozen times and have great food and service everytime.  There have been a few different faces in there over the years but they always seem to enjoy what they do and that helps in my opinion.

The Super Chicken is one of the best sandwiches I have had in a long time.  Great pasta and cheap drinks.

Decor is in need of an upgrade, but its a dinner... that's how they are supposed to look.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christiane Boyce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUk8rdRFmJ1KM7ygn-HJiAzOBfXcFMVGJJGIJ0MnvNC2qPJoLti3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I used to own this place so it will forever hold a place in my heart. Their food is for the most part homemade, very tasty and healthy. They have breakfast and lunch, take out and catering, salads and daily specials, and friendly staff!","Images":null,"When":""}]
