user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alice Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrFoTVG3bg2s1lpPG8HWYrdBBc8UTZJ3KxLi-QQieQcjin11TN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had such a pleasant time eating breakfast here. Their pancakes aren't on the menu, but I highly recommend them. The pancakes do take a bit of time for them to prepare, but they did a great job cooking them perfectly FUFFY. The couple that runs the store are one of the friendliest people. They're very tentative and always carry a smile on their faces. The spaghetti with homemade meat sauce is simple yet tasty. I'll definitely be back for those pancakes 🤤.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJF7f3Nrdf0qNzX6vbfntgpOlCrtE8hgLKMr4n&fid=0x0:0x30e9151f20574446"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Kin “Roderic” Law","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkK6DgzCJShRK56e_AG3IdlwhFoUCgUIyiwOIpjvXciE9fRpo9xw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It is not a classy restaurant. I ordered a full breakfast with a house coffee. Price is on high side. U may find it in Parker Place/Admiralty centre which is relatively cheaper. But the food in general is acceptable! The litte restaurant operated by Church fellow seniors. They were nice and humble.  The location is a bit remote and u need a pay parking. However, I was dropped by after visiting my family doctor. The advantage is it located under a clinical building and quite convenience to have food to feed your stomach 😃!! The atmosphere here is another good choice which I think is quiet and u can refresh yourself after consulting the doctor 🤔!!
It is worth for me to try Curry Chicken and beef in my next visit for a lunch 🤣which I heard were pretty good with local taste 💪","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMb3uvO4G5DPvpCIuqrgBAdkFDIxZQQCeJzjOgp&fid=0x0:0x30e9151f20574446"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"EdC CdE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVG5kTjfNM0e8Gg59V2cCknkINQqcXD847e5k5VWQmqGlTqG06h=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"cozy deli cafe serves comforting food. super friendly chatty staff

Surprisingly they have traditional dragon boat festive food - rice dumpling in 4 different flavors! I believe it’s a seasonal offer

Curry rice dumplings are something new & interesting while personally I prefer the traditional meat rice dumplings and the sweet rice dumplings with red bean paste…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMueYHlh6G-qW5pcrRnu0gBery-ttyIAVUShMge&fid=0x0:0x30e9151f20574446"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Vero Vero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJqM6z3NvGgp8fOHPNYXy_sxK1l4a3Acl0A1wGDJ4i1AfuQXig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Owner or staff was kind. But the price has gone up. Spaghetti is just like Jollibee without ham. I love Jollibee spaghetti so it was delicious. Spaghetti is over $14 now. And french fries $2.5(good price) And it really takes time to get your food after order like 15mins. Considering the parking lot is also $2.5 per hour, overall it makes everything pretty pricey( it will be great if parking fee gets covered). Good thing is they offer you coffee or soft drink on house when you dine in. I will visit again to try other sandwiches because I saw other people were enjoying sandwiches 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiqNM7-slvNw_7gs7wNyi0FGMkXjhOqZmWphtz&fid=0x0:0x30e9151f20574446"],"When":"2024-4-11"},{"Name":"Aly Benoit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7c-UEUi24ibtYVtbbSec2CYh54bbC4Fkhg6vWfdJ95rhVbKOD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The nicest couple running the store, delicious food, great value! I really enjoyed having lunch here :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSuN-II18LKiw8V-MbrpnyA7hFgCnVj1Z3F3eK&fid=0x0:0x30e9151f20574446"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Tanya Zhukov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAOH8BmdSl7Was0Esu-D7g8FFi0l8iQq59Hh27lBk7voTM__6Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful gem in the middle of Richmond. A very comfortable, quiet spot. Family owned by wonderful people who put service first. Always served with a smile, food is freshly made, hot and delicious.
Personally recommend getting the Cafe mocha, fairly priced and delicious

We will be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuJE7UANIO9PDG1boV-ZzBo2PwIQOFQxKOemAG&fid=0x0:0x30e9151f20574446"],"When":"2023-3-9"},{"Name":"Rahul Kumaar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnCcNmzfo43HcnqnI2ZhoUgAKqGC4WZmLi9xEu0rL4bicYb03-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A hidden gem. Very friendly and welcoming couple runs this place. I went in for a quick bite and had a veggie sandwich with coffee.

The veggie sandwich was really good. Very basic yet very fulfilling. Will definitely visit again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"aaron c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpvzR4UUNPOrNb3xi9hqgbGhc96Y0vsktvi7lsCsewGmxj6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Simple and welcoming location. Tried their spaghetti with home made meat sauce and their pancakes. Pancakes are not on the menu but should definitely ask about them. Very reasonably priced and delicious.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"ctm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXB1imkqcUxp_Bz-Je5mCP_ShxLap8YPZmbWo3qteDmNMMm7ePy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I typically avoid negative reviews but this one really pissed me off so it’s more of a buyer beware‼️‼️‼️

Ordered the holy duck and holy ****, it is absolutely tiny. I counted 3 little pieces of duck , one tiny slice of tomato and lettuce. It looks nothing like their image the use on their menu, and the DISPLAY MODEL they have in store. the actual product is extremely small and misleading . The size of the croissant is probably 1/2 of what it should be.

This looks like some grocery store bought tiny croissants and quickly slapped together with little to no effort.

I understand sometimes good food does not come in large sizes but this is just absolutely misleading; and the taste is nothing out of the ordinary. Using cheap ingredients to market products as high quality food is not something to be proud of.

Beware!! There is no way this is worth your hard earned money.

I do not recommend coming here if unless you have an appetite of a 2 year old child.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxZw70_hLtg2j7b_xSL9pHHV4nia3gfEB9IWxg&fid=0x0:0x5993a362f4b0d6d9"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"明好來示範by徐馬力","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQLC5pMP0vC1AYCyqJ5brqSpWpkuxwsBGEUrhJd5QneW4K5pfE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good Pour over coffee, and the sandwiches are very decent. Had scallop and shrimp sandwich and spicy chilly duck sandwich. Seen lots of people come here for oyster but too bad I am not an oyster fan, looks super fresh!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsoq1EZqJKCCmSqUViWDcJOhEJgkMJa4GyYltf&fid=0x0:0x5993a362f4b0d6d9"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Origin Delight Cafe in Pacific Plaza food court is a fantastic spot for a delightful meal. Their lobster scallop croissant is a must-try, offering a unique and delicious combination. The mango salad is fresh and flavorful, perfect for a light bite. Don’t miss their signature drinks like fruit tea and green tea, which are both refreshing and tasty. The lychee soda is a refreshing treat. Origin Delight Cafe is a top choice for excellent food and drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgrcukqsizfzWiaXIcE85c6IhGd0y_3GE-UB6-&fid=0x0:0x5993a362f4b0d6d9"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Cassandra Hung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyqE7_G_YQE66KTdUJ4OXzizw3a7lxSkRa8HY-fJWKGdjIYxfW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem in a food court. Superb service, small but offering great variety. Many people come for their oysters, but it’s their croissants that captured my heart 🥰😋 The mango coconut milk with aloe vera is my go-to for summer—refreshing and not overly sweet. The crème brûlée is also a must-try. I hope they’ll expand and move into a proper café space with seating soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlsqajt7QgUK7d_v5WCOFxIoxCtU6nOqmENBJN&fid=0x0:0x5993a362f4b0d6d9"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Mandy Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNuY-0jTdNxHB6ttH2ufYmdFgIPCnay3FkwmJb6Egjx8UEdzY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally got the chance to go to Origin Cafe and try their dishes. We had the fresh oysters, black truffle chicken croissant, scallop and shrimp croissant, and also the aeropress - preimum bean coffee. All of them were incredibly delicious! The croissants were generously filled and bursting with flavor. The cafe even thoughtfully provided disposable gloves, which was great. The oysters were fresh, plump, juicy and sweet, especially when paired with the spicy sauce and lemon. I recommend trying a little bit of the spicy sauce first before adding it to the oysters because it's quite spicy. The aeropressure coffee is a speciality selection, rich and smooth without any bitterness, with a hint of the natural acidity of the coffee beans, which was a pleasant surprise!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCCK8mGKriXlvMQR-gBbYLa1pIhRBYU2emR18&fid=0x0:0x5993a362f4b0d6d9"],"When":"2024-2-8"},{"Name":"Keanna Brudy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrvtVDpTLv907TJCSFf5_gQPgnW430klNywJKG1DsDcUodZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We arrived hungry and didn't savor our food but it was delicious!! We had the Lobster tail croissant, Spicy Duck croissant and 6 of the West Coast Oysters. Pairs with a Mango bubble tea and a pineapple bubble tea with cream top. The lobster was cooked well, not rubbery at all. The oysters were probably the freshest and largest oysters we have ever had. Well worth the 21$ for 6 oysters. They could probably charge double considering the size.
All in all, we thoroughly enjoyed our visit from Mission, BC to this cafe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNmc_UCqqMRbdikVJgKEqLs2uXipmw4wYaB2Un&fid=0x0:0x5993a362f4b0d6d9"],"When":"2024-3-16"},{"Name":"Danny Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh9iLvKMlzIwNDPlGVTDPUlwHsbvep-h1JgMdVcgZXaG5lVvewMw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This small cafe is in the food court area. I had their pour over coffee and a black truffle chicken croissant. Both are beyond my expectations, a very speciality coffee with a perfect croissant. It is a very good place for a quick bite and for a delicious drink or coffee","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLWEl5mrEXj_eWWMIGp_bwhh-2y31jRTS1sPcA&fid=0x0:0x5993a362f4b0d6d9"],"When":"2024-6-14"},{"Name":"Stanley Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJv828Mq0RI43_3pU5iL16DocKE33YwgSXBDUJw-tBWhL_ELA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A cafe that offers their best to the customers.
I ordered Flat White and oysters from the cafe today. The barista picked the coffee bean with a special characteristic for me. It's processed with brandy! I could smell the brandy aroma when the barista was preparing the coffee. Could taste a tiny bit of wine but not overly strong. Just right! Coffee specialist quality at chain cafe price...... much better value.
This was the second time I bought the freshly opened oysters from Origin. I had the palm-sized east coast oysters this time. Super yummy! They came with full set of condiments, well packed with ice. Chatted with the staff and I can tell they really care about the quality of food they deliver to their customers. That's the attitude I always look for! Definitely a cafe I'd like to visit often.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfvP9iuA5SdUGylBYQiiFIuT77JjxVM5Pnbty0&fid=0x0:0x5993a362f4b0d6d9"],"When":"2023-2-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tianqi Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6oHkKYEc4f8lk2-BSf5CXZWlczGEAYEMSD-V5a94VT9Nn-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"⭐️ I recently checked out this awesome new cafe in Richmond, and I can’t recommend it enough! The vibe inside is amazing—clean, stylish, and super relaxing. It’s the perfect spot to chill and recharge. From the moment I walked in, I felt so at ease.

☕️ 🍔 🍗 🥗 The coffee is absolutely spot-on—brewed perfectly—and pairs so well with their food. I tried the karaage burger and the beet salad, and wow, both were seriously good! The burger was packed with flavor, and the beet salad was fresh and vibrant—a great combo. (didn’t manage to take a photo before it’s gone 😂)

Plus, the prices are really reasonable for what you get. Whether you’re grabbing a quick coffee or sitting down for a meal, this place is totally worth a visit.

🚗 If you’re driving, there’s street parking, or you can park at Richmond Centre and take a short, lovely walk if the weather’s nice.

💛I’m already planning my next trip there and can’t wait for more people to discover this gem!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFHriT7kiLvA8WRPOjzCWXzaI_76MQptj-i3XY&fid=0x0:0x9e07d7364f8db31e"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Victor Ti (Cafeseeker)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJazTUcxAqd_LoWervGZB1rQd-HYNZikglNsos_EXvPtaH1qva=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5 star brunch restaurant in Richmond! We ordered Luxe Lobster Benny, Uni Pasta, Butter   Giant Salad, Crab Cake, and Karrage Burger. My favorite dishes are Lobster benny and Butter Giant Salad. Also, please try their dessert - Chocolate Cigar, crispy shells combine with ice cream, Wow! Compared with other Exquisite French brunch restaurant, their quality of food&dessert and price are more competitive, especially in Richmond. On the other hand, it is nice place for afternoon dating. BTW, their waiters are cute and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXZJtMdCTdmZefP4uJktd4jXvN3YLAKkG4LDU1&fid=0x0:0x9e07d7364f8db31e"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Hana Lash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbaueL8eDvKvURmsZTjJbUlzsuEMCNDDNffwn4Z3iLzLfaVw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":""We need more places like this in Richmond! I visited during their soft opening and loved it. It’s located in a quiet area of the city, with a cute interior that feels cozy and inviting. The food is great, and the atmosphere makes it a perfect spot to work or study. Highly recommend checking it out!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFCc-cBwRwDhBfQdn82Wz7oZ7ATYIuS0MrGKc_&fid=0x0:0x9e07d7364f8db31e"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Diane (Dineoutwithdee)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJfHVJSjIKAcPEXNIfUcWAtOeYHaXavqJYPtVJZ3lhCbCbpeo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful cafe serving tasty brunch, pastries, cool drinks and coffee! Loved the space/decor and the service was great as well. It’s a great spot for those get togethers with friends and foodies!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOID3_0XjD-ERRZNlJZn7DP9upQSBZizgjF_8qc&fid=0x0:0x9e07d7364f8db31e"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Wong Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWS8NDCYx-EAYp8-FGAzFMa-k2eUidrdorSPYFpvZRKKc5LZLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious food and cozy environment.
So many choices, a good place for proper meals or a break with some sweet treats.
Coffee is ok, definitely got room for improvement.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-qgYoGkn_kpZ7uk3glYjljRlBS025DZKlbnaz&fid=0x0:0x9e07d7364f8db31e"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"W Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1JvSEaqdQdczcQMdp8s3rAdMy6CLF2o2QBQbQ2IjmsCez0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Same high standard as their Vancouver location, now they have added brunch. Best we’ve had so far in Richmond. Great place for photos too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTJLKl68V8x3ANxp2qqO2pAeQ59Qzokx5DfZNv&fid=0x0:0x9e07d7364f8db31e"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"S L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtvX4QaZvpJSE6OTO4AzNWCUI-OFuSXuIEerJdvcbjAniG8MYn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Order at the counter before sitting , early morning cafe was warming and quiet. Ordered the Spanish latte and egg bacon croissant. Enjoyed it all and will go back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4reA7FpE5D8I3V2ir7KCApG08uYhOaKut67ii&fid=0x0:0x9e07d7364f8db31e"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Sarah Richardson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_FahoQBKzoW_sAhVyOAftvvYLkKcOIWVsBwi6lWnNai8UudNI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I stopped by here to pick up a few little sweet and savory pastries. The service was great and they had friendly staff.

The pastries and tiramisus I purchased were delicious. I got 9 items small items, and it was ~$40.

It's a shame they don't have a larger selection of small items for a picnic or brunch.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"B M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHRiTft7xJbNPQoS0fUeCb--58M6IbUMz2US--uF6mksNA-KE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love taking my children to this cozy play cafe. The best kids cafe with awesome food, cleanliness, and customer service that I have been to so far. Wonder kids cafe really has the standards that I look for when bringing my kids to eat and play. I will definitely keep coming back to this kids cafe. Doris is so awesome and a pleasure to talk to. She definitely makes you feel at home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP69NOiTJqEX_NtfqiKFMNi4qIoXepkaSjwf5p2&fid=0x0:0x4fb40bd6b058a931"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Chris B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmsHIbkgQ4C0Hd26T9Cz_q-2UImM2-duoe-6grA3AI8STVo34y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have 3 years-old baby. He loves this kids cafe so much. I can eat delicous food without any disturbance. I feel comfortable and relaxed here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0dgL9kwfBQf_YMyd2UOHOOPcQ2C3o6oGgydfw&fid=0x0:0x4fb40bd6b058a931"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"eric rio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHAob32RrMQ1j_u2IpHHZD0He0CBt0r0e-eKiRSc5Ar2L0t8kB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today is our first time coming here. And we were pleasantly surprised with how beautiful this place is. Our daughter who was 3 years old had so much fun. And with a touch of Good Food and Coffee and a great service... we highly recommend for anyone to visit this place when you are in Richmond. We are Definitely coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBfYo5PL-EkfMJrDgWkT1jEVgJYXrhnqwN5Ayt&fid=0x0:0x4fb40bd6b058a931"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Angela Jingyi Fu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJU8-IJUrbQxN0TBRWJC2NriOZaLp8n0GCEOdT7ZUxGW4J3ug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was so surprised and absolutely satisfied from my very first visit to this lovely cafe today. I over heard a lot of good commends from my other mama friends about this place before. They asked me to come together since the kids have no school today.

I loved the interior design right away when I stepped into this place. The color combination and designs are so lovely, playful and elegant. The sections are designed for different aged children, well blended into the dinning area which allows the parents to rest and watching the kids over their meals. Their menu has varieties of selections with Western and Asian food and drinks. My friends and I ordered some kids meal, snacks and traditional Asian meals for brunch. I was so happy to discover that they are all so tasty and well presented. We arrived before 10:30am, the place started to get busy after 11:00am. Their service was very good and steady.

I couldn’t help to share my wonderful experience to here just want to let more people to know about this great place. It is not just a place for your little ones to have fun, it is also a place for you, your family, and friends to gather, to relax and to enjoy the moment behind together with high end service and experience.

You really need to check this place out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHllyVYm2G1WSfsJ-_h3Haddjy7ZOGJ6Ey0Ul6&fid=0x0:0x4fb40bd6b058a931"],"When":"2023-11-14"},{"Name":"D. C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMOQFdmqykPjQvVOZhA99oxns3XyzxMfU6B20B_6jDIvXhVT9r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My child had a great time here. She was occupied the whole time. The only criticism I have is not to this establishment but more to the other parents of not properly supervising their kids. There was a larger kid who was very rowdy and played pretty rough around the smaller children.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgqx8tM5E4GR9YswTu7nwQXqd2VhvyPqgqv1WR&fid=0x0:0x4fb40bd6b058a931"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Erica Ngan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxiFAMX-8U6Hf7I7ySV2AT1mYgYdeBidCPp2cDYnZKccTLsR17eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's a cute play place for kids 1-7 years, older kids have a different fee, while parents eat, minimum spend is $20/ adult. They charge more for kids on weekends and they have a birthday room and option to decorate for party. It's quite clean but toys not picked up. Loud kids will ruin the atmosphere, more Montessori style play. Parking is not included when dining here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7aLTNooXEMaK-Afzk-qymNsqBRM3hvoyPFvoP&fid=0x0:0x4fb40bd6b058a931"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"Kristina Ilicheva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5zzzbr5S6SIbh5trel-ejGmCas1m2KmW2Jr9hIStYbb-JIWBG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing for little kids before 6 years old. Clean space, slippers provided, all surfaces are cleaned and disinfected 👌 food variety is wonderful, for adults and kids, mostly healthy options, no fast food. Stuff is very friendly and supportive at any matter. Strongly recommend to visit the place, will be your favourite indoor play place for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcWdaSJUL2SrgFknoS_moSCsvFiQxL_5AY4f5n&fid=0x0:0x4fb40bd6b058a931"],"When":"2023-11-15"},{"Name":"Bethany McNab","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvFUovcsvsZWYEmWNuL-M_sbptnQ89cyZvW1nFU4_h0pcASshs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This cafe is very cute. It has a really unique kitchen grocery play area. A small spot for crawlers with their level toys and a ball pit. It cost money to enter and they expect a minimum spend on food and drinks per person. So it adds up. The whole place is really clean and even has cameras, so you can keep an eye on your kid at a distance.

Hot meals presented, which we all delicious and homestyle

One parent and kid with food was aprox 50$.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObqgMRGVYMblMFO9mTuI3s9m9WMjafDZIEuPDr&fid=0x0:0x4fb40bd6b058a931"],"When":"2023-3-2"}]

title: My Coffee
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true},{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bernie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPXTBFQGy4UZogf6r0hGxUGZ8fvtwePPN5iicbAtQksaWtpwOP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A coffee place gem at the Lansdowne Foodcourt. I tried this coffee shop for a Western breakfast craving.  Got a brewed coffee and a yummy waffle with cream and maple syrup. They also have a variety of delicious baked products.   As an avid coffee drinker, I loved the robust taste of freshly brewed coffee. You get your money’s worth.  The staff is great, fast and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzXIzb84_Per-vJf36yNin2tIWR61KDeGp5kzJ&fid=0x0:0x9e21d05cd22a00c0"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing coffee shop! I was very impressed by the quality of their products and their very reasonable and affordable prices. I highly reccomend the regular banana flavoured bubble tea with coconut jelly ($3.95)! It tastes just like a British banana milkshake. Plus, with any drink, you can add on two fresh made waffles with whipped cream and syrup for only $2.50! It's delicious too. They also have fresh baked scones that I want to try in the future. Highly reccomend this place if you are in Landsdowne food court. Service is absolutely excellent too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNP-WumdSLTHD-d2247RiIderR5_PTs_r-xJ_--&fid=0x0:0x9e21d05cd22a00c0"],"When":"2021-6-12"},{"Name":"Romarie R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzW5qJ6Byk1R2-iF2t8IobirxqbxjnMZt96PK0T0go7mibDUc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been eyeing to try for a very long time. So today I finally tried it. I was planning to get a coffee and one pastries but it change. Because I walk all the way here I feel so hot so I ordered Iced Latte then I saw the poster on the cashier Waffle ($2.50 additional for any ordered of a drink) So I asked the nice lady working if I can order it. She said yes but I need to wait for couple of minutes.  I was like sure.  She also asked me if I want some sugar on my iced latte. So friendly . She's the only one working that morning i feel so bad cause she just open 10am and I ordered a Waffle 😅 she's already busy before that. So she gave me first my latte and I just stayed on the corner waiting for my waffle I expect it will take a while cause she is so busy but no less than 3 mins. I feel inlove more cause of the smell so fresh why she is making it. Overall I purchased $7 something. Not bad at all. The Waffle came in 2 pcs with whipped cream on top and maple syrup on the side. I would definitely comeback here again and try their scones,brownies I saw first 😁😉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfQnz8ieUDWZ5JPJJ84Keax0XpuYU-VaQmm6v_&fid=0x0:0x9e21d05cd22a00c0"],"When":"2022-7-5"},{"Name":"Urvashi Gautam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-JsBPWns7aDcToqon1F-acNN3eI1Edex5K-ajgTHAwvHKoBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this charming coffee shop and had a delightful experience. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, but what truly sets it apart is the friendly staff. The service is exceptional, with a special shout-out to the wonderful barista who is always welcoming with a bright smile. The coffee is fantastic, but it's the warm hospitality that makes this place a standout gem. Highly recommended for a cozy and delightful coffee experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOr9EeiCzib9q4QtRVmtgBoayEi9D6BGzHdG1Il&fid=0x0:0x9e21d05cd22a00c0"],"When":"2023-12-6"},{"Name":"Austin Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHum01ey_MeIMUYynBQNNqO3jAErV-Sh_aZuntzxtn7df5Nw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Underrated. I have visited My Coffee numerous times now, primarily ordering the Mocha Frapp. The flavour is rich and tastes high quality. The consistency and how long the drink stays a frapp/slush/smoothie seems to be better and longer than other drink stores, including Starbucks, Tim Hortons, and the multitude of bubble tea stores. The prices are slightly cheaper than competitors as well.

Another menu item I have tried is the Green Tea Matcha Frapp. The taste reminds me of green tea-flavoured ice cream.

As of now, I have ordered from two different employees, but both are extremely friendly and efficient. If the rest of the menu is as high quality as the two items I have tried, My Coffee is definitely a place to visit and revisit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQgfNGKRixqbreonfYuxPPS7l4lxVqSo1Cg_sB&fid=0x0:0x9e21d05cd22a00c0"],"When":"2023-4-8"},{"Name":"R T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3qKHbtmD1fo11AAGY9Zyb-prKTL50gjE8OiiO4xLjhrjKJ2Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a surprise to find it in food court!
The waffle taste good, and the most astonishing is the HK style tea. It tastes exactly like the local HK "stocking tea" 絲襪奶茶！ I definitely will come agaiin! 👍👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_6g9Lkl8UrniRLQivepR5LiVDP66lyziGImnf&fid=0x0:0x9e21d05cd22a00c0"],"When":"2023-8-7"},{"Name":"chinwe Crystal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDaR07RBVX8kIWuLnj6kWc7H0I1IyEVHyEj8ll_AWRH2ajKA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Most of these reviews are just lies I had high hopes ordered caramel macchiato with oatmilk it was horrible alongside I got Sausage roll big mistake! I wasted my $12 I left the order at the counter the staff there had no empathy! Guys don’t bother going here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1f-vpJowrhq5vNtDaB7CQ0XS9FqpDitQrWmnWHwwrRZ12Ww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are at Lansdowne Mall and you need a strong jolt of good coffee, then this is the place for you. In addition to your usual coffee, they also make frappes, macchiato and the like, with real espresso shots! A definite must have if you are doing marathon shopping around the mall!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Elisa Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2KnuzcVu8y_F-Ig0pQTw681CuVq4SxWE7iJrVGkkU0asuUQkf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When we travel we like to ask the locals where they go daily. Of high recommendations Steveston Coffee Company was consistently mentioned by the locals. We had a Cortado, Cappuccino, and hot chocolate.

Family run by husband and wife, this was a really nice coffeehouse. The owner spent some time talking to me about coffee and it was lovely. A must stop in as an iconic coffeehouse in Steveston.

Free street side parking is available (3 hour max), limited seating, tight space in coffeehouse.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN06rvSr8c3pZdt4v9GmNMMK0I-9ikAr5FJ0BnJ&fid=0x0:0xf9f565d785bca5ad"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Noor Pwala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX73wZYOxvQUP_-hEkhgMR6FFgRokITePDBxNfDv6fPUVkVp2BD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little cafe with great coffee; my caramel macchiato and my husband’s latte were fantastic. Would definitely recommend and if we ever visit steveston again, we will go back for sure!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnUbXxdgMaAqUu_RYuVktZKZ66FwuyCPsU2F-p&fid=0x0:0xf9f565d785bca5ad"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Bonnie Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnEc4L_oX33x1BIdSnyu3qIy05RmcbQP1bJwBirlW_Yv38YSLczA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice Flat white.
Croissant n scones r good 👍🏻 too. Consistent customers visits👍🏻😎
Wraps n bagel 🥯 writtebn on blackboard, 🤔 unsure if still serving as appeared not on menu","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxmNSlL1Fgef5Ft1eH2HnmZvOy6Je5sGjKgcan&fid=0x0:0xf9f565d785bca5ad"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"Kwong Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRNhrcdIOQyhkpCbdjoUSwC0OqkPEp5C09o-KZX9pyAsIQioX9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"☕🌧️ A Perfect Escape on a Rainy Day at Steveston Coffee 🌧️☕

On a rainy Sunday, I found solace in the cozy confines of Steveston Coffee Company near Fisherman's Wharf. Their Latte was a highlight, offering rich and comforting flavors that perfectly complemented the day's mood. The café's ambiance, with its warm and inviting decor, provided an ideal backdrop for relaxation. It's a great spot for anyone seeking a quiet retreat and a delicious coffee in Richmond.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJeGpIzlFjgQ5qVKp09q9mfSXVp7SVkbrv3JFh&fid=0x0:0xf9f565d785bca5ad"],"When":"2024-2-11"},{"Name":"Jack C.S. W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVdnkQxYRl2U4uADHQtHhnTZ3y5_vhQQs3Ney8YGmJee-llJ6NWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Looks like a family shop by an asia couple. Latte art could improve but the taste was great. Subtle uniqueness in the beans. Well priced, was pretty busy in the morning, but smooth operation by the experienced couple.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6qfa_gZLPkXjX2j0bpStStjafaTnEBEOp7eMq&fid=0x0:0xf9f565d785bca5ad"],"When":"2023-12-16"},{"Name":"Ken Mogridge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3Ml8d1_DawOEpC9BGDlwnu-HDiERRmxYUGKPaV0u2VlGki3R9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome coffee. Great selection. Treats for 4 legged visitors. Sit in or out.
Perfect place to chill during a visit to Steveston","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven Tanaka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWK9bDs4c7P7rYbjduLt85BsSIhstBOchiaNtMf2MR90wxUVEc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I prefer to support local independent shops but unfortunately I was disappointed by the attitude of the owner/barista.  I asked to use the washroom before ordering and she insisted that I order first.  Understandably in busy times, washroom access can be an issue for public.  However, I am clearly not a homeless person and intended on making a purchase.

The americano was tasty and the environment would, otherwise, be comfortable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"__","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURtewwsqVG5PO3uKPn3OOA0FnfaP0WZtSfpikwyWKQHm8YamdS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always make a stop in Steveston when going to Vancouver from Seattle, and the Steveston Coffee Company is one of the reasons why. The cafe is clean and nicely decorated. Menu has many options for coffee drinks and bakery items. The brands they use are roasted in a way that makes them coffee really flavorful and not bitter - it's better than most coffee places in Seattle.

I would enthusiastically recommend Steveston Coffee Company.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOv1t_VmCoEm2aVgWMkHBdqUftJttkB-rgttEqn&fid=0x0:0xf9f565d785bca5ad"],"When":"2023-8-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Madeline Pashnik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAC20xn6tQi6-uSahDNj66aA43GiNKH0EHgkxJTo3gSJ2_aA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Randomly found this little coffee shop and glad I did! I had a breakfast wrap and cappuccino. Both were really good. The wrap seemed really fresh. The staff was extremely kind.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPICgidnbcdPJARq2PBHjflm-v1ZXUPgLjVx1z0&fid=0x0:0x6f2a5f1d11ede443"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Suman Bilkhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgOEqlVcR-SHJwu_c7T9FCQhKLIbhYsmGic_lANm34xi4hCfo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The sandwich was great..could use a little more sauce. I got a side of Siracha and Was perfect!
The breakfast toast was good too..maybe some bagel seasoning would help with the salinity and add some zing..or a little drizzle of a chipotle mayo.  Cappuccino was good..but could be stronger and the chai latte was good too but needs a little more strong tea flavour.  I know this place is newer so we look for ward to coming back and trying other things on the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmu_s0l5-vSpeFyv39e_eLMqqDWIHtryX2qJjr&fid=0x0:0x6f2a5f1d11ede443"],"When":"2021-10-1"},{"Name":"Mel L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrFGuGuZoTeJwGMDhPMiN1vtTGHuPijis3Yx0fde2EK4DqXXI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quiet little clean cafe . Yummy muffin and coffee. Great spot in the area .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmxAa_8w__DT8BneUjzoS64n4_x1ZGbHpr7JD4&fid=0x0:0x6f2a5f1d11ede443"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very upbeat place with fresh food. Really liked it. The avocado toast with goat cheese, tomato, and balsamic vinegar was DELISH and fresh. It seems they operate as a charity that benefits the community too so that was neat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX4gxvgalWUlUFK1FwXtQyrvJui7i-ucKWBLFL&fid=0x0:0x6f2a5f1d11ede443"],"When":"2022-3-17"},{"Name":"Cacey L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlwHsC_NZUHR7pMEzQgpbrKJ3YiAJ971Jw3cIu1EnSpP10zbfVAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best cafe in the neighborhood!! Got a small Iced Latte and a Turkey Sandwich for only $11 included tax. Love it, absolutely will come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh1a-Ec0DyDgXnVahybB33DudyGSUrC2m85j1Z&fid=0x0:0x6f2a5f1d11ede443"],"When":"2021-8-13"},{"Name":"Glen Keith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKY4WmW8wE4X6u6JcnpRgkFUZQRkaMiMWXG8oqkQU3nohMQuw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst catering service and worst food ever
On 16th Feb 2024, we appointed Storey's catering service for the celebration of our daughters birthday. The food they served were comparable to the street foods. Highly disappointed with the catering people and food quality
Firstly, their service were super slow, guests were waiting for cocktails and starters.
Secondly the catering boys were too lazy to move and the manager who was in charge was the most cunning person ever met, his only intent is to save food or steal in other word.
Thirdly, the catering boys were taking the whole day just to prepare the drinks and serving the cake, the guests were literally irritated. We made a live pasta counter, but the person making pasta was so slow that half of the guest could get the chance to eat.
Coming to the food, it's comparable to the road side food, the chicken is half boiled chicken literally floating on a tub of water, The food was so hard, rubbery and cold, that no one could finish their meal. We were much ashamed of the food to our guest, all because of the wrong choice of taking food catering from Storey's, that too so expensive.

Whoever reading this,please never go Storey's Cafe and catering.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tony Moulatsiotis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJASY2ASY8N7tjFWeDUbdMgpkGaXB6l_cSCDUR62F-V2MybrUjx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like this cafe. I come here regularly to get sandwiches, soup, and day-old muffins and scones for take-out. the sandwiches are always great. Never had the coffee so I can't speak to that. I live nearby and it is my most visited local cafe.

Jamie and Jordie are great friendly people. This cafe is part of a non-profit organization, so your money is going to a better cause than padding some already rich CEOs pockets.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Young Chia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZAiptI2de3J2Gbs2WoHNdwc4eBDpL0Gdnyh_q0KSdzQlBNbeI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional quality for an incredibly fair price, ambiance is calm and pleasant. Excellent location for lunch, coffee or even a study date.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sarah Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgKfTvTU39GcFwEYKiM-A6cN2DenDwi2_yEuw--YUVCT2GM3PxcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food: Fantastic food! We got a lemon lavender mousse cake- perfect sweetness, delicious, and so light! My matcha latte was strong and perfect! 😊 they sell their own coffee beans and you can even see how they are roasted through the window!

Service: Excellent service! One of the ladies helped my friend pick the coffee beans she wanted.

Atmosphere: My friends and i LOVED it here!!! Sat here for at least an hour to avoid the rain. They have a single clean and accessible washroom, but you have to ask for the key.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnScekPYyDYzjvSs0Adm2AA9FXzvjIaRTyW0GQ&fid=0x0:0x91797bc4560ad8d"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"William Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmQdctlbM12t5Occdf84xI_X4OatAdUnoO7Mf5nuujaBWYasmgPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My rating is based on the siphon coffee, which was weak, I had but I'm sure the other coffees would have been better.

Parking is free in the ever busy Union Square shopping center parking lot.

Service is very good and the staff are pretty friendly.

The dining room was pretty comfortable and I would definitely visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1iVrvK51J-k87nWVReLyMYvu7VMHl9GOzjNz4&fid=0x0:0x91797bc4560ad8d"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Eric D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJ2MEGmYI0aVlBihe5SoOfFnPKaLqiMvg7jFkHnLbZXuiV4hsL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The coffee bean menu is very rich, but most of it is just for siphon, a brewing method that I don't find very delicious. Latte is very ordinary, not as good as I expected. Fruit Garden tea is very delicious, fragrant and tastes sweet like candy. Cheesecake is quite delicious but Mango Cheesecake tastes more like Mousse than Cheesecake 😂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvWEZonBBY8iPsj5Sktm9Ugw11O1yF2ElknZ4H&fid=0x0:0x91797bc4560ad8d"],"When":"2024-4-15"},{"Name":"Sikander H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNmjTEd9_FxsAT4gVm8dv1nbtMnnm5nSfmZM0TUcGYU3YUn4kC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great coffee and great service. Lil pricey but also really good.

Would recommend getting the tea. Note they charge for honey as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nancy Fu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI82VWwTk83ZouVZIu9JI-1KlOAwZZTvm5Gdr2dx9KDXvvPOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The coffee is excellent, and the cake is delicious. The environment is beautiful. The quality of the coffee is very high. It was an excellent experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-yGmbXvgEz6OlvZAy29kMeCgrVKDR7FeawBCt&fid=0x0:0x91797bc4560ad8d"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Steve Bush","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJ-hGlS5uEPIMy86HldnJsoDwq8LbGAfr8LRWOEvmurnLSxjcb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Coffee drinks were tasty and well-presented. Food a little overpriced but not too bad. Parking is VERY difficult to find, especially around lunchtime. Seems to be a popular place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brian Shaler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVanm_SU1M6cSuCRW78pg1T2oWnXPERDUCzn8bF70zKPszCwZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What everyone has been saying. It’s a wonderfully cute coffee/tea/cake shop. Had some rose tea and some earl grey. Both yum. The tiramisu a delight. All the cakes looked wonderful. The staff were courteous and generally great at their jobs. Can’t wait to come back. (Came back again and had a tasty sandwich and a slice of heaven, I mean earl grey strawberry cake. Still very impressed by the staff here)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKwBz4_lZuh2nWCVKp1vo7L7ZQQy_35IUdoneD&fid=0x0:0x91797bc4560ad8d"],"When":"2022-2-18"},{"Name":"Eddie So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISSdmRal6WEYNToT2BfCZQ0cdumKRhmtyRM82KD93UMkc0-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife bring me to this coffee shop.  She likes tea and the decorations there. The cake, sandwiches, tea and coffee are all good.  She took some pictures of this shop.
The staff there are nice and helpful.  They pay good attention to the customers. The place is tidy and clean.
My wife told me that she wishes some more fancy chocolate decorations around the cake next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOWDVc1QPmkhp8eABC3ShQ1JcZn8BQ4LQNZoGL&fid=0x0:0x91797bc4560ad8d"],"When":"2022-6-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Elton Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_SVkVqkNe3SvSFwaZ1xrBYHObNVkTiTTXXYykf58guqGIk3qy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a nice cafe with plenty of choices of Taiwanese foods and drinks. The interior has a wooden hut theme like an old wooden inn in a small town. The vibes is warm and comfy with good service.

I usually come here for Taiwanese style milk tea and snacks. The Taiwanese chicken sandwiches is one of my favourite foods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRILHJtblc1mCONAk-R9CUBbaZ3e638KZjo2k&fid=0x0:0xb333a051e4a8db9a"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Aminul Huq","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVzqymJ0TBICnYonVoahhL-Obco1YY5NFXkXew4a2XKep2j90VNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good place to enjoy tea, coffee and dessert. This has always been my go to place for desert for the past 2Years. Nice atmosphere to sit down and talk. My favorite is the chocolate coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxaXJNiwfK7W1Qa94-6tQJcbeITluvxiqtngs1&fid=0x0:0xb333a051e4a8db9a"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Juan Fernando Tirado Uribe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_JUbrk0nXxFocvio5qhbrYVwMcTsK5shZSOSNdKJBD9iYeIvS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is an old-style themed cafe that takes you back to the 50s or 60s with its vintage furniture and nostalgic decor. The atmosphere was very chilled and relaxed, making it a perfect spot to unwind.

The menu focuses on coffee, tea, desserts, and light meals. Everything we tried was beautifully presented and very tasty.

Overall, Cafe Leisure offers a nice experience with its old-fashioned charm and delicious offerings. If you're looking for a cozy place to enjoy a good cup of coffee and some sweet treats, I highly recommend visiting 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtn17__P7_4ukVb7dVcmK49TixrXqcdiJTBnu3&fid=0x0:0xb333a051e4a8db9a"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Angel-Connie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqrdJ1_oHixLkvmJI-GgqCPCjZF4dRN52Z9UavctvKXs2OEyPuhw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my all time favorite spot in Richmond for brunch in the past 25 years. Cozy European interior, friendly staff. Quality coffee, delicious brunch items and Taiwanese style sweets. 👌🏼👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzRgGxEGrA4TKq23Y3I7-_pQUgCCawpwnXaueY&fid=0x0:0xb333a051e4a8db9a"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"K Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBu4_ZaAgECG41rev8GrGyGl2x4Ekp-734YP2jktPLGAnRXGaB4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The taste and vibe is timeless. Thank you for keeping the way it is since I first visited as a teen. The shave ice is pack with toppings and it is perfectly pair with syrup. Is a cute place to gather and converse.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHAqDAedfbHQIwYaj4zmuYuMnULufdYbv83io-&fid=0x0:0xb333a051e4a8db9a"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Little Journey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlNkzOJynLpgqJCrPnrmAAn5viwim-B3Uir-26DOWxIzwcnZ0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I didn't realize this cozy cafe in Richmond until recently. The English style tea cups and the interior decor has a vintage aesthetic. They have a variety of coffee/tea and desserts to choose from.

I was told it has been around for so many years. Well, it's never too late to try all of their signature dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdZitEDX12i7bmAuH2Mf67tUaoHfeS8rArOFbs&fid=0x0:0xb333a051e4a8db9a"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Kateryna Lazaryeva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSlLwInOjTD3QhFCZzPQIAdE0julelZFq0LL29qA3f9uUmcw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great cafe with classical interior design. The most unique things about the interior design are the collection of tea cups and different photos on the wall. We found it very elegant and nice.
The menu has different kinds of dishes ranging from main course dishes to desserts.
The staff is very friendly. This is a great place to experience the elegance of Western culture with your family and friends!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcj2VGmRURnGlIoXL9KX9aiVTqTaC69F_UeOQ-&fid=0x0:0xb333a051e4a8db9a"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Lisa N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2KHLvnsh19HJMAOMiI8byw-52uRB0TkrEatkGaTv_TqsJFoVa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Unassuming cafe but partner insisted we visit from his past experience with Taiwanese friends many years ago. Our food and drinks were good. Fresh taro, #43 hot winter melon with taro/sweet potato was tasty (but too sweet), fried chicken was great, as well as the souffle thick toast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9rDYwY3gavVKZBkDKQrnLO02bNClm2hGZ2b4c&fid=0x0:0xb333a051e4a8db9a"],"When":"2024-5-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Melissa Meng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfi_MaQwJQjr5awFnfBadZv0UHcxu-wrWjT5PFn9oDD0gq0vU3JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice and quiet place for friends or business meet. I always have clients meet here, not many noise here, suitable for chatting. Seems they changed the owner recently. Inside the clean and organized, a lot of parking lots outside. Bakery and drinks are good as usual. Really worth to visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGSyK6T_d9TBJbb7A362J5oIk_z1S3C30ZrFj_&fid=0x0:0x614700db0d98851d"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Jackysonice","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfzBwU0XeAdoDfyNhuljHQkLwIYszOcGcf1Tf2VvVjrJ_zXw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The coffee is really good ,and super fresh sandwich and muffin too. The service is excellent and all the staffs are very friendly too. I really enjoy the coffee and the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEvVUDPS1aNteUY8D4XDm3eoi7WIWDN1AUMsg1&fid=0x0:0x614700db0d98851d"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"TAO FU","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNZbnfihj9k2w3fhAcKLrarwZdh5eC5dph7o84YVHs5hrfa2FD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

I recently visited Blenz Coffee, and I must say, the new management by Ruby and Alex has transformed this place into a true gem! From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with warm smiles and exceptional service. The atmosphere is cozy and inviting, making it the perfect spot to relax or get some work done.

The coffee is absolutely fantastic! They have a great selection of blends, and you can really taste the quality in every sip. I also tried their pastries, and they were fresh and delicious—definitely a must-try!

Ruby and Alex have done a wonderful job creating a welcoming environment, and their passion for coffee really shines through. I highly recommend checking out Blenz Coffee if you haven't already. I can't wait to come back and enjoy another cup! Keep up the great work, Ruby and Alex!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mustang Marauder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWx5j8EX8z14QXjNA1cllBB0VCd1dP9vvussYi9txglNQc85GGR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Needed a cup of coffee ☕ soo came to Blenz Coffee. Rejuvenated after having my cafe. Great courteous Staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN93ejs8rBUoAFqnlLium-SkytgWaPfCuErsCQ-&fid=0x0:0x614700db0d98851d"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"wenchao zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxOGFO7dJCbB78iACZimHLAEdToCqe6IaqxdI0dkx7eOz5fA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The BEST service I've ever had from the new owner of Blenz Coffee.The place seemed very well kept and cozy felt like home. Hot chocolate is a must try on the menu! I would highly recommended anyone who likes the hot chocolate.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tiara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdwUnwSAkNW5Zl3YiUXPlmqV7pO6nJ8rlMt1DRnRaBFlLr37I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"i just went to buy the ube matcha ferrero, it usually taste good and never had a problem with other barista (they couldve make it differently that sometimes it taste different) but i still can taste the ube and matcha on the drink, but with this barista not only that he was using an airpods when taking the order, theres no customer service at all too, the drink taste just like freshmilk since he added 98% of the cup with only fresh milk i saw while waiting on the counter. i thought it just how the drink made but then i went to walk to my work and drink it, it shouldn't even be served at any point🙃🥲 i tried to mix it but it still doesnt look like ube matcha🥲 he also served the drinks while the ube syrup still on the bottom 98% of the fresh milk so its white and not purple and green because he didnt even mix the syrup☺️ i had to mix it and it taste just like fresh milk for $8","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtCS4yiaCic8l4UfL75Kkrzq6yIA4LaBxY2pUz&fid=0x0:0x614700db0d98851d"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Diane (Dineoutwithdee)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJfHVJSjIKAcPEXNIfUcWAtOeYHaXavqJYPtVJZ3lhCbCbpeo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Update Oct 2021:
I have to add to my review because the last couple of times I have been since, there has been one lone person working despite the long lineup during mid afternoon on a weekend. The person was kind to every customer and was moving as quickly as he possibly can. Well deserved kudos to a hard working person who continued to serve customers with a great attitude. Also, we enjoyed our coffees yet again.

Original review:

Been here many times over the years and it’s always been packed. They were quiet during my mid afternoon visit on a Sunday last weekend though, most likely due to the dine in restrictions. However, I do suggest swinging by if you are looking for coffee. They have some patio seating and a ton of parking in the lot, in case you’d rather chill in your car instead.

I like their mochachillos, caramel lattes and hot chocolates. The guy who served us was really nice and friendly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcdtQ_k6UTS1-ZdCfnL14I7ZtecyP0OHPz3dme&fid=0x0:0x614700db0d98851d"],"When":"2021-4-24"},{"Name":"John Wu (Bun)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfKCbONy8geXldXOzG-RUFdaf5DDFT9hZCtzgwdSb0ESQXNG4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It's a blenz coffee cafe. Do not expect to be a fancy place. I like that it opens very early. I arrived around 7:30 AM on a Sunday. Lots of seating available.

Suggestion for any cafe. Bring an extension cord  if you want to charge anything.

One thing is that this place has a stale alcohol smell. And the washroom could be a bit cleaner. But it's acceptable

I rated 3 stars for good enough. Perfect way to spend you very early morning. Sit, sip, and enjoy your newspaper","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoXzUafKeRH8_j5VyrNUHvgqkds-Bmo1foetuA&fid=0x0:0x614700db0d98851d"],"When":"2023-8-6"}]

[{"Name":"Robert Cole","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX83YQyO79dJPTx468i5SQq5-WjR3aJF2mZVO2kk8SSCEQjY6x7MA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice artwork and relaxing environment. The Benny's were tasty and the coffee fresh. The printed Latte art was nice, and only required sending a photo via WeChat to the scanned qr code on their wall. The only negative, is the price. Well the breakfast was very yummy, the price was steep. We were hungry, and the ambience was nice, so we decided to pay anyways. Would gladly return if we were in the area. ✌️☕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCz7rD7YhCBdZRQFS1s4s904p58PG9f1l4dONy&fid=0x0:0x41f2d4b874099fa5"],"When":"2021-3-20"},{"Name":"Simon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLeXtcIkg8lqSKv4ULjPR48sPEd_xEDt4gVsxCjhIPgLN07kAm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Coffee is nice and environment is quiet. However there's obviously a lot more going on behind this place other than coffee. Lots of people walking in and out and into the back. People smoking right outside the area made this experience much less inviting and a bit disappointing.  Wouldn't recommend this place as a great place to work, but if you're only here for short while, it's still a unique and clean environment.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Drew P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDcf1NU3uRMYqNDSa8s8VpM5fD2DvLn0kBzZCXvFNA7m_yoA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service was great, and the coffee too :) A nice atmosphere in the morning.

To everyone complaining about the owner parking in the handicap spot.... I get that this is disrespectful, but it is obvious that he parks to the side of the spot like that to leave room for someone else with a permit to park in the remaining large space to the left. Why call him out and say he is taking up two spaces?! There is no need to be finding extra problems that don't exist, just to make a point. That kind of public shaming and use of rhetoric is discrediting of the real issue, and only contributes to arguments proliferating in an exaggerated and unproductive way.

I enjoyed my time here and will come back, thanks for the hospitality Italove!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"WANDER THIS WORLD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUm9C2QLItRB-mEusLLCqBAHT72rJuDirXuuvLI402bMiWXZRWZnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The appeal was the coffee art for me. The Macchiato was sweet and had tasted good to me. Fast, friendly service was appreciated too!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"LIN YANG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi3Pa_JzEq5Xgq6f3aWqkvSrPiK-y2tvtY8Aqu1hBYZKKQ_lBXFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good place if you want to have quite place for a coffee, and enjoy the wifi and beautiful environment there. Cheers!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Scott Donnelly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5EAF9DtH4ijmCd0whZuXPrGMsOI2VrSXFoYfn26161GWcAA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Clean nice place, service was good coffee was served quick. Hard to find and would probably do well in a mainstream area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tow Stories - Jonny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqnWah7w89CMmsrlULTbf7N47xnAq69CnvUuNna3YpQxwTopw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Cafe in richmond, hands down. Great atmosphere, great staff!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hamed Noori","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMAUuMUOrwjRZa9CPs8hCA6rz4GhTLtyibWaWdlZ2YB_aPXCtNAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place and staff.
Coffee is delicious","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Blenz Coffee at Richmond Centre is a hidden gem, especially during the holiday season! Their Christmas special hot chocolate is absolutely delightful – rich, creamy, and perfectly balanced with festive flavors that bring the holiday spirit to life. The drink is beautifully presented, making it as much a treat for the eyes as it is for the taste buds. The staff are warm, friendly, and go out of their way to provide excellent service, ensuring every visit feels special. The cozy ambiance adds to the charm, making it an ideal spot to relax or catch up with friends. Highly recommend Blenz for a festive and comforting experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrgGVGLCH19qqN5c4XqSKGGbfyjlLJDp1dCqB0&fid=0x0:0xebc6156b5d88292e"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Jenny Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKe4Ehz0Q1hlB1yzdf9Me4ruaZU3jzZX9I3memzO-WUuPgYuw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've loved Blenz@Richmond Centre since I moved to Vancouver 2 years ago. The staff are always smiling, even when they’re so busy. Drinks are always ready in a short time. Of course, Blenz's Dark Hot Chocolate is my favourite! It’s rich, smooth, and creamy!

It would be great if Blenz could promote reusable portable coffee sleeves like the one I made (for my own use) in the photo. I always think single-use paper coffee sleeves are such a waste. This fabric one is washable, reusable, and easy to carry in a bag. As a responsible local coffee shop, it's important to promote an eco-friendly approach.

Some customers have asked me where they can get the portable fabric cup holder. I believe customers would be happy to support the change. Blenz can reach out to me for further discussion if they're interested :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhGRQjzHK7SZ7QMmcRrO0VtulCgUUVS5HdeNxh&fid=0x0:0xebc6156b5d88292e"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Melissa Meng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfi_MaQwJQjr5awFnfBadZv0UHcxu-wrWjT5PFn9oDD0gq0vU3JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time to visit this location , very impressive about atmosphere here, warm and busy, individual area suitable for people working or small group gathering. Decorating inside store is nice, there is huge customers flow, employees are busy all the time, my friend ordered a coffee without caffeine is tasty good. You still can smell the coffee taste. The sandwich is fresh and good taste. Really Worthy to stop and have a coffee or drink here. I love this location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPX1l_plkoGVGZpFoKk645OA3FRyDzrUDtRZzAL&fid=0x0:0xebc6156b5d88292e"],"When":"2024-4-5"},{"Name":"Jessy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyB5lCso4XzPBlMikybZBzAwpJoNWBYEpefFHYcJUtX9IT0bF0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Iced latte was great!
Not a lot of seats here and no Wi-Fi
Also no power outlets for people working or studying, but it’s a great place to just enjoy the coffee 💕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkTa2mXZIk1oiKIBa5JdkLKHv5AO__ktX6nAA6&fid=0x0:0xebc6156b5d88292e"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Hu Dorothy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXV3309bTxFNTl1ve3ShfFWOVu4hK6JkO1PfuSvCba7ZMQZ6o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Charging water for $0.25 cents. A cup of ice for $0.50. This is nonsense. The staff doesn't understand English. I had to repeat my order more than three times. Do not go there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoKWsFfgs4E6M1uZ3DgPuzu6kwv0qJW0YUbUcK&fid=0x0:0xebc6156b5d88292e"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Da Wanderer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6gUX2zsQKdIE8uVzYWBnKKtvYQAJfEKJppzMJqd4hE4TuUun8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just recently discovered the best dark chocolate coffee mocha in Blenz and I am definitely addicted to it. You can really taste the rich flavor in each cup. This location makes one of the best.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPr2IBo9A58jxXd_EWnBiScu-eFTB8impYK8pN6&fid=0x0:0xebc6156b5d88292e"],"When":"2022-3-14"},{"Name":"Grimoaldo Assuncao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXU2Y0QnGVfV3sT7avvzv_BELncEzuG0SSyXqGRkB5XwNyC_gPK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Good place with a good variety of drinks and snacks.

But a good tip: always when asking for a cold drink don’t forget to ask with “light ice”, because 65% of the cup is ice, so you will lost a lot to drink, because in the end more than half cup is only ice. 😳😔","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdXuWvubTsjJZ_c6RK8z2VdiCWc_KLUzvl97Rt&fid=0x0:0xebc6156b5d88292e"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Colin Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKsZm0dxkoaNVpT_U5MSz6Hu71-aJgYtlTkTneFejPbF30OZkbOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I was offered whipping cream out of an aerosol can, instead of aerated whipping cream from a proper nitrous oxide dispenser, so I refused it.  The interior design is different and nice compared to other locations. Can tell the owner is East Asian because of the nice aesthetic.

Oddly, dry flowers are displayed for sale behind the counter against the wall.  Blend is real lax with their franchisees which is fine. But I expect consistency in the quality of drinks across franchise locations.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ingrid Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpJ7BDSOGvowBGNTTCIxIzO8iKdPQulZrzi56sGNYHPbL7Hw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited this Hong Kong-style diner for dinner and was impressed by the authentic flavors. We ordered the baked pork chop on rice, Singapore fried vermicelli, and fried rice with salty fish and chicken. Each dish was flavorful and true to its roots, with portions that were just right—not too small, not too overwhelming.

However, the restaurant did seem a bit short-staffed during our visit, even though it was only half full. While the staff were friendly and did their best, service could have been a little quicker.

Overall, it’s a great spot for those craving authentic Hong Kong-style comfort food, but patience might be needed during busy hours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUh_DHxwYFzI2RSd6PjpdbIC3LhQsD-lpzEwf1&fid=0x0:0xa9e104e6d85c9ed0"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"actionj007","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3vSkBAqKJl0vg8_AMzQD5EEGhEVeYS2de8UbzcFClZ51w9xM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came to this restaurant as my wife said the restaurant recently re-opened (due to renovations) and had 20% off (till Nov 16th).

This is a Hong Kong style cafe and most of their dishes comes with a drink.  I ordered the hot milk tea and it was pretty good.  Nice and smooth.  My wife ordered the laksa and I ordered the baked pork chop rice.

The laksa was very tasty and had plenty of ingredients.  My wife said that it came with roasted chicken instead of just chicken breast which was appreciated.  However the baked pork chop rice was a little disappointing.  The deep fried pork chop was really good as it was crispy and not too fat or too lean.  However there was not enough sauce and the rice (which is typically fried rice) looked like it was just plain or the attempt to make fried rice out of it was lacking.

Overall it was an ok eating experience.  Next time will try their fried noodles or their combo rice options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-ckWS1TSf6ae0x8yYkfx9Maj2UzOBSJk6wJ54&fid=0x0:0xa9e104e6d85c9ed0"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Brandon J (B2)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk5xWmfyZG2f0bMXantsSbItuWlqAW0g04s4GGiRJ4pkAu9yQn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was relatively empty when we arrived, the staff were very friendly. We ordered the beef brisket curry and the pan fried rice noodles with beef in a black bean sauce. The rice noodles were delicious, although a bit on the oily side. The curry tasted rich and pasty, with notes of cinnamon or cloves to sweeten it up. The Ovaltine tasted slightly diluted. I probably won’t order it again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfTDSsFzzz6cf4x4m8GN254RynHA01Bq1pomSD&fid=0x0:0xa9e104e6d85c9ed0"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Iris S.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzX8ibzkB1yzxDDYaddKTvFvC1K_Tciy8prh94HdGwsQZIe66HJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I saw their FB ad saying they were reopening and offering 20% of everything so worth a try.  This HK style Cafe or cha chaan teng is an okay option in this area where you can find so many other types of cuisines as well.  You are on Alexander Rd after all.  The dishes we ordered came with comp hot drinks.  We ordered a HK hot milk tea and a HK coffee/tea mix as drinks.  As to food we had the Lakhsa and the Baked pork chop rice. Food arrived way before our drinks which is kind of odd to us.  Also to mention we had to "inquire" about our drinks as we were into our meals.  Lakhsa was surpsingly good but the baked pork chop rice was alright.  2 chunks of real tomatoes but the sauce wasn't cheesy enough I would say.  They did fry the rice with some frozen veg.

All in all worth trying with their discount for the week but not sure if I'd be dying to go back again.  It was overall an ok HK style cafe to tryout if in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEqWAAZz4ygsm3R0yW4J2roo8dZlAgx7DmoPeQ&fid=0x0:0xa9e104e6d85c9ed0"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Sandra Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS3d7aZA4lMhkB4lrjOTrDjB_p6PvngmeWQeM0VFHPfzqli2Uc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We tried this restaurant because we noticed the constant business they were getting. There is a lot of seating, but the restaurant hot filled up quickly. People shared tables. The menu is extensive as most Hong Kong cafe menus are. The prices are very reasonable. We definitely enjoyed our baked rice dishes and will be back to try other items. It’s debit or cash only. No worries about parking as there are 2 levels of free parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCyldWVNa6s_00ajfHNyrJ2XZ6kqxPVcDZgtMx&fid=0x0:0xa9e104e6d85c9ed0"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Joel Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNWIRKSX0a7TfxHs0vrscQsThvC80Fx13wyUanCtzywKtGQlna=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are curious and have never tried Hong Kong style French toast, this would be the place to try it. The texture here is perfect. Crispy on the outside (but not over done and crunchy) and soft on the inside. The filling they have here is custard and not the traditional peanut butter and condensed milk, but it is mouth watering. The next item we highly recommend is the pineapple bun with kaya butter - there's no way to describe this other than "you have to get it to know" 🤤😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaeo0l3w5ceejALmhRle73Ab0OMgtARCg0d7qc&fid=0x0:0xa9e104e6d85c9ed0"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A friend and I were supposed to have lunch at a Korean restaurant in Richmond but when I walked inside, one of the employees told me the restaurant was closed for cleaning that day?! So we ended up downstairs at a Hong Kong style cafe called Peaches Cafe.

I ordered the Curry Mixed Veggie & Tofu dish, and had a milk tea for my drink. The food was OK. Personally, I think the flavor of the curry could have been a bit stronger. They have a pretty good selection on their menu and prices were fair. My meal was $14.99

It was super crowded in the restaurant. I felt almost claustrophobic when I was seated at my table. We got moved to another table later that was bigger and had slightly more space between it and the neighboring table. Seems to be a popular place but I'm really not keen on crowds so...don't see myself choosing to come here again. Just my personal preference though. I really don't like crowds.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOx_zrgtvneHBnU5WeuzVCcQlkvJ_7ECVlhYNFj&fid=0x0:0xa9e104e6d85c9ed0"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"willxcool","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxaJyufxKii48F04cM1DXcGKGEg41nSi1pqYgPffVp6MArp9IGdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Got my food 35 mins in , waiting  others after me already had their food , when ask where is my food, the lady check pc, quickly ran to kitchen,  5min later food arrived,  looks like soaked in oil,  rushed  not cook properly, no explanation why, when asked mention new staff, another said machine not working properly, clearly lying,
Maybe if my skin was a different colour I might get my food alot quicker. 🤔 if give zero stars not coming back,","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9-33PUAZcDPlH2DiM_gwfx1h_Ab2r7XxVkgwT&fid=0x0:0xa9e104e6d85c9ed0"],"When":"2024-9-5"}]
