user_reviews: [{"Name":"Annie Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_Nt8g5tVgA9kn7PfnSkylT8ciyQ9vTEAdVt7FJfpax0A9Vg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The specialty Thai milk ice tea is absolutely amazing, I think about it every day! Not to mention their delicious pandan slim cake, what a perfect pair with the Thai tea!!! Everything isn’t too sweet and tastes perfect. They have the cutest dog cookies and treats too. I was able to enjoy my food in such a serene peaceful and calm setting next door where pets can join in too!!! Definitely going to be trying more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0c0y8BgGuKVlR4ANKiQ2TkGYVcL_gcvqOGl6l\u0026fid=0x0:0x8313782b0524d670"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"huei-xin Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0mTibUsQ33gjKX7gTvTY3YpGb_pHXwMfRpyOcwktfOQF81sY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the food and drinks here! The croissant and muffins are my favorite and the Latte here is sooooo gooood!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"梁家恆","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCgK4C0ub5M6IDANES0YDrmev_z342beSbMtRla6_j72VmDtty3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food tastes good, the service is nice here, it is also pet friendly , i really enjoy my time studying in here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Xi You","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgAOCcXNI5CZ8QtIDWryDZGaRSRNCU3UFPcdp9uQLbyxl4G1Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Annie L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLt6FGNz1s3FklNpr8EqH3COzDGByU996w7YPjE7COikGXIyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnHYWNprVcF-sXJBw15-pVNSQ_D5ZZf912KM1v\u0026fid=0x0:0x8313782b0524d670"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Ire K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIcRenmw0l3XmbFc_ljn-HdVNd96NkcYaY39MnW1CtajfdGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnw7gdROlWsR-LVHvs2T2SvWzBIizKBSQ6lmEB\u0026fid=0x0:0x8313782b0524d670"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Wyatt Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWO47KB7BLIe1eGjRKWteUIgqDlrut-2Qcp0MH_E2AVqy5XJk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOThn7GnXc2ozoih8qiJsVKwlKg77vmivTrdYJR\u0026fid=0x0:0x8313782b0524d670"],"When":"2024-7-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sylvia Lan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZOrignIxZtNQr5fqOb9lpoqxcw0LTJa79u5ODK0MTYwholQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Expect to stand in line for 15-30 minutes to order at the cashier, then another 15-25 minutes of wait time for the food to be served. This place is always packed and seating is limited at this food court.

Cha Kee is famous for their creamy scrambled egg sandwich, but I definitely won’t wait in line for this again as it’s not that specialty to worth my time. On the other hand, satay beef on instant noodles was good and scallion sauce chicken on rice was even better! They were both flavourful and very delicious. We’ve ordered less spicy for the curry fish ball, but it was still very spicy and the spice overwhelmed the aroma & taste of the curry. They’ve increased the price recently, but it’s still worth the visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuNLkI001Rgb-0Q2ZGthWZXY1TnQ663cnLNh50&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Colin Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7h35ZtHaveCK9eq8-mDb7BmK8EeHfVN1usnvgcw8J_phkrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great Hong Kong style food court joint.  In the corner beside washroom.  Large lineup on a weekend morning, by far most popular place there.  Take the FF elevator to reach with a stroller.  Menu flashes too quickly, had to take a picture to view properly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxDKB8WXhc8twOkMgwWfmraZ2QYhTp6FkW6-uY&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Jaz Cheerios","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWSsqMl_UJjmJASBF3hbFK4Z9HKEEe-XSiGeuCWW8bRGEK2Y5Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I’m impressed. The siu mai dumpling was super soft and tasty. I’m normally not a siu mai kinda person but I had to order to try because that blew my mind away being super Hong Kong authentic. I used to go to the other hk style cafe near by in the late 90s-2000s. After coming back, that store wasn’t as good as it used to be so that’s why I want to try something new and came across this one.

The Fishball was great but the chicken scallion was a little less impressed. I felt the chicken was a bit soggy and not completely crispy and not enough scallion sauce (Personal preference) Nonetheless, I think it’s not too bad.

And too bad the satay beef noodle was all sold out. Will come and try again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgMsrGDaBOxFcrKPk19tY0sOKob_0ZLc9S8Q2R&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"K’s coffee lover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-385uQOflrqOxsV0QWsdIyhv-rxdZ7rLwLnLPmzpfPGzr9P6Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place truly brought back memories of Hong Kong! The satay flavors and the soup base were both authentic and satisfying. The scrambled eggs were smooth and hearty, and the Hong Kong-style milk tea was perfectly up to standard.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIGFzDmYj2VBw7MXVRDSojMwkKD_7RdihefMn4&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Jason Au","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuQkBpFBNxfDVCdPMZPlKNkod3AabrNZg7qk8g7qYjlMsYKR78=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place to grab HK style breakfast and lunch. Decent prices and the food is delicious. Would really recommend the pork chop. Food court can get very busy on the weekend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA8mlfsfq_OmMNBlQBrEsv5hhWiqsYBEkBl57R&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Smore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjSaUf7vOl2hGYXhAgxREDrK4inMpSiptrY_i_pmB_G1dvx0aI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you’re craving for cha chan teng breky,  this place will really hit the spot! No fuss, just order their signature “Satay Beef Instant Noodles Combo” with scrambled eggs & toast.  Their cup of yuan yang is ⭐️!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDZNQZ-s3k8absdLcAzobDefw40JNjgCiP1hDh&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"X C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWDLyl13mprvEmj4FbFEB0vsaF1P1nXZvaRVd_9Tu32pZ9oQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Needless to say, it was a big rice dish with lots of meat, rice and some cabbage at the bottom. (See the mountain of meat and rice in the photo). Expect at least 15-20 mins wait for both ordering and getting the rice dish.  I think this place is cash only.

The only inconvenience would be the food court itself. It’s very busy with tight seating, not a lot of tables. Parking is a bit tight as well. Beware of questionable drivers 😅.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPEspEYxkxoYVdrd4uYcZuE_CpzvGz_LFT4JiO&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Clement Chew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwKhl3mEn2gCZF6VdKbi7gB6oYfqEyv4ScXRvTHDS2H04sB70nmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I finally had the chance to visit the famous Cha Kee. The chicken with green onion on instant noodles was incredible—truly a unique dish I haven't seen anywhere else. The creamy scrambled eggs were the best I've had locally and are definitely best enjoyed on-site.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSN0pW9uWmqqp8K0okVp3yj4MCuqQ_7LvFeuHq&fid=0x0:0xfc521777c6283160"],"When":"2024-5-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not busy on a Tuesday morning
Great place to have quiet chat with friends
Price and portion reasonable and tasty food and friendly waitress
Limited free parking in front of the restaurant","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiaA-TVXAJnvBdXB3NHtdQJqeMnLOXeG6G-7bB&fid=0x0:0xc891b74f76d93d2e"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Asian breakfast of champions. They have a grilled cheese and apple sandwich that is quite unique and tasty as it's both sweet and salty. Their club house sandwich was also pretty good. Many layers in the sandwich. Heavily buttered toast. Last, the red bean ice cream drink was rich and nutty from the beans. Yum. For take out, it was packaged well but not cheap.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA44G5nyjrpSwDQk-ok_AP6TcbXZPX11dhaRsE&fid=0x0:0xc891b74f76d93d2e"],"When":"2022-9-13"},{"Name":"Vee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUueJodC1i2retDaMGr8pdA6W5hmb6gmxJg1KJ9-r-bSnZjtK1s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly, 5 stars just for being open for HK breakfast. Why is it so difficult to find places open for a simple breakfast in Richmond that aren't either a)big American chain restaurants or b)some sort of millennial/gen-z crowded "it" spot. (Lido, I'm sideeying you hard.)

This place did it. We had to wait just a little while for a table. It is a very tiny place. And it was worth it. Nice selection of the menu. Hit the spot so well. And the condensed milk toast 🤤

Excellent service too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRcA6ntW772RBtjgm28Z2lXjeS0qgVrzq4stE5&fid=0x0:0xc891b74f76d93d2e"],"When":"2022-9-11"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quick and easy place. Food is decently priced (you can get breakfast and lunch easily under $10 with variety!). I love the baked pork-chop on rice curry style!!!

It’s easy to come here in the mornings and for lunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIJ8WN0dlj3UfWLq8VujP3VCOtCSs9B-cevheI&fid=0x0:0xc891b74f76d93d2e"],"When":"2018-9-25"},{"Name":"Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLS5W2Xxu1WcE_tpEucA7re4_f2r2n8HDAbimOrI6UDn_o1vYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered takeout here and was very excited for it since the ratings seemed pretty decent on google maps and it was best rated on ubereats. I ordered the baked porkchop with tomatoe sauce, baked sausage with minced beef sauce, and the baked seafood and cheese with cream sauce. The packaging and visual of the food was very nicely done and portions seemed like a good amount.

However, the good points ended there. They had fish filet in the baked seafood dish, and the fish filet was chewy and fully raw! I had to microwave it for the fish to be cooked and taste normal. The minced beef also seemed raw and had an extremely strange texture when chewed. It was hard to visually tell the rawness on both items because of the respective sauces, and I only found out after I ate a few pieces. Such a simple, basic task to cook their protein and they failed at it. I will never order from here again, which is sad because I was looking forward to try this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMl35Vy3t3BuiwZwZ7xY1JjXygnYmkAR0h-vBKD&fid=0x0:0xc891b74f76d93d2e"],"When":"2023-10-29"},{"Name":"Dean Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3468Xh3UyEYqJz7eUr_eyijDAhzF-4NYFwz4YvwhkYF9c30EAXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mediocre food, the staffs seems overwhelmed for the size of this restaurant, will recommend come in early to enjoy the foods. Ps. There is not much parking space available near the place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNF-R2KsfXsnhFYiNYxfu-7PHeOHFIRiI011_uO&fid=0x0:0xc891b74f76d93d2e"],"When":"2020-9-5"},{"Name":"Katherine Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpteR9ddS0bDXH1vHnqUSijwkt3ObhL_P-SVS4YVh-r0ltkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The first day of 2019 we tried Night Owl Cafe, surprising it is good.  The freshly prepare sandwich is unbeatable, taste good & spaghetti with beef steak is tasty 💪💪👏👏👍👍👍.  Drinks are good too.  This is our first time here, we definitely will come frequently👍👍👍
All breakfast menu is good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHxKzzgnQIDsoa-tPoR-_SWHGenc0oagKlA3D-&fid=0x0:0xc891b74f76d93d2e"],"When":"2019-1-1"},{"Name":"Dion Gomez Avila","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYEqTQJvnjzrzcX8IZXobglRgAOWEC2tU5gSw2s903Vv6mmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Nightowl Cafe is closed right now!

The name is rather misleading as one would presume it is open right now","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ali Alhajji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFlaWbNZEzh-PssSheLnYkY9iQiVdyi2mILIRO8fobDUf2eRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely loved the atmosphere and the coffee here! 🤩 The vibe is just fantastic, and it’s clear that this place truly values its community. I always make it a point to support local businesses, and this charming little spot is no exception. Let’s stand together against those greedy global corporations that prioritize profit over people and support Canadian small businesses instead. Places like this deserve our patronage! 👌🏽all the best our local businesses ❤️love and peace","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZrEtq70uSq64O0DZEwUIinFhuB6xJDF62lDq6&fid=0x0:0xe3b52f3b1a64f56d"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Samantha Chio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9_oEKH2Q7qPjM-sXog07f0RMAkRaVASuLzKUmjPtLUkVITg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My salmon quiche although pricy ($8) was delicious in my opinion! The Iced Matcha Latte however tasted water down so not as good as I’ve hoped.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIwYR9nGAzVJpPlrt9b1rQNwiV0cZIUzgghkmk&fid=0x0:0xe3b52f3b1a64f56d"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Nikki c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTEI07jnFTAEaLsFO0c2_mPPfnmG0XKKHuolSSFqT8Xlgj-nIi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The matcha mango cream was delicious!! Seems like a collab with tourism coming and cafe, never seen something like it before. The staff was friendly and even delivered the drink to our table! Though they kept the door open and there were some bugs flying around, other than that it was a comfortable space.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqBQ8hrg9j2zRJpmY8q04nJI7qKVFc5gSEzYMr&fid=0x0:0xe3b52f3b1a64f56d"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Emily Oh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvVcSfydz8AdVVxSFJdQu4d27ACBsc19qdMpveAqcudJ0AZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stumbled upon this new cafe while waiting for our dog's grooming appointment. We tried the matcha mango cream which was a solid 10/10. Definitely worth a visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQoNNJ0wf6hLgSS0f2EBt6RnErKVaSjg35n0GJ&fid=0x0:0xe3b52f3b1a64f56d"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"J여림","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcsvEwO41ECqsIZhkDITG-eQ3tirPuERomcVQMLb7lwxGp4GRq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place was really nice and sooo tasty !!! I wanna go there again! The staff was so kind 😊 I really enjoyed mango match cream sooo good 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNro9PkkWIrcfY0BlSU41nOX7zUotPKILC27nPy&fid=0x0:0xe3b52f3b1a64f56d"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Jeffrey Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPdYtRdHLysToNTL9URLbC9dc9F5bsY9XES_IJ7Jm4Twfe2xXTwA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is the second location that recently opened. While I enjoyed specialty coffee in their first location on Alderbridge, this was not an appropriate setting for a coffee shop unless you are equally interested in the travel agency.

There were a couple of teething issues: The payment machine was not working which led to quite a delay. We later sat down at a table that was unmarked, but within the cafe itself. A few minutes later, staff started to rearrange the tables and we suddenly found ourselves in the middle of a travel agency itinerary presentation.

While certainly a unique experience, this should be more organized as we felt quite awkward being in the middle of a presentation. The tables could have been marked or cordoned off if an event was occurring. The volume (understandably for the attendees) was also quite loud and echoed throughout the whole cafe.

I feel that if there are multiple businesses (cafe and travel agency) in a venue, there should be proper communication to patrons if an event is happening. Additionally, the specialty coffee was quite bland / bitter and not representative of what the original Fresh Press had to offer.

Will reevaluate later on as understandably this store just opened, but there is room for significant improvement.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"張瑞彤 Tong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfmFHk-gJReMv-zkJ5jC-PM12mclXLNiI16cZTFDkqo4LbIVqT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Soooo good
A coffee shop that cooperates with travel agencies. You can drink coffee and read flyers launched by travel agencies.
There are many great value travel itinerary flyers","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONdSFDABZV-NA-RxY9cazQtj-KYq15Tw5G125O&fid=0x0:0xe3b52f3b1a64f56d"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Saniya Sayeedi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpYsDXt86d6InweQ2kdHRHqYzavyowv8EESnAMgu3MpaEuwJo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"New place, I understand. But a chicken teriyaki that’s is not a medium size costs $8? Saturday 10 am and you are out of stock? Please improve on the menu and you could do better with the drinks. The salmon quiche was fishy. Way too fishy for a salmon. It was expensive.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Sunny M Specialty Coffee & Tea

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sunny M Cafe never disappoints! Today isn’t my first visit, and it definitely won’t be my last. The donut coffee is a standout—unique and delicious. I also had an Iced tea which was very fragrant and perfect for the hot sunny summer weather. The service here is very personalized, making each visit feel special.

Sunny M Cafe has quickly become one of my two favorite coffee shops in Richmond. The atmosphere here is quiet and cozy, and the attention to detail in both the drinks and the service keeps me coming back. Whether you’re a local or just passing through, this is a must-visit spot for coffee lovers. Just note that price is on the more expensive side compared to the regular cafes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZ1UyCvAj8kVGHLXk1oda7N9-ypADS3SPfX5zS&fid=0x0:0xf155067405d86e0"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Asad Sumair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlXXuGsd29jki8e-yWx8Fx-Kh3bHQIFBKgwfaVoaIMQnjiyUM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sunny M Specialty Coffee and Tea

I recently visited Sunny M Specialty Coffee and Tea and had an excellent experience. This cozy coffee shop offers a welcoming atmosphere, perfect for relaxing or catching up with friends.

I ordered two Spanish lattes and one coconut latte, and they were really good. The Spanish latte was rich and smooth, with the perfect balance of espresso and sweetness. The coconut latte was equally impressive, offering a delightful tropical twist that was both refreshing and satisfying.

The ambiance of Sunny M Specialty Coffee and Tea adds to the overall experience, with comfortable seating and a warm, inviting decor. The staff was friendly and attentive, making sure that every detail was just right.

Sunny M Specialty Coffee and Tea is a must-visit for anyone looking for a cozy spot to enjoy high-quality coffee and tea. I highly recommend it and look forward to my next visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQIGusimehWvkkDAKqzRnk1DxPXCMABRaeQRyW&fid=0x0:0xf155067405d86e0"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Will Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGDD7brNtaOWSPrb4kG9HB25Ge1x-VU_HZtlpi-qzw-EVvrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pour over selection with some interest reserve auctions beans. The owner was really cool and provided some explanation to the origin of the beans.

Only down side is shop has limited seating.

Will return to try the tea offerings","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpNC8ugo_B_LsTXBc4A_0-DoTZd0ZtxykM_llr&fid=0x0:0xf155067405d86e0"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Jim Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3tXWnX8xFhA_qZcSgIAVcjedjNVtb5Riz6aB4ltUNzTkDmgfU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another hidden gem coffee shop in Richmond. Never had a Dacquoise pastry before and it was sooo goood. 😋😋

Americano met my wife’s expectation too and she’s very picky with her taste in coffee.

The place is a bit small with only three table. It’s quiet and a very relaxing atmosphere. Will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeBkVBTMNZgiVc8-HtsQNpW5ZSUXq55m_twb9O&fid=0x0:0xf155067405d86e0"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Kenny Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCkKTuOESfGudPEm0-BDzQVkIamalgjsSUzE_II9VRplB0iEEX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited this coffee shop in Aug 2024. Very friendly and helpful staffs. Good boutique shop atmosphere. Decent coffee.

Had iced Americano and iced Latte. Also the tiramisu dessert. Overall pretty good. Expected a bit stronger/richer coffee drinks, as they have a good selection of beans for sale, e.g. ONYX and Five Elephants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJgc4KjxInobyMj4xCDuN5RSLRuRrCL2KMuNsW&fid=0x0:0xf155067405d86e0"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Angel David","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbHsnbRpH_Q6WjHO3KGuWDX9xxq_8wvkZ54MVUQi8qlPdh5tSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"10/17/2024 - first visit at this cafe. I didn’t know what to expect going in but the at atmosphere of the store (calming music, the tiny but cozy space)  made it so welcoming. Absolutely loved the Spanish latte and Black Pineapple Sea (especially if you’re into “weird flavours/combos”. 9/10 would definitely come back again. Perfect place to just relax and have a sip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6nkqSEHJo-G5W5dRSyetuVYS2xTaJzZXIK-V0&fid=0x0:0xf155067405d86e0"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Merle Langlois","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZnruGVXm60ftapBuESQGQtjZaF1P3OYbvdZyq6WrVWTjNEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love how they focus on the coffee instead of kissing people's ass. I like the no notebooks, pads, wifi on weekend and holidays. The coffee itself is good and is from specialty roasters. In other words, it seems to be one of those businesses where they actually care. I wish more businesses would be like this. The customer service is good. They even offered me a shot glass of ice to put in my Americano if I found it too hot, which I'd never experienced before.

The only drawback is they don't seem to have a bathroom.

It seems like this is right next to the place where an individual drove their car through the storefront!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgK-Yyln1QyZT0rSvg90Wm5S0MfmTx_RZlPBur&fid=0x0:0xf155067405d86e0"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Ilya Meerovich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMb0Yn-Fx1t0S2Qwa6f0VgKaIVigpWrYJVKpo4HmLJJcSjxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love it here, this is a fantastic coffee shop with lots of very interesting beans on offer. There's a wide assortment of beans from roasters all over the world, as well as rare lots roasted by the owner himself. You can order off the menu or get a Pick of the Day to make your decision easier. I highly recommend this place to folks who are really into coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkoAoAwIVEa_fR97zP8IqKZ8YsfbdI-dB18dCa&fid=0x0:0xf155067405d86e0"],"When":"2024-8-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Foodie Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6n06QAfqStqer1ZgBILsv-fiSHmrGRZuznSS1ny9iQFfb_Ognuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My absolute favorites from their menu are the Wuhan Hot Dry Noodles and the Braised Pork Knuckle Rice. The Wuhan Hot Dry Noodles have a rich, sesame-flavored sauce that coats each strand perfectly, creating a wonderfully balanced and comforting dish. The Braised Pork Knuckle Rice is also a standout, with the pork knuckle cooked until it's tender and falls apart easily, while the seasoning enhances its flavor beautifully. Both dishes are incredibly satisfying and worth recommending. However, I feel that the experience would be even better if the prices were slightly more affordable, making it easier to enjoy these delicious meals more frequently.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9soGfzdwmkJ8_UdGrhWqJPhKO54wi6vHZwoXC&fid=0x0:0x108e07777597e207"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Sylvia Lan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZOrignIxZtNQr5fqOb9lpoqxcw0LTJa79u5ODK0MTYwholQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The overall meal portion (meat + rice + side dishes) was worthy for the price of $15 if you like side dishes. Meat was flavourful. Some pieces were chewy but some were hard to chew.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6JiQFNq2UQQ8eIoN-Nf9m2xOA3NQXb64_yFl7&fid=0x0:0x108e07777597e207"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Ski Goer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVm5nxmMWQ3WVNeq456be3NPpSfJyH772tw5Xr4nenCb6dcQSI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Everyone liked their noodle, so I had high hope. It is OK, spicy taste and lots of noodle. But just a few tiny pieces of meat. The spicy taste is strong so it covers everything else. Maybe if you like spicy noodle, this is for you but I have tasted better one. Oh, long line around lunch so be prepare to wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvmBmDu-zpYU_5qmSVoanH-zs2bzfEfvLTQ2K7&fid=0x0:0x108e07777597e207"],"When":"2023-1-4"},{"Name":"Stephanie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBV5KRG75WlxmWo1wuDhWSQhlZCOao4V2_9kFkOn0OqRNe45TP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is my second time here. You need to get the 熱乾麵 dry noodles. I came around 11:30 and they already had orders piled around them. My order took around 10 minutes or less. I ordered 2 portions of the dry noodles and a portion of the 小面窩 small donut lookalike. The first time I had the dry noodles I feel in love with the sesame flavour and the crunchy pickled veggie inside. It might not look like a lot of noodles but it is very filling. I realized after ordering two portions that the way they season the noodles depends on the chef because both bowls of noodles were different even though it was the same dish. One was spicier and saltier than the other. So it really depends on your luck if you get a good bowl of noodles. The crunchy pickled veggies on the inside balance on the dish well. You MUST GET the 小面窩. It's crunchy chewy and very bad for you but good for your soul. It soaks up sauce really well and goes with everything. One portion of 3 is not enough. The price of the noodles is $7.90 and although there is no protein in it I think the price is reasonable. The xiaomianwo is 3 for $2. One serving is not enough for 2 people. You need one serving per person because it's just that delicious. Yes albeit on the oily side, but still delicious and would go so well with soupy dishes or soy milk.

Tip: go early to avoid long waits. Order the xiaomianwo.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOn2nP_tvVV2huw3EGHY6IfQZH9-0vJDxxF6ZtJ&fid=0x0:0x108e07777597e207"],"When":"2021-8-31"},{"Name":"Helen Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKI-mzgGlleZ4ePt7mDYbQ4Gabh9zw-OBKk6bKlySQQQboerA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"ordered 猪脚饭 (pork feet rice) and 热干面 (hot dry noodles) and 2 Coca-Cola for $27, super fast service. Everything was tasty. Will come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgcKHeVryQMpkmGVX0U4Dgln6FizzWiUbRDoZP&fid=0x0:0x108e07777597e207"],"When":"2023-2-11"},{"Name":"Eve C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQeTlgZ3KrOqtuzRwLXmbRjeIMIyvk805PlOMgN5f1SxnIqzb4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Repeat customer for over a year, but noticed their portions has significantly reduced. At one point, their pork hock rice could feed two people for dinner. Just returned today and was disappointed at the smaller volume.

Still delicious, but wasn’t as good value as it once was.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matt Au-Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSUeirOfQcO6zHnhBYx8QGbclOfMpmHEFGZ5edOpWnr5aUp6xz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pork knuckle with rice - Portion is big. Pork knuckle is soft, which is good, but I expect the taste can be more fully. Price is expensive, it cost around $15, as a food court restaurant, I think it’s over charged. Seats are limited and busy in this food court - it’s a big disadvantage.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNT0xf4dK8wHkQrj1HYPsF1r8pgrbwHXUEEzzR2&fid=0x0:0x108e07777597e207"],"When":"2023-3-8"},{"Name":"Lou Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW70gr5joDcNnpPzG1-txjIB8R3O_Mkls6a_yzdJJynBHtKUq6Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pork hock rice and dry mixed noodles. Both taste very good. The taste is right balanced and great value for the portion. I would love to come again to try they beef noodles.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCW9ERDnpAJZKCdOOarXd3wrRm1tEvXcCM2NxK&fid=0x0:0x108e07777597e207"],"When":"2022-3-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Frank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV32Dl3aDuecVTKkUVDILvrpBYb8ATjyfxIGWGxKJriKTeCzCiJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A true hidden gem in Richmond! As a coffee enthusiast, I can confidently say these are among the finest espresso shots I've ever experienced. What makes this place truly special is the owner's dedication to his craft - he roasts the beans fresh on-site (I saw the roaster in action!), and each cup reflects his meticulous attention to detail.

During my visit, I had the pleasure of engaging in a fascinating conversation with the owner, whose thoughtful approach to coffee-making mirrors his distinct philosophy about life. The result is an exceptional coffee experience that stands out from the usual cafe offerings.

The freshly roasted beans produce an incredible aroma that coffee lovers will appreciate. This isn't just another coffee shop - it's a destination worth going out of your way for. I'm already planning my next visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaMcjoekwXrgkphuUIG8f4S3PTmbM2k8BrMtCH&fid=0x0:0x28f546df3960ec4c"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Kab Kbaas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5U0xr3upvQTURbvXCvcu5mgHu9kAs3kt9vv_C4iuqaE8mdtRkEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a coffee roasting house that has been in Richmond for many years. Clients come from all over the Lower Mainland and outside of Vancouver, to purchase freshly roasted coffee. They also sell aged coffee. Well you're there enjoy a cup of freshly made latte, Americana, Turkish coffee etc.
Simply put there are no other coffee places in BC that compared to this.
So if you are a connoisseur of coffee this is the place to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEW0-C8PDzo04W6WUn9KlW1-GWoUV-R3qDXTjl&fid=0x0:0x28f546df3960ec4c"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Salma Ismail","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMZ1-aBPYlSd9ahEZzhlqcMZnLrE1thcqsLXAkqW46rEvacS0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came all the way from Vancouver just for the coffee! The iced mocha was 10/10 and was very high quality. You can easily tell the difference between this and other coffee chains. Would definitely be coming back!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAksW9qQh50q4zUz8DDcDfiLagZrHKv9NsxMDs&fid=0x0:0x28f546df3960ec4c"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Carlos Valverde (Carlosvalver)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7nmUuwZZ5DhyzC_Qwm0DJK1344hUQ87x8hEzFhLgjsfHlD0I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m from Spain and I have lived in many countries and yet this has been the best coffee I have ever tried. Found it by chance and seeing the place one can already feel how good the coffee will be. It is grinded on the spot and the taste is fresh and unique.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbWV2ThfKX5CFXmE2Sv_Q4t3XkpVUHpwsJ-q48&fid=0x0:0x28f546df3960ec4c"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Louise Yeoh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKn6H1v99edwzRk8pxHxqcfGWgIZaHgZyHlx8FsGc__i8U2ig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best coffee place in town . Even when we go on vacation overseas. , we find Viva Java to be the best.  We have been supporting this independently owned coffee place for over 30 years . Artie roasts his coffee beans every morning and one can  smell the coffee aroma while driving along Bridgeport and Garden City.  We love his Mocha, Latte and Cappuccino . There is absolutely no need for any flavours to be added as the coffee needs to be enjoyed as is .  There is usually nice music playing and when the weather is warm, we love sitting outside on his picnic table outside.  Great place to catch the sunset and they even have Sunflowers in the summer for you to enjoy while having awesome coffee. We also enjoy very interesting conversation with Artie about current local and global affairs.  If you are a true coffee lover ,  head to Viva Jaya and skip places like Starbucks, Waves, Blenz . You won’t regret  it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsJblIiQ4ABZ4QyiDTookE6lrt6KCMW2F5-DwC&fid=0x0:0x28f546df3960ec4c"],"When":"2024-2-6"},{"Name":"tyra thaker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXD3ht_Mt-i3zoWv4WTEVOC8nopo_FhRu_vIMJBTa5-jiGCFQ_e=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"this is the best coffee I have ever had in my life. it tastes like it was made with love. I had an iced latte and my friend got a caramel macchiato, i have drank a lot of coffees from a lot of cafes, but this is by far the best ice latte I have ever had. Not to mention the delicious nuts you can buy with them. The service was amazing, no phones, cash only, follow the rules and you will receive the best coffee in the world.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Josephine Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImov6ysQuqgaO_fG8nfD2KYi13UGmqaUixscIh4z3rFmCtsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Took a trip to Vancouver and stumbled onto this place in search of caffeine before taking the kids out all day. Ended up visiting THREE times before we left. This coffee surpasses any cup we’ve ever had, even Italy. Highly recommend the Cafe Mocha in dark. The beans are smoky and flavorful. Great conversation with the owner and his wife. One of the most memorable moments of the trip, looking forward to returning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"chloe brownlee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbtAaElO_C-1gHYxYq5jKcROqly2NPW8J75fdU6qE-BAOY2pLKTA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such beautiful coffee, every sip tastes like love. The owners are so friendly and warm! I adore coming here, my day is much brighter. Highly recommend the caramel macchiato and the little bags of peanuts ♡","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anthony Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjLBVGvYMuQ_7irAafqyFenF84IHbDebi7uNt8G5dE291E5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is good.
Lobster family meals are decent combos with soup and rice.
HK style cafe service. So don't expect friendly smiley servers.
Very busy on the weekends. Make a reservation.  Parking lot are usually packed as multiple restaurants in this complex.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRW84zjO1UIBCkVKowmTQZHlH8NNSGyRUB8ja7&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Bonnie Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnEc4L_oX33x1BIdSnyu3qIy05RmcbQP1bJwBirlW_Yv38YSLczA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious hong kong style Cantonese food
Hainan chic rice👍🏻
Stir fried beef rice noodles👍🏻
2/3 Attendents only , so busy n slower than expected but hardworking enuf🫶🏻👍🏻
Comfy atmosphere
Easy parking
Reminder: Fettuccine n noodles size r large for Asian ladies 😸","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9nQnzK_ArHkk8V-B_slQ3Cgt3trtQ1P-7ACDl&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Fay. H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd4mYlouz-Pj7R6TieEfSHQNydfMYBskXJxl4xfL_hV98dHHgm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This review is only regarding the breakfast menu as I only go for breakfast.

Prices went up a little. Serving size... Went down a tiny bit? Feels like there's less meat in my noodles.

Service is still great like always. Sometimes the kitchen mixes up how the order of eggs (eg. Scrambled VS sunny side VS fully cooked).

The place is clean and brightly lit.

The noise level is hit or miss depending on other customers.

Cost of hot drink with meal is free. Cold drink cost extra $1.50, but nothing is stopping you from bringing in a thermos with ice 😜

Will continue to visit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjChlAll89fJZj5h3vzzdYoeZnIT7WTd1HUSr8&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Charmian “Lola” T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgNIsycjAjzrvG8wivWZhPbw8cIcLPeWXd_RAmbJfEA0gUU6vQDA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My parents brought me here to try their lobster special set … soup and rice comes with it plus free flowing tea… omg the lobster with noodles was amazing , the halibut was to die for and the spicy pork with green beans was so addictive. Let me tell you this year alone in the last six months my parents have gone back at least six times and each time being more friends and family to try every single dish on their special set menu… We’re already planning to go back and try their crab set special 😂. It’s well worth the money, we had enough food left over to have for dinner. And the staff are amazing and quick and friendly ! Just go and dig in!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Johnny C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMH8aFZIGB5a7CFStbNQ6JGT0sYgxOttD7xMtIebcz8N9tnSzq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Another Hong Kong style cafe and noodle house combined.  Food was average.  I ordered curry brisket with rice.  I find the brisket to be too fat and not enough white rice.  Prices in the menu are on the higher side compare to other Hong Kong style cafe.  Personally I don’t think the value is there for the price of the food I ordered.  Parking lot is big but fills up quickly during meal times.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJ2WDCiItljI5MNQLQEwUyMfSAAoQkXqoGkeaA&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"William Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmQdctlbM12t5Occdf84xI_X4OatAdUnoO7Mf5nuujaBWYasmgPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Visited twice.

The first time was a really busy and crowded evening so I felt the tables might be too close together and the service seemed to suffer for it. Food that night was not as good as the Vancouver location but was alright. I heard the head cook moved to this location but maybe not by that night

This time was a less crowded breakfast so it was better. Food seemed better but then breakfast and dinner are different meals. Ordering 2 item combos is a good deal ($14) vs just 1 @ $10. Love that egg custard in their deep fried French toast. Congee was good too as seems no MSG.

Plenty of parking in their shared parking lot both times. Capstan Way street parking if the lot is full.

This is a fine location for breakfast if you are dropping someone off to the airport.

I'll visit again if in Richmond for the day and maybe I'll give more stars in the future after those visits.

Update: visited again another companion wanted to compare here with Main Street branch as she heard lots of staff moved from there to here. Still not as good, and didn't see any original serving staff from the  Main St. branch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFVie6NSUTF2QFafotn1WSRyhrzdSVmMC34J56&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2022-12-30"},{"Name":"t l","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIMDadAdXgjdCR9ryJtJHb7jNI1DR0yfUG8KK9xo-KtDDcIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"At present, most likely the best Hong Kong style cafe in Richmond.   A good balance between portion, quality and price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMaepUwzj4bLxHQf7zqvV61qcofwz86mnrhA8d&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Dan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6Vpad3zmd_bRS_NRyMDg5xHn355DE6cSY0nXB1CDQJfi5a5o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good portion for the food. Chicken patty is bigger than my hand! Average price for a HK cafe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNArnmeZxj9tvOMEV4c9Ga4WQRH2e11cYuR5EY9&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-6-28"}]

Staff were friendly and attentive, interior was lively and had a nice atmosphere. However this time, my friend and I waited for a while at the front counter. The batista was behind the counter organizing something and was taking drive thru orders, while completely ignored what was going on at the front. I decided to try the frozen lemonade refresher since it is new, and boy was it disappointing. The flavour was alright but still tasted more diluted than just the normal refresher. The ice melted quickly, as you can see in my other picture. I had to quickly drink it before it was all melted. And also, there was alot of froth and foam on the top of the drink in the end. Forgot to mention theres no dried fruits like the normal refresher. Do not recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0KwA9GrpmxsTJPo1V5CcePA8VXwR9u4baLbeh&fid=0x0:0xb27b3e96a851c384"],"When":"2023-7-9"},{"Name":"Algorithm Monster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjC2C4AtAESIDHMV0oc-BfPANBIAwOsITdcwglUHOnOG_QJW8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Fookin Bananas 🍌 in town!

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Sandra Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS3d7aZA4lMhkB4lrjOTrDjB_p6PvngmeWQeM0VFHPfzqli2Uc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The shop is bright and cute. If you’re mot a durian-lover, beware of the smell when you step in. There are a variety of crepe cakes, rolls, drinks and gelato. We ordered a bd cake - durian, of course. It was pricey, but worth it. There are a few tables - I can see myself returning to have a drink and a sweet treat with a friend or two; it’s that inviting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1lVflOdu09TfdaiNEQT7pcJipeTM91QiVICQ5\u0026fid=0x0:0x689fa5465910e871"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Vem Fell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwkPSV3Go5MeUNG2num_FvOxxkl2soaYDTRAJLJyvuZfHkM2xy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time visiting from Seattle and was solo dining on my birthday. The cafe was packed with all tables occupied. I did not have a reservation and my hair was a mess (was windy that afternoon), but my barista/server gleefully directed me to sit in one of the reserved booths. Aww! Thank you so much for the exceptional service  and for the crepes that are aesthetically pleasing and tasty! And the oat matcha latte...gulped within 5minutes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPW2RfiL-dKu1f-dBmoOJpeFXAOKRUA8u1K3O6j\u0026fid=0x0:0x689fa5465910e871"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried their rose lychee crepe cake and it was beautifully made, light, and fluffy. It tasted more of rose than lychee and was very rosy. Only get it if you like the taste of flowers. The quality was great. Would try another flavour in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8s8vvCQZUysfCKDoF_yC66s_pqDp3FZIXPpbU\u0026fid=0x0:0x689fa5465910e871"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"nessrosen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7uS9oTFgG7xh_Ki2KuerxYgK-ZhomqZxw658ffIqjObHyA8Ou=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've gone here quite a few times and every time have thoroughly enjoyed the desserts I got. Drinks alright. Small location but if it’s not busy, you can study there. Parking available for 2 hours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO011bMM9nX0zqyBIvBZu_Z0vKbkqiLOZZ4EN_I\u0026fid=0x0:0x689fa5465910e871"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Kaman Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTfY1lFx7N7LsexryuKa9Q76pyfiBSBOSe4KZKmNeoZtDKwC8s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The take out box is sooooo pretty and elegant. Totally love it. Crepe cake is light. I enjoy the lychee rose crepe cake. For someone who does not like whipped cream, it’s quite good. Good presentation. It’s definitely on the expensive side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKV7CJmbkvJtjmKmUNvpGeYf4oFLBAbWOawdwN\u0026fid=0x0:0x689fa5465910e871"],"When":"2024-2-2"},{"Name":"Tawan Nawakorawit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVV8OV36By4BIOT3pjElMFtXRTQnRFeaa5DMsCvcny_Nse7iYG5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have tried Earl gray crep cake and Lychee crep cake so far, and I love both of them. My little one really love the Chocolate crep cake. We sure will come back to try everything else :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBkAiWhQsk4bgqdmapL6lZhy5gnbMPxeQGy6H6\u0026fid=0x0:0x689fa5465910e871"],"When":"2024-6-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Enjoy Cafe in Richmond offers fast service and delicious Hong Kong-style dishes. Their baked rice and fried rice are flavorful and perfectly cooked, making them must-try items on the menu. The French toast is another highlight, with a crispy exterior and soft, sweet interior that makes it a perfect treat. The staff are friendly, and the overall dining experience is excellent for casual meals. Highly recommend for a quick and satisfying bite!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSmG5SsJ2CDvM8ljilMJSZuGxXQHDLjj3tNxg1&fid=0x0:0x6be640746fc7e2ed"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fair price for quick bite with decent portion and great taste
Friendly staff
Plenty of free parking
The place is not new but seating still confortable
I like the all day breakfast can have something light at night","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZYuSzGEvQmJMl6B-Mz_hk74ump3nNcmU3XLJE&fid=0x0:0x6be640746fc7e2ed"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Eddie So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISSdmRal6WEYNToT2BfCZQ0cdumKRhmtyRM82KD93UMkc0-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's the first time that we go to this place before six.  The restaurant is located in a stripe mall with lots of parking. The restaurant is at the second floor.
The place is well keep with comfortable seats.  If you looking for a quiet HK style coffee restaurant, this is a better choice.
They have 3 VIP room can be good for bigger family for gathering.
The food is good and big portion with reasonable price.
They offer free hot drink pair with the dish.  Both free drink are good.
We go to this place on a Saturday afternoon tea time.  This time we order some mini afternoon tea menu.  The food are still good.  The coffee mixed tea are good too.
The bill come out for two sets of mini meal is $32.80
They still can keep the price reasonable and good food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfcLZc5Mz34MJZLB-zi2XupP9gS6rMlREPft4T&fid=0x0:0x6be640746fc7e2ed"],"When":"2023-9-1"},{"Name":"Bernice Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBoAmtuVF2MIOHmCIWEAQdYPuBjzyZKDuqNq1x4NlLcVquFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Service is good. Staffs are very polite. Food is not bad base on the price point.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWHNchyKoSX3w_-niaAakpmr-aD-FbejGZhe0Z&fid=0x0:0x6be640746fc7e2ed"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"TKO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKr7rD0FqlvGk6KqS92IamkRFh-Rd8Cz7G6koWHCvjlB_TBIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food is authentic and in large portion.

Service is pretty much "just normal", but two marks were taken away from the normal "3" rating  because:
- Maybe you guys should specify any debit card for payment MUST be local right from the start. Even my non-local debit card functions exactly the same as local ones because it is loaded with CAD.
- The cashier "reminds" to tip next time, despite you've already accounted for the cost difference by charging higher for dine in, and your rude hidden "local" debit card rule.
- Nonetheless I'm paying while standing at the counter.

And you have the audacity to tell me to tip next time? Meh there will not be a next time. It is your employer's responsibility to pay a living wage.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karen Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXchMPPAN3zqOoag_ixABnvIJMH6A1alhdVdwJdZOdnJvvZotnpUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"With the increase cost of living in Vancouver, Enjoy 1 plus 1 enjoy great options with an affordable pricing.

I had their all day breakfast which comes with a drink and you can add and make changes for $1.00 for French toast or butter bun which is super flexible

I love their baked pork chop rice and the assortments of food available and it was my go to when I used to work in Richmond and still one of my hk cafes go to!

Ice lemon tea is solid and I highly recommend to those who wants a hk style cafe fix.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzIfOcVnpK-jTXnzgCQNNUJ_bCIECcxS4thjQc&fid=0x0:0x6be640746fc7e2ed"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"Betty Ni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMKTBPOnjIjhQ6teM22cemeOSl8LqF7CE53rXbFC-f57VaHKsN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for their breakfast combo. Ordered B+D and chose mushroom omelette, braised beef with vermicelli, and half French toast. It was way too much food for one person. Milk tea was average, not the most rich tasting I've had.

Overall, I would consider coming again but I would also try to explore other options nearby.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"N Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXOpc5ihGvxzyNVLN3C7gyShCZbUKufmBFsK7BGewsCgAIv0BVTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Honestly didn't want to give this low. This would get a 1 star if it wasn't for some of their other dishes. This is my go to for the 2 or 3 choice combo sets. Ordered it 2 months ago. Their other dishes during lunch aren't bad. But I just ordered the baked Portuguese chicken rice and it was horrible. It smells amazing but the taste has no flavour. It tasted of coconut milk (which I love in curries) and oil. I actually feel quite uncomfortable and sick after only eating a third. Years ago they had my favourite baked Portuguese chicken rice. The potatoes in it were still delicious. My coworker got the baked pork chop version and it also had the same problems. Additionally it had extremely dry pork chop was nearing burnt In colour and really old oil.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Louise Boilevin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrbB57nz9izpshPwn7yH-SAdWr6iO_LJBZM25eopW2F0ZElrXPDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I enjoy this location alot due to its location  , service is good  , lots of seating areas  inside  the  coffee shop and outside in the lobby here .    Thier are plugs outlets for charging your electronics here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXpcWzYXkHunJGh19TOGh_jVxfAL6ZAiHAvxFo&fid=0x0:0x8dddf461fd42226b"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Jung Hee Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJr5MIe9qyM2CoSpNeIbqBKESF-B9QbiYXLhU-uZJMhdUJxxg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This Starbucks is the worst Starbucks in my experiences. (I’ve been many Starbucks in many other countries.)
On Oct. 14th. I tried to use the washroom before order coffee, but it was locked. One of staff said they let me in after ordering. Wow…just like Paris!
I ordered a tall coffee first, but they gave me grande coffee. Then, I showed my Starbucks App for collecting my points, but they refused to scan it because this Starbucks place doesn’t do that.
Starbucks is franchise all over the world. Only this place doesn’t let customers collect points??? These staffs made me uncomfortable and were rude through their speaking and behaviour. Where is the service mind??!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maggie Hickinbotham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIlpN4-IhAGizKfc4Fz3sD1SY2gJondCCMrli0AHBzAucYHDJ8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":""I recently visited this Starbucks location and was disappointed to find that they don't provide restroom facilities for their customers. As a customer, I found it very inconvenient to have to go into the River Rock Casino Resort or go all the way up to the third-floor restaurant just to use the bathroom. It's surprising that they have a restaurant but don't allow their customers to use it ¹.

The lack of amenities like restrooms makes me hesitant to visit this location again. I hope they consider adding this basic facility to improve  customer  experience","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIbVUWe2CJoe9eA1lxIC4Tzf5zJQqI4AiMhw3BBQhnMhUDEg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to this Starbucks for iced coffee with my friend. I placed order and was told that they will charge extra for using credit card. my friend asked to use the washroom. The staff said it's only for customers. I told her she's my friend and I just ordered. She then waited a minute or 2 to open  the washroom door for my friend.
She poured the ice coffee from the pitcher which was only enough for not only half of the cup. She looked through 2 fridges and the back and came back with nothing. She then filled the rest of the cup with ice and handed to me. I said oh that was a lot of ice and she just smirk and said nothing.
This is the worst Starbucks experience I had. Avoid this place!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAkGI_XyFYKsAyb5lGGoZ0iEJb49FioQFb68vw72vDvbjxcw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"One of the worst Starbucks ever. There were full of fruit flies in the display. Almost bought the snacks there with my coffee.

The employee had to "air out" the flies. And then the whole sitting area was full of fruit flies. I would never buy food from this place.

They took the food out and maybe was going to replace them. But after the other customers left, they just put the food back in the display. She even dropped one of them off the display shelf and just picked it up with her hands without gloves and put back on the shelf.  🤢🤢🤢😷😷😷","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMleWdRHY574ZIEKCkwwMTl7My9lqWaMQiZRpQt&fid=0x0:0x8dddf461fd42226b"],"When":"2018-9-7"},{"Name":"Kelso S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIKrEczJVzA121rwGCiCC-fnKsLsk567aWPXpHwdvza9IDT7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a new lemonade refresher today and when I tried it, it was way too sweet. I couldn’t drink it. So I asked a staff member if I can get this replaced with something else. They actually said yes and asked what I’d like so I said an iced latte. She ended going and getting the supervisor or the manager instead. They came over and I explained again. They told me that they couldn’t give me anything else because I “didn’t ask to sample it” (which doesn’t even make sense) but they can add water to my drink to make it less sweet. So I agreed to them adding more water. I take another sip after the water is added and it’s still overly sweet. It’s still undrinkable for my taste. I told them it’s still too sweet and they refused to do anything else for me. So I left the drink on the counter and walked out. I paid $7 for that drink and I’m just shocked they couldn’t just make me something else that was the same value. That was very poor customer service. It’s not like I drank half the drink and was demanding something else. There was literally a couple sips taken from it. It was a full drink.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Francisco Venegas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGXdo6Pb3k_3Tuw-r5CjWv4eeGOOYysaxpGDS04ZfLh7VbwjRW9A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"EXCELLENT as usual!!!! When I stayed at the resort ( not my first time there this year) I ordered Pumpkin spice latte one of my favourite drink for this season 🎃and it was amazing!!!

The staff is always beyond excepcional and always receive me with a smile.

In addition, they always have lots of cool merchandise that you cannot find at other locations.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Terry Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXaEEceuh-TKNHifDt6Mbf83NCLhSgySHS4DnZV-B-uZAB4JjD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Place is nice and comfortable.
Food came hot and delicious. However, the staff is quite rude. No patience and rushes every customer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMJpSMF5RFesMgKG-a9M-aA09o_zN5LMU_7t7U&fid=0x0:0x8dddf461fd42226b"],"When":"2023-6-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fiona Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1WqgSxu82AHjlJWGEzWOZPg0BA-C5kZM0c8OMheD3CB_t_KdLEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food in this restaurant is of average quality, the prices are affordable, and the environment is elegantly decorated, where you can check in, and it's also a good place to chat with friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqLMJUHA008gAfXWqmFQjoaqtA-SMtohA3QjES&fid=0x0:0x743bbc3da8e10abf"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Jack Yuen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhRPpXHdrFGpSfFPj2Llvg9rACCkMWbpnKawexr7OBRxKhKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is so-so they should narrow now the number of choice and focus on few items.  As many people mention, it is such a nice place to visit but music is coming from a real piano. It is unfortunate that most of the music can't finish all the way to the end and immediate jump to next song. I also don't like their QR code menu order system that requires you to register your phone. I think this place is good for simple food during breakfast and afternoon tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_vYP3cykjtGLYG4eysdhxwMRQuhE_ADyv8ujA&fid=0x0:0x743bbc3da8e10abf"],"When":"2024-1-15"},{"Name":"Janis Chiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvo-S-6kGEPk0wxBMJ07JXObaf-TnNyuz93RFwSkutvHglDuY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is very pretty, good food, reasonable price and very friendly service. The only drawback to me is that the menu is too diversified. The deco of the restaurant is European and very elegant, so to me the traditional Chinese dishes (i.e.congee) don't match the atmosphere.  I hope they will add pastry back to their menu, then it will be a good place to go for afternoon tea too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiVFGw6P9hZ-hjf2Rsk4dprWpYBKsdHDNPxjHD&fid=0x0:0x743bbc3da8e10abf"],"When":"2023-9-12"},{"Name":"Posy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGs-08ciD4n9dcj2lgNB9owqim55DMZlkyK7AYMmaM13JUR6S98Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great and unique place to get Hong Kong style food. The food is cheap for a sit-down restaurant and tasted very fresh. The servers were very nice and patient when we were struggling with the menu. There are many options to pick from! The atmosphere is very unique and provides a more elegant experience.

My only issue is that they dint serve cake anymore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFQqfILI6C07eOAdbTeHmlzLktuQrRBvCPACzx&fid=0x0:0x743bbc3da8e10abf"],"When":"2024-2-28"},{"Name":"Little Journey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlNkzOJynLpgqJCrPnrmAAn5viwim-B3Uir-26DOWxIzwcnZ0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Serving Hong Kong cha chaan teng style breakfast @averyrestaurant kind of makes ppl feel a little bit out of place. The food quality is acceptable, the waitress can be more courteous, the deco is designed for selfies, and the vibe is perfect for chi-chatting. No complaints at all as we all enjoy the vibe very much 💓","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVw47Q75Rt3PRF16QQqLpbYihM6aYaJIMjoFoO&fid=0x0:0x743bbc3da8e10abf"],"When":"2024-1-12"},{"Name":"Johnny C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMH8aFZIGB5a7CFStbNQ6JGT0sYgxOttD7xMtIebcz8N9tnSzq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"HK style cafe but in a unique environment. The back wall is very beautiful and doesn’t look like any HK style cafe.  There’s a piano in the restaurant.  Plenty of parking available. I enjoyed the all day breakfast!  The decor in the restaurant was from the previous high tea restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdcPjFoMEsrCsEURVyZ9qo9geQPT7YdoAz4fou&fid=0x0:0x743bbc3da8e10abf"],"When":"2023-10-4"},{"Name":"A H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXL7NDL55nzugSZ5ygIgm81COgNwrrxjMsfhJRohKFEoMSS7Ge6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love the spaciousness and the distancing between tables. The lovely floral wall makes a nice photo background.

Lighting is ample which brightens up the place together with all the chairs being white.

Hong Kong style foods are up to par. My only complaint is that while the chicken filet (with ramen noodles) I ordered was very tasty, it was way too salty for my liking.

The female server could be friendlier.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSy3604gmhAogzpN4aK6GpyPBR92J-t1B4650V&fid=0x0:0x743bbc3da8e10abf"],"When":"2024-1-30"},{"Name":"Adrian Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRz_uEV8AM70-EugybmCMjVZLIi0OfMP3My2LKS1PidWwGuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The decor is white and faux "fancy" Elizabethan. They have an automated piano playing. Atmosphere is unique, a bit over the top, but nice. Food was surprisingly good and prices are a good deal.  Coffee and tea a bit weak.  Service was a bit abrupt, but ok. Parking is free for three hours if you register your car with the restaurant. If you treat it as a standard HK Style restaurant it's good. The rest may not be to your taste, but the basics are right.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2ZNRVuqT29lEeWvorLpjpAgPYRg53al9hQtlJ&fid=0x0:0x743bbc3da8e10abf"],"When":"2022-12-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mj Rafiee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdnlRPrjMdGMWb13tlnuZPCxgBQ9eugaLdoUPBmGrQDNDIDw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic experience at AL BASHA! The taste of the food was absolutely great—every bite was full of flavor and perfectly cooked. The staff were incredibly nice and attentive, making us feel very welcome. The restaurant is beautifully decorated, creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere. The quality of the food and service truly stood out. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for a great dining experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrDTn2RaJrzwD699Y_ncT6R4nvBmvgP_dhSNS1&fid=0x0:0x16a3a137d5937689"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Maryam R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUd89dXDCpd48jupIrIgLCGItEfpJ_1ItJSHoKqZIAiEA5wq5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Al Basha beef and chicken plate with hummus is a must-try! The meat is succulent and well-seasoned, cooked to perfection with a great balance of spices. The hummus is creamy and smooth, complementing the meat beautifully. The portion size is generous, making it great value for the price. The side salad and pita bread add to the freshness of the meal. Service is friendly and prompt. Definitely a standout dish that will leave you satisfied and craving more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZKkBq0fbuGfoQTm9zRrgaFO-ZVWmzbXPZp4I&fid=0x0:0x16a3a137d5937689"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Mohammed Yahya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLT1QQjsQL0cVBO4YH4tgQfBRBthb4gM79UjFdzAIKyKZVPkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"this is by far the best shawarma in Vancouver. However the service or the guy who takes the orders is kinda arrogant and can’t answer simple question. No smile or welcoming vibe. I hope they work on that. Restaurant is more about creating great experiences and friendly service not only tasty food. I tried the beef arabic shawarma and it was tasty 4.5/5. The price is kinda high but worth it. I would recommend the place. Deserve the shot 👌🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZTP6d9ZdB8A4O_2b2A5V2EjK8BA-8gvcKhBIb&fid=0x0:0x16a3a137d5937689"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Mucahit Mert Alagoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlZFzlr8OmJ6ReNSeqILjiXkPYOR-Wi6HlJhjaTTE_xGsRl7kohA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The location of the restaurant is great, and there are free parking spots available in front, but only for a maximum of 1 hour. The inside of the restaurant is very small, and there was a long line when we arrived, so it was hard to find a seat to eat. I’m not sure why such a popular restaurant is this small.

The food was absolutely delicious, I have no complaints about that. However, there were a couple of issues. The ayran was very bad, and even though we ordered a mixed beef and chicken plate, only the chicken shawarma was served. The beef was missing, but since there was a line, I didn’t want to mention it and wait again. Overall, it’s a good restaurant, but I’m deducting one point because of the ayran and the mix-up with our order.

I’d still recommend it and would come again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpyfqivIERxBtXrQNMWBK7KMVtYF3ed2TN4grh&fid=0x0:0x16a3a137d5937689"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"kamran shahrokh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnW3BKn89dGuAosnDpO1eQs955pDL6wqZ69_AnKg-v5vknxucnCg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everyone was amazing there. The food was amazing. The staff was amazing. The atmosphere was amazing. The men working behind the cash were really helpful and gave us options on what to order. The baklava Tasted very good, and it's a must try. My wife and I really enjoyed the food And we will be coming back here for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNrbOltFMFgq9pL1PvY5AzKofkXECH2RGnrZs_&fid=0x0:0x16a3a137d5937689"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Kendra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrPM42GFXCZgLpY36OfGTYBwQappVku5jisnWGkmbHZFY_irtCEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently dined at Al Basha in Richmond and had an excellent experience. The Arabic shawarma was absolutely delicious—saucy and flavorful, with a delectable garlic sauce that really elevated the dish. The tabouli was fresh and added a nice, light complement to the meal.

Overall, Al Basha offers a wonderful taste of authentic Arabic cuisine, and I highly recommend it. I look forward to trying more of their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIlyEyiv1y8PkUOsTuvCI2hgc6_B2TQO9P22pc&fid=0x0:0x16a3a137d5937689"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Ali Refaie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Qb1nUMuhTdvKT5xKfXkaldS_6IEl3rjYIcb84mIig84o7rgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve tried many shawarma places, but this one has the best shawarma taste in British Columbia! The flavors are authentic, capturing the true essence of Arabian shawarma. The staff are incredibly friendly and welcoming, making the whole experience even better. Plus, the prices are very reasonable for the quality you get. Highly recommend for anyone craving a real shawarma experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEI6GO2-J7HnOUGBgm7ClOiMvUfiDxRKWFyg-V&fid=0x0:0x16a3a137d5937689"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Sharif Bakouny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfbjmd7gfBv4gb-mUKIQxfP9RT7RF8lqNjjj8WpEH6B5_MSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've tried Shawarma in most major cities in Canada (Montreal, Ottawa, Toronto, Calgary, Edmonton and finally in Vancouver). This place serves the best chicken shawarma in Canada. It tastes the same as back home and the garlic sauce is unbeatable. Falafel is also very delicious. Also, the staff are friendly and generous.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLjG5QecQfQmKDvI04cc5Xj4JR6PqSzf_oXPOi&fid=0x0:0x16a3a137d5937689"],"When":"2024-6-2"}]
