user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lissey F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_0h2gfDoKvqHrlczcNzuVcw6R82p4tFoqi1v6X-IZDmM6MIVL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice little bubble tea place tucked away at a far corner of the outlet. Steady flow of customers, but not overly overcrowded; plentg of indoor and outdoor seating for everyone.

Staff is friendly and helpful with recommendations. Price is reasonable for a outlet bubble tea shop, with most drinks selling for $5.99 to $6.99.

I got the lychee fruit tea with black tea. It's much lighter than I was expecting, and not sweet despite opting for regular sugar. Probably the equivalent of 50% sweetness for most other bubble tea places. Sadly the lychee flavour is too light that I barely tasted it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHBkLUWUEFBLoMXfU30su9j4srHKsuIEPGL7yE&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Theresa Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXXyx0R-aYhpdkr3rO8RWtdAne-P2jLUdoemlenmpZtWZUBqF5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We had a honey green tea and bubble waffle here. The tea was great but the bubble waffle was kinda meh. The shell tasted a bit rough and it was a bit too sweet. I'll come back for the tea but skip the bubble waffle next time I shop at the outlet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDEwOLLp6rzPsYFCc8a2Og3NBMxL28pxvW7JWv&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-1-5"},{"Name":"Lauren G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxuzD4dNBcnsFwfMfkGF5frTb1vGOSS2zVwisDrkV_gL4jEfjs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Do NOT order the roasted milk tea unless you have tastebuds of steel. I took one sip and nearly choked bc it tasted like lukewarm motor oil (and I ordered full sugar). But- they were nice about fixing it plus we also got a taro bubble tea which was very good. Just stay away from the roasted milk tea if you know what’s good for ya","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV-Lz5qD-QzNF_pawOu12zrzamVUYajefxIRep&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"kawaii hatchiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLtom4JJghW2UnkOsI7GKr-J96yxZfSX4SBdkTaAQaNBfKVBVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time trying bbt here, surprised by the reasonable price point. The employees were very professional and attentive. I did find a string of plastic in my drink. Maybe something got caught in the blender when they were making my taro frap. I was driving when took a sip and thought it was a hair at first.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYZLgAT90di9uY8UAjLQrI2dzT1CRRqr56mqPi&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"mochi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFJ3YzQy4Ek7Uv6iuvuDDt8SDrpfRq8OqiVFgoo79K5l16GqzX4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"[June 2023]

All round good new boba place. Fast & friendly.
Good pearls & good taste. Mango & watermelon slush are fresh fruit slushes. Bunch of random asian snacks are on the side as well.

[November 2023]

Today, we ordered the Blue Raspberry Lemonade with pearls and it tasted really bad. The pearls also had a bad, tough texture. However, service is still ok, so I'm leaving it a 3*. I probably won't be coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEkVKb8gvyJGU-RIvoA23YlrvgHesEqIWD8u9x&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2023-6-16"},{"Name":"Ghazal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUxPjakfUDfUlOphLX0NHrhY3j03bOfl1WB2qtK88VIEBoxSUc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We were waiting for a very long time to get our order and the store wasn’t even that busy. I got the milk tea which I would rate 5/10. I had way better ones in other places.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOb3PmURpAa5j4zpBldaJSJscO099MqKy1MQ5SO&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"Ben Moreno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbXIQA5QNY2om_rvFeJhZDcAcErydWjpf8dpxFoZ8JJurbSZgE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice store in the outlet mall, plenty of choices for drinks and bubble waffles, fast service,  nice outdoor seating,  very convenient for a drinks and snacks break while hunting for deals, well recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhtLakxU9Asm8keAnh3Cg0WUedQJiRkpZ8QStw&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"HJ Marshall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_gcI3vW3uepTT3i_wt2Vk_IaBu140gLQwAD0ak9Ec_xFAMNhXbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice recharging station from all the shopping at outlets. Their fruit juice is great, and they provide samples for you to try out first.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4f_mUjfBiasGEX_-DZW0HxLDzDPB-egV2z7MA&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2023-10-15"}]

[{"Name":"Shaeli Finnie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9swc8R2K-WPKeSpodeW9gMPefWym8hWzzaxuYb_8dEHf-eO8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I've come into this Starbucks a few times and didn't leave a negative or positive impression!
Let me teach you the linkedin customer service certificate knowledge I learned!
Welcome everyone,  compliment them on a ring or hair cut, be chatty and more uppy!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kirstin Mann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKFC93mtUUxLCDTP5rwRZPqzHlCelq4xvOflCa0JMfVVN2PCaT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my favourite Starbucks location! The staff are all so friendly, kind, and helpful. And the speed of service is always super quick. I love coming here with my friends and family!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"hamidrerza Mohebbi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVPKWMuzgo_z7YMDmXOTG1AYlWabI5ba_2WL6o2iSnlyT1ug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Food and excellent atmosphere and services. There’s an only barista who’s called JESSICA is not a helpful barista. All the baristas are helpful except her. I always bring my thermoses and order venti but my thermoses are not large enough to fit a venti size therefore all the baristas always help me out with that and share the coffee in my thermoses except JESSICA.  I got coffee the day before yesterday and that was my second experience being bothered by JESSICA. It would be very appreciated if someone talks to her and makes her understand to treat the customers better.  Thank you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Da Wanderer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6gUX2zsQKdIE8uVzYWBnKKtvYQAJfEKJppzMJqd4hE4TuUun8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this location as it is not very busy in the morning. They have plenty of seating inside and a few outside. The baristas are very accomodating and pleasant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMe_9ZlsEwvzkJ3wtqmHpNEjmcEKPmzroBRUyTG&fid=0x0:0xa56606d8d2cfdc0e"],"When":"2023-6-3"},{"Name":"Persia Abadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAoes5Wz3Km1FVuM212mPfo7qE9ixcl_E4X1WBiag7ozE0Zw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the staff here is so nice and they make the best matcha out of all the starbucks i’ve been too 🥹","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lissette Lemus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhUA8VuA39PGcgP65Sw0rS_K18r8jm5_BSMMSgkZVJGGDXNw_6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Starbucks, not just the rush in and out downtown, very inviting atmosphere.
People treats you really well, they are nice barista and do their job well.
I really liked this venue","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYXfBD0upZYENSON9QHjk_5QBoW-n3BeV19INp&fid=0x0:0xa56606d8d2cfdc0e"],"When":"2018-6-9"},{"Name":"Peter Kun C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIeizCojDFPzFmClVAuONc5rpvdco3YUfm4JIEAaedThnc-yQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We got a grande cappuccino order via Uber from this location, and we got the product like this, pissed me off so much","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMg0uMMO-UHrBzTq5leGu6jd3DO0GPbV-DF3_xY&fid=0x0:0xa56606d8d2cfdc0e"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Ace Handler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXG070pDZpOXrzwV2rQlXrfq11qJdrQhixLElKepKB2sD2XcznU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good coffee if you think so (I do) vente blonde w/2 pumps mocha and lots of cream, yum! user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great neighborhood coffeeshop. Tried their white chocolate, peppermint mocha, and hedgehog mocha. They were all good-  but were all too sweet for my taste and that’s comparing to the regular cafes I go to.

I saw different variety of tasty looking cheesecake that was tempting. I might be swinging by again and next time I should request for less syrup.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXrxD9Aw4WjikLFsliyUYk68JmbrNE5PCAo-5y&fid=0x0:0x52882a56840643ec"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Robert S Hyslop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLk4RfYovC07wE1lh_LlfD5aSVAcWDDfPXHC9l_66SZLa9ReQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So Good So Good So Good... had a White Mocha and Ham Egg and Cheese bagel.

Both were yummy... service was quick and friendly. Pricing was fair for the quality of the food and coffee being offered.

Listen to these great reviews and try it, if you haven't already :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMU_WPqD_iZdc4vssybCu64QJIfIxqPE9dPmB13&fid=0x0:0x52882a56840643ec"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I came to Wick's Cafe for lunch with my daughter as I had a parcel I needed to pick up in the same area.

Featured here:
Matcha Latte
Caramel Frappe
Spinach Quiche
Tuna Melt Sandwich
Cloud Cheesecake

The Matcha Latte doesn't appear anywhere on their menu; however, I happened to overhear a customer in front of us ordering it so when I got to the front I inquired about it and the salesperson confirmed that they do serve Matcha Latte even though it's not written on the menu.

Tuna Melt Sandwich was just OK. My daughter and I both felt that the cheese was not very melted. It would have been better if they had left the sandwich in the panini press for just a little longer. We did enjoy the Spinach Quiche though.

Our slice of Cloud Cheesecake was the star of the show! I was floating on Cloud 9 while eating this cheesecake. Sharing this one slice with my daughter was hard. I wanted to have it all to myself. It was so incredibly light and fluffy; it felt more like a mousse cake than a cheesecake. Now I wanna go back and try some more flavors of their cheesecake. There were some very attractive looking flavors. Wonder if they are all that light and fluffy. I sure hope so!

Service: Good
Parking: Free","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdwJK_xqRMM-pTOW9V9t8f_mLLji-V2vcRm8Jf&fid=0x0:0x52882a56840643ec"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"M B (Patient Survivor)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsJtKImNrZWwe76NcWbU2P1NFMAfy_bud9DaV5t27t-N7-wJh2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My wife and I visited, as we have done for a few years but not for an extended period, and we ordered food and lattes.

The coffee is quite good.
The service was good
The food was disappointing.

I ordered a freshly made tuna sandwich. The sandwiches in the glass display had a squared pieces of cheddar and I thought this would be good…

What I received was disappointing because after spending between $30-$40 my sandwich bread was soggy in spots and barely any cheese, and it was shredded cheese.

To add to this, the chocolate croissants have zero filling… we will not be coming back here. This spot used to be like a Brekka but is now another spot that does not deliver for the price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCTWvOidVmVlxTUnXq_iryBCkwntq9gbTFIAYY&fid=0x0:0x52882a56840643ec"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Jane Doe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIG6ivj47xS2HhBWyL7Nhqkjx3ByYqnQdgrN9qpq1CDdbnzpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy chill cafe with a ton of selection!
I have tried many of their drinks and love them all, their selection of red drinks are made with red roibos tea for a heathy alternative","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6ZeMsezHdar8vZ4fnKBI5FtQVbU76tsfTurz9&fid=0x0:0x52882a56840643ec"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Lalita P-Junggee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3xrsDIid8Rw5dOJBImvBbraN_DyT3iG8gGw1tfemzKsC6SJpI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is by far the best café for excellent coffee and cheesecake! I've been to many places around Vancouver, but the peaceful atmosphere here and the delicious food they serve are unparalleled. Yes, we're still talking about a coffee shop!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIWOLd69u2rGJ03hZyEGFkEquWZQvAHfZsvJRK&fid=0x0:0x52882a56840643ec"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"A MA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhyppVwJo7AF52M9f-tAUC4pUSQmeoVrRurchvPgz-992aZeU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I would've never thought there was such a great little cafe the area without the help of my American express shop small map. The coffee was amazing, strong and bold. They have a large selection of food from sandwiches to cookies. The only thing missing was and wish they had was donuts. It would go so well with my coffee. The service was exactly what I expected from an independently operated business; polite, professional and welcoming. There are tons of parking in the area, so you won't need to worry too much with finding one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQ8SnPGq1quPd2Lhq-ADzvHGFCkF4Hg_PERnpo&fid=0x0:0x52882a56840643ec"],"When":"2023-10-22"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tried an assortment of their baked goods and they tasted comparable to those of grocery stores. Good, but average and nothing stood out. The croissants could have been crisper on the outside. These were on the denser and breadier side for croissants and weren’t very airy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMntaB_IXyOBmlGRobWejLebAoBMDT3f8J_E4eU&fid=0x0:0x52882a56840643ec"],"When":"2023-12-6"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Donna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV-1fC2NyXiZ0A9667ftjo1ZmZjT3xSB_hLv0c5m10v2150dNZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm pleasantly surprised. An early departure from YVR, we enjoyed sitting up at the bar and having breakfast. The staff are pleasant. The food is fresh, including a baked section of croissants and sandwiches.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJv1uJi8IivPbYzN2TWUCWp3v7BkTDdTfL7tBI\u0026fid=0x0:0x37f17d21de7a62c9"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Rhonda Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOvQYQZHka-bKxi3IviN8K56T6tlM9aOpgmfcHCCvVRP0KPkD0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s 10am and I’m in the airport headed to my next destination. I sure would like some breakfast and this restaurant has waffles 🧇 😆! The presentation was lovely, two delicate waffles, a serving of warm syrup, raspberry compost and a custard that tasted like green tea. The waffles were too sweet for my taste but I’m atypical ☺️. Mr. Martin had the bagel with lox. He said it’s really good. The dish was pricey but that’s typical in the airport. No one forced me to eat in the airport, I could have waiting until I got in the plane ✈️ and had a pack of cookie with Sun chips. Root 98 didn’t disappoint! The staff is very friendly too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYbuhKSPnpaEyVE2FYPtYPlbVV-L6HAAUWKnLV\u0026fid=0x0:0x37f17d21de7a62c9"],"When":"2024-2-17"},{"Name":"Ward Vanlaar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrCaudT5ghJSCamFFt7xiARF0veL1nqOxoBylV1EgIcwwtEWrr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had a great Avocado toast. It was delicious, which is not a given in an airport. Beware though, if you are planning to use Air Canada food vouchers, they do not accept them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWePtuTgZt8KJUVEdgpgyUcLtEH8HbLm9CF6XN\u0026fid=0x0:0x37f17d21de7a62c9"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Shayan Emami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRtVjgeF0Xa8B9cN17jFb1xX_jsiTrD6AvufKoea_Jc3WiF0j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered a salmon bagel sandwich and surprisingly it was very fresh, crispy and large. It came with fried eggs and kale. We tried it for a breakfast and we loved it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Helen May","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhdcNGr66ctzIXbilFOlgRnubfEx9lvwSwBUQMkBMnI43hdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ate here before a flight, and after such an awful experience, I have come on here to read the reviews and they are all correct. Please, please save your money and do NOT buy anything from here. Bought a breakfast sandwich which was cold after the first bite, the croissant was at least 3 days old-you could throw it at the window and it would have probably smashed it. The service was just horrific, like you owe the staff something. Please avoid at all costs!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"C T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3BPFG_kEH6QBcAhVRjCmHqqTEno7L3Q__ZDIhgjGciUYQ5A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Hot chocolate was vile. Sickeningly sweet. From an instant coffee machine 🤮 chocolate hazelnut (or was it almond) croissant was equally unpalatable, made worse by its enormity. Cold and dense. Wasn't sure if I was eating dough. Saddest breakfast of my life 😞","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danielle Doty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJuQqCHnCZ9DBflmd8GQgK4cviDh794Skn_d4jEcTSwiHY86DG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered avocado toast for myself and my 9 year old. We both loved it. I like the greens and pickled onions on top. Eggs are a little small. Takes about 10 minutes to get so plan accordingly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnptfBDkqovSCurp43UjAp73BtVNGCnaUhfDTg\u0026fid=0x0:0x37f17d21de7a62c9"],"When":"2024-3-11"},{"Name":"Kinston Ackölf / Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbjyaVfgv7ehhmQS_BFZVN7ezp0H8SBDUuWJWAPnZI87cFXvlE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Pricy yet low food quality.  The salmon bagel I had was heated unevenly.  The cashier staff acts like I am in debt to her by throwing me the card machine, horrible experience afterall.  I would rate a zero or even a negative number if I could.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"larissa sandoval","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHMsnNOyQ-dDeoTnqKIXCM1pOeSc3Hn8eBLvjCMupM9LsN7CuRvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This hidden gem of a mom-and-pop restaurant is truly amazing! Don’t let its location deter you—step inside and treat yourself to a delicious feast made with top-quality ingredients.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPspjAlfA_oOU1jjbYjbJDckIFlZ40v7ewYpe0p&fid=0x0:0x248de577e6dd7100"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Colin Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7h35ZtHaveCK9eq8-mDb7BmK8EeHfVN1usnvgcw8J_phkrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent genuine service.  Amazing food.  Must try if in the area.  Authentic family owned business.  We tried almost half the menu and will return to try the other half next time!  Hello from Toronto!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFpWDAaFywc-M1GnARNYEm3ZiLZel84dlqpgMP&fid=0x0:0x248de577e6dd7100"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Stephanie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBV5KRG75WlxmWo1wuDhWSQhlZCOao4V2_9kFkOn0OqRNe45TP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We came on a Saturday at 2pm and there were a few empty tables.

We got a couple of items to share. The food took awhile to arrive by elevator. Be warned it can get quite hot upstairs.

Our favourite was the pide cheese. It was the most visually appealing and also tasted the best. Loved the bread and the cheese combo. Doesn't get better than that. The other ones we tried all tasted similar to it.

I would skip the beef wrap and the pizza and just stick with the pide cheese

We also tried the napoleon and it isn't your standard puff pastry napoleon. It wasn't crispy but it was still made with layered pastry and custard. Not my cup of tea

Overall service was super friendly. Food wise it maybe just didn't suit us. I would say just try the pide cheese or the pide beef if you eat meat. Wouldn't make the trek out to this industrial area just to have it. But if you are at IKEA, it's not a bad place to stop by and try it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkg8zgrTxuLvFhIfDBHfklrMGLaoPmdjKu9vTS&fid=0x0:0x248de577e6dd7100"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Amanda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmKD2bj1fRErBMVVW1HuxjabqkrOQ7Iekj70MVT9jou0uRjgsO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered from Lamajoun for delivery and everything was nicely packaged.

I had the lajajoun beef, chicken thighs (SO FLAVOURFUL and the whole thing was big as my forearm), jingle bread (would also order that again), and basturma (too much of a kick for my mild tastebuds).

I can't stop thinking about those juicy chicken thighs but I look forward to trying more items from their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoaWmKlh8NTgD9VzXD3KmG_CsATfCACYs7Sb42&fid=0x0:0x248de577e6dd7100"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Jonathan Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWddQo8wMBJzHSVbZqf3PzuLAF8cbLklc-QzLlTMxdNAQdxIUXqtw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sergei was welcoming and friendly, explaining everything on the menu in detail (we only knew of a few Armenian/Georgian dishes) and he even gave us a sample of the basturma while having a pleasant conversation.

Very few other restaurants have staff that interact so nicely with their customers in this way.

In terms of the food itself, it was amazing. I am glad to have found this little eatery tucked away in the middle of a Richmond business park, especially because you cannot get anything like this anywhere in Vancouver. Highly recommend this place to anyone wanting to try something different. Flavours are amazing and recipes are authentic. Will definitely be coming back when we're in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQWpvFTD7b28qykdQWTCxLwMdsgF44Wj_WJBk2&fid=0x0:0x248de577e6dd7100"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Amy Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIE3UOROV8NMo87qR9oHXk3F9ay6IRjlJvxzBx_WjoDffL02qA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice restaurant and people! I have not tasted such delicious European food for long time! Strongly recommend it to my friends and colleagues!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTrjp5cifMU9fCr4LjPYa1w63pqo65zrlL4ovs&fid=0x0:0x248de577e6dd7100"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Chef Menajem Peretz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFHHucZwQOsfB8-8SKRbUjhOVQd_5RL6RbAdEZcnLC3uuqNK4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a place to discover, for sure a bit out of the way, extremely simple and down to earth. No fancy table, dishes, ambiance, you come here for the food, it is fresh. It is unique and it is amazing, if you have time in Richmond, you must try this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCzFgJhF8EzZ87PcBJ8cxv1gvlxCixqQ3JhW8&fid=0x0:0x248de577e6dd7100"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Lina Gozman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVt0-rgRow0xVQ7ri60vVSt4shjOmHP0wIlSp3-EBLuYNl7GTxleg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I heard about this restaurant from several people and was eager to try it. It was definitely worth it—the portions were generous, and the food was absolutely delicious. I will certainly come back here whenever I'm in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmvFqgJalHp56tnWSFn0p8xReFZsKoVgvb4BIP&fid=0x0:0x248de577e6dd7100"],"When":"2024-8-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joshua Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiq_RKExmA89Du8aX-W-ZBs3qCm4qRSNgBD8pl68UG5TZxMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I placed my order on Christmas Eve 2024 at 2:05PM. I waited 15 minutes l for a drink and there is not much people there. But the drink is very good. I visited with a friend and they think it is good too. But 10 minutes wait while others already have their drink?

I drank some at the time I took the picture, but the drink is filled to the top.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPai4XbIUayxuAgsWNEj9ZMasF4S1LUFoaOEYsK&fid=0x0:0x492a6e8362c9c941"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Sue E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICcqHscHU_79ANCxjsuIGnZlyEJ01H_X0yqHSZFUvVWMFJxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is fully renovated and opened. Very modern! Came here on June 7 and the gentleman who made my iced lavender cream oat matcha tea latte did a great job. I watched him make the drink and he was very precise and made it with care! Thank you!! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7myIPJcnc7KdKPKZVIZzRaYLE6rJ3BuJc8zL1&fid=0x0:0x492a6e8362c9c941"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Catherine Tseng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVJHMKmleEmjwpqAN-WjI_WJps9FU65U1kH-elxOpLmTBa1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love coming here! Everything is always fresh, and the staff has a great attitude. They genuinely care about making your experience pleasant and won’t hesitate to make you a new drink if you ask, which is something I really appreciate.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JB CHU","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgWSLLs0R--vY6HThjK4A_oQpcCL09XMjbjMMjW_zVqw3j73-u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The staff were friendly during my last few weeks of studying for my final exam. I've spent several hours a week at different time in a day at this location. Here are 2 main reasons for its failure to earn the missing 2 stars:

In short,
Impressed by the cheerfulness of the staff. Disappointed by the hygiene of the place.

Details
1. Drinks are somewhat inconsistent in taste. Maybe it's just me. Definitely debatable.
2. Cleanliness. At any point of time in a day, the garbage was always full, the one in the washroom included; can't comment on the one inside women's washroom. There's always some kind of garbage on the floor somewhere. At first, I thought it was only when they were under-staffed, but no matter how many staff were on duty, it was never clean. Busy hour or not, there were at least a few pieces of paper or something on the floor with either almost full or overly filled trash can.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKYVAkgsG9vzP2fhfllicGzsasc_ASzHvrpLzH&fid=0x0:0x492a6e8362c9c941"],"When":"2018-2-11"},{"Name":"Mani Aman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAQdDzJK_n7cMNRHrL-34BroltaZwV9Wwgys5y1TYhlFdekQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Andy and Damien are their best employees. They helped me with my order, served me with smile. Thank You Guys. Defiantly coming back☺️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Boba Pigi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnZjmGZGO1A2NDEvRRpGVcqDDphZLMioGEMlGGXLsGtaWeGY60og=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Close by where I live, very friendly stuff, feel warm and welcome, will be back often to have great cup of coffee and afternoon delights.  I used the on line order when I arrived, it’s quick and accurate. With outdoor area but today is too cold 0C outside better take out and head to work.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNK-ETXSLSc4NohEnlyC06TXnZSBZ-xUVYP0LBE&fid=0x0:0x492a6e8362c9c941"],"When":"2018-12-6"},{"Name":"Sina S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJx8DnpRX5mBvFFZUYYEQiXjS2kv1W9251xEE07cyUXEZkdAI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Manager Mark not doing a good job at this location. I stood at the till for 10 minutes and was never acknowledged by the 5 partners working behind the counter. They seemed to be too busy with mobile order to care about walk in customers. Very unpleasant experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"甜甜的","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUJsxfZiLZS-hc3273LMI3fl31v1zZtk7eW5OmAKKnlgBpPrbR5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have to say it’s really a Nice place to take a sit n study there. Peace and quiet, and it has lots of plugs so that you do not worry your laptop power off at all. The air condition is acceptable that not super cold!
I love the new product name Mango dragonfruit refreshing with coconut milk, it’s incredible! I will recommend that if people not have try it yet","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmkdY5B8Myhz4acjH52TOHA4xNq7Xjbd00vCji&fid=0x0:0x492a6e8362c9c941"],"When":"2018-8-18"}]

title: The Bubble Tea Shop
descriptions: Bright counter-serve spot offering bubble tea drinks, fruit slushes, coffee & egg waffles.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kel Shaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxlG7dSzG0XCaRucFdzjLtGXMN3t4REtRn-uT0qJZlGy2kASSN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little dessert place located under real Canadian superstore. Ben a few times. I’ve orally never had the bubble tea. Just their super tasty dessert waffles. They have sweet and savoury with no shortage of fillings and toppings. Be prepared to wait a bit as they do take time to make and sometimes only have 1 server on","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPr_8hhGESH7q_ix8bj3HVPd_NPwjoCTerJBvs\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c3fcb803f5e5454"],"When":"2024-3-14"},{"Name":"Duy T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-q9Nk62bNz4EuciUr1qRGxxQ8g_xJikWCDGYy4XykvphUvOlY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Did not try their waffles, but the drinks were pretty good. Nice looking place with sellable small merchandise with plushes and action figures. Pretty and helpful ladies.\n\nAccommodating what we wanted in our drinks. Did not realize there were tvs with menus on them until after ordering. As we were only looking at the pictures in front of the register. Nice chill place to hang back and relax.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMjHVlSSGjs1EJp3YJv8-8js1tpDhSjYmtYR6u\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c3fcb803f5e5454"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Talid Jalbout","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXaUeHBH7AVJdkjB_vmutMGnZKiS_gwPrWTjeXNr8SoSvPSvNMCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lots of really great options to choose from, many unusual ones such as topped with icecream. The dual cup is a great option if you're indecisive, but the flavours are available for it are limited. Fun interior with lots of things to look at. A couple of big tables, but it's a tight space.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPymd6S7YXFBDBtwKtQh3zVP6XmRPssmkoRjsCF\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c3fcb803f5e5454"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Kevin Ao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkBvZ6ce_zHnWsLqA5ojfX0nMQ_CDE0WIX5k8yhZ46T8a1BLiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Bubble Tea Shop is great place for bubble waffle and boba. I got the triple decker and it was delicious. The mango drink was refreshing. Staff is friendly. You can also buy random stuff from the glass shelves. There are two entrances.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMV2PJxbPc_ZcdG6h_z5fqOZYoHrLxcEtNa1-tF\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c3fcb803f5e5454"],"When":"2023-8-22"},{"Name":"Jenny Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgIEDkB2PzsQAjZtJxzL5NwawLrCpei_X1mvBSmllmI0Q-tBD5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sweet shop that has delicious bubble tea options and dessert waffles. You can customize the amounts of each topping for your drink as well as your premium waffles. The reasonable pricing and terrific service make it a place we highly recommend! The matcha ice cream and black sesame ice cream complement the red bean topping and black sesame waffle well. We hope to be back when we're in town!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_ufQ1s6QFFTpYNPLMa2qJgenLVVe-uDkZyY2U\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c3fcb803f5e5454"],"When":"2023-6-22"},{"Name":"Brian Shaler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVanm_SU1M6cSuCRW78pg1T2oWnXPERDUCzn8bF70zKPszCwZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is an interesting spot.  On one hand I thought the BBT was good and I’d like to come back and try other flavours.  But unlike some others, I don’t like the location. If I’m not shopping at Superstore I’m probably not trekking through this area of town and dealing with this parking lot. The store is also a mess with signage and pictures everywhere as well as merch in cubbies. It doesn’t mean the place wasn’t clean, just a lot going on. I do appreciate they offer a $0.25 discount for bringing your own cup!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjola7Oq_SF8HpVqAwimnmHx_l0XsVI7KDgxBB\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c3fcb803f5e5454"],"When":"2023-8-31"},{"Name":"Paula Hlavacek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUEHsTUDREBV0VNUK6UGtTRNbBuCTOdBVYyLeZYC7hO1QTx25MLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place has such a good bubble tea and waffles! The bad thing about massive menus is you can’t make a decision! Everything looks so good! The classic simple bubble waffles are the best, can’t go wrong with mochi! Bonus!! They have lactose free alternatives, coconut milk, almond milk and one more.. I forget! Really great place to hang for a quick dessert and a drink!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNON2PxrfAsF8Tu6u0pcAcg87wc8CHoPMpyedQ7\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c3fcb803f5e5454"],"When":"2021-2-8"},{"Name":"Jonathan H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgzhgQVztAxyjnx8UlA7B3n_i6sm9N4u3qe72zv5RxG6qHFl07=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! The choices are endless, they have an extensive drink and dessert menu. The wait times can be quite long but worth it. The bubble waffles are my favourite especially the ones with filling. Will definitely be back soon","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMifl3G7zcwLilk6XVcBIXeBnBmqJay5Zx3I4WD\u0026fid=0x0:0x6c3fcb803f5e5454"],"When":"2021-3-23"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Keri Stephens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXl5nCC0tCPK6QhEDC3LubCS1sWgXmh8U5htQ6iNQl1jsj6iCqD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Shaken espresso with light ice, the cheapest drink you can get and oh so yummy!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A bit pricy but great quality bottled beverages that are so very refreshing and tasty. Convenient for stocking your fridge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuZ0aO5ZwDQD-LOkZTqtmZ0zZ_m5GQLQ3mQoB6\u0026fid=0x0:0x858889628fc223fe"],"When":"2022-6-7"},{"Name":"Mari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2r-mhryMGk2X-vn8PMytpnU3ybB55mhqqbzhmzq1T-t2Nrus=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Used to love coming here. But now there’s a lady today that ruined my experience. She did not add enough sugar in my drink and when I asked for sugar to be added, she did not understand and was saying she already added sugar and needed me to repeat myself several times. I also added for no ice but she gave me extra ice. I gave tip too… she does not pay attention and is rough. She also did not tighten the lid for a hot drink for a gentlemen behind me, causing the hot drink to spill over him. Bad service from this Asian lady. I came on Sunday May 21 1:00 PM","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris Dunham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfIJf0xwT6BsOnd6X34kiaIn5ofmeO92kqhIbm1TKR-890kJxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had booked a room at the Sheraton Hotel on Westminster hwy @ Minoru I Richmond, a suburb of Vancouver and on my second day was spellbindingly amazed to find an actual Starbucks Franchise within the hotel property. The staff amazingly in my opinion seemed to to genuinely enjoy their employment and in my opinion appear happy to have the privilege of serving the customers therin. My current residence is quite close to another Starbucks I however will continue to commute to this Starbucks as the employees make my morning coffee that much more enjoyable and the extra 5 minute walk makes it more than worth it. Keep up the awesome work ethic guys. Looking FWD to starting my mornings on a  high note with you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sharp Life","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3vI4QfYfN1GhcGyz1XThp8pD3gTJeePXBJXbj-cP_9TXwjXEqyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Made my green tea frappe right. Was so happy. Have warm food options. Servers were good. Place was clean. Located in hotel but easy to get to and lots of 15 minute parking out front to run in. Always had a spot open.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wanderlust Aquarian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1DozKQFb34_3ATb_fjvErTkyfnJE_NLw6g27lthfIhkVHqyt8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Paid too much for a poorly made drink","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Suzanne McCray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlH3KsExuz1hePbQV52NVlmqFWonlSBVEKGJF3Sdv_SkNuDfrf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great friendly service, but they always charge me more than any other Starbucks. I bring in my own mug, so the short blonde should only be about $2.15, but here it's always $2.36.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"adavid J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoqspAhOzmuj5jmArL8z-_Bt4OojMw8geOJGohHV6f2MUW-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service, nice people","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marnie Eudela-Umlas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg_gVRD_Hd9V3XIUh6_P71KHCryea9xsHYGqrZHTuXW_jdxEU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time here and spent our Christmas Party. We rented their heated patio and it was a great venue. Their service was excellent and fast, their food was great especially their creme brule was so good, price was reasonable too. We will surely be back and maybe have our parties here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzI-bZwCYSVgmTjwCA0Mc339vwgYnAWlzGJIpw&fid=0x0:0x474d47516cceb253"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"RhE “R”","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhxn3fL4a0hIxT8HJcx09RB-3VeIdPygNVtHUnZO0hk197vWIP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fogg N' Suds is the restaurant attached to the Holiday Inn YVR. The restaurant is nicely decorated with a Sports Bar theme. It's comfortable and very convenient for the hotel visitors.
I had breakfast one morning. It was the standard Holiday Inn offering in a bit of an upscale setting.
The service was pleasant and friendly.
The restaurant offers a full menu, all day, which looked quite appealing.
This is a convenient location when staying at the Holiday Inn.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVDy_CnXoozIpKy_Mr9VH87gdSxzIu9yJDKTcO&fid=0x0:0x474d47516cceb253"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"grant johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOT5kNa0x4eE0h2LxlrWwjL4mH6PnEZaX0NHDhip8rb98DGHh3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fogg n Sudds is a very handy restaurant beside the Holiday Inn YVR ( not AT the airport). Service was very good and attentive. I ordered the Prime Rib meal, which was filling and tasty enough but the prime rib cut was the thinnest i’ve ever seen for Prime rib. It was maybe 1/2 to 1 cm ( 1/4-1/2”)  “ thick”.  for $29, i expected at least twice the thickness. Plus the Yorkshire pudding was way overdone ( i know it’s tricky to do). My wife had the halibut and no worries there, a very nice meal. i’d go back but not for the prime rib.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNd58YRrkVKqWszNIOIoD2LerG_5HlbAnqk3LJl&fid=0x0:0x474d47516cceb253"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Julian Uhrig","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW08nq9XmUdp3LXQYIWLa1rmdmrS7ft5311n---leOqXXtK-0-k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Was here in February and the breakfast hash included peppers and red onions, bacon, eggs and sausages cooked to perfection.

But now the hash is just potatoes deepfried to a very dark brown. This could have been a one off but was very different from February. Loss of quality for sure.

Service has been awesome both times and it's just a pub dinner so atmosphere is good.

Picture from what it used to be.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0SxkDixMX1lExfXzqlNDLXXSfdZNx08zUj8Gm&fid=0x0:0x474d47516cceb253"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"tlee996","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQ_1UZR5IqHh2weDbQuG13Guye1-3IdopwdQKCyvp3B2_Kmg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I think our server was David.  Had a friends bday party there.  The wings were good along with nachos, truffle burger, lamb risotto, steak & prawn, truffle pork chop and sear Mahi Mahi and chicken fettuccine alfredo","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw1hFRkLe4KK2mHmlcA0EW58eUhLaqfrrcBr1f&fid=0x0:0x474d47516cceb253"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went for Xmas 3 course lunch meal on Xmas day
Surprisingly it’s not busy at all
Taste of the food meeting expectation
And the dessert much bigger than expected
They have limited parking in front of the restaurant so i park in the hotel car park ( all parking is free)
Entrance of parking right next to hotel , just buzz in they will open the gate.
The parking lot , hotel and restaurant is all connected so kind of nice for rainy days to stay dry
Ps don’t park on Volvo side might get ticketed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvnMeIJRBqSQfb0MXfpaWFXr3KnqgfwcHABglV&fid=0x0:0x474d47516cceb253"],"When":"2023-12-29"},{"Name":"Richard Oxlade","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6dmdsmRg8ls0W8KfTsxibV4XJj0l366DGgb_zQ42TaifdINNk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place for an affordable dinner close to lots of airport hotels. Lots of menu options for a variety of dietary restrictions. Definitely a great spot to visit if you’re staying at any of the nearby hotels and don’t want to spend a fortune on dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMb3CgWfWHCGOAkpZawz3-53wN4Do8s77P2u67b&fid=0x0:0x474d47516cceb253"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Wendy M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXti_Nw51FeZwTm2Y6QWUQnS4XGNNxg279vOwOMNj1a6B1wn5Z1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was fantastic and the happy hour menu made sure it was affordable. The steak entree for happy hour and their burgers were amazing. Thank you as well to the staff. They were very pleasant and accommodating.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty good HK style breakfast and cafe. The portions are generous, and prices are reasonable. You can pay debit without extra charge.

The breakfast A+B combo can feed 1 to 1.5 adults, depending on how much you eat. The hot drink is large too. As for the eggs, I prefer scrambled (they call it fried) eggs.

There's usually long'ish lineups, so you can try ordering over the phone and pickup as an alternative.

Parking is fine since there's plenty upstairs. Seating is a problem on weekend lunches, as there are many other food court stands in Parker Place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvibNKXE6HdeQeaeVqkVluaZ7ciaAZ6jn5W9ep&fid=0x0:0xa9370d856d430aeb"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Edmond Hui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSq3NvFWYU7d8X0XllbLamBy2m-B3MtLa9kF_rBzisafuojqimRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good HK style fast food. Really good fried chicken legs, rich and comfort meat sauce on rice, top with fried egg.

HK style milk tea is one of the best in town.

Bring back memories from HK, priceless.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYgLsziPwiPCgenFBgTFv0At-2vgGumNRnfapa&fid=0x0:0xa9370d856d430aeb"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Ming","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqc_DJy_7kp-HGh2ROvgEWhZsmLV7qnzyBCBqW-6HWZNyNjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Hong Kong style breakfast and snack, but in a food court style. Definitely cannot count on the service as interaction is brief and they do expect you to be efficient like them!
I enjoyed the satay beef with instant noodle. Drinks are great! Other food items are… decent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxVlgQP9L0uewjsnBr5-Ytlx4PL_J13rJUc80F&fid=0x0:0xa9370d856d430aeb"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Macsen W.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7R507e1tQogS7ePLx183cUitHIjVF1AWY7PSdCxN71xj5ZpqStw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty HK style breakfast in food court comparable to restaurant... Fish cutlet and pork cutlet are crunchy and juicy... Good HK milk tea","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCqInPDol0hxqeslWyyarE47WF93IK0NtHA32x&fid=0x0:0xa9370d856d430aeb"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Tarrance K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJrYECNNpyBbtf7KnQB1Kfy0-Y4qKb0gKhY-TVdFBICrcoIF1j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The baked pork chop on rice was a big portion and not bad taste for the price. It was very busy but I thought service was fine and was able to order in English on the phone. -1 star as I thought the hot milk tea was a little wattery. Takes debit or cash.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBV5KRG75WlxmWo1wuDhWSQhlZCOao4V2_9kFkOn0OqRNe45TP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We came on a Saturday morning at 8:20am and there was a small line to order. After we had ordered and sat down, the line was long and they told people the wait would be around 30 minutes (depending on what you ordered)

I ordered the thin noodles with pork veg and the satay beef macaroni with an additional side of egg and toast for extra $2 (approx). We got milk tea for both. They are very generous with the amount of milk tea they give. The cup is bigger than usual places. It also is pretty smooth, not bitter and the tea flavour is pretty strong. For me the satay beef macaroni and egg toast was too much for 1 person. I couldn't finish it but for others it will be just right. The macaroni was cooked just eight and the satay beef had a lot of flavour to it. The egg was a tad overdone but overall worth it for the price.

Overall I would go back to get breakfast again and try their lunch items when available. It's economical, the portions are decent and the milk tea is not bad","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWA_oN46mvHpH2iURzHLxgO94B1tQA28liKTpU&fid=0x0:0xa9370d856d430aeb"],"When":"2023-4-12"},{"Name":"Pepperonli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDYePCBRkaObdo8TKMZI3kZzC8lDuO8BSZ8PhJgn-l7Afrpaf7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not sure why this spots so popular. Baked pork chop rice full of tiny shards of bone. Sauce has barely any flavour. Service/attitude is not good either.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfgZdcUnCfjLj9zH89LTwcXO9YI0mF3s0n-ZiPEgAZy8FVQrUI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lunch time lots of people lineup. Tried the Hong Kong style milk tea, bake rice with pork chop and bake rice with curry chicken. Taste not bad.
Weekend lunch time expect long lineup.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjUqv5BXfq1vR6GkQMvICKUfLTX9TeX0r3hEGT&fid=0x0:0xa9370d856d430aeb"],"When":"2023-11-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Starbucks is awesome always fresh stuff from bakery and recognizable good coffee. My only issue it’s always so busy and you can’t find empty seats but overall fully satisfied with this place.
I highly recommend it and I’ll definitely return again 👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyQhanog7VF8S_NZtmLHD6l_XyR1v5xXwshmu0&fid=0x0:0xb3e6df659ab2e8a8"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Sanford Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLEfg9CaoTYmrbgRSAshVrGQtZBmV850o0rIUp4q8eMEf-RJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The service was half decent as the barista had to attend while the cashier and store manager were busy with training new employees. Anyways, had to wait for my order for a Pike Place Roast as they ran out, waited for 5 minutes and got the coffee but it tasted burnt for a medium roast.

Not sure how quality control is kept there but the amount of attention to make coffee was lackluster.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"angelo aguilar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWd-8bE2knxXUSSPOL9MUSDqckU6PK4rvpKJXGYVZ0mK0m-A4IPaA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The barista Elena was just absolutely gorgeous. I couldn’t stop stealing a look! Despite being busy, she took the time to give me a smile and even drew a heart on my cup. Totally made my day. This starbucks is located in a designer outlet which befits the brand. It’s understandable that there may be times when it may take awhile for my drinks to be made. Even under immense pressure from the seemingly endless hoard of customers, the workers seems to push through and clearly loves their job. 69/10 would recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZyXuR1Z4_is40ek8KpulEd5RhpADf_XFR9FRi&fid=0x0:0xb3e6df659ab2e8a8"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Louis Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCS0d2iW9p8qyQ5MAhtEHf73JHu8pojIk1b9XgujAKTnhaySo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"First off, this isn't a complaint against the staff who were doing their best in a challenging situation. Kudos to them.

My issue is with the fact that a busy store such as theirs is under-staffed and has not enough machines/area to service such a large demand during traffic spikes.

The service which Starbucks is known for was not there today and very disappointed by it - especially as my wife, who is 9 months pregnant, had to wait outside and sit down for almost a whole hour. We ordered at 3:36PM and didnt come out with our drinks until 4:26PM.

Very disappointed and will be cautious to come to this location again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shery On The Move","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmAA3VItm5d-LzZjMzSS_FZs12aHSse1X5w-nXQqVmdbUvhBBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time visiting this store. I came on Tuesday morning, just an hour after they opened. All three baristas greeted me with smile and friendly faces.

I ordered hot chocolate and it’s up to the standard 👍🏼.

Good atmosphere, clean and nice to relax inside the store. Please keep up the good work and the cleanliness throughout the day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmldLfRI0AuaRO6SK_fs_CXGfY--HYpwb9CMFI&fid=0x0:0xb3e6df659ab2e8a8"],"When":"2023-11-7"},{"Name":"TheRealM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBQ02s-MSYbJVx5xAObiOh6GtjLc7QEIqJtof6C-5EDQEhH0mT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Starbucks is generally just starbucks. But if you've been to many and always get the iced caramel macchiato, then you will notice the difference in the stores. Even with the same exact recipe all across the board, some just make it better then others. How, you ask? Well its all about the mixing, and the right number of espresso pumps (which still some of the people get wrong 🤔) Some make it really undrinkable and others make it super delicious and smmoootthhh. This is all dependent on the training the specific Barista did and any tweeks shes learnt along the way from experience to make a drink oh so good. This location, has always delivered either good macchiato to Amazing! I remember driving away a few times after a sip and actually having to stop for a second right before the drive through exit to say (woooww this is soo good)! Doesn't happen often but once in a while, it is a good surprise. Now, not all Starbucks are good. And the one closest to home depot in Richmond, every time it sucks! But that's another review.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiwefCl3qP_a6_aZsUAPKXgFyOmgtjV8lRp5rL&fid=0x0:0xb3e6df659ab2e8a8"],"When":"2023-2-18"},{"Name":"Jason","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVH3_U6pO1xCKGFIuXI_qqe_T4260Tfz6BhyIPfv5U3P-y7sesGag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice place. Service is fast. The layout is good compared to other Starbucks locations. I like how they have a large counter to pickup your drinks so there’s not crowding. The only downside is that seating is limited.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJiH8yS65gHz5C-QU6PoOczjNN2QSCW-L4DKsF&fid=0x0:0xb3e6df659ab2e8a8"],"When":"2019-11-10"},{"Name":"SALEH Moh. (Bo M7md)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4Wpd5JoxgleQRnvy0VFRjsWGBOu8CZFzs8ptUvMS8kqLflMf_2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you for serving
Cinnamon cake was delicious
Black coffee also was amazing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvGyrNSy8ZRUz_1bdqVYTDUxLk634I9ejzwln4&fid=0x0:0xb3e6df659ab2e8a8"],"When":"2024-5-28"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Danny Ivancevic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3T2n8GTCfmXpjciJltg1N-t9P8Zha3uH-kUU4iWN6GbnW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We order for a dealership on Saturdays with a large order of 15 pizzas. Always arrives hot and fresh and perfectly on time. We keep coming back week after week being the only place that seems that it can do a large order and it arrive fresh. Will keep coming back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jas G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_qMMW-Xwzdkt9eWYDAntfkcCbodz8bi7MePPJAv49qypORds2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered pizzas for delivery and received a message saying it was on its way, which turned out to be a lie. I called the store after the delivery driver didn’t show up 20 minutes after getting the message and they said they were waiting to send the driver until they had multiple orders. The store is an 8 minute drive away. After I called the store the driver called me to say he was 8 minutes away. So basically he didn’t leave the store until I called to inquire and if I didn’t do that I suspect I would still be waiting.  I don’t blame the driver but I won’t be ordering from here again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Olive Town","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEDuLspzw_LatBMmArqU2kGpoMiGIPnT82mRoyzxanzlueamy3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The same wonderful pizza at every location! You can even add chili flakes as a topping here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7_JeG2b_4j7Nk8E-9R8Io62diiOOLT-YwogEx\u0026fid=0x0:0x6b698841de574889"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Miloš Mandic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJEgxRAANxWZ-pvkfTqDQHLk0KRjRy5VATPmOq-IkxcuvHww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst pizza I’ve ever had. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Michelle Mar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlEJ4cgmtWYMUHyJi23QVuK-RKnP2DhwagVXHaXRadVApOlEed=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited this place around 5 PM, and it was pleasantly quiet. The atmosphere was cozy and relaxed, making it a great spot to unwind. The staff was friendly, and our order tasted excellent. The mango shaved ice was a refreshing treat, perfect for summer. Overall, a very enjoyable experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhfyiiREfDrqB7w63zwkfIjwhgXCPAvMSdILJK&fid=0x0:0x3887c1b1874e48"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Henry Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcTlx45tkivdnVyW4B38kXt4WHZXtLMp6yRttTlIFdf-1gou8R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Location is a bit far from the Richmond business centre, but dessert here is absolutely amazing, didn’t really expect that.

Price is reasonable, service is good, interior is comfy, dessert is pretty damn good! Would definitely come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOk-TI-nLOOz1YeTs4FUrLw4m9yxl9ganTyKh0&fid=0x0:0x3887c1b1874e48"],"When":"2023-10-5"},{"Name":"Maggie L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgYjxK--5ofPE2eFHgAPTuYdgwI3-xVXGEfEJahKX_1NHRbgpAEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The shopkeeper lady was helpful and welcoming. Loved the chewy mochi balls on a skewer and even more the mochi with salted custard sauce with crunchy chocolate sprinkles. This place isn't cheap but the stuff is of great quality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Earl Peng (kumofoodlist)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWdrMWeeLeJkwNqcfA9V0mTN83YcbLXkuOS9zw0pniZZaDMpPq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Asian fusion desserts place specializes in delicious eats of drinks and dessert ranging from cakes, shave ice, waffles, soufflé pancakes, sweet cold or hot soups, fruit salads, and more. It also has a very interesting and extensive menu. One probably needs to visit more than quite a few times to try everything. But during our visit there, we had,

- mango sago tapioca icy drink
- Mochi skewer on soy milk custard over red bean and shave ice
- Michi skewer on soy milk custard over cake
- Mango sago cake with cream float
- Pork floss cake with custard

The sweet level of desserts are moderate. The soy cream is light and airy while the mochi are bouncy and chewy. Also, the mango 🥭! So ripe  fruity fragrant and juicy! If you love fresh made desserts, too, then you would love this place.

IG: @kumofoodlist","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNewdX-r4ZMSgciVsSGQHcT-wKe7bmf-lztNew5&fid=0x0:0x3887c1b1874e48"],"When":"2022-10-8"},{"Name":"Michelle M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeetN-W20mnzvtvgZG8vAeDlWwG6zd354oPCvc1I4B_3Cjy_PI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The name was confusing I thought it was a kids cafe. Haha but surprised to find unique desserts. It was slow and I wanted to try the pork floss dessert. The pricing was 2 for $11 and 4 for $20 for one flavour. I really wanted to try 2 flavours and ask to do 4 with two flavours for the $20 deal. They said they can’t. I enjoyed the mango sago cake with cream and the pork floss custard cake. The Asian soup with beans wasn’t impressive so I didn’t even take photos. So service was average but the desserts were great. We ended up eating at a park due to restrictions.

We been back twice and loved the desserts options. The mango sago was delicious and the pork floss cake is still my favourite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMl1ONSs3MUX8tJkL7-YunpnWlpRyssd-Xvgu6p&fid=0x0:0x3887c1b1874e48"],"When":"2021-4-26"},{"Name":"Sweets Fanatic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKT4q9vq4bFnKURKLo-IuFZkNgSUZrYyHCHwVq7PvVTaTofHHc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like the atmosphere! They decorated the store similar to a beach cafe. The food was quite good, although the cake with cream had a bit too much cream in the middle. However, the mochis on top of the cake were soooooo good! I couldn't get enough of it!

The durian mochi that I ordered was a bit disappointing since it was basically a block of durian wrapped with whipped cream and the outer skin. It was too icy that my tooth started to hurt when I bit into it.

The drink my friend ordered was very beautiful, worthy of an Instagram post. She also said that it tasted great.

The food there was also not too sweet, just like how I favor it.

7.50$ for the cake, 5$ for the mochi, and 8.5$ for my friend's drink.

Overall, the price is fine. I would recommend here if you're trying to get a good Instagram photo with super pretty food.

Customer service: 4/5 [they didn't bring water when I first asked for it, and I had to step up twice to remind them.]

Taste of food: 4/5 [the durian mochi was really the only thing that was lacking.

Decoration of food: 5/5

Decoration of store: 5/5

Price: $-$$","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCXZKdqA_hN8mnvKPJ11IIjDfaqwMjBTfT-Goa&fid=0x0:0x3887c1b1874e48"],"When":"2022-10-30"},{"Name":"Chen Fish","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFRFYs_A3P0rP_v0SPg0K0FJ62YD59aL_HsUlsyADQHpp-XoY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute place, cheerful staff, and the desserts are good! Went for the first time today and I’d totally return to try other things on the menu:) I got the Soy Milk custard cake with mochi as well as the taro tapioca. Neither are too sweet, although the cake had a little too much cream for me, but that’s just a personal pref~ The mochi was soft and chewy > usually its a hit or miss but they made it really well:p Should def try !!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5L3ynPp5Jh03DIkXPKGW2oNBLmqzGCjdpgqye&fid=0x0:0x3887c1b1874e48"],"When":"2022-11-21"},{"Name":"nick shen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJr-219TigqhQwLsuskExymKd8d_Ip_6GjwZNWrbD0sv3-Trw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here a couple of times now and am loving it! The shaved ice here is great! Not too sweet and good portions. The fruit drinks are also amazing. The strawberry lemon one was sweet and tart, makes my mouth water at the thought. The souffle pancakes were also fluffy and with great tasting toppings. Perfect setting for families trying to find a spot to eat dessert at as they also have a play area for the kids. Will definitely be coming here again and again :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxAIYiFWzbdeaVAX4DBTWqqTyGmNYhNfYyPMes&fid=0x0:0x3887c1b1874e48"],"When":"2020-1-3"}]

[{"Name":"Dave Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL544JfNo-heg8UsP95fr9shcrTY9pTTKZqcIgOMgLc7F2usw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice selection of coffees and muffins. Lots of seating available including patio seating. Staff very friendly and efficient. Lots of parking in Seafair Shopping center.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5CYl-ILDUeAOk1TZCpcV3g8YWQwi4Zi6IpMGf&fid=0x0:0x23240cbeb7a3f194"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Melanie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKp-8Se2SxBjdZz0KfZI6p2T2nqU4HsNrWKU4KN6h11D5Oojg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The MOST EVER beautiful and
delicious Caramel Latte Macchiato!!
And all the staff are very
welcoming and friendly.
A wonderful place to relax and
have a great coffee!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO15RJQAsaYS_KFXz_KXsuK5n1Rtq5tiwM8boye&fid=0x0:0x23240cbeb7a3f194"],"When":"2024-5-10"},{"Name":"Yawar Murtaza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNGQuQOldhH8K6katNswm6TWuLJ11qH52vpnzYXuQFkBjWEINZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Blenz Coffee at Seafair in Richmond is truly a gem! From the moment you walk in, you're greeted with warm smiles and an inviting atmosphere. The owner is an incredibly caring and humble person, always going above and beyond to make sure every customer feels welcome and valued.

The staff here is amazing—attentive, friendly, and exceptionally helpful. They really take the time to understand each customer's unique preferences and necessities, ensuring a personalized and delightful experience every single visit. One time, I asked for drip coffee, which they didn't have, and they generously offered me an Americano for the price of a drip coffee instead. This kind of thoughtful service is what sets Blenz Coffee apart.

Whether you’re stopping by for a quick coffee or planning to stay a while with a book or laptop, Blenz Coffee at Seafair is the perfect spot. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Kan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk_o12iCtyO0gE_QoPCj5qJ7UUQkuic2cEzUnsQvn8LpSf4EV-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very clean and comfortable place to enjoy a cup of coffee.
The coffee tastes okay, not as strong as I thought.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOr6xWwpRmpN_Aa20tDFVyO4wItd9xqZf0TbYWA&fid=0x0:0x23240cbeb7a3f194"],"When":"2024-1-9"},{"Name":"Free Bird","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZlD0qDFHXsot2OEUOYz4TCssrlLzSwqQVetu1yQb66jYUuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I order a  “HOT mocha” but I receive a “cold” one instead👎
But good almond croissants","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNb5RycZwK3ya2C-6gavNKTQokd-RRwpV_UHbAp&fid=0x0:0x23240cbeb7a3f194"],"When":"2022-4-5"},{"Name":"Ilyas Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqlw1X2jfFMVs_Ww7qU-kKnoMPtq3AJNu1Azu7IhfLxjhQYAEU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I live near here by Dixon, but it closes so damn early... if it was open till 11pm on Friday and Saturday that would be so good for business... because only Waves in Steveston is open late. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The only coffee shop in this area! The coffee was pretty decent and the space was bright as well. As a Terra Nova resident I'm still very glad they chose to open in this area. The chicken sandwich also seems popular so will definitely give that a try next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFQVy-g00VcRcl1g9BYqX0WrgrkEL2AK1cdEmI&fid=0x0:0x609e3a941d0d0e26"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Shery On The Move","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmAA3VItm5d-LzZjMzSS_FZs12aHSse1X5w-nXQqVmdbUvhBBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Date of visit : 8 Nov 2024

I ordered Iced Mocha and Roasted Vege Panini (for take out).

I'm disappointed with my sandwich because its cold. I didn't ask for the staff to heat up because the menu on the wall stated 'hot sandwiches'. So i thought it will be served hot and fresh.  Unfortunately i was wrong.

I' happy with the iced mocha but its quite pricey for small size.

Seating area is small and tables are limited. Its not so cosy to seat down there.

For those who wants a good service, fresh food and cosy to hang out, feel free to go to L'aromas Cofee and Bakehouse in Delta. I went the before.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkCctnW8nwzu1TXnqWzXPKqdsipN_y1gCUvEDK&fid=0x0:0x609e3a941d0d0e26"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Greg Mattson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFrbttlbDAMTrqcEYaEoNGgTXaMwtarCi6C54s9mUz7zEh6gC-iw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a great little spot, but the word little is the only drawback here. Formerly a Starbucks, the cafe has a weird, narrow wedge design. The result is that there’s only 7 two-seater tables inside, so it’s frequently filled up with no place to sit. Too bad, because the coffee is really good, cinnamon buns tasty, and the staff always friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPReTdBZfrgc1y8avqRaY8AnOHtGAz1g7vMrpxG&fid=0x0:0x609e3a941d0d0e26"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Cookie Hunter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXt0vkVvy3V7zOQLqookmcIq_YHD4e9Kb6E4i_IaeGUl5Tg5Moz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This café has the most delectable pumpkin muffins, gooey cinnamon buns and blueberry scones. The chai is to LIVE for!! 💛 If you’re someone who is really anxious, this place is safe. The staff are extremely kind.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxS0ik2j9_BlXpCtBlFBwc921KM8tf6p8QGAuD&fid=0x0:0x609e3a941d0d0e26"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Erin Nunweiler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDVq5iPmjZ0NknNdChY5QEk1bFJt6EFnFZnZb-tbxgE9Rs0L0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love it here . The best manager and staff. They make the best cortado , I can’t stop coming here . The chicken pesto sandwich is also pretty amazing .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxF6icI93ajg8TAC3QXX-sQjkmyzYvHKlv58Hg&fid=0x0:0x609e3a941d0d0e26"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Elsa Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgBtFYCkWTkjtefII4egxADlhVRhaG7pRnzQoESC-LbjFzCviaGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We only had a cappuccino (16 oz - 2 shots) to go so we don't know the service beyond that. From what we've ordered, the drink is strong and aromatic, the milk a tad too watery for us but not that bad. The price is decent.

From what we can see the inside is brightly lit and the patio is a quaint little area.

Overall, a cute little coffee shop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBhy7Fr0Um7qQfxDgG_aOz0ObZX5W1p_T7tdEg&fid=0x0:0x609e3a941d0d0e26"],"When":"2023-7-7"},{"Name":"Dave Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL544JfNo-heg8UsP95fr9shcrTY9pTTKZqcIgOMgLc7F2usw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great neighbourhood coffee shop when you need a break from shopping. Love the coffee and the baked goods. Been going there for years. Lots of Patio seating available. Staff outgoing and friendly. Lots of parking in the mall lot. Come in an relax a little.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHfhlHks7HA6en2vj0Pw_ANiP9N4G12RFli13l&fid=0x0:0x609e3a941d0d0e26"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Faith Clow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOeH1n1Cz35G6Jqbhdw9Z4V-ji4aseb_lzJkEagL6qjqv0XQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been coming to this location with my boyfriend for about 2 years now and it’s our go to everyday and we love it!! The manager Damen is absolutely amazing and super thoughtful and Sabina is so sweet and kind and takes the time to talk to me everytime I’m there.

I’ve seen a couple people post reviews about how slow they are and how they mess up and it bothers me because these workers don’t get the recognition they deserve. It’s a small coffee shop and they get lots of rushes especially during lunch, so it makes sense that it will be a bit slower because they are on till and making drinks usually by themselves so obviously they can get things wrong sometimes, we’re all human and we all make mistakes.

Overall they’re an awesome team❤️","Images":null,"When":""}]
