user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bonnie Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnEc4L_oX33x1BIdSnyu3qIy05RmcbQP1bJwBirlW_Yv38YSLczA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy but spacious coffee place for sunny Sunday n oldies car parade

Croissant, buns, coffee , cold chocolate coffee r all good. And  Pricey.
Cold Matcha coffee slightly lack of matcha taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFnxJxihGJm9rvsHdPJzbym3wQRFhGwIH5v57j&fid=0x0:0xcf8437e78b3600f1"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Globus Shipping","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVJruCDxd4AOYgZZPT5kX1vWeozoTz9juRG5gVhqImQF-fzw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Waves coffee is a gem in Steveston! From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with the rich aroma of freshly brewed coffee and a warm, inviting atmosphere. The coffee here is simply outstanding. Each cup is crafted with care, and you can taste the quality in every sip. They also offer a great selection of teas and refreshing cold brews for those looking for something different.
The staff are incredibly friendly and knowledgeable. They're always happy to recommend a new blend or help you find your perfect drink. Service is prompt, and you can tell they genuinely care about providing a great experience for every customer.
In addition to their amazing coffee, Waves has a mouthwatering assortment of pastries and light bites.
Overall, Waves has become my go-to spot for coffee in Steveston.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZnsHFENVstpEQTbRonnRhjjT6T2c3OZw0NofT&fid=0x0:0xcf8437e78b3600f1"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Carl D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxqgvP-5esfzYwpCbrSOhfpiA0OzcL_XFV6VQZPW3nT06lv3Ra=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is easily one of my favorite coffee places in the area.  I've tried them all.  The place is huge for one thing, plenty of seats.  I never had a problem finding one whether I'm by myself or with other people.  I always order my black coffee, its always fresh and balanced.  I frequently order some of the breakfast sandwiches, but my favorite is the breakfast bagel that has melted cheese together with bacon and egg and the chipotle sauce completes the flavour.  I've had the curry wrap as well.  I've always wanted to try the cheesecakes because they look appetizing but maybe next time.   I like that there are tons of choices from dessert to sandwiches.  I know that they are also fresh, not sitting in the food display for weeks. It becomes hard after a while.  Although the place is busy I've never seen a long line and I have always gotten my drink relatively quick.  The staff is friendly whenever I come.  This is my pet peeve whenever doing reviews.  I dedicate a star just for that purpose coming from the service industry myself. The ambient music is just right, unlike the Starbucks across the street blasting music you can’t have a conversation and there’s plenty of light coming in thru the huge glass windows.  Not to mention the best views overlooking the river.  I've had great conversations with regulars here.  On a nice weather like this I enjoy sitting outside soaking the sun.  I highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsTpODGnYlPg6Z8Md3WQvZye0DTo6QLXxmgQ1n&fid=0x0:0xcf8437e78b3600f1"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Transam Freight","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLowYxkD2uF-xtFe3bVpeQcbnbQxABBqXeWIbFtqtPkI3M6rQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The ambiance is inviting, with cozy seating arrangements perfect for both solo coffee contemplation and lively chats with friends. Whether you're looking for a quiet corner to work or a vibrant atmosphere to socialize, Waves coffee strikes the perfect balance.
Each cup is a testament to their commitment to quality.The baristas are not just experts in their craft; they're passionate about coffee, and it shows in every cup they serve.
Service here is also top-notch. The staff is friendly, attentive, and always willing to offer recommendations or customize your order to perfection. Their dedication to customer satisfaction truly sets them apart.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN29i9-0BdEkxGfcPjdoRzrurPG28kPZ7-J8jUI&fid=0x0:0xcf8437e78b3600f1"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Jay A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0RELLdGDmU4mUU2O4splg5RoL3yTJnShh825sqC7IizJnW3IrnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One best place to be in when you want hot Chocolate in steveston! Beats Starbucks! No offence. Went there with my family for the first time since about 3-4 years ago and the place stayed the same! Clean! Friendly staff, spacious, sinks are awesome, food is good! Went here for breakfast. This place is great for catch up, study, group collaborations, chill time. If only I live close by, I would keep going to this place! Keep it up team! Good job!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGikAxJ8kfR8E-yGt9jW52PG5e32JrGlOj5bxe&fid=0x0:0xcf8437e78b3600f1"],"When":"2023-4-14"},{"Name":"Jun Yuan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlk095JmqEu4LDk3bI8aly62G1_ZENwtgtJRj6NALfKxoJBNsH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great Coffee Shop with the excellent location and the beautiful ocean view beside the well-known Steveston Fisherman’s Wharf. The parking lot is just across the street and is surrounded by the many famous seafood restaurants and Public Fish Sales Float! The shop is spacious, clean, and well decorated! The price was affordable and reasonable with such tasty coffee! The best of it was the excellent customer service! The staff was very friendly, diligent, and caring! Edith was very kind and she made sure that the coffee was poured all full of the cup! Thank you! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP98d4MKy3JyrLPS0_xSR6056Duu9Vn7yCs_eXh&fid=0x0:0xcf8437e78b3600f1"],"When":"2022-11-9"},{"Name":"Edgar Ignacio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7oexz4qXoBKr6ujKuYxwMvlf16ckv-ovFMKFmC4nzUqeMSoelFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Waves Coffee House is my go-to spot for a perfect cup of coffee whenever I visit this area for stress relieving walk. The quality of their coffee is outstanding, with a wide selection of beverages to choose from. The baristas are friendly and skilled, always creating beautiful latte art on every drinks.

The atmosphere at Waves Coffee House is cozy and inviting, making it an ideal place to relax or catch up with friends. The seating is comfortable, and the background music adds to the overall ambiance. I appreciate that they offer free Wi-Fi, which makes it a great spot to get some work done while seated.

The pastries and snacks are delicious, and I love indulging in a tasty treat with my coffee. The prices are reasonable considering the quality and service you receive. Overall, I highly recommend Waves Coffee House for anyone looking for a great coffee experience in a welcoming environment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoSrYywLXPpFvZnK6DJ9ohkZCkTaW2Ct62zxQn&fid=0x0:0xcf8437e78b3600f1"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Jennifer Lockhart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgUYOA4C8aRVFH58DclgCF9l3zgJFpoAaU2AYBrCk5UYLfke1t=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Specificly came to waves for a iced chocolate, chocolate was barely melted so the milk was bland with chunks on the bottom.
My mom's latte was even worse though. First they forgot about it. Next they tried to put a shot of espresso in that had been sitting on the machine for over 5 minutes..... I called them out on it and she made a fresh shot, but tried to serve the expired shot to the next customer. Lastly, it wasn't even hot. They did end up make a new latte for her
I know they were busy, but there should still be standards.  Suggest watching them make your drink if you care about what your getting.
3 stars only because I have had good service here in the past.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rachel Keery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7HrRs2lYWD-a0OMwYD8hcg13jIWjm47WrdDcC3B391YGfNtPv3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Randomly came in here while walking through Aberdeen square. So worth it !! ordered the mango pineapple fruit tea and it was probably the best fruit tea I’ve ever tried !!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCLBYAK_WnzB2mrZQRF7oN2iKHiEIwjlfZNkGY&fid=0x0:0xd4a3860c86ee30e8"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best fruit teas ever is served here. It's literally a sweet tea beverage that also serves as a fruit salad meeting your daily servings of fruit as per the Canadian food guide . All the fruits were fresh and not frozen and it had fresh slices of mangoes, oranges, lemons, limes, strawberries, blueberries, and kiwis! That is 7 fresh fruits in a drink! It tasted delicious!

I also had their Taiwanese club sandwich which was a homemade burger patty on sweet bread with tomato, egg, and singles cheese. Very tasty too.

Their fruit tea is a must try and I'm surprised people are not lining up for it. It was great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpFkjMrwLz465KmTWaFuxfWeDg59Bj0xHe20lo&fid=0x0:0xd4a3860c86ee30e8"],"When":"2022-2-16"},{"Name":"Ang Xue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7mPLBA9i6TwjRIRic3AD873AgR0eqhzpx4ngGIFeGWmnrRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite cafe in Richmond! Addicted to their avocado 🥑 coffee! Love how it’s not too sweet and taste so smooth! 🤤 Best Taiwanese club sandwich with homemade Pattie! They also open earlier than most stores in Aberdeen square, so get your drink and food than shop around. Love supporting local businesses like this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlqFMjaGftiTBfANXbhYIqygzNoHdfqqw_SNw1&fid=0x0:0xd4a3860c86ee30e8"],"When":"2023-2-11"},{"Name":"Vanda Florist","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjSVJadDCE_Xg1f0dSaC3zahd253j2uT5iK4yLJwe2Za4cdKRB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Randomly found this place for a coffee, surprisingly good! Lots of healthy food and drinks choices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmkbRvk0OIpgBjzt1Dph6MsFmGDjugzeeQI4gh&fid=0x0:0xd4a3860c86ee30e8"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"F Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLN9YFqPNQC-8D2WCySWFEp0AvnaStwnjE3nmdrCL3sh4hGuRK7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I've been going every Sunday this month...I love the quality of the food and the atmosphere.
For long-term business, employees must be replaced.  She was rude... yelling at customers when they tried to order.
However, I managed to put up with it because I needed a quiet place to kill time between transitions.  This week, the staff member came up and asked me to leave the cafe because she needed to go to the toilet.  I didn't understand at first...because it doesn't seem like a common practice.  I still have half of my meal to finish.  I understand that this is a basic human need.  But she was rude when she asked me to do so.  This just ruins everything...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjHr8NeE0ModZrIQl7YZz6qfv5M8TYL2teFOr4&fid=0x0:0xd4a3860c86ee30e8"],"When":"2022-1-30"},{"Name":"Afreen Shaikh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfTOe1btAJlwzxmmY_Um5PnVVnGzOAvCxU1srO_gwHRizeO4s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cute little cafe tucked away in this mall. We had a Sicilian and an avocado coffee both delicious! The Sicilian coffee has a hint of lemon which was so refreshing and the avocado coffee was not too sweet. The person who took care of us was really gracious. I will definitely be back for more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORxesiERSUAuE181Rd6RPpwU-yIQ6LBwAfwnQl&fid=0x0:0xd4a3860c86ee30e8"],"When":"2023-7-15"},{"Name":"Debbie P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4C5xruKQ5o6viohHClLtBI51peBi4oJ3xbenMJNl6Ni-0vA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They put a crazy amount of fruit in the special fruit tea. It’s so good! Not sure if you can adjust the sweetness, but I did end up finding the drink itself a bit too sweet

Lots of house-made treats for sale as well. We went in while they were baking cookies, so the smell was absolutely delightful.

One star deducted however, as the drink did end up taking a while to make, despite only 2 of us in the shop. Lady who took the order was also chatting loudly on the phone during the whole process","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqsVu_b5qxM62Qsm7XBgoy1frUfOfTawNrCSLW&fid=0x0:0xd4a3860c86ee30e8"],"When":"2022-10-16"},{"Name":"Sushi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhzBcE0QBehKmo-4odRXDw3twMFs9YwER2LQ_zgov7_LH30Zs1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice music and lighting, really good fruit tea (made with real fruit wow), service is really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOl41EKpo0BFWSArZBRBMdX0D7DF0f7niel2T-&fid=0x0:0xd4a3860c86ee30e8"],"When":"2024-8-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Stephanie L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuOlWa7F9wJqteFqI4GP-t2_ufMjp3Yanky67JlNu-CHpoQ5SS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place deserves ZERO stars because they shame customers for not tipping. The cashier, who looked like the manager, got lippy with me because I didn't tip on an overpriced subpar excuse of a "sandwich".

SIR, tipping in this country is optional, why should I tip you for the thrilling service of tapping my visa and handing me a sandwich that tastes like damp cardboard, that's literally your job my dude. The entitlement is real.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aline Desrosiers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0XlBiEKWVpr4d4y-zmC8XIC9vPKWhm_muBByN8YZIneMUS5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Craving a sandwich and a coffee. Got their Salami sandwich and 12 oz drip coffee. Coffee was fresh and tasty. They asked if I wanted the sandwich pressed and I said yes. When I got it was still cold in the middle. When I asked them to redo it since it was cold they said it does not heat up the sandwich. Okay, understood. The sandwich itself has four maybe five slices of meat and processed Kraft slice cheese. For $12, it's an over priced item for what you get. Suggest going elsewhere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcErAJKpp9FevNlJQgVRV2NyDGsp7EMQWTQCwc&fid=0x0:0x307dea860b61da98"],"When":"2022-4-27"},{"Name":"V E G G I E D A W W G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhhpzNS5ztdsEPZrBgpKR1i9bPaC1FRc_tM6jAzVj1eUwNw75M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The lady working there today around 11 made me an amazing iced coffee!! The Tim Hortons on this side of the airport doesn’t do iced lattes, and I prefer not to support Starbucks, and ended up here. She made me an iced soy latte with lots of ice exactly how I wanted it, delicious, give that queen a raise!! Espresso tastes way better than Starbucks 🤙🤙🤙","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNupeZx9bPP23DKgAf15B9CCo8X0ba7e6VF9-Zb&fid=0x0:0x307dea860b61da98"],"When":"2023-11-28"},{"Name":"Olena Tkhorovska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyUXNPkDyAzFJYuIfJch9QBFsr0xd0BA0sx64TyliAdoDxzug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very fresh and nutritious food. I pleasantly surprised with the quality of the food. Especially the falafel appetizer and the fresh veggie salad. The appetizer came with 6 pieces of falafel, some marinated peppers which were so good, and pretty good hummus. The veggie salad was springily fresh and crispy, and very large.
To add, the chicken samosa was better than average and fresh. The espresso was made from the beans roasted by some toaster called Canterbury, never had their beans before, it was not terrible - quote similar to the 49th Parallel coffee but way better than Starbucks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRwa-KT-k5MBjFFroMqu5D5oSt5P7BV64CIJ2z&fid=0x0:0x307dea860b61da98"],"When":"2023-7-8"},{"Name":"Juan Celis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLkv_fiku7v9fHoIg-kKtrQe1ZBR_irkQosFYze9kaDEPYaA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"As far as airport food goes not the worst. Breakfast sandwich for $10 is probably on the more adorable side these days.
It was fresh enough and decent.
Why mayo on a breakfast sandwich though?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMw7MtftxGVR0Xr1Z5G7j1eOCP2pVbFCjCd6N9Y&fid=0x0:0x307dea860b61da98"],"When":"2023-5-8"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food is not high quality or fresh here. The Mango Smoothie ingredients contained E-211 which stands for sodium benzoate, a bad preservative. The ingredients in the mango juice had lots of other chemicals to and the mango was like the third ingredient after sugar and water. The sausage roll was bland and microwaved. Come here to buy food if you have run out of other options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWCL5wmn86VCbW0-72zcyft1YXOyNk99aVOsF2&fid=0x0:0x307dea860b61da98"],"When":"2022-7-7"},{"Name":"Redhambo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5uDU22uGFbNRjQD7VvTBf2F_B_43PrC8dcaQct_ywV7zgewWSUA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolutely terrible. $15-20 sandwiches and wraps is crazy!! On top of that they taste like processed waste. They add cheese whiz, you heard me cheese wiz. They add like no meat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvPZhsXhfAcNjjzkXHpijfSw5olGmFiy8djkiv&fid=0x0:0x307dea860b61da98"],"When":"2023-8-24"},{"Name":"Kris Beauchamp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjU55s8sph05XbWYID_ocgQEmn2l5eFoNGyG6y_PKT16XDVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I got a sausage roll today. After having 3 bites I realized it was covered in mold. I did not have enough time before my flight to return to request a refund and cannot find a customer service phone number online to address it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJsTIUDdCYMf-c3UN4v-2XVC_OTe915_04UJfK&fid=0x0:0x307dea860b61da98"],"When":"2020-2-3"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Dave Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL544JfNo-heg8UsP95fr9shcrTY9pTTKZqcIgOMgLc7F2usw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Warm and friendly coffee shop. Staff friendly and were quick with my order. Large fresh selection of pastries and wraps on display. Lots of seating available , and parking was easy in front and the whole mall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMak6QCmJux2IrUpyCehW_j1zMcmrPppHcfZFFg\u0026fid=0x0:0xff2c187eb55f6e28"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Michael Chou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUu1CRSNCes2sa1ZH1yWP1b-VZ9tZlM42hE2Up5hwvPM2vmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Americano tasted like drip coffee. I ordered a small americano and the clerk mentioned it was double shot but it tasted absolutely terrible. And the worse thing was that it cost $5. To be honest, McDonald has better Americano than they do. Great service and welcoming staff though. But sorry won’t be coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPG343w7XDUrGHBELoATJglOKN3hsdPcqmowPEi\u0026fid=0x0:0xff2c187eb55f6e28"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Sarah Wootty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7AAitqYRi3Dv8-ARHluxK55qFjxWTN-sqFKnOyb-SK5eVruA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The food is always super stale and the customer service is non existent. I once waited at the register for nearly 10 minutes while the barista was sitting at a table wrapping muffins in plastic wrap. When people are stopping by for a morning coffee on their way to work, why would you be SLOWLY do other types of prep work when you have waiting customers? And zero acknowledgement that people were inconveniently left waiting. That’s just one experience of many … there location should definitely hold itself to a higher standard in terms of food quality, site cleanliness, and customer service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kevin C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRd1anfKGQWXwA0nOlaj8Lo78JWegLy93jfUJFPhotuLMOHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"From previous review looks like this is not the first time this store pulls something like this. Blenz have a promotion \"heroes for heroes\" for healthcare workers on Nov 6 that is supposed to run all day (this is confirmed with Blenz head office, and this is what was advertised to us), but when I arrived, I was told the promo ends at 5pm. My other friends have gone to the store earlier in the morning before work and same thing they told them it starts at 9 am. If they don't want to participate in the promotion, why even have the promotion advertised in the store. And if the promotion doesn't apply to all stores for all day, Blenz should let us know ahead of time. It doesn't sound like it's the employees fault at the store, it just sounds like the manager or someone higher up there who did not want to give out any free drinks. Plus most healthcare workers are usually at work between 9 to 5pm, so can you really expect them to come during that time just to grab a drink?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vicky Law","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyI2QwPX0sBaeeBnoGN0PGG6IZrk3KLAIL2o9-lSxpL-pyPio=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very horrible experience with Richmond Gardens city Blenz about 9:15am this morning. I order large latte and almond croissant, and use visa to pay, but their visa machine keeps running and running, and the 2 stuffs restart their machine 3 times. and then I need to press my visa 3 times and the machine still running and running. Of course, stuffs not giving me coffee or croissant, so I had no choice but went out the cafe.  When I just went out, my ipad ringed to inform me my visa being charged $14.28…so, I went back in and said to the Staff that my visa being charged, she get coffee and croissant close to the garbage tank to me. I took the coffee and croissant to the table and sit there crying… let all people around me seeing a wheelchair old lady just like a stupid beggar but still paying money to Blenz…Yes, I am on wheelchair but have money, why treat me like this…","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ayah Hasan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJD1dEmXzPQZjhrIWe0qJcHBnY-8xjwP9l7p98ELueK2lJdTc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"so basically we was sitting outside eating the lady (employee) comes saying that we can’t eat outside food here and there was some crumbs on the floor not even fully from me but said that we were making their place dirty and she hands me a broom saying to clean it . I am sorry but isn’t that her job to clean after customers no matter what even if I did something she could’ve said it politely and I would’ve left so disrespectful then she later was looking at my phone through the window because I was writing a review laughing at me. Personal privacy? Hello please go over u company policy and learn customer service. So unprofessional for a cafe😐","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Central Hoki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeiT1epU0_yqwB7qDkyrbkMvptlnpIO5XUL9ycQsPghRLgGw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Me and my boyfriend needed to use the restroom while our friend ordering coffee for us, but the cashier said we can't use the restroom while it's been cleaning, after she said that, two women came out from the restroom giving back the restroom key to the cashier, and my bf is not allowed to use the restroom with the same reason, but nobody is cleaning it. Bad experiences and bad service.. Don't lie to customer, we buy your coffee and you guys treated us like that ??!!! What a shame !!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aaron Snell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeYkbKhtByHXM7jWEYGAON5dahRW3NVSN6qQSw6XFV1wiluJc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Followed map but the location wasn't super obvious... Did find and discovered staff was nice plus they made good coffee. (As a semi-coffee snob, Canadians don't always make the best nectar of God's perfect bean...) Good ambiance and at 745a there about 10 people sitting around drinking the good stuff! Closest to the Richmond, BC hockey rink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM57QVQl3UMf3Q993OCRDxaHFmKzfo5c-UDbQ_3\u0026fid=0x0:0xff2c187eb55f6e28"],"When":"2017-12-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tina Tong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW84nSBBDmolUoqC6VL8CFIp8yQPFiKAaahx5gKDgGnmi00YHOV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the BEST cafe to study at!! I have been going here everyday because of the amazing atmosphere here. The drinks are super good, the baristas are really nice, and the tables are extremely clean. If you're looking for a place to get your work done, this is the perfect place!!

Some of my personal favorites are the matcha latte and the matcha lemonade. Their bakery items are also amazing. Definitely recommend you check this location out!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3CmRc249eHDdV8JaIBdPEi1PxE9IiXM3dhTdm&fid=0x0:0x37cb5a8d5cf64706"],"When":"2022-8-3"},{"Name":"Leah L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDya90CgAk4fcW3mvCpJdlQsgsA2Cjcn0tcoZXroJZl7PftQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After moved to Richmond, I have tried all the coffee shops nearby. This coffee shop is my new favorite. The manager Nan is always nice and helpful. Their coffee taste is amazing with reasonable price. There are a lot of seats and even some meeting rooms you can book. Good atmosphere for a morning coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCTbTu5r0-O05miuwk5e45n9LfFt3SV_mVIA6p&fid=0x0:0x37cb5a8d5cf64706"],"When":"2022-7-18"},{"Name":"James Kan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk_o12iCtyO0gE_QoPCj5qJ7UUQkuic2cEzUnsQvn8LpSf4EV-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am giving the service 6 starts review.
I purchase coffee for friend,and the handsome waiter seen I have pick-up breakfast with me and order coffee. He knows I bought for someone, and prepare a heart shape cappuccino for me specifically.
My appreciation, he helps me a lot making great impression for my sweetheart","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnpcS9U84nL2sAjLTqDCU7Dav3S3r2OEU8m-Vh&fid=0x0:0x37cb5a8d5cf64706"],"When":"2023-11-30"},{"Name":"Ropl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIS6TWbZXQh8Rm-I7kNqC9eZrO0RBCY6Q9jzn4KWuw4zWN7bw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good place for coffee and pastries food etc.
Parking is free first 2 hours underground when you register plate via QR code","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFE0L8M_LfO-8azoNYZ2l3NYEbZs6hbpk3zTte&fid=0x0:0x37cb5a8d5cf64706"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Ethan Behnke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi0vh5R1eMd0SAlByFdv1DuZjJDyf-xI9pb8e-GBiQXzf01bs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Vibes chill in there, I'd hang out there to do some work again if I want somewhere quiet.

Coffee was a bit sour and room temperature but honestly not bad despite that.

The staff are really nice, the place seems to have aged a lot though.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Billy Huellas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAv_mn1m07qcXPfvP6IJa5ig07JAEvdsQw4yWb6kLSUMUGXEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the few cafes left in Richmond that has a  comfortable amount of space, along with solid quality drinks/food (sorry, Tims). Cherish it!

The baristas here balance efficiency and quality service very well. The girl working at one of my visits was hilariously chill to talk to. You go, giiirllll 💅☕️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ali Shahidi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR4248CEKQMexHikv8rnYr8wI4aDqDYdh7hi8Zb-cofZj2naA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I found this coffee shop for the first time and became sorry for allthe times i went to Starbox or Tim Hoeton this the best i suggest evryone","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3o6_-zr9wADZrmVKk9m-FZqCCNllBInZ21ca_&fid=0x0:0x37cb5a8d5cf64706"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Billy Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7Xohn1Nh-mD_QgN3DKSY70wAQ8BYCcJifqnK4w_zXiIb0xg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great please to have a cup of coffee and relaxing here, very clean and organized by the owner. Even have a small conference room for you to have a meeting for free.
Strongly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_XtO9KNDq9kvHBJSPOJU-plt2lcgVrBemObuN&fid=0x0:0x37cb5a8d5cf64706"],"When":"2022-10-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Liza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUU6psZuYm5issGPqVIywDJmiQmgvYke0cz4aCVVktU9NoaykdJkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great bookstore with new, used, and rare antique books all available in one place! The atmosphere is unique, and there's a cafeteria inside with outdoor seating. We found great children's books at a decent price, and the staff was very nice and helpful. It's a great place to visit if you're in Steveston.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMTMDCjNUzWqAdDM-Seh_ONvyplFZRR-wadCp3&fid=0x0:0xae6d47422d70d529"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Shery On The Move","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmAA3VItm5d-LzZjMzSS_FZs12aHSse1X5w-nXQqVmdbUvhBBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First visit : 9 May 2024
The moment i stepped in, i feel like i'm inside the movie set. Lots of books and it displays by the categories.

Second visit : 18 November 2024
I bought a cup of hot mocha. You can’t say that about many places. 😌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7Xk_lmaEz0a3zhjo-OfostoYIv8MQ9oO6Zy_v&fid=0x0:0xae6d47422d70d529"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Emiliano Pazos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKV91HkAsLguleR8GXFV9DKsFv0VDkUlUg6igIqeB9dQbIkzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finding a bookstore is finding magic, shelves full of history and stories, of the dead that still live among us through ink and paper, Borges use to said "Let others pride themselves about how many pages they have written; I'd rather boast about the ones I've read.", an amazing place with amazing people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1K0RZXhtjJGL811Bo82FWfOo_omwowePI5XPM&fid=0x0:0xae6d47422d70d529"],"When":"2020-12-5"}]

[{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cora Breakfast and Lunch in Richmond is a delightful spot for a morning or midday meal. Their double chocolate pancake is a sweet indulgence, perfectly prepared and full of rich chocolate flavor. The burrito set is a must-try, offering a great combination of flavors that are both satisfying and hearty. Pair your meal with their cappuccino ice coffee, which is smooth and refreshing, the perfect pick-me-up. The service here is consistently nice, and the staff are friendly and attentive, making the overall dining experience even more enjoyable. Whether you're in the mood for something sweet or savory, Cora's has something to offer, and they do it with a smile.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPvJtpAOkmYAoedBxRgdV_XeLMffvP9oST7ZSj&fid=0x0:0x11f42c2117bd3ed9"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite places in Steveston. Food menu is great and everything is fresh and delicious, my kid enjoys every bite…
All employees are very friendly and fast with delivery👌🏼
I highly recommend everyone to check this Cora restaurant 👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmXQDehWlKv6FKCkVw44ZfNheQmXP97wPm6t8F&fid=0x0:0x11f42c2117bd3ed9"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Cora - Breakfast and Lunch

Location: Coppersmith Corner Shopping Centre
11380 Steveston Hwy #170, Richmond, BC V7A 5J5

During a recent visit to Richmond, we had the opportunity to dine at Cora for breakfast. This location, nestled within the Coppersmith Corner Shopping Centre, offers a diverse menu that caters to breakfast and lunch enthusiasts alike. Here’s a breakdown of my experience.

Service:

Upon arrival, we were greeted by a young hostess at the door. Unfortunately, her demeanor lacked the warmth and friendliness one expects from a welcoming staff, which set a somewhat disappointing tone initially. However, the experience took a positive turn when we were seated. Our waitress was notably accommodating, exuding friendliness and good humor throughout our meal. Her attentive service significantly enhanced our visit.

Rating : 9 out of 10

Food:

•	10 Star Skillet with Egg:
This dish features a hearty combination of bacon, ham, sausages, frankfurters, bologna, spinach, green onions, tomatoes, onions, red and green peppers, and mushrooms, all topped with cheddar cheese. The portion was generous, and the ingredients complemented each other well, creating a balanced and flavorful dish. This skillet is a satisfying choice for those who enjoy a variety of breakfast meats and vegetables.

Rating: 8/10

•	Halloumi Chorizo Sausage:
The halloumi and chorizo were paired with spinach, black olives, sun-dried tomatoes, green onions, and a drizzle of hollandaise sauce. The saltiness of the halloumi and the bold flavors of the chorizo were well-matched, while the freshness of the spinach and the acidity of the tomatoes rounded out the dish. It was a well-executed offering that delivered on flavor.

Rating: 8/10

•	Morning Hot Dogs:
This dish consisted of frankfurters, bacon, and melted cheese rolled in crepes, accompanied by a side of potatoes. While the concept was interesting, the execution fell short. The flavors were decent but lacked the depth and distinctiveness that would make this dish stand out.

Rating: 6/10

•	Elise Brioche:
A standout dish, the Elise Brioche featured a brioche dipped in toast batter, served warm with a medley of strawberries, blueberries, and harvest crunch, garnished with English cream and cream cheese. The combination of flavors was delightful, with the freshness of the fruit pairing beautifully with the rich brioche and the lightness of the cream. This dish was a highlight and comes highly recommended.

Rating: 9/10

Beverages:

•	Iced Cappuccino:
Unfortunately, the iced cappuccino was underwhelming. It lacked the richness and depth of flavor expected from this beverage.
Rating: 6/10
•	Raspberry Pina Colada Smoothie:
While the smoothie was enjoyable, it didn’t leave a lasting impression. The flavors were pleasant, but nothing extraordinary.
Rating: 6/10
•	Beet Cocktail:
The beet cocktail offered bold, earthy flavors that may appeal to those with a palate for more adventurous drinks. While it was a bit strong for my taste, I appreciated its distinctiveness.
Rating: 7/10

Ambiance:
The restaurant boasts a clean, inviting environment that is both comfortable and welcoming. The atmosphere is well-suited for a casual meal, with a layout that allows for a pleasant dining experience.

Value for Money:
Pricing at Cora is reasonable, particularly when considering the portion sizes and the freshness of the ingredients used. The restaurant offers good value for those seeking a substantial and flavorful breakfast or lunch.

Final Verdict:

Cora at Coppersmith Corner Shopping Centre delivers a solid dining experience with a variety of well-executed dishes. While there were minor setbacks, such as the initial greeting and some of the beverages, the quality of the food and the excellent service from our waitress make this location worth revisiting. I look forward to exploring more of their menu offerings in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFX3T06UYvzJ8z_7YAWPho7iDcXdNu0OjMPEYy&fid=0x0:0x11f42c2117bd3ed9"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyqbE9FvKnSnD3GY4-us3_EnzbDGoj3ofAUCboC5L1JG3nQ7Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Eggs Benny- very yummy. The selection of fruit that came with it was amazing, and cut into bite sized pieces. I got the 3 eggs Benny with mushrooms and goat cheese. The 3 egg included 3 English muffins and hash browns and everything. A bit pricey, about $20 ish for 2 eggs and $24 for 3 eggs. Completely
Cured my hangover. Fruits, veggies, eggs, bread, sauce. Mmmmm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDVfSmqTrKLMUybmBsXc3Sg8xvcgOTMU6uZ88&fid=0x0:0x11f42c2117bd3ed9"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"KentTa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9sDh51B2GR28uJKshUftP6vtMtumYW-ozVd4mMEHsPMyVCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"family friendly restaurant.
great kids menu

generous portion of fresh fruits!
friendly staff","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmyON8qAeMlVTmQhf6GjyLKt9F4Ckjik4ffFKo&fid=0x0:0x11f42c2117bd3ed9"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Helen Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKI-mzgGlleZ4ePt7mDYbQ4Gabh9zw-OBKk6bKlySQQQboerA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the surprise French toast with bacon and it’s great. The fruits are fresh and the French toast has a hint of cinnamon. It’s a busy place for breakfast. Overall a good experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJcs8QlAWc6OJAtAIVskpXPfPnn5oDKox6pwAw&fid=0x0:0x11f42c2117bd3ed9"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Debbie Cullen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpXJDxvfJVaBFAt1Jx2Yts3y75HqDad13DwrvCEz8i2tpwAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a lovely breakfast Dec 14 for my husband's birthday.  Food was delicious as always & the fresh fruit garnish is a work of art! Natasha was our server & was friendly, efficient & quite the character. She certainly added to our experience. Thank you Cora's for never disappointing us.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Big Libby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-u3QE505INvUWP0nEKGMC6q8NSCyZJpGVM0PvxYfZNh8c2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a very well run restaurant . It’s very clean and the staff are attentive and very friendly. It’s a treat to pop in for breakfast as we don’t have Cora’s near where we live. This location though is exceptional and wanted to give them a shoutout. *****","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCG2tnPfiMhc9tlaUKkRpaeWUshDL2XUxr5DjG&fid=0x0:0x11f42c2117bd3ed9"],"When":"2024-9-26"}]

And wz fruit pcs at Reasonable price.
Regular coffee is good. Good quality Bread 🍞 n discounts on selected items ! 😍😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOH5uPSUSHKIJJI4REoYRNQ6_8yZPVxP5N1nDHF&fid=0x0:0xb4c36c00dcff8f17"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place with mom and pop store feels.  Fresh bakery at great price and service.  Cake and bread were good for the price.  Restaurant is cozy and welcoming.  Right by nice beach walkway, this place added extra fun to our little weekend trip to the Steveston park.  Server was very friendly and professional too and the place sell sandwiches and soup as well.  We will return to try them for sure when we return to the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMx9BGQfOkZQgcLOXktTwsQQgwXlo0yKFX0Xz4J&fid=0x0:0xb4c36c00dcff8f17"],"When":"2023-3-4"},{"Name":"Autumn_Kiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1zcZdU411-b8f5Fcx7HImynMifJ7qg-_yzjSJzTLgmhJaggW_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Whenever I can I’ll drop in for a quick eat and coffee before my morning walk.  Lovely people here.  But the breakfast sandwich is wonderful.  Vegetarian options available and the coffee is always good.  Check the sandwich board out front for daily specials and come in and say hello.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5FV7qG8tNBekTJqICTOVhrSGBa3oF3mf0Siwr&fid=0x0:0xb4c36c00dcff8f17"],"When":"2024-1-10"},{"Name":"Rachel Keery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7HrRs2lYWD-a0OMwYD8hcg13jIWjm47WrdDcC3B391YGfNtPv3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious baking ! Panini also came with a side salad. Reasonable prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKozar9HC0xk-kHu8HWKs8-dI6jRxw_ejrLZQM&fid=0x0:0xb4c36c00dcff8f17"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Steven","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwhlFiHPSDGYcBNEBZjiV401CUR-8LRwpy-nj0JN_nYZzCJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice quiet coffee bakery shop in Steveston. The fruit tart was super sweet. The carrot cake was good not overly sweet. Fair prices, but not anything fancy or memorable in terms of bakery selection.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnVHGzd7SqQRYTQTLImfV_FgE9GL2lEK9c2of2&fid=0x0:0xb4c36c00dcff8f17"],"When":"2023-5-30"},{"Name":"Novak Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLoX9JVn_bDsVw23EtSJ2S2u4nUI2b3vvbvKZtAFgP5PCFSz34=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pecan pies were so good I almost hshshhsgdy
There was chocolate at the bottom and it was so good I shsygdgdgekekeo","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtnzJZX28_jwNUA6LRwIltorAzk65oAw0XSeQ3&fid=0x0:0xb4c36c00dcff8f17"],"When":"2024-9-30"}]

title: Steveston Cafe & Hotel
descriptions: Unfussy rooms, some with whirlpool tubs, in an 1895 hotel with a cafe, a liquor store & free WiFi.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Hard liquor","enabled":true},{"name":"Wine","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true},{"name":"Brunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Family-friendly","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Holly Woosey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV2lbZeCEe9uk_tp5v5HeEBpd05cOkWx2bWGKGCFJqdBVjRakcIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5* REVIEW IS FOR THE CAFE ONLY!

Cafe was excellent, really tasty food for a great price! The server was really friendly and helpful even though it was really busy and she was the only person on the floor. Definitely recommend the cafe for a good brunch.

The hotel I wouldn't recommend which is unfortunate, the staff were really helpful and nice, but they have a mouse and damp problem which lead us to changing rooms twice, due to pests and the smell/wet floors. The location is perfect though and if you are able to request a room on the front of the property I think it would be okay. The two rooms we had to move from were on the inside next to the low lying roof of the neighboring building.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Natalie Bull","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWf-cGMn_sV_l8bgFrRjWM93w9ZU2Q5V0l1sQ2zgiCEusIf24lggw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately I would not recommend this hotel until the mouse problem has been dealt with. We experienced hearing and seeing mice in our room at night, and had my purse completely bitten through by a mouse! Absolutely unsafe and unacceptable. We did not sleep at all the second night and left in the night to find a different hotel. We have had no response from the owners regarding our complaint.

Pros: good breakfast at neighbouring cafe, cute area","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"theodore francis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTSetJGCZSIvm0AtUnutt8BO6unSa4domn89NlrFeNQXq3IA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"oh boy well its look great and the town is special and charming, and there is heaps to enjoy and the staff try really hard but even though the pictures look good the rooms fail because of the mice/pest problem which makes you feel dirty and scared to put your feet on the ground. The beds are comfortable, the hot water takes ages to warm up, the tv etc all work but our bags were eaten by mice/rats, we heard noises at night but did not know until morning what had happened , food damaged and luggage. We could not get these thoughts out of our mind for the rest of the stay. the cafe breakfast is a nice looking place but a really controlled set up, you are not allowed to help yourself to a tea/coffee or jam or spoon you are not allowed to touch anything you have to wait to be served by one busy crazy lady, make sure you do what you are told and dont rock the boat !!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alexandre Contreras","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOw3b8mqN_9Z1ApZuHogzs37t-GRfam69BRQGJnjecXJ4Aw84e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"CONS: Room walls are made of paper, you can hear the hallway, very noisy, especially the hallway doors that bang constantly. It's hard to sleep at night when guests arrive or leave at 2 am. The shower is a hazard, it was so slippery. It requires a carpet or some sort of protection. I don't know if it was just our room, but I've never seen a tub so slippery. The room is pretty old, no fridge or microwave.

PROS: Staff was super friendly. Very well located, close to the airport and tons of restaurants and things to do around. Free parking for guests.

Overall, I would not recommend this hotel mainly because of the noise.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Falk von Metzen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSkgNG296rYM5u4fMvB8T_GxhmAzN4wFlsuVRIXJ79G8MDnHLS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The hotel is very well located! The price-performance ratio is fine if you book early enough. Yes it could do with a little renovation, but it didn't bother us.

I had drinks in the laundry basin to cool (unfortunately there is no fridge) and when we came back to the hotel in the evening, there was ice in the sink. What a nice service.

We had a small problem with the room, which was dealt with immediately and without complications! Thank you for that! We will be back on our next vacation in Canada.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vlade Patterson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM4ueYAVWh31RWSZpkcc8C4noJ_G9MjIF_WsTT3RGs4MwnVpjP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The hotel is Ok, nothing fancy About its outdated structure, and old style architecture. It is clean but stuffy. In good location, and cheaper than other hotels in the area.

The music bar downstairs is playing extremely loud music until 2AM, hotel has little soundproofing. Each beat vibrates the entire room. That entire walls shake. The reviews we found later have guest complaining for the past 2 years.

The management absolutely does not care, since nothing has been done about it for the past years.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nagisa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqXPNpu-jbMwJgl8cFVObs452H5IrrA3B8jU_qFa4Eq3UrnrMN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Staff was amazing! He clean up quickly and accept early check in. This hotel have only steps but he brought my little heave laggage :) thank you so much :). room key is only U lock.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Irving Salsbury","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHN5uty1a2s4R74gE3QR4yq-3dJFVGy1U-GJGx71xf01f5H1Zu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have to say that I am a frequent visitor to Steveston, it's a date night for the wife and me as we come from Everett, Wa.  The pub next store is our gathering place for our Canadian friends and the staff there (mostly Nick, the bartender) is incredible and attentive.  The charm of this hotel, the cafe for bfast and the pub, and the warmth of our friends add to our incredible date night! Let's always have this for all people to enjoy!!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Greg N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUprdb2-ciYZv-AcF_CX1nExQCLM8G8jwGaSRCE3G5qy9uh18Dv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Waited more than 5 mins to be served. I should have walked away.
Ordered two Almond milk latte's, both burnt, the 'barista' steamed the milk so much, it separated.
Possibly the worst coffee in Canada
Don't bother asking for the Barista to add sugar for you. They will snap on the lid and direct you to where the sugar satchels are and you will find a twig to stir it in with 🤦‍♂️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4vnIwcsCMyJ7hW5dWhU_R2tgZuivdPjPvE-dn&fid=0x0:0x2ba82ed9367014ef"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Helly Soni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXU6Xqw90lqljw_SlQL_JfvT0NvdetVbOA9FoRPtOmozLGKk9U=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Rude staff. Extremely rude to customers and the coffee was just bland and bad. I ordered an ice mocha late and the batista kept shouting mocha frap. Very rude to other customers and her own staff
Couldn't drink beyond one sip. Horrible experience. One near gate D69","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Noblechange","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1bj0Wi_CyXzLPIDE08ksMQYLZ3aB3XGsKUww0rHjgz7mGAk3F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"You won’t expect a better coffee in airport but Illy Caffè tastes not bad. Regular Latte is a good choice for a midnight flight.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMspPO3jENnEfIvSpotBbdpmk4dtVz6HnbVwlEw&fid=0x0:0x2ba82ed9367014ef"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"SANJEEV JAIN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7irBDrxDtZO6Op_5CUoBRN_NBYNf9vRKksAloeNciWZQcd38=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This one is at gate D69. Enjoyed decaf Americano. I love olly coffee. Quality is awesome.
They have beers and wines along with croissants and muffins also available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCwv6yVeHW8XDYulEhIPUFUXZamDwVQ9EwHbCp&fid=0x0:0x2ba82ed9367014ef"],"When":"2023-10-11"},{"Name":"Hillbillytc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV833YeKMKJfxtYeKhRHVRSrikZoFOcCapKBwyEFBOnxiCMeXAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Wow talk about airport prices 13 dollars a sandwich with 1/4 if that piece of chicken. The servers were great, big smile with a huge line up and little staff. The food was well look at the picture","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOg0ZrgqnpNIwU9kWp9HZvROcrYhaNZz9Vf3Go8&fid=0x0:0x2ba82ed9367014ef"],"When":"2022-12-17"},{"Name":"Kuljeet Rai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAKc-Eu4C3Dp_weR6muyWA3kIYcceMBAJBxv2wqnFfVrg4Qw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Waited 30minutes in line to order coffee and food after the order was placed they gave me coffee but not food waited another 20 minutes but they served others who ordered after me and same food I tried to ask attendees about food but no one responded and when I tried to ask them I am getting late my food is not served and you guys can take drink back too if you guys not gonna serve me food as well  then the staff laughed shamelessly and took back the coffee too  instead of correcting their mistake I had to leave empty stomach for a 14 hour flight that too after paying for my food. staff working on november 07 2024 between 8:30am - 9:30am were worst for tjeir service at Illy’s coffee at Vancouver airport between gate D65-D70","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul Whishaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9A87wupkHt-ziDTT0E-evajYv-jT3pQVEqLz9y_Zg-9xgJDEqSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Coffee is OK but the breakfast sandwich has zero taste. Line was shorter than Starbucks and A&W.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JUNJUN 1981","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1IWrXNndUB2PCXxLu4aeiDzUd6jLzHXwR7-UbB3KcHyErGjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The worst service ever... 😤😤😤

Worst coffee flavor...😭😭😭

Is it possible because it's an airport???

It's a waste of money, but...

I was so offended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwYu0rkX-_VJZTZwmg0QUNwL4YsYwIFTCsQtlE&fid=0x0:0x2ba82ed9367014ef"],"When":"2024-9-24"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"More Cafe in Parker Place food court is a delightful find! Their Hong Kong style hazelnut cappuccino is fantastic, with a rich and nutty flavor. The Taiwanese fish cake and egg are nicely done, offering a tasty and satisfying bite. The strawberry grass jelly is refreshing and sweet, perfect for dessert. Their homemade almond drink and ginger tea are both excellent, providing authentic and comforting flavors. The friendly service and cozy atmosphere make More Cafe a must-visit for anyone seeking delicious and unique Asian beverages and snacks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9d7zy6Y1ox-OJqEMfuxiigWLtckUYUYvr6bQD\u0026fid=0x0:0x8870019a2c1dd213"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Gooseberry Bilberry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMJD-L9WmQytMhbODZNa3Nz3Kk8Z3fxnupE5Xvb8JG11rhZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Recent review:  We tried to order when she turned to us at the counter, but she walked to the back right away with a smile while facing away from us and said, \"Wait for a second, I need to go to the back\" before we spoke. She should not look like she was ready to take our order when she actually could not.  When I told her we wanted a decaffeinated coffee in Chinese, she repeated the order in English.  It was funny.  It turned out that the coffee was not hot (it was warm); only the jasmine tea was hot.\n\nReview: They put a lot of black pepper in the curry fish balls and the fish balls were very small. It was not worthy.  We asked for more milk and unsweetened for the milk tea.  Then we could not really taste the tea and the drink was not hot enough.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"K C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZBOs15_pfrbMS0N74eRTzP_tu5B0G_uHOiJzmh-9Mhzy6xQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their Latte fits my taste very well, I enjoy the layers of flavors in it. They can even handle my weird \"iced coffee without ice\" requirement. The best in town within an affordable price in my opinion.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVU1vbx8b_Hccm787MoAk6GjkeRrzlE6b0yEjOj7ABkR1ktJFSh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I spent 6.00 to buy mango slush.The taste was terrible. I felt like drinking rotten mango. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joel Chamorro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqxP2bWIn2UNWnJeEqa2NfwY_uXQTca_R9eYt8xs_aya6Ii1k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice place, pumpkin-friendly. The staff was really nice and inclusive with the pumpkins. The food was nice and the new autumn drinks really tasty. You should definitely bring your pumpkins here. My pumpkins had a really good time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtLvDKyhc-yASlrK6PvAAa9VuUZG1s66dXBJiG&fid=0x0:0x3babce2dbc82d074"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Ramandeep Aulakh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxF_1WeJuVLn9Xg5wIUKt16c8fkNAuY9QMcIYIlGJhB-7AOMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to this location from last couple of months. They greet me with such a charming smile & my order is always ready ahead of time as I often do mobile app orders. Staff in here never disappointed me.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J.J. LaRocque","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs1wnHH1wE-6ehYO1ShgkgKN3A6ZFemN0kZy8RwdiX8HwJ30lb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This location has incredible customer service. The manager and assistant manager were extremely helpful and assisted me when I had a missing pound of coffee. The vibe has amazing music like Frank Sinatra. Lots of parking, patio space and easy access from the highway. Great for client meetings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPofO6UPuvIjuS0fJNi81e1BWxayd7nLjXU7sbJ&fid=0x0:0x3babce2dbc82d074"],"When":"2024-2-1"},{"Name":"Urmi K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDUjBHPIqI2TwbtxQkFaLgs4Y6Bxg-0_jMi5kUQw1trs5979aHLA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered 1 latte which took 30 mins to arrive. If it was going to take so long I would have appreciated a heads up while ordering. Definitely not returning to this location again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike Jack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfoMVgqBdGzj8XotTXWU8qwMsJC8JLF_30D_dYm_2wy23w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a Decaf Caramel Macchiato sub w/ coconut milk. I thought I tasted dairy milk, but looked at the label and it said Coconut Milk, so I drank it. 5 hours later, upset stomach and using the toilet. It sucks when you can't trust workers to FULLY read the order that came in before making rather than look at the name and think they have the recipe memorized. Don't know what to say to warn anyone, but maybe ask the barrista that made it not the window person if your order is correct","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nigel Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZB0kfIdbnJQYSnT3G7QQ5mj6T-ot6hoR28bIZoawzq-ibscr2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today was best star bucks breakfast ever i was greated  with warm welcome be Emily who took my order notice my star buck mug need bit of rinse emily just did best thing by cleaning up and made best coffee these things and service that keeps people like keep coming back for more and more of star bucks great service wokers such as emily should  not go on notice by higher up today i       felt like emily done the outfit proud and 👍👍👍👍👍 to staff at ironwood Star bucks  .

DR.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vanessa Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxzhWNUyhs2y4pDnYHt5zo9EDT5JatwPzQXjeIGopqU7G3axmbaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Waited about 20 minutes for a mobile order.  The staff did call out orders that were being made. The combination of drive through, walk in-s and mobile orders was too much for this little store setup. Had I known it would take thos long I would not have ordered in the first place. Please include a cancel button in the app.
Also the staffing arrangement seemed off, all staff members were quite busy except the person taking in-store orders.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"V. Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtxytIAcHJPU2kvIbnWlwWBNj4S9Hgy3_cHs6Uah-waKkl2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Last 2 times I’ve been through early morning drive thru at 630am service is slow. The line ups during drive thru have been slower than usual. The attendant at drive thru does the bare minimum and gives no cutlery or napkins when food is ordered. I’ve seen the workers wipe the top of my cup with their hands which is completely unnecessary and unsanitary. If you go into the store, service is quite good but I’ve noticed service goes down when you hit the drive thru.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Isabela Padilla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiseaaPVTqUF22ybPl9wGUNgpkZUqpVkNJoV5Tz5RG5RK8fsM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My fave cafe to study at! They don’t have a wide selection of pastries \u0026 sandwich. Only few tables have outlets so it’s first come first serve. It can get very busy around 5PM-9PM so there could be little to no spots for studying. I love their panda bubble tea (Classic Milk-tea with mixed pearls). No outside food/drinks allowed. Washroom key needed for washroom access.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBql94pGgGscIoFxaEljSpAiwoi1Tav7bkkuEE\u0026fid=0x0:0x734c257718fe47d4"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Burda Sir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsf0IPgqxq1OwyAYZu8cuyHghh5nhV25m7lBd103ulFx5CbA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere here is absolutely amazing! Cozy, stylish, and perfect for relaxing or catching up with friends. The coffee is top-notch—smooth, rich, and perfectly brewed. The pastries and desserts are fresh and delicious, with a great variety to choose from. The staff are incredibly friendly and attentive, making you feel right at home. Whether you’re looking for a quiet spot to work or just a place to unwind, this café is a gem. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julliet Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0fWWKZlcih_MjuZ0MU7z0-AuxifGWoZtZtqffSbSecxpieQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really nice interior with a relaxing upstairs loft for customers to sit \u003c3 so many drink options and I tried there signature fruit tea👍it was good 👍  the staff are kind and hard working\u003c3","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhxGAQnktacM9EpBa6dD7cZ7qwRHEivXdGRbto\u0026fid=0x0:0x734c257718fe47d4"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Si Z.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7gLWIj8IqjPvI73xDmz2DmSJqju6RFiW9wQSZ86hR0FOK_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Busy bubble tea place in the plaza with seating on the 2nd floor(couple table on first floor). Place is clean and smell coffee/tea which attracts me when I come in. This is good vibes but be prepared it’s a bit noisy as everyone is here to chat and talk about life. I ordered their black tea fresh milk drink with pearl. I am looking for strong tea flavoured bubble tea. Their bubble black tea meets my liking! Good tea taste ( I chose black tea)! Will come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPhQtPNCsIXYTpmaAniFHImXEEKQC4MxhQxk5N\u0026fid=0x0:0x734c257718fe47d4"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Angela Guo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIu-tb9cNLJeLqrjquZmvrjqkHTOPu2M5JyP989DJnGV_marA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This milk tea shop is greatttttt. I like the store’s vibe really chill, and the clerks there are really nice, and the owner also treat us well. The drinks, especially, the matcha, taste amazing (not that sweet and bitter)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPs9EOdwdB5hmJep9gunR2ZtEqLRgpoRG5XBXBV\u0026fid=0x0:0x734c257718fe47d4"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Micchi Ko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_jAytrCj0QUWrI1BxBWThFjcG4rZpTg2wzV0v2RjVMzbZ6uZM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always try jasmine milk tea at new boba spots and this was definitely a memorable one. I loved that you could taste the tea and it wasn’t overly sugary. The atmosphere was great as well, I love the upstairs study area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8nAv3PGDgBegU9X1Y-Trc1SYMRWRobcSn54k2\u0026fid=0x0:0x734c257718fe47d4"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Chang Wun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXinnRETbtdmwq0G3dzHpocXq4c0y1kT8tCLTmXT5-MPrsCx3WH9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The atmosphere on second floor is good, quiet and suitable for study.\nThey also have good black coffee!\nHowever, the cake is a bit disappointed, so dry and the flavor didn’t taste well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWi7tIAIDyTeMwomaJOQLDHCWA7rWu-lGj8Xls\u0026fid=0x0:0x734c257718fe47d4"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Lebaron Westermark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6pqpzlyQ9QLlb5oJ2GeXW1fiVuVRljOdQ5nakAd-6LHxm1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a wonderful experience at this cafe! The staff were extremely polite and welcoming, which made the visit even more pleasant. I tried the Earl Grey Chestnut Cake, and it was absolutely delicious—the chestnut cream was rich and flavorful. The watermelon smoothie was also very refreshing and perfectly balanced. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for great service and tasty treats!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Malcolm Gray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh4yzyylSClLeWhPoF4GqgdScsO4v9CLr2CKeg4lUP5KuS32x_Fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a business lunch after a meeting at the hotel. The service was very attentive, and the food was good if not exceptional. Had tomato soup which was flavorful. Had chicken for the main and it was a little on the dry side

It was quiet and comfortable to carry on conversations. I did find the prices for lunch to be a little higher than expected, which was the main reason for 4 stars.
Would consider it for dinner sometime.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNZi_debdCLy_dUBIZELOLdQMP-WUjwGN9q4CY&fid=0x0:0xf77c416f95185df"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Louise Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdwxOP7IKmHv1pqr8CLOtOu012YQ5nKrrU0WlNL_Fs6Alv7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Server was amazing! He went through the whole menu with our big party (celebrating my birthday) explaining each dish that was unique! We had five kids and four adults! Definitely kid friendly, they had a kid's menu which had many healthy options! The food was really good as it was different from other restaurants! I would definitely come again! My family and friends enjoyed it too and wanted to come back again as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNksWxDZ1TfOudBbaELCC6s-OQu891MjDv424MY&fid=0x0:0xf77c416f95185df"],"When":"2022-3-18"},{"Name":"Brian Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1inD5UgJe3GOa667vmEEl3vxIGfC-lhzkSxBIWvnxSnDj9qFBRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got comp breakfast here as Marriott platinum. Service was great and food tasted good. Portion is quite large though, so definitely take that into account if you plan to hit up some restaurants nearby early noon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtXC7Pmm3i6ZETxM_Tm6NkJ3XrJHBQElthe4Xu&fid=0x0:0xf77c416f95185df"],"When":"2024-1-30"},{"Name":"Dominic Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIY5_F3DHI9TXcxytV4Jxqzl-96dwZbPhX6am6l3FDfq1I25Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Service by the server was EXCEPTIONAL, the 5 stars are all for her.
Complimentary parking was good.  The dining room had no more than 3 tables when I walked in.
The roasted beets salad was so miniscule, even a can of cat food has more content and it was for a total rip off price of $24 dollars or was the plate just too large.  The roasted beef sandwich with the soup is still expensive but a lot more palatable than the former.
Strangely, the forks must have been used to crack open your safe as it was all twisted & bent out of shape, even the replacement from was somewhat twisted.
During the whole time, it was very depressing to see I was the only customer in the whole dining room on a Black Friday morning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Annia Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCmNf-6kVgoV3z2v1rhLUKPIXQtdwZxPsOxdlb6pZhbXP-BQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Enjoyed the contemporary vibe in hotel setting, located inside Westin Wall Centre YVR Airport location in Richmond had a nice breakfast made with fresh local ingredients.
Their Brioche French Toast served with berries, whipped ricotta, warm maple syrup 😋 delicious.  Server was friendly and on top when it came to refilling the much needed ☕️ coffee for the morning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMm3z-Qrqr1WF0zJILZ6f6HYE37ZCL_gz0OfwZJ&fid=0x0:0xf77c416f95185df"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Layla Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9dHkQ6cmLZ_pyL88YgaqOukE80x0ky0JcopCd0mp0W55k4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Truly perfect place for brunch. Satisfying foods and options. Their Smoothies are $10 which is pretty expensive side, but worth it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLh7Sq0KjTmLLVDK8ODNvuHZ5I2n7TUxuYMt66&fid=0x0:0xf77c416f95185df"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Angela Jeffery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtGyld6d4wIU2Lb7oe7xsoiq4r77iaBdF6nkFQ8ek01eF1q7c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Decent in the hotel restaurant, pleasant server, relaxing music, easy to maintain a conversation, slightly cool temperature, but otherwise nice atmosphere.
Interesting cocktails, and prawn tempura appetizer was lovely. Crispy but not too much batter and tender prawns. Seafood sandwich was average; tasted fine but nothing special. The seafood linguine had a lot of mussels, two scallops, and three prawns with a nice butter sauce.
Sold place to eat if you are here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtI6PlqVEQVmUyFO3g_t6-gIczm8pk7dnwTC5O&fid=0x0:0xf77c416f95185df"],"When":"2019-11-15"},{"Name":"Amir Rezaee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB9I-upNV4sxdxhPbnwpyqTuA78yJJcZ9hKj2ow7AGMYmWypVZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I had breakfast here during a cold snap in Vancouver. Restaurant was so cold that staff had to wear puff winter jackets!
My bill was $50.40 for a Salmon Benedict plus apple pie desert before tip; very expensive.
Friendly and polite service was enjoyable.
Overall I don’t recommend this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPq_e6gM6kB2gBH9ahCCeA9V3K9Cz_j0S2Q_IBo&fid=0x0:0xf77c416f95185df"],"When":"2024-1-14"}]
