user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Derek Hansen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXaBRm-VY_m99UwZ6UwdvGjzB7nw1EejvhcMIUbGB5N2HHxrZpHjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First time being here friendly staff and lots of selections on menue. The restaurant was clean and had a nice seating area. However, sandwiches were just okay. Had good flavor just seemed kind of plain, and bread was a little dry. Also, a tad on the pricy side for what we got.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOu3w9nITjaoXLqVsGrMNMAXhOfaoW-9cJOc0_x&fid=0x0:0x61df21739f7cb8e2"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Noel Eaton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWv3xT0B3aTA21-qbkcIetUsa9kmBoOYjcnLcSu1qlcT3C8tplh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This little sandwich spot is tucked away behind Canadian Tire, so might not be easy to find.  The sandwiches here are great, with a good amount of meat, crispy bacon, thinly shredded lettuce and tasty sauces.  My kids loved the crunch of hickory sticks in their sandwiches.
The prices are higher than Subway or Quiznos, but worth the difference, though the regular size did not seem much larger than the snack size sandwich.
The couple behind the counter are very friendly and helpful, which is good because there is a very large menu.
We will definitely be visiting again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lucy Locvan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6-2UPi8oWSpstIlwY7UZceLC_l-0NE_2LFFiS0dcxtOSrQoSB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Your Average Sandwhich Shop.
Service was prompt and friendly! Restaurant is cleanly and there is a large menu with plenty of options to choose from.
A sandwhich is about $15 and was pretty average. Lots of variety with good ingredients but nothing stood out as phenomenal. (I tried the Turkey and the roast beef).
Dine in is a standard fast food experience. Plenty of seating, no plug ins so not ideal for students. Lots of parking space.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0aare7PraRqZTqDgcrDfxkWTU1IxH9gxxsa7K&fid=0x0:0x61df21739f7cb8e2"],"When":"2023-12-30"},{"Name":"Dani Bowers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLb-27wn_M6hB3_26vnMvsHfPnufSpunR4QJX0wgHUPtr5SAg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time visiting this gem of a sandwich shop and we were blown away! The freshness of the ingredients made every bite incredibly tasty. It's a shame we don't have this shop back home; the convenience of ample parking and its central location only added to our wish that we could frequent this spot more often. Highly recommend for anyone looking for an exceptional sandwich experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODmAsId4u9RwMkNEDWjghkiUxo7M0naegYuCSn&fid=0x0:0x61df21739f7cb8e2"],"When":"2023-11-22"},{"Name":"Ed Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs8Nk-P27gf7GFx0Tlx-z8wEpbrWOUtxk4db8i_WWcIOdLdjKi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family drives by Big Star Sandwich in Richmond a lot, and always wonders why the store does not seem to be busy. This past Friday, we decided to give the place a try and we were pleasantly surprised.

This is not your regular sandwich restaurant like Subway or Quizno (the prices reflect as much). The sandwich's ingredients tasted fresh, and the sauces were very tasty. And even though the prices appear to be on the higher side, for the same size of a sandwich, Big Star's ones are more filling and satisfying.

The restaurant is very clean. The staff there was exceptionally nice. My younger son loved his sandwich so much, he went to thank the staff for a very tasty meal. In response, the nice lady gave him a complementary cookie! My son was beaming the rest of the day.

We will visit again and hope to see it thrive with more customers!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andy C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBn7tt7zGjqnNM6Jz-1-lvYpkoioVvzMgVYTzB5B2vGe-dvC8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time trying Big Star, and it met the expectations of being a solid sandwich shop.  Price can be a bit steep, but at least the size of the large is fair.  Picture shows a large Tony Montana (~$13.50) pulled pork sandwich.  Pork was tender and moist, the saucing amount was just right, and the bread is excellent.  Hickory sticks are interesting, but a novelty which the sandwich doesn't have to have.  Would go back to try their 20+ other menu options at some point.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNofSn4rzoORZLVRYV5LLVS2MEQ7eCyAfe71rC4&fid=0x0:0x61df21739f7cb8e2"],"When":"2021-5-7"},{"Name":"Dawn D.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-o2PEhlsKa5Fi02hDjllbvk-OWM7pcgNWvN-8x7XYjFkvadpvQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! Always amazing, went today and thought ‘Way more people should be enjoying this.’ The sandwiches are so top notch: great meat, great bread, great sauces, lots of yummy crunchy toppings.  Just go.  It’s worth it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ley U.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLc7Lw0Qd_4EJhTFWRL1mzSzyrNFex-1H6XIA0CYzgGUcpN6H3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Sandwich overall felt pretty fresh and healthy. I ordered a large but could only eat half as the bread was very tough and my brain was literally tired of chewing. For price vs quality & portion - I personally would not recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpeqYSCsbbnm7iLmpLfn41eCpWHd_O1E4yG9Mg&fid=0x0:0x61df21739f7cb8e2"],"When":"2022-9-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Just Me Traveling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX18amg9WNM9rF8Fs9axj8FE9tNtrVpXPgaMIl0yMbfuZ56ahzt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The place was quite big for the usual artigiako cafe. It was spacious enough for a comfortable seating. The crew were nice and helpful.
I ordered the Chicken Baguette (14.50CAD), it was delicious! Highly recommend this item. For the drink I ordered small Chai Latte which was also highly recommended. This cafe is a good place in the McArthur Glenn Mall for a cup of coffee or tea and sandwiches and pastries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKrsxIqqU8ohcqVyINjjOEpEIELXnq0DeL3XRX&fid=0x0:0x7bedae4a23dda9ae"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Brenda M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZYOQzEe8yb8JwcUoGCKtwOfWYQk9enAqx-fKJJTbLQOEAuRoGyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Staff was very polite, attentive and assertive at the time you walk in. You order right away. It takes a minute or two to have drink ready. Pastries are ready to go. Seating is somewhat limited. It was raining outside and people started coming in. I got to wait around 10 minutes before a family left and allowed us to seat. You can order to go cup or have the full experience with a nice cup and sip on hot drink. We ordered Lavander Vanilla Latte. Outstanding. No need for sweetener. It is sweet enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMR2_ZNTdDbRlAIcNl_IFDlVdbtILx3jdY3lYLd&fid=0x0:0x7bedae4a23dda9ae"],"When":"2024-2-12"},{"Name":"Deepnain Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXC48KwGmRlWxQlV6Agegyhq2XIZYyL10qqxIZgD2F8o6mjPp8C=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"During our visit to McArthurGlen Outlet, Cafe Artigiano provided a welcome coffee break. The atmosphere was pleasant, staff friendly, and individual lattes decent. Nothing exceptional, but reliable for a quick coffee fix.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-J8RZDi7MkjkWo20LxwPYXU0O09-eMaL-yNTy&fid=0x0:0x7bedae4a23dda9ae"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Ebrahim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPIKcLlYsRXzj_NU-cKrILAfiV6rHoottOnSl1Co3QI6YN1537=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you want to see how the unhappiest staff treat you, you should try this café. If you're lucky, you might get a hi from them.
The carrot cake was too sweet and a week old, at least.
Come on, guys. It's not about the poor staff. The management should do so ا real changes here. Getting a review of 3.8 for such an amazing location is a shame.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUztUo3LHqI6Vz3iotG9gosUpmY4nlmNXorqET&fid=0x0:0x7bedae4a23dda9ae"],"When":"2023-12-11"},{"Name":"Rachel Keery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7HrRs2lYWD-a0OMwYD8hcg13jIWjm47WrdDcC3B391YGfNtPv3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty coffee. Good unique flavours. Blended coffee drink was perfect not too sweet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkXbnHdmEX5ned44VziTRCk4ZGOxp0dBoWEckr&fid=0x0:0x7bedae4a23dda9ae"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Rongting Luo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoUuPmBkCCZ4u--x14TLCOW3fVhRv0PFZZ3T-BSlj2I0mcMQMi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a good place to serve fabulous coffee, I ordered a Spanish decaf latte, very smooth, would try others next time. The cheese scones were so delicious, freshly made with cheese cheddar and some veggies, perfect to go with my latte.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bird Peace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1YPe8UXTSHpchcmyxuJEdmr8Kiwkw0hQIP1QWlKBkZn7uslp9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here and I can't help but love the atmosphere. Very cozy and cute, I got the signature hot chocolate and for once I found a hot chocolate that's not overwhelmingly sweet. Perfectly sweet and even had a foam art which was a nice touch. Their milk? Or cream inside the hot chocolate and cappuccino (which I also got) is a little on the thicker side? Roughly $10 for two drinks which is fair price. Recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPb6_Q-ncUAK442Vjh9skaeh3xRCQi-tsSfgprs&fid=0x0:0x7bedae4a23dda9ae"],"When":"2022-12-22"},{"Name":"Saranye Sri S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvWcZtoLmaB2aS8jZlZkbdmbh5Ixvre6wZw8pvBE7aON8icRE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came in early for a cuppa and croissant and it did not disappoint. The coffee was just right and I loved it!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuN62U1id0Tjc2vf6lBXFgFdM8noX_Y0xognEX&fid=0x0:0x7bedae4a23dda9ae"],"When":"2024-9-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eddy _","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgAbAjye2hnbGKrKeR5bA9jMC1pgyyuF5XGVOPDwlo-amKFXW4Pw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food was pretty good & portion size was decent but several issues: the tables were not cleaned so food debris everywhere. The trash can was overflowing so there was nowhere to discard disposables post meal. Worst part was there was no soap in the men's washroom... overall, not recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtq24FYgW4rq-15F9IQqLqsnSAOTWPKsFyaQg8&fid=0x0:0x5bda3765fe8f2710"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Raiyan Abir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2qaKwaT55z4b1jsai2OscIEDQTo9mW3p47H7bxiSkS7njZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Manpreet is really a nice sweet person. I always liked their food that’s why I always come back again and again I always came from North Vancouver. But worth it. Highly recommended. Please visit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM847fWyTZaSKaNeGLhhLI6-39wsvQuJvnKR7I-&fid=0x0:0x5bda3765fe8f2710"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Adesh Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVDjRIVXUvbzgopQBxLetFxe7e0nHoVpp8i6a6yaIRsftf_XveHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":""I’m extremely disappointed with my experience at Osmow’s. I found a hair in my food, which is completely unacceptable! It’s clear that hygiene and food safety standards are not a priority here. This ruined my entire meal, and I won’t be coming back. If you care about quality and cleanliness, avoid this place. Absolutely unacceptable!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5EHd6WrhhvRdxe_deIJWoaHm4IQ5fwO2PX8Y3&fid=0x0:0x5bda3765fe8f2710"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Cavemancavan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKo0DI4xCYv6JOqFu2lbTAM2xAfP9MVOG1jX4q5925hUFXV1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fast and polite service, and hours are great if you're looking for late night food and don't want burgers.  They have daily specials which is always good of you want to just get that and turn your mind off, but watch the spice levels.  Even mild has some kick to it, so don't try to be brave and not actually enjoy your meal.  Expect  your food in less than 2 min.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alexander Hunt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKntg94WsHup3cVgJBk3yO0jaRf4K-ndL2T0xGy94s_gBQtie8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"At the Osmow's Shawarma Restaurant, my friends and I ordered food and shared a good meal with each other. We ordered the 4-person combo with 2 On-the-rocks rice,  2 wraps and 4 packs of fries. It also comes with 4 drinks.

The food was ok. Service was ok. However, the combo was not enough for 4 people. The fries were overcooked and the portions were small. It was also expensive to buy the food here. Seating was very limited for this restaurant. But, there was no one there except my group on that Friday afternoon so my group could combine the tables to sit all of us.

If I were to come to this restaurant again, I would see if there is anything else to try other than the combo. But, if I am hungry or I want to hang out with friends, then I will go somewhere else.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO8TtO5gxgFU8DJ4dW0LIXiiVJ4BARkds39KQH&fid=0x0:0x5bda3765fe8f2710"],"When":"2023-12-21"},{"Name":"sng1002001","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTfKdGFrJyL8jc4znhIMXimj1BkuJ1S_SEthxZmoeo2Gf8Rg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you like your shawarma to have a nice spicy kick, you come to the right place. Different level of spicy hotness that you can choose from. The spiciness blended well with the sauce and the meat.

Staff very friendly. Generous portion of meat and veggie filing. Should have asked for lesser amount of sauce. Otherwise, the food came quickly and tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwsU5QQQ_spPebtcz27iBK8Ab0KEFTbEXN80jd&fid=0x0:0x5bda3765fe8f2710"],"When":"2023-7-10"},{"Name":"Alan Chin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHipm801YuXx_nwQR08mDwxgVkrGTiSd44wrgRS5nULNqTHOov=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic place to get amazing Mediterranean food! With a wide variety of toppings, items, sauce, and spice levels ranging from no spice to scorching hot. The service there is very kind and quick. I ordered the chicken saj and it was delicious, it had a large portion of toppings and was Pannini pressed. 11/10 would go again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyDwrrqPqcYMWehgO02-MlF1f_ZiMk4CGNQKqQ&fid=0x0:0x5bda3765fe8f2710"],"When":"2022-7-1"},{"Name":"Narinderjit Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKXFJeZMzhYFXAl3b3VQsooKSFOHiYKZEZ97iB7HWIQ5uk59w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was very good, with rich and authentic flavour that truly impressed my taste buds. The atmosphere was very good, creating a warm and inviting environment to enjoy the delicious cuisine. Highly recommend this place.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"YU U","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0nH1IDVl5JKBE-6ym-GzRTN424F1AIj9FKlXASZfTI9-nMv1M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This bakery is such a gem at the airport—super convenient and a total must-visit! Whether you’re just arriving or about to catch a flight, it’s so easy to swing by and grab some fresh, delicious bread. They’ve got a great variety, from classic baguettes to unique sweet and savory options. Every bite feels so fresh, with that perfect crispy crust and soft, fluffy inside. It’s nothing like the usual airport food—you can tell they put a lot of care into what they make.

What really stood out to me was the service. The staff are always friendly, smiling, and super quick to help. If you’re in a rush, they’ll recommend options that are easy to take with you and even package them up quickly so you can be on your way. If you’ve got time to kill before your flight, you can just sit back, enjoy some freshly baked bread with a hot cup of coffee, and completely forget about the stress of traveling.

The prices are also surprisingly reasonable for airport food, and the quality is way better than you’d expect. Plus, the bread stays fresh for a while, so it’s perfect to snack on during the flight or even to bring home as a little gift for family or friends.

If you’re at the airport and need something tasty and convenient, this bakery is hands down the place to go. I’ll definitely be stopping by again on my next trip!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAFIxtpXovXLl6pUhl-2dlqb3Vkx-lxX7WJbhW&fid=0x0:0x3a59ea277740ec73"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Max Cli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLO48oNpZy20ZKJ0cWruPEH7vhSStdJTg9a0QgOlZcOkI14IQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I think this Airport store has a wider selection than the W Broadway outlet I went to. I went completely nuts and got spinach and feta muffin, four cheese scone, sour cherry scone, vegan chocolate cookie, and chocolate pecan cookie. Personal favourite is the spinach muffin, and the chocolate pecan cookie is a close second. I agree with some reviewers that the scone (sour cherry one) seemed a little stale. Latte was good and it’s decently priced given is in the Airport.

The second waitress who served me seemed impatient and I couldn’t help but say to her, a smile is free you know…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP45Z8a7IOw2kYFzXFQ3CYLl6pIr0mimbDCuWSl&fid=0x0:0x3a59ea277740ec73"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Bill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHaRfUMmW_DzJz_kI3949wt5mcfG-_4hflqsgUHRBRsC8TTcX_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice clean bakery and coffee shop, especially for an airport. The ham and cheese croissant was delicious, by far the best croissant I've had on this trip. The coffee was just alright. Service was prompt and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLsfQoR1nPoqboE0c5ps1p6Fa0raGrh3zqJ2Hs&fid=0x0:0x3a59ea277740ec73"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They have a wide range of baked goods (cakes, cookies, dessert bars, scones, breads, sweet and savoury - a bit of everything), a few sandwiches, and coffee. There's a vegan sandwich and a few vegan baked goods. I think there might be a few baked goods that don't contain gluten, but this is probably not a safe place if you need true 100% gluten free because of cross contamination (nothing is packaged separately). They also have local soft drinks if you're not feeling coffee.
The baked goods are delicious and fresh, and I like that they have some less common flavours - nothing super out of the box, just more than the basics, which is especially a treat to see at an airport. If you've been to any of the Purebread bakeries in Vancouver the city, the selection here is just as expansive. Unlike the other Purebread bakeries, the sandwiches here are prepackaged and cannot be warmed up, but my veggie sandwich was just fine served cold.
I know the airport is a different sort of employment situation than the rest of the city, but given my very positive experiences at other Purebreads, I was still surprised that the two employees here on my most recent visit were not very friendly. The barista that served me wasn't overtly rude, just kind of short with me, but the other one was snappish to another customer who was having trouble paying with their card. I suspect it may have been a language thing but I still don't think anyone needs to be spoken to with the tone that this employee was using when they're just having a little trouble with the pin pad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqXII4qVw-av3LVZnUFbi3iZ3FYgQkbeXNqkcC&fid=0x0:0x3a59ea277740ec73"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"shikhar Rastogi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMLXKJUTllxkDw8ta7YPkiaS2WGRjgnQhvxrPVAJ0tRKtjJEhujQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A great selection of muffins and breads with lots of variety to choose from. The staff was helpful in recommending a really tasty muffin, which made the experience even better.
Definitely a place to visit for fresh and delicious bakery options","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtfBzVjdWgDscAlGzThX_h6GNlpk4lmI_EQcv1&fid=0x0:0x3a59ea277740ec73"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Roberto Contreras","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTPDZSOKmeieSE-8Ws_NNXKwjvzkOzeB7CuLtITLb4m36Hxb2s3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The atmosphere/presentation is super.  Pastries/cookies are very good.  I had the expectation to have a nice  americano (coffee), I ordered a large-size one.  I was disappointed when realizing that it had a single shot of coffee, so I was almost "tasteless", I would have greatly appreciated to had been clarified that the difference between the sizes was the amount of hot water (the bar person did ask for the size but did not go beyond).  To play safe, I ended up paying extra for an espresso and putting away the americano (another shot was not enough for that quantity of plain water in the americanito).
Another "comment/room for improvement" is that it would be nice to have one or two options of salads.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"TheRealM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBQ02s-MSYbJVx5xAObiOh6GtjLc7QEIqJtof6C-5EDQEhH0mT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The place looks amazing in terms of desserts, but the prices are as you expect, airport prices. So expect to pay about $5 per cookie to $15 for a small chocolate flourless cake. But even still, they look pretty damn amazing, I don't think you can really go wrong with what you choose when you're there. The only caveat is to not buy things with your eyes because if you do, you might go bankrupt since they all look so darn good. All the desserts are a good size and definitely not diet friendly, hahaha. Don't be afraid to ask for what they recommend and what the most popular thing is, it might give a chance to try something new. It seems like there is a dessert for almost everyone, even some with different eating restrictions. Give it a shot, see what you think. They also serve coffee as well, although it might not be comparable to what Starbucks offered whom rented that space prior to these guys, but I am sure it is still pleasant.

Again, when you go there and you're worried about spending all your money there remember buy with not your stomach or your eyes. Go in there, are you decided what you want and stick to your guns and you should be able to get out of there with most of your money intact. Hehehe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqllYJifDgI24NE1U4YGguud5exyHrELK3z1X3&fid=0x0:0x3a59ea277740ec73"],"When":"2023-8-1"},{"Name":"Luis Durán","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvq7ICrqaasY76hyhYfCnewmjwn-gIN69xrKAFDEZc4FPp-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"All good but can’t believe it has just a normal oven to heat the sandwiches… there was a huge line and it took about 15 min to heat a single sandwich","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMj7HIyrI2Qq1z22Ym1ig6st3z3Fi3BVzREfcKo&fid=0x0:0x3a59ea277740ec73"],"When":"2024-9-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Oakley Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8hLgsxZ2FBV1wDSzDnMkTFiGeFTrTLKoXlkYC4wKxFoYLP8lu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"How do I start ?

I have been to all types of HK Style Cafe, and this one is a disaster.

First off, the ventilation is very bad. It was previously a dessert place probably and they added a hood that doesn’t ventilate but just filters.   It’s an open concept kitchen so you see everything.

The Milk Tea , is the most important part of a good HK Cafe even if it’s “fusion”. Have a look at the picture, I can tell from when they put down the milk tea that it was going to be bad. The color is so wrong, and tasted like watered down syrup tea. The lady at the water bar was clearly visible, and we saw her smelling a container of sugar or salt. lol… that shows a lot.

The Satay Beef Instant Noodle, again tasted like watered down satay beef , the more you eat it the more you don’t want to finish it. I think one of my photos show that I just stopped eating it.

The scrambled eggs was actually the only thing I can say is decent, but maybe it’s from that everything was just so bad….

So they ran out of ham and gave us sausages, and that was salty and not cooked like hk style.

Then have a look at the “beef with shell pasta in tomato potato soup” , look at the effort in cutting that potato!!! lol…… really? The name should be changed to “beef with shell pastes in tomato and A QUARTER POTATO soup”..

As a true hker, and someone who actually enjoys hk milk and is hkers pride and joy, this milk tea was horrible and doesn’t reflect what hk milk tea is…

What saved the service was one of the lady running the show. She knew what to say what to do. Experienced , but the food doesn’t save it.

The parking btw is very hard to find.

I know it’s soft opening but there is a lot of catching up if it can be caught up, won’t be going back for sure though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPb-My8oFNnIHFaqWXdAJQ3wtTn8DMXkkw1exW&fid=0x0:0xab84f5a44e3060f9"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Clarence Choy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4ubf8sP7uQKlJ2tiEfgdz8Zt5nBRl1PkKvBsr3Lqx4Cev-20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fish meal ($13 + 1):
Good price for their portion. Scrambled eggs and fish cutlet were good. I also got the “hotdog” sausage for an additional $1. Milk Tea w/condensed milk (茶走) could use more condensed milk in my opinion.

Noodle see with pan fried chicken ($15): Garlic toast and pan fried chicken were alright, but noodle soup was slightly bland.

Not the most convenient location per se. I would not travel from far away for this place, but I recommend giving this place a visit if you are around the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUuonsFczDrKy1X3N9BPPki9KExAOxmw3_wv35&fid=0x0:0xab84f5a44e3060f9"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Bonnie Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnEc4L_oX33x1BIdSnyu3qIy05RmcbQP1bJwBirlW_Yv38YSLczA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Congratulations to opening!
Hot Milk tea 🧋 is good
New recipes are good trial:
Garlic toast👍🏻 , cutlet spam 👌🏻, mushroom cheese mixed noodles 👌🏻( a bit filling if prefer hkg style)
Soup for Ham macaroni and toast 👍🏻

Stay low on seasoning as thirsty aft meal ☺️,
And will visit again 👍🏻😎","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAn_6W3vS39LhvsmM4REHg1Y0BfIeqNo3zgee7&fid=0x0:0xab84f5a44e3060f9"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Ting Ting","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2nghnQJAXSrHtsANgIkWbsjYkwOqAZDfeG4n3SWJzhrZqAEo-oA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My recent visit to this newly opened restaurant was quite disappointing. While the food overall was mediocre—nothing memorable—the over easy eggs were particularly bad, poorly cooked and unappetizing. However, what truly ruined the experience was the owner constantly shouting at the staff. It created an incredibly tense and uncomfortable atmosphere, making it impossible to enjoy the meal. The lack of respect and professionalism on display made a bigger impression than the food. I won’t be returning and can’t recommend this place until they seriously improve both the quality of their dishes and the dining environment","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRY2ZQ1_sGiyDL-Ld0d6wMDPUq6AS8JBkOVUyY&fid=0x0:0xab84f5a44e3060f9"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Madame Lamb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKB6Zl78nceNUHpaGnIHp7Xs1-kfcVn_eOslK891SUHxbO2JxB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good solid HK cafe.  Kitchen and eating area very clean.  Staff are super polite and professional.  The HK milk tea is on point.  Good addition to the neighborhood and reasonable prices.  Will go again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUcnayirOLEnYY61lqlA2UBl4hF9vtDc6bPaou&fid=0x0:0xab84f5a44e3060f9"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Kitty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhMuwg_tl1TRTc24JxH5iTo3OJVTHqCQijM2P6PldLkYJ1Idkn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Service and atmosphere is great. Does have a bit of an open kitchen smoke smell. The food is very average. Not bad for the price. $10 for noodles with two toppings and one hot drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoHqUQs3-QQhhgwvCeHqpxgPQjkzcho9Q6fjbx&fid=0x0:0xab84f5a44e3060f9"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"C. H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocII_GLBwpOIJ9Mi9dLIwSZqYYbMMDsTPVWnYSPecZzJKbKx_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Food is not too bad but not great either. Don't feel like it is Hong Kong style at all.

Ordered the French toast. I was surprised what it looked like when it arrived. The syrup color already didn't look right. It definitely is not authentic and there is somehow a sour taste.

Service wise is still soft opening so it is understandable but you can see it is kind of disastrous. With multiple people asking the same thing again and again. The one who took order forgot what order he took.

Not likely to go back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOu8-Ky1ttcauY62i6Xfvf5A6g9T375TnpAyv9I&fid=0x0:0xab84f5a44e3060f9"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Joanne Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICAdhH2GUSWOFLbF7AT9qfQnpEJ2D27xGyjFuW7cLxH5jzog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very HK style,  I like the hk style milk tea. Make my day. they are testing for opening. it should have better room to improve. but the price compare with the quantity of food. it’s way much better then staying at food court. food delivery fast n hot.
Will try again a week later!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZkKDqjnjp0kwNBcSHVoR0u7UFFWGIwSB3toeE&fid=0x0:0xab84f5a44e3060f9"],"When":"2024-10-3"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Rachel Keery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7HrRs2lYWD-a0OMwYD8hcg13jIWjm47WrdDcC3B391YGfNtPv3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Drinks tasted great , ordering was a little difficult to get our order correct.\nCute gingerbread bottles but only available with the drinks shown can’t substitute anything.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwm3YEwR3tCydw0XXTBMS_lwtdGCKGV70KE5dH\u0026fid=0x0:0x3f450279d979fa84"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Le Thanh Quang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnBJw2xJAqroToFn2U0ww-W22fxkXputW6WAZ9qpU4TmtHis0-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quality milk tea, I have tried here many times, all are great. Especially some of their drinks are available in jumbo size, really satisfy my milk tea craving. But the strawberry milk tea I recently ordered was a bit sweeter than other drinks and the drink lacked the tea flavor of milk tea but still a good drink. Also, the staff are really nice and friendly, should be on the list to try when visiting Richmond centre mall.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCrVy00qBlL-x3z5PjXCqCvnOoJFx86bs7xce2\u0026fid=0x0:0x3f450279d979fa84"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Win Nie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZh8JI7hF0RPjg2XaWcihILfZm1QFtcp0fdf16r5ajBrO30Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I never get bbt from food court but tried Fairbee once and I keep going back!! Best bbt shop in RC and even outside the mall. I would go just to get their bbt. All the drinks I’ve tried so far have been good. Their pearls are soft and prices are reasonable. Bonus is they always change their cup designs too, so cute to look at. My go to is their milk tea with white pearls, the foam on top is so good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaE6_Wl3tpMzh9dAodK_W_gtbdvm4fApUvKHj3\u0026fid=0x0:0x3f450279d979fa84"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Katie Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBDK3zjuiOEbhhmROW824stlBpmCpGZEQFIpQp-T56GdYeG3uzOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m a sweet tooth, so you have to believe that Fairbee always delivers on their dessert drinks! They’re decently priced, and the employees are always so lovely and sweet whenever I stop by to pick up a drink during my shopping trips.\nI got the strawberry milk tea this time, and it tastes just like a strawberry pocky 🍓I’m in love with this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVfBm-gaM3WwJtf9UzEUgIBPfh7U85j_ejYcXU\u0026fid=0x0:0x3f450279d979fa84"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Jennie L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpdyPYq_UEg_tKXjP6ulDk4pSRVYUhZML75kcuFsHUDtRW-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fairbee bubble tea is one of my all time favourites! The black milk tea with grass jelly and tea jelly is my go to. They also have this amazing 2 for $8 dollar deal on selected drinks!! Try this place if you ever get a chance","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcmuZg0ADdcMdV7Kv_PN5_Fh17RQRLJFT-Wq8H\u0026fid=0x0:0x3f450279d979fa84"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Albert Cherng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2AYaSfHm3FolRzm5pTtzww9NlenNwViv8VJczOj_IeDJCYO9B7A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honest and high quality ingredients! I tried both their fruit-based and milk-based bubble teas and was very impressed. Their staffs were well trained and it was fascinating to see how quickly they work. Definitely must try if you’re in RC.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYi1qMS2tEjl4HndJbTksEWDtiK4nYuPrdQ22x\u0026fid=0x0:0x3f450279d979fa84"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Crender Brine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLknuYKtqPzeOZUuVMzxSaZUX9ta2zfPI5Ja-axtkyNifD36A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An old favourite of mine, they’ve been around since the 90s. My go-to is still the Black Milk Tea with pearls. Also, the Fresh Papaya Milk and Mango Coconut Slush is a must try when it’s in season!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxNOaxmEjYWhE9nw7956CrWa3olWki_-U_zxKr\u0026fid=0x0:0x3f450279d979fa84"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Helen Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKI-mzgGlleZ4ePt7mDYbQ4Gabh9zw-OBKk6bKlySQQQboerA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The lady offered me a sample of passion fruit green tea and it tasted amazing but a little too sweet for me. Luckily you can choose the sugar level. So I got a large passion fruit green tea with 30% sugar and it tasted just right. They are very friendly and efficient. You can choose to add toppings, such as pearls and coconut jelly. I like this place and I will come back to try more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVmG3J40KGbQnoYmvHJX1pJ6ZNeztV2PmoKOo3\u0026fid=0x0:0x3f450279d979fa84"],"When":"2023-7-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eunice L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQkzUZXfdvXjIof6QNpWT0Clt0HQWO6_tic3KMTC1-MnvOY65-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s a bit hidden underneath the escalators going down from the Canadian Domestic Departures floor (the cafe is at Canadian Domestic Arrivals) but it is definitely an interesting venture.  The space is clean and a nice spot to wait or take a break over coffee.  There’s also wraps and baked goods available.  Prices were decent for the airport and lighting is good.  Staff were super friendly! I love their mission and will continue to stop in to support them!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO13-HOScYakEePojXa66lKnbSairkGLvzcIGtW&fid=0x0:0x25fad826dc47697b"],"When":"2024-2-6"},{"Name":"Paul Nazareth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5M3iA3GJcdaCFMqOKkU3baTGlZ_mS-mqtUCzQgV_Do2jiDQNc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem! Right outside arrivals when you really need a coffee or treat after a long flight or on the way to transit.

Great espresso options, warm and friendly staff and a really nice place to sit and rest for a moment!

Indeed it’s a little hidden but now that I know it’s here, I have my arrival espresso spot SET.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN20Touku3Yo08_4WWqNzyVC37qq40KGcuiZBxG&fid=0x0:0x25fad826dc47697b"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Bryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9N5sXwFoqFaR5HGAG_hbrSIKtEl2NVRHGNjfNd5YREFP9HxeSpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best coffee at YVR, bar none. They have little variety, but what they do, they do well. They also changed suppliers for their pastries, so their baked goods are great. Skip Tim's or Starbucks during Paper Planes' open hours. You won't regret it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Devon Scott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeORLHCOpm4NWHjphA4RzVu11tjg5hgrft8wWL39GswyywFs0CUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love seeing the local neurodiverse community being supported and celebrated in this beautiful space! The service was excellent. I will be supporting them as often as I can. If you want to have the best Chai Latte you've ever tasted, this is the place!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrw8ADSa-zhSaZKDfl8T41I7AMfqDg4NetaGAi&fid=0x0:0x25fad826dc47697b"],"When":"2023-11-3"},{"Name":"Canute the Great","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhYEm61SXM3IPJvFFUbHhXanEvOia3flxvgr4piwUd1sEiY_s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Gave us a dairy-based drink, despite being reminded multiple times that it was meant to be based in a vegan milk. They did replace the drink, but unfortunately the corrected drink was poorly made.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Douglas Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpGdttp_iyfrTGvKMlFeYGudpdtsrMwImaci8zGF6ahEkNNv90=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Comfortable place waiting, just outside baggage claim, can enjoy coffee and croissants 😄","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sacha Bourdeau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRUh8-imnd3wzM4JOv8PNroQ7FD5h_F6kSDycXfW7bMaPV7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst matcha I've ever had, disgusting. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Julie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6iqNbgJ99pEVigrdmqTpMQQRCYbL7zrrvCytBAxs45Tk47A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The bubble tea was pretty pricy and it wasn’t great. I’d say it’s alright. Not my fav","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHSweeaxP006BCmu_9x1LCbVx2ES-B4IcEKWhp&fid=0x0:0xbd3038a477f50c66"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Ly Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9Rfi9YJyNXoeUcOB0q836NlpdhCZYOXnMsyIK7wwlRTMlQ2vr0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am absolutely delighted with my experience at CHUN FUN HOW Richmond! The tea quality is exceptional, with perfectly balanced fruity flavors that are both refreshing and satisfying. The boba is just right—chewy and full of flavor. I also love the beautiful cups they serve the drinks in. Although the shop is on the smaller side and more suited for takeaway, it’s perfect for grabbing a delicious drink on the go. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ayuu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWASytRjnB071FlOavyCkT31BSNx6IrSO_EFMs-U_nsclyPxCi8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"i don't care this place is just my favourite bubble tea shop ever. it's small, open until 12 am, has a respectable selection and complemented with the sweetest staff. i've never EVER had to wait very long for my drink, even when it was busy with a lower amount of employees. not once have i had my drink be wrong, even if i ordered with other people. the cup designs are the cutest thing,, and i do indeed value that! i got two free cups from their summer '24 event and they are cute plus work well. i typically do not have any issue with occupancy; come here both day and night. personally, i do enjoy their oolong tea VERY much. i always get it LOL, i would recommend. very much enjoy the smaller size of the store and the music is a nice touch to the place. staff are incredibly kind and always thank you for coming. it's located in a very spectacular spot as well, as i enjoy going into some other shops around the area before heading back home.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Luke Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-nw_Hipvgt6UpenAw0abcDlQMvwpFIko8ke_8Sy_24ohAlwTK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am glad they opened up a location in Richmond. I love their teas. The tea flavor is always super strong and not diluted. The pearls are chewy/bouncy. Cup designs are so cute!

Love that they also have their own delivery.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONcf5i_qaO3wvTGneKneVpS1YRAq3MXFmUdpWo&fid=0x0:0xbd3038a477f50c66"],"When":"2023-10-11"},{"Name":"Andy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhlSS7jPz5zCaOBcdduZUQiQLkdoBrNXd3voRg2PZcAC_6HQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The teas here are really good, especially if you're looking for strong tea flavour! Their Pearl Oolong Milk Tea is my personal favourite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlyChgyMxNNRKxuSrssAgRJWceIunVm8PbxkpV&fid=0x0:0xbd3038a477f50c66"],"When":"2023-9-11"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The fragrance of the teas and fruit when you walk in the door leaves you salivating for each of their drinks.  However my wife was upset that the person working gave everyone the same cup when we had 6 orders.  (We got home and realized they got my order wrong😢 and one of my kids threw up after drinking)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYiqcesq0_x-hnmfPvqYgHFV6Pg4aZ-zAozLts&fid=0x0:0xbd3038a477f50c66"],"When":"2023-1-15"},{"Name":"Shibe Life","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUC4Mb1DHizRVJ60Sg_sm7ibJx8EQiAVjPSsfgIJdoHWmHYbUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I like the cups but basically that’s it.

The pearls were not that fresh. Taste imported and not handmade.not worth the extra $1

Teas taste like sugar. Tea is also brewed wrong so it is bitter. How can a drink be bitter and too sweet??? Just try this place lol","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"K L H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQFZJuD0_NE10o4xSC-XtXQSVqtA5ZrAaHnqFaD10csHc_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the very few high quality bubble tea shops in the lower mainland that don’t doesn’t skimp on quality or portions. Rare nowadays.

Love how they don’t dilute, shove a crapload of ice when you ask for 30%, gets sweetness levels right every time, or add any crazy amounts of cheap coffee mate to the drinks. Pearls are cooked perfectly, other toppings are always fresh, and the customer service is top notch! They hand you your bubble tea directly while in store too! :) Keep up the good work!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mr. Surya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBrn9nd1HcDRdmtXAMfMXUvo9HXV6arQCmsPAMeCB7UNfrsdPy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have visited many other Tim Hortons locations, but this one stood out because it was neat and clean. The atmosphere was pleasant, making it a nice place to sit and enjoy a coffee. The service was also fast and efficient, which made the experience even better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJjLNlZYvK9Xr1QwKFyevTUzw9-X9dl2RSVpUc&fid=0x0:0xdc8a63fed0f43a45"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Madaleine Berkeveld","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVvsgTsWh3680oxbxN4T-WlOhwtfslMXGEfG7lPhF4IXIOU_S0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"In the last few months the food and drink quality has decreased. They don’t toast the baked goods properly, there is little to no cream cheese and even the coffee has tasted watery.

Not sure what’s happening to the Tim Hortons but quality control is going down

Look at the donut I got today","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-ShBiB7SxM7sXs0gg5FCyK7u6jj7-O1drCyfw&fid=0x0:0xdc8a63fed0f43a45"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Harton Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYPe9N6qewamZnCfchT6UUzwVRR5KKwudnnk5PmJw3cykk4Wbb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Terrible service. My girlfriend ask the salad sauce to be served on the side twice when we ordered. The salad was still served with dressing on top. We kindly asked the cashier (first name initial is H) to replace the salad. We also noted to H that we have mentioned dressing on the side when we ordered. H, clearly missed what we just said, immediately complained that we should have specified this when we ordered. We restated that we have asked dressing on the side when we ordered. H, unwillingly, reached out to her manager. We told the manager what happened, and the manager immediately said they can replace it. Throughout this time H was obviously upset about us, which was really astounding. The rest of the staff was actually not bad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjy8W5JsVyTxynP5zbTyEwgIZy6vYoGTAvauSj&fid=0x0:0xdc8a63fed0f43a45"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"趙雯津","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBDAXjmbgfu9NFLrKWz3ZSOAjoNxi-7xfJsjsFUUO8_m5KlgP34g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This was originally the most unique and cleanest Tim Hortons I have been to in Canada in the past 10 years🇨🇦. It was reopened after being renovated and was once nice and clean. The staff are also very polite.

Unfortunately, current employee education and training is clearly insufficient. There are many people working at the counter, but there is always garbage on the floor in the dining area.
I have never seen any employees come to clean it up.

The hygienic condition of the dining environment is disturbing. This is Tim Hortons which represents Canada🇨🇦, but now I have a very bad impression when I walk in. I hope it will improve one day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-EiefY6dSSkWtAX-uhYgmSghIOt2wcLpItP3i&fid=0x0:0xdc8a63fed0f43a45"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Kayle G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiTsWeWndrNr6Fvrag55tcAkI3a4OPAmNwoxwB3ExrNdnGMg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Quality care and training is abysmal. Go to starbucks instead. Paid for xtra cream cheese and got this: (see photo) Both sides were like this, other side was worse actually.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjoOcav76cjRIRZgkIMPVVVaCtp4x8mTQn0stA&fid=0x0:0xdc8a63fed0f43a45"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"jaxsaidblog donuts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxGpINti4p1NiXA0zQvA1_4VJhYhZw9JrxjdOJda8btWYVso98=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is by far the worst TH I have ever been to. And I've been working nearby for 13 years. Yes 13 years of terrible food and order taking. Today was disgusting. Got my order wrong again and then look at this GROSS biscuit. The owner should be ashamed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1mBeEkzGUEr1qUjBfuatdvL2V8saWT0oeNA2E&fid=0x0:0xdc8a63fed0f43a45"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"sunyannoah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLSwBWIgNapCmvSkDfQ18S6DcsJMyFpEPTbGC6ivBYhk7uF-X4S=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The food quality and customer serivce is really conerning me in this store.  A hair style string was found in my muffin....  The lady  was even sincere apology, and said muffins were not produced in the store as an excuse...
How come Tim Horton became like this??","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5tkUsHwomDwDJu_b3aNa3JRq8005W5yWwCBh_&fid=0x0:0xdc8a63fed0f43a45"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Elia Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiOHbc7QmIaHrWQ5XU5KwTxR9QxNVVXfbY3F4kDIJ_PWJwf-NL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a crispy chicken wrap because I wanted it, but they gave me a grilled chicken wrap. Not asking for perfection but at least avoidance of food poisoning would be preferred. Bought a breakfast burrito/wrap then boarded an early morning flight to Toronto. About 3/4 into the flight I experienced substantial pain in the lower abdomen nearly fainting from the pain while waiting for the toilet to become free. Stayed in there for 30 mins to forever, hard to say when you're in that much pain.
Can't say much of their other food but the service was acceptable nonetheless.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Faby Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULMF5-txgC_jJaj-r8772V6U0G7C8f7gUPflWT659ELuxrZVWi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food was kinda bland. We had the Thai chicken wrap and Jamaican Spice chicken wrap and we could barely taste any flavour in it. Food was cold inside but hot outside, so not great.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rosie T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW375Wtm7_sZ5QwW_S-ntrYpPta1t0mjFxd186j4vDYKkK7sRkh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered the Tonkotsu ramen. Its definitely not tonkotsu. The broth was like a basic Campbell's soup pork broth instead of a creamy pork broth like it should be. Its disappointing if you're expecting **tonkotsu** They could continue to sell it and call it something else but it was pretty bland.

My server was really sweet. And that's probably the only reason I'd try the restaurant again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lynnea Setterstrom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWpA3NwuGw5-VLnPj9oe9NcpdO3OQguTexSE0rPeVfU9I03g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One girl working to take orders, make drinks, and make food but she was quick and efficient. Really impressed with her skills.

Food was good and mocha was delicious.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leah Bruce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkX62WTTSocBgHktQdxD3aUnx5z9bphuCE7ycZjFNu-MaWl5q7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"HORRIBLE service!!!! Instead he told the server that I had complained about not being served, so when the server walked by, he said, "I know you're in a hurry but I don't have any lone tree cider." We walked out and left. Absolutely HORRIBLE service!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jon Fleming","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIh4EBPBQjKUTSQLxOL5kDH-_mtq0Wp56yr3WmbF6_PuZ3mj_o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not bad for airport food. [{"Name":"Nazanin M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwOpECU_Obym-SgEqekgcV3NCmM15cozRjkgCICqU4KpGa9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a muffin and a latte here. The staff were so nice and helpful (given it was 5:30 in the morning). The coffee was good and the muffin was good too.
Much better than Starbucks!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tihomir Todorov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSVzG084qTfn9Z3MEuI-ldWBvG5IowoSgT8PZ1X2qiEpU0HBOZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Nothing exciting. Salads sandwiches, and overpriced juices.
But I was in a hurry so I had to buy something. Otherwise, I wouldn’t go for this. It’s just too pricie","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkylMXr1wykYjAo9gNjslpijx2ilpEQVlIp2oD&fid=0x0:0x55ca65e2624cdf92"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"T Major","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULrvC6fcP_lpyrNwifbmV0sBSk1OxWkbHeTPQ7DSZNz-ldCGpD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Extremely expensive for what you get. I picked out on veggie wrap that did not taste good at all - the lettuce was old and had a funky taste to it. I went back and the people working were very kind and let me pick out a different wrap. I opted for the Thai chicken, thinking it would be different. The lettuce was the same - wilted and disgusting. I ended up throwing the wrap out, it was so bad.
The food portions are quite massive so while they are very expensive, you could easily spilt a wrap between two people. The veggie wrap was 17$ and the chicken one was 20$","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sung Hoon Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqvVHzr9KM60OLkjGCqYkzNe3hyrKinUyc4x_B1iT1j0krLpig6g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"For an airport coffee and snack shop, it is ok.

Coffee, quite bitter and unclear what kind of beans they use. (I tried a regular drip coffee, but the same goes for the espresso set up)

Zucchini muffin, interesting idea, and tastes like a regular muffin. Maybe I got some extra fibre from the zucchini.

Everything Bagel with Jalepino cream cheese was cheewwwy. If you like a fluffy bagel, then I do not recommend it.

I know the Dirty Apron brand, and this place does not represent it well imho.

Cost: $18 for the above in Apr 2024","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOymU2Ny0FwPZX-iwSHzYtdWBtxi0aV1SDngKIS&fid=0x0:0x55ca65e2624cdf92"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"Darren Sherbot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILIDoHyj3HV-WFShHxOsxsS2-GXoRLbjmt_EQ8Y6XqjEMfr-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"For a coffee shop pretentious enough to post their pastry menu in French, their croissants were dry, stale, with a tiny amount of chocolate… all for 6.75$ + 20% tip to put it into a paper bag. I’ve had better croissants from the pastry plates for breakfast at a Super 8 in Cranbrook.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bryan Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1Oxd8zHtXcPSrivmym3Rco0zb5jANa-Q_ZawbmLkRRWDepw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The counter staff, mimmy, got the worst attitude i had experienced in Vancouver. She literally put the change on the table when I hand over the cash to her. And she got no patience when I told her I got 50 cents. She even raised her voice at me for taking too long for the change, merely 10 secs.

As i stand at the side noticing her way of service , i realise she gave Asian a very nasty looks whereas the west, she smile and greet. If she thinks by working in Vancouver makes her superior over Asians, someone please remind her that it's all the customers,  regardless of nationality, is paying her , her salary. Best of all, she's Asian herself....

What a way to end my tour in YVR.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"egor r","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIkhWxPZ1Fbyyy3HWfwKi293F44yfu4ID5VUuXr8b2YM_co_Va=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Airport pricing aside, this is the best coffee in this side of the terminal, with legit croissants. JJ Bean coffee, and classic dirty apron sandwiches.. pre packaged, but still the best sandwich you can get here.
I may be poor after stopping in, but I'm so much happier for it. Gone are the days of being sad about airport food in terminal A & B!

Also, the juices were 7 bucks and looked pretty good...","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul Nazareth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5M3iA3GJcdaCFMqOKkU3baTGlZ_mS-mqtUCzQgV_Do2jiDQNc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m a frequent flyer and airport food is often gross chain neon-coloured food. I have NEVED bought airport food after a flight. Until now. The bright, beautifully designed store drew me in and the healthy food options are awesome and the juice is quality stuff. Brightened my spirit as well as fed me food that won’t slow me down. I’ll be back for that Prosciutto and Fig sandwich!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoJklpEWMFKW7X09GQ-GLBgeMHGMmVW-XAhHG6&fid=0x0:0x55ca65e2624cdf92"],"When":"2023-3-29"}]

I don't know whether she doesn't care the customers or her job?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-q9dSqwMYpi4Vh6Ta7Vidw94TMKyAfzTlL55x&fid=0x0:0x8fa6a3d6a117bf8c"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Nicky M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzeS4qN8hp0aA0dJCRbv-FZ2oYnG_l6MJBY-rXmvJwZoIOYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always order Double Chocolate Frap or Chocolate Cookie Frap with extra whipped cream and extra chocolate drizzle in different Starbucks locations. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"IKEA RESTAURANT RICHMOND

Mushroom Soup
The mushroom soup at IKEA Richmond is a straightforward yet satisfying option. The seasoning is well-balanced, allowing the earthy mushroom flavors to come through. However, it lacks the depth or richness that would elevate it beyond a basic offering. Its creamy texture and mild flavor make it a comforting choice, though it remains relatively simple without much complexity.
Rating: 7/10

Tomato Soup
IKEA’s tomato soup provides a familiar and comforting flavor, with a well-seasoned base that balances the natural acidity and sweetness of the tomatoes. While enjoyable, the soup lacks distinctive characteristics—such as fresh herbs or additional seasoning layers—that would help it stand out from standard tomato soups. It serves as a reliable option for those seeking something light and traditional.
Rating: 7/10

Vegetable Medallions
The vegetable medallions, while offering a decent texture, fall short in flavor. They lack the seasoning necessary to make them truly enjoyable, resulting in a somewhat bland experience. While the dish is a healthy option, it could benefit greatly from a more inventive preparation or the inclusion of a dipping sauce to enhance its appeal.
Rating: 6/10

Plant-Based Balls with Vegetables
The plant-based balls are hearty and filling, accompanied by a modest selection of vegetables. While the texture is commendable, the flavor is somewhat one-dimensional, leaving the dish feeling uninspired. A more robust seasoning or a dynamic sauce would significantly improve the overall experience. While suitable for those seeking plant-based options, it falls short of delivering a memorable meal.
Rating: 7/10

Ambiance

The restaurant, located within IKEA, offers a casual and functional dining environment. The setup resembles a cafeteria-style experience, where customers line up with trays and select their meals from a counter—evoking memories of high school dining halls. Despite this, the space is large, clean, and cozy, with adequate seating. While the chairs are functional, they are not particularly comfortable for extended dining.

Price
The prices at IKEA Richmond Restaurant are undeniably affordable, which is one of its main draws. While the food selection is not top-tier, the low cost makes it an attractive option for budget-conscious diners. For the price, the overall value is reasonable.

Service
The service was adequate, though not particularly notable. It follows a self-service model, where diners order at the counter and receive their food. The staff was efficient, but the experience lacked any personalized attention.

6 out 10

Verdict
IKEA Richmond Restaurant offers simple, no-frills dishes that cater to those looking for a quick, casual meal during a shopping trip. While the food is consistently decent, it lacks the creativity or bold flavors needed to elevate the dining experience. Ultimately, it’s a reliable option for convenience, but not a destination for culinary innovation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNU7PHXXXsfMSLHGlzfydg9s-jQFhbvXML5_pUa&fid=0x0:0xc8855e3befc7b661"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Sign up for a free family ikea membership.
Choose any 3 entrees at 50% off.

Go lineup. Grab a tray. Grab a cup (your tea and coffee is free). There are desserts and beers and salads while you’re walking if you wanna add to your bill. Tell them what entree you want. Proceed to the cashier. Scan your ikea membership bar code. Pay.

I got the fish and chips. For that price you can’t complain if you’re looking for frugal eats. But don’t expect fresh caught non processed. They get their shipment from Gordon Food Services. It’s a family frugal place.

I noticed they took the salmon off the menu.

*Update*
Not sure if anyone knows this. Every time you buy 10 meals in the Swedish Restaurant and scan your IKEA Family card, you'll get 1 free meal! You can log into the ikea website and check. Once you reach your free meal you have 30 days to use it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKAcUwsdEWUByAvfTynzCU8iFMsMPdcyYxV2t6&fid=0x0:0xc8855e3befc7b661"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"Adam Truong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnKzCbjNxt18VXSbSzL1g7pvkQmP8tqRC673Ls95uotzGz0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"What do you expect? It’s Ikea food 🤷 cheap, fast, and taste so so. However, the service is good and tables are clean. Whenever I have a chance to shop at Ikea, I’ll definitely stop by their food court to refill my energy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwswDhrb-jWbjxhQjZwvHcY0MGBO_WCXyQ8h_-&fid=0x0:0xc8855e3befc7b661"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Cathy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4K-b1pp8UkwCQabFg1c15aes6lTmBY7Kt_eMxlotNZcUAAbpK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Like most of their food but their rainbow cake is terrible, cake is not moist hard to chew and LOADS of sugar, wish they had used cheese instead of sugar coating. Avoid with young kids.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbmykrgRriMyJRIzHTc407qa8y0hdHfy3_gup5&fid=0x0:0xc8855e3befc7b661"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Ferlin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyhN9COMWbZvujGjcXtb2QJJW4o9YiV8wo-a58P4P09YCpLW8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food that we ordered were all good. The servings were big enough for their prices. Clean area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOegWoqZc6v0wASPuGy-dP4QV18zEh1JyV-yyLU&fid=0x0:0xc8855e3befc7b661"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Keely","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPhWX1e7rxg7tZFNfTBzG-8D8OSQ8F6e_R4tSsbsCqwZ5hcuri=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was there this morning. The line was long and slow, seems like they are understaffed.
The cashier who is a middle-age-Asian-woman is very rude. I greeted her with “hi”, then she looked at the soup and started scolding at me in a condescending way “YOUR SOUP IS MORE THAN ONE SCOOP I CAN TELL IT BY LOOKING AT IT! YOU CANT DO THAT IT’S NOT RIGHT!”. I’m not sure where this attitude came from as I never said anything about not paying for the double scoop (all I did was greeting her 🤷🏻‍♀️). A normal person would have said “I saw you have more than one scoop and we are charging for double scoop here as indicated by the sign”. I didn’t engage with her as there’s lots of people waiting, said nothing else, and paid for my food. After I paid for my food, she scolded at the next customer as well “YOU TOO YOU HAD MORE THAN ONE SCOOP ……” (blah blah blah and went on the whole time the next customer paying for their food). Again, none of us saying we are not paying for the double scoops (and it’s allowed as the price was indicated on the sign).
The soup bucket was also almost at the bottom at the time so my first scoop wasn’t even a full scoop🤷🏻‍♀️ if it’s a problem with the business then it shouldn’t be self-serve, or use a scale to weight it at the cashier to make it fair and square.
I only went there for breakfast and got some decoration for my home, not being the cashier’s emotional dumpster.
The cashier no was 7013899.

Update: I already DM ikea Canada on instagram and I’m hoping for any update on this issue (I.e., action on this employee) thanks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZjiRhBqKF_07b7rdPxukbIlQNKFlf04BXt5Fu&fid=0x0:0xc8855e3befc7b661"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Stella Oh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvqyQ2KS_YIN6XYOMkDtQZO2ezjEJLWRODsOzNFIWuIhCYtAL-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Try to get here either early in the morning or late at night. We didn’t have too much trouble finding parking here at 11 am on a weekend but when we left an hour and a half later, there were many drivers frantically looking for parking and someone asked for our stall the minute we started loading our purchases.

Foot traffic gets heavy around 11:30 am at the cafeteria. Because of this, it seems like they open the second service lane at that time. We waited 20 minutes to order. If you are more into satisfying your hunger than telling everyone on social media that you ate at IKEA, an egg salad sandwich is a good choice, for both the portion size and price (it’s only $3.99 whereas the Swedish meatballs are $8.99)! Also, they don’t give a Swedish flag to everyone who orders meatballs, so do keep that in mind.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Timothy Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXppglo6ZAetCQzplW2OLh2qI567m4ZgShYOz5i82egCmgzc4sM2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Very subpar experience at ikea cafeteria. The staff are quite new and inexperienced. Lady in front asked for kids meal and the staff was stunned and 5 staff members discussed among themselves back and forth on what the portion should be. With bacon or without bacon. This much eggs? Or too much? They didn’t care that there were 10-15 people in line just waiting to get food. They had to get the kids meal portion right down to the atom. If anything, indicates a very inflexible and novice management team.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlMdo3MmCGue34vX23lb98gCjQzM55NvhhzH7V&fid=0x0:0xc8855e3befc7b661"],"When":"2022-9-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Picked up a couple of food items before my flight. Unfortunately, at around 8:30 pm, they had a limited selection of their market fresh sides. I had wanted to try their maple roasted root vegetables, but had to settle for their chicken dripping baby potatoes. A single portion was $7.95. The potatoes had a good roast, and the parsley & rosemary spices were strong. However, I wished it had a richer chicken taste from the drippings as the meaty/fatty flavour wasn't very noticeable. They had a small selection of To Live For Bakery products, so I purchased an Everyday Cookie (around $5.50). No issues!

The majority of the grab and go items list their ingredients, which is helpful for those with dietary restrictions! Pricing is as expected for airports (higher than off-site). Service was friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnnwdnKgxHbz53D1DqqQjf3MX-RZGc8W6eMNND&fid=0x0:0xebdce533e6bfef87"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"devan wiancko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlbkqaV0nP_YyIUqKd7W1zYmD2Ri6ISyeUhV9VKZXV5r9gM4jyPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an amazing stopover at Vancouver Airport that truly exceeded our expectations. My girlfriend, her friend, and I initially tried to visit the Stanley Park Taphouse but were very disappointed. The atmosphere and service there did not meet our expectations, and we decided to look for a better option.

Our decision turned out to be the best choice we made. We found Pacific Farm Market and were blown away by the experience. We ordered a delicious pizza, a couple of perfectly mixed Caesars, and an exquisite espresso martini. Each item was outstanding in its own right—the pizza was flavorful and cooked to perfection, the Caesars had just the right balance of spice and tang, and the espresso martini was a delightful mix of rich coffee and smooth alcohol.

However, what truly made our visit memorable was the bartender. This wonderful gentleman had a fantastic personality and went above and beyond to make our stopover special. He was engaging, attentive, and clearly passionate about his craft. His recommendations were spot-on, and his friendly demeanor added a personal touch to our experience.

The atmosphere was relaxed and welcoming, providing the perfect setting for us to unwind before our next flight. The combination of excellent food, well-crafted drinks, and outstanding service made this a five-star experience.

If you find yourself with some time to spare at Vancouver Airport, I highly recommend stopping by Pacific Farm Market for a meal and a drink. You won’t be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-ToNnh2HvDcGbpaLvzRaB54rqEKw7HGI77Y-k&fid=0x0:0xebdce533e6bfef87"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"Farhad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZsh7rsXskoTeFBdwx-4_jSK3VIUQ0BNWwnMfqcoyfBr3tpy_n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food quality was nice, prepared fresh. The store associates were friendly and helpful. This was my 2nd time dining here. I bought chickpea stew that was warm and delicious, although it was so oily (not heart-healthy in that regard), and contained lots of tomato sauce. I also bought macaroni plus cheese that was nice as well. I paid almost $20 for this. Overall both options were good, the prices were almost ok. A bottle of water is sold about $8.5 here that is not reasonable. The previous time I bought a chocolate croissant here that was acceptable. Overall recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNq3Fv19K55_ySxjc4lJhMo7Li0yOzvsj3ATeY&fid=0x0:0xebdce533e6bfef87"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Nikita Kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAPHJEjmr4AZZdMCt-VAxI-Yq62S4wfYJufUFh1-FIF-KZ5O9i=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered food and the lady at the counter was rude and got mad when I asked about the menu. Decided to get the pizza because it was the easiest to order. The pizza was delish! The bar tender was a great guy! Very friendly and made possibly the best Moscow Mule I've had. Kudos to him. It's the airport location so be prepared to spend a good amount if money for food and drinks. I took a star off because of the rude lady at the food counter.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiKEh4gmcv4x5IhUXs03aouZ_phe22QuTQLKs0&fid=0x0:0xebdce533e6bfef87"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"Cathy Scott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5AusVxk7qAio0Bkg4UWrUuvS26PeQ-8gn9H71jfquqMrrhw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just wanted to drop a note! I travel frequently for work and pleasure, i have stop at most places in the airport over the years, but during the past year + I have made the Pacific Farm Market my stop before hopping on a flight. If I travel for business and have colleagues travel with me I bring them along (they now make this their stop with or without me).
You might ask why? Staff like Milo make the difference, they recognize us when we stop in, make us feel at home, know what we drink and always have suggestions on what we could eat with our beverages. Not pushy, but always observing and aware when we might be ready for more!
Please treat staff like Milo well, as that is exactly what we look for when we stop in for refreshments!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chantelle Harding","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW06-yQhHNrbkUt6RDsv9iTMZUOZVhNA_BVT4pJC1ZSh5p0cFWc6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in for a quick drink before my flight to Barcelona, and thanks to Milo behind the bar, I ended up staying longer than planned (and no regrets!). He whipped up two incredible drinks with flair, kept the conversation flowing, and had the perfect balance of charm and humor. If this is how my trip starts, I can’t wait to see what’s next. Cheers to Milo for kicking off my adventure on a high note!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjh8RXxyTrsGVveHU1H8D3KWTxp-5iY_OX1AnZ&fid=0x0:0xebdce533e6bfef87"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Kelly U","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURCRfsNxQBDobodc8pU1y0DeqAQis1FjO9UYy2BBrOIhIDyFw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my favourite place to spend my layovers!! Sitting at the bar in an open, friendly place helps pass the time or gives me a chance to catch up on emails. Milo is attentive and funny, and I can’t believe I fly so much that I now have a favourite YVR bartender. I’m a vegetarian and the options are plenty, and the beers cold and fresh enough to easily pass the time. My only complaint is that I can’t access this place from the international side! Looking forward to my next layover for this cafe/bar that feels like the one around the corner from home, especially with such lovely staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dave","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPZIUOsDwlBkFebhG04vj0-2yRgvhqZ8FA0OSOGGM5zHg8Nw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I've had decent coffees and pastries here. Their mocha is NOT good. Savoury muffin is a pass too. The staff move the line pretty good though.  They have seating at the bar and TVs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5KDfRdtGtUNpEK84JrqsQoMkPrCPs5wC-ldED&fid=0x0:0xebdce533e6bfef87"],"When":"2022-12-21"}]
