user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gordon Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYpk0cIhtHUvM7XXheJSxz2s3kSGL8HqlDSxLxb-fzNnM7pgBx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food is really good and has a ton of variety. I got the Portuguese style chicken rice and chicken burger. The chicken is really tender and juicy. It’s open 24/7 which is awesome and there are a lot of customers even late at night. Cash only. Added more photos from other visits","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaOLpmiAF-B_pd3qCJdN_Vc7jVhJJNSNbEy8Ee&fid=0x0:0x723922f9bf29f56f"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Judy Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKV97FGp6pvH2GB0Sbbd5vzH4RVaCgHQ1POlgKRZoLObEp2Qw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Despite the many reviews we read online, we received great service during both of our visits. The food was not bad, but nothing special. It’s a feasible option for late-night food, but there are better options available at other times.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8HdzaLXeOsOLAnXjpR0j3CuwRcgIKv4vRocT5&fid=0x0:0x723922f9bf29f56f"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Rongting Luo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoUuPmBkCCZ4u--x14TLCOW3fVhRv0PFZZ3T-BSlj2I0mcMQMi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic Chinese Cantonese foods, i ordered one of my favourite congee, fried dark Soy sauce noodles, and spicy sour soup. Everything was perfect, served very quickly as soon as we sit down. Highly recommended if you are looking for a very good Chinese foods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-QNN5sgZCyEBtAXjKzHqVypbj3UBIxvUqJHKM&fid=0x0:0x723922f9bf29f56f"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"No.9 restaurant

5300 No. 3 Road, #812, Richmond, BC V6X 2X9

I opted for a late-night meal at this location, primarily due to its 24/7 operating hours.

Food:

Pepper Salt Fried Squid:

A standout dish and one I highly recommend. The squid arrived hot, with a crisp exterior and well-balanced seasoning. The flavors were satisfying and memorable. 9/10

Century Egg and Shredded Salty Pork Congee:

Among the extensive congee offerings, I chose this variety. The congee was creamy and well-seasoned, with a generous amount of ingredients packed into a small bowl. The portion size was ideal for a light bite without being overly filling. 8/10

Ambiance:

The seating was reasonably comfortable, though unremarkable. While the establishment was clean, there was an unpleasant odor lingering in the vicinity, which detracted from the overall experience. The source of the smell was unclear, but it did impact the ambiance. 5/10

Service:

The service was adequate, meeting expectations but offering nothing exceptional. It aligned with what one might anticipate from an establishment of this nature. 5/10

Pricing:

The pricing structure is mixed. While the congee was reasonably priced, the main dishes were slightly on the higher side. However, portion sizes were fair given the cost.

Drink:

Iced Almond Milk:

The drink menu offers a wide selection, but I opted for the iced almond milk. It was refreshing and enjoyable. 7/10

Verdict:

I would consider returning, primarily due to the convenience of the 24/7 hours and the availability of parking. The extensive menu also offers plenty of options for future visits.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEAxgKL2ND_kC2C_5m-XPcz3DtgA6v78XdvQpe&fid=0x0:0x723922f9bf29f56f"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Polina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWiyqoycI0Ysocr-kj8621bO4G6RrqpNlPOKg7m9EOi6JsVvyPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing. The servers are really nice and helped us decide what to get, the food is delicious and the portions are great. Their menu has literally everything and me and my family had an excellent time. Will definitely be coming back in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6mGlRNpe-QsP3spTlVgAG9YperBj7pfJ36Fyc&fid=0x0:0x723922f9bf29f56f"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"J. Lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVc0thC-iDujIZ9E4Ya3FGjxAiajh4VoiSbuoyhVWO45E221fab=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good soup I had on rainy days. Pork hock noodle soup for only $12.00 plus tax medium size bowl. Lots of meat, I'm actually surprised by the amount of meat in a bowl, I thought they're gonna be cheap on meat, 🍖 like the other restaurants. 😆 Really good soup 🍲😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhibfYdFlslJwpl1VP0EKszfasv6bpyTePHplo&fid=0x0:0x723922f9bf29f56f"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"wing ip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWatT9GFgKWeeaf2n2D4FcwN8eiVO8Fg_BArCj_SSEvm2dZlNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is a worst food that I had never eaten before. The beef looked liked rubber band which is so difficult to chew with my mouth. I think it was a fresh beef and cooked on daily, but I don’t think so. I hope they can make it better and improve the quality of the food!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGE1gqdrC_g8b2YkzwOerUr-VinWltZ4V6pBvO&fid=0x0:0x723922f9bf29f56f"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Ruby Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3LrrVwi-mDW5WQKHXOamURBu-eEORn8gD4ZzWQ3IMFrFb_ts=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you live in Vancouver, you must have heard of No.9 Restaurant, which is a famous and iconic Hong Kong cafe opening 24/7 in Richmond. We arrived Vancouver at 3am and drove straight to No.9 to satisfy our late night HK food cravings.

Their menu is a thick chunky booklet and I was impressed by the insane variety of food they serve. No wonder it has been a neighborhood favorite for over two decades.

I don’t really eat at late night, so I only had half of the sandwich and a few sips of the milk tea. The corned beef egg sandwich (鹹牛肉蛋治) is the best I’ve had in North America, comparable to those in Hong Kong. The bread was lightly toasted, and the scrambled egg was so fluffy and loaded with corned beef.

HK style milk tea (港式奶茶) was rich and creamy. It came with a big glass so it justified the price.

I was also craving for something hot and homey at midnight. I got the ginger steamed milk (薑汁燉雙皮奶), hoping it could recall the taste of my favorite cha chan tang (Australian Dairy Company) in HK. The texture was apparently not super silky and smooth, but good enough to cure my homesick.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzA69FIc44zXCGVu6udNRKTif0KiI8-vNrjRCe&fid=0x0:0x723922f9bf29f56f"],"When":"2024-7-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"erica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQdTLxQq3O3Cmha4MP5ofAdkzIilRUOF8AZcCWZgph7QL3mA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered a caramel brule latte. The server asked me particularly if I wanted whipped cream on top. I said "of course!" She goes "that's right. That's the whole point of ordering this" then we laughed. THEN, when I returned to my car, settled my 6 months old baby and his giant stroller and wanted to enjoy my drink, guess what? THERE IS NO WHIPPED CREAM ON TOP OF MY LATTE! Nice. Made my day. Disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqv7edIn7vXveVqnCH7qM5ftlad_XwMDHQIh2F&fid=0x0:0x5cbd3ae03e5b54d8"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Imtiyaz Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJaLx6tppLtyBsTwoQqGlcrr4HVpQgYPZD0iIvY5P8B4aX40Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at Starbucks on 8111 Ackroyd Rd Richmond, thanks to Vijay, the barista. Vijay was incredibly friendly, engaging, and made me feel genuinely welcomed. His knowledge of the menu and attention to detail were impressive, and he provided exceptional customer service with a warm, courteous approach. It’s always a pleasure to see someone so passionate about what they do. Vijay truly elevated my Starbucks visit—he’s an absolute star! Highly recommend stopping by if you want great coffee and outstanding service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-fGe-RJidPbr7dQb7n29tuhnUj7FuRK-5hy0p&fid=0x0:0x5cbd3ae03e5b54d8"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Tammy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUIsyHPNMHN7nX8WZzvEm9Lv8GWwdtKN15LYF9P03Ph6BhjLC2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Today was free holiday red cup day and I was so excited.
I ordered 3 hot chocolate through the mobile app right after 5:30am.
When I picked it up, they said they can’t give me the red cup. I showed them the qualified drink list on their website but they still refused to give me.
I asked if I can cancel my 3 hot chocolate and order another qualified drinks but they didn’t  like to do it. They weren’t even busy cuz it was  before 6am. Well, I wasn’t going to get any if I don’t get the red cup. I just wasted my time and money for the drink which I don’t even really care at 6am in the morning.
It supposed to show appreciation to the customer cuz Christmas coming ended up making customer confuse and upset.
Hope nobody else would have the same experience as me…..
By the way hot chocolate was really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7lUsm1IIG0Zs-ieJeEC7hNpGloySF26lRmk0K&fid=0x0:0x5cbd3ae03e5b54d8"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"IH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-JBeMdUqEOpDB4lfC2N925MXnFVb86w_GiB3MtN2Ba4i16omB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my favorite Starbucks in Richmond:) I often place mobile orders here. Today, I arrived later than the estimated pickup time, so my coffee was cold when I got there. I asked if they could reheat it, and they immediately offered to make me a fresh one instead! The staff was friendly plus their coffee is always perfect","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ISMET KIZILKULA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXe3zQcS8YAQR2uI-oQD83ehQ_kNuua4bpYW_g_MYuj1NGkyEwu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":""I have been regularly visiting Starbucks for about ten years now, and I've seen various branches in Turkey, Greece, and the United States. However, the staff at this branch in Richmond are exceptionally warm and welcoming. They make you feel like you're having coffee with your family at home. Especially the manager, who is incredibly humble. Today, unexpectedly, he offered me a complimentary treat, and I was deeply touched. I want to thank them for maintaining the brand's integrity and for their respectful and polite customer interactions. My heartfelt congratulations to the employees, and I wish them continued success. Thank you for being there; you're truly appreciated."","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8Atc4qj6ykno4IdGodiV3Nf4BiwfWIwSu0SEF&fid=0x0:0x5cbd3ae03e5b54d8"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"insanire","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIa85IBUlJppyCFq4XrTqi0kFahKKUdkIQaSE4YHiALLIRbqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"what’s the point of having starbucks next to your place when all the drinks they make are disgusting. They always burn their espresso and mess up non espresso drinks one way or another. The only once i got my drink made right was 5 month ago. Today they forgot to add any syrup to my matcha and burnt espresso for my macchiato. This location needs better baristas","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jayne Vos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFgAr_yc_Q3kiLXNHQ23km5V4OboTQK336EclqQskkvAbLR3s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Placed a mobile order and it said it was ready in 5-10 minutes. I got there and it said it was ready to go on my app, but there was only the food. I waited 15 minutes for the drinks, and while i was waiting I saw one barista make my drink, then leave it on the counter for 5 minutes, then another barista put on a lid without finishing the drink, and when I told her it was missing things, she completely brushed off my comment. I got the attention of another barista and she finished the drink for me.
There should be a better system at this location. I understand that it is busy and one person can only do so much, but simply communicating and having good customer service would make such a difference.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eric W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-xjFGLc5fl9TzyOT84GhGl-PW32pobjXYCXUmXLQOsJC1_9Yl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"worst starbucks ever

At 10 a.m., I used the Starbucks app to place an order for a coffee. Then, I drove to Starbucks and waited for the coffee. At first, I thought it was crowded, so it might take a little longer. However, as time passed, more and more people who ordered on-site after me received their coffees. After waiting for another five minutes, at 10:25, I asked the staff about my order. The staff didn’t say anything, just checked the system for my order, and then told me to wait another five minutes. After that, it took less than one or two minutes for my coffee to be ready. I seriously suspect they forgot my order. I don’t understand the point of ordering a coffee through the app 30 minutes in advance. Is the person who orders through the app the one who ends up waiting the longest? The app is entirely pointless and has wasted my time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMz_jqdUSMdGrvv4eayuOv3xs5yhj8GF6NAD8Lu&fid=0x0:0x5cbd3ae03e5b54d8"],"When":"2024-9-21"}]

[{"Name":"MG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5IuvbcCs20FrxwffXgNoi9JVbcn4MAl7HI2Gk0AWkPl8uhuU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is based on my experience today. I went here to order 5 drinks in total. Paid $30+, Tina the supervisor who took my order and was so very impatient and rude when she was taking my order. I ordered the new one "Iced pecan crunch oat latte" to try it out and when i got them and take a sip it taste water as there is only a few ice in there. I called the store to let her know that the "iced pecan crunch oat latte" thats she made is wrong as it taste like water and all she keeps talking that
"they follow the recipe" which is i dont think so they were following it. The custumer service at this location was so bad and racism aswell. As when you were trying to order they speak to their language in Mandarin while taking order. I attached the photo of my drinks when i got it.
Please do train your staff properly as she dont deserve a "supervisor" position when her custumer service is not that even good and her work ethics as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxrxWgC69FeOHZrjJQ8kPihhxP5EZmBpijMvy3&fid=0x0:0xc42b89d89561898b"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Enid Niu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfCoPpBuHSjVw2gH6WJHUJGMuidn_U2QleXwRSXclaLK1lLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The staff at this Starbucks had a very poor service attitude. When I approached the front desk to order food, the two girls stared at me blankly and did not ask what I wanted. They didn't speak until I spoke. Their expressions were very disdainful.  I will never buy coffee from this store again. It completely ruined my good impression of Starbucks. Terrible hospitality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Catherine Tseng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVJHMKmleEmjwpqAN-WjI_WJps9FU65U1kH-elxOpLmTBa1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a cold brew here, and unfortunately, I watched the barista water it down halfway through. Definitely not what I was expecting. I’d rather take my money to Blundell Starbucks! Their drinks are consistently the best in Richmond.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rosene Mckenzie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMbuyxSEe7rUXOu0oGgI7HbeS8gii-Vvpgm9wgJgN4Vw0kKw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went for a walk this morning and grab a coffee here, latté to be exact. Coffee tasted like heated milk, not even a hint of coffee. Both cashier and barista looks like they having the worst terrible morning of their life, they are both not responding ! Like in a coma. I don’t know why they are working in a service industry. Poor Starbucks. I will never purchase coffee in this place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jobanjeet singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtc9sRN_71lmMvHHkfxie8IUkWRki-63LgShGuEu2ZJwzmX6Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This starbucks inside the T&T market. Good service ..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeTNzpntKAkdxSUkdHgYyLgwmEBVyltJstbkFj&fid=0x0:0xc42b89d89561898b"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Jiggin Joy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFMhqUoBeub5xLpSOYKfepWr7Uqh8h-VGzBQP-Zr08ycF6FOM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The cashier visibly  rolled his eyes at me when I asked him to use the correct milk for my order. I confronted him, which I’m not sure he had this before because he acted surprised that I would call him out on his behaviour. I  asked for a refund because I felt so uncomfortable to even be there after his extremely poor service.  Very rude. If I can give zero stars I would.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sara S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUW_Gz9QZqafD5n0dRwFh51TQU2npX_K5-VvZJwtS1KV99_dn1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is based on my one time experience I’ve had today. I mobile ordered my regular drink in the morning and went to work and realized it didn’t taste like my usual drink which I order everyday. However, on my lunch I came back to ask if it could be remade because I had a sip and immediately thought it was too sweet. When I asked the supervisor Tina (who made my drink) she refused to make it and went down her ingredient list rather than understanding where I came from. She then went on and started speaking in Mandarin with her colleagues and making unnecessary remarks. The other two on shift have always been really nice and kind to me so they’re not the ones at fault; it was just Tina that had the bad customer service. The other two were just listening to their supervisor. I was extremely upset as I usually never have this kind of experience and I’m a regular customer of this location.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"viola lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUo3erzXKhK141JhRODNcUmBtfXtOeoXTQulLG_a6gIitE6yHc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I bought small mug ornaments in this store. I went back to exchange cause one of them lost its red stripe. Few days later, i found the package is not completed without the sku label. I’m collector. I hope my mugs with the sku label. I went back to ask if I can change it. I’m surprise I got the answer is 我已經給你換過一次了，不能再換了！而且我們沒有撕掉條碼。I’ve already let you chang one time not second time. The recipe doesn’t mention change one time only. And told me they never took off the sku label. So what happened to my mugs?
I don’t like the attitude just like she gave me the chance to change it.
Yeah…….I really should checked everything when I paid.
The Starbucks customer service told me I can do exchange after purchasing not only one time.
This store doesn’t follow it.
I don’t wanna talk too much in store. I told myself never mind just a bad shopping experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMB446uFgRZxO4d2SG1NyQXuUCsGzuvXwpGPptK&fid=0x0:0xc42b89d89561898b"],"When":"2023-6-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"N Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXOpc5ihGvxzyNVLN3C7gyShCZbUKufmBFsK7BGewsCgAIv0BVTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good service, good value. Delicious food. The boar ribs were super tender. The seafood curry was delicious. The lobster soup had real chunks of lobster and was velvety. The mussels were very fresh. The raspberry pancotta was fresh and great after a delicious meal. Their story fried linguini is a great combination of Italian and Chinese cooking.

I would say without the combo, it is on the pricier side and the meal did leave me quite thirsty as it was a bit in the saltier side. I'll say the food was delicious but I'm not quite sure if there was anything super stand out that would make me come back any time soon. It is definitely worth the visit.

Service was very attentive and they did not kick us out even though they were closing shop. It definitely deesrves to be more full than it was. With the combo, the value was quite good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0vq2EWJEDXawYg3IhVsDsL48ED6CKtYtmCLHf&fid=0x0:0x5e2ef173da2a3c86"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Christina Reis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLn53-1ttpC7fLDqMp5eRmBLAxZi47puLV1zk4TWRtAuBPq0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love coming here as it’s a hidden gem!  The food is amazing and and the ambience is great. Seats about 30 people giving an intimate and warm.   Must have the shoestring fries!  Thanks Eddie!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8Mk6oMBCOtNGKzv0Aw1lzDOF3c4wCnnlvgU6h&fid=0x0:0x5e2ef173da2a3c86"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Sandy Y. (CameraGourmet)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ9J8ig1HwUQBJbXRdKDIwR0OrTw3YtQtyHDEaRuCN8XnUDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My recent visit to Shoestring Cafe left me with mixed feelings. It is located in an industrial area across from the Richmond Driving Range. The cafe has a unique charm but falls short in some areas.

The atmosphere is cozy and inviting, perfect for a casual meal.  The menu offers a decent selection of meat and seafood options, but I found the food to be average at best.  While some dishes were tasty, others felt salty and overcooked.

One positive aspect was the combo deal, which allows you to add $20 to your entree for a full-size appetizer and dessert.  This option value was appreciated.

The service was friendly, and we appreciated that the servers spoke Cantonese, adding a nice touch to the experience.

📝📝
Food:  🍽 🍽 🍽  Can Try!
Service: 👩‍🍳👩‍🍳👩‍🍳👩‍🍳
Kids: 👶👶👶 A-OK for kids-- there is no kids' menu, but generous portions are available for sharing.  The venue is small, with closely spaced tables, which is not ideal for kids sensitive to noise.
Price: 💲💲 $50-$100 each person (dinner - birthday celebration)
Presentation: 📷📷
Parking: 🚗🚗Limited free parking is available in the plaza, but there is plenty of street parking nearby.
Tips:
📝 Recommend making reservations weeks in advance.
📝 No alcohol license, but can communicate with the restaurant and pre-apply for a temporary Special Event Permit through the Government of BC website.
📝 Serve complimentary freshly baked bread with homemade shrimp paste and butter.
Would I Return: Maybe 🤔","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9mRrHELsnI35oioTfcBAAwG-hWwBoJXOTub4b&fid=0x0:0x5e2ef173da2a3c86"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Shoestring Cafe

Located at 4611 No 6 Rd #180, Richmond, BC V6X 1Z7, The Shoestring Cafe is a hidden gem offering an exceptional dining experience.

Our meal consisted of three courses (x2), including:

•	1 appetizer
•	1 main
•	1 dessert

Additionally, we ordered a side of seafood and corn chowder.

We began our meal with warm, freshly baked bread accompanied by two distinct sauces. The homemade touch was delightful and set a positive tone for the evening.

Seafood and Corn Chowder

The chowder featured sea scallops, tiger prawns, fresh corn kernels, and cream. This was one of the best seafood and corn chowders I have ever tasted. The seasoning was impeccable, and the soup was rich and creamy. It unquestionably deserves a perfect score.

Rating: 10 out of 10

Appetizers

1.	Grilled Jumbo Tiger Prawns with Corn Cakes

The tiger prawns were impeccably crispy and well-seasoned, providing a delightful start to the meal. The corn cakes added a wonderful texture and complemented the prawns perfectly.

Rating: 8 out of 10

2.	Baked Scallops with Lobster Sauce and Parmesan

This dish was undoubtedly a highlight of the evening. The scallops were baked to perfection and paired with a creamy, flavorful lobster sauce. The addition of Parmesan added a wonderful depth of flavor. It was an exquisite combination that I thoroughly enjoyed.
Rating: 10 out of 10

Mains

1.	Sea Bass

The sea bass was expertly cooked and seasoned. It was juicy and flavorful, making for an exceptionally enjoyable dish. The presentation was also impressive, adding to the overall dining experience.

Rating: 8 out of 10

2.	Rack of Lamb

Ordered rare, the rack of lamb was substantial, juicy, and delicious. It was a standout dish that I relished. The accompanying sides were equally well-prepared, enhancing the overall dish.

Rating: 9 out of 10

Desserts

1.	Chocolate Soufflé

This dessert featured dark chocolate, brandy, and vanilla ice cream. It was rich, indulgent, and thoroughly enjoyable. The soufflé was light and airy, with a perfect balance of flavors.

Rating: 9 out of 10

2.	Blueberry and Mango Panna Cotta

The panna cotta was sweet and creamy, topped with a luscious blueberry puree. The mango added a refreshing twist, making it a satisfying conclusion to the meal.

Rating: 8 out of 10

Ambiance

Despite its small size, the restaurant was cozy, inviting, and exuded a charming atmosphere. The decor was tasteful, creating a warm and welcoming environment.

Service

The service was exemplary. Our server was professional and attentive, thoroughly explaining the menu and checking on us multiple times throughout the meal. The staff’s knowledge and friendliness significantly enhanced our dining experience.

Rating: 9 out of 10

Price

For the quality of the food, the price was slightly above average. However, it was justified by the excellent dining experience. The value for money was evident in the quality of ingredients and the skillful preparation of each dish.

Rating: 3 out of 5

Tips

It is important to note that The Shoestring Cafe does not serve any special drinks such as wine or alcoholic beverages.

Verdict

Despite its modest size, The Shoestring Cafe excels in providing high-quality food and outstanding service. It is truly a hidden gem in Richmond and comes highly recommended. We will certainly be returning in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPB3kKmZSNGCNhmyQ0cZqPn3h3vp-t6ANuVqElV&fid=0x0:0x5e2ef173da2a3c86"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"M Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJi4yGvZ0EIiVvGbJvBEwvfQZdCqEuSHad_kcYBnGNV_aeLYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Western flair cuisine cooked by Asians.  The food was hot and tasty.  The service was good.  They could use an extra pair of hands in the front though.  The place is small and cozy.  However,  they need to put up some acoustical panels to reduce the noise level in the small place.  When the restaurant is full,  the noise level is unbearable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCDstBSVyo6BmQIDn_CDRMvvmw2XL7Hi-KG2_x&fid=0x0:0x5e2ef173da2a3c86"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Jack Yuen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhRPpXHdrFGpSfFPj2Llvg9rACCkMWbpnKawexr7OBRxKhKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Chinese chef made high end steak and you can't find such quality from the those Hong Kong style tea Cafe. Chance is you need to wait for a seat as the restaurant is rather small. Another disappointed there is no wine list and I guess they don't have the alcohol license. By the way we order from soup, steak, pasta and desert, none of them are disappointed but I was hoping the saving could be a bit bigger","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBxXAlO0yXX9fAg7pKfoAvTIJqkTrc6LZaTgMU&fid=0x0:0x5e2ef173da2a3c86"],"When":"2023-11-30"},{"Name":"Jamie Jin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlepHCWdoqih1jl4dnAMo7ntd9I3m4VnkN__YLq5zodAqxuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have been there quite a few times and tried out their tasting menu this time. It never disappointed.

Got the bread with lobster butter to start with, then four seafood dishes and the wine marinated quail. Really fresh seafood and quail was tender and juicy. We got really full after the 5 course and didn’t order any main or desert.

Very attentive services and low key atmosphere for friend and family gatherings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsak_bydFqEAgQ_KMW6iQK48eqOaamlZNx9l0p&fid=0x0:0x5e2ef173da2a3c86"],"When":"2023-1-10"},{"Name":"Mark Heywood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXT2tNfg41m-9ytBntosC5AfC-XXG7yi7NwPSjIwOIYT8LFkA7h=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to this place on a whim not knowing what to expect and based on the reviews. While the area (#6 Road) is not a place you would expect to dine out at, the restaurant proved the journey to be worth while. The staff were very friendly, welcoming and knowledgeable. The food was essentially Italian with hints of Asia. Each dish we had was excellently prepared, both in taste and in presentation.  Clearly the chef was top notch as everything was cooked and seasoned just right. The wild boar was the favourite. One thing we noted, was no alcohol was served. Not sure why, as a bottle of red would be excellent with the wild boar.

A great place for a date or 2 or three couples. We will be back.","Images":null,"When":""}]

The quality of the food has dropped alot since the new management.\n\nAnd to the Opa HQ comment below, you know how to get ahold of us reviewers, so if you really wanted us to share more info, you would reach out to us via email yourself, instead of simply saying it here making ppl think you have tried to resolve the issue.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenny Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVrOH7irHGAdgXOTBUteIxwJFN7LZFHWQ6Ywq-dO1eJ-Urdega=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We always come to buy the Lamb wrap. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"J Lum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjVDSF6GLpOt9TbGVIYbPyuME5IGvtBYEUCly96a8repQNOavA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Offering a nice 5 dollar combo set. Comes with taiyaki and soft serve ice cream. Matcha flavour not as strong but still good and the fresh made taiyaki is generous with the red bean filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6JLFrFWBIpzGIRoi6hgCOCn2GvUCn88xbTvYY&fid=0x0:0x87e71bde084071c1"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Venice Boulay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9jALwYwhV6kRFfSIaIH3475DH_nQWVfmJVb-OGi9vzxrf3rKT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This crêpe café has quickly become my go-to spot—I’m here almost every week! I always order the strawberry brownie crêpe paired with a matcha latte, and it never disappoints. This place has a cute special vibe, with the food replica display, the fenced garden screen and the pager system to call you when your order is ready.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCwNrI5Mtu8aCSEVsbwDROw9_hN1HkFXMau21y&fid=0x0:0x87e71bde084071c1"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Forest Bai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnsc43J-1KhrgIRu2_gBgTWm3XJatUIeZr4gH72IhutnZbobMk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This cafe is super cute, and is located inside Oomomo so you can have a snack after you shop. There are drinks and snacks like the taiyaki (we got them with red bean), crepes, and soft serve. The taiyaki were fresh and hot, and were filled with red bean. We made our own crepes which were good but a bit difficult to cut. The soft serve was also good but we felt it was more hard like ice cream, and the matcha flavour isn’t very strong. We enjoyed our visit here, and the workers were all really friendly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYqs_-trvgmGtbRUVRSyT3O0YpC3bsO936GnUE&fid=0x0:0x87e71bde084071c1"],"When":"2023-12-31"},{"Name":"Flora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlzbErQLVss3kGeby9sz0OkhuOyGVQdZwSlbRUxvvwLu6nZ3c7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fresh crepes and drinks! (Please Like!!👍👍👍)
For $2-7 you can get japanese styles crepes fresh off the griddle. I got the double strawberry soft ice cream crepe and my partner got the caramel choco brownie strawberry crepe. I also got an iced matcha latte and I couldn't take more than one sip. It tasted like grass and was just so horribly bitter. Not sure if I'm just not into matcha or if it was just that bad but I would not get it again. In my opinion, I didn't like the *ice cream cone* format of the crepe. I was expecting to eat it sitting down. The crepe when rolled up so tightly was chewy and unpleasant. On the otherhand the soft serve was to die for and very milky tasting. The price, presentation, and atmosphere of the cafe was great!! I would not make my way out to richmond just for these crepes because I found the batter chewy, eggy, and a tad undercooked but it's still worth a try if you're in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrtL1ye7rvI8dkbKgTUvgj1YbszT6NOMt-EiNX&fid=0x0:0x87e71bde084071c1"],"When":"2022-6-1"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quality fresh crepes made to order at prices way cheaper than the food court. Amazing presentation and large portions too! The sitting area is also well decorated with green shrubs and a light up backdrop emulating you are outside amongst greenery.

They sell both sweet and savory crepes all for $7.00 or less as well as sweet and savory melon pan buns, soft serve ice creams, and coffees.

I tried the caramel strawberry cheesecake soft serve ice creme crepe and it was amazing. It came with swirl vanilla and green tea soft serve with real matcha bits, fresh strawberry slices, a slice of plain cheesecake, and caramel sauce all on a giant rolled up crepe.

Highly recommend if you visit Oomomo or Aberdeen mall. I'm surprised it's not more crowded... Perhaps it's because it's kind of like hidden and no one knows about it?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrN-VOQTr1dcR4vuotb2IZlkJQw4vp_Xm5GUzh&fid=0x0:0x87e71bde084071c1"],"When":"2022-1-25"},{"Name":"Jon Lo (VancityLolz)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyHXIvO6zjUGBm2q5mj88BnbYXYXFce_0_r9hk7c_P-UzKlHQRTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Matcha ice cream was good. Crepe was tasty but a little bit too thick, would have been even better if it was thin. Taiyaki was soft and crispy and well filled with red bean.

The price was good and the seating comfortable and not too busy on a Friday evening.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcf2SHQ9KoEc6d2pedExg0tYwkYUXAamLxvVst&fid=0x0:0x87e71bde084071c1"],"When":"2023-10-9"},{"Name":"Madison G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZsEld-Yz5a2Swm5LesjF83lo03ZXPGgujeQvQiLn6WLaIuGx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came all the way from Coquitlam to try this place out and I’m so glad we did ! It is SO delicious. Aswell the customer service is amazing ! They didn’t have cheese cake the day we came and the sweet woman at the front offered us caramel on the house because they ran out which is so kind. The prices are great ( $2-7$ for the crepes) and they have drinks aswell. The portion sizes are the right amount. Will definitely be coming back again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVlrJZc2PNlyOewEcRvW1MFtnJcrU2gLTE4Liq&fid=0x0:0x87e71bde084071c1"],"When":"2022-10-10"},{"Name":"JT Travel and Photography","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVy3F6hVnlGcw2pTlxXcsAiYcw2E6E3JP7-YUbKqE4eDVB5LCh8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This sweet little café is located inside the Oomomo store at Aberdeen Centre in Richmond, B.C.

They specialize in crêpes and soft serve ice cream. We didn’t notice it as first because it’s tucked in the corner of the store.  The dining area has 3 tables that seat 4 each so a maximum of 12 people can hang out in the café at a time.  They have a beautifully lit backdrop on one side of the shop which really contributes to the cozy ambience.

I’m not a big crêpe person so I ordered the cheesecake sundae instead.  Initially I thought it would just be cheesecake-flavoured ice cream with some oreo sprinkles.   I was pleasantly surprised when I received my order.  There was an actual slice of cheesecake in my sundae! The ice cream was rich, thick, and delicious.  It was not too sweet, which I loved.  They drizzled it with caramel syrup and the bottom of the cup was lined with a thick layer of crushed Oreos.  It’s the perfect dessert.  Simply delicious!

Apart from the top-notch dessert, what’s great about this café was the staff that worked there.  When we arrived, a lot of people were ordering desserts.  There was only one person behind the counter.  She was the one taking the orders and making them as well.  What amazed me was her demeanor and ability to multi-task.  She was pleasant to everyone who came to order, she always had a smile on her face, answered any questions customers had about their menu, and made sure patrons didn’t wait too long to order.  Once she was done receiving all the orders, she proceeded to make them all. She was fast and efficient but did not sacrifice quality at all.  The orders came beautifully presented and just as they appeared in the photos.  Her name is Zoe.  She’s an absolute gem and really adds value to that business.  I highly recommend this café.
We’ve been back several times since our first visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMW_1bbef69vJElM9BFC-A-A-I9xxeqzSJklc5B&fid=0x0:0x87e71bde084071c1"],"When":"2022-4-24"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"R David Anthony","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2yBUuEQP06V9J7oQMcPXFi8PcG7eIO658whvwindEzEJUQCw6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Somewhat out of the way if your flight is not departing from this particular wing of YVR, this was our second visit to this hole in the wall (which no longer operates under the name Java U Cafe).  We enjoyed our vegan wraps and cappuccinos.  I also purchased an almond croissant but it must have been at least a day old and it was rather stale.\n\nThe service was good and the prices comparatively reasonable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maxim London Gorshkov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlpWv6dsDbLr-lNZ-2HJXCJo7lZ9svkrRMGoc2jCU484qbDl5FaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Vegan wrap wasn't edible since the tomatoes were slimy and had a foul smell, after clearly being chilled and warmed up over and over again. The parfait was decent but not worth the airport prices.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maxime De Guise","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJP9tqD9X1DXrex3QbTtPfc8WJ2HVMTMDv5906bAcanuJ5L5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Really bad service, they had nothing but just received chocolatine and croissant. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Bri G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_d9MZVk6NEsD3j9u47PSlmzO-GrumfKJQg0DEWtuWsOzRROk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an absolutely awesome experience.  So glad we did the afternoon autumn tea set. The onigri was so good! It was all good. The stunning plating. Felt very special.

One of the best parts was the staff. Super nice people all of them.  In particular, our waitress Mia( I think . Not sure if i heard wrong. We went Nov. 1st at 230pm). She was so kind, diligent in our tea and very helpful with all the questions we asked about where to put shoes, about food and dishes ect. 10/10 service pushed this place to full stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIpgERitSMNPvPVyZJK6VAus1woGcV7i2vu3Cv&fid=0x0:0x5cf0fb3964ec903"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We booked the table in 30 mins after they opened so it wasn't busy yet. A warm welcome greeted by the staff. Clean and organized, everything looked nice. We booked high tea to celebrate our daughter's birthday. Because we love to try high tea so some for kids, some for adults, perfect! Everything looked good. What a good experience to try Japanese high tea! And all the recommendations about what is good for kids, if they should have or shouldn't, appreciated it! The only thing that I think they should do is change the washroom lock, move it down more  because it's a bit too high for kids. And also difficult to unlock for kids. My daughters got stuck inside because it was difficult to unlock for them. Even me, I had a problem unlocking it. You have to put the door out to be able to unlock it so my friend put the door from outside for my kids to unlock the door. Anyway, we all had such a great time so thank you very much! Oh! I love green tea so I tried all their green tea menus, liked them all! They are not cheap on the ingredients.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQUUMn9j2XVRGx1j_zmf9bdNI51t6GEZcXvj4R&fid=0x0:0x5cf0fb3964ec903"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Leanna Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-SXyk3Kx1735OiIr1tgjifqKKjDGVUvlOKwRxhFYCtDjEz6O6zQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's hard to find high tea options with sweets that aren't too sweet so I'm glad we came across Tsujiri. Although the place has limited seating, we were able to reserve a table in the tatami section which I recommend as it's quieter and aesthetically pleasing. We got seated quite quickly and they started us off with the tea. We found the tea to be too sweet and couldn't make it less sweet no matter how much water we added. The tea was a blend of a black tea with Korean honey Yuja cha from T&T. Tasty but too sweet. All the savoury and sweet items arrived all at once. They were beautifully presented although some of the sweet items were beginning to melt when we got to them. We had 3 people and the amount of food was more than enough. The savoury items were better than your typical high tea sandwiches. I think 1 more savoury item would've balanced out the menu more. Our favourites were the unagi inari for the savoury item and the yogurt/ice cream parfait with cornflakes and brown sugar pearls for the sweet items as the different textures made it a fun experience to eat. Didn't care for the mochi Dango on a stick as it was too chewy and flavorless. We couldn't finish it all so we ended up packing some of the sweets to go. The service was friendly when we were able to get their attention but it was quite difficult as we were sitting at the back. The total for 3 people (3 sets) came to $120 which is good value for the price and experience. I would come again to try another set.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1ASFIsSRBIY_apq-pZl6MyLWsf507CW-F1SLM&fid=0x0:0x5cf0fb3964ec903"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Sinyo ganteng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK6DhObLW3StVcJ_e9Ph42mdmAq5cSoW-d536hao-jSu7WAn8I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the best  Japanese matcha, from their cakes to their drinks are made for perfection. I've been there several times and still want to go back. Richmond Tsujiri, I think it is better than others' locations. I gave the atmosphere 3 stars due to its always crowded. The table needs to have a reservation. Else, you may need to wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMs3VkI6K5ktDL7eJbDqWOZkkwZ3ToeGv8Rorx3&fid=0x0:0x5cf0fb3964ec903"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Branden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIs6a_R5xAIaJ3H2Q6Ffpj_MclDRcJQiQ0Lkja_94WV7pr_tw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went for high tea. Good selection, good tea, good atmosphere although it was too cold.

Food selection was good but some desserts were still slightly frozen. Service was okay, the waitress did not explain to us what were eating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdRf9eDV5y1JgB1hl082nJh0H_1iqZiKNiL3Kc&fid=0x0:0x5cf0fb3964ec903"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Zephyr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi0Xbpfu6tRkPw0IoGrJ0CmwuI_fq3bZplujLoTo1QVvPthPHi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tsujiri Richmond is a Japanese restaurant that offers a variety of matcha and hojicha beverages, along with traditional Japanese dishes such as soba noodles.

I tried the matcha ice cream, which featured a distinct matcha flavor with a subtle bitterness. The brown sugar added a nice sweetness that complemented the matcha. As I reached the bottom, there was additional brown sugar, making the overall flavor slightly sweeter. The dessert also included sweet cereal and soft pearls, adding interesting textures.

While the matcha ice cream was enjoyable, it didn't particularly stand out as exceptional. It’s a pleasant dessert that I might consider having again if I happen to be in the area, but it’s not something I’d make a special trip for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpOrR_EE9fngLfpJBx9UEFRMF3pGVXZzx-qsOq&fid=0x0:0x5cf0fb3964ec903"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Soojung Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0VgVSLiu0hA_KXN2UPR1cfNMrtFH3J6vQ9X825HDcPyDg1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went so many time this cafe! drink is good and match Cheesecake also super good. And we enjoyed several times high-tea.
At first, the quality of the food was good, but I could feel that the quality of the food was getting worse. This part is a little disappointing, but other than that, it‘s satisfying","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNL7_MdOyUv-naCofNDZAkV2YMMeLxaA3Wivdnh&fid=0x0:0x5cf0fb3964ec903"],"When":"2024-2-6"},{"Name":"Yuki Koi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlZs9LPQXdFOiluwjpoSCsUwrTPGNtLq82ldvGSnLzYdwpCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I wanted to buy a Father’s Day cake and I was immediately interested in the green forest cake for its beautiful design. But as soon as I received the cake, it was totally different from the picture 😭. I was definitely disappointed in the presentation. The cream was not evenly spread on the back of the cake; making it look messy. “Happy Father’s Day” was messily written on the chocolate. I could see they were rushing as all the other cake had been messily written too. I was told that the cake was different because they haven’t updated the pictures for a long time. The workers there just kinda stood around not knowing what to do while one lady was doing most of the work. Overall, the store was clean and all but the cake was really disappointing. Next time, please email or call if you are changing anything to the cake. I would definitely choose another store that does a better job for $75.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7Hqs5UOoaGyXvRdc-_A-nXCgZkhoN5xTJmyyi&fid=0x0:0x5cf0fb3964ec903"],"When":"2024-6-17"}]

[{"Name":"Eric Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH012PRZYz9f3OZ8gkvrj3UZJEs4DtJ4VopXO9-se-RsbFDVU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The French Toast is something you can grab quickly in this food court. It tastes great and affordable too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrTEA4BdqhcfJhlCUmpunn1GJQ5b2lGJ_P8gnJ&fid=0x0:0xbe799d2ae0868d0d"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Mark Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK013A6TM5Le2iVdQPHPEdhpJekGRPFgo9Lg1TAIeu9E3XRGNG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered the minced beef in Russian Borscht soup with macaroni.  I love HK Russian Borscht soup.  This food court stall actually has better Russian Borscht soup than the HK style restaurant I tried in Richmond.  For $8, I'm a happy man.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuvCjUdEpEKMTTZpY_mgLJ4AWpMCmufSzwxnVz&fid=0x0:0xbe799d2ae0868d0d"],"When":"2023-5-2"},{"Name":"Jacqueline Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfkQmcGPrGZ9uA8ErZR7RC6e4jmu_1B_sU6xbmi0551rUxzshxxw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The food taste sooooo bad OMG! I had to throw it away and get new things. I could have used my 30 bucks in somewhere else which will be much much worthwhile.

Nothing has taste even the drinks lol
The ovaltine tastes like they put tiny bits of powder in to a bucket of tap water. It literally tastes like the water you drink after drinking real ovaltine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6gPktZV7aipdt2WuykOlF3WNXhEryG4JNgdIs&fid=0x0:0xbe799d2ae0868d0d"],"When":"2023-8-28"},{"Name":"James Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzKbTqfGC0MxDU4yFu0wkRIo6rJhMRuel4f1sHyihLN5ljxpCc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was great. $10 special. Very tasty. It's amazing they kept prices low during these times of insane inflation (we have to thank government's reckless irresponsible monetary and fiscal policies for that). Would definitely pick this place again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeSZIWHCryaYBJKMbhkshTLdQySqPidze8MZGG&fid=0x0:0xbe799d2ae0868d0d"],"When":"2022-7-1"},{"Name":"KT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMygczddxuI4a92C2Ugr42x635CpGtQdIDw3VekXKUfhJMpcZf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The soy sauce stir fried noodle is quite large than what I have expected. The porridge is just taste ok. Overall the place here is like grab and go or when you are alone and can’t think of what to eat. You sure can come around this Parker place to grab some Chinese food. I think there are dishes that can be tasty but haven’t tried yet. The price is decent as compared to other stall because the food portion is quite large.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAdHg1zxuJLRii6fC7sEPJG90L4yVsCC3o-85e&fid=0x0:0xbe799d2ae0868d0d"],"When":"2018-9-19"},{"Name":"Kalvin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYzAZd-0_JeniSNljNxgImCwzlXWbe6PzaDeAXT6_nhg5vP5E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Best bang for your buck for the selection of food you get. Service wasn't the greatest but the food tasted delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWmjfqgv9ot9lAgQGdTBfoDyzjBu-qk6R7SlI7&fid=0x0:0xbe799d2ae0868d0d"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place serves a solid classic breakfast with all the fixings you want for a reasonable price. The food taste and quality is exactly average/okay. $6.00 got me a slice of brown toast, a piece of fried African style chicken, a slice of tomato with mayo, and two eggs. A good enough kinda meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTaafiognMgHRiZFju3DiSsxcSeGeB8Si2b7OA&fid=0x0:0xbe799d2ae0868d0d"],"When":"2021-3-24"},{"Name":"CY Siu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM3Ctylp7Mrn5uab0RojAoPMaVbcTi3Moq_j_tgDTvPUHYdsdr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Cheap and good food. Typical set up of a chinese food court. The food comes quick. Nothing too special but a good go to spot for food if youre low on time and cash.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPc-ZK509FCO6umcT2EXZ60QbuGBErpQKCq1x7v&fid=0x0:0xbe799d2ae0868d0d"],"When":"2019-8-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Edward Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJ5t1luJWZ0TXirubqGJZ41s6LG2QmSjyD9Fyi7Z2m-eTjmKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First time revisiting following COVID...still one of the better Xiao Long Bao in the GVRD, but the pan fried dumpling, despite minimal difference in taste, appearance-wise, looked markedly different, and not in a good way.   Solid food...but operating days and hours present challenges for most ...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBxdekqpjmiz6Pgtu596DLaAsDlkXFESws8kZG&fid=0x0:0x365b3613bd3ec5f6"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Teresa Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaxj0KKnHAwm3EpJhBDdHU2wk1oJVJOozOGomEkK4TcEZezeE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Very disappointing lunch today. Ordered pan fried dumplings and beef noodle soup. The beef noodle had almost no beef! Four tiny cubes of beef that I ate in 2 bites! It’s literally one piece of beef cut into four cubes. I complained about the lack of beef and the guy said they always portioned it this way. Then I look at former Google reviewer photos of the beef noodle and there’s definitely way more beef before. Very egregious shrinking of portions. Also the soup was bland and watery. The dumplings were not juicy either. Not sure if the ownership changed but the quality of food and service deteriorated significantly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcM2uxSDNHPyPc0oq1j0A_NRi1v7KMV4dH2gU&fid=0x0:0x365b3613bd3ec5f6"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Mustang Marauder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWx5j8EX8z14QXjNA1cllBB0VCd1dP9vvussYi9txglNQc85GGR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is fresh and high quality. The staff is friendly and helpful. Restaurant is not a fancy place but the place is clean and tidy.
You need to place your order at the counter and the food is served to you on the table.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMY2Ck0HP3dbrIdGf2K3aHQxJmt8UmPhDh9u3nt&fid=0x0:0x365b3613bd3ec5f6"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great Shanghaiese food and comfortable sitting in office area

It’s like a food court need to pay up front when order at the counter
Dumpling was juicy and portion was decent
Coffee was surprisingly good
Some free parking spot right in front of the restaurant
Server didn’t had a big smile but he’s seriously doing his job well, he cleaned every table right as soon as last customer left the place was clean
👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYySNl_U5W_sOcMU0axnIXmA8yP-LFJKv3Egz_&fid=0x0:0x365b3613bd3ec5f6"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Leon Zhao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfTeSOwrqgZnbN1IDgqsoDiCbT6wKkD187xjYz7sOvWlWe4xg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing! Nice small restaurant around the corner. Drove from UBC to here for an authentic Shanghainese cuisine taste. It didn’t disappoint me. Sheng Jian was as good and authentic as the ones in Shanghai, the noodles were delicious, and the soup was smooth and tasty. Defo my future go-to for Shanghainese cuisine. I was born and raised in Shanghai, so you can trust my taste. 嗲！","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsjDB2a9SX6-dzGNfZ-_HyEAPOGxIS1C_Ls_mU&fid=0x0:0x365b3613bd3ec5f6"],"When":"2024-4-3"},{"Name":"Tony Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPKcy0N8L_e03kCanD-kbqBYJvghgec1_Wu16Qs-S8YjI-PLg2nw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Walked in to an empty restaurant today and was really impressed with the Shanghai buns and fried noodle dish. The famous Xiao long bao had plenty of soup in them which tells you they're authentic. They're best eaten with a spoon. Just nibble enough to let the hot soup out into the spoon then slurp it up. The meat inside was delicious. Perfectly seasoned and tasty. The panfried buns were just as juicy. Didn't expect that but I was pleasantly surprised. Also tried their Shanghai Fried Noodles with chicken. Delicious! And the price was great too. By the time we were done, more people came in and tables filled up. Felt bessed  finding this place. It's a keeper for sure.

Update: I eat here every other week but lately the lady at the till is beginning to annoy me. I usually order my food, eat it then leave a cash tip on the table. Every time I pay upfront, she notices there's no tip and she makes a big fuss over it. She is so rude asking for the tip! On my last trip, I gave her 10% only because she expected it. If she wasn't so rude, I would have tip more. On top of that, I've been there so many times and left a tip that she would give me some slack but no. I'm just another customer to her. Disappointed with the service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkF0fmafKBNss_x3cIgzk0WWRhM09DJpchrKsD&fid=0x0:0x365b3613bd3ec5f6"],"When":"2023-11-17"},{"Name":"Peter Estrada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVw52Fx60bw34dCukF0QbSF82RCB7ujq7YTAahYaTLdvpQbj8VVtg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of those hidden gems. Located behind the ironwood mall area. It's a spot for the locals to go to who work in the area. These folks are friendly respectful and prompt with service and quality. Their good food is reasonably priced and delicious. Don't let this one pass you by. I've had their noodles, and meat on rice combos and they're quite good. I can't say enough about their house made Shanghai noodles. The fresh and perfect mouth feel.  Thank you Mama's dumplings 💗  you'll be seeing me soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlo_KGmuG4BsS-xqfneoQGxym5zyAzEsobGDp5&fid=0x0:0x365b3613bd3ec5f6"],"When":"2023-4-22"},{"Name":"Desy Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrUNUi5nBlBmUQMOU2Lo2Yu5SjMGgKZ2L2N1xVRXSvhFjaBcU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice cozy shanghai style dumpling house!

They use organic meat apparently which is different!  Their shanghai style-fried noodles are delicious!  Really like the texture and taste of it.  One thing I will note about those is that there's not enough noodle!  It's like 60% noodle, 40% veggies.  Should be at least like 75-80%!

The Pork Soup Buns are pretty good.  How are they compared to shanghai river?  I would say Shanghai river is still better but these are pretty close!

The pan fried dumplings are good, but small.  Could be larger!

The curry beef on rice is good, same with Garlic broccoli.

The pan fried soup pork buns are really good!  Must try!

UPDATE: 2023-11-09","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlGeVe3tWEFGvBYpHJTBXwFyYQhI9lDoBVjcs&fid=0x0:0x365b3613bd3ec5f6"],"When":"2023-11-10"}]

[{"Name":"Venus Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIuaI0383JsQv-D7CJ2KLZPmfFY_j3Wfc__AXktK_XefZUW3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"1. Milk frothier has been broken for days.
2. Espresso machine is acting up.
3. Staff are not very attentive regarding my order that I already repeated 3x but still missing some cream.
4. I had to wait a long time and they asked me if I can just have a regular coffee. I had to ask for the price difference and staff told me oh it’s only a difference of a dollar and 25 cents.
5. Unacceptable that machine has been broken for days and customer service is very poor.
5. To add my regular coffee was cold.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3pRNIXZ7SZzyEmy9a_alGfd8BXOLs1LRl90Ut&fid=0x0:0x49576810cac4cd56"],"When":"2023-1-19"},{"Name":"Andrea Pino-Olivares","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDHfW5CQIShXG0Q2Pw9uW-j6d53mSzuaPbenQG8OgvnErBa6_0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Prices are higher compared to other Starbucks located inside hospitals in BC.
They tend to be busy bit not too organized. I have seen faster, more efficient service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robby Achnani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsDnxYNIl1-hVyOl4m3nKfXlI-hEjtGeRh6DiM50nxl0aKNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst customer service ever i had in starbucks i ordered my drink without ice and barista made it with ice i went back and informed the girl who made my drink she opened my drink and took out all the ice cubes and handed to me this is the quantity she gave to me after taking out ice and more over what kind of customer service you guys are providing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQvSQupLzdZ81JZdPEpqQVTI2hhiIxC_LjfIrn&fid=0x0:0x49576810cac4cd56"],"When":"2023-5-30"},{"Name":"Shinn Inagaki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpF1gPQ6II9FjL7HoACMWpgmrVznxivHZdomkvTJ9wRIkWHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I love having Grande Latte & Banana Loaf 🍞","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmYq-ae9f4SqvizULyAcRZ61yhG_MqbZx27j4&fid=0x0:0x49576810cac4cd56"],"When":"2023-9-4"},{"Name":"Joseph Shalom Abbou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYS97Fn0_L2A0MyT1hQ-8674J53SuyaQL4f3EOQ8xA7BQm8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst service and Steven the manager is far from being a professional trained manager although he said that he has been working for 10 years.
No fresh baked goods.
" We can warm up for you"
,🥺 really sad.
He was trying to explain that in his location it has been like that for many years! !
A Coffee shop without fresh produce.??
Joseph","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Crispin Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0J33Kl0fQBT-ZeJR4WDONs9f_fB6BYckpjWCKncp3cft3xk8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Oh my goodness, where do I even begin?! Going to Starbucks is an absolute treat and always leaves me feeling uplifted and energized!

The baristas there were incredible! They were very swift in making the drink and gave me exactly 5 ice cubes, just like how I ask! Magnificent service! Would come again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charles f","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCcLAsSHGdOlBGAqhgMLc8enEkWVxfwOXZ97QVjmCYJgWahNs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to order, stood to the Side and patiently waited for my turn as a nurse cut in front. When it was my turn to order Kelvin at the counter asked me to hold on a minute I said sure and leaned over to look at the pastries when I heard him ask “what can I get for you” as 3 more hospital staff ordered. It was the rudest and belittling things that has happened. Then not even an apology or a thank you for your patience for someone that already going through a tough time to be made to feel so meaningless at a Starbucks in a hospital definitely did not help.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chrisdoyl272 Doyle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhhMoZqmOA3clClbdnfQjDaZIeA6erTfdgsxVII0fu76whH2BG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The coffee at Starbucks is so strong that i can make 2 regular coffees but then it does not taste very good strong or weak but it is great for keeping you very regular!! And then allot of people love that super strong coffee experience all good personal preference for each individual !!
Chris D","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lucy Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuwCjTEBDQem6hcfmmxSA0I0nNlJPkS88N0KyjwlMUZAjI_Jdm8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We stopped by here for a dessert because we were craving matcha and it was good!! The matcha tasted strong and the desserts were delicious. We ordered the shaved ice and matcha float. The only downside is that both of the desserts melted really quickly, and the desserts were on the pricier side :(","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5UDcEfot109eEb6sGTZEK1yP2qcbuAjrjkDYw&fid=0x0:0x601b95f2c392e685"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Lingke Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTGjGc9uF2gtSPT6Ruf-AqFHfSmQVzYkYHiq1BNnXXBKS0Og=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Staff are so friendly. I got my free birthday ice cream and it is very delicious! The taste of matcha is exactly the flavor I like. Their black sesame is also good too. Thanks for the ice cream and will definitely visit again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODECWKbCKYxZBKfjIdnVBKBJkh1nHJnFu9wc_D&fid=0x0:0x601b95f2c392e685"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Irina Chua","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGx9EyU4vITyOUzUv3iP99dTnYs7cyTGqXbuJ5Z_iHvAv7BCfvHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't believe it's been 4 years since I started visiting this place but I've neglected to review it.

This is one of my favourite dessert places in Richmond to visit. If you love matcha, you will love this place. Their soft serve is delicious, although my favourite item is the Maiko special as it's a decadent treat with lots of ingredients inside and soft serve on top. They occasionally change up soft serve flavours as well, so I've loved the hojicha, ube, and yuzu flavours in addition to the usual matcha.

Service is pretty quick and smooth. The atmosphere is lovely as well, very warm. My only issue is that there's hardly any tables/seating inside, so if it's full you have to wait or go outside. In the summer/warmer months it's a great option to visit the playground/park outside the Richmond public market, but not so in the colder months.

Shoutout as well to Bryan who helped me figure out the new rewards system. As I've said, service is great and the staff are nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFcw36bK6JNIfk8EguN_BYuByIzs4aTYmjkFPd&fid=0x0:0x601b95f2c392e685"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Melanie Tam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOnCXlUyDGCRthUKehak0_GUp_az2pTQqceWOyRQ-aAN0D6lJP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in for a pick me up before our two-hour drive to Whistler. It was a Thursday just before 2 and we had just beat the rush because a few groups came in just after us. I had the hojicha iced latte, which was perfect. I didn't want anything with too much caffeine. The roasted flavor was very nice. Hubby had the matcha latte float, which was also very good - but I wasn't in an ice-creamy mood.

I wish we had something as delicious and reasonably priced in NYC!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGuTNS_TpwHmAoqM10oUSw1PWm3yiwxN5gN9O6&fid=0x0:0x601b95f2c392e685"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Tammy Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWn0N2I5STxk6Dw-kQhoKTxOlHlPrvcouHiB9OgzjAG84pt3M0D_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"tl;dr: hojicha float is a MISS, definitely try something else the store offers! not huge portions and workers are friendly.

🍦Food Quality: 3/5
We ordered the hojicha float and we were quite disappointed. I would not recommend the hojicha float because they add very little matcha icecream. We made the mistake of getting it iced because it was 50% hojicha, 25% ice and 25% icecream. For ~8$, it was not worth the money because it just didn't taste that great. I think their matcha icecreams are probably a lot better but it was my first time and the hojicha was not good. I would come again and get just the icecream.

🍨Food Quantity: 4/5
The hojicha float came with 2 mochi balls, hojicha and a small dollop of matcha icecream. I mean, this is an icecream place, cmon!

❣️Service/Atmosphere: 5/5
The employees were very kind and friendly. The store is quiet and spacious but the tables were a bit sticky probably due to previous customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf_CR9OkjHeCBdC-ZWlJFEEgHxVw7TKZphrU1C&fid=0x0:0x601b95f2c392e685"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Foodie Zhen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdVrItxlQusWp3ETEL7NhYfMWl2gqDZyecxR3J7ul6ce7cG2tr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hard to find parking around the cafe, but as a big fan of matcha, loved to try the matcha ice cream. However, some flavours are only for summer, will come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNM9dRMqHHBI-uJmD71kkemQ-MErRIHWk5DD77R&fid=0x0:0x601b95f2c392e685"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Khrys Burden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLZn9q35VDgCHOO8Jp2vSx9zNhESZQLmPGDnMXvFiAf8ERA2-v=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the Matcha Float with matcha soft serve. It had matcha tea as the base which I thought would be super bitter but was pleasantly mild. It goes super well with the soft serve.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwkCXCN85lj2P9MFxOsQ3qfUGzltJeLaHNpCav&fid=0x0:0x601b95f2c392e685"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Ginny H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcHEodXIJ0P8yOKMmLFZPfzdWgFxq2sxo8ivTOo8lLJUVIfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite matcha ice cream place in Lower Mainland
• matcha and kinako mixed soft serve in a cup with cone on top.
• topping : anko , a must get. Also recommend the mochi balls.
Parking : paid street parking
Store: slightly small with limited seating
Staff : always super friendly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwZAVCVOyQdDL-EJ5RWDsMO7YDton-AU1ebCs9&fid=0x0:0x601b95f2c392e685"],"When":"2024-7-7"}]

[{"Name":"Mini Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVd8UO7vSQ6uAepc8Q89jz06o2Hk-hIH8uLSPAuosYQnY_rixIXnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the new tasting menu (Pineapple series)!
The passion fruit and pineapple tea is so fresh! It's REAL PINEAPPLE & PASSION FRUIT😍No artificial taste!

Love it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6OOmNr8MQHel5GbQ9_59N2WXVk6l6IhuvcDZR&fid=0x0:0xafa344b6fd541964"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Maya R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNTJTaxVFS43rU8wffMV_TIY3vSjpuWE92T3_3_2VvyKeT1ytzJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Royal milk tea reminds me more of a roasted milk tea. I got my drink with no ice but it came just slightly empty. I'm not sure if that was intentional.
Overall not a bad experience but I don't think I would call it a 'royal milk tea'.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCOkpK5Hqubzx4E0jF_CPFU8XvKW-10q4dQqpf&fid=0x0:0xafa344b6fd541964"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Nara Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhvqYviVmNRdUs4hBsTj9aEeMEUIUtVFXoe8f3rZFhfWT27yat=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It’s an okay place to have bubble tea and bubble waffles. Service is okay too. Great choice of music and plenty of seats.

You can park in the parkade and get a parking pass from the cashier if you plan to stay for a while.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1KIp5oKknWtCHk9cWZATIeo8KBlEuc666_n5P&fid=0x0:0xafa344b6fd541964"],"When":"2017-12-28"},{"Name":"Séra Klein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsX2Wc9rwt6p1OFqqYfVPexVGfJIkNDIJIJ9g28niJxvEKTtY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The drinks are good, standard gongcha experience. The inside seating only has about 4 tables, so if you come here to study, you just gotta get lucky for a table, because some people stay here for a really long time, lol. Good if you wanna pop in and out for a bbt.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM72A-r3jJAcnHBEgAvg_O2gGEk3w9awTDq1aaN&fid=0x0:0xafa344b6fd541964"],"When":"2020-10-9"},{"Name":"Paula Hlavacek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUEHsTUDREBV0VNUK6UGtTRNbBuCTOdBVYyLeZYC7hO1QTx25MLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Your average typical bubble tea! Ps no lactose-free alternatives here.. they have lots of Christmas specials with unique flavours such as Hot purple yam latte, hot matcha latte and my favorite Hot Taro latte! I got the honey lemon green tea with aloe & coconut jelly .... I found it to be too sweet and didn’t really like it while the other drink brown sugar pearls with Oreo taste like dirt. Stick to the original brown sugar drink. The matcha waffle however was perfect! Crunch yet soft on the inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1840TDUyYgdtNgIlWmjSWs_8KRF8cDNrLi3_M&fid=0x0:0xafa344b6fd541964"],"When":"2020-12-21"},{"Name":"Steven Kwan (kwanste)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6842Md8cxNbpZUmdIiQtAIMLlTr1BRhgUWJantzMzNS3JXy0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The bubble tea is consistent and dependably good. I stop here pretty regularly when I’m just in there mood for something solid. It’s also pretty chill here. PROTIP the entrance to the parking lot is in the alley in back. It’s free parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQD7nIb3uCHNr4HkiHELdP_OY4lMhUyRtKHbw&fid=0x0:0xafa344b6fd541964"],"When":"2023-1-15"},{"Name":"mochi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFJ3YzQy4Ek7Uv6iuvuDDt8SDrpfRq8OqiVFgoo79K5l16GqzX4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Discounts on Tuesdays (I believe 15% off any drink). Good place to get your bubble tea fix. I rated the strawberry matcha more for its looks than the taste. Boba isn't the best that I've tried (slightly on the hard side).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYrzEVZFFfwYQ_obAAXn7M7DNRlRrb16SainkY&fid=0x0:0xafa344b6fd541964"],"When":"2023-4-7"},{"Name":"jambingoo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4XoLAUvqX0_n7K0yyq_zZCyfuMST3JOhDaDR-hXm8GdWpNg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Finished my drink and found a piece of rubber/plastic that's obviously not supposed to be part of the drink. It's definitely not edible, and I don't know if the drink was even clean then. Not happy with this experience, and very disappointed. Cleanliness should be a central part of any food/drink establishment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyo3-m4WQbTRp_OIPOZIXUiUvQV2apFQ7YAYNH&fid=0x0:0xafa344b6fd541964"],"When":"2021-5-12"}]
