user_reviews: [{"Name":"Dave Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL544JfNo-heg8UsP95fr9shcrTY9pTTKZqcIgOMgLc7F2usw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really nice selection of items available, from wraps, pastries, coffee, teas, and sodas. Lots to choose from as well as a fair number of tables and tv screens for watching sports. Service was friendly and quick. Lots of pay parking underground.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZKQPpZd-u-_zhJWRu6zlCnNStem6jRlP-G-fJ\u0026fid=0x0:0xfa689647c8a63523"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Mandy Hsu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYyCNAeDjJm6G9PHNUteT7TlLPZGWicixDSaY53g2Phqm40w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Banh mi is the best one Evaa! This cafes banh mi is soooooo good! Five. Star. A must try! It’s a tofu banh mi. Finished it in 8 min!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMR3JR_pIo5zZW56bvweXAvDig_lsx-I0ZKa1GE\u0026fid=0x0:0xfa689647c8a63523"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Jay Gee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIuMtis-HbMwx3X2sPR1lUObsNMG1bJNdI7_lM2xqnpOjkpUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s long overdue that I leave these folks a 5 star! Many years I have enjoyed this place. They are really the only option here at the oval yet they are still priced fair. Tons of selection, yummy options and the staff even though overwhelmed at times stay positive and handle the pressure.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"yue zhao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQDMLyUfrCN6FgHZJ1kZvLfPkatNfb28-oG7ZrxDUScp9cyg8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great for morning coffee and some great food the food is hot . The coffee is really hot . Taste little bit light. But overall great experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNU_BPTseLjbx55kXk8IgFLrUCjDJYP4vSejLbF\u0026fid=0x0:0xfa689647c8a63523"],"When":"2024-2-16"},{"Name":"Malin Olafson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINKNO3ohrRwKjz1xh4s9XS7wAOB4JK0g_2K_ZJvQFjQmN3YQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have several vegan options including banana bread, a chai pudding and a bang mi sandwich in addition to vegan drink options. I had the chai pudding and it was really tasty.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ariel Galvani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDdWPH-z7brmJ-5XxpVULSYOaVfC8plCUuVgJpNED0RkygspCkzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This could be a great place if they hired enough staff for a NATIONAL event. People were lining up for about 1 hour until they could finally order. Only 2 workers there who seemed a bit stressed, and I don’t blame them. Unfortunately we had to go here because there was nowhere else nearby to get some coffee. I’m giving 3 stars for the workers, otherwise it would’ve been zero for the disrespect with parents who wanted to watch their kids play but had to wait over an hour to get something to eat or drink.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Derek H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJs6fY1Z9YaNKxyg6t15mkYDRcfsy7HCRdJ2h7z_GFQOTgzhlH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Medium coffee, 12 ounces.  $3.50 plus defaulting to minimum $1 tip.  Far smaller than Starbucks (25% less coffee), price is over 30% more.  That is ridiculous.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqYKRAErisHJREvJrjGmXrMz3RjwWanb0DNkOZcSy3B0uCRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and beverage options for everyone. One of the best places for espresso in Richmond.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jessie Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUF4wEEZRp0d8jxMrHjSZbktAeIkdnNdEP4W6FcZNZdLL8LHgbi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst bubble waffle dine in experience ever. The chicken steaks were at least 2 days old. Why would I pay to eat leftovers?
The server made me pay tips before even serving my meal, is that for real?

There are so many bubble waffle locations in Richmond, don’t ever bother to come to this one. Food and service none of them are good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpo2Gi8I8FiVuclwJhaoi3eaKl2l2e3pKB5xJD&fid=0x0:0xaac660925123f3e0"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Abigail Monterrosa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAHHvD2RhzS4cua3lwFTyldmxnny24KlJCgKkIMmSStE6OFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a noodle dish for dine in. The amount is about a quarter of the picture they have on the menu. Very little. Good flavor though. The bubble waffle is not fresh, been sitting in the warmer probably the while day. And you don't have a choice but to tip, the lady at front watches you the whole time you are paying. Won't come back again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Second Breakfast","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWws9RUTZF6w1MgAEjGemUXipuVHz7Nya8qYGLGC8cwIpTYrG9s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Like others have said, worst bubble waffle place in the city. Lady needs to realize customers tip after the meal, if and only if,
you did a good job. It's  not a given.
People pay and tip after the meal and not before. You really do see why she has to resort to coercion for tips when the food arrives. Puny portions. She laughably even added a tablespoon of canned corn in a feeble attempt at adding volume to the plate of sadness. If you paid after, nobody in their right mind would ever want to tip.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"G C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJa1swwhJB-08TsIGpTm_JbxwZSReiWFmszZqjaKKB7z1TCHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Owner is rude and not friendly.  Lack customer service skills.  I had ordered my meal through the app and ask if I can sit down.  She says you ordered through the app means you have to take out and not sit down.  Fine, it’s reasonable and thought nothing of it.  I had a bubble waffle card that I can get a free waffle.  I showed her to get one and she goes no more waffles.  Then she looks again and see one and gives it to me.  Later when I left, I found that the waffle was rock hard.  I think it was left over the heat lamp for most of the day and she just wanted to get rid of it.  This is the most expensive bubble waffle cafe in Richmond and the least likeable.  The owner makes the atmosphere, service, and food a low rating because she is so stingy.  Not coming back, I rather go farther to another bubble waffle cafe than here!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"sandy chuang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcGAY5083-P5n1cLMfSxcqdrdHDMU5G4g91q3L7NrCZKV2-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I don’t normally write reviews but….
Do not order from this place, it is not the same from other bubble waffle cafe. The chicken is hard, the dumpling soup is only filled half way to the bowl. I don’t even want to mention about my drinks and bubble waffles….","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN850YzcxG58IzQAMma_UnodWGrz10gSIiH3u9i&fid=0x0:0xaac660925123f3e0"],"When":"2023-12-20"},{"Name":"Jack Tsai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLL2asiKnaMNQzIziAXxAtiuqDjICpU79P0UfFaVfjmzIZWkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is what a $17.30 lamb noodle soup look like.. 2 piece of lamb 1 pork ball cut in half small slice tofu skin and small amount of veggie... everything in total with soup in it was only half full. I will Never! Ever go back to this place ever again! Btw the place does not have a place for you to wash your hand a washroom to use.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNy05tqSB1LugOUsMUp-VJOANl3jSehvK0z4j9V&fid=0x0:0xaac660925123f3e0"],"When":"2023-9-24"},{"Name":"Sophia Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIP9FknyGa_OWZP_waUV3tETQ1LgTFAaYk3BEhlss584oN5Okc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After seeing so many negative reviews I was resistant to try but glad I did since it’s so close to my home. Laksa soup and the crispy chicken wings were amazing. Tasted the same from other location. Lemon tea is good as well! Portion wise I think it’s similar, at least on the noodle combo. The staff was super friendly and nice. Will come back again for their Laksa ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpfFnTJmq80CZBeGNxxeHIyZUTVAH4Ycrqny9x&fid=0x0:0xaac660925123f3e0"],"When":"2024-2-17"},{"Name":"Leichelle Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRvJA965uHo-aqlqjWaeJzl-xJ3a4HDDsC7xwaQKHZTv30bII=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The lady is quite rude. Ordered a bubble waffle cheesecake and it's not actually cheesecake. It's parmesan. And when I asked if it was actual cheesecake or just parmesan she said its made with parmesan. Tastes like stinky cheese and was burnt. Also when I've got food from here in the past the amount is significantly less than other bubble waffles. Also the laksa soup is always watery and weak. Seriously really mean and rude lady.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Bubble Waffle Cafe in Richmond Centre offers a fantastic dining experience with its delicious and affordable combos. The boneless Hainanese Chicken with rice is a standout, priced at only $14.25 with a drink included, making it a great bargain. For an additional $1.50, you can enjoy their original bubble waffle, which is a must-try. The HK-style lemon tea and milk tea are both excellent and pair perfectly with the meals. Their Angus beef dry noodles combo is another highlight, packed with flavor. This spot is a go-to for quality food at reasonable prices, and the service is always friendly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYj2lRgszn_GA21_a0tKTcsoIGTkLkJlwDLtZj&fid=0x0:0xdb7a641b6d97199d"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Use the app if you haven’t. I highly recommend it for ease of comfort and finding a table first.

Chicken wings and Taiwan style fried nuggets are good. Soup noodles are good.
Nothing fancy but it does the job and you’re stuffed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMB0MgOICpxyGsbWdymmmCv35vWFODkrV1Rvfe&fid=0x0:0xdb7a641b6d97199d"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"After shopping at CF Richmond, Bubble Waffle is always our go-to spot to satisfy our appetite. My favorites here are the Hong Kong Lemon Iced Tea and the Bubble Waffle, which never disappoint. For noodles, I love the Laksa, while the kids really enjoy the chicken.

Located in the CF Richmond food court, Bubble Waffle’s rating is based on food court standards. I’d give it 3 stars for the food—some options I’ve tried weren’t as outstanding, but they were still good. I’d definitely come back unless a new and better option catches my eye.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlSKR5JmAArVU-06ZRkoUDWgZ4BCZMi0dQ7k0Y&fid=0x0:0xdb7a641b6d97199d"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Ed J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXeZmUHGpsrfi3qr7xoyOiGCM-NR4m4LSiZMraZ406FGQqkvSO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered the veggie rice noodle soup with a fish soup base and it came with Chinese milk tea. ( this was excellent) . There were only two people working so service was slow, if in a hurry and wanting for a quick bite. I suggest trying another place. If one wants there specialty which is the $4.75 waffle delights. This may take 25-30 minutes.

The noodle soup with rice noodles were good but portions were small. The price for the noodle soup and Chinese milk tea for $14.49 is fair.

Bubble waffle cafe is located in the lansdowne food court. T and t supermarket also has a smaller food court that isn’t bad to try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGFco1TW2mswc2soOuoAHeQVab6UMoQay8xtwO&fid=0x0:0xdb7a641b6d97199d"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Sarah Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8KBPpeKqlJnSuV_v0mI5I480kovh7Z9l9T0oEWz8g_Y724-M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am a person who doesn’t leave reviews, but I feel like I have to leave my experience for other customers, owner, and employees . I ordered a bubble waffle and a few milk teas through uber, and as I was eating, I bit into something hard.

To my shock, it was a stapler pin embedded in the middle of the waffle. I checked The packaging didn’t even have any staples, so I have no idea how it ended up “inside” the waffle.

I’m deeply concerned about the safety standards in place, as I can’t imagine what would have happened if I had swallowed it. I hope the management takes this seriously and investigates how this could have happened. This incident has left me feeling extremely unsettled, and I would appreciate a response from the staff or owner.

+

I had almost finished the waffle when I discovered the stapler pin.
After the call with uber eat customer service, I’ve started to feel a sudden, unusual scratchiness in my throat.
Right now, I’m seriously worried that I might have accidentally swallowed another pin. I hope it’s nothing serious, but if any problems arise, I’ll go to the emergency and get a medical report, which I will formally submit to you.
I checked another review said he or she found a staple in the soup.
*Please understand that you’ll need to take responsibility if something happens.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6YMH4Z0-awFgNJ59keeaOKw7fqmuAjIRWVp1E&fid=0x0:0xdb7a641b6d97199d"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Veran Starre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVW9RcPsbcHdTCg-Pcdf0x9DaHA5Fm0DE1X7hc4ZnA2VPIIWs8F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Bad service so don’t expect a good experience. The manager is quite rude. The food is good value but watery. If you are willing to put up with the service and wait time then it’s a decent spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAiL-ns6s_vsn2m1apYObUv_lwdW3G8MKLNDqD&fid=0x0:0xdb7a641b6d97199d"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Amar M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBQWZODVOR5EgW_ud4WGBoPZzS3E7_T_DuyVRfFsnuGSHVIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The app and payment options are great - nice and convenient.  However was not completely satisfied with meal.  Spiced boneless chicken was a bit chewy and dry.  Wings were good and relatively decent value at $8.95.  Inconsistent across locations makes it hard to know what to expect.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angelica Yee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcQojzbdV9sbLoihEwt6NQe8LJ9Oux6JR_irkYfLyJU1tPYS4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I wanted to give bubble waffle cafe one last chance, but I regret it. Like I mentioned in the Marine Dr review, I feel like they used to be better when they first opened all those years ago! I ordered the fish soup with rice noodles and I don’t mind the price being higher, but it just doesn’t taste good. It took forever (25+ minutes), noodles were over cooked, broth was flavourless, and for the price and wait I could’ve gone to a real restaurant on the other side of the mall. If you’re really craving bubble waffle, go ahead and visit - but otherwise I suggest another place within this massive food court.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvBPCJR3Lm0GOFeJS3UrhJQ_tMfGK4IUE5x9S_&fid=0x0:0xdb7a641b6d97199d"],"When":"2023-7-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Zee Sing Liew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNGof6XxTlJFDRgWKPR2JSUkllmHISAAz8bjQB8yJlU4lEqR4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered a "make-your-own-noodle" and it was horrible. The soup was bland, with only a few pieces of meat. The soup tasted like super-diluted tomato sauce :( Definitely not worth the price of $16. Do not order this!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNllgevXl5c9wfYhJAZstqpPctgaAmVETIWWufJ&fid=0x0:0xcd3cef10beea56c7"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Bubble Waffle Cafe in Aberdeen Centre offers a delightful taste of Hong Kong street food. The curry fish balls are packed with flavor, bringing an authentic Hong Kong experience to your plate. Their Taiwanese sausage is another must-try, perfectly seasoned and grilled. The fried shrimp ball has a satisfying crunch and is cooked to perfection. To top it off, their Hong Kong-style lemon tea complements the meal with its refreshing, tangy sweetness. The variety and quality of the street snacks here are fantastic, and the service is quick and friendly. It’s the perfect spot for a quick, flavorful bite while shopping.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_OXXSV_itz1eD9re5lEIzVA0FwTlN6iCK07Qr&fid=0x0:0xcd3cef10beea56c7"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Ada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_tT85lO7aZKFfq17wWpo8ldgI_n0GJFJfBhG1nWiEa2zXCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The fried squid tentacles were seasoned well, but the batter was a big mess and the frying oil was due for a change. They left the tentacles in the frier for too long, so it was soggy instead of crispy.

The bubble waffle was good since it was fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKxQ_w0Wf5IKWYDCLRvjTIBk1Rj_VyM7FUC6dg&fid=0x0:0xcd3cef10beea56c7"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Leah C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0KgicWO9w2i7Du6_Car3bsGiD-F6NG-UShCm5wj_Rqd9SM_A6IA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I’ve been coming here for about a year now and food is amazing soup is rich and noodles are chewy. Food is overall amazing but service is HORRIBLE I’ve tried to put up with it cause I like the food but the female cashier is super rude, in the middle of me ordering she starts talking to another customer on the side and is ignoring me she’s super slow and unfriendly recently they increased their prices $5 for a water with a teaspoon of syrup and two teeny lemon slices is INSANITY. Food is tasty overall but wait time is horrible especially for a food court over 10-15 minutes. Always has been my go to at Aberdeen foodcourt but the lack of respect and attitude I get from the cashier is crazy probably the last time I’m eating here ☹️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCtfzw_owshADuoJ93hNaxKBHZAplKXFbOuYyl&fid=0x0:0xcd3cef10beea56c7"],"When":"2024-4-13"},{"Name":"Kallie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJbXVeVE6dgy7kBSNjydK9fNHyNVKMUzIsWJGidPo6PNLrE22nE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First off the bubble waffle was pretty tasty in flavor, but kinda soggy and not crunchy. I really liked the fish ball because of the sauce flavor and how well it was cooked. As for the main dish the fish soup noodles, it was good and well cooked, but the noodles didn't fit the soup style in my opinion and the portions for mushroom were very small. The presentation also wasn't that good, but my expectations weren't high since it wasn't like a fancy restaurant type of deal. This meal seems pretty simplistic to make and the price overall isn't bad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6iFiwKNqR0vnw2wofhOMRNft4_eiBEXsQ8ejr&fid=0x0:0xcd3cef10beea56c7"],"When":"2023-2-23"},{"Name":"Nelson Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPsTo_ggOS2UPccq3rSQc-De4U-qs9Ay8OlAKuAnT5Hws0_III=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Several months ago I attended Bubble Waffle Cafe at Aberdeen Mall on the weekend and wanted to redeem a free waffle as I had accumulated enough stamps on the stamp card.  The lady told me that they don't honour the free waffle on weekends and it's only valid during weekdays.  I thought that was weird as there was no mention of such policy on the back of the stamp card.

Fast forward to Remembrance Day Monday, I tried to redeem my free waffle again and the lady said they don't honour this on holidays.  I mentioned that I thought it was strictly weekends that they don't honour the stamp card but the lady said it's also holidays as well.  I again mentioned that this isn't stated on the back of the card.  Apparently, the boss for this location advised staff that this is the policy at this location.  Not sure if this is the case at other locations.

If you want to redeem your free waffle, make sure it's on a weekday and also not a holiday.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Queezies Queenie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqO-3A-wFrT02A32C-6J4gjfBC2zec5kURniDdxNSGqDYtSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I would give this place a 5 star before but today the #1 noodle I ordered tasted awful!  Veggies not cooked, beef is overcooked like chewing gum.  The soup is tasteless but water with spicy, not salty at all.  However the milk tea is good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWPSoGmr95AOAftIdDRQFbOmciaNB-Gzy8-nTv&fid=0x0:0xcd3cef10beea56c7"],"When":"2024-2-6"},{"Name":"A MA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhyppVwJo7AF52M9f-tAUC4pUSQmeoVrRurchvPgz-992aZeU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love their dry noodle with the pork and coffee/milk tea combo. I will have to give props to the guy at the front counter, he placed a lid on my noodle when the drink wasn’t ready to keep it as hot as possible, that’s the attention to detail you don’t often see anymore. I’m happy to see the establishment is evolving, it from cash only to Mastercard and now they take everything. Thank you! Officially my go to place in Richmond.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNif01a616KuDQD4gotaul8N0JIz-1-J-R4buQf&fid=0x0:0xcd3cef10beea56c7"],"When":"2023-4-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mehul Gautam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUWfCAHcbrboibLKGQvB-6XITmMahnsJsanCyw3xnR-9XifHCrTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is extremely delicious - way better than most other restaurants I have been to.
I absolutely love the Cajun chicken sandwich - my all time favourite dish. I love the New York Cheesecake too. It is one of the most perfect cheesecakes that I have had in a long time!

I had a fabulous time there with the nicest / warmest service. They truly go above & beyond in providing the best.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3KIoMTVJfKfqA9Be0Ann4veN0P7b6IkvDUBUm&fid=0x0:0xc4ca7558f4984c8e"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently visited Cactus Cafe in Richmond, and it was a fantastic experience! The vegan burger was simply excellent – packed with flavor and cooked to perfection. Their chicken tacos were equally impressive, with tender chicken and fresh toppings that made each bite delightful. The highlight, though, was the peanut butter crunch dessert, which was outstanding – a perfect mix of creamy and crunchy textures that left me craving more. The ambiance was cozy, and the staff were friendly and attentive. Cactus Cafe is a must-visit spot in Richmond, whether you’re vegan or not. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6kWg2fgouL-I-M4wHPGdDkguPjlBmgVq_ZIiz&fid=0x0:0xc4ca7558f4984c8e"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Samantha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiBNPV0WM2QyZIomdZFReW3hhBQYlq1lHEnztGJxFPhA7qVw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great dining experience at Cactus Club Cafe in Richmond. I've visited Cactus on several locations, but this is the first time I felt happy to return. My food was delayed a bit because the white rice wasn’t ready yet, but the waitress was incredibly polite and offered me the option to wait 20 minutes or choose an alternative rice. I was perfectly fine with switching, and what really surprised me was when the waitress came back to apologize and offered me a free dessert for the wait. That was a lovely gesture!

Our server, Elise M., was also very attentive and cheerful, making sure we had everything we needed. I want to give her a special thanks for making our night enjoyable. Overall, I had a wonderful dining experience with my friends and look forward to going back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJN90V_EXgJOYtVQGxebD-lj6uJIJhJyHaS1xP&fid=0x0:0xc4ca7558f4984c8e"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Fionn Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6QM4xX4rnjDy7uQ9_UX1ud-FeXhAIPbUGuv1ks1vTREnqqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Overall food was good, service was great! Atmosphere was nice. I got the Bolognese! Tasted very good! Definitely will come back. It’s located in Richmond centre which is convenient if you need to wait for your table.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEnRAs2w4SiuAoDKVyu31i2KIF5RDPE5JAETel&fid=0x0:0xc4ca7558f4984c8e"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Hakan Guzgan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUA_W8rhFsh5vl3N-SwOXx9x2M4aBXN2TS01V15E4k2zvHSImaORA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"**Delicious Food and Exceptional Service at Cactus Club Cafe Richmond**

Cactus Club Cafe in Richmond is a must-visit restaurant if you're in the area. The atmosphere is vibrant and colorful, setting the perfect mood for any occasion. The menu offers a fantastic variety of food and drinks, with something to satisfy every palate. I highly recommend their Epic IPA—it's simply delicious. My personal favorite is the Cajun chicken burger with yam fries, a dish that never disappoints.

The location is also very convenient, with easy access by bus and SkyTrain, and plenty of free parking available. After enjoying a meal, you can even take a stroll over to Richmond Center Mall for some shopping.

What truly sets this place apart, though, is the outstanding service. The staff are incredibly friendly and fun, making every dining experience special. I’ve had the pleasure of being served by Jennifer, Noah, and Jacob, all of whom are professional and ensure your food is made just right.

Cactus Club Cafe has maintained its delicious taste and high standards for over 20 years, and I highly recommend everyone give it a try. You won’t be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOF7ti8v468n1FFezlBcmt_fjh3dwk1RAjH_Ux2&fid=0x0:0xc4ca7558f4984c8e"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Sylvia Lan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZOrignIxZtNQr5fqOb9lpoqxcw0LTJa79u5ODK0MTYwholQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful and cozy environment. Consistent decent food quality. Friendly and welcoming staff. Quick and professional services. Cactus Club is always a good choice of place to sit down and chat with friends!

Pricing is a little pricey but definitely worthy for the overall experience and especially for the outstanding services!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP26iEjSMRNVBNnfPq-72euLPyULvjGJOjwecNY&fid=0x0:0xc4ca7558f4984c8e"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"ユノアYunoa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjb-9fmtTSx8hqCIoWqnedMR35nqhPIaEnKm2tWMaX_d-sIJvR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Mmm I wouldn’t say the food was that bad but they did switch me and my friend’s steak wellness, I wanted rare and she wanted medium rare, but I got medium rare and she got rare. It wasn’t that bad but I did think my steak was a little burnt on the outside which was harder to chew, the lobster I had was also wayyy too salty, it just tasted like sea water, other than that the other stuff was fine and the drinks were fine but we learned we don’t like margaritas that much.

But the server we had was very nice and attentive so the service was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ0iJK9scJMRMbPemMWoWsjlcvQEFVpoxYtei2&fid=0x0:0xc4ca7558f4984c8e"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"szigeti anna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXO8wV_bW0HLPIGb8SlgqJHo9eo9SWQK2r_1IJkrboM1Vf4-rwcxw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was amazing, wine pairing was ok but ! Sayoka was the sweetest waitress, made the experience that much better! She always made sure I was taken care of and she was very attentive but not over baring 10/10 would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYXWCgy7qrY_nmphufMCn86hCQm2zRV-nMYhri&fid=0x0:0xc4ca7558f4984c8e"],"When":"2024-12-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tina S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXW45-HgdTYMsROA974XLtQz-u0papEwxoo-3ThkTBJz_gb-Dek=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Hidden family run restaurant-cafe upstairs in Central Square. Twinkle is one of the best late night (sometimes open to 2am) places to chill. My friends and I like to order their Oyako don, Garlic Chicken & Rice, and Satay beef with udon in milky soup. Some things on their menu is quite delish, especially if the good cook is there. Others, like the ham & cheese sandwich are just average.

The atmosphere is really nice. This is the only place in the area I know of with an upstairs outdoor patio. If you're a smoker, they let you smoke on the patio. But if you don't like smoke smell, this may bother you.

Its a super chill place, quieter in the afternoons, sometimes a bit loud in the late evenings. There is a play darts machine. The owners like to sit at one of the tables and watch tv.
If you're a member of the LGBTQ community, come and get to know the owners. They always make my partner and I feel comfortable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNtQ5GQF7M_02F5NdEKrYH23964bnKLplRClBI&fid=0x0:0x2c89c698b55b9399"],"When":"2018-8-17"},{"Name":"Ken Leong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkcBnCzNWoskspBq75bEbSl0RQW0PfirIdNShwElc5BGNVUnY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food and drink had large portions sizes and tasted like home cooking. Good location right next to Aberdeen Center, had a nice lunch here to avoid the crowds at the food court in the mall, and we could walk over right after to do some shopping. Owners were friendly and chatted about their prior location Twinkle 1 before moving to the current one, Twinkle 2. 😅","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMp8Jxq9icEW6Z3IKlYu7OuFKcX4DeTvq7SRGY3&fid=0x0:0x2c89c698b55b9399"],"When":"2021-2-1"},{"Name":"Clarence Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHtOqf2gtYzBKQIwuVvsCF-9HPO2Lh2LpQE8bTKylJwpnM9QQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"A very long journey waiting for food arrived on the table. Very dark atmosphere with non-stop blinking lights, unfixed toilet, fair food quality, and almost zero service. I’m trying hard to find a reason to be there again, but sorry I can’t.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt_yLZntmVIo0RoFjGFp4oUmo16_fpCPpBiR8d&fid=0x0:0x2c89c698b55b9399"],"When":"2024-1-14"},{"Name":"Karen Kwan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHMLiRr23eJa87Yq7GzJlUJeyhHFPMObdx1d4tfCdwd7QxUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food and drinks! Place is nice, cosy, washrooms are very clean. They have lots of board/ cards games to play with and my kids also love the dart machine. My kids are very entertained.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOn5722BO0Qh2LKCwsIuEaYCrI6Y4U_ab0Mnt9e&fid=0x0:0x2c89c698b55b9399"],"When":"2022-12-16"},{"Name":"T D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLSyeKhD__uPlI1its_EDVwX4U973zjMQXltoKzX4xFUyrOcg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty food that you wouldnt expect from that price point. Definitely should support them. Haven't tried anything else but would recommend the Tonkatsu bowl for under $10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9gcW_n56HxlCrtD9KAOpbVui20fgyKqP8CvgR&fid=0x0:0x2c89c698b55b9399"],"When":"2020-11-30"},{"Name":"B Dot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCx6snNN5EZ49VFj-2b_LUCtpthOM4wCb7zXBU0PetSqF0hnV4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered my vermicelli noodles and they canceled it when my favourite are noodles and the only gave me my rice and pork dish overall really think they should just make some noodles","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3qReUW3INzhVgaZVaaFvZfcaPy1QrJkvOkopF&fid=0x0:0x2c89c698b55b9399"],"When":"2022-2-26"},{"Name":"Long Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXASYE4PxN6JW3fd6dFmHy5rnptnC1Bc1x4ZYGO6MJ631X23ddi7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a gem in Aberdeen! The menu is full of delicious Taiwanese and HK snacks and meals that taste as good as it sounds. Fun and cosy cafe with a great outdoor patio where you can play electronic darts live with people overseas too as well as mahjong. The owners are super friendly and apparently you can rent out the space for private functions too. Definitely recommend checking out. What a find on our way to the airport!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lucas Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAR40X-qBdYx3r2f0RRAAwrVYzEfPOZsVpyFJlPc5UBiWoI-Ok=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A very nice and sweet place for Taiwanese and HK style home made cuisines, their owner and staff here are super friendly too. Offer dine-in and take-out, providing some worth mentioning delicious items on their menu like salt and pepper popcorn chicken with some other specialty drinks. due to the size of the shared parking lot, I find it is extremely hard to find a parking spot when other businesses are open. A recommended visit will usually be late to midnight. Or online order for just a pickup. On a recent visit, staff hinted customs can give a call if just downstairs so they can open the back entrance to F2 for a shortcut.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gora Dholi phagwara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNSrptBBfwxYwcKpcXgQlbV5_cZBbd2MyskD0DOIpfMq8kDu0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you, Robin, for making my visit wonderful. I was feeling very frustrated and having a really bad day, but your smile truly brightened my spirits. I also appreciate the compliment you gave me today; we need more people like you. I’ve decided to make this store my regular spot from now on. The drink was exactly how I wanted it and tasted amazing. You have incredible skills! Keep up the great work!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tario Sultan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs5egw4ytTDIua69pxGET59kVTaWgbfGJaRgqyQl37e1dCXZiC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff at this location is super friendly and helpful.

Keep it up guys.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0jfbjcG0JneeTRRHFgt68AGJTPheERGLMrri3&fid=0x0:0x7fe013f149707bd8"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Angelica Yee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcQojzbdV9sbLoihEwt6NQe8LJ9Oux6JR_irkYfLyJU1tPYS4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This location is a little secretive because it is overshadowed by McDonald’s and Popeyes which are both very close by. I’ve only ordered to go or mobile order here, but staff are friendly and usually the wait isn’t too long in the mornings unless you go closer to 7am. It’s clean inside with lots of seating and it’s a nice store. They forgot my whipped cream once and another time my coffee cup was almost a quarter empty, but other than those times it’s been good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOODAks_H9Nguo8la3gJpbrLpGjM85zxjZ86RYE&fid=0x0:0x7fe013f149707bd8"],"When":"2023-8-17"},{"Name":"Smurfmobile H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEvae61zvphzYsaf9k7A4p4uJt6ov5mKp_fC2xBwxroi-r9Ho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always get exceptional service here 😊😊 I also love the ambiance. I wish more locations had the great seating area like this location!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgTYnq0xUNjOmScnSlUCBa43ZSPYVw7tlP1GMw&fid=0x0:0x7fe013f149707bd8"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Kyle James Isaac","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJWDSdzqRGN8uZ25dPk3GrPmHYhE2fFin2Tx19UtHfw-qRuKsy7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It's a shame that Starbucks used to be a place for people to gather and enjoy the company of others, or come to relax or focus on getting work or school projects completed on their notebooks ... Now, Starbucks is so focused on online orders and bringing people in to push them straight out again, very little interaction from the baristas, no hello to welcome you into the cafe, barely a word spoken to you, not a single barista saying thank you. You cant even sit down anymore at a table to enjoy your coffee in glass mug or cup anymore. Such a shame. I used to work here so I know the level of customer first focus Starbucks had. I actually won an award as a Starbucks District Partner of the fiscal quarter in Q3 of 2004 because of my customer service approach and attention to detail. And Starbucks, whatever you are doing now, is definitely not it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"SARTAJ SINGH MINHAS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtUfMOqkfT6jvwbqmgDECslXLBKN361FCqYEiOvWUWa3JbFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Most unwelcoming atmosphere I experienced today evening.The guy working there didn’t even bother to tell us or  call my name that my order is ready.  After sometime when I realized that order is taking too long. I found that my order has been simply kept at side of counter and he was busy doing his own stuff. (Not attending any customers). Even my chai tea latte was cold by the time.

If any manger reads it -my order was chai latte and dragon fruit a-tall size-time of order around 6:30pm  Aug6,2024.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEVUHAZtR_a0Mp2iApXDik3Icu9AkEXT6Y-wwcQvaTdDrN5g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Overall I come here to get a coffee on my way into Richmond. Not sure what happened with the barista I barely took extra time to end a conversation with someone I bumped into. There was no one behind me. Rosie sighs, gives me a dirty look, and rolls her eyes speaking hostile. Is it due to my race or being disabled? First time at any Starbucks or other fast food chain that I am treated like that.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ben Klein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9R820F28I0t3X369CmfDuA-HVVZc86vM9sktLJOY_Gt7-9IRU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A friendly Starbucks if a bit slow. The Starbucks has a pretty good layout. Comfy chairs, work areas and a nicely defined line up area. Service is very friendly and usually quite complete. What I have noticed in six visits is that it just takes a moment or two longer to get your order.
Parking is available from the strip mall and it is on a major bus route.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDQzRXPg0TATC-rNDaEoNMRc5tFUsyGqx6pDIG&fid=0x0:0x7fe013f149707bd8"],"When":"2017-8-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joanne Julia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJm_tXiOF_L1HYwmfioWTODaQDMOM4FYl_6EM6B5LJU8NK_mDCK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What can I say about Timmy‘s? It’s a great place. I love going there. I love the coffee there atmosphere they have good choices of food. Great donuts to die for and really good tasting coffee, steep tea and hot chocolate.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sunny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9fyAKm7pFni1MIgaaYssJ4Y49Mqp9AnfHXff2ge3FLPxnk4WY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Missed Tim Hortons so much! The staff is very friendly. And of course, the coffee, donuts and bagels are amazing 😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtlH4CexMas0vSBWl6GFRAfcmuXclChhNIZpzF&fid=0x0:0xb9974c1195cc5010"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Jason","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUu-aRF10e9Dcl6PcvyE1SSiwi_0uOZJ13HX4ywADoFPUAyzzs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not happy with how this Tim's operates. I've been coming to this Tim's for a while and most of the time, I have to wait a long time to order anything. The managers here don't seem to understand that it's particularly busy this time of year. They shouldn't be having one person taking and filling orders when there's 20 plus people in the lineup. It's bloody ridiculous having to wait almost 25 minutes just to order one thing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_tT85lO7aZKFfq17wWpo8ldgI_n0GJFJfBhG1nWiEa2zXCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This review is for Sheeba, the 4'9 Indian female supervisor.

I called to check that they have the Timmies Timbits pool floatie. Spoke to Sheeba, the supervisor. She had no idea what I was talking about. She kept asking me how many flavor Timbits I wanted, even when I emphasized that it was a pool floatie and a Tim Hortons merchandise. I asked to speak to someone else who would know, but she insisted she was the "only one here" when I knew it wouldn't be the case.

I told her I had seen it on the shelf, above the coffees. She tried to tell me that "it must be there still if you called to check 8 hrs ago and it was still here". I requested she check as I had only seen 1 when I saw it yesterday, and it could be gone by the time I get there 9 hours later. I was also driving from Vancouver to Richmond, and I explained that I didn't want to drive all the way there only to return empty-handed.

She promised she would put one aside for me in the office and even asked for my name "so I can pick it up anytime". When I got there to pick it up, not only did she NOT put one aside for me, there was literally just the 1 with a dented box. I was so disappointed since I had called several Tim Hortons that didn't carry it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsX4p_Scfw0dnL8dPrwf1uOYXVKYRVVUkIlIl2&fid=0x0:0xb9974c1195cc5010"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Yashwinder tungal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-mW4khkKySXGfLrhXDOK_LLBvy-RCpWsuuSL39zsNO3AjfuQC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Two girls ( Naaz & other ) simply deny to warm my food and they don’t know how to treat the customers.
Instead of service they focus on talking with each other.
Baddest service i had today from Tim Hortons locations.

Request to management to communicate with them and train them how to do jobs in food industry","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Juan Velasquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUIxcI_7xSrQjRQCJLWV31nhCAJ9HvOJF_qNkUFjpw6nlnJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's hard to mess up Tim Hortons.  Really.  This one was very conveniently located (two blocks away from my hotel, lots of parking).  No drive thru through.  My food was fine, it was a donut and coffee so easy to make.  It was odd to see that there were like a dozen and a half people in line to order with a person, and no people to order form the kiosks, so I ordered from the kiosk and the food came out very quickly.  A+ service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Deep Taggar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXT1_qCqtQFsW3fScB67Ym5eyohlA3AJaqmqgHN3Q28zagMLWFb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We went to grab coffee this morning and placed a mobile order. We waited 15 minutes and asked one of their rudest girls if our order is ready and the way she answered us, she should be fired right away. She yelled at us for no reason and ruined our whole day. I would suggest her to leave the job if she can’t even speak nicely to their customers. She has zero customer service skills and an abundance of bad attitude. If you work in customer service environment, you should learn how to keep your tongue under control. I would never suggest this place to anyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jagdish kaur Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITbgtxTMg1F6OS8WaXxCPImr-aXMJKU-qEcNyoMDWDDALQUA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The worst service I can ever get is here specially from Punjabi girls working here. They think they are real canadians and behave like they hate us. Have some senses girls and please be nice to customers and give correct orders. Complained to manager still the service is worst.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"David & Patti Ens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCrwxnBL2_VqJnEgLg0JtK_fNSDOCo9bnsDqabFska_Kpl4DON=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We stopped in after being picked up at YVR. Parking was tricky, but we were fortunate and a space opened up for us. We decided what we wanted, but no one was there to take the order. After a while a young lady called "next", and we placed our order. She got it all correct and we waited for the food to come up. It took a long time, if I'm being honest. Finally we got what we ordered and sat down to eat. The table was a bit sticky and the floor needed a mopping. We finished as quickly as we could and left.
Please go see how it is and write your review. It is not a bad restaurant, it just has poor management. That can be fixed if corporate knows it is substandard.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMk0V6D0JpAMFWauApruPp89QKNMI7S1V5haym9&fid=0x0:0xedc3ea1afde82514"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Kvlifestyle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHnupsYENa5rrbmom6kyQufxUA2ehJgar9AgudaDl3GplDeAs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I GOT ROBBED BY TIM HORTON's staff today....So today Wednesday August 07.2024 approximately 11:23am I was in line to place my order. I ordered the fully loaded cilantro chicken wrap. I have ordered this many times before at this location and other locations. The cost was $7.79 + tax = $8.18 as you can see in my screen shot from my debit transaction.  I was on my lunch break. I stood on the side waiting to pick up my order like other customers. My wrap was ready and I grabbed it, even said thank you and  off I went to my car. As I sat in my car I opened the wrap to take my first bite like I always do. Then I realize today's wrap is totally off size!! But I was on my break and was in a rush back to work (cause to have to clock back in) so I didn't bother going back inside with a long line (lunch rush) I took my first bite and had to take another picture of my wrap. I kept shaking my head saying, "there is NO WAY this wrap I ordered should be under 4"!" Then I took few more bites and my wrap was finished. I got back to work and told my manager and colleagues. Everyone said why didn't I go complain. Told them I'm on my break on the clock. So my manager approved me to go back and complain. Shortly after I went back. Waited patiently for a staff to greet me and i nicely and calmly asked to speak to their manager. I greeted the manager and she greeted me. I asked her what is the size of your cilantro chicken wrap. Tim Hortons manager replied, "our wrap comes in at 10". When it's folded it becomes about 6". I said ok sounds fair and I understand. I then showed her my photo of the cilantro chicken wrap from earlier. As she was looking at the photo I asked her "does this look like 6" ???" I then said it's like 4". She then said, "sometimes our wrap comes in smaller size." She never apologized. She never offered to remake a new wrap or refund. She then asked me," how did it taste?" I'm shaking my head and said, "taste the same like always but that's not the point here." She then said, "thank you for showing us this and I will let my staff know to wrap it better next time." I'm standing there still shaking my head?!!!!! And just walked off. This manager obviously thought nothing was wrong. Didn't care to apologize or remake me a wrap. This is unacceptable!! $8.18 for 3.5 bites of this 10" wrap or 6" wrap. Here are some pictures from today compared to what Tim
Hortons advertised. You be the judge for yourself. She said it becomes 6". Ok fine I respect that. Well here's my 4" wrap......","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNP-IepIKudCJySajvIS7RQo477KMJN1oigKTFY&fid=0x0:0xedc3ea1afde82514"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Abhinav Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6TogcalTUutmcqpgYDRoNZ4Emh_MwgLC9v6JmLIsKq1iFoA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Asked for large mocha iced cap without whipped cream. But they give the order with whipped cream and when I asked them that it’s not the correct one they just simply remove it like this as shone in the photo. This is really unprofessional. I paid full price. It’s not fair.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjVRRcqEzGKMHfwzu2hZII27AoSVc-_2DmG2bk&fid=0x0:0xedc3ea1afde82514"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Mehran bakhtiari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX52_I8QBEvpbwP2DsvccLDQ1hUjTB0qEjwNL_660Q7Wjozcaqk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"What is the criteria for hiring an employee at this Tim Hortons branch?
Being rude?
Being nervous?
If you are nervous for any reason, it is better not to be a cashier.
Customers are not responsible for your discomfort if you want to speak badly to them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrkFzbLwIJZs_lsHa_31cbhvm_jZHjE4123CuY&fid=0x0:0xedc3ea1afde82514"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Khaled Hussein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJCznp-SUGeE-QfkhbPEIky56rNsjMQDyj8ID8pF3EEbpwxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always pass by this branch during my work hours, and I’d like to mention that I am truly impressed by a girl employee named “Muskan” (I asked for her name during my last visit so I could leave this review). She always carries such positive energy, greeting everyone with a smile and remarkable patience! From what I’ve observed, she is the most professional employee there and should be in a position to teach customer service to the entire Tim Hortons team! Thank you to Muskan and to everyone like her! She should be rewarded for her excellent service and professionalism in preparing orders.

5 starts just because of her!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKFVokNn1sh194MVvRIlaePzNe5f1mJ96xYLw&fid=0x0:0xedc3ea1afde82514"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"harman sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiVtcZxfVNfYIl2d6MPEDh1SWP8IKkWsLT_d4eakXsTk6vig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the food quality of this tim hortons. I believe this is the only time hortons in Vancouver where they maintain quality of the food.
The staff here are so welcoming especially- Tamanna, Tanishka, vanshika.
So keep it up guys 💪🏻💪🏻💪🏻💪🏻💪🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_4yTWq4BRg86B4vJXorx4K2cx5FOtlmSPCmZC&fid=0x0:0xedc3ea1afde82514"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Santhosh Vijayan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILVlpBBDKLiwk83UIhNGb4rS53yC_2WSVVrNouvnltY1vogQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice service providing so far. Employees are really nice behaving. Clean and well maintained restaurant.Fast service 👍 They are well trained I think. Belpreet is very smart and deal the customer good. One of the best Tim Hortons in Vancouver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gurek Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOepGwFvzCj_BQJz6pq8drkuNvXemSg0-Z0fB5BUJOamdNHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered a everthing begal  tosted with butter and  with chipotle sauce
I told to night shift girl  to put sauce extra because last time nobody can put sauce inside my begal
I don't know why but she put like this.
Why she doing like this
She is in night shift","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv8TX9VHD02nGvXnhCi4B17oHgi5pv7dEocwvD&fid=0x0:0xedc3ea1afde82514"],"When":"2024-6-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We came here for a dinner with another family on Sunday night. The food quality was fine, just like at other White Spots. Kids had their Pirate Packs while we ordered the Legendary Burger and Chicken Tenders. Endless sides as usual in case you're hungry!

Once we sat down, the servers were good too. But since they didn't have a lot of servers, we had to wait 20 mins to get seated for a table of 8. You also can't make reservations here unlike other White Spot locations. And this was at 5pm .. the start of the dinner rush. So be prepared to wait!

We liked how it was inside Richmond Centre, across from Cactus Club, so we could stroll around after the meal. But parking was hard to find so plan accordingly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP448XVx_W4NQIecv0OQ2L2mYf9D33sjBfiWswH&fid=0x0:0xb32555de0e6742c0"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Joshua Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiq_RKExmA89Du8aX-W-ZBs3qCm4qRSNgBD8pl68UG5TZxMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience on Monday, Nov 18, 2024 was very good. First , Katerina was very nice. And then they have fast food service. She politely waited so that we can think about what we want. There was a fireplace for people and it was kid friendly. Katerina was also very friendly. There is a separate menu for kids and adults. I have some pictures down below.

I wish I could give this a 7 star review.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOPvDIaMgOOMCQEUbm_4nAE4E27c4dgxOcmSlU&fid=0x0:0xb32555de0e6742c0"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Anjali Pillai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbS9H8edzDEAxi_3l4xeMKVQAQwEbi1DVj2WXZmWpkCSekihg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered the Fettuccine Alfredo with the White Spot Club Sandwich, Fish & Chips and the classic Egg Benedict! It was soo good However the coffee we ordered was bad, it was cold and tasted watery.

I must say our server Kamila was fabulous, she kept visiting our table, we had mentioned to have our items served without bacon and she made sure our food restrictions were heard. She was very attentive and deserves a raise! Koodos to her!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJcfjhwECSiqSUh2GOl0bWP10OlosnhgEfrsPZ&fid=0x0:0xb32555de0e6742c0"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was delicious and great customer service
I highly recommend this restaurant","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOj60ff0moHDoDJRYNeeLq8hwlt2tQyZcQt_k4a&fid=0x0:0xb32555de0e6742c0"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent breakfast taste pretty good and comfortable sitting
Staff not the most attentive but acceptable
Coffee  could also be better rather bland
Free parking at the mall","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWZ0S9hdPAgAVOGDipF4XYYBsVooBj1c5mlmij&fid=0x0:0xb32555de0e6742c0"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Mariena Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Nw1jeBXne8haJacgZytBHrMEqU2gmOMAF3l5QWK0CwO3rXPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was decent and the server was alright. I do find white spot to be a bit more expensive","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLtvnKXV3NATlNx2jqqKnjyxWJdiXjRUL1q8fh&fid=0x0:0xb32555de0e6742c0"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It took awhile before a server came to take our lunch order, and we had to ask for ice water. While our server was efficient, our group had to ask for things like coffee refills (rather than them being proactive). My Prawn & Avocado Bowl was nicely presented and had a good variety of ingredients (bacon, smashed potatoes, toast, prawns, avocado, poached eggs and hollandaise). It had good colour. The eggs were a bit too runny for my personal preference, but was good to coat the potatoes in! The bacon was also cooked well, and was not shrivelled nor greasy.

The Strawberry Rhubarb Pie was much larger than what was pictured in the menu, and it did have a good tart flavour. However, it was quite saucy on the inside and we would've preferred if the strawberries & rhubarb filling was thicker and held together better. The vanilla bean ice cream also melted fast! Ample parking in the mall lot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPC8JADP1fUfxFU7Xpp3GshYVcMKMIVRE-o30Y_&fid=0x0:0xb32555de0e6742c0"],"When":"2024-5-3"},{"Name":"alice w","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfBFd5-MCz0iWhHQjADA6mFZoHPhSAyoSlVDQe971OUgYbxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent very clean food is good service but little be slow the pork ribs is really good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcDSlE5agGCSkR-IOFZRGPHbw5jKJeNUbukQRU&fid=0x0:0xb32555de0e6742c0"],"When":"2024-8-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Khue N.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVhVKylYAtr_zgjEBMuypkuJBrSM3sCJT_8EE6YWBCFfnw53OL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The coffee here was so good, took me right back to Vietnam!!!

I’ve tried many ca phe sua at many viet places in Vancouver but always left feeling disappointed, it’s either too sweet or too watery. This place really nailed it, can’t wait to try more drinks!

I’ve seen they even sell bottled coffee (?) and it’s inside Banh Mi Ba Le place so you get two in one place. Sooooo good!!

Limited seatings but plenty parking spots.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCB6J-B3UcE-QmxMtJkEWP7JSyLb7oyOO4dEgR&fid=0x0:0x3f0edf035b552130"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Clement Chew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwKhl3mEn2gCZF6VdKbi7gB6oYfqEyv4ScXRvTHDS2H04sB70nmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really enjoyed the Hanoi drip ube Vietnamese coffee! The ube was perfectly balanced—not too sweet—and complemented the rich flavor of the Vietnamese coffee","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5DQw3XnIV4k5gQjG_oQlqM9nrdktEqgw10NTm&fid=0x0:0x3f0edf035b552130"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"elaine zhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-SjtHnXPj_icrE-ZwEVjQB_3_Gx4hU_dtsEb7kHOxO1xpEcdj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered Ube Coconut Coffee and Black Sesame Latte, and love both! Nice drink and looking forward to try other drinks on the menu next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsWUFCQUP3nTReg_Q6R3Z2gUTOaBNhQQHk05VE&fid=0x0:0x3f0edf035b552130"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9-9RM8UxhR1OSp_BYzMNofg4VvmPhWmfDxtsrIseThc-pNA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hanoi Drip Coffee Richmond is a must-visit spot for coffee lovers! From the moment you walk in, the vibe is warm and inviting, blending modern design with authentic Vietnamese charm.

The coffee is next-level—their 100% Vietnamese robusta beans create bold, smooth, and perfectly balanced drinks. I tried the classic Vietnamese iced coffee (ca phe sua da), and it was the perfect kickstart to my day!

Customer service is on point. The staff is knowledgeable, friendly, and clearly passionate about what they do. They were more than happy to explain the menu and even share the story behind their coffee beans!

Whether you’re grabbing a quick coffee or looking for a cozy place to work or hang out, this spot is the real deal. Don’t miss their ube coconut latte—so unique and delicious.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"C L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTU8TH5lq4rZ1fPYRJ14w_qANSg-34AdVnR04TJt3cMzGq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had the viet iced coffee at the Hanoi Drip Rupert location and it was very strong and good.

Seems like Bale finally opened up a Hanoi Drip few days ago.  So instead of getting viet iced coffee, I tried the Red Thai Milk Tea.  Very good...similar to what you get in Thailand.

Minus one star for wanting to charge additional % if you use a credit card instead of cash or debit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlRdRPlM9-mXw_Oi0snluCaf4iw7Tg1NGfRlobrT8noGkzJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Viet coffee. Probably one of the best and tastiest because most Vietnamese places don’t seem to get the right sweetness or taste when making the Viet coffee. Will definitely come back when I’m in the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karwen Tsan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn0t5jmwXxKS3KRBdJYmn5Oq1KIVbQONhEn8KH992P65_MT1fa8w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fast speedy service.   Great tasting coffee and Crispy banh mi bread. Will return.  Thx","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMD4M5JbsvY17e4kspiVQOD0Lcwv9423mcOM9nb&fid=0x0:0x3f0edf035b552130"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Dennis Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVod0Irwbj4BHs0xH4gjix0eqZz1UbVO78AnVXMUDeHt7RpcSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the ube coconut 🥥 Viet icecoffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOV0lH2ulpFiiqsx4SxgMnz2r7HKmTvJDkDv5h&fid=0x0:0x3f0edf035b552130"],"When":"2024-10-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jeffrey Dignum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBcy9wgOwUkphKaqP4bahnJB4Lyue2aCceXAC-n2AHGbEzZkBt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m not usually leaving a review but this person has beyond my expectation! Kudos to Glen who took our orders! My son’s keep changing their orders when ordering in the store. he managed to work with us professionally and patiently to settle our orders. Even his manager or supervisor asked him more tasks to do while taking orders. Thank you for an Awesome Customer Service Glen","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNc5lf0g3EwLuBVOa5u2KhV2PVeFUsX8ky8A6bp&fid=0x0:0x3205ba13c25f482a"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Daniel Coronado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7Wok1Lbp5ZwkPDltYCf4EbML5IK2dF9W9g4ARthOrTXxgOkax-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped in while in Vancouver to get some of our "Official" Canadian stops out of the way! We were pleasantly surprised by the coffee, food options and of course the different types of donuts available to us! Not to mention the cost, two large coffees and two donuts for about $9 Canadian which was about $7 something US, I believe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPxsVUOxabwkbTerKff7q8yGC56PORGDnB-TMs&fid=0x0:0x3205ba13c25f482a"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Amelia Glover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPzbKvPKixw2fn2bhrmZMSrYCMzRxDkdSWGi9Jb05c5s-R=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s a very busy Saturday especially since it’s almost lunchtime, but the staff are doing their best to serve everyone. The little lady preparing our food was very friendly when she asked if she could replace our sandwich, as they had run out of biscuits. She worked very fast despite the hectic atmosphere! Kudos to this store for providing great service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Diana Ortiz (Nana)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd7UoDX_Ek-Akz7kCAus8GC8vLoXqsxTHIG36bj2PGLMQa60O6Cg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fast service, good customer service, delicious cold drinks (we didn't try hot ones).

The donuts are delicious and we tried the garlic ones with fine herbs, which were delicious.

A good option to share and chat with friends, family even by himself","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPY_r_yjItmSI31XHP73boy_SJOeHy-5bNu2fJz&fid=0x0:0x3205ba13c25f482a"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"O B S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5-acwaSzcuibtCxkLzYSF1VQcKmzy0DgJzLAVRn0lDfG5uHfFOw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I controlled myself before in giving a bad review about this location but it happened again for the 3rd time.
I usually order online for pick up so when I get to the store my order is ready or close to being ready. The first 2 instances my order has been ready but no one called my name or my order number. We kept on waiting for my name to be called but nobody did which made me decide to come to the mobile pick up. There I found my order , coffee getting cold and no one bothered asking me even if I was already standing by the Mobile Pick up. I will be forgiving if it was crazy busy but it wasn't and staff were just chit chatting. Today, went straight to mobile pick up because I'm not sure if the staff will call me. Waited patiently and saw my order being prepared. (The counter order which i think I was about 5min ahead since I placed my mobile order was served ahead of me) I was standing there waiting for the staff up call or ask me but my order was just placed down and was left beside the machine. So I need to ask if that order is for me which was definitely mine. Had I not asked even if I'm standing there for the next 30min or an hour nobody will bother asking if I'm waiting for my order etc. So different with RC which I think is way busier that this location. Bridgeport","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"rae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXE2Ll9j7SH2Pv2LKZOOu1a9vVzagDBBZrAzHXMr1Z03rXNhk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of my favourite Tim’s I love how they offer drive-through pick up and in-store pick up. It’s great if you have a car or just walking to the bus stop. they always have everything in stocked only during the nighttime they have less baked goods which is totally understandable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was near my house I used to live so I’m always glad to come back and have a quick lunch.
Employees are always friendly and fast with orders and I like new stuff on menu like Cilantro crispy chicken bowl 👌🏼
All recommendations for this Tim Hortons restaurant…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlxYkYCfw87UmHAHrlVu3UUDC_7e3eBAs6lJjs&fid=0x0:0x3205ba13c25f482a"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Reg Belyea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLXkwhPLhl6PTOpWtztQvj60Mca6EyvG5NHU0tbTkXJ6YbgXc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped for a coffee and breakfast sandwich, as usual the meal was excellent quality!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP49MLlu4z0AjVG8WS6bvfGxWjkf_8lOkoro4n2&fid=0x0:0x3205ba13c25f482a"],"When":"2024-8-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ximena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUayTatAEE6Z9z7xL_08iL8v1IvA-RW3jU6jIGt68yyYbPR6nqU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely coffee shop. Small but super spacious. Prices are fair and they have a lot of options. The atmosphere it’s super calm. Decoration is on point and the service is great. Their chocolate croissant is amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2qkPo2YBhH7kRO3LG6V3lENo4K_g9PTpyBGzl&fid=0x0:0x1290fe78e961559b"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Deborah Aiko Insook Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkrXzRxO3A2OGqiLyPY_PlsYk2B44E-xgPkg6UAgy-1KwY7fkT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently discovered this café by chance, and I was pleasantly surprised. The space is larger than I expected with plenty of comfortable tables. The staff were shy but very friendly, which added to the charm. The coffee was delicious, and parking was easy to find, which is always a plus. I also loved that I could pick up some Italian groceries while I was there. Overall, a great experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYKLk_Qlf8T6GepzNAaT48sb9Rs8qQ1sFxVDch&fid=0x0:0x1290fe78e961559b"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Frank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV32Dl3aDuecVTKkUVDILvrpBYb8ATjyfxIGWGxKJriKTeCzCiJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stepped into this charming coffee shop today and instantly fell in love with the atmosphere. The space strikes a perfect balance between rustic and modern, with its standout wooden plank ceiling and warm, globe pendant lights casting a cozy glow throughout.

I ordered an Americano. The coffee was rich and well-balanced. My London Fog tea was equally satisfying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYRc_IkT_l5guJ-0vGiY96d1nL26pD0zEfR8f_&fid=0x0:0x1290fe78e961559b"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Jeremy Hannaford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJh4gJaa4fTCJIngBRIGMrmmqMdx4ZxIh5c_eHCdtOqz7VOAFhyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely little coffee shop with a ton of additional items including pesto, ice tea and more.
Pretty reasonable prices as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX97H4qX5Snu66LU3c8BsIlzdXpwObHCAVhztb&fid=0x0:0x1290fe78e961559b"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Chef Menajem Peretz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFHHucZwQOsfB8-8SKRbUjhOVQd_5RL6RbAdEZcnLC3uuqNK4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a beautiful corner coffee shop with a totally neighborhood vibe. It is clean, modern, and inviting. Usually, I am not around this area, but what a great addition. Definitely a place for meeting, working, or just reading a book.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnmhJ1N3pAUXy6PY5xo7bipBQ2l5x5TJhJXhs&fid=0x0:0x1290fe78e961559b"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm a coffee addict and I'd say the coffee bean is good. I got a mocha this time and the balanced flavour and texture is great. I'd be back to try on their pastries when I have more room for my appetite. Ambiance is not so crowded which is great. Love the simplicity and vintage atmosphere. I just based my rating in comparison to the other cafes around the town. But il definitely support this local establishment. Go local!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZrkoK52PLY-GnOT4m1BkKgEJ4OrImHkbjfkGA&fid=0x0:0x1290fe78e961559b"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"Jacqueline Gallant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWG-tugujkbfadM66vrr0jPwuiRkmdZRunbCfUsNnGRHBdXsU2CkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cute little cafe tucked away in the community. It also doubles as a pantry store as well with a limited selection. The ambiance is cozy and calm, a great place to relax for a moment with a good book. I grabbed one of their breakfast sandwiches and coffee when I was last there and it was really tasty. Definitely will be coming back as often as possible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmthEYvsGhiNdpBJiWa1ef33ae-iqMvk4w313A&fid=0x0:0x1290fe78e961559b"],"When":"2024-2-15"},{"Name":"Cheshta Bhasin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO9mCwmCAifgK6bkb9zTKnSUjaPLR3E7ThLyEd74l6hAiJJsMgTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A lovely coffee shop with a big, calm space — perfect for working. The ambience is great. There aren’t many options on the menu, but whatever is offered is absolutely delicious. I had the breakfast sandwich and it was soooo good. Love this place!","Images":null,"When":""}]
