user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joseph Fung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkZEb8e5c-d48CtQKYY357rxTS2qVXdqhij1aQG0wnJ9RdQaSW8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"🌟 Happy Hong Kong Restaurant 🌟

I had an amazing dining experience here, all thanks to a last-minute gathering with friends! 🤩 One of my friends flew in from Edmonton, connecting through Vancouver, and we decided to grab a meal before they headed off to Hong Kong. ✈️

This restaurant is inside a hotel, so parking was a breeze with lots of spots available 🚗👍. The food? Absolutely delicious! 🍜🍤 With a huge variety of Hong Kong-style dishes to choose from, there’s something for everyone. 😋 I loved how the flavors reminded me of the authentic tastes of Hong Kong! 🇭🇰

What really stood out was the staff 👏. They were so friendly, constantly coming over to chat and even sharing a few laughs with us 😄. Their warm hospitality made the meal even more enjoyable. ❤️

Another bonus is that there’s no time limit ⏰! Unlike other spots in Richmond, we could take our time and fully enjoy the food and company without feeling rushed. 🕐

All in all, I love this place! 💖 I highly recommend it for anyone looking for a relaxing, authentic Hong Kong dining experience with great food and friendly service. 🍽️🍲

This keeps it within your word count and captures the essence of your experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3R7HZHEuSU0Hgmq3D5pWzm5A9DGwg359wkmaS&fid=0x0:0xb68c3b4b3e6405d0"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Hong Kong style cafe with both Chinese and Western foods. It’s located on Bridgeport across from Costco and parking is limited.
Their foods were hits and misses but in generous portion size. Kitchen a bit slow though ladies were very nice and personable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjqWFzQc_NDD0kU47QX8URnbmoaWtj9Mo3pKfW&fid=0x0:0xb68c3b4b3e6405d0"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Jay Why","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWf6qVrRB2FWSP3f_QpdYqgSMlmFo0fYvO9JkGkahstgPZxGBo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty good Cha chaan teng in an area where you don't expect it. We went there for brunch before heading to Costco across the street and was surprised at the price and portion of the food. It not the best tasting food around but still pretty good. Parking is bad, especially at dinner time and they can get very busy. The service was also quick and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNz9hBcCOBKtdR5b1NtPtfHX5Xa7AYreKllQjAC&fid=0x0:0xb68c3b4b3e6405d0"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Happy Hong Kong Restaurant, like many HK cafes, operates at a fast pace and prioritizes efficiency, which some may interpret as rude or impersonal. I noticed a lady sitting next to me who seemed put off by this and, along with her partner, left without eating while expressing feelings of disrespect. However, for me, the atmosphere felt familiar and nostalgic. The food was satisfyingly well portioned and flavorful, and the prices were reasonable. I'd gladly return for another visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPa696tOxBhUP81pT2b0xoFH3egz3oCwHMNMMGg&fid=0x0:0xb68c3b4b3e6405d0"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Adriana Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw8TxIjObJW9SI3OLKrPLLWlfbdE8ceaMspO03jhoHEYDyCZLJ7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of my favourite Hong Kong style cafe in Richmond. Very fresh pineapple buns with butter and the French toast was so fresh. Will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMz3DY5mP7E6y_XjhaApgPNE7V5BIF3CbZdo8ic&fid=0x0:0xb68c3b4b3e6405d0"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"ミスタードーナツ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXrBvi4iBWRqQhd6YUjOsI1njaZ9-88FHOjTUvy9KJQij9prh6lw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was ok, about on par with Happy Date, cutlet pork chop was a bit lean for my liking.  We ordered a combo where they forgot our soup, but didn’t bother saying anything as we were full anyway.

Steak was not good, lol, but that should be expected for an $8 steak.  Unseasoned, and a bit chewy….gray 🤣

May go back again, if parking is easy to find.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8twmjkUiPQG6jr6diyXasJTIHIe7I_ZfV-c4B&fid=0x0:0xb68c3b4b3e6405d0"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"Kenrick Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4Qlr-7avGGG_gw-sdMVAbZ5vTLZXDpwcJ4A7g2sjiGekUnOtm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"At first glance prices seemed high but the portions are very large. Was cooked well and not overly salty. Service could have been a it better and food delivery more consistent/quicker. Overall a good option for a variety of HK styled dishes. Parking is a pain during peak times also as the lot is small and shared with other businesses and the motel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYxMG915qH5ta0MzFRO9hnnN5LyEluLwporZqz&fid=0x0:0xb68c3b4b3e6405d0"],"When":"2023-10-26"},{"Name":"Em","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWi3QiusifdOJzcAF7-Z-6Ds6Hu7i20GIe6_NGGQFD1lghZGFg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had simple pork rice noodle that comes with a drink and pay $3 for soup. Good deal and food tastes very good Hong Kong style","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP592ZvZOzIs41eEYZ8THvlw3jg_kZg8fgeNdPW&fid=0x0:0xb68c3b4b3e6405d0"],"When":"2024-12-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hiro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTugIRaO0gkYAy_ExJDXCZFxJqHjBnPyDVYLBYjjBCRdT652sY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I had a family Sunday dinner here after we found that IKEA restaurant was closed at 6pm. There were a few customers at that time, so we seated quickly. My kids were so excited about their Pirates boat meal that comes with fountain drink and dessert. Kids can order a main meal and sides from so many options which was nice. Unfortunately, what we got was a bit disappointed. Their food was OK, but nothing special. Most of them seemed to be made from frozen foods. My fries were soggy and cold. My wife’s chicken on the salad was hard and dry. My kids left most of their meal because of the taste. I felt those meals were overpriced because of the quality. I understand that they need to reduce those food cost, but I thinks they should improve their food quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZ-K-2zjxOuXqgiFm5aV_r4cP3KVouwui8Zd9l&fid=0x0:0xe4878073efa24fa3"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here today to get my all time favorite, the spinach and mushroom fettuccine. I have dined in this location quite a few times after shopping at Ikea and the staffs were great here, everytime. Will definitely come back again soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOVU-rqOq9Pse-u5ne4qbcfaPjrlGVa6wf1Ddl&fid=0x0:0xe4878073efa24fa3"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dined here several times for a quick work lunch. Favourite would be the burger, yam fries, and the salad. Service has always been fantastic!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_ja8PVl1MItiPW_HZR3ON9zzgtb0I_Fq6dXTK&fid=0x0:0xe4878073efa24fa3"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Alyssa Brooks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSv8_CrbDbgiQ2WfbumeGzdDSwPQWKjz5qhmFRu3GdCxNKciEuLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"WORST SERVICE EVER!!
Went for dinner last night ,we never saw our server without having to call for him, brought me the wrong meal to start off with came back and said he grabbed wrong plate, my food was great however my friends was not great especially the sweet potato fries.
Finished dinner and dirty plates left on table, decided to have dessert had to call over server took order again left dirty plates on table then finished our desserts wanted bill he came over asked how it was we said good and he literally gave us 2 thumbs up and said "Great,Enjoy"
This was after our complete meal and dessert was done AND now he left all 4 dirty plates on table and never did bring our bill.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Supun Ranaraja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSF7vT1xmMddne-YjH0vPq4Vog-I3Lcf4oPe3L8FcHTOEFQJt6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an absolutely delightful dining experience at White Spot Sweden Way. My family and I stopped by for a cozy dinner, and their fish and chips absolutely stole the show. The atmosphere was warm and inviting, perfect for a family outing.
The service was top-notch - attentive, friendly, and prompt. Our server made sure we had everything we needed throughout our meal.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"AG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTVyMm7SUzrWXHy5W9YTTw8RiR5u-uqKsPcACPZNBpht5PoCY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This one is so close to IKEA, so perfect for us to have a nice weekend lunch then continue shopping. This restaurant is not crowded, food was good. Service made us felt great as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMZIrcNHSH8tU8tR9gRvzp8HiDh6heWR4FMC4c&fid=0x0:0xe4878073efa24fa3"],"When":"2023-12-19"},{"Name":"Sandra Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS3d7aZA4lMhkB4lrjOTrDjB_p6PvngmeWQeM0VFHPfzqli2Uc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Slow service and so-so food taste overall. The hash browns (smashed potatoes) were not seasoned well, unlike last time (a reason we were back today)...sad! My veggie burger wasn’t tasty either, but the Spot salad was awesome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhKJimikjLyLElYBjCku6tA15LaIckWXwn6O_K&fid=0x0:0xe4878073efa24fa3"],"When":"2021-1-9"},{"Name":"Ric Thomsen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbMQSj-42VN4SBBemyP6dYbom8wv8Ua1r7BhtpIzHpqa1v1voQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It was a sunny afternoon, and the temperature in the restaurant was 90+ degrees. Service was friendly but slow. Severely understaffed. I love the White Spot. So do my parents,  my kids, and my grandkids. Seems like the restaurant chain needs to focus on a business plan that understands that this place is more than just a restaurant.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alvin Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe7GNAcDD_olIxPvjJNxL1Hm7Qi7x4Wh-Txa7EiT1fdDm_8c2Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super chill little cafe that serves bowls and plates of deliciousness.   Priced well for the proportions and quality of the food provided on a made to order style, the food takes a front stage it arrives and you get to carve into it.

That said, don't miss out on the drinks, the tea selection is quite good, and for Asian teas.  served in a nice pot, which adds to the experience.   Coffee bases are generously large for the caffeine addicts.

Service is basic, but functional, staff friendly and openly communicative.

Atmosphere is a mix of retro/retiree business , and modern tea/coffee shop.  The mix of interesting coffee/tea hardware sits amongst a deli fridge.

Summary, come for food, relaxed area, don't come if your in a rush, or stick to the baked goods if that's the case!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6Xv9uXqUIilLti7bvPPQop4bNIeV_l0VNEBJ5&fid=0x0:0x29e00a347c067550"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Mz Ali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJypKHANfNlXO4d-SSO8Vlllina8PYZC7zDscyBwkQPreC1MA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the everything bowl which was....everything. I don't even care that it was a reasonable price, the portion was so generous (5 or 6 dumplings, large piece of beef, perfect egg, pickled vegetables, noodles) and it was perfectly seasoned. Absolute gem of a find. Also? They open at 830 which is the most logical time for a bowl like this!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpVcwm5PjmoT3r8LLXXD8qRGXQIv7U-sksmteG&fid=0x0:0x29e00a347c067550"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Amy Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdCc8a96z2pCnLRYxOEKmAes9mGWP3kxL_HIDiTs4T2WB7yg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It an interesting restaurant. They have so many different tea pots and cups display. Many Chinese tea selection.
The food is delicious .
My friend and I all had good time there!

The staff is very friendly !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBqSt9R6j_bzdGFOSICH5h7D2Mln0J0kTYWH1V&fid=0x0:0x29e00a347c067550"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Gabriel Gutierrez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0N0L8CVyy2kKjYu5Ea0T8EFVZVWtRORAiHdi6QDz8AdYBhBrm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Try the food, the cafe side of things were great! Bakery was good and the atmosphere set by the music and staff was very warm and welcoming. Peaceful and friendly staff, nice place to visit while in the area. 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQZ2HBwpVf0buhnVq22H5uBKcePmySf-vmfLGJ&fid=0x0:0x29e00a347c067550"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Thisibillie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXu2knW8t0sLvKNCHWqidgkmwY-W6A9so4LOf51SnpX3RfMMdM1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can’t recommend it more!!

Great coffee, muffins, cheese cake here! Plus some real Chinese tea leaves. Very nice owner as well.

They change daily special lunch every day!

Great for study, chatting, or solo dining and chilling.

An ideal cafe, in my opinion!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2iXaIYLQv3Wg34GfCbKE30D02DnXX9mhquIVz&fid=0x0:0x29e00a347c067550"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Emily Creer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUh76r7OQsDq2zTvKNh2k2SO5kH19fP5HY4xNFJ3wVkImkqam-FLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious. Staff were super friendly. The wonton were so good they were fresh and really tasty I could eat so many.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-hZHO0bDKchi9nOm6-bG9wuRSCdJRn0usDoi_&fid=0x0:0x29e00a347c067550"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"George Scandi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLv2kAmQd-R92Vcih-nW9OMGYU13kq_aAFGJlqTtcUVbuCsOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a wonderful gem! I had an appointment nearby and stopped in for a coffee and a snack.
The folks working there were incredibly nice (perhaps the owners).
The atmosphere was very cozy and clean. Prices were excellent. Food was made with love and they very kindly and wonderfully accommodated my custom requests on the chicken bowl. I loved looking at all the cute teapots and cups.
I might just come back with all my friends so they can try the cheesecake.
I hope the owners see this - thank you so much for making my day yesterday!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elton Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_SVkVqkNe3SvSFwaZ1xrBYHObNVkTiTTXXYykf58guqGIk3qy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This cafe is owned by Taiwanese and it is a hidden gem in the neighbourhood. The cafe has a causal ambient and you can find many choices of foods which are not expensive.

I ordered the lunch special which is spaghetti bolognaise with meat balls. The portion is big and you can’t find the same price elsewhere with this big portion. The latte was find too. The cost performance was beyond my expectation.

The interior was clean and neat and the free WiFi password was shown clearly.

The owner was very friendly to us and we had a nice little chat. He served me the latte and asked me if I needed more spaghetti. The service was great.

Outside the cafe there are roadside parking spaces. The place is easy to find. I’d recommend this cafe and I will go there again for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCww8lFuFXfvIKPHD2lPUbz29iTH9Xcj3UOKE&fid=0x0:0x29e00a347c067550"],"When":"2023-11-11"}]

Refreshing, delicious, easy to digest. Highly recommended, especially for kids and elderlies :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPwcV1SAwau0tKXPIY67xy6P6WW6Xt6dbqIxqF\u0026fid=0x0:0x9a8fdf896e95b825"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Sheryl Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzNht8DncMfk97CrHArfj8UAvkdsKvF3dxuZREywB0NpGTKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"HORRIBLE, do not order these buns. They came cold and taste like stale old dry buns. they clearly microwaved these with plastic wrap over it. I can't believe I spents $36.00 on such garbage!! Called to complain and was told that I should pick it up in person next time, because Uber gets delayed. There website mentions nothing about using Uber to deliver to these items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGCHxKpaN__y-8Bln79mMvfTP7DsfZzDZIHYeS\u0026fid=0x0:0x9a8fdf896e95b825"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Linh Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbP3plInkqXVOA2XJc8czoQ80aWBGnT8WS-yMiUPgvNShtt-y90A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came at 11pm and didn't expect much but the food \u0026 drink were so great that we'll be happy to come back. We had the mango lover coconut pudding, chicken coconut soup, summer mojito (non-alcoholic) and peach oolong tea with cream cheese. We love everything! That bowl of soup was the best thing at $6!!! So hearty and delicious, especially on a rainy night.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3rmmrAYlVsJqsGwHcuGKbMro-fdaHOh-qVxGY\u0026fid=0x0:0x9a8fdf896e95b825"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Pooja A Kundra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGrOKtnJEkOBpmuefIn2fZNiu1NOnbOJ-J1AlQfN6NtonOlPGPHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great drinks \u0026 customer service. We enjoyed the Mad Mango drink, Mango Lover’s pudding, \u0026 Summer Mojito. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQixJU425pFQx4E_qRj65lbnuBE_SmpIbD_xbO\u0026fid=0x0:0x9a8fdf896e95b825"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Jade Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFAOD0kmbYBclK7WQqTBq4ON68NMo6eJhpPjkf9ZGfJpZvFYnMEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was looking for a late bbt/dessert place in Richmond! Found that place and decided to try their number #1 best seller: Mad Mango! It was good loved how refreshing it was with the mango, it was not too sweet and the coconut pudding was a great touch to add to the smoothness of this drink! Also tried the bbt brown sugar but overall prefer the Mad Mango for sure! It also owned by 2 sweet couple which are so nice! Great customer service! Would definitely recommend and come back ☺️✨","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsFSK9HjzEE8FbjyfuUb1Xtt0bqOi4UzOeD5Ps\u0026fid=0x0:0x9a8fdf896e95b825"],"When":"2022-5-10"},{"Name":"Leah Cooney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXL_hhId5AJhpy6N56NCM3CCjfI5b8NsGRLekyHFjbgtsh2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Drinks were very good. Decent price. Other things on the menu looked really nice, would definitely be back if we were staying longer. Service was great, the guy who served us was really nice, would highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMM_ZXfKUc1sY7eoPjyyVB05kztaPenD8Wp64oN\u0026fid=0x0:0x9a8fdf896e95b825"],"When":"2023-7-31"},{"Name":"Kim Ngo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVUW51_JD2gdhn69RUo1eSblKz6hTdynmiwsfhIJkcwOR-VDzhSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place was clean and neat, the lady there was polite and sweet, and the presentation was great. We got the mango lover’s coconut pudding, and it was worth it just to eat a fresh coconut on a warm day. The mango pieces were sweet and the chewy taro balls were fun to eat. It was a great experience to try at least once!\n\nAfter speaking with what seems like the owners (the lady and an older gentleman), I can tell that they put a lot of effort into this place, especially if they’re getting coconuts from Thailand that have a hefty bit of meat to them and cutting them open themselves. Kudos for all of their hard work!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNnFRxThCLXX5NsGxkvSZy9yJcV65A6lEey4GH\u0026fid=0x0:0x9a8fdf896e95b825"],"When":"2023-5-30"},{"Name":"Ava","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWEo-NqNZs2s5xV6JQwStsyM4OZSjkm2ox3b9OCb7FJwUCyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"For $18, the coconut pudding isn’t really worth it. We got the strawberry lovers coconut pudding which only came with very little topping and not nearly as much strawberry as the photos advertise. The flavour of the coconut pudding was good and the overall sweetness was just right but the price is unjustifiable to me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrfMuz2aaVYaOUNuJ_VgEd8fy65A7iZjAlaXcN\u0026fid=0x0:0x9a8fdf896e95b825"],"When":"2022-11-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"C T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgS9_N3RvGRzjGP4q0CjRyk4CzxkTzB4cNEPmyEXeU-p7IBoH2mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best rice roll in town. We always get it with the black truffle seasoning and the old style rice roll. The ingredients they used are very fresh and quick ordering system. The roll itself is so soft yet chewy and very thin. Perfect for a quick bite of breakfast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRJRQVGUBeMwJnz9sVejCdhLnX3Yr9RfMR4ddT&fid=0x0:0x89a948935654c8d9"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Edith Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJmOen6EtIl7Ej_JFqybjeY6J0ua3WQel6_FE_xI_4sbCJAgJF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The rice rolls are exceptional - so far, we have tried their beef and pork, char siu, and mixed sauced rice rolls. Looking forward to trying their other ones!

Their congee - preserved egg and mixed pork, another with minced beef - are decent (my dad really enjoyed them).

Steamed milk with egg whites was also very good, akin to the old-school Hong Kong-style. The stone grinder black sesame drink was good, but I prefer the egg white more.

The seating area is not great (considering it is in Public Market's food court), but the food here makes it worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5gd8FqG9_iS7lx4J3PHZL1AF5cpP5xsSOZQKA&fid=0x0:0x89a948935654c8d9"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Foodie Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6n06QAfqStqer1ZgBILsv-fiSHmrGRZuznSS1ny9iQFfb_Ognuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The three-combo rice noodle rolls at Xi Ji are absolutely delicious. The rice noodles are incredibly smooth and silky, and the sauce adds great flavor. It’s a really satisfying dish with perfect textures and taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO88M65SZmUdcmVlt3hK5egQpWyHAaMo2iIU3Y2&fid=0x0:0x89a948935654c8d9"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Melanie Tam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOnCXlUyDGCRthUKehak0_GUp_az2pTQqceWOyRQ-aAN0D6lJP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Out of all the food stalls in Richmond Public Market, this one appealed to us the most because we love a good fresh rice roll. And they make them fresh because you can customize them. It'll take about 15 minutes. We ordered the beef, pork, and shrimp rice roll, and added an egg for $1.50. Free toppings include corn, bean sprouts, and scallion. It was a good rice roll, but I wish there was more meat and egg - or at least that it was more evenly distributed. The meat was all on one side, and the egg wasn't really spread out. $11 CAD seems a bit hefty, but it's comparable to NYC prices, so I'm used to the price tag.

Tip - cash only","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLK-W6tKFCnBRUShTg56XWDcueDt6XAF7OMlBA&fid=0x0:0x89a948935654c8d9"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Esther","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWm4MrcOMcE-MmdjBoKAjDTfZHS26hzehvqwvBxROz7rHTb9kPKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered their shrimp and minced beef rice roll. You can customize your rice roll. The sauce and the chilli oil is amazing. Cash only, plenty of seating. Wait can be long.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqmjnz2StZl_kB-6nM9lTiiSF4eUjIbzxYdfhw&fid=0x0:0x89a948935654c8d9"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Jesse Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqc4Js_hbpSJyGd7HxE4_GSDRsIjYI5FHNMKdapkO7Vpm1mm0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s unusual for me to give restaurant 5 stars because most are average, or super expensive ones I expected it to be good for the $. It’s unusual to get something that’s good, tasty and reasonable too.

As a ex-Hong Konger, Hei Hei rice roll hit the spot for me, the rice roll were perfectly textured, not too mushy or too dry and firm. It’s not too thick. It’s what I used to love about good Hong Kong rice rolls. Even the fillings were tasty and their flavored soy sauce is 😋😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHZr0-P8i_s3JHOoq032ARoj8O-Jk1pWcqypBq&fid=0x0:0x89a948935654c8d9"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"R L (Froyo)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCqdbgWznhU2EnuYICmvYBK8n_bnBg-Riap63TsJBz3enHzr0T=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is prolly the best rice rolls I had in North America lol, even better than some chain restaurants like Yin Ji Rice Roll. The wait was super long which is kinda annoying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPN0LGzQkRpWIF8lwWdzgjrU6s4KMBUQ9QKv3FK&fid=0x0:0x89a948935654c8d9"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"actionj007","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3vSkBAqKJl0vg8_AMzQD5EEGhEVeYS2de8UbzcFClZ51w9xM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here a couple of times.  Their rice rolls are silky smooth and the soya drink was refreshing.  First time trying their congee and ordered the one with fish and it was also very smooth and tasty.  Price for the 3 items was around $18 which is reasonable.

Will be coming here if we have cravings for rice rolls and/or congee in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7hSE-DXEVh5GI_DOvgimFzY4XWekZoLa8R4K7&fid=0x0:0x89a948935654c8d9"],"When":"2024-9-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pho Japolo’s chicken pho is absolutely amazing! The broth is rich, flavorful, and perfectly balanced, with just the right amount of seasoning. The chicken is tender, and the fresh herbs and toppings elevate the dish even more.

It’s the kind of recipe that feels comforting and satisfying with every bite. If you’re craving a hearty and delicious bowl of chicken pho, this place is a must-visit. This is another recommendation on top of the lemongrass chicken.
——————————————————————————
Wow, another gem for a good value dining in Richmond. I love searching for good quality fresh healthy foods around and this is one place where you can find some options. I had lemon grass chicken here and it’s delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkQwKDYDqvuvXDTQCP70BPSMD7jmCevahRirwS&fid=0x0:0x124ebd790a2eea46"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Cheng Alex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZxzAEq7ZczTRmoPieQ57QSkCDAGnsilAJGMf2qgbJFXM6azU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Taste is fine, but 18$(after tip) is way over priced for  this content
(Update)We're forced to eat again because of convenience, menu says 17.5
Ended up charging 18.2 + 0.25+ 1$ tax? (20$ for the rice) lmao","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZMAQHeyymwaYXbkWlb3aeYoTGh2AGTMlhfXzm&fid=0x0:0x124ebd790a2eea46"],"When":"2022-8-5"},{"Name":"Raymond Soegiharto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaAFdVfw6WvqJk9LFfIIvryL-t9PGh-FNdHekUANnqs-xmp7GQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Foods were just decent. Service was a bit poor since the older servers weren't attentive. Luckily, there was a young one who knew how to do the job.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOivk7cM30NbasFzFZEOsVm3H-kVpNju7ofmv6y&fid=0x0:0x124ebd790a2eea46"],"When":"2023-9-26"},{"Name":"Tom Hu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyyQ5KvmKl4Z33nT4wusvkCwA9Cr-xWhWOhejIZbkV4EKIng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty typical pho place.  Portion and price is pretty standard too.  Service is good.  Very polite,  and the place is very spacious and not too many people so the whole experience is very nice and relaxing.  The sub is crunchy and meat is very tender.  Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOscW5AVRnlPm8lWC6vbGH4F6QAO8DIQvynSpEI&fid=0x0:0x124ebd790a2eea46"],"When":"2019-7-25"},{"Name":"Aaron Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcyAqGvbQChyQNpoyohPaD5TZ1kNHz3Ec2QUUyAxk3O1LhJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Broth is really good. Staff very friendly. Tea is good. Good variety of dishes. Very consistent. Parking could be a challenge at certain times of the day","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stuart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5iM-rQaxkvqeBpoKBsjAnL8iUoZMmksIeNKsXQmCS1xRa4kr6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The pho ok, not the best around. Reason for the 3 stars 1. They do not use sustainable packaging, take out was in a plastic bag when plastic bags are banned in Richmond. 2. I was given one very small napkin for the order 3. The gentleman at the front came across rude and didn't want bothered. Not a place I would make an effort to go back to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPN0D5J0LMm1rfUHsWX3Rk2xOHBe5k078zrlSit&fid=0x0:0x124ebd790a2eea46"],"When":"2022-5-31"},{"Name":"Kathy Raby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAwUHVHJDq_10lgPRnNeU8_JLmX_G48Z5-STdN7Gim5f-TJhC3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great restaurant for our lunch... it was busy, the service was excellent, and the ladies are lovely. Parking is a bit tight, but after the lunch rush, it's not too bad.
The restaurant is wheelchair accessible,  and there is handicap parking, but it gets taken up quick when it's busy.
Definitely a good find
We both had Vietnamese subs, and deep fried spring rolls. Hit & tasty","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tombert Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPBxI_k-U_bsxEo5jgZCSGM6zCzad2priqCO4cybkQaaCfnZI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quaint mom and pop place, family friendly. Decent pho and bowls.  Reasonably clean atmosphere, friendly staff, prices are a touch higher, but still reasonable","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5upguZR3TFyO4HkItQSOfXbySRRT8INg2Y73v&fid=0x0:0x124ebd790a2eea46"],"When":"2019-11-12"}]

[{"Name":"Preethi Nair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUz8cCAzlnay_PFhvv7Ji00tvlRLoqJA-MhaglfwwGMG6P16JkGug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I and my work ladies gang had dinner last night. Ambience is good and service is quick. Vibe and atmosphere is really great. My gang really liked this place and will come back soon. If you are looking for some authentic Indian food, then this is your place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfkkql4ghWxlSf-RFvPt6-KSOslhzJmPRmaVtW&fid=0x0:0x87b41a4fca1785ac"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Ramneet sahota","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRdOSui9vNPgcxPonMijbxElRRpH59hD3V3HBzso-W4FaVVZR1cQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place every weekend we come by and every dish is amazing and everytime we come here!! Love the vibe here and the food is another level must try! Have tried most of the items none have disappointed us!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNssZoSNmR09moUrYGJi0t1-e3-BK4gBsUWXF1H&fid=0x0:0x87b41a4fca1785ac"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Sujive Selvanathan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKX9CrhN3TDPMBvR5Zb2ny2htnGQsn0PBQVFW-6FKovhhiqioi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered for a fish curry and garlic naan with vege samosa, food was delicious staff were sofriendly. But I would suggest them to maintain the cleanliness of the table bit more and it would be great.. still a strongly recommend this place for Indian cuisine in this Vancouver Airport area","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPodsMt372C0dI78DW_eUgMb9jXJeJWE-h4X34A&fid=0x0:0x87b41a4fca1785ac"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Kathy Lok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8siZehNvbFPO3538jSK2MrlvowVJiCLBEYOSr_fYcqjUo0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is great for get togethers with girlfriends. Our 3rd visit. We celebrated a milestone birthday for one of my gal pals.  Food was great as we ordered one of
our favorites Malai Kofta including Coconut Chicken , Honey Chili Cauliflower & Garlic Naan Bread. Yummy.  Parking was plentiful as the bank next door was closed during the evening of our celebration.  Service was good- the staff was attentive & checked on us frequently.  We had a terrific "gab" session.  Definitely returning to our favorite "special occasion to celebrate" spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNNky9emuKiwKNOzrvLFbIuEZzefp6O-WxBCjC&fid=0x0:0x87b41a4fca1785ac"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tandoori King Kitchen & Bar

Located at: 11911 Bridgeport Rd #101, Richmond, BC V6X 1T5

Compact Indian dining room featuring lamb and goat specials, and vegetarian items.

We were driving in the Bridgeport area of Richmond when we noticed a new restaurant with people lining up and waiting outside. Intrigued by the buzz, we decided to visit Tandoori King Kitchen & Bar the following day.

Ambiance: Upon entering the restaurant, we were warmly welcomed by the waitress. The interior was inviting, with a cozy and intimate atmosphere that set the stage for a pleasant dining experience. The decor was tastefully done, reflecting traditional Indian aesthetics with a modern touch.

Food:

Appetizer

Prawn Pakora
Marinated in yogurt, ginger, and garlic, the prawn pakora was a delightful start to our meal. The prawns were large and perfectly crispy, with a well-balanced seasoning that enhanced their natural flavor. This dish was an excellent introduction to the restaurant’s culinary prowess.

Rating: 9 out of 10

Mains

Butter Chicken
The butter chicken featured boneless chicken pieces cooked in a rich butter sauce infused with ginger and garlic. The portion size was generous, making it good value for money. The chicken was tender and succulent, with a well-rounded seasoning that made the dish thoroughly enjoyable.

Rating: 8 out of 10

Lamb Korma
The lamb korma, cooked in a creamy cashew nut sauce, presented large, tender pieces of lamb. While the portion size was generous, the dish fell slightly short on seasoning, making it a bit bland for my taste. However, the quality of the lamb was commendable.

Rating: 7 out of 10

Service: Despite a minor hiccup with my drink order, the waitress was courteous and apologetic. Given the busy evening and the limited staff on the floor, the service was efficient and friendly.

Price: The meal offered excellent value for money, with generous portions and reasonable pricing.

Verdict: Tandoori King Kitchen & Bar is a promising addition to the Richmond dining scene. The ambiance is charming, the food is generally impressive, and the prices are fair. Despite a few minor issues, our overall experience was positive, and we look forward to returning. This restaurant is definitely worth a visit for anyone craving authentic Indian cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPha-Y-Gk9CP9P673GgpVn2KWnVfpOc2F8jqBcg&fid=0x0:0x87b41a4fca1785ac"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Ganeshmoorthy Parashuraman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEIRwZQUcLWcO7hA7Zi8p6w86DjvEsVjtmHVrwiSQTRcMd6Sk6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":""A Culinary Gem Worth Every Bite! 🍽️✨ From the Superior Quality Food to the Lip-Smacking Chef Specials, this restaurant truly knows how to elevate dining to an art form. The fantastic customer service seals the deal, creating a perfect blend of flavors and hospitality. Whether you’re a foodie or just someone who loves a great experience, this is the place you’ll keep coming back to. Each visit feels like a celebration of deliciousness! Highly recommended!"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J.D.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWEMv5_rpQ-DCRCC_FRrgfXT4LK7lweB_sqQMBkrTJ4Kys14oTPg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a very, very cool Indian restaurant with great food and an unmatched vibe!  Service is excellent, food choices are fantastic, everything is new from the decor to the dishes so you can’t go wrong.

I would probably recommend everything on the menu, but if you’re looking to go out for Indian food, this place is unmatched in Richmond.

Seriously worth visiting and ignore the ugly strip mall it is in, as the inside of the restaurant is awesome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5pE-bfmkogEpUChXBS431Vwf4l0JKWo2fwSE6&fid=0x0:0x87b41a4fca1785ac"],"When":"2024-2-15"},{"Name":"Chelsea Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHVWaXfVBGL-NRGFFbHN7eiAD3hCGrOaEohFBcpGwJyjbv0CUl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot for lunch! I was surprised there weren’t more people there. Food was great and so was the masala chai. Looking forward to coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3ZvJwlEkMBtJWXJKd7sPSxMrJwh7hFDRqbQo&fid=0x0:0x87b41a4fca1785ac"],"When":"2024-9-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Up4Social","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrYFBSgHXJdgCCOKsiROQm8Dm6iUJVK6VE6bZ2rWmcr7i2t7c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We were a party of 12, table was large enough with decent space between chairs. Dinner and food was interesting… we ordered all kinds of different types of food. Peking duck, spicy (hot chilli oil) beef soup, Mongolian beef, very delicious food and great variety. Free parking and good service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_r8XKw1CaaPkWTED1qQLAyKx_ZObjNQFRFTit&fid=0x0:0xfe3e101b4829587e"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Lydia X.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViT0kOTUfe-14sI-XZzuSAMJ11zLMz2yRFRP-Y15rc4maS4qQo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Honestly, not a huge fan. It's great for generic family dinners, iykyk. There's a ton of dishes on the menu, and they're mostly average. Since it wasn't busy the night we went in, the service was outstanding but usually it's as expected for Chinese restaurants (quick and efficient but not observant or friendly). Nothing particularly good or bad. That said, it's one of the better options available for this style of restaurant.

Lots of seating inside, well lit, generic interior design. Bathrooms were clean.

Free parking lot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jim Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3tXWnX8xFhA_qZcSgIAVcjedjNVtb5Riz6aB4ltUNzTkDmgfU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Our family’s go to restaurant for years. Consistently good food.

Finally made back here for dine-in service after a long pandemic. Service is fast and very friendly. Food is so much better when it comes straight from the kitchen to your table. Compared to takeout; where by the time you get it home … food is lukewarm.

XLB have a lot of juice and very flavourful and is a must try.

We ordered the 3 course Peking Duck. Menu says 2 course but you can order it with the soup for an extra $13.

The Peking Duck came with 12 pastry wraps. All three courses were very good.

Our favourite dish here is the Dry Ginger Beef. Deep fried strips of ginger beef coated with a sweet spicy sauce.

Pork Chops with Pepper & Spicy Salt were crispy and not overly spicy. Perfect for someone like me that can’t handle spicy food. 😂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2lDYE4xz9IAzVz5K24wI0bZRnJVEaofsJQWiQ&fid=0x0:0xfe3e101b4829587e"],"When":"2022-3-17"},{"Name":"angel lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1IzL3-IELA7R7E3oFObEFF5jKqUJ8mIkFOIr338r21pBTPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is a place opposite to costco, and underneath the hotel.

The Duck is amazing with different fillings, taste good, with broccoli

The shrimp is a bit salty and no other flavours

The bean is kinda overcooked

The "choy por hai" is very good as the display on the table.

Steamed dumplings is a bit thick

The best is the dessert of go lick dou sa","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN81_BCn9tE1SWKQDaCL3lTRB5wVd0ixo-XKHYC&fid=0x0:0xfe3e101b4829587e"],"When":"2023-9-16"},{"Name":"Melissa Meng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfi_MaQwJQjr5awFnfBadZv0UHcxu-wrWjT5PFn9oDD0gq0vU3JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of favorite Shanghai cuisine restaurant in Vancouver. All dishes never disappoint us each time we come here. Kids loves Shanghai steam bun, meat stired with sticky rice , meanwhile beef and bean curve soup . Very suitable for family and friends gathering. Try here if you love to taste Shanghai cuisine .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWl-ZHmKyYszS6WWZnkUUD-kEr4CPB4BYAERTu&fid=0x0:0xfe3e101b4829587e"],"When":"2021-9-12"},{"Name":"SC Peter PANG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY8NccQPKwEMeXpLPAi94NNyD9gWgdb-2ZcImCIOELJkq7Cs8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Location is good if you are staying in the hotels nearby. There are not much restaurants around if you do not drive.
There are a good variety to choose from and they are all nicely made.
Portion is decent but not big for the price. If you want value for money, they are not as good as other Chinese restaurants around Central Richmond.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN414m8R6VQFTqeFqWlmWtz6yR7eMiZw72QL0ey&fid=0x0:0xfe3e101b4829587e"],"When":"2021-9-3"},{"Name":"Little Journey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlNkzOJynLpgqJCrPnrmAAn5viwim-B3Uir-26DOWxIzwcnZ0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It used to be my favorite place for sticky rice roll. However the quality has gone downhill. Too much sticky rice and too less preserved vege. Fortunately, the turnip puff pastry was still good. It's crispy and flaky, and filled with savory shredded turnip filling. Although the XLB is not the best in town but it's worth to try too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZGu12Ejqdqbjaak0G7Reb5iTFAiTKi0PnnjYB&fid=0x0:0xfe3e101b4829587e"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Liz Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTP4Z96_a17LOvt0lMiLm2Ndv_c1yQOotoeSsNRkfKTlc-ZFOwsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family's goto restaurant for Sunday brunch. After trying different new restaurants my in-laws always come back here.

Xialongbao, Luobobing(flakey pastry with radish inside. Doesn't sound amazing to explain but it is really yummy), Youtiao, Shengzainbao and Fried noodle is something that we always order. But other dishes are all very good. Today we ordered hot and sour soup for the first time (cuz it was a cold day) and it tasted delicious too.

Would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone who wants to appreciate good hearty food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwxKWX_f_Cw6XG28jF3nGkalFcyfL8YTcTFwqi&fid=0x0:0xfe3e101b4829587e"],"When":"2024-1-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Autumn_Kiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1zcZdU411-b8f5Fcx7HImynMifJ7qg-_yzjSJzTLgmhJaggW_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Like I've said before.  I feel pretty whenever I come here.  Even though my diabetes prevents me from eating cake here all the time.  I still love coming here with friends.  Today we brought our nephew from Japan here.  It was her older sisters favourite place for cake.  One day I hope they can make a diabetic friendlier cake.  Now that would he something!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOD1P-VIyYqun_DcYWOtywjJtcrNa_djyEPales&fid=0x0:0x85a490efbbfde7ab"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Julia D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWGHgIRg6UZB2wR1x2csycbI6ACHnuk_Z9bgnuPPHXuO-zSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A must- go for thousand layers cake lover. I passed by in a rainy afternoon and was really surprised with the thousand-layer crepe. The shop has a lot of layered cakes with lower prices than other shops I've eaten at but the quality is great. The cake has a light sweet taste, soft cream layer that melts in your mouth, comfortable outside location with free parking. Highly recommend to try chestnut and earl grey layers cake and a hot tea pot. Their staff were also friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm3YYv8Dw7UaX4NZRf9jAB7RcvYPQQfLwoms_F&fid=0x0:0x85a490efbbfde7ab"],"When":"2024-3-12"},{"Name":"Angie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyUjdZQkz0bhaDppuQsySaOzrLROWSfhKe7zzOgxtMex30Fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Small portion cakes, the chocolate moose was very rich. Korean ginger tea - very gingery!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoxn-ZWOwJ4MPpr1d5pzgTPZLwqQ0irM_VKJ9G&fid=0x0:0x85a490efbbfde7ab"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Lalita Junggee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWk9lM-eyOFL7Io5cwjXYNTHhoykUm-jYn9BIt4NLw9jE_B0bUS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful time at Berry Good! The cakes were absolutely delicious, and the drinks were equally satisfying. I particularly enjoyed my hot chocolate, and my kids loved the strawberry milkshake. Although I didn't try the macaroon myself, my two-year-old had three! they must have been fantastic! The prices are reasonable too. We'll definitely be back soon! 🍰🍓🥤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1Ysc2vyOpyWDYn2Xm0RLB21t6qBG5vaQlcRP8&fid=0x0:0x85a490efbbfde7ab"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"Lili C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcAiQGcLvc5_O-ML--pv0xcn4LpU5qVoZYUrmfaiyDpr2qgmoo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely one of the best cafe I've tried in here so far
Matcha layers cake is really good in texture and taste
Iced chocolate also nice simple but good
The atmosphere is homely and quiet which I like 👍🏻
decent quality and price
Will comeback for sure!
Ps. They take cash and etransfer only so just fyi :-)))","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNXYptEy7xVUFLLbtcdMId-P8NjyYASi1z9YpF&fid=0x0:0x85a490efbbfde7ab"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Kristin Gardiner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDtuBhFm7j94OoDnR3iXNweLH7DFVLCjf2-gaxoclQtC-TLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely delicious
Very easy to order cakes online .
The freshest lightest cakes made with Absolute LOVE ❤️
ThIs place is a hidden little gem and the lady who owns it is an absolute delight.
Thank you for making such simple, fresh and delicious cakes .
Been coming here for  years with my mom and my son. They always stayed true to there standards and  how they make there cakes . We love this place and will continue to enjoy there desserts for years to come ❤️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Henry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUy96lXjwXaDMxmN1o42H3WgjT-ZI0RUx_U95yA5UVqY5otZr9_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Beautiful packaging, very suitable for buying as a gift.
Update: However, the package is too big for the cake inside. It ended up falling like in the photos. I recommend the shop should put more thinking into packaging.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuMokNh8Y7WWh9xrKcqvZFH0U7ZC1iBj4HO2E0&fid=0x0:0x85a490efbbfde7ab"],"When":"2024-4-26"},{"Name":"Josheen Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwCo7-f-b68MEm8tWRQbvfzn1Kf3YilQi3t_u45GnJNMx0gg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I bought the chiffon matcha cake for my boyfriend’s birthday. If you like not too sweet cakes, this is an amazing cake for you. The service was fast and the cake tasted delicious. Bonus point: this was a beautiful cake.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Bruce \u0026 Tawnee Untethered","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaXwL1OOHf7VZyohtQkWkHGiUmFFbLHBMHxQlL1ku2N1Ffx3YKtA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We met friends here for dinner. We really enjoyed the food here and would definitely eat here again. The portions are huge especially if you get the full size meal. There tons of options with the pasta and various sauces. Prices are reasonable. The service was top notch","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrwaBYQnRmriGppAoV7PNSD3mJJm2CTlk_aUMl\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2ff4289a54c73de"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Mark Richards","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2ogtQJ6cdhyg5kCDNWKrd0HiIziL5KIxoHOuGLFml-aIrlA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was attending an event at nearby River Rock and went here with a group of seven.  Good food and service!  Diverse menu with large portions (order smaller portions unless you want to go).  Our waitress was fun and knew the menu well.  Drinks were also good.  Will come back again when in Richmond area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1ljXERBw2SG3zU3lfGA7ORliOjsGzBcwdKIpm\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2ff4289a54c73de"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Anna Alcazar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCyzwek29_i3gUxaRcd0JXpPYxtmysum8100tqYvxtLSZXu1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I fell in love with this restaurant! The best pizza and pasta!, without thinking about it I would return to try all the food on the menu, the quantities are generous and the attention we received was excellent, especially Andre the guy who served us who was very friendly and kind, my whole family was very happy to know this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMm2Y0OMP0ZLZoqsDnqf2_meOx_CW9Tq3nQ1UGu\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2ff4289a54c73de"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Michelle \u0026 Tylor Prather","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9ON0qkkn4hfv9TEDZt5SitdAM9FxmjHGS8F1Zf5t0So42ZT82HQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely family style Italian eatery only a few minutes from Vancouver International Airport!  We had a 4 hour layover so we left the airport to have lunch here and both the food \u0026 the service were top notch.  Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1lbY-b1iKi__uv4U2V67gEuICNtR_mff4ZQva\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2ff4289a54c73de"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Eunice Zhao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_m19zpDnShMlACSrl6S-cDalRdCNjiwxQ6t6OmcK7Ajk5cQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nothing fancy, more like comfort Italian food with huge portions. The pasta and pizza are excellent—you can't go wrong with anything on the menu. It gets busy at dinner time, but there's no trouble finding parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_0cnzyMSz6hYgJJlrFd_YLkkUZIKFJnwn0rU\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2ff4289a54c73de"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Fernanda Sant' Ana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5IBTYtLjoy1EiLJFqdgOlYs7X03sw_CnxfsECsFmSwutdRSP9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to this restaurant with 3 friends, two of them got full sized single meals and took the leftovers home, and I shared a full size plate with my boyfriend. Honestly, even sharing a plate got us completely full and the food tasted amazing as well. My favorite dish was the Milano sauce with Fettuccini pasta. I think their price is reasonable, but I agree is a little expensive if you order stuffed pasta like gnocchi, which they charge an extra $5. We also shared a brownie with 4 scoops of ice cream ($12) and it was delicious. I like that they play italian songs in the restaurant and the servers and hosts were nice as well. I would recommend this place if you want to share a meal with a friend, I think it's more worth it to share with someone than to take it home later. The price varies a lot so it depends what you wanna eat. For example, one person paid $16 at the end (sharing a plate, no drinks), and another person paid around $60 (full size plate, one glass of wine, extra for gnocchi).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNZtnGQJaUFEd2_Q_1F_jCSBPIiPYTLUaAUGY\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2ff4289a54c73de"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Jello Candles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHi7A-Ad-UZ-ihIVsJVirYVG_GwBefu03JiYiQDIqXUu231g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pasta was excellent!! And I love their spinach walnut salad with a bit of sweetness. Our server was very friendly and made lots of recommendations!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPut9ZdAm3amfPGtxVzNCI_B6lJn1TKqnNZnBKI\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2ff4289a54c73de"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Mario","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVym6rPtr4Z-Ee5tpTA7WVlZBpeLblyEfXw_Mo4NQehI18fUmUy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's like we stepped into Italy. The food, staff and environment were spectacular. Call and make a reservation before going! A must try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRBrymvotIEcRtsh4lJCU1DxZ-kCTF8zGqkhI7\u0026fid=0x0:0xe2ff4289a54c73de"],"When":"2024-11-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Prim Pat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZKv3aP9BAHMwHzyiUn9sIc8kD_VzgZo6VZG07JM1H0KPY3A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Despite real bad reviews here I ordered green kiwi slush it came to almost $9, it was actually super tasty I was surprised. Just abit expensive for this drink but the drink was great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6WeY5vNSqhgSa3AkFjHwWsOR6c6IZ7V7ZeSSH&fid=0x0:0xde83096ed0a7f55e"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Tiffany Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-S80A7ZBrkaVJVd4KOTL7m72lHJ-R7bLjO7U1Jhm0BdEwUjay=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"There are no prices listed next to their drinks so that should have been my first warning.  I ordered the strawberry mango slush.  I'm guessing it was from their fresh fruit series but in reality, it's prob made with frozen fruit.  The drink was tasty but for almost $9 with no toppings added, it was a total rip off.  I should've just walked away when I saw the checkout price but so few stores in the food court accept credit card and that's all I had with me. Also as others have mentioned, customer service is non existent.  It almost felt like it was an intrusion on their staff ordering from here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLv_JrFdu4tF04uUGHjYZnS6NPOgsIMqInH3NHKxahFAcKgVA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"As others mentioned previously, worst store ever in Richmond.
1) no flavours in the drinks. Super watered down.
2) employees showed very negative attitude
3) comes up with unreasonable excuse to reject customer’s smallest request.

Suggestion : better find other shop. Or grab yourself a can of Coke.

PS. This white milk like drink supposed to be a cup of taro milk tea which has purple colour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6_QPdpgaP9gX5PZb-sRE8StPgsXps3KHq30i3&fid=0x0:0xde83096ed0a7f55e"],"When":"2023-9-4"},{"Name":"Wai Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzmH5OpJoM-hhDFEjmWs5pk92KWv4KTM3Z3pPRu01cSO_3zEyz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered a strawberry milk tea. Was good. Priced at $4.75 so not bad. We did not try their boba with it.
They have slushes and also green/red tea. There was soya pudding available for $5.50 but we did not try the other offerings.
Service was ok.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnxw0udVVFZhTlgwCNR0MWvNmvcZwpo9MH0YIu&fid=0x0:0xde83096ed0a7f55e"],"When":"2020-3-9"},{"Name":"Victoria Teo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtbVR0BjyaD-wgUP8fsIHU8WxfO1kIMVV1CgwY-RwDT3s-yIGD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Menu prices are wrong and was charged more than the posted price. Ended up paying $7.90 for one watery, melted, super sweet matcha red bean “slush”. Tapioca pearls are undercooked and hard, texture was terrible and on top of that customer service was rude. Most expensive bubble tea I’ve ever had. Would not recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQVHYWRqsC1rHQtgn3RJKytStjnzyY-B5V6jD_&fid=0x0:0xde83096ed0a7f55e"],"When":"2021-10-10"},{"Name":"A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLyxESPNluHPANqjtf8GvzaBVe5cJ7PryLgkiwArow4alGcBA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worse drink I ever had, the cashier lied about using fresh mangos. Taste like mango jelly powder and the pearls are soggier then congee. I should’ve waited in line at juice 8 instead of coming here. Drink was $7.50 and I threw it away after 1 sip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8efBPV-s8j4n7TYJnxOn--orUQzrJRjPGzZNp&fid=0x0:0xde83096ed0a7f55e"],"When":"2022-6-25"},{"Name":"LTRMcrew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJE-m_SkYYeYncr_KsicU4Cz3cI5Z6NPF7LKPcrXeJIc861JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"One of the worst bubble teas I’ve had. Taro milk with pearls tastes like thick water and hard jello chunks. Barely any taro taste. Pearls are hard and tasteless. Save yourself the $8 and buy a can of coke.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karen Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXni9KmKF64OTgj5RqsxZPmoHNDk-ZlUj0600NHE7rPnyPeCQ4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst customer service. Was ordering food close by while waiting for my drink, and when I came back after 5 mins asking if my drink was ready, the guy answered coldly with a stare, “ I called your number 4 times.” 5 bucks for a plain calpis green tea at a food court. Not worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfdsidepc9XLPoA6bvbTXar6-gK9cD04duxcZZ&fid=0x0:0xde83096ed0a7f55e"],"When":"2019-12-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alessandro Virtuoso Haraldsen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuILI_FZI3Jmwv-mQy828odH7kyi85pBDWb5tFSLWy8l8-d9Uo5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cozy, family-run cafe that offers pretty spectacular breakfast options. I know it’s not exactly right, but the full English in a Yorkshire pudding was amazing. Lovely service and great prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP41Jcm2TcVfwqMOq9abj4YBgHloGn4-Cswzu9m&fid=0x0:0x9fb050604acd0879"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Nicola Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDBJwpssxdSsfv1nChR47WHUEY8x8QdclOHSWdnmx29N-KW4zuJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stumbled upon this place by chance.
What a cracking little place. So quirky, but that's its charm..there's a lovely undercover seating area which is dog friendly.
A nice touch is dog beds, for your dog to sit/lay on, instead of a cold hard floor.
Our dog loved it and soon settled down. I covered her with one of the crochet blankets provided. Just such a lovely touch.
Staff so friendly and the food was absolutely delicious with generous portions. We had veg curry and jacket potato. What a gem of a place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM88YTSNOP-QFKifXGhZhll29Y3EGmfn7aORbXR&fid=0x0:0x9fb050604acd0879"],"When":"2023-11-1"},{"Name":"Lynden McCrae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSNEi9SCE4AqVYpbNakKx8U0wOOtNyfnA8IYMJEapfc-ni=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great meal today in this quirky cafe. We both had a ploughmans lunch. Was a huge portion and the bread it was served with was so soft and fresh. The waitress that served us was lovely..... always smiling. Will definitely be back.😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFlUF6w7IIwLZ7NlRXDKnkOSN7sZIyqM_vB7M&fid=0x0:0x9fb050604acd0879"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Martin Atherton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgb-TyUjx1XGxqyZN7qNA5KvMp7p5UztdzgsEnRhuxMJxJRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really busy on Saturday lunchtime but well worth the wait for the best bacon I have eaten in years. Quirky place with nooks and crannies and as far removed from franchise cafes you could want. Staff really friendly despite charging around nonstop.
Highly recommended","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrew Kitching","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJoqgACE3dbd9pHpUvah32oQEoLmSKide9h7MrTQvmNrlznCw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found this lovely spot when breaking up the Christmas trip to family. Great food and service. Could not resist taking a few of their sweet treats with us for the rest of the journey.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marek Lew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWES7o47vn7ct8yKmsN5iFqFacfaO6uKcgNrVPl2S0fwULKuezCqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Granny's Kitchen was a real find , tucked away down a short alley entrance.
We called in for a late breakfast and both dishes were very good indeed.
The cafe style is super quirky , staff are nice and food spot on plus prices fair, that about covers it , well worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv--KuCyzgXGmdMdnkQcUElD44dtq9vtxzZP08&fid=0x0:0x9fb050604acd0879"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"A Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBHkD5Xv4JmAGBLwmpM0jyZ4XzbUmg6Wou7h-QGawWaIbnAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came across this fantastic place by chance when shopping. You could easily miss it. When you do find it you will be so happy you did. Gluten free ham and cheese toastie with chips for my daughter. Biscoff cheesecake and latte for me. Very friendly attentive staff, excellent food.
Thanks to all at Granny's Kitchen. We will be back 🙂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObLY619M_6g4NbDM8bXQKObUt6wbzxaL4x8jR_&fid=0x0:0x9fb050604acd0879"],"When":"2022-6-10"},{"Name":"Alasdair Strutt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuxi6pEsUrZjYVrPUuWqK845eUpK2shkOlo15lt7zOW2JlPyh0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sadly tomorrow is the end of our caravan season. So today was our final scheduled visit for our regular Saturday morning breakfast of the year. We are already looking forward to returning the 2nd Saturday in March 2025. If you want GREAT food, with GREAT service you are always assured of both together with a friendy welcome. Thankyou Wendy, Mick, Lisa and the rest of team "Granny's Kitchen".","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Dave Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL544JfNo-heg8UsP95fr9shcrTY9pTTKZqcIgOMgLc7F2usw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered the BiBimBap for takeout, not too bad but it was a smaller portion, includes both broth and lots of hot sauce.  Also tried the Spicy Pork on Rice. Restaurant is in an industrial area. Service was friendly, food was pretty quick. Overall pretty decent but needs some updating in the Decor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAn8ZNh9YmLTlBxhzdzY7nxAnUp0jrWcC-2WKq\u0026fid=0x0:0xf74d9b09dfdad273"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Lisa Dykhuizen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDxpj-n-1VjvEG3C0tbaTyzWLyHzPcWdeaSpZX6lxnW-QXPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Feel bad but it was awful.  I know we went close to closing but the rice in rolls was so hard dry. 3 rolls they completely fell apart. Not edible.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Janina Ritzen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWz0F-EDkwi92uouu9dKe1NZ0Hopux6jwsTJ6qP5rg--ote-Bo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Average prices and food quality. Their sushi uses cucumber instead of avocado. Nice family run place, and a good atmosphere to eat in. They are slow in preparation of the food but everything is made well and meticulously. Recommend the turkey cranberry (half pictured) and the beef lunch box, or the bipinbap!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2qwhiF4e8z3S0nfu2CjGDuerfURXfrRMKiOgr\u0026fid=0x0:0xf74d9b09dfdad273"],"When":"2017-8-21"},{"Name":"Canice Foran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKX3G4nN4cGHaBgPLRRtz_04D4Rt8-R8bqkgM90CUGA1wej2g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered chicken fried rice for my lunch, go it after 20minutes waiting,got fried rice with 4 tiny pieces of chicken.girl told me I should have added extra chicken when ordering .I told her I expect the minium amount not 4 peices. Buy food before you enter the area.do not go here.they get away with this stuff cause they the only food place within a 30minute walk.I got.my money back and wasted my break.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0ZBgZvg0oKr2VDhTJl4snKG_ol5G0BHxEFoCT\u0026fid=0x0:0xf74d9b09dfdad273"],"When":"2021-3-25"},{"Name":"Sunny L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWB8u5heqIzfWFm0QaZY6iTuZdoxqD6iYrk8AcV31mFfcMeC1yB9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hard to find any food in this area. This small shop serves soups, sandwiches, and home style Korean food. Udon soup, Bibimbap, fried Gyoza, cali rolls etc. Daily specials include Jap Chae, bulgogi, spicy pork on rice. Good selection of sandwiches and breakfast bagels. Reasonable prices. Can get pusy during the lunch rush due to the limited options in the area. Nice owner team of 2. Always a friendly welcome from the cashier.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joshua Herbel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXaTypX0VrH-DO6uafC6b6egUaVL2dQtfFWnIMT0YQo-DzWayev=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice food, nice service, nice price","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andy Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKWeDyoIw7IK_VqaIoj_0v7_OdbrNd8MW5QegRs4TuCA76JU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Seems to be the only choice around Graybar area that offers less costly food options if you aren't willing to drive all the way to Queensborough. The food is mediocre and the pricing is in line with most food court prices ($9.50 for teriyaki box). They tend to use microwave for a lot of their cooking so that might be a turn off for some people who are sensitive to radiation and such :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dasha Brar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbeu7uFhXTLdOn8Sm4H2xZZ-3X8jQMQkkszoUO2kfN0lVl-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Decent sandwiches. Burger was awful, looked like byproduct. They have the corner on food in this commercial area so I'll hit them up for a sandwich and juice/coffee. Otherwise not the greatest food, could do with improvement.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Diplomat Bakery
descriptions: Warm bakery for gourmet sweet & savoury pastries & custom cakes, along with coffee drinks.
