user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shery On The Move","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmAA3VItm5d-LzZjMzSS_FZs12aHSse1X5w-nXQqVmdbUvhBBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is my second time visit to Diplomat Bakery.. If you're sweet tooth like me, you will definitely love this cafe.
Always hard to me to decide what to get for dessert because they have lot of selections.
For the second time i chose red velvet donut and almond croissant. Highly recommend.

Dine-in area is small and limited. Three tables only suitable for 2 person/couple, and the others are individual high chairs. If weather is good, they will set up extra table outside.

I'm the person who always fast to spot the cleanlines. Dine-in area and kitchen (where they stand behind the counter) are clean. The restroom is smells fresh and clean except the toilet bowl. I spotted the surface of toilet bowl didn't fully clean. I hope the management take note of this highlight.

Another friendly suggestion or reminder, Diplomat Bakery should have active on Instagram and allowed customer tag their pictures and videos, and repost it.  It's a free advertisement for business.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNY7JsrAhbI0Vs1yr8UbYr63fN4QVKoPdL5pyph&fid=0x0:0x4a6fd7152c76bc64"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Frank Tsai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYDpTpJBssHvs6nCC9N56Cz-V0hWsxlmD8WEoC4CYIhQ8Z_KjwbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Diplomat Bakery is probably a great cake and pastry shop in Richmond.  There are various cakes with different flavors here.  This is the best Western Caffe I have ever eaten in Richmond. If you have the chance, you must try it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5aMSrbTZd_efoqNK6eP3hEvOXw7U5ISGUh_Io&fid=0x0:0x4a6fd7152c76bc64"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Deb PS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2JrjvxBJWPrjHCwBxV9NiRybb9V5GJpynDBuSW5sd6snYZiMa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can’t say enough about the Diplomat Bakery. I first learnt about it more than 12 years ago when a friend had a cake that was shaped into a book at a party. The book was made of a triple chocolate mousse cake.  Ever since then I have been returning to the Diplomat Bakery every time I need a cake. Their prices are very reasonable and the quality of their cakes is excellent. The triple chocolate mousse cake is my absolute favourite and every time I serve it, people are always raving about it. I don’t live in Richmond, but I will travel the 40 minutes to get there just for this cake. The staff is always friendly and there’s always people getting coffee and mingling around the bakery. It’s located in a nice little tucked away spot in Steveston. The parking is easy as there is paid street parking but also there’s free underground parking behind the building. That’s where I usually go. Not really sure if I should be parking there but I do! Staff is always friendly. The place is very clean and organized. It’s a great place to go for cakes for special occasions as well as just having coffee and a treat with friends, to take a break or just because it’s so good!  I think the Diplomat Bakery should give me a free treat for this review😀 But honestly, I highly recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwt9ShNtk3yGs4aHlR59-Kxb7xY2rsnyUIo3oz&fid=0x0:0x4a6fd7152c76bc64"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"A A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_yls-c9aHmykcfQ2h9FniTZl8rGh46VKtnyP5sbH1xa_u7ghP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Diplomat Bakery is my "go-to" place for cakes and pastries.
This time, I got a couple of donuts and a cupcake. I was so impressed with their donuts! As well as the cupcake. So good!! 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9Cziz96pgK9Gj9pJKOrVLLKk5CVEuGUFMioVI&fid=0x0:0x4a6fd7152c76bc64"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Laura Gillanders","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOt6FWlK79P-lQICwsdkEJP8AswP3C42lHWcPeFXrC01rrh4u7yQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was reading reviews of this place because I'm trying to find if anyone has ordered the carrot cake before and how they find it, I'm ordering one today for the first time. But I frequently get other cakes and cake donuts from diplomat because of the great variety and quality for a reasonable price. There aren't many places where you can walk in and buy a cake and have them personalize it right then and there without a pre-order, it's a wonderful service. The other reason I'm writing this is put my strong opinion in that the red velvet cake donuts are absolutely the best thing ever! Another reviewer wrote they didn't like them that it should be more of a donut, but it literally says cake donut, it's a cake in the shape of a donut and the cream cheese frosting is out of this world. My whole family loves them and I get them as a very special treat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mavi_S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWg20yxmSjXezsrBWkT7y-5xUiqTVSIYkge173K91C6TgPAoIEn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We visited this place on Monday Sept 30, 2024 and order the expensive Samosas ever $6 each, muffin and 2 drinks. The food was okay but we were served food in the paper bag and drink in to go cup. We ended up eating the food with our hands seating g outside. While other people were served in plates. How does this make sense? Very unprofessional service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2nb45cAisDFjs5N6-7y1EaVAyYtATOPyIHstg&fid=0x0:0x4a6fd7152c76bc64"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Andrea Lafleche","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFlThhYcbT4PEnA3-nkniTy4tGiKmCmWhBSYXhNOyx2bl9G2Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cakes are a little expensive but the quality is excellent! I got the hazelnut cake and it was delicious!  I will definitely order more cakes in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAddqyK89h9Fi3mCnlQwEGpqD_gfrxYpJ2jJwz&fid=0x0:0x4a6fd7152c76bc64"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Meiji Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqGk-Vnkp9G1pS_fYgeST0ZwKp8nb9wEb2fz6quulGMqG5NngemA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The apple strudel is my favourite, not so sweet and so crispy 😋 I also bought 5 apple strudel for take away ~ the muffin also good, is soft and yummy too. Definitely worth to come here, even there is no highchair here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0wP_KPCjjJTKAzDJmozjrNUQSsNKHpQEIxo6y&fid=0x0:0x4a6fd7152c76bc64"],"When":"2024-2-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mohammad Areeb Malik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUId6QgC5Yav6LJNokH5kp1l9hW5RuBHo3Qy78GOv2VShxA_oiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not too busy, mostly clean, but a lot of druggies outside.
The best part is that the bus stops are right outside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPA4z0d5t1xG6hdfJMpnHp1lp3TnNye5URrPU_&fid=0x0:0x62f3b5c87885456e"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Jaspal Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrjAqTXnmIRIWQDR9C2RHtW4CpOTN0sYYDZmP24I5aIkEBWJV8pQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Brighouse Station is at the heart of Richmond’s cultural, recreational and administrative offerings. Located on No 3 Road between Saba and Cook Roads, Brighouse Station is within easy walking distance of shopping, community centres, a wonderful park, theatre and much more","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPp4WRKESICIOj8Ud6Ye_L0DC-emG41eYj7eYzd&fid=0x0:0x62f3b5c87885456e"],"When":"2018-6-2"},{"Name":"Dr NA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO4n47rE2JaIAUmjrHe9rjWknHsZv3WE8lW77MWjN-3k7aTl00=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Clean, convenient and not so crowed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZ1wCpImEWoq8CH7zCt8z8JWVWGQbieOoApESu&fid=0x0:0x62f3b5c87885456e"],"When":"2024-2-23"},{"Name":"Tim Buggy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxTYEgmwlEkSeHKTAsw48MupgQd_JHZcP4iq5VbUMI0pN2BA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very rude staff. We asked a simple question about bus destinations and a member of staff. Small, dyed blonde hair, south Asian descent was incredibly hostile and unhelpful. Do better!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul Hisako","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZsJ-ebou09S4oK9Ub0dJeDWlgeRJHJk_YeQJQgRmD2jzw4GY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Good: it has a nice view at sunset. It's usually clean. The trains run frequently and on time. It's close to some fairly high density areas and shopping and the area is becoming increasingly walkable.
Bad: No toilets!!!! Seriously what kind of planners think skipping toilets at a train station is a good idea? I feel sorry for the elderly and the parents of toddlers. Also, they could use more gates, but I don't think they planned for that and there's probably no space.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Edward Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXy-05iPRGGFib1_amPkp7NlcM17_qc_Dde1rCz-wZd0SWS_kCk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very convenient located station, near Richmond Centre, Minoru Park and it's right in the heart of the city. Frequency can be increased at night though.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bryan Dott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWx35iRqnP5n5w98cxyKEKoBqGV_3Zq6L5aICuvO2BnGwZ2o3M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A beautiful old train station houses in Vancouver’s newer sky train, Subway and Seabuss. Has a number of other small businesses in it beautiful building.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRseDSp_-hGeuwsFdA3LLVUaqHOQBjT50_hr89y70h_1vBw8wv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not really clean.
Don’t forget to check the train where it heads to when you want to come back here not to the airport~","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPx2Gj4jqwdtMjjM0XA4XdwbWL3bQfrRpf8bunK&fid=0x0:0x62f3b5c87885456e"],"When":"2019-1-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Izaak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViHojgSQ4bdCvdIt9A3ngE65dhUStWGEehlfwq1ureXHJXsUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Poor customer service.
Told this guy the order was wrong and he strait up said “ just a little wrong it’s fine” and turned away. No explanations or any attempt to fix it. Then when i asked for ice, as I enjoy more ice he said to line up again to order when there’s 15  people in line and all I need is a cup ice that takes less than 5 seconds to fill. It’s literally just like asking for a lid or a cream or tray, something that can be done so quickly. At any other location they’d always give ice after I order a drink but this guy  decided to be extremely rude and condescending  for no reason.  If you see this man be wary.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTzyKcXvsZt_Sm3wpZOz11q0tN7aaxtFCtjJY&fid=0x0:0x425cf13a3a04c04c"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Shery On The Move","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmAA3VItm5d-LzZjMzSS_FZs12aHSse1X5w-nXQqVmdbUvhBBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm a regular customer of this store. I don't have any problem with my order. Staff always show their dedication. Keep up the good work. 👍🏻

I just want to highlight something regarding Remembrance Day. When I made a purchase, i saw a poppy donation box on the counter. Just my suggestion, it would be good if all staff were wearing the poppy in honour of veterans on Remembrance Day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrVxYg7PYr0AL4CuBNUIVpvZuGxZTfLObQAC7I&fid=0x0:0x425cf13a3a04c04c"],"When":"2023-11-10"},{"Name":"Mae Postel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcJVxl8gdmYUrRhe1SNtPeYubkipYufk2uVJ3U-DPKgyIx6UO0rA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I've come to this starbucks a couple of times, and each time, they get my order wrong, and staff are rude here. EVERY other starbucks I've been to, staff are always smiling, but not here they all have stressed out and mad faces. I DON'T RECOMMEND COMING HERE IF YOU WANT YOUR GOODMORNING COFFE OR JUST IN GENERAL.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYEGpyBY07Xpvbi580vwyBxmQCDvZ_-q6aFiSu&fid=0x0:0x425cf13a3a04c04c"],"When":"2023-3-7"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Falling for the festive flavors, we tried a Soy Pepermint Mocha and Chestnut Praline Almond Latte.
Whilst you get great efficiency and friendly service, unfortunately these drinks were pretty miserable and felt uber rushed and the milk tastes burnt as a result. It's a super busy location, but unjustified to have such a poor tasting result as I normally always go to Starbucks for its awesome consistency no matter on the location.
I love Starbucks and a regular customer, but unfortunately this was one of my worst visits.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6qC8ctiQjESa-Ci59DYIO-iWRCfhMJDyR08tr&fid=0x0:0x425cf13a3a04c04c"],"When":"2021-11-7"},{"Name":"Wong Tube","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPzqoCw4p4XSLNfZiL8SgHeg5f_fzsAUl_an4TdIU6mtfaGpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the staff here. This location is always busy. The staff works hard. They get the drinks out fast as they can. Friendly staff, as you order here often they do get to know you and whenever they get the chance, they spend time to chat. Great service and great drinks!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yuma Ama","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpQ1TAJZL7yiQR-xarn-AKR09ENICb_I_8ljOwxCwoDFCNCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"04/14/2024 around 9:50am: White girl at the cashier had so much attitude for what…
She didn’t greet me or anything and looked like she hated her job (Y’all need customer service training or what LOL)
I work in retail and worked in food service so I know how it is when there’s a rush, doesn’t excuse your attitude though","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Priya Jassal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLK2a2nFkriPl8lZEb3bKm0_57217uhxHOY9oKIVcThaGrAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Waited 45 minutes for our drinks today. Gemma was the only one that figured out the problem and solved it for us while providing phenomenal customer service. All the stars in this review go to only to her!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angelica Yee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcQojzbdV9sbLoihEwt6NQe8LJ9Oux6JR_irkYfLyJU1tPYS4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was a while ago, but I wasn’t sure if I should try the Oleato oat latte when it was new. The cashier Amy was very friendly and honest, admitting it’s not her favourite but many people have been returning to order it. I ordered it to try, but she comped it seeing my hesitation about the price and the olive oil! (This was probably an approved action across SB to promote the drink, but was really nice of her!).

This location is always super busy during rush hours but they do a great job keeping up, remaining polite. One time they forgot to heat up my food and I was hesitant going back due to the crowd, but they did it for me right away and was nice about it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXqC4581_xsyfBOFkQFZb-_Auh1A8ydMB5hcVg&fid=0x0:0x425cf13a3a04c04c"],"When":"2024-4-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Daniil Furman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBJRS3JNazB-FrnpzolODPwZ4tX0HVK7KmqCkA7Mmk-485WepZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Making wrong orders for English speaking customers and did not even know that.

We came in for the dine in and ordered crepes via machine at the door. Using English language in the menu we order crepes with ham.
Receipt was in Chinese so we couldn’t verify what was said on it until we received our food. An employee assured us that what we ordered was crab sticks and not ham as it stated in the receipt.
I was confident in what I ordered and after a quick investigation I was able to prove that the translation on their machine is wrong and if you order ham it translates to crab sticks in Chinese.

We were not offered to redo our crepes but rather to add ham inside. I declined.

First of all, I think it should be illegal to print receipt in a foreign language as visitors cannot verify what they ordered and have no proof.
Second, were they making wrong orders this whole time before I came to visit? Hilarious.

Crepes were mediocre and I would not recommend to stay for dine in as the atmosphere is not designed to stay but rather to take out.

Would not recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmczpGadD49hd5LsAhmNnwORN74p0IXCAGtT0E&fid=0x0:0xc34f8fe0e0942e47"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Info TGHOME","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTtJTYLOAAA6DuOhvWO3BENPDcgo4KFbMGX2fuNtBiFQ8_Hg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best breakfast place to go in Richmond, plenty of choices with different ingredients. Highly recommended for Chinese modern style of crepes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6glp-nrtdcvvbkGr7CBRe0wvnpNeie5evfpsR&fid=0x0:0xc34f8fe0e0942e47"],"When":"2024-4-1"},{"Name":"Nina Monnikka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDVBurTUfguvZQ_ETpdJP0Qx9KXejHHpaCUitQirLuRGAdnj8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The tofu soup has a weird taste. The tofu itself is sour inside without the sauce…almost tastes like it’s expired. The sauce is from sesame and fermented tofu, which is not the typical sauce for this dish. Lu charcoal’s tofu soup is so much better…","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Despite the criticisms from my fellow local guides. I recommend the herbed pork one (anything else ask for extra sauce). I do agree it’s a bit pricey. There’s a place at the president plaza food court that makes a good one at a cheaper price and I believe T&T started making these for the same price as a sticky rice wrap.  I would come back and try their mini hot pots as the price is attractive.

The Wife was showing me how to wrap this so you can eat on the go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyKPoR0UuOHau1lO-N00dxK8qjlc8IOXaWWq6N&fid=0x0:0xc34f8fe0e0942e47"],"When":"2019-5-8"},{"Name":"Michelle Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKcM0YfAevZRMlWNYZap6hsqt2owsBtQua1SViL77-dnaI6eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered crepe with cumin lamb, a bit spicy but overall it tasted good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgSaaJLR02NmMfsrUl6mtJ63KtVWd49C1IUwJV&fid=0x0:0xc34f8fe0e0942e47"],"When":"2024-3-15"},{"Name":"Adam Flewe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCrK5lExQbqQZ5wGSKJvMKGnavXMaNsSPzW1RZQaNZattXE2hz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food here was not that great, the quality and service were very poor. There is so much take out flowing out of this place you will wait forever to get food sitting down. Chinese crepes take a few minutes to make but they can’t keep up. There is many meat options. Lamb, short rib, beef, chicken etc and each crepe is filled with different things. There are also many options to add if your into customizing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdp3fybpPHbW68rbOwnvcwT1hAaIA0WXux6LEn&fid=0x0:0xc34f8fe0e0942e47"],"When":"2019-9-15"},{"Name":"NC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRXn7MhrYuulxUnAStsyAPxcJgk33_YlX1XE92srw1sAVjGeCWeg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super delicious crepe!! I got the cumin lamb and it was amazing, like drool worthy deliciousness 🤤🤤🤤

I'm not entirely sure what's inside the crepe but there's a crunchy thing and some egg. Together with the cumin and lamb, every bite was amazing. Eating it in the takeout pouch was slightly more challenging as there's some oil and sauce leaking from the bottom. The pouch kept everything contained but a few sesame seeds got lost in the car somewhere...

It's take out only right now but once things open back up I would love to dine in and make a mess on a plate instead of in a takeout pouch 🤗","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRpbE_oGxw11qeGxaWrbxKFWHvc3c2znlvHIIt&fid=0x0:0xc34f8fe0e0942e47"],"When":"2022-1-29"},{"Name":"Robert Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4zVLs84gNXUyO2cQ1alt5_xXV3NBLpJzeJnQMClqmRyk_HFyD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is a more upscale, creative (but NOT westernized) version of Chinese crepe instead of authentic Northern Chinese street food. The crepe was just average, not impressive (almost chain fast food style, which was disappointing given the price). Tea boiled egg was way too salty and the tofu wasn't soft enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjoKQsyUVPfjXi9eG1punlrvAkSA3CpleGg2uQ&fid=0x0:0xc34f8fe0e0942e47"],"When":"2019-8-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"ミスタードーナツ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXrBvi4iBWRqQhd6YUjOsI1njaZ9-88FHOjTUvy9KJQij9prh6lw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice little hidden gem in the middle of an industrial business park.

Had the Reuben Deluxe with Cream of Mushroom soup and it was really, really good.

The sandwich had the perfect proportion of ingredients, amazing taste.

Soup want overly creamy, but again, seasoned so well that it was perfect.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcKF8dWzjBjkIASXDS3B8P6Mj2TOJ7BM0oBHXJ&fid=0x0:0x2fa0757f0fdd01b5"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Friendly owner and nice comfortable sitting in this small restaurant
Taste of food is decent but the portion is really small
I had a chicken breast sandwich and the chicken is so thin
With coffee is about $20 I would expect something more filling not going home hungry
Coffee is refillable there’s a pot next to cashier DIY refill","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoLuiBqECskkvT6feaj2eBb4s9HtteRUMJ4JiG&fid=0x0:0x2fa0757f0fdd01b5"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9B18BsuOI3Y27yllx0Hx9gut2kL9djTLoTMDlJIm5z9XAvQN9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a lovely lunch at this cafe this afternoon. Sat on the patio, and really enjoyed the chicken panini, the chicken was juicy and tender and the bun was perfectly crispy and soft. The owners are very kind and great to chat with. I Highly recommend stopping by","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6wkpMbLQFYOcRq42n5qjFe3SzZQGuwY4NGuc0&fid=0x0:0x2fa0757f0fdd01b5"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Jordan Ellis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6CEeIPS-loQURDvgAmkL1dRe7eqLm27RtfMqxJVA0n0p4cgv3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great experience at Red Garden Café. I enjoyed a delicious Denver omelette with my coffee, and the portions were just right. The service was excellent—friendly and attentive. The café was clean and welcoming, making it a perfect spot for a relaxed meal. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4WhOFzNpbl4vBUI7317P0XJgvWW3o-nuCPABb&fid=0x0:0x2fa0757f0fdd01b5"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"HS SAM WONG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdrgCJmNCacer8Kju6gJnl7vhh6rpIUE4GPDYS1m00GZNOwA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was here on 14/3/2023

The owners are a Persian couple who showed nice hospitality with the wife approaching customers from time to time to ask if we have any need and whether the food was satisfactory.
The veggies in the salad were very fresh.  The soup barely had salty taste and the natural flavour and freshness of the ingredients were even more palpable. By the time we finished the food we ordered, she gifted us two pieces of cakes and two cups for self-service coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEuroIGTswdwqwjYSabmvaD04BnR_TO4SO3Ynq&fid=0x0:0x2fa0757f0fdd01b5"],"When":"2023-4-5"},{"Name":"Maryam BG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYOocnrrI0wz1xy1UzzrfX002uyW86PfiNNhxdXyfBusTbUhlS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mike and Rosita, who are the new owners of this restaurant, were very hospitable and nice. We ordered the eggs Benny and I substituted my bacon for turkey and Mike happily accommodated. Rosita did a great job with the interior design and looks drastically different than what it previously looked like.

Minor details: The food quality was good, no option for alternative milks and eggs Benny was not runny, it was a bit overdone but overall food was great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwAJha5Rquaeqsex416M6FCT8nhmnIOcozzT96&fid=0x0:0x2fa0757f0fdd01b5"],"When":"2023-8-13"},{"Name":"Dog Lover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWUy_cKDyeqe90SXYlJCESdUjuzwFhKB3t1bxbd4V3R0xALg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is amazing , loved the homemade jam so much! Definitely a hidden gem!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0Gx-kCIEvvCVMLImOznNL6hgcqQMwq00CaQP0&fid=0x0:0x2fa0757f0fdd01b5"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Tess Disturnal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJu_6YEKjqNEMFrSSYkTfHS5PpkXxeJNKIpqVMzuczam56z1rM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"perfect hidden gem, super cozy family run spot! the owners, mike and rozita are so warm and welcoming - I love coming here when I visit vancouver. the decor is lovely, especially the plants!

the food is fresh and comforting. My favourites on the menu are the sandwiches, soups, chow mein, and last time I was there i had a delicious pasta feature - always a treat!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFPLf9EzJO0jAckxrvtrJxxXZhl7BB_lFRjVqz&fid=0x0:0x2fa0757f0fdd01b5"],"When":"2023-8-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sanjana Chawla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1vfyBXrJNSH3ClP_8O3HxwjRyrR4uuiyIgtE8I7U6ZTcGMD17-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super yummy coffee and super friendly atmosphere!! It’s placed inside an early learning centre that looked amazing too, they center their learning on the UN SDG’s which I thought was incredible.

I ordered an oat milk latte and it was honestly one of the best oat milk lattes I’ve ever had! They also had coconut, and almond for alternative milk options so the cafe is vegan and dairy-free friendly!  - if I had one recommendation it would be to also add soy because soy milk is my favourite :) (and maybe charge a little less for alternative milks too)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPefNMPnGN9pw_HgcCVbs1Pmirha2szjKtmoyr4&fid=0x0:0xe08cdfbb33efc1c3"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Kitty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhMuwg_tl1TRTc24JxH5iTo3OJVTHqCQijM2P6PldLkYJ1Idkn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best coffee shops in town! You can really taste the high quality coffee bean. Very friendly atmosphere. My favourite is their latte, and currently they have a special pumpkin spice latte, must try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOOFuM2RwAafyZNM0iBjMlbHhvEDN2Wf3ybSmb&fid=0x0:0xe08cdfbb33efc1c3"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"John Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnGzFSZCI0oYVcoS7P_SxDfl5Ds40vY4hWVkRHwQu4GVvzVQnf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent coffee! A rare thing to find. Hidden away in the early learning centre, no place to sit really, but if you need a really good coffee and you’re in the area, you can’t go wrong here","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkMqZIC8DVuQUXIQTv6VzSC9fCDa_-Ehpbm-EG&fid=0x0:0xe08cdfbb33efc1c3"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Hotsun Mok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLoNgpZvhHTTr8qnSjYSEuoYnNTVY6HQzr0xnEeIdYJwafi5A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was a 5-star, now 1, sorry. It used to be exceptional and worth a visit even if you don't go here.
But they switched barrista lately, coffee doesn't taste the same anymore. One time milk was over steamed and the whole drink lost its flavour, and one time the milk was not frothy at all. Not to mention the latte art is gone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nadia Slakov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8CnG_D1Ia_mWbPVgqNh0vgiKcrZ1QJFRRgNVWuMLsPn5fVljf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem for great coffee! Coffee and nothing but :) part of the Terra early learning centre, and we got to chat with the director, who was really engaging and lovely to talk to. Thanks for bringing good coffee to the area!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dominic Lemire","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrUx7HMeFserfmygTi6qVwPLSmFbwi4cWVuUVBV9nxVSx8e__Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious! Glad to finally have a good coffee option in the area. Too bad there are no tables.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMirdvtN4U7Xl0GRHOVnnHmymn_PFO3YgNAX-D4&fid=0x0:0xe08cdfbb33efc1c3"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Ranita Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6VWQMLP5uN7ijEOMc3tf74DydlyA0c5VEhMaxxjfLmTWXczth=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute to-go cafe inside Terra Early Learning childcare centre. Great coffee if you're in the area or waiting to pick up your kid from daycare, as there are a few early education centres surrounding the space.

You'll need to ring the doorbell or knock to get in for the safety of the children.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2v5yrp6vcyUE0Z5uzCDdodi1N4dOY2ehm1wfL&fid=0x0:0xe08cdfbb33efc1c3"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Ophir Stolov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxHcPLm6wSiLwLkTtGSfoMjGWs99Z0jPTqHs_n5WW7mECm8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great hidden coffeeshop for people who appreciate good coffee.
I find it hard to have a great cup of coffee on Richmond. They are everywhere in Vancouver. This place is as good as any coffee in Vancouver.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tosh F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-KRnR0awA2JnHcCe2nGRqZX0WOllmhjMevkVRuly7evPAJI2V=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nov 2024 - new menu item: spicy crab and pork noodle soup. Excellent choices is your like seafood and veg in your noodle soup. Service is stellar as usual. A hidden gem of River Rd. in Richmond. Highly recommend 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM--zjjvoLV_rQWlf54xVltLy0sn587oucJuNJn&fid=0x0:0x163fe9d5aaf2d85b"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Jubilee Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINuSYrvbuq7vxxpfawBkp_I3UTKfjvimjZxCtBV2cchCPwZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my favorite weekly go-to place! Love their no-msg pho, grilled pork and chicken, stewed beef, etc. Their special homemade off-menu items always surprise me… seafood pho, chicken pho, shrimp dumplings, seafood spring rolls, etc. Got a chance to try their crab soup noodles today and it was amazingly tasty. It came with two huge crab cakes which were made with real crab meats and seasoned with dried shrimps. It was definitely the best crab soup noodles in town!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONMfdeW1aDBBASzOtl-FTxugEFF8-Xd5C0qirV&fid=0x0:0x163fe9d5aaf2d85b"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"DG Sider","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCV2q-q02_m3cFOY14_aZJOjggrJL9qzbklcA5OCmKLq0C=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It's a great little restaurant in a busy industrial area.
The food was fresh and flavourful.
The service was excellent.
I am certainly going back when in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqwu_od2H3ADtLLYJE4rA2n3j-3WTsgvAKAPU&fid=0x0:0x163fe9d5aaf2d85b"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Na Jiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWIVdjobevi4r9o1X3Pm2rHdti1YezlwQDzSKztvmkQOlup1c3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a good place to have Vietnamese food. We had number 15 (pho) and 23 (lemongrass chicken vermicelli) and a special beef noodle soup. We liked it as it tastes clean and does not have taste of MSG. Will come back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nikita H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0JYug06TnLpwLulSVS2Wd06Srl880Jv4W4pQHNC-GSau3sPM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time going but definitely not the last as they became my favourite pho spot in Richmond. so delicious and creative in they have different kinds of Vietnamese menu items as well as the regular stuff. The inside is cute and small but can accommodate a fairly sized crowd. I highly recommend this place to eat as it is really delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMW6ciepq6mmYvacSV7d1z0rmphNDjhlvgyFlQe&fid=0x0:0x163fe9d5aaf2d85b"],"When":"2019-10-17"},{"Name":"Cher Bear","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVU-qOXZlkWJdKbXTs1arcYC6vKucoTg1V7RzgeGkD19xWvGtKh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered on doordash and waited 40 minutes for them to cancel my delivery. Was hoping to try them out for the first time based off good reviews but will not be ordering again","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeremy Sharman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLf1oEMge7n_YmjSKunWN3iUHCkxHz5lw092wpoRkaaP6qk6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing, authentic food. The Pho was great, had a bahn mi to take away and it was incredibly fresh and flavourful. Will be back for sure!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ej pangilinan (MisterE87)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKn_HoRNyfcqwhFEJB0aSFKg9UVE1xY70uBHtQWKHbwoC-8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to get my car tinted , while waiting I came here to grab lunch. Very delicious Viet pho I will definitely come back. If your in the area and you love Viet pho or subs, I'd recommend this place. The price is perfect. Nice outdoor eating area","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shibe Life","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUC4Mb1DHizRVJ60Sg_sm7ibJx8EQiAVjPSsfgIJdoHWmHYbUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The old man is scary lol. I’m a cbc and decided to use my canto to order because idk feel like he would be mad if I used English. I wouldn’t normally really care about this service as old Chinese men running these shops usually dgaf which is fine if the good is fire.

The waffle itself is pretty mid. So airy there’s nothing inside and the taste isn’t right. So far crystal mall has the best bubble egg waffle.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5bI9Uk2GQ6EDLnDPayZp6zh6EqjHOdx5jswpI&fid=0x0:0xea70b962b7fefb7a"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Rainbow Cafe in Parker Place food court is a fantastic spot for refreshing drinks! Their bubble tea is excellent, with perfectly chewy pearls and a rich, flavorful base. The pear juice is wonderfully fresh and sweet, a real treat. The chrysanthemum tea is soothing and fragrant, ideal for a relaxing break. With friendly service and a cozy atmosphere, Rainbow Cafe is a must-visit for anyone looking to enjoy high-quality beverages in a welcoming setting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9P5A6O2uDisNUWVU-RRSKEzrsPbkWu7p1kw3S&fid=0x0:0xea70b962b7fefb7a"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"7a Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIByhqEbat1EccniZw0W8OATciQlnxhaKi5wzhBNiM5jxMyCw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"These are the BEST egg puffs I've had not only in Canada, but also in the US. If you don't want to go to Hong Kong to get quality egg puffs, come here! I don't understand where the negative reviews are coming from. The egg puffs are delectable and the service is amazing! The prices are also very affordable at 4.50 for one batch. In the span of 24 hours I've gotten SEVEN batches of egg puffs!! That's how good they are. The best part about these egg puffs is how they're crispy on the outside but soft on the inside. It takes a lot of skill to do this and the owner does not disappoint. I highly recommend coming here for some great quality egg puffs.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKM9R9gbXq46NYUVhAHiMu2hGPj-H3RAabkVCwB7Sqi-JAE1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Used to be great, now the old man and lady have become senile, and this is reflected in the bubble waffle. Horrible attitude, soggy bubble waffles. I have been coming here for over 20 years and will not return.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"William Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLygJ_WT80jbthJLhQOXOsXgQ7SXXRd1_jsXBj31C_n78__g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best egg waffles I’ve ever had. Texture and taste is unique compared to the complete dry bread egg waffles I’ve had in bubble tea places in the States. Rainbow is underrated!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtP68sK30htt0oQ4q-QwEx6jmkIVHfYibpLlyP&fid=0x0:0xea70b962b7fefb7a"],"When":"2022-10-4"},{"Name":"Steffi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJeHD3RD58jcNDB6oxCfLZOP_vq288BoxQ-aat6QY4WRHVZOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This used to be my favorite place for bubble waffle BUT NOT ANY MORE. First they lied about waiting time, they told me the wait is about 3 mins, after I paid, they told me it will be 10 mins (no lineup).   Second, they serve burn waffle because the machine is broken inside. When I asked to redo, they responded rudely for refund option only.   They don't care about food safe, spend your money somewhere else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jing Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUf9Qg0tHXsTQO4A5ZIHRnKXFtHTRAYClK5qOr_je_bU6FDq4nt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have not had their bubble waffle for at least 5 years so I don't know how they taste now. Used to be good so I gave 3 for the food. But their service is terrible and they simply do not care. We were in line to order and we saw the guy making the bubble waffle rush back from the kitchen and made a face when he opened the grill. It was burnt but he just placed it on the rack anyway. When it was our turn, the cashier lady tried to give us that piece so my husband asked if we can get a fresh one. The lady became visibly annoyed and asked us why we don't want that piece so we said it is burnt. She took the number tag back and refused to sell us any. Since they're the only vendor selling bubble waffle in the mall, I believe they will get good business regardless of their attitude. Too bad they will not held accountable for their rude attitude.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jambingoo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4XoLAUvqX0_n7K0yyq_zZCyfuMST3JOhDaDR-hXm8GdWpNg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered egg waffles and was given clearly burned and old ones that have been sitting and soggy. I asked very politely if it was possible for me to get fresh ones since the ones sitting out were not only burned black, but also soggy.

Was responded with extremely aggressive attitude from the old man who seems to hate his life and snaps at everyone he sees.

I decided to let it go and take the burnt and soggy egg waffles anyways since it was only a few dollars.

Guess what? I found out those egg waffles were pretty much an outer shell that were empty on the inside.

What a terrible place.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amy Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjXHHF3vPFKXXTvrLI9L9GLLX-x9A-g0rYHpm8C9R04tRthXY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"For $15.95, Nutritious BF (option E) seems to offer good value. I chose scrambled egg and chicken, ham, hash brown, and lemon in hot water.

They allow customisation in many ways, like jumbo egg for $2. Not worth it imo.

Chicken was cooked right, decent size, crispy outside and well seasoned.

I liked the ham. Thicker than packaged sliced ham. Taste right. It won’t make you drink lots of water after eating.

I loved the scrambled egg. It came in 1 piece rolled up. It reminds me of the egg in my sandwiches back in elementary school days. I wish they provide us black pepper shaker. I only got white pepper.

I enjoyed being in this place when it is busy. Sunday morning seems to be one of the peak times.  Sat among many people who speak Cantonese who came in big group/ with family.

When I got up to leave, I forgot 😅 my cell phone. Our vigilant waitress spotted the phone at the table and ran out to the door and called out “Wait!”. I am so grateful. Waitresses were really busy but we got what we asked for speedily. Here is 5 stars for service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBoe0ScbI9QNhf8rGkzMc9-E9pSPBe6svhL6Jd&fid=0x0:0x9889cbcb466fcde8"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Christina S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIE7SKDZvMmixPw_VGe3Ej13nq3C_PaModBiwAEK3j8WVG2oQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It’s a nice venue.
I don’t know if it’s because we’re not locals, we are used to service asking how the food is.  If we need anything else.

They don’t seem too friendly.

Atmosphere is nice.
Lots of ppl ordered the lobster dish.  We got it over sticky rice.  We went to another location which we thought tasted a bit better.

We also ordered the crispy chicken, fried squid, and sweet n sour pork chop with our set.

Big tip: cash only! Or use your debit card they don’t take cc! With prices on the menu I’m surprised they don’t take cc.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO53vdar_UV7FHO2c3BdvhbufGLduqGkx1R4HD7&fid=0x0:0x9889cbcb466fcde8"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Maling Sun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLxrVpvBLeDjDbqxSw5ebEuGE6ULYMthOqllAX6mlVH_M9G0Z2Ig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Early breakfast at Happy Day Cafe in Richmond, enjoying A5 Morning Special with two eggs and crispy top bun (bolo bao) and fresh butter & Congee combo steam plain rice roll. Both come with a hot drink; we chose HK milk tea and HK style coffee.

It was bumping busy at 10am but we were quickly seated upon entering the restaurant. I do like the contemporary decor as table and booth/chair are in good condition and the lights are bright with high ceilings. It's not my first time dining at Happy Day Cafe and every time the cafe is clean and bright. The service is always friendly and quick (never feel rushed).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSwe-IGVazNpjRc5Zhx4OvnXrF9c4HHgC_FqnS&fid=0x0:0x9889cbcb466fcde8"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We visit Happy Day Cafe frequently, and it’s one of our favorite HK-style restaurants. Their breakfast menu has plenty of choices, and I especially love the satay beef instant noodle dishes—they’re my go-to. What I appreciate most is that they maintain a consistently good standard no matter what time we visit. It’s a reliable spot for a classic Hong Kong-style meal, and we’ll definitely keep coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMi40wakEX-8rxA5PfQP4P56rnOJ6XfafHBXjoW&fid=0x0:0x9889cbcb466fcde8"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"JOE CHEUNG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITcUa8udaZfgZECEKe5qn4g0G5mpOKc-aHAY-YGVBDA4qWLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Saw some bad comments and wonder why so check it out as also heard positive recommendations from locals.
I went here for late lunch
It was ok, not crowded
Service, I can’t say it’s good but it’s better than what I expected for HK style cafe/restaurant, they serve me well and polite.
Food, the food I order is pretty good to me. The fried rice is good, the noodle is fine, the BaoBao is only one SoSo as not likely freshly baked as it’s already late noon
Overall, taste and value to me is good.
Do recommend to come.
May be some others comments are right too as normally what I see from restaurant is that when they are super crowed or busy, some dishes will be out of control.
But in general, they are good
So, try and see","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4VQqYGERJ7_Fs6VnYDbDrotmKYHuWJKLGk4r-&fid=0x0:0x9889cbcb466fcde8"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"S Chow YVR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLft45tqKYa6LWItZoKD8gx_lrSIIWD1eS02qURQYYbl6j37Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Looks like it is hard to keep food quality stable here. I used to like it’s breakfast and take out lunch. However, it has been in several visits recently that I found the food quality varied. The satay beef instant noodles in soup that I ordered recently was way over cooked. Noodles were so soft like it has been cooked for 10 minutes. Satay beef is hard and tasteless. Even the milk tea that I liked most was lukewarm and not tasted as good. I asked a waitress if they have a new chef. She couldn’t give a definite answer. For me, I definitely would move it downward from my list of favourite cafes","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rick Cheney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5kbPUX907HB9-JPnY34Lwfl0RWkDRVqUKYSlfGhZk1gBu8f0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I went there for a quick bite after work today.
Satan pork chop with spaghetti was ordered with iced tea. Delicious!

Service was the regular HK cafe type, where you have to hail down your server. Not attentive which is to be expected.

Men’s room was actually clean and not smelly, that deserves a star!

The bad: I found hair in the midst of my pasta when I was half way into my meal, gross!

Atmosphere just went down hill for me.

I suggest that the manager can provide cooks with hairnets to prevent this happening to other diners in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvuZ4TJCxhbL-wdCwMfvbICQlXSP3ePWRJLzXw&fid=0x0:0x9889cbcb466fcde8"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Hong Kong Style breakfast
Always very busy here
Quality of food really depends - some days are good and some days are quite bad
Today is Happy Day the egg omelette perfectly made
Satay beef I wish they can give more beef
Milk tea is good
Server too busy to be attentive but still polite
Plenty of 90 mins free parking","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBKOqJzZqFkUU8D3CEv4zQEUHqADY3R0B8KBoq&fid=0x0:0x9889cbcb466fcde8"],"When":"2024-5-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Little Fox Bakehouse in Richmond is a delightful find, especially for those who appreciate quality baked goods. Their vegan cookies are surprisingly delicious, with a perfect balance of texture and flavor. The cakes here are consistently good, offering a satisfying mix of sweetness and richness. The Biscoff flat croissant is a must-try—flaky and buttery with just the right amount of filling. Whether you're vegan or not, this bakery is worth a visit for its thoughtful and well-executed treats.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUhAaOWSn4k6NrAioWncjOM44T-Bpw1rRxSIQ1&fid=0x0:0x186d74e59e6f7d54"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Karen Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxZHtI2a_ExlNYwCwp-uwLeaG0hCCmCziIHzCMLJYVJ_2HwQZi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have gotten various pasties and croissants from here before. Some of my favourites treats are the Salted Egg Yolk Croissant and mochi donuts. This time, I ordered a birthday cake over the phone for pick up as I had never tried their cakes before. The strawberry shortcake was great - cake was light and airy, cream was fresh and there was a good mount of strawberries in the layers - and most importantly the cake wasn’t too sweet! Prices got cakes are very reasonable :)
I would love to try other cake flavours next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsy1xilr-Xb3ZfONCdG7hmrAfHV8kT5gAG3_ms&fid=0x0:0x186d74e59e6f7d54"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Sylvia Lan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZOrignIxZtNQr5fqOb9lpoqxcw0LTJa79u5ODK0MTYwholQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite bakery in Richmond! There are diverse selections of pastries and with varieties of classic and unique flavours, such as milk tea, salted egg yolk cream, black sesame and mocha. The flavours of sweet pastries are rich and with a nice amount of sweetness (not too sweet). Savoury pastries are also amazing, but there’s only limited amount each day from certain times. Croissants are buttery, flaky and crunchy. Egg tart is a hit and miss though with very little filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbBHrqeegz3vVPKbcih8gUitOvG02bR2QdpN6p&fid=0x0:0x186d74e59e6f7d54"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Star MP","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpAAWd0MhlKmohK5G6a5gfMUU1smyDHS6WobxLbnqY948xb9sGZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent coffee & Phenomenal croissants - From your basic butter croissant to matcha creme and everything in between and beyond.
Their pastries are absolutely delicious and they serve great JJ Bean coffee :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUD24so37vEZ_fgCCQEgbikO3-4auSEcTrrZ-I&fid=0x0:0x186d74e59e6f7d54"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Victor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkxqtcGXmOPYM4VdnBihzRqF3McQwie2ieRk7WpRaOPgQ66Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Take out and go spot, but you can take your goods to eat upstairs.

I love this fusion French Asian inspired bakery.  Croissants are so good and flavors are on point.

Price is reasonable and worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPTGFw3QexCcwajxQJuvB2TIORqkAEzoNs2ABu&fid=0x0:0x186d74e59e6f7d54"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Yan Jie Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWtJgsuhwRId0t1MOzd5ywiIXfrBfIFDTo7UODkLUu9At3EXtegw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If I’m in Richmond I’ll always come to little fix to get some croissants. If you buy more than 6, then no tax. The sesame croissant with the mochi in it is definitely my favorite. The almond croissant is classic and good.  I ordered flat croissant which is super trendy among Asian people right now, however I don’t know it’s the way I reheat it is not right or something, it’s so hard to chew and doesn’t taste as good as the normal croissant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEhlIxaD8f_lSbWa4OfmMTHCsMpUsOjKU1AIbN&fid=0x0:0x186d74e59e6f7d54"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Elizabeth Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXku1mc6pmeIDMqP2gIA1uCtfryJMYCip8UUonqzGQcOKr7CzokQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the matcha cream puff for hubby and the waffle croissant for myself. Hubby says that the cream puff was light and not sweet at all, he loved it. As for the waffle croissant, first bite was crunchy, the dough was not the usual dough, I think it’s a pastry dough, I love it, it had chocolate on the side which makes it even better. The price was reasonable! Would love to try other flavour in future!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMF_Xr3MT6Msu_Hzio3ZJecu_Fcf5yCtKAOK7ym&fid=0x0:0x186d74e59e6f7d54"],"When":"2024-5-9"},{"Name":"Jeannie Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXDfPBPFFajsT3BJpoCdoax6r1y3Xe_I5ATKB7H2xuQF6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been going to Little Fox for cakes and goodie boxes for many years and they never disappoint. Eric is so accommodating and everything is always so delicious. We always preorder what we need and it's always nice to pick up a few fresh treats as well while we're there. Highly recommend for just going in to grab a treat or preordering for any party needs!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOh0WpFq84RbHAapt0csNwPZy-8LqgUGbuUhWs&fid=0x0:0x186d74e59e6f7d54"],"When":"2024-9-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Raymond Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBtAhCSFPuyjlYh4wgzIFHrrE1L_iXwYw4jFuh-6uGxOYES5H32w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I have only tried their classic red bean milk, and it's pretty good, I like it. The red beans aren't hard; they're soft and slightly chewy, but not fully mashed into a paste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgyLWO38PUqvsCuBpLM8YIiGR_uPk-8ylJd46z&fid=0x0:0xa2d18a45be06b045"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Angela Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7yy49zVKKZU9KKFVQ-LBH8_6p8gUoSWN14t_io3DQ81P4L6zN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"My mom got the luncheon meat and egg instant noodle with a hot coffee milk tea. It's cheap...and that's kinda it. They're generous with the luncheon meat but it is definetly one of the cheapest brands and had an off-putting texture, also didnt seem to be fried either leaving it soggy. The drink...wasn't good either, extremely bitter and not smooth. They're still new and have plenty of time to improve and I hope they do, they're pretty nice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"冨樫義博","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGSBcDk_AAI823XhnuxhvKVhwTEjIc1QNNkmPlKS25YNaLDYI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"第一次試吃，十分足料，金鐘廊沒有三文治的早餐店，以後不用特地跑去百家店，因為價錢一樣，而且他們的咖啡不會像傳統香港早餐店的咖啡一樣飲完會痾肚，除非你習慣吃完早餐要清腸胃。

份量&賣相 9/10
服務 9/10 週日的服務員很友善，這點也比傳統香港早餐店好一些，不會好像趕你下單的感覺。

題外話: 旁邊新開的基隆早餐店其實是香港人經營，菜單也不是台灣早餐店的內容，騙得了本地人騙不了內行人。","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOU8OoPKpEOEAHPO_Nyv-jxsbPiyjm8Z9SK1vCf&fid=0x0:0xa2d18a45be06b045"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Booger Boy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0pDblVMiYEpDAtRnWZfjDGKLrPFUO2TBhq1x6ITdQG1Hm0V4G=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"今日試新開張的茶餐廳，太太想食蛋牛多，廚師特別炮製，用上碎鮮牛，好好食. 好立克是正牌貨，香濃美味.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjiu8movYMLNi7FuFGGqbqHO4LALNFLuobkviK&fid=0x0:0xa2d18a45be06b045"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"mana lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJr0vdmVHlhXzCetLcymbw5GOUNMET9kwWX8v69hPamyeDMyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"牛丸米線配炸春卷熱飲餐$9.9
整體ok唔錯。","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1XL4eLtNQSxoeUZu5-K5Qtxc0SSzTveuuQYXo&fid=0x0:0xa2d18a45be06b045"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Vincie Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_31Uv7Lp6ZXwZHkgaM-IH25LpzxuSuCfOk11xzri3_67THLMl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shuk Man Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHxtgrEbYDep0VekPMorcmDnBM76EpyRlN9H2whBS_g_jq-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Andrea Pino-Olivares","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDHfW5CQIShXG0Q2Pw9uW-j6d53mSzuaPbenQG8OgvnErBa6_0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have only tried their lunches but I see that they offer breakfast and dinner too. I am impressed by quality and creativity of the lunch menu every day. Full of flavor and healthy options.
They also have a burrito/wrap and panini corner, have some pastries, coffee.
The staff is very friendly and serves you with a smile.
The prices are a little bit more expensive than other hospital cafeterias.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anne CZ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICjZmtGpaR3bzwt3KjR6sD7iZTuVW2P9FM7QboFNwJxB3crA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The cafe offers breakfast, lunch, and dinner foods. They are closed in between each service for a short period of time, I'm assuming for food prep. The food they offer differs by the day, as well as by the week. Some foods you can find here are soups, pizza, sandwiches, bowl noodles, fruit parfait, chips, granola bars, and drinks including starbucks frappucino in a bottle, san pelligrino, and chocolate milk.

The staff are quite friendly towards hospital staff but moreso on the neutral side towards visitors.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ERIC LEE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaJovYZAgLzUeUNtNtg127bXJTiz29J3-DCzJEx2zxmWPGyzyC1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Richmond Hospital cafeteria operated by Sodexo. Located on second floor, Red Zone. Has coffee, tea, soup, salad. Serves breakfast, lunch, dinner. Compost, recycling available. Accepts credit, debit, and cash. AppCard accepted. Menu available online. One public piano.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maggie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4doE0c83QLwldGBrqYdFpPSkNl0NCJ0S4EW39mk2RO2om36uLHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Better fish n chips than Pajo’s tbh","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Terry Benton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXb8-dKilKeefTZJjXUY5Ujc6vTa_Hjn0P4VZXYrSPKla7GEPyV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Very limited menu. Very expensive.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jenny Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyruovd3E8Tx5MBsyO8-Dd-DpYOIPX1sg-Vx1hyvwyVYuQTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So happy that Paragon opened another location 😊. I love their hot genmaicha oat. The matcha coconut refresher is great if you want something light especially after working out. Their tea infused baked goods are so yummy. They are collaboration with other local small businesses. The space is super cute and cozy. It can get pretty busy on the weekends but the line moves quickly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNfrVeRYvhR4gzIuWdocYRnXtwu_Q9Oc1RFR7v&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Paragon Tea Room has opened a shop in Richmond!

This new shop shares the same welcoming and warm atmosphere as the Vancouver W. shop. It also offers dine in and take out, although seats are limited inhouse. We came in a Monday late afternoon and managed to grab the two final seats.

It was absolutely pleasing to watch the lady gracefully hand-whisked the green tea to make my Matcha Black Sesame Oat. The matcha and the black sesame complemented each other so well with a good balance between each flavor and yet without losing their uniqueness. The seasalt chocolate cookie further  enhanced the taste of my drink by adding a little bit of saltiness.

I was very tempted to try their mochi muffins and bubble waffle, both of which were highly rated on Google, but I had to leave them for next time.

We will be back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmd61c1vTAYdTnMiHerNThP0V_pRGeaaYsX6yn&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Nikka Adrias","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGi6Gz_tMMFxsiHqVtyo9UQujDLj1XNHKkomkhpjbqVuxkYAZ79Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My visit to the Paragon Tea Room Richmond location was perfect! I highly recommend their Classic Matcha Oat. It's the perfect amount of earthiness and it's not too sweet. You can definitely tell it's high quality matcha. The exclusive mochi muffins at this location are a great lil' sweet treat when you're on the go.

If you're lucky enough to come across them, maybe you'll have Jasmin or Tiffany as your baristas – they were so warm and welcoming and their service was very smooth.

Will definitely be coming back for more soon!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEbCQsvLOXYcOoDoC45FW05VPUVBgB9WAS_2_w&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Aaron Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxKZ7-UTFQni0mrdKYzhez4Ll3vvr5m_nxy9gIdPj06QAW9g8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Paragon Tea Room in Richmond, and it was a wonderful experience!

The comfortable environment and convenient location makes it perfect for a quick refreshment.

The drink selection is fantastic—my favorite is the Obsidian Hojicha, rich and flavorful. They serve a variety of teas, plant-based bubble teas, and delicious bubble waffles. The staff were friendly and efficient, especially with managing the line ups, and ensuring orders came out in a timely manner.

Whether you're looking to hang out with friends or just enjoy a tasty treat, Paragon Tea Room is a must-visit while in the neighbourhood.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNH8RnzTWaAxIUPLiThqUlHZCGN9rkNFBImPPwG&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excited to see they have opened up their Richmond location. Their green tea beverages and tea powders set the bar high for its competitors in the GVA.

If you have never tried, it’s worth trying","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4J9iBTQenxjICBDqxeI3RdKXv-8kh-YfOoyAK&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Henry Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcTlx45tkivdnVyW4B38kXt4WHZXtLMp6yRttTlIFdf-1gou8R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As good as the Vancouver store. Interior is clean and modern. Barista is a bit slow making everything. Bubble waffle and tea drinks are good. Lots of space for parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3RjHWGMP8v2hH9Vxk7OIAgFvA-MrKVfQiadED&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Elton Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_SVkVqkNe3SvSFwaZ1xrBYHObNVkTiTTXXYykf58guqGIk3qy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was a cold morning, my wife and I needed hot beverage to warm us up. We came to this tea room as we visited their main shop in Cambie Street before.

This tea room has a similar theme of interior and there are several tables and single person seats opposite to the cashier.

We ordered matcha latte and tea misto. They both had a bold taste of tea and silky milk foam on top. The taste was satisfactorily rich.

This is one of the best tea rooms to go in Richmond.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXODY0Mjx2P3GkHfxbOSjMgCWlzpTn4I6nmO8&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Belva See","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKA0yW8ovdsF8RER5QKnV7faGXhFRY_rCpDJLu01gM6B7onuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I like their drinks and have been a long time customer for both locations but I just want to share an experience about making sure to pay attention to their holiday hours.
I ordered their Santa shortbread collection on Dec 23 for pick up the next day on Dec 24. I remembered clearly at the time of ordering to check for their closing hours to be sure that I can pick it up on time and that they weren't closing early for X'mas (both the Google hours and their main website said at the time of ordering that their store closes at 7 pm/ regular hours so I proceeded with ordering).
When I got to the Richmond store on Dec 24th at 4:15 pm, I then realized from the sign posted outside their door that they actually closed at 4 pm. I want to thank the staff that they still opened the doors after hours when I knocked, thank you to one of the ladies who called her manager to let her know about the situation and thankfully, in the end, I was able to still pick up the order but I want to raise a few concerns here:
1) I would not have ordered from Paragon if I knew ahead of time that they were closing early or I would have arranged someone to pick up for me. I have done my due diligence to check for their holiday hours on the day of placing the order. Their holiday hours should have been posted on their main website given that they have an online ordering system on this site and they have order pick up available on xmas Eve (even until today, Dec 24th, the holiday hours aren't posted). The hours on google were not updated until the day of. The receipt also does not indicate pick up deadline. I raised this concern to the staff at pickup that their hours aren't updated and her response was that this is posted on Instagram. There shouldn't be an assumption that all their customers follow  their Instagram or that their go-to would be to check Instagram for their hours, especially when there is a store website and the Instagram account is not the first link that is attached the Google business page. I could not find a phone number to call either to give them a heads up or inquire what to do in this case.
2) It would be appreciative if the staff could have called the customers who did not pick up their orders (or even called 30 min before closing which some other stores would have done) or sent an email regarding this which will highlight more professionalism here. When asked about this, the staff answered that they have too many orders to call the customers (which is interesting because do they have many orders left behind by customers who do not pick up their order for the day they ordered for).
In summary, I still want to thank the staff for taking their time for helping me but I hope the store understands the frustration for a customer who is trying to rush from work and hoping to gift the cookies for an X'mas dinner. This could be handled with better customer service and professionalism.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPp2nBWzmJi7dbcF5UHsZFQaWmDwVsqNjavRLr3&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-12-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Annia Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCmNf-6kVgoV3z2v1rhLUKPIXQtdwZxPsOxdlb6pZhbXP-BQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their mixed coffee -tea 凍檸茶 was decent.  Quite busy in late afternoon, we came for lunch but ordered off the happy hour menu, even have 營養餐 nutritional items.
Payment was cash-only, but ample free parking.  The interior was all of famous old school actors and singers.  Food was just your regular type HK Style 茶餐廳 nothing fancy just simple and full.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMU12q4a49DSoWD5pc48_rJV-KLRYBEJTpPUyvW&fid=0x0:0x849f064f95af4389"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Super Stars Cafe
8080 Leslie Rd #110, Richmond, BC V6X 4A8

Ambiance:

The ambiance at Super Stars Cafe was average. While the seating was comfortable, the choice of background music and television programming seemed more tailored to local tastes, which may feel somewhat isolating for non-Chinese-speaking guests. This lack of inclusivity in the entertainment detracted from the overall dining atmosphere.

Rating: 6/10

Food:

Tom Yum Goong Seafood Hotpot with Rice
The Tom Yum Goong seafood hotpot was the highlight of the meal. The portion was generous, with a plentiful variety of seafood, including fish, shrimp, mussels, and fresh vegetables. The broth offered a well-balanced flavor, though it fell short of the punchy, spicy kick that typically defines this dish. A touch more heat would have elevated it to a more authentic Tom Yum experience. Nevertheless, the dish stands out as a solid choice for seafood lovers.

Rating: 9/10

Fried Intestines

The fried intestines were an unexpected delight. Expertly fried to a crisp, they offered a satisfying texture and depth of flavor. Paired with a garlic soy dipping sauce, the dish was well-executed and is highly recommended for those seeking a unique starter.

Rating: 9/10

Drink:

I opted for the taro slush, which unfortunately did not meet expectations. While the flavor was adequate, the texture was inconsistent, with ice chunks present throughout, marring the smoothness that a quality slush should provide. The drink could benefit from better preparation to achieve the expected level of refinement.

Rating: 5/10

Service:

The service was the most significant area in need of improvement. Given the nature of the restaurant, my expectations were moderate, but the staff’s attentiveness was lacking. Additionally, communication was difficult for non-Chinese-speaking customers, which could be an obstacle for many diners. Greater attention to service and accommodating all guests would significantly enhance the overall experience.

Rating: 2/10

Price:

The pricing was fair, especially considering the portion sizes and quality of the dishes. It offers good value for those looking to enjoy a variety of flavorful options without overspending.

Verdict:

Super Stars Cafe has potential, particularly with its food offerings, which are well-executed and reasonably priced. However, the experience was somewhat marred by the ambiance and service, which both require attention to cater to a broader clientele. The restaurant only accepts cash, and parking can be a challenge during peak hours, so plan accordingly. Despite these drawbacks, I would return to explore other items on their menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCqMo_AmYOxKlMXPUQgJXonjcJO1zs0L_2Rqui&fid=0x0:0x849f064f95af4389"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"JENN WOO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvIJPgN4NR4GqFDWwcS6beS_JkwzhP97OBJCKBMgCo_hhFdb4d=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"One star is also dont want to give to this restaurant.
Service is so bad, also food is worst ever i had in Vancouver.
Also they only take cash(i dont know why permitted restaurant only get cash), and we didnt know they only get cash so we try to etransfer but they treated us like very annoying. I'll NEVER come to this restaurant ever again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLU1b2H_o3o6IT9DJ7d4AShrqJVnZNPYds9OGY&fid=0x0:0x849f064f95af4389"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Evans Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1CAnsQLdeq_AM90IKnxhuLTzFWDJoL2eGsQ8nbnMQQxOtOME9xw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This restaurant is absolutely disgusting. The place is cramped, and the decor and cleanliness are abysmal. The hygiene is downright revolting—I was halfway through my meal when a huge rat started scurrying around. I was on the verge of a breakdown—what kind of hygiene standards do you have here? And it's not like the prices are cheap either. With all the money you’re making, could you at least invest in some basic cleanliness? The sight of it made me tremble all over, lost my appetite, and ran out immediately.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQRXu3F7jkqkxxWZmhjfDebqTnSRN7RL6_inL5&fid=0x0:0x849f064f95af4389"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Macy Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJER9yFgtNyUGssrtb5PmY4384Vkzv8f3uRUR7KE1COw58Bsg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very good food with reasonable prices. Service is good. They have special prices for some food items from 3pm to 6pm, but portion is still big. We tried soy sauce chicken which is really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKTYd84Qi3tg0oXMQ8CRB2vBABluXJ7ErfFof1&fid=0x0:0x849f064f95af4389"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Minji Co","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0cW7yUIGQwxewtq2t91XH-PweiJmGMnXmQUWs9lKXUa5ZbKC6vQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Edit: CASH PAYMENT ONLY!! Or WeChat!

This is very surprising for me to go into a restaurant that serves steak but only accepta cash payment. It’s very stressful don’t go if you don’t have cash.

Food: Huge portions like what you would serve yourself at home. Food arrived quickly, service was friendly.

Tastewise, the food was just ok.

Ordered their lunch special it was only $15 and includes hk tea with a free refill.

Despite the good value for money, I will not be returning here because of the stressful cash payment only situation. I would rather go to the public market food court for the same price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzo9X_c1GjXdNnpM43WZTmaN8KJkB6HzSlb3_v&fid=0x0:0x849f064f95af4389"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Kasumi A. Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7_0dE4TBrW-eazsY9gh6IEHsIYux8SX4ecNQs4YyVQn_4oH7I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not much services,  need to wave them for 10 minutes to place our orders. Took them 20 minutes to serve us French toast.
Their pasta with creamy clam and mushrooms sauce, only got 4 tiny clam inside, took them 30 minutes
To come.. it was not busy at that moment.
Their green onions chicken with
Dried and hard steamed rice.
Fried beef noodles with 4 thin
slices of beef inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTdTEsL8_ywHqPXLs5d2-y7TXDpbUxHCWg5my-&fid=0x0:0x849f064f95af4389"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Wen S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfKekcgGrSM5orE3YNPLTTzg5L68GHdpR3eDy-Cv34Kb5a-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is so good, big portion and reasonable price.  Another dish must try is stir fry pepper beef noodle with black bean sauce, the noodle 1/2 soft 1/2 crispy, so yummy!  The service is good as well.  Must go early as the parking lot can fill up quickly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPidnxU8qkzjlYAKbsxitjaOwf6ci8pM1krUHHj&fid=0x0:0x849f064f95af4389"],"When":"2024-1-29"}]
