user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Edgar Ignacio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7oexz4qXoBKr6ujKuYxwMvlf16ckv-ovFMKFmC4nzUqeMSoelFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently visited Daan Go Cake Lab in Richmond, BC, yesterday Saturday and I must say, I was thoroughly impressed! As a first-time visitor, I was delighted by how affordable the cakes, pastries and drinks were. It’s refreshing to enjoy such delicious treats without spending a fortune!

The ambiance of the bakery is another highlight. The cozy setting, paired with the high ceilings and modern, catchy design, creates a wonderful atmosphere that invites you to relax and indulge.

Every item we ordered was not only budget-friendly but also absolutely delectable! I can’t wait to return and explore more of their menu. Highly recommend this gem for anyone looking to enjoy some fantastic pastries in a lovely setting! 🍰☕✨","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZyZXaWRdB67m9oGc8cTFCqERECjeKpxQVTfCI&fid=0x0:0x53f926f181db5382"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Tammy Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWn0N2I5STxk6Dw-kQhoKTxOlHlPrvcouHiB9OgzjAG84pt3M0D_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"tl;dr: really pretty and creative desserts but it is way too sweet. For 4 pieces of cake, it was around 37$.

Food Quality: 3/5
For the cakes we tried, they looked really pretty, however they only tasted alright. They are extremely sweet and the cakes start melting and getting droopy after being out for a while. You’d have to eat them instantly or else they will melt and droop. Unlike most Asian bakeries, they make their desserts really sweet.

Food Quantity: 4/5
The cost of 4 cakes was 37$ which is pretty pricey considering they are not that big in size.

Service/Atmosphere: 5/5
Friendly and quick service. The store was clean and tidy as well. Went on a holiday around 1pm and there was no line.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgCQuDBmQ8-7mih0tY28u2Cw3OwHy2JPg0AMCn&fid=0x0:0x53f926f181db5382"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Sally","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYjadMy5T259gkmUlT3p9sRdMDrhLZLohAcAX0TlTZ6TSMTtRT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The strawberry matcha cake was super bad，it tasted old and the texture was off. There was some kind of grain in the cake, which made it really weird. The salmon cream cheese was way too rich. The only good thing was the chocolate croissant. Really disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONCqtdm0egDozA9XgkW-NcSYDKYFoFH_tZMH7f&fid=0x0:0x53f926f181db5382"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Ellen Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzoh866OovBfVlMHdFGLQnEdLyB97Utya-3yzGLsM4EYweL6y3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Adorable desserts. The bubble tea cake was good! Love that they have vegan ice cream (cherry blossom - whole tub lol). Would be great if they add more vegan treats!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN145sZOLa4kr1TJSbYsdppiWVwx-hFrMSExK0n&fid=0x0:0x53f926f181db5382"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Sam C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXxmKczYakFIxjwSYGS4UEC7Y5L-2m617P2sdy0kF-_IgbrA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered an Opera cake and are extremely disappointed in the result. We didn’t open it until we got home but we were shocked by its appearance. As you can see in the photos, the chocolate coating was cracked, the cream exterior was nowhere near smooth, and the entire thing was collapsing. There was what we can only assume to be water leaking from the cream, I guess it never fully set? After cutting into it the entire thing just deflated and pooled onto the plate.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2pcfGmZgfHLcw1Z9mVvasz5boLeyEWPdp2RoA&fid=0x0:0x53f926f181db5382"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Jessica Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOeC5VCbc6g3HH3dxXpDS9bE993HEKMDVI3SjHX2aNdHbQOJHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ah the Thai tea croissant should be more than 5 stars because it was amazing even with so much ooey gooey goodness and for me with sensitivities. It was nice that the person working there explained it doesn't need to be heated. The durian cake I had high expectations because of reviews on here but it might not have been as healthy. I wonder if it needed to stay in the fridge and not stay out for even a couple hours. There was a strange processed taste in the pandan macaron too. Pricing was reasonable. The packing was all really great and overall visiting here was worth a 4 hour round-trip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOydQrN_FtJeY7aVlgLHrFLtIGd_EayftpwYWwF&fid=0x0:0x53f926f181db5382"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First of all, the vibe here and the style of the shop is truly awesome. Totally jive with the cute and yummy theme! Also, the manager deserves a shoutout for amazing customer service along with the staff. We ordered the celebration pig cake for Father’s Day and it was a hit with both the kids and the adults! It’s one of those scenarios where something actually tastes as good as it looks!

The cake was beautiful and detailed with real burn marks and crispy chocolate skin to replicate a real roast pig. The cake inside was delicious with the cherry bits and cream. The quality of the cake was amazing. You totally get what you pay for here.

The macarons were the cutest and came in so many different colours and flavours which again tasted as good as they looked. The packaging was beautiful! Definitely worth a visit and one of the best places for cake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvCZCiJTqBHhivRGir29n2ZJjuNAHaE00b0Jg3&fid=0x0:0x53f926f181db5382"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"John lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHcEpe_rdGFT18X1xSq_zGAWTDJet6abEOGhjWIbqUaXkcOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The durian cake is flavourful and looks awesome. The cake is moist, but not the fluffy silky type. My wife loves the bobalicious cup -- the milk tea custard is rich and the faux Boba has nice texture (Not the chewy type). We also got the character macarons which were a huge hit in the family. Service is adequate, but a bit nonchalant. A smile would be nice for a dessert shop. Online customer service is very good though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQixf0bYaZmUAWZFmRoz09pE_1wCGIKASwpdK3&fid=0x0:0x53f926f181db5382"],"When":"2024-8-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"L’espoirducoeur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXYOgTeV2_ww6s9tqNXmDRJczT1aljcVqEtrRtUoOfjdBo_zI_bg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Myomi Sushi is absolutely a gem! Their set meals are not only generous in portion but also incredibly delicious, bursting with authentic Japanese flavors in every bite. From the freshness of the ingredients to the meticulous plating, you can truly feel the care and quality behind each dish. Whether it’s the sashimi or the cooked items, every dish is a delightful surprise, and the side dishes perfectly complement the main course, elevating the overall dining experience.

Moreover, the restaurant’s ambiance is cozy, and the staff are friendly and attentive, making you feel right at home. If you’re a fan of Japanese cuisine, Myomi Sushi’s set meals are a must-try. It has definitely earned a spot on my go-to list, and I can’t wait to come back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDIGT8MNRYdNWaadzukpmMqw30AKZ9LoG4YNsv&fid=0x0:0x108d65e092af93fc"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Erik Leong (gd6noob)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFn08Dkw-Vc2VUS4RFPPEWldYIwPrAvH4xtkXnIoGrVB2Is6a4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The service was excellent and very friendly. The interior decor is also very nice. The food overall was good; however the meats were a bit dry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPnve58_zzkWDyKhM-Mqv2FxPZT4z2G5e8slGT&fid=0x0:0x108d65e092af93fc"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Shonnah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVryghpg_5X3Yv-cncwU7OGN26KCAvVhjXajvFLZ6BLUMNFRgyF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Casual sushi place that seems pretty busy especially for a weekday. We ordered the Bite of Everything, Spicy Agedashi Tofu and King Dragon Roll. This was more than enough for 2 people with some leftovers to take home.

Most people seemed to order their bento box (dinner special), so of course we had to try a Bite of Everything. This is definitely a good sampler to try a variety of items from their menu. I’d say the nigiri was quite standard and basic. Didn’t feel the fish was amazingly fresh or anything. Infact most of the bento box was quite basic, it’s more catered to getting a sampler over quality. I’d say my favourite item was probably the tuna carpaccio and chicken karaage, it fried well and juicy. The Spicy Agedashi Tofu could’ve been spicier - I didn’t taste much spice, although it was fried nicely. I’d say my favourite thing hands down was the King Dragon Roll. It’s like a dragon roll, but so much better. The soft shell crab was fried nicely and texture, flavour, looks was all on point. If you’re looking for a roll here, get that one - you won’t regret it!

Overall, I feel it’s a bit overpriced for the quality. I prefer higher quality, smaller portions while this is more quantity over quality. Besides the King Dragon Roll, there was nothing that stood out much to me. I left feeling pretty average so it’s not a place I’d go out of my way to. I feel there’s definitely better places with better value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvDSK3YX8nmpgeBIZrAjZ_rWHBXcTtGQgLNK86&fid=0x0:0x108d65e092af93fc"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Anne H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOtJObZEuqS-_AGcDV08LHiNOH1vlSXl2nqoJyyUVDcWm1p_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had lunch here. What a great meal! We had the Teriyaki Chicken Lunch box. The food was presented beautifully,  and tasted great. Service was quick and friendly. Prices were pretty good, too. I'll definitely visit again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6v-QmC6fj1Xfvnvqh-MaVjwRlQ5BTCSUXLBDW&fid=0x0:0x108d65e092af93fc"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"H W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXexF1ppHhagktR0Lj8tfRndSZu99-g8j0KJdvC6dho4atqtz4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Myomi Sushi provided an excellent tasting experience! The freshness and flavors of the food were outstanding, leaving me completely satisfied with every bite. Their creative rolls were particularly enticing, bursting with color and flavor. The service was top-notch too, with friendly and attentive staff making the dining experience even more enjoyable. The ambiance was cozy and relaxed, making me feel right at home. Overall, Myomi Sushi is definitely a place I'd recommend, and I'll be sure to come back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3Z6jJ5G5ieiguZqr_e1MYrd0EXk9B7DP-wKlK&fid=0x0:0x108d65e092af93fc"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Marina Tran-Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfVtiU03SeiL3e-Ic5oNmDODXKfWsUK79bWxpgN-wBrQU_4exfaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little spot! Busy even on a Wednesday evening.  The food is so well made and such big pieces of fish! The Aburi is better than some of the super expensive places downtown.  Would definitely come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSJHbz18Ftweombco5Njn15-E-w8WYVE7GQ4L1&fid=0x0:0x108d65e092af93fc"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Autumn_Kiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1zcZdU411-b8f5Fcx7HImynMifJ7qg-_yzjSJzTLgmhJaggW_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is a recent update on Miyomi Sushi.  We usually do takeout but this last time wasn't like it used to be.
So i have taken it down a notch.  We'll be going to another place going forward.  Their success might have been too much?  Maybe they got a new sushi chef?

Below was our original review when they were one of the best in town.

Myomi Sushi is better priced and the flavour of the sushi rice is better than Edokko.  As much as my aunt and Mom love Edokko I prefer here for their sushi.  My Japanese Food Critic says the same thing as well.  You may have remembered her from Yelp and non digital publications from the past.  But if you want quality and taste for sushi in Richmond?  Come here and try it out for comparison and let me know your thoughts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrMkdZzeBThUoNm9hqoqSkM2l-2QeE4aDzh2BF&fid=0x0:0x108d65e092af93fc"],"When":"2024-1-4"},{"Name":"Anita Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrKjpCHbbgEoMHFGQR9bpYGxjAvml7weUEpSY3XyToZoMD0ExhKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cozy restaurant, and the sushi was beautifully presented. Very good service. I would come back again.

They unfortunately ran out Atlantic salmon belly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQmsm_f8n_WEwBkVdWcCDbkaVZVEpfMqVX-QK2&fid=0x0:0x108d65e092af93fc"],"When":"2024-11-22"}]

title: Liuyishou Hotpot Richmond
address: 4731 Garden City Rd #150, Richmond, BC V6Y 1P9
descriptions: Roomy, warm eatery with a minimalist vibe, tabletop Chinese hot pots & create-your-own shabu-shabu.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sandra Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS3d7aZA4lMhkB4lrjOTrDjB_p6PvngmeWQeM0VFHPfzqli2Uc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I’ve always wanted to try this place and have seen good to great reviews. Parking is free for 3 hours by registering your vehicle at the restaurant. A great start! The private room we were in had us 12 adults and a toddler tightly squeezed around a table with two built-in hotplates. We had to ask for more chairs and cutlery even though a reservation was made and numbers were confirmed at the entrance. I didn’t think the regular menu was great (except for the price); there seemed to be a lot more choices in the premium one. Everything started to taste the same to me because the broths were so strong after a while. Our fault for dumping everything in all at once… The meat rings were a nice presentation touch, but there wasn’t room on the table for much more after they came. Overall, it would have been better to dine with a max of 4 pp so the food could be added into the pots more slowly for optimal savouring. We’ll have to give this place another try, especially with the premium menu. There were ice cream sandwiches and sea salt mints at the end. The mints were awesome! The service was a bit slow; we had to add for more broth, napkins, etc. The sauce / dessert bar was crowed with people and needed some cleaning up. I didn’t get to try much of it. There were items in hot plates that would have tasted great if they’d been temperature hot such as the black sesame dessert, deep fried glutinous black sesame balls and spring rolls.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP98pev_jxgZ402gx5wnJ74zcsi9Iaeb5HDencB&fid=0x0:0x5c055ec6db84add0"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"David A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEhfdwuckml1-C2x68EL2VDw4V-S6HQd2jqi-0tdmo935ebQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably my go to spot for ayce hotpot. Great selection to choose from. One of the highlights was the experience of sharing the meal with friends. It's a communal and interactive dining style that makes it really fun, especially with a variety of dipping sauces to experiment with and perfect your flavor profile.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNLcNoLOvqf22SEE4_Gjwq_ayjl4HUlc413A1n&fid=0x0:0x5c055ec6db84add0"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Holden Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYpJY2_1HdzOIst_vIvyrA2PI5OAIR9C7Ut7-TgJkLn5DAwg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were the downtown store once, this time we came to Richmond. This one also offers an authentic Chongqing flavor, and the all-you-can-eat option is very cost-effective. The condiment bar has a wide variety of choices, is clean, and offers plenty of different seasonings. There are also many snacks and fruits to choose from — you could even fill up just from the snack bar alone. The service staff are very friendly and attentive; even though we arrived late, they still provided thoughtful service. Overall, highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPN-INv9HHFAGbCdcC3Ub46KTIDxY5iMunqmSA&fid=0x0:0x5c055ec6db84add0"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"J T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhlRzWDXzdsN5IEg7ILK_EQ56zA9jcQ-fPPr3cS5cgV1YVlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"All You CAN’T Eat… thumbs down!

I have been here and their Burnaby location a few times before they became an AYCE, but first time giving this place a go as an AYCE.

I called in to make a reservation but was told they had a table available if I can get there asap, when I arrived within 5mins (I was at Lansdowne Center), was told there’s a little wait, the little wait ended up to be 45mins (still don’t know what happened to the available table ?!?!).

Inside is a smaller layout compared to other hot pot places; back corner is the bar counter with a self serve appetizer and sauce bar in front and the kitchen to the other side.

Finally got seated and decided on the Premium AYCE for $58.99/person (seafood and sashimi included along with a one time order of a wagyu plate);

1. Double soup base (spicy & pork bone broth). Pretty basic and standard.
2. Sauce bar was pretty standard.
3. Self serve appetizer bar. A dozen selection of cooked and cold appetizers . Plus a plate of chicken bones eaten by someone sitting there on the counter, do people actual act like animals in a public setting? (Rolleyes).
4. Pork blood, quail eggs, frozen tofu, Chinese donut stuffed shrimp paste, selection of vegetables, bamboo piths, spam, tofu skin, enoki mushrooms. All pretty basic.
5. Clams and scallops. Clams were small and scallops were a bit too thinly sliced.
6. Sliced lamb and Wagyu beef plate. The lamb slices were okay but the wagyu beef was… ummm.. it certainly didn’t have that tender buttery taste to it and as you know I eat a lot of wagyu beef.
7. Salmon, red tuna, hokkigai sashimi. The salmon was okay, a bit dry. The hokkigais were a bit slimy at one end and as for the red tuna, it was like eating a sponge soaked in water. (The quality could create an outbreak of food poisoning so the restaurant knows.. Facepalm). The wasabi was a paste from a supermarket squeeze tube. Ordered another round to confirm the quality but it never came! So pretty much paid $34 extra for a few small pieces of bad quality sashimi.

The service here was pretty generic but they sure bring the food out slowwwwww and they will also tell you that it takes a bit longer to prepare the sashimi?!?! (Yeah expect more than 35+mins wait for an order of sashimi and most likely you will get one round of it during the duration of your meal).

The food quality was pretty basic to below average eg. sashimi, beef, seafood. Therefore maybe it’s best to opt out of the premium and stick with the basic AYCE instead if you want to try this place out.

Overall, it’s really a disappointing experience. You can rest assure that the experience will be nothing like how those so called foodies market it on social media. (Don’t know why I even believe those who twirl their beef on their chopsticks to begin with.. clowns).  I would say for a much better experience for a lower or similar price would be Marble Eatery, Cho Cho, Happy Lamb hotpot.

In conclusion there’s a Chinese saying, “if you open your door for business, do it properly not half azz it” Literally this place gave the impression of half azz’ing it by its delay and long wait time for the food to come out.  It really became an All You Can’t Eat!

An AYCE failed! No repeat or recommended.

Thumbs down 👎","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9DCd22o6dY48ZFeryCODWOW2I-4x54JJIOQ0o&fid=0x0:0x5c055ec6db84add0"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"CL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEOodGjHk-7O4UQKg3jyAyeHD7p5mB9pYh7Meku93t9eyaqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our go to ayce hotpot spot! Great price, good quality meats, and the staff is always really helpful. Throughout our meal, our server was  very attentive and after noticing we skimmed the foam off the top of the soup, he took the initiative to do it for us himself.
There are call buttons if you need service so even though we were tucked away in the back room/vip area, it was easy to get the server’s attention. Only con is when you’re in the back and there is a large party, it gets really loud and boisterous. Good for groups but bad for small parties!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipON7KntRoAYxwpYAQmQBSp9J7Lx3TL3LtynBeu7&fid=0x0:0x5c055ec6db84add0"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Kaizer Uanang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTnb4oBQQyYpRo-4o1XXgG37wliDS1gMqgxZTvAGFlhbAxFA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was fantastic! The food was delicious and worth every penny. The highlight of the evening was the all-you-can-eat meat option. The service was excellent as well, with very attentive staff. I highly recommend this place for the ultimate hotpot experience. Also there’s so many sauces to choose from the sauce bar its awesome!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTWZn7eMmLUDn5khIE9pmkX26zsWSA4Es1U7WL&fid=0x0:0x5c055ec6db84add0"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Dave c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIJpNuDp1ZFsieXDs0ogWBdgOjnNbMjcRh6MXnVvyr3IcSBiJA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend and I order the premium. First, we order Pig Stomach soup base with extra pepper.. than we visit the sauce bar and snack bar... they all kind of sauce you can think of which is very nice.. most importantly, it's clean and not messy. Then we ordered the sashimi and they are very delicious.  We order again as they are very good. For the all kind of beef and they are very fresh. Most importantly, when we go out for Hotspot the meat and vegetables must be fresh... When is time for IceCream we order ice bar and it is very good.  Better than the one in Lansdowne.  Lastly the service we got was very good I would say this is one of the better service in the restaurant industry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOs75DGzgV5eOPWVdgiK5XTEks6vpZDnmiNQoFP&fid=0x0:0x5c055ec6db84add0"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"A Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIc27WvwBwZu9S5lRm0w3Utp7ODM1wwap4JvnukjwZrgyspKm4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"阿熙’s service is very friendly and professional , very satisfied with the quality of food and cleanliness, a variety of sauce bar options and snacks available. Would 100% recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMF3JwxXHOjGNEtj-nVOOMfTip2hXCoiNKxmshW&fid=0x0:0x5c055ec6db84add0"],"When":"2024-12-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anna E.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKi2h3ArqgU_TYCKhB265HkgDHtTiZdy-WZwZpaips_tWOYQIIZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've heard about this chain for years and was very glad to see that there is quite a few locations in Vancouver, Canada. The interior design of this particular restaurant is very nice, and they have a hand washing sink right by the condiment station. Very convenient, I wish more restaurant had this.
I tried two dishes: Peri-Peri Chicken bowl ($15.99) and Peri Q Chicken and Fries Plate ($17.49). The bowl was kinda dry, I had to add sauces on my salad. Other than that, everything tasted good. The plate was good, as well.
Big plus for having a menu on the website.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNacxV1cld-Ii6zsbu4VfWk6BH0_YTXAUlmQIr3&fid=0x0:0x8f5a3709cede8538"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Tushaar Bal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4AMbgxUKoO28LvEh2ifbLcwYB_A0mjrxYuOyakOLaD9-3nFM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Recently visited Nando’s and was really disappointed with the experience. When we picked up our order and brought it home we noticed that the sandwich bun had visible mold on it. We went back and brought this to the staff’s attention, but instead of addressing the issue, they insisted that it wasn’t mold and claimed all their buns looked like that. When we asked to see other buns to compare, they refused. It would’ve been much better if they had simply accepted the mistake and resolved it, rather than denying something that was right in front of all of us. Customer service is about acknowledging issues and making things right, and unfortunately, this wasn’t the case here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXxbAOF24myG8Kl41EMk7deV3V9mb5wEeqQFBb&fid=0x0:0x8f5a3709cede8538"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Sean Clarke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHEQ8ZVdCiJ-KMalTctUWx7nICzxQHgfAdI2daY5TT96lWt-8z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cool Nandos. Decorations inside and out are pretty dope, open kitchen, very comfortable seating, friendly staff. Good chicken as always, the menu has great choices. Thoroughly dope.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9IGwjAkJ-IzIllbZHoHnm8kaRwcUL4j2_cRMW&fid=0x0:0x8f5a3709cede8538"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Alejo Suaza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIZKfSpm4-G3sMiA6BYsw4Hh4HCI8PqveS9cFi-8rYKvYGqjBHcA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time dining here, I came with my girlfriend, we both love chicken and we were amazed by the quality! Chicken was yummy and fresh, the lemon herb peri chicken is really tasty. The restaurant is cozy too, I can imagine the vibe during cold winter. The price is okay, considering we live in Vancouver is actually decent price, could be a bit better but for what you get is fair. Will definitely come back!👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOY5VLrOpANwG1KMz6jQf0-UXCmFr6B-76MsPps&fid=0x0:0x8f5a3709cede8538"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Sandy Y. (CameraGourmet)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ9J8ig1HwUQBJbXRdKDIwR0OrTw3YtQtyHDEaRuCN8XnUDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an absolute blast at the Yelp Elite Event!  Everything was delicious, and here are some highlights:

Main: PERi Q Platters (non-spicy)
This limited-time flavour is a must-try!  The chicken was tender, with a sweet and spicy kick.  Perfect for dipping in any of their Peri-Peri sauces, from mild to super spicy!

Sides: Spiced Rice
Packed with flavour, mixed with bell peppers and spices.  It’s the perfect complement to your meal.

Dessert: Naughty Natas
Similar to Portuguese egg tart - Flaky crust filled with custard and caramel — sweet!

Beverages: Sangria
Refreshing and just right for a summer evening.

Loved their spacious indoor area and the beautiful outdoor patio with brick and greenery—perfect for summer hangouts!

I left with a bottle of XX Hot Piquante sauce, ready for some grilling adventures.

Big thanks to Nerissa and Nando's Canada for a fun and delicious night. 🎉 And shoutout to our amazing Yelp Community Manager, Anushka, for organizing such a fantastic event! 👏✨

[Yelp Elite Event]","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4ZgxiOjey3ZCImnpcjxWaITGWeX0Db5L1TpZf&fid=0x0:0x8f5a3709cede8538"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Laba Group","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKBffkXjyVpQ9hNDSIdczYqzHUSaC3cBZjTa55QNrNt8_IIIuw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Angel Makes This Nando’s Exceptional!

My family and I travel to this Nando’s location not just for the food, but for the exceptional service we’ve always received from the local staff—and especially from Angel. Her friendly smile and outstanding customer service truly set this place apart. Angel goes above and beyond to make every visit a pleasure, ensuring customers feel welcome, valued, and well taken care of.

She’s a big reason we keep coming back, and her dedication to her role deserves the highest praise.

⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zhuge Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPo5epQpB8uJydI3sToJa66foIacZBCLIBYQ-6Z79DDQxjMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Chicken was tender and juicy; but medium spice is still lacking 🥊 For the price, opt for costco rotisserie chicken.

Sweet potato side dish was the 🌟 - perfect blend of spice and sweetness, nice crunch from the sunflower seeds and savouriness from the feta.

Brussel sprouts had the right sauce but 99% charred 😑","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtgbjnQ7OLZzV3EL98eXUDddffqIKc_Ixag-oL&fid=0x0:0x8f5a3709cede8538"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Isha Dhoot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUODtmX3R0OeWQrlJ6M8qJrVJkadF_33Y_D9ufFismcxRjM8Djt1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We loved the quality of food, it was perfect to my taste. It is very hard to find that in Vancouver! It was our first time dining here and definitely won’t be the last.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWB462LpOxBV54yi_iVof3p34qr5VtA44TiMpb&fid=0x0:0x8f5a3709cede8538"],"When":"2024-8-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed a tasty dinner on a Friday night. The food was pretty good. We ordered sweet and sour pork, egg white with crab on broccoli, shredded chicken, and tofu pot with seafood. The rice bowl portion was pretty big! We had the complimentary red bean soup dessert too.

Service was good and it was very quiet on a weeknight. Lots of parking in this mall as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtTyRrptLCm18NoRPvoTZOx_OVL9n1xzpWiBBO&fid=0x0:0x840ce353d44b4170"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Jimmy Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX72ZuhWzFJa-dvzhpIYEgFMddZHT0-fUecIaPoe_e7xYZfxGcl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I don't know why, but all my experiences for Chinese food so far in Vancouver/Richmond have been mediocre. This is another example of a mediocre location.

Our table didn't even get desert for some reason.

The best thing about this venue is that there is plenty of space to host larger gatherings with your family and friends.

Fried things were too cold and soggy, and sweet things were to sweet. Honestly it also felt like everything was dialed to 11/10 for salt as well.

There seems to be something off with the balance of flavours and I felt like it made my stomach upset after eating a dinner there.

At least the service staff was good, but man they needed to give us a pitcher of water nearby or something for all the salty food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0uifYBRASLNcqMoEKt8Gw1Sv8HShj_OJAk6nU&fid=0x0:0x840ce353d44b4170"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Dan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6Vpad3zmd_bRS_NRyMDg5xHn355DE6cSY0nXB1CDQJfi5a5o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good variety of dim sum option, tastes are good, however, quite pricey, an vegetarian dish is almost 15 dollars. A bit on the expensive side. For a party of 7, we spent about 240cad. The service is great, they are all very friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJoOWjgc6KLCy_mAjnWX1A_RDFYI0j6oHL7Xp6&fid=0x0:0x840ce353d44b4170"],"When":"2021-10-4"},{"Name":"Nelson Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2MDlKaveGLZlb7eeQnFrGjq0OxHVOj680sWG1ZFzmIze2-Uue=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had my banquet wedding reception here yesterday. I must say the service was exceptional! I got my refills when I wanted. The dishes served promptly and according to schedule. My guests were very happy with the service as well, they got their drinks at the bar when they asked for it, and overall great service. They hire top waiters and waitresses I've seen before at top restaurants.
The layout of the restaurant was perfect! very spacious, enough to fit all my guests. Very good lighting and Audio Visual. They have hard wood so I was able to have a dance floor with my own custom playlist! The place was so nice I didn't even had to do bring or setup my own decor.
Food was top notch. I was able to modify my set menu to what I wanted. Every dish that came out was extremely delicious and unique. My guests told me how they loved the food so much.
I would highly recommend this place to others for their wedding reception.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8cA3KNqY8NgyiH33W9OOqQbxCCxb9PrZDXcNl&fid=0x0:0x840ce353d44b4170"],"When":"2017-3-19"},{"Name":"Wun Tun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRX8y0CFiE6nMEK8WbNNliTbzoWixhnMbLndMuv6xykpVccF8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice venue that can handle large families.  Wasn't busy so service was fast and attentive.   I did find the food came out too fast to enjoy each dish but at least we were finished within 2 hours. Lots of free parking.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erica Ngan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxiFAMX-8U6Hf7I7ySV2AT1mYgYdeBidCPp2cDYnZKccTLsR17eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like this place better after the renovations, my go to for dimsum. Clean and nice, efficient staff, they are accommodating when you host events. Love the VIP system. Gets pretty busy at peak times so must reserve before you go. Parking is also not an issue which is a plus for me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzerc9TmKLcoktXa6A0LxECdlAYQeqRwSS1Ccq&fid=0x0:0x840ce353d44b4170"],"When":"2023-7-15"},{"Name":"Anita B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqR9XaT9Iurv8qpSTJAowFy3FLbOXnf3TrPRxAsGtsBVTPcpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"On weekdays if you dine before 11am there’s a discount but we were here on a Saturday morning so sadly no discount and it’s $1.50 a person for tea.

There are certainly better places for dimsum but at least they offer all your traditional dimsum dishes. I had to add hot sauce to give the shrimp dumpling more flavour.. otherwise it was fairly bland tasting.

One let down was that the XLB were steamed close together so when trying to grab with the chopsticks, it would puncture the wrapping and all the soup escaped. Not only this, but the meat filling was subpar. Overall, the dishes could be seasoned better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFitMIDlD9zuUhhatOStXixezXzgKjJjVPT6rM&fid=0x0:0x840ce353d44b4170"],"When":"2023-5-27"},{"Name":"Hamaad Kazmi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLq1yxUWrhhaH6otOahR5Tn2feif5BVjdwAKZi6rgG_68l5TA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best seafood restaurant I have visited in Richmond, BC. It's a gem and the food is outstanding, they have a very vast menu, but I tried their duck and lobster rice which are a must have. The duck was succulent, seasoned perfectly, and was cooked to perfection, it was served with fresh cucumber salad and an amazing sauce; each bite was flavorful. Lobster rice was delicious and packed with good taste, at the end, they packed the remaining portion of the food which I took home with me and it tasted more delicious the next day. The staff was very polite, friendly, and professional, and the restaurant itself had a nice ambiance and looked opulent. If you are with a group of people and want to try authentic Chinese food and seafood, then this is the place, I highly recommend this restaurant.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sara Rostami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-0F0X5uejpgUPksS3dNe8lvbqXi3gXIV5sSqvv6JCvVyYEIfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I usually order special chicken and everything special pizza. They were both yummy and really worth the price. Besides the food, the staff has always been nice and friendly.
It’s the best pizza I’ve tried in the greater Vancouver. We live in downtown and usually drive 46 minutes to just get the pizza from Round Table. 😋🤩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPts4hknnHvrM-vK-wXBW6ywRn1cKPD8PZsaE5I&fid=0x0:0x3c6a525de86e4699"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"joe burr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoL0VpVWD0ZP8bt0Y8Pb-v0jCc9IKI-3Np1nTnrQ3GPDlBxhk3wg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"After over 20 yrs of going there, not going back. Ordered my usual Mon/Tues special but when I got there, they said no discount today even though it was a Tuesday.

Took advantage of customers and did not tell them in advance or at the time of ordering that after all these years, they are charging full price because it was Christmas eve day.

Multiply that by the number of customers thinking they would get the discount. Money grab! Never going back to this dishonest business.  No 2 large for price of 2 med, no pick up discount. Rip off!!

Going elsewhere from now on.  Hope the owner sees this review.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODkW9Utk2MlRqjX_KBaFjMdNxw3_Tifv7wF9jj&fid=0x0:0x3c6a525de86e4699"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Sarbjit Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpoeiFX0Oi2mfwjcYcqPfDfAfZCjegbPMFxUajM_OhXawvtHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If I am in Richmond, I'll absolutely must order round table Pizza and take it back to wherever I am going, which is usually an hour away at least.  Yesterday we ordered four large pizzas for our family, and every single one of them was perfect and absolutely delicious. There is no place on earth that I have discovered yet that can compete with this locations ability to make a really good pizza.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiBiehVBMqDRcQQk3J28lEnqLVQ-p5tIOA0Zlj3wvs65IUmg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best pizza places in Richmond, and they have numerous awards too, including 1st place for "Best Late Night Pizza for 25+ years" - so you know they're open late.

My order:

Everything Special: I really liked how there was also a layer of meat on the bottom of the crust in addition to the toppings. Generous portion of toppings overall and good quality ingredients. Crust is a medium thickness providing a good crust to topping ratio. I also liked how there wasn't too much tomato sauce, so it pairs nicely with the crust/toppings instead of being overpowering.

Pepperoni w/ Beef: Generous portion of large pepperoni slices, great pizza overall","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwiF4C9m2visY9UjlFKNOcUdy2pTA34y9uFl7r&fid=0x0:0x3c6a525de86e4699"],"When":"2021-4-24"},{"Name":"Brian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWy7Z4vq6JPNAHku9gFFEi8vGQXrQNC4M-hfvd643Sh5gL2DKkd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just weigh a roundtable vs any other pizza you order. No contest! They have continually served up great pizza to my family for many years. Our go to especially when hosting a get together.  Many thanks to the staff! Cheers!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kassie Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWa8BwxMiShNXRyhqWy6qlEwx53hlmm4dGsiqtwm6gX4AVDyraO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food: 8/10
Portion: 8/10
Service: 6/10
Location: free parking for pick up

As an experiment, we decided to get the exact same pizzas from both Pizza Hut and Round Table Pizza to see which one was overall better.

Taste wise they were both good but Round Table Pizza definitely wins in the topping category considering they actually went to the pizza crust edge with the toppings. It’s also evenly applied throughout the pizza. It’s quite tasty. Crust though, Pizza Hut wins here. My bf disagrees though. He thinks they’re both good.

Ordered Supreme and Pepperoni Lovers from both places. Overall round table pizza wins in value (slightly cheaper by like a dollar).

Customer service is what you expect at a pizza place. Don’t expect much and it’ll be fine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXdrY9tBQR-OdNYgHikQDfZvJk0oCs5S-0Au9P&fid=0x0:0x3c6a525de86e4699"],"When":"2023-4-22"},{"Name":"Jimmy Au","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhkWVEjW391-3KZoIg-J2oESX35HLqOaW4ISOpBCVpA_p4lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best pizza in Richmond and maybe in Vancouver.  You can actually test all the ingredients, unlike the big chain pizza joints.
Prices are a bit higher but worth it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwhlFiHPSDGYcBNEBZjiV401CUR-8LRwpy-nj0JN_nYZzCJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Located at Garden city and Blundell. If ordering on the phone make sure you select the right location. A Medium costs about $18. Got the Canadian pizza style. The crust is fairly thin and not too much dough. Nice and crispy. The ham goes well with the cheese.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLUOTYeEZt-J5-lpG7_9qjWsU4MtyUUncDgUSp&fid=0x0:0x3c6a525de86e4699"],"When":"2023-10-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Liana Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBd7Ss8Y7y3H5JQstWWjO4TKz3hKo9b4W72dyZfc4FSDaNq6e4-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super fresh and qq mochi. Love their durian mochi. Also got their mango + cream mochi and taro baked sago dessert 芋頭焗西米露布丁. Curious to try their chestnut mochi next time. Good treat! Eat it while it's fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXnHh5hTBn61gUn3m4BlXHtGKYrPZuKaPmeg2s&fid=0x0:0xc4455d28238d7ea5"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"C T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgS9_N3RvGRzjGP4q0CjRyk4CzxkTzB4cNEPmyEXeU-p7IBoH2mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Hands down the best Mochi ever in the area. The Mochi skin is so soft and chewy at the same time. As for the mango filling, it is not too much and perfectly matched with the cream inside. Do note that if go during the weekend they will be selling the Mochi in a combo set instead of per piece. We only got the mango one as we are not a fan of durian","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObZ2FXuWFbykVUEHWrhJIIs4j7TikLFSDVK_4Y&fid=0x0:0xc4455d28238d7ea5"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"J Lum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjVDSF6GLpOt9TbGVIYbPyuME5IGvtBYEUCly96a8repQNOavA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The egg yolk custard is amazing. They can heat it up for you on the spot(10min wait) or you can take it home and heat it up yourself. They don't allow for you yo eat their mochi inside their store as they offer durian and mango mochi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_nTkLXIV0BlPSWZLvzqot5_HRUArgusXClhum&fid=0x0:0xc4455d28238d7ea5"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Brayden M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPBZNPVNqHW8dSCFike-NLUMkuCrsmT6ZW7ysivwMhyRbgUxkL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The mochi here is great! When we went the place was packed, and we were only able to try the mango mochi (they were all out of durian).
The skin was soft and chewy, and the mango filling was just sweet enough - you could tell it's made from real natural mango.
In terms of service and atmosphere, my order was understood and processed very quickly, even in a relatively busy time. The place is decorated pleasantly, and will definitely appeal to Hong Kongers especially.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp-D63004PZKiLx5qCniyhoQlI1wHkv6koxIZn&fid=0x0:0xc4455d28238d7ea5"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Amber Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUE3_LIkc7Cpzx-MDVN-THAzZDRP24bcGvXr6uyqlwc9r8ltGE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the durian mochi—it's chewy with a thin skin and generous filling. Custard baked pudding with sesame flavor, which was not too sweet and reminiscent of the high-quality desserts you'd find at a dim sum restaurant. A must-visit for dessert lovers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAb49HgRd62QDffKwPHDO67rMtLtUc9Th58YG2&fid=0x0:0xc4455d28238d7ea5"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Jessica Qian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMPHnv5ykgYQs8zvHb-zflWJP4NabP5GUcTNQF5f9Hl7NQFW1S=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Overall, the dessert here is not too bad! The mango pomelo sago cream could have had more flavour to it, in my opinion. The mochi was the best. I got mango and durian only today and both of them tasted so good. It’s very soft and chewy, about the size of your palm, and the cream is a great addition. Although, we went in the afternoon (around 3:15) and a lot of the things on the menu were sold out. Do expect there to be a line and approximately 10-15 min wait time (data based on my experience only, it most definitely can vary depending on date and time!). Pricing is slightly high for the portion though. All in all, if you have a chance, do drop by here and try it out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpjxVidCr_bQRJX1FIQBkCTlUjKJ8JiDNx47Uv&fid=0x0:0xc4455d28238d7ea5"],"When":"2024-1-15"},{"Name":"Kris S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNm7YjxoPuCEYMGaqv9kVtVi7hFJowmYFaS9tspAP6BvXBoBqh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I've been to this place multiple times and tried many other spots around Richmond for mango mochi. All I can say is this place has the best mango mochi in town!

The mango mochi is made fresh daily, ensuring high quality and great taste. It’s perfectly soft and chewy, while the mango inside is juicy and sweet. I definitely recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONNTI6iBwO1WY4hTS2jH3JdFQNjkU19Uu01Vd3&fid=0x0:0xc4455d28238d7ea5"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"Vancouver Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8w6jkWQhHhs1Z246avVvoKQqrR4N6KZDvvFaklq629YACSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very yummy dessert!  Ordered mochi combo C (chestnut, purple yam, mango and durian) and baked sago pudding with taro paste.

Personally I love the mango and durian mochi most but overall they all tasted very good. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5HZV7xX5TssETrouheedV2JDJxzi0hArE12C7&fid=0x0:0xc4455d28238d7ea5"],"When":"2024-2-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shirely Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL6Iy5Aw1jcF4ss-Twhf-3hVGDy2B8y2664Svq0d5b_sV-hKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The staff was super friendly, and the food was great. I love the squid we got, it is fried nicely, and the squid itself wasn't dry. I got the mini noodle soup and banh mi combo, the noodle soup was good, the texture of the noodle were not too soft or too hard. I had a bit of the soup, and I didn't get the msg rush-for-water afterwards. The banhi Mi was tasty, flavor was just right for me, wasn't too salty. They served us hot lemon water, this is a true Asian restaurant move =)

If I can make a small recommendation, I would say it will be great if there is an option to get a full size banh mi with the mini noodle soup, I went with a small eater, so they got the mini one and I ordered the full size one for myself lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuVQqYPIBQ8WxvhiXBYHYty3ZUETufn2t8-LKo&fid=0x0:0x67366e6222358ea4"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Frank Cen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKs-CtZOKd8xsDcrB8C1DBc1Qpuge7UDCpdM2MoF5D-29vKsA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Come here for lunch with a friend, oh man what a disappointment. I love bun bo hue so I see they have that on the menu and give it a try but major major major disappointment. HOW? Can a real BUN BO HUE don’t have pig feet?? HOW?? That’s the major ingredient. Also portion is really small they have only few slices of beef and some shrimp ball? And they charge $25 for a bowl. Major disappointment. If you looking for traditional Vietnamese food this is not your place. I’m only giving 1 star because i can’t give 0 star. And not to mention they set their credit card machine for tips at minimum 18%. Total for more than $30 for a bowl of not good noodle","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxPn0DG7Um7skluD3IS61ZaotQlV0ppkiq4Idn&fid=0x0:0x67366e6222358ea4"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Hammad Qazi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7fsvemgBpNtZVMHn27-vhXwK0eQU2lHXvRXp0A48Q21OgtsKJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We ordered Vietnamese coffee for takeout. The place was clean and restaurant was nice but it was totally empty. The service was good but our complaint is with the quality of the Vietnamese coffee. We ordered 2 and both were filled to the brim with ice and had about 5 sips of actual coffee. Besides just that, the coffee just tasted like burnt drip coffee iced and didn’t taste at all like Vietnamese iced coffee. For $7 a cup, I’d except it to actually taste like viet coffee. Would not return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCD0k8dOrRrZwj-xJLtqZndu3l5U38JLMGmN17&fid=0x0:0x67366e6222358ea4"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Nessa Gomez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqxdPyvTH4qX5jBVgRxbz3ex4RcYkUOkyskvlopMe0RAjgo1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came in with some colleagues. I got the chicken salad roll and chicken vermicelli bowl. The portions were good, very filling I had leftovers. The flavour was lacking, food was very bland. Inside the restaurant its cute, and the service was good too. Presentation of the food was very nice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmacLis8x-R5_4gaNQiZJx2GD50FdjyfbrAbia&fid=0x0:0x67366e6222358ea4"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Nicole Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLV8yqFhmOYgomRkRbkYY0ipHFRMqsfbx3xt0F2xJnnzsTV0YZG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Extremely Disappointing Experience

I had heard so much hype about this restaurant, but our recent visit left me thoroughly unimpressed!!

I ordered their signature bone marrow pho, expecting a burst of authentic Vietnamese flavors. Instead, what I got was extremely salty MSG loaded bowl of broth. i have never tasted such salty bowl of pho broth ever in any restaurant, even food court quality pho is not this salty...I told the server and she kindly asked the kitchen to replace a new bowl of pho for me. Then the second bowl, broth tatsted much better, but the beef sliced was tough and chewy, the bone marrow (probably not cooked long enought, still very jello like, and the noodles were mushy and clumped together...i told the server again and  asked for no replacement.

Also the snack (mini spring roll) was surprisingly MINI, teh dipping sauce tastes very sweet.

Partner ordered chicken leg and fried egg rice. The chicken leg was super dry and flavorless, as if it had been fried into oblivion before being thrown onto the plate...

Environment was ok, the interior is stuffed with many decorations, making the space seemed small. Also they have a few type of dining chairs in the restaurant, some are shorter than others, making a weired height with the table. Also, I dont really like their chopsticks, its made of wood and probably been used for a while, the wood starts to flake out. Just dont like to imagine that it been soaked in many bowls of pho, in people's mouth and soap many times...

Finally let's not forget about the prices!! They charges PREMIUM prices for what can only be described as subpar fare. And not to mention they set their credit card machines minimum tip percentage 18%, though their food, service, and environment of this dining experience is far below what they thought they deserve.

In conclusion, it is definitely an unforgettable experience that I wouldn't wish upon my worst enemy. Save your time and money and seek out a more authentic and satisfying dining experience elsewhere...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkaR1FjYU2vSUbDKdM3mqP7uciAoHlCTv5o-QP&fid=0x0:0x67366e6222358ea4"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"Kimia Hedayati","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsvnAEqOhH9Tnwqz5U6c6YNnByQ90wxEfAzlCcpokriO643Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best Pho places I’ve been to in Vancouver. Delicious quality food, plus really nice ambiance. We come all the way from downtown to eat here! It’s such a nice treat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNL-BuJ7ctMRn8DDTCE4A8D6KTQbfS_wYmI_6DQ&fid=0x0:0x67366e6222358ea4"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Tia Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU51IbRagUC5V2juaGe7IIlkxJyGEVOiqo0VA1CasnJN-FFJROU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little place. Love the piano they have. The service was nice. The food was ok. The Bahn mi bread was good and not dry. Didn't really care for the pho. The texture of the crepes was mushy on the inside and crispy on the outside. Flavors was a bit lighter. The shrimp dumpling was ok.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7Gd1AvJvxgKSMQOaID37SJk-Tjt-6x_DzqhOb&fid=0x0:0x67366e6222358ea4"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"Daniel Shu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS1jubu3BD_aebsu2emIDna5JPsgqM6RfMEVBMrW0qDYHu4mTv9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food is good here. Prices seem high for this type of food and experience. Otherwise, we like some of the food choices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXPyhWb9IrFEa3HfeW-d95u7wCYG0Ag0tHolIY&fid=0x0:0x67366e6222358ea4"],"When":"2024-8-10"}]

title: 顺峰顺水A Bite Of SHUNDE(Best Price on Website!)

owner: {"id":"112086900051090775376","name":"顺峰顺水A Bite Of SHUNDE(Best Price on Website!) (Owner)","link":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112086900051090775376"}

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great traditional Chinese food, the dishes are cooked very well and the staff are super nice. We came near closing time and still took our order, even when it was after closing and we stilll weren’t finished our food yet, they let us stay and did not rush us at all. The traditional soup here was amazing, very herbal and did not taste fatty or watered down at all, It was one of the best traditional cantonese soups that I have had, would definitely come back. The restaurant itself is a tad hard to find, you have to go upstairs, the inside is very spacious and clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaDep7z3lZibmfTp0H08MIwz7SIHNGlNVxI39Y&fid=0x0:0x69fcadaae8478662"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Foodie Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6n06QAfqStqer1ZgBILsv-fiSHmrGRZuznSS1ny9iQFfb_Ognuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The sashimi is extremely fresh. For $68, you get a whole fish that can be eaten raw and used to make congee. The fish bones are cooked with salt and pepper, and the fish meat is fresh, sweet, and clean with no fishy taste. The salt and pepper seasoning makes the outside crispy and the inside tender. The service is excellent and the price is very reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1O8gL-f9artyVjinT3paxj3Mt4w_8fgQ0LVH6&fid=0x0:0x69fcadaae8478662"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"L C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0UvmmNv-LTP2kjLnvY4Tkp2-hsTp7MoElGKvEXR6urPb6QSXz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The owner is very nice and constantly strives to improve their food and service.

I would highly recommend anything with fish in it, such as fish soup, fish stew, and pan-fried fish.

The lobster is very fresh, but the taste is just so-so, and its presentation needs improvement.

We had the same issue with shrimp fried rice as mentioned in another comment, but they have fixed it.

Being located on the second floor may put them at a disadvantage.

Most of the food tends towards the mild side in terms of flavor, which might not appeal as much to younger people who often prefer spicy, crunchy, or more elaborate flavors. It's not quite clear which market segment they are targeting; they may need to adjust to cater more to their target audience's tastes and increase their promotional efforts.

P.S.: It's on the pricier side, though. The seafood is very fresh and not bad, but considering the price, the restaurant needs to put more effort into the food to truly justify it, considering its competing in Richmond.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHrm2J_2IsZNPsiU20ZjezTCCPxRz1UBFQCdKJ&fid=0x0:0x69fcadaae8478662"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"iriseeks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUN60_e6Ur-2aRAWVagksXHkVjjXJQEtpBqJoH5yb2-dy-4FWWLpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recommend this new restaurant to anyone who wants a good 煲仔飯clay pot rice for winter! Their fish soup 順德拆魚羹 is really good as well! Their staffs are helpful and friendly. They came check us out often. I would definitely come back again👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwuCoRucq2D0yxs8SKS2WCWGKGPqOiQp6PdT7T&fid=0x0:0x69fcadaae8478662"],"When":"2023-12-26"},{"Name":"wei zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkXhznaoQn5Rm8BKFr5HCjLvS-AStkYPwT06pSJupPBqiCTqfv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Having the pleasure of enjoying authentic Shunde cuisine in Canada is a rare delight, and this restaurant is a gem that offers just that. The flavors are genuine and rich, a true testament to the culinary skills that bring out the essence of each dish. From the tender and perfectly seasoned meats to the fresh and crisp vegetables, every bite is a harmony of taste that reminds one of the traditional kitchens of Shunde. The environment of the restaurant matches the excellence of the food, with a clean, inviting, and top -notch atmosphere that enhances the dining experience. It's indeed a privilege to have such authentic flavors so far from their home, and I couldn't recommend this place more for anyone craving a taste of true Shunde cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWsAvMV13QB_YwzjlkYmp1VWP3zjBTKVBSjiOJ&fid=0x0:0x69fcadaae8478662"],"When":"2023-12-17"},{"Name":"Evan Du","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU16J4Qn0DO8vE1PbeQmqbt7Xdpl_WUfKnGq6hgf3ybUnNIvdU4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently visited this Shunde restaurant and was thoroughly impressed. The dishes were a delightful blend of flavors. Service was outstanding, making the dining experience truly memorable. Highly recommend for an authentic taste of Shunde cuisine！","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTReW-s8qMghpVaUfbxev8poeSPeTcr6coIX6D&fid=0x0:0x69fcadaae8478662"],"When":"2023-12-19"},{"Name":"Allen He","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJffgcbwEfIJs_E2cnnY_dOVBhzTP0VQenXa_DsYqM5HlVhYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is absolutely legit food from Shunde, the food is tasty, rich flavor and good quality. Definitely recommend some friends to try the best of the best of Cantonese food","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzZFvbUiB1Y4xDaVC5vRW2Hh_Xkrtp2r2UY81C&fid=0x0:0x69fcadaae8478662"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"lily","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUo0K8dYj540_P2kLYLu2nymG5GZGogN8OZ54Msf4iQsyqOAFI5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"extremely overpriced for mediocre food. all the dishes seemed to be overcooked and mushy, and frankly the presentation was terrible.
for the prices the 'food' costs, you would almost expect it to be fine dining. the lighting way too bright and none of the colours match, making it an eyesore to be inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMN1IVuHGuOkNAnlbg5f7K37Biv5uIEh3wRvc1A&fid=0x0:0x69fcadaae8478662"],"When":"2024-5-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jasmine Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjl1vG8AfP1KQsme5lqEpYpQJBF68_I3YKilvkqGxYcn9Se447fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The restaurant was quite busy when we showed up. But the staff was very nice and took our to-go order on the spot.
The service was very quick and efficient. The staff were very busy but also very nice and patient, as it was our first time there. They answered our questions and told us what was popular, so that is what we ordered.
Big portions and very delicious.
10/10 would recommend 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcN9H6mAqjUEuaeD-8zsvIqPvcP2f0VqRoNH93&fid=0x0:0x3cb5d8e5a38357da"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Helen Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKI-mzgGlleZ4ePt7mDYbQ4Gabh9zw-OBKk6bKlySQQQboerA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my second time here with my friend. We came at around 7 and the place was packed shortly after. I already started eating before I took these photos so just know they looked neater when they were first served. We got the mango yogurt and watermelon bingsoo. Both are very good. In the end I found a hair in the mango bingsoo, and they refunded me half of the price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGuBY90diFj5QOY3yoxorH6yWMbYzZ4nlv33Zz&fid=0x0:0x3cb5d8e5a38357da"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Tara Chic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbKLLW5-4TVsnhiyxsW4bWwx8b3t5fSx8NR-6JccbcOPwfnRbf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place for special evening desert. Busy area after 8pm but some parkin left in the back of laundromat. The order we wanted was sold out so we had a different large Mango shaved ice! Never had thus before. Melts in your mouth!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOW64ouzvX6L7YEkU6o9K7JC_ZTw23ipsqhDAXM&fid=0x0:0x3cb5d8e5a38357da"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Amy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKM9n-iFdzxIOMqGXhLY6PtB1tBiMRKTqgMFgTeDKZJacisyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried the taiyaki at Snowy Village in Richmond, and it was fantastic! The fish-shaped pastry was perfectly crispy on the outside and filled with a delicious, warm filling. I had the custard flavor, and it was creamy and sweet – absolutely loved it! The staff were friendly, and the service was quick. A cozy spot for a tasty treat. Will definitely be back to try more! Highly recommend it for anyone craving a sweet snack!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sue L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWK1Xs45MxTbBAkDexDdc8tM6u5P21ibhQQKSUFoghgoR8a2bOV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is the saddest bingsoo I’ve ever had. The watermelon bingsoo is not served as pictured and has way less toppings than pictured. Shrinkflation is real here. They’ve clearly changed the way they do things so I don’t recommend this place to anyone. Their washroom also has no toilet paper or paper towel. Staff is just standing around doing nothing while it takes 30 min to get our order. Front counter is filled with pantry items and is messy. Not a good way to do business.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNj7oU1YAbBZ3saj6dp7ueKC3HPzrtO6jgK-ae9&fid=0x0:0x3cb5d8e5a38357da"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Angela Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgU359Dev9tceZMdK-W_jXN8y0TQSEb9-IOLDnCR1DHt7zaMRcfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect refreshing snack! Service was good and parking was plenty around the corner. We got the regular size Mango Bingsoo and honestly it’s enough to share for two maybe three. The price for the portion is 10/10, there was a heavy amount of fruits and it was super fresh. It is a small shop, so depending on the day and time you might have to wait a while and there’s very limited seats inside!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOWtUienOJs0hE-5D4cqt5VaoXJMhicCUe8eed&fid=0x0:0x3cb5d8e5a38357da"],"When":"2023-4-2"},{"Name":"Allan Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqNDGT1BaxgZqqtKNhbhf5dtxqriZLKK0cICI_N8HdgMz2eUgIXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Edit 7/18/24: went back for the first time in a long time. Seems like they got new owners or something. Bingsoo no longer looks like the menu pictures, now it’s a small lump of depressing icy clump. Would no longer recommend at all.

Never been disappointed with any of their Bingsoo or taiyaki","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOV2cgLBKIne9E9NHH4NActd1PhV-blnrzqUJQ9&fid=0x0:0x3cb5d8e5a38357da"],"When":"2017-5-9"},{"Name":"Jacinda K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0xoGeCDSw5DVJ3YNgzQb_o4aJOLzQdAQ3syqD9WiYy7lJqCATJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We always circle back to Snowy Village, even after trying so many other places, their Bingsoo is consistently good.  If you love mango, it’s a good choice! I like how they layer the flavour in the middle of the Bingsoo, not just on top.

The bowl is much wider than it used to be, (but shallower). Perhaps it makes the fruit qty look like less than the original bowl. It is still enough fruit for the amount of snow.

Firmly packed, but the texture is still fluffy.  This is a regular and it’s plenty for 2 to share. It is very satisfying!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLOQSodBcLkmfzsGp0zSBelJH5r72otZcaOjOS&fid=0x0:0x3cb5d8e5a38357da"],"When":"2023-10-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ingrid Wu (Miso_Miso)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgRJEIuhtghT7iVkULciqa6MDMg7BC9km5HTsNMMQUYPwzJz97=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time there yesterday (Oct 19, 2024). It was recommended by a family member. We ordered a large pork bone soup, a deep fried small crabs, a seafood pancake, and they served 5 different side dishes. Everything tasted really authentic and delicious! The portion was great. The guy, who seems like the owner or the manager, was so attend to. He was fast and efficient. The food came fairly quickly and we all enjoyed it very much!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlFfEEHSntWBOj5xhL9UTWf_XYv9H-0XvH1o-f&fid=0x0:0x93e733d14e1a4990"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Erica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiBiehVBMqDRcQQk3J28lEnqLVQ-p5tIOA0Zlj3wvs65IUmg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Not surprising that this Korean/Chinese food restaurant was fully packed on a Wednesday night at 6:30pm!

Seafood Tofu Soup ($16.95) - Tofu soup was SO rich it’s practically creamy! I dug around and found 1 large prawn, a bunch of baby shrimp, mussels, heaping mounds of soft tofu, mushrooms, cuttlefish (maybe squid? I can’t tell).

BBQ Beef Short Rib ($32.95) – How is this so TENDER?! Huge portion too, it’s at least 3 large strips. Marinated thoroughly and comes on a sizzling plate. 10/10 would order again, great price too.

Honey Butter Fried Chicken ($13.95) – Wish it was crispier, BUT flavour was 10/10. You can really taste the strong garlic flavour. Came with 3 rice cakes too which was cute, a nice chewy break.

Cold Noodle w/ Soup ($16.95) – I’m usually not a fan of cold noodle honestly, this was actually amazing and changed my mind permanently about cold noodles. It’s not just a boring vinegar sauce, it has a robust flavour with sweetness. Super refreshing for the summer (or anytime really).

Service is very friendly, but they're also super busy so you'll have to grab their attention if you want anything. There's a lot of large seating at the back, so it's good for larger parties/family gatherings, but I'd probably recommend a reservation for sure. Lots of parking available, and additional parking up the ramp.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCllSEhhqBQNBGwSFUqoQe_9jlTbNwkrBJdIhO&fid=0x0:0x93e733d14e1a4990"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Aeeln T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3Tv74wgUPtmjIrJoolepIvRLS9w7RBNoNhZ_q6qFRBh97S1-8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Had dinner at a Korean restaurant tonight, and while the food was amazing, I wouldn’t go back because of the service. I went with two friends and we ordered bossam, cold noodles, and also wanted a soup. We asked the server for advice on the soup size given the amount of food we ordered, and he suggested a large one. It turned out to be way too much, and we felt terrible about the leftover food that we were forced to take home.

Throughout the meal, there was no service, and when we jokingly mentioned how much food was left at the end, the server completely avoided us. It felt like he just wanted us to spend more and didn’t actually care about our experience.

If you plan on visiting this place, trust your own judgment when ordering—don’t rely on the server’s suggestions because they’re not very helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfvyW1PLmpZ2TaVb0KCyKBMVw-Zjrf4FGVvcrn&fid=0x0:0x93e733d14e1a4990"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A subpar korean restaurant, the food here is not bad but not amazing and I can find better Korean places in Vancouver. Although for Richmond, they would likely be one of the better restaurants. I definitely do not recommend the army stew and I found that the pork belly was a tad too fatty for me but the chicken here is yummy. May come back if I am craving Korean food in Richmond.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxy75Yzx-q5t78HahfbCEOOCbwxwGsHwuDKAhL&fid=0x0:0x93e733d14e1a4990"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Lizzie S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5qIG1VmBASZQRSYXsIMifm6rtLhZA6xcKTGDs0bvXyJT2pXkmsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A hidden gem in Alexander road. The side dishes were very good and we loved the fried chicken a lot, juicy and great seasonings. Unfortunately, I was not a fan of its rice and cold noodles. Kimchi rice was plain and lack of seasonings. Cold noodles was using very thin noodles but it sticks together and not chewy at all. I may visit again to try other dishes and the yummy fried chicken","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgcHs6-TCBV1iLkRdmW-Po6n5Rhv-joA_BuJVo&fid=0x0:0x93e733d14e1a4990"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Zhuge Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPo5epQpB8uJydI3sToJa66foIacZBCLIBYQ-6Z79DDQxjMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"To try:
- cold noodles: refreshing! Especially for those who like vinegar sour.
- hot stone rice (bibimbap): rice crisp and well seasoned beef slices.
- tofu soup (jjigae): silky tofu and flavourful broth with a perfect spicy kick.
- seafood pancake (pajeon): interesting take with addition of imitation crab.

Pass:
- fried chicken: lacks the typical crunchy batter.

Friendly and courteous service, with good banchan selections.

Don't forget the (free) coconut pudding dessert; standard but who's complaining if it's $0 😆","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6bobHZ9TXJsfxvzPy5hj_PQnRnE4QSAWptAOg&fid=0x0:0x93e733d14e1a4990"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Diane (Dineoutwithdee)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJfHVJSjIKAcPEXNIfUcWAtOeYHaXavqJYPtVJZ3lhCbCbpeo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a nice, cozy spot for Korean Chinese fusion! Loved the space and thoroughly the food!! Pork bone broth and seafood pancakes are must try’s and the wings and kimchi soup did not disappoint!! The location is easy to miss, but worth the hunt.

My first time visiting and I’m looking forward to coming back. Really efficient and kind service, see you again!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo20f2jF9LvuLmSdmSNOi0FHLPK0edsrkf6o5V&fid=0x0:0x93e733d14e1a4990"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Lauren Shiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5ql7ebkARNN6nyaL-VdGSM9h_5cQnePgQFljadnIG6ywpJvoA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here was absolutely delicious and the staff were so friendly! We shared the Seafood Tofu Soup, Beef Short Rib, Cold Noodle, Bossam and Jap Chae. Each dish was packed with flavour and was generous in portion size. The ambiance of the restaurant was nice and everything was super clean. Would highly recommend, we will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQhom9p2XUnziaQqtsM0KKgehAoqnVb6ySS2qU&fid=0x0:0x93e733d14e1a4990"],"When":"2024-8-26"}]
