user_reviews:
[{"Name":"leesa tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWsWaHyhzcw7kKPh9V3HkvTK5TTa81TdmCDp9IylYllx4puXIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried out this restaurant in Richmond and thought it was pretty decent. We ordered a few of the main appetizers and I also ordered the jack fruit smoothie and I thought it was amazing.

The staff members and service were well and quite attentive. The prices are also really reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsRV7lXalgIID1lyHMm2KG6aH26BnjeuA50pya&fid=0x0:0x35f864943c2578fa"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Tang Vietnamese Restaurant & Bar

Location: 8611 Alexandra Road Unit 180, Richmond BC V6X 1C3

We decided to visit this establishment in the evening for a quick bite.

Appetizer:

We opted for #37, the signature Viet Butter Garlic Beef. This dish is a must-have starter. The flavors were exceptional, and I greatly appreciated the combination of ingredients.

Rating: 9 out of 10

Main Course:

We selected the House Special soup. Unfortunately, it was quite disappointing due to its blandness. Although the quantity of meat and noodles was adequate, the soup lacked flavor. Additionally, the necessary sauces were not provided, which further detracted from the experience.

Rating: 5 out of 10

Ambiance: The atmosphere was acceptable but unremarkable. There was an unpleasant odor, possibly emanating from our table or the surrounding area, which was distracting.

Pricing: The prices were reasonable.

Service: The service was below average.

Verdict: I may consider returning in the future to explore the variety on the menu. However, given the plethora of Vietnamese restaurants in the city, it may be some time before I revisit, particularly due to the busy location during dinner hours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmRdC9N5nHigRWaoNOSzX7hpBKyeheY1zBMj3l&fid=0x0:0x35f864943c2578fa"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"candy L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgq2OgnXFRsC1icGye-CTgUf_6kEV0cPoOgzI7ANMes5eDT-Xz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I love Vietnamese food, and we’re fortunate to have so many great Vietnamese restaurants to choose from in Vancouver. So, when I saw Tang Vietnamese Restaurant in Richmond being promoted by many foodies on Instagram, I decided to try it out when I had the chance to be in Richmond. Today was the day.
The restaurant has a spacious outdoor and indoor dining area. We arrived around 12:00 on a Monday, so only a few tables were occupied. The menu had a wide variety of options, so we needed some time to decide. The staff came by twice to ask if we were ready, but when we were finally ready to order, no one paid attention to us.
We ordered the House Special Beef Pho and Chicken Pho, along with an Oyster Egg Cake. The pho arrived quickly, and we all loved the soup, meat, and noodles. However, the portion of bean sprouts and basil seemed smaller than at other restaurants. After finishing our pho, we were still waiting for the oyster dish. We thought about canceling it, but just as we were about to, the oyster dish arrived. It looked large, crispy, and delicious, especially when dipped in the special source.Unfortunately, the egg and oyster themselves were lacking in flavor.
One thing worth mentioning is that the environment here is quite noisy. Even with only a few customers, the loud music from two big screens, the staff talking loudly, and the sound of someone chopping behind the counter next to us made it difficult to enjoy a quiet meal.
Overall, the food was good, though the price was slightly higher than other places. The service, however, could be improved.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvT5pU-XVYdqIZVI9jLoYgddHskHQGpeHpsTTT&fid=0x0:0x35f864943c2578fa"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Vincent Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRTaPpbMwtWXlBMDWwH_pYmP3LMsknWyp6Tv9YEYXfKF2Yfg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is the best place in town for Authentic Vietnamese street food and pho. They got many selection and every bite was absolutely delicious. we love their pho and butter garlic chicken wing,  BBQ beef rib , Snail, and the little wrap Hue dumpling . My girl friend like their Viet hotpot and oyster cake. Menu got good cocktail too. Will come back for sure. We came in with a group of 8 people at around 7pm, it was busy . Lucky we got the table with 20 mins way time. And the plus was they got a big free parking at the back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOt6OAUef9mM7OdUupynYe6fRROy4GCI8EI61ca&fid=0x0:0x35f864943c2578fa"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Rob Campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDKhcs7-KcEnYJeV1fqvc8JWC7u5HpnLyUHUg7OzHFW57-qA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were visiting from Calgary and was told of this place. We ordered lot of different dishes and was extremely impressed with the flavor and  portion sizes. Highly recommended and will come back next time we are in Richmond.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp1oKP4YRqe6mPErg24vmSZHlRqR1hoiikAf9t&fid=0x0:0x35f864943c2578fa"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Edy Hartono","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV83JGpGqSgslHDOcTAbzYhhVN16swzTO25X5HMopiOlSyDTg6r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Simply one of the best Vietnamese restaurant in town! Food taste amazing, especially the chicken wings! Butter beef is also a must order menu!

We also love the atmosphere of the establishment.

On top of that, our server "Alex" did amazing job! He introduced us all the menu and explained  very detail what's on the menu.

Definitely will come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4cF5ZoOdVMjWk8cgqpZOsByHif3pr8SDFuNNa&fid=0x0:0x35f864943c2578fa"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Jessica Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOeC5VCbc6g3HH3dxXpDS9bE993HEKMDVI3SjHX2aNdHbQOJHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The salad roll and tea were great and healthy and presented so nicely. The server was really kind and patient and thoughtfully used photos in the menu to explain things. Even though it's part of a "modern" theme I found the music and music videos sad because they lacked deep culture.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXqC9rafDtNFJxQrSVLD1XJaCTk3JXafv3dzGm&fid=0x0:0x35f864943c2578fa"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"V Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVP_yI7QAdxPPXZMbAh6xyz1lPV92ndcPIE3VxjETdT9ri31drc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We’ve visited Tang numerous times in the past, but they recently updated their menu and introduced a new item: individual hot pots. The concept is simple—you start by choosing a meat base (seafood or beef), a soup broth (beef, seafood, tom yum, or chicken), and a side (vermicelli or pho noodles). We opted for the beef option with a beef soup base and pho noodles. To our pleasant surprise, the portion size was much larger than expected, easily enough to share between two people.

Overall, it was a delicious and enjoyable experience, though be prepared—it does take a little time to eat!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEYI78oeOEsLwISBt0IInv0f1NoAtpR-j0oSYk&fid=0x0:0x35f864943c2578fa"],"When":"2024-11-12"}]

[{"Name":"Natalie Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYbxz6tHfzpw_crQvWrKdbcrfKS7J8gsWBP0N2RIGEa5Pij8iW4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their 螺螄粉 is so delicious and on point!
I visited this place for the first time with my family, but I will sure bring my friends with me next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQdUceN5KBBKr4tfOM7OXlcaen5H6Oem0k1Nqq&fid=0x0:0x88355907a0475d77"],"When":"2023-8-31"},{"Name":"RandomAlpaca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWc8u0_GgO8i6h2t6topz8d0q7v21fNNwo_yKKNeSkQzcr9qkb8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For the price of the noodles here, you get incredibly great value. The noodles were incredibly authentic, and tasted amazing. The only complaint would be that it’s too spicy, even at the least spicy tier of spice, and the portion size is a bit small, which is easily remedied with their $1.5 extra noodle add-on. In addition, the noodles are vegetarian, which mean anyone can eat them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlpbL_PZCqWKC0b06eUvQSq37ztOIhZmt80uwH&fid=0x0:0x88355907a0475d77"],"When":"2023-2-19"},{"Name":"HI HI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVupVKWR_xUWpWYNohpa4HFlrcxBdWjzz_CeR7dAsroKU5DBbk1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was delicious, and the bubble tea was very unique. I highly recommend the fried egg on top of the noodles. It provides a contrasting texture to the noodles and really brings it up a notch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPltXqPHmqyNFB1qYB5N6hz9VBfZSbLlDirHDwf&fid=0x0:0x88355907a0475d77"],"When":"2023-1-18"},{"Name":"Susan Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcYTYC0tDojJjS0tPig0UhGrw5IVeDkgkEB8dMN2M03ivcVtPXbA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic snail rice noodle! Probably the best snail rice noodles in Vancouver. With Reasonable prices for add-ons.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZc0g7IaA0nvS7ny_Ymr4Q2td5RUHrSlhbs2aD&fid=0x0:0x88355907a0475d77"],"When":"2023-3-10"},{"Name":"Arin Tsai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_akiQcKKdH-jyb9d7lDwuUpXa__KqBodJe7G2J0mb2yos8DZt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I think they use a lot of MSG in the soup.  I am as very thirsty afterwards.  Many people recommended the fried egg so I ordered it. Me and my husband’s favorite spot!!!!! This place is legit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBDooaWSKwJ1ZBV9SWP7BOL06t33PAh5-bGcRp&fid=0x0:0x88355907a0475d77"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Niki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhNt9SIcIrXlI_csE2maNCQ-bzqJPtkbGblGwIvcphArIefsGC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"10 out of 10!! Tasty and so yummy. Must order the add-on fried egg. Highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh2SQPh1cRXneWrZhW8OAkaEUq5hVKjqn2A6Ps&fid=0x0:0x88355907a0475d77"],"When":"2023-10-9"},{"Name":"Fan Chester","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWa31G_hlPPDsl1wIwe25M8uKrczRElh-Jd1vZV3cFbNG4--T0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very good taste! The food is awesome

1 star off because they didn’t clean the pig knuckle well","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpOwgyu44h-0hoyr9N64wpTbxn9Bssfo8t7IOy&fid=0x0:0x88355907a0475d77"],"When":"2023-2-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent Japanese food! We came here for dinner and we had the coco mango roll, salmon sashimi, aburi oshi salmon sushi, tempura udon, and chicken kaarage.

Lots of parking available and staff were friendly. Wasn't busy as we went on a weeknight.

Pretty decent overall!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1BZd9fsf3din4_AaH3sgXfv3a1potfbguhCHz&fid=0x0:0x37aa1db857e64aa6"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Megan Em","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwdX1sdgHzaGHK1Qh5jhqONWzisfTYlDr_jLfhPbhiD41lUSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I told them I was allergic to wheat and asked for my rolls and nigiri to be gluten free. They brought me out "gluten free" soy sauce - they put a label on a soy sauce bottle and claimed it was gluten free. Before I left the restaurant, I figured out really quick it was definitely not gluten free. They had no idea what gluten was and had to check the sauces. Do not recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDgp8fBGY1hCe7acvlRF5ZbkKEImTC9yhT7LWL&fid=0x0:0x37aa1db857e64aa6"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Christine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoQxHupe1pOOt3yPo-VvCIhkRwnjfNJNZ1G0WcwmRWYUOVKEAQtA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I’ve been coming to this restaurant for years, eating their sashimi don at least once to thrice a week whether from ordering or eating in the restaurant. I even invite all my friends and family here. As a frequent and local customer i loved this restaurant but i couldn’t help but be extremely disappointed by my last order. I ordered a tuna and salmon sashimi don and the cuts were absolutely tiny I felt so disheartened to see it. The tuna and salmon slices were barely the size of my thumb. I have pics of previous dons ive gotten as reference. Idk if the chef changed but this is really disappointing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbtF3FXrVP4zNT05ur-amLr1pAZ0y5PxKpPm8J&fid=0x0:0x37aa1db857e64aa6"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Jessica Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbKN7JTB8-geSMCvSN4JUMFRJdzyUw9Zem00rFXxig6jms97b4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Overall, a nice place to eat with your friends and family.

Service: I think the service was fine. They didn’t do anything special, just helping us order. But honestly, I don’t see a problem with that.

Atmosphere: The mood here is very nice! The constant chatter mixed with silverware against dishes provides a comfortable environment for me to eat in.

Food: My friend and I ordered the California Roll (and another roll we forgot the name of 😅). The rolls were great! I liked the flavor and the presentation of the food. Overall, not bad at all.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwqY_uIl_sbC2fhn2fQfh1G6AsOM9H0272prAG&fid=0x0:0x37aa1db857e64aa6"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Djordje Kojic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBL6vcGYM0P3feyhqJkWM8uZeZP_Q7F0JmFh9MDsvKIRzJtg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great lunch spot. It’s never that busy so there is always room. Very fast service. It’s my go to lunch spot because I can be in and out very fast. Food is really good and the prices are very reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8bPRvTjjK6vvh--9S8C6k5fis5m_3eQnP0m8n&fid=0x0:0x37aa1db857e64aa6"],"When":"2024-4-4"},{"Name":"RK","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeUlmJMo9MWvowCgtiwgc17IMBaHwKLndZbE-uU-ycn11uEyFE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came in hungry expecting a decent meal.
Ordered the beef teriyaki dish & there was barely any meat but many sprouts underneath to make it look like a full plate. Dissatisfied, don’t usually leave negative reviews. Feel ripped off.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhwKu20epLzNsOSAwQzfdIDloogDCyJNFnaASE&fid=0x0:0x37aa1db857e64aa6"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Bionic JS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGm3sKRl22i3V5BABQPkSuxCeoEuF4PS9rUO0aHqDFYGVuEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very good tempura

Went here for dinner.  Had the salmon don, prawn tempura, chicken teriyaki and house roll.

Tempura color was very light golden so you know the oil is clean.  Very crunchy and not oily at all.  Salmon on the don was melt in your mouth.  Teriyaki is served sizzling and could have used a tad more seasoning.  House roll was tasty.

Interior is your typical run of the mill sushi place.  Service was quick and friendly.  I would come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpOlnCkFR9HpL3VbG1ellJyclc5sZXkPo92q94&fid=0x0:0x37aa1db857e64aa6"],"When":"2024-1-14"},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The quality of their sushi is okay, but it wouldn't be my first choice. For the amount of food that they give you, their prices are super reasonable. The sushi rolls were decent too and I quite enjoyed the korean bowl, I would probaberly not come back again, but nonetheless, not bad. The chicken karage was the one thing that was terrible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfNMP6i7SY4Uy1mFREPNaIKd48wfUoB1lTNCRS&fid=0x0:0x37aa1db857e64aa6"],"When":"2023-11-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Victoria Castillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVfaQAeLtKLGafbxOu4KJUr6F8OKPdGNR557-uiK4csZgjrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing, I was completely blown away by the flavors of the food, the staff are stupendously friendly.
I definitely recommend this place whether or not you're in the area.
The salad was a bit more sour than I liked, otherwise the food was wonderful.
The falafels tasted amazing and all the food smelt wonderful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_Uvxt2_t65ukPvTqQ1wrprW0jy5xvvZVW-kii&fid=0x0:0xe25aa2e96ef4e684"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Rosaliza JB","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWa30Lq-0IWmj7RPGPpc4QUnkMb7A6XF5PBL3Krl3WaDQ8f_b50xQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered here via Uber eats. Service was fast and the food was 5/5! Really impressed with how delicious it was. It made me crave it for weeks. Will definitely order here again when in town!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNQhEdjjo9Wte8j8LLKHC6BwXVtzXRPEKZcSEF&fid=0x0:0xe25aa2e96ef4e684"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"A L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDuox32jyJxnkzAm48h5i9Ht66Z7AvtkXQcQV08flbS_JcS1Q6eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a great meal (take out) from here. The chicken and beef were good, but the lamb was exceptional! Definitely a must if you visit here.

I'd prefer a different hot sauce. The one they used just taste like Frank's.

Next time I'll try the garlic sauce. I missed ordering it this time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAB7wNzSxaCsTCM6SJDww1yflGbvp-gK3VJgjS&fid=0x0:0xe25aa2e96ef4e684"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"KentTa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9sDh51B2GR28uJKshUftP6vtMtumYW-ozVd4mMEHsPMyVCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great taste! I like the falafel. served hot and yum.

Friendly staff!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDa0HhMLwecX1egmY6qHicdQmon4OLgJUAZhAn&fid=0x0:0xe25aa2e96ef4e684"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Shameer Pulikkal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOHMSHxUaWurqQz3BtBfdTHxCWvMxlwX-ZtssiYEe2cEd-8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Service and workers are trash, food is decent. Overall,   a below par experience. If you are in the area, Al Basha and Richmond BBQ are a better bet! ✌️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhKg-YEZ5VytgEiACU6_qWWzNS13Z0kqBEsTro&fid=0x0:0xe25aa2e96ef4e684"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Narine Snkhchyan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPrGIbQ9lj39JI9No5tn-JAKkdrxXL0_o_JzZeWFh3GIlr1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My twin daughters grew up eating their lamb shawarma. I always get to them if no dinner at home. It’s fresh, super delicious with generous amount of meat and vegetables. I am confident my family will be taken care of and fed properly every time I send them there or order. And the staff is so friendly spoiling my girls sometimes. Thank you for great service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brian Shaler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVanm_SU1M6cSuCRW78pg1T2oWnXPERDUCzn8bF70zKPszCwZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loving the new reno’s!!!  It’s bright, airy and open. The food is great, including and a little surprisingly the FRIES!  The friendly staff is always a treat. The Shawarma is a personal fave because it’s really easy to eat on the run and is great value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNG6lDv4GKzbMuHZk5XHENe3XRPCPcgjcU9Ajbg&fid=0x0:0xe25aa2e96ef4e684"],"When":"2023-9-7"},{"Name":"Robel B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1Q6YAX7fi3QQ_rb4l1Tdgj6-54L86R4O4l7WPHK8RCUwTqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The chicken shawarma was delicious,portion was good aswell.Uncle's Sal's received me with a bright smile,very friendly and customer service oriented staff.The place including bathroom was super clean.They had all the drinks you expect in shawarma places.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuVlN77VkNsqYuen8c1_sZdzOCMhVKgLKcNj-n&fid=0x0:0xe25aa2e96ef4e684"],"When":"2024-2-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good Chinese food! Lots of choices here. We typically order sweet and sour pork, soy sauce chicken, and broccoli with either beef or seafood (picture has this one).

We also like the fried rice and noodles too.

Plenty of parking in the mall, but you should make a reservation if you plan to come for dinner or on weekends because they can be full.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsiXenVEAjYQILSNGl5pQMxnMn7tXfWJLjEY2l&fid=0x0:0xde6b357180a4ccd4"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Cole Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAOU6XCX3s_R0vWndse-P-J59JZDVGZbi6kfyG2pJARhX4qsYzZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The pineapple shrimp fried rice was fantastic, it had a lot of "wok hay" the chefs said. I think that translates to good flavor.

Not sure if they added msg, but it definitely didn't taste like it. Not bad at all.

Interior design was okay. Neat and tidy.

Service is where the star fell off. It was slow and not quite friendly. They favor Cantonese speakers.

Decent price as well, the average around here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlwa2-OPaXLPSKfoa-Y05pYSF-4z-pJy5B9pBi&fid=0x0:0xde6b357180a4ccd4"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Clement Chew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwKhl3mEn2gCZF6VdKbi7gB6oYfqEyv4ScXRvTHDS2H04sB70nmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very busy place so make sure to make a reservation
Every dish was delicious! Especially the coke ribs and shrimp scrambled eggs","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzzM7xaqeU4GxmB42bfXTvCPSDf2bE0MQZVkoD&fid=0x0:0xde6b357180a4ccd4"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Oily and disgusting
Beef brisket come in bites , not much meat
White radish gone bad and taste sour
Free parking lot plenty of parking","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3-w8L2PR7TltOHHOTSH-PdH-CTx6c6ZjIUVZU&fid=0x0:0xde6b357180a4ccd4"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Alex Hui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5jEgmDrhILILfxQgwIKYaBaK3kTV4j2v0HdA6NrE_q0qyXMw7KQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Tonight, I ordered a takeout dish of stewed seafood with tofu. I only got imitation crab meat, but fortunately it contains actual tofu! Never again order from this restaurant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgKZSWsO0LGgYJLmmwUjO3ZMr-PxF_tqyA1OzI&fid=0x0:0xde6b357180a4ccd4"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"William Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmQdctlbM12t5Occdf84xI_X4OatAdUnoO7Mf5nuujaBWYasmgPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came with friends who know people who work here, so can not fairly judge service but  seems good service.  High pace,  seemingly high turnout.

The food was really good here. Loved the chicken,  prawn, and tong choi had loads of flavour.

The cauliflower dish was made not as they normally do so may be sweeter than it normally would be. Also had loads of Chinese sausage but not as much cauliflower or preserved pork. Bell peppers are not usually in this dish. I like them but maybe not for this dish.

Parking lot (free) was busy, but a few spots were available when we arrived.

I would come here again if in the neighbourhood.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNa4ZfB1_TgWSA9bZgGOoDoeSW-8_leb6gb_voU&fid=0x0:0xde6b357180a4ccd4"],"When":"2023-7-28"},{"Name":"Bronson VM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtc-bPdNjsYMvBcP2Txz2fw_jtG1usp53QQ5fldtfCo_CO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Price can compare to famous Chinese Restaurants but taste of food are not good, especially sweet and sour port are not fresh and over cooked like dry meet. All dishes looks good but not the taste, only the beef is up to standard. Not a recommended choice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMikjgPHAo25cvLic_87Z3zhQbs095W2F2ZVGw&fid=0x0:0xde6b357180a4ccd4"],"When":"2023-12-8"},{"Name":"C Pedrosa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcMDy4tMBdT1bu6DvBAjbPuH68jW3f1qeeNrDCc5DPFdSftMlu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The neighborhood’s best kept secret.  This place is always full. Their squid with salt and pepper is divine. Restaurant is clean and they have Friendly staff too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmF3Igj22ipU84RLIsVKa4VWkFCwJZYi6VytxN&fid=0x0:0xde6b357180a4ccd4"],"When":"2023-10-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"rinatchalove","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuO1rntC2oQZoKUtOqm6IaTQ4wBM26jAlbbqW4w8YxelmhLiM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"To be clear you do not grill your food. Food is grilled and kept warm/hot on a hot plate. Candles are used to keep metal tray warm.

Food is really good, i like the pork belly a lot.  Steamed buns arent what you think either (see pic - it’s the double half moon)

Great late night yums!
Friendly staff, ez parking","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4ZnelyWc-FEMa_sCzs_HRbdBLDlE5Qgzv2LQ6&fid=0x0:0x6150e3e4eb7f7b22"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkLPbuR2Lbk_N-PtXNVGF1nDc7UOQmEl0cDxsJheipcOTu3i85=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing experience! Great ambience and there are cuts of meat i have never been able to try until I came here! All the food was very delicious and the service was quick and friendly. Can not wait to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjiiCAlwGi6NZHQnuN8Amrf0Gtk2coBb09NtJ6&fid=0x0:0x6150e3e4eb7f7b22"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Jenn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRm654M6WEPKpMVyI_-_CuYSSnZvfd29M3aYNWNqYhiLyRGrBS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I was really excited to come here because of everything I saw on Instagram but the food was mid as hell. Everything tasted the same and we ordered over 10 different types of meat/ cuts. The shots were diluted and I probably could drink all 25 without a buzz. All the servers were so busy and yet so free all the time, so service was not good. When we asked them what meat they brought out they would said “I don’t know”","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWe2v3q_QK24Yc3Fqbk13POLBSLzW2ugWkBISq&fid=0x0:0x6150e3e4eb7f7b22"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Jesse Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqc4Js_hbpSJyGd7HxE4_GSDRsIjYI5FHNMKdapkO7Vpm1mm0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"A warning to park at their parking lot, be aware of the SCAM ticket to eat here, after getting home we realize we had a ticket and have to drive back to the restaurant to show our restaurant receipt to get the ticket removed. What a scam and wasted of our time.

Based on our above experience, my take on the restaurant wasn’t as good. Why would they ticket customer assuming we park there illegally? WTH!!

Not sure we will eat at Grill Party again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNBKtbK7FMONiD6n6k67bizQXn_0ZlzU9aiRRx&fid=0x0:0x6150e3e4eb7f7b22"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Nancy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWA4ejh4lO-tY_eoGTxmCCJv76K8jBUalBI7YiJcE-rigM7HxeT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time visiting this restaurant. We tried the pork belly and ox tongues grill. The texture was so soft, it melts in my mouth. The skewer has minimum order, which was too much. We were unable to try out other skewers.

So we order 2 more dishes. The marinated sea snails and chilli frog legs. Both were super tasty!! Goes very well with beer, we shared the 1500ml beer world tower. They have 8 craft beer to pick from all very different styles.

They have lots of parking and easy to find. Will go back to try other dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOb3pFIvWOzJogLr1WM94BeGrgz9Z32_NjWN8qR&fid=0x0:0x6150e3e4eb7f7b22"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"JJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWv0snBpgvBPf2qz4qfFT4OylgeUYJtPPar7PLTM4oqEyOHGx25-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is ok , not very special but the atmosphere is very cute . Reservation is a good idea because there are not a lot of seats inside. Will come back to this place again with other friends . Drinks are a bit overpriced .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ2J2VFRW9UuiUfLZZoyEcMCmPJ7vw2jOftn_i&fid=0x0:0x6150e3e4eb7f7b22"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Helen Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKI-mzgGlleZ4ePt7mDYbQ4Gabh9zw-OBKk6bKlySQQQboerA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and great atmosphere. I highly recommend the grilled scallops with vermicelli, it is soooo good! The lamb and beef skewers are so tender and appropriately flavoured. The beef tendon is also great. The only thing is that we waited for a while and asked the server who then told us the kitchen missed one of our dishes. We decided to cancel it and the server took it off from our bill. It’s a great place for groups. I want to try the shots next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsnweQXavas3zmypSbub_sABPcmq3dKRogGj3K&fid=0x0:0x6150e3e4eb7f7b22"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Monique","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQcAgOL4v2U_VirmCaadFrb2IzIMWiSeW-tX_pA5B7GcJn2vN8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want to grab some bites with your friends or a large group, this place is great!

The different items on the menu are perfect to share as a group, same with the alcohol menu! Even though the place seemed really gimmicky with the lights and alcohol deals, the actual food and basic skewers like beef and pork were super moist and delicious. Usually skewer places have meat that tend to come out dry, but not this time.

Just a heads up that while some of their shot packages seem like a good deal, they have less alcohol than what is usually standard in each shot. Great if you lean more lightweight! 😅

Also on another note, parking is free if you register your plates inside the restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZhjbU4gnu8rpnPSLtbP-xEUJAVC6zSECMsRG7&fid=0x0:0x6150e3e4eb7f7b22"],"When":"2024-8-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Vic W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpSPmDt4nq7hsVbYQlv9PQyLT9pSZXhNmOH1JaH0U1d7Hcx7v8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have been here several times over the years. Service is always excellent, staff are friendly. The food is good quality. Coffee free refill. The best location in Richmond by far. Free parking inside Garden City Plaza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKR1ry85dxTJsYvfCi2S0nFeDjX-CFBTrYgm0z&fid=0x0:0x8295161bdb334c0a"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Bernie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPXTBFQGy4UZogf6r0hGxUGZ8fvtwePPN5iicbAtQksaWtpwOP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A&W claims to uphold high-quality standards, yet my recent experience at their Garden City location in Richmond was completely unacceptable. I ordered the Chubby Chicken Cruncher with yam fries and root beer, but the food quality fell far short of any reasonable expectation. The chicken was dry and tough, devoid of any crispiness. The yam fries were cold and soggy, clearly having been fried hours earlier. To make matters worse, I ended up with diarrhea after the meal. This level of service is absolutely unacceptable. As this was my first visit, it will undoubtedly be my last. The owner must take immediate action to ensure that the staff meets the quality standards expected from this brand.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJpmBM-Eo3BZEzcOOmBIAWZRiJqvti1JAXvAwW&fid=0x0:0x8295161bdb334c0a"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"jordan K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_oUrS5rrFikT9zMgreWZGSg7ji2MWj9fPkgEerXYXDrFwdKSW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came here for 2 double buddies and bit into one of them which had mold on the underside of the bun. I nearly threw up especially since the taste had led me to look under the burger in the first place. Disgusting experience, can't believe I paid for it. Someone get a health inspector here or something, I see they had this issue 5 months ago. Ridiculous.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGtp7yF-h_ldLMYSokWyMLIu8AK5FZKXwBqawJ&fid=0x0:0x8295161bdb334c0a"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Cheryl Hundal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkEXmHdu0BvBskm61CrVlC9OSIcFGuCOGj2gdo15iujYcaPV5tlA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Spend 33$ on 2 combos. The burgers were, at best, edible. The onion rings were so bad we couldn't even eat them. Soggy and tasteless like they had been sitting dripping in oil for hours before we got them. Best part was the rootbeer. This store will never get my service again. Waste of money and gas 😡😡😡","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXI_xSvHXpq7dR30o3afOoEIUe6a4SrJBjX9nrWy8wjOKiJhjKG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I usually dine here during my break time and always order Buddy Burger with cheese. But today,at around 12:45pm, I ordered the same thing. After the first few bites,I noticed that the patty was undercooked and it taste different than usual. I approached the staff and told them that the patty is undercooked. One staff just told me “ Next time, you should let us know if you want it cooked well-done” . I have never heard in any A&W location that the customer should tell how they would like their patty. He didn’t even asked me if I want to have my burger redone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3uUKbkBTQ1e9uN8SOBj5H3N_UYXydSikzSct0&fid=0x0:0x8295161bdb334c0a"],"When":"2023-8-16"},{"Name":"AMAN SHARMA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKkmXLCNJgEA31WlZ_mWA1Gi-X3wb2bQTjETGEy4lDyJBhVDg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Rupinder,

I had the worst experience at this A&W Location as i ordered veg peri peri burger and i got something with chicken in it.

Maybe you were in a hurry, but please listen first what exactly the customer is ordering if you’re not sure about it there’s no harm to confirm it twice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYQ1OJuiFutHEMWnE6tT2aU1ESP4oSs7OtdglaK0ViH_103ch2rw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The rep at drive-thru was patient was my question.  Beyond meat burger was meh, nothing fancy.  You feel some mushroom texture, some soy and bean ... etc.  KFC veggie burger is way better.

Didn’t wait too long though, I might come back for other stuff when I’m starving.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpMrg9PYA8JRZweoaFSOF2W0p_Nomp-2Cd_wWO&fid=0x0:0x8295161bdb334c0a"],"When":"2019-5-17"},{"Name":"Aarsh Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoqn5WgDFnskFUfcIZqv0VD7VWhLGDoj3U0QK600p05HBvMFta=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"July 28 11:40 pm. Did multiple mobile orders and the girl made it fresh and overall food was awesome and delicious. Kudoos to great service. Best A&w","Images":null,"When":""}]

about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"No-contact delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Freedom Freedom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlOow58Akaca2hdtCvPisBcoR9gk9TySG2ikdX73BQG76ENw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"DISGUSTING  CHICKEN AND RICE.

They always serve old overnight rice.  Not fresh at all.  It happened 6 months ago. I tried to give them another chance.
However, it’s the same and it’s actually gotten worst than before.

Rice smell weird and taste weird.  Definitely not fresh or a day old.

Chicken is super dry, rough, hard and the meat looks like an eraser texture. Any food court Hainese chicken rice in Richmond food court is better than this.

The price is the same as prataman but prataman is 10/10 delicious.  This is only 0/10.

This is a big failure since they were good when they first started.   I wasted $40.

Only took a few bites and had some chicken.
I stopped eating and felt sick.  I’m throwing out the rest.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjzx6Jtfx99Es9zGdPw62eTMDjheLirQhDPly7&fid=0x0:0xd637e1aab2f4668f"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Erica Ngan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxiFAMX-8U6Hf7I7ySV2AT1mYgYdeBidCPp2cDYnZKccTLsR17eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's pretty good for the price, I didn't expect much but it's worth what you paid for!  I was impressed with the taste, sauce, rice, chicken was average but tender, salad ok, amount of ginger given was generous. Seating was comfortable too, can buy a drink on the side. Just missing the soup that I find in other Hainan places, would have paid more if they have soup. Great idea to serve the meal in take out boxes. Like this fast food restaurant, their tip starts at 10% quite fair!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVdNUtDTAYFyoTyJP6B6_gjfPbW16cv32eBXBV&fid=0x0:0xd637e1aab2f4668f"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"S Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2e0D5-kJa11tnJIdqzRbPkXwHnlSrxab1DzM0kPyYfoRUvHgk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Completely pre cooked chicken, the meat is cold and dry, the curry fish ball is basically fish ball plus spicy source, not even curry! Moreover, I got stomach uncomfortable after dinner, will never ever order again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5ioxUdrrPnUAMqxcX7rZOnYQ0tL8p_VQWm97x&fid=0x0:0xd637e1aab2f4668f"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Some delicious, cheap, and again, delicious Hainanese chicken here! Not a super big fan of their drinks, but their chicken and curry fish balls have quite a generous portion for a decent price. I highly recommend this place :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4KTfxS1WKre8sGnX8kVQdwlq-3UuBJyjWgeq2&fid=0x0:0xd637e1aab2f4668f"],"When":"2024-1-26"},{"Name":"Prettech Canada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK0-bRSlFJXhwUcmoFjEgfZ9XzFxBcYJAHnfse3QULvhaTMLX3oQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Chicken, I've recently had the chance to dine at this space and found the chicken to be the most tender moist I've ever had.They have a great takeaway system. I personally eat on premise and it is a family run business and they take pride in the art of "healthy food" Clean bathrooms and friendly staff. Try this space out you will be glad you did. I can sum it up in 2 words "Simple & Tasty"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnfE3nQ04lXM1JQqrm3q6qcWMbWnvqNzLjQKIC&fid=0x0:0xd637e1aab2f4668f"],"When":"2019-1-16"},{"Name":"Steve Morgan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmgrmzSyB3CC_qWamR3pXmaZna6-RxfqDluiFzTGNrypDReGc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place offers a limited menu of dishes done well. Don’t expect a tonne of selection. Just a few dishes well worth the wait (expect a lineup at lunch hour). We ordered all three of their mains (yes, there are only three) and each was done very well. Though the Hainanese chicken is their mainstay, and it is very good, we actually liked the beef brisket best.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHd3RxaGMkHy9aoOQbB18im0ndUyifHAgO5HQ&fid=0x0:0xd637e1aab2f4668f"],"When":"2018-6-4"},{"Name":"Tony Ferreira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_m-giD7ih8ykJwu8hd7aytoqE60fzC7PglKoWfysVCRGVYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming a few times and the chicken keeps getting better. The sauce, omg, the sauce is DELISH!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOr6qkwxNdeQj3wh5kRhVcKvavDFMOEFiE0DhXD&fid=0x0:0xd637e1aab2f4668f"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Desy Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrUNUi5nBlBmUQMOU2Lo2Yu5SjMGgKZ2L2N1xVRXSvhFjaBcU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Skip the beef brisket curry. Not the best. The beef is not that tender. Lots of tendons...

I still give it 5stars though because their hainan chicken is on point! Not much fat, nicely seasoned, and no bones!!!

I would suggest getting the half order rather than the single order. It’s like double the amount for just an extra $5.

The salad it comes with is surprisingly good too.

I would totally come back again but only for their hainan chicken and nothing else.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxzUW6xBjAQU5QOKJgunj4vyIqvos62DJfRnk&fid=0x0:0xd637e1aab2f4668f"],"When":"2018-5-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Daisy Jeroo Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhxni7wKFHdFt7utvcSLMFvCVzWXtlW81uZzqtcGmUUsujSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pan fried pork buns were very juice, Siu Loong Bao were juice & the skin were thin, Stir Fried Shanghai Noodle was yummy, Fried Leek Cake, this four kind of dishes were excellent, these are my favorites.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzLc0c-Slvb-_TOh09aNDJBXBrB69SgWooCMNH&fid=0x0:0x176090eea54fd623"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Lanbai Kenneth xu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqIDq3TdFVmqMIIKvSVGKlkMC_XKLdZllG7NF-GUH5gA6mCzEkIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"To be clear first, this is actually a restaurant more specialized in Huaiyang cuisine rather than a Shanghainese restaurant.
Some of the best dishes include Sangji Bun and Tofu Noddle （揚州煮乾絲）, which are both juicy and authentic. This place perhaps has the best Sangji Bun in the whole area, with is a must try","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUOA670Fceb1jLPvF2I2wpJ8eD-LDwOuobKFxY&fid=0x0:0x176090eea54fd623"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Mark Cai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkSvGBBQx52iwGZhr1gWfkv6ERu5XtOjs8SMzU0WeiY_cnJ6Q9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant specializes in Southeastern Chinese cuisine and offers a descent dining environment. The manager provides excellent service, and the dishes are usually quite good. It’s a popular restaurant, so you may need to queue up for dinner sometimes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsBdIX-eK5Dp1yjctmNCHT4RReUfYMnjWOkSqV&fid=0x0:0x176090eea54fd623"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Jackie Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDuIMyOTrv6WftETLu6eUry90PqCsA-BFLE9H_yJdoJX9iXA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite Shanghainese food in town. Reservation is required. Big portions and decent prices. I would recommend the Woton Chicken Soup. I was shocked by how big their small portion was. The chicken soup was creamy, the dumplings were filled and flavourful, lots of veggies and a huge chicken. The Pan Fried Meat Dumplings （锅贴） and Xiaolongbao （小笼包）is also really decent. Served very hot.

I would also recommend the dessert the Glutinous Rice Ball in Wine Soup and the Pumpkin Pancake (with red bean filling. I liked how the pumpkin flavour was barely noticeable and the red bean was not overly sweet.

Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbf7rJ2VAGR9ZUTlbm2lFTvw0sU9nJ3xGzKDSI&fid=0x0:0x176090eea54fd623"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very authentic Shanghainese cuisine. Generous portions as well. Definitely one of our go to's.

If you are eating dinner there, I would strongly recommend eating the first round, so 5 or 5:30pm, because parking is very limited. There's also paid street parking on Alexandra Road.

Also make sure to make a reservation, especially on the weekends, to make sure you get a table!

One interesting photo to share .. the large wonton chicken soup is a sight to behold! The photo doesn't show how massive it is. It can easily feed ~12+ people with seconds to spare!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYKj-DmyEFxlbyykgWqbntWp1ibhbJRDK_nnci&fid=0x0:0x176090eea54fd623"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Zhuge Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPo5epQpB8uJydI3sToJa66foIacZBCLIBYQ-6Z79DDQxjMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Homey, tasty and unpretentious food 🤗

Good and prompt service.

To try:
- spicy chicken feet (well marinated, refreshing, and crunchy)
- drunken pork Hock (well-seasoned, collagen wonder)
- cucumber and black fungus salad (seasoning sure opens the appetite)
- Steamed pork bun (signature dish well made - thin wrap and soupy filling)
- Steamed rice with salty pork and veggies (looks simple but packs a punch in terms for flavour - feels like home)
- stir fried leek with egg (simple but perfectly executed to bring the leek flavour forefront)
- stir fried rice cakes (not a fan usually due to its texture - imagine Korean tteokbokki - but pleasantly surprised 👍🏻)
- smoked chicken (crispy, moist, well-seasoned and off-the-bone goodness)
- deep fried shrimp (well-seasoned and juicy)

If you're hungry:
- crispy duck (crispy but a tad bland)
- braised pork belly with pickled veggie (taste on point but meat is a bit tough)
- sesame rice balls in wine soup (was expecting filled rice ball but 😔)
- deep fried red bean pastry (standard)
- stir fried Shanghai thick noodles (bland and a bit greasy; not a good return-on-calorie)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqHfrNvL-mhB71mFVQ9XK8gNvz45KylQsoOAxM&fid=0x0:0x176090eea54fd623"],"When":"2024-3-3"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Our families came in on a Tuesday late morning and there was a lot of available parking. It’s located across from sun sui wah.
Apparently this place serves authentic Shanghai/Jiangzhe food.

The restaurant isn’t too big. But it also isn’t too cramped. We kept hearing someone from the back kitchen ringing and taping that service bell like there’s no tomorrow haha.
Yes people… the service is gonna be a hit or miss. The owner looked like a cool laid back guy and always smiling but the service staff needs more awareness.

Anyhow,
The hot and sour soup with noodles had ample spice. I wasn’t too sure how I felt about the noodles. The texture wasn’t my cup of tea, but the hot and sour soup was comforting.

Then the salted soy milk donut soup. Oh man. Really nice! If you want a great starter this would be the one.

Pastries came out. Passable. But nothing special or wholesome. I wish the radish filling was more stuffed.

Xlbs it’s passable but I’ve had better. Still delicious with that skin popped with delicious pork broth.

Shanghai noodles. Passable.

Beef fried rice. Delicious. Almost borderline too oily.

Spicy wontons. Dude that spicy sauce is a creeper and it hits the back of your throat. If you don’t have a good tolerance you may cough your food out haha. But delicious. I wish I can buy a jar of that sauce for home. Absolutely delicious.

I would definitely come back again and try dinner 😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIJKEbN5Om6cjyDlMHZtiZaGwtkye1NRw6OYko&fid=0x0:0x176090eea54fd623"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"Michelle Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKcM0YfAevZRMlWNYZap6hsqt2owsBtQua1SViL77-dnaI6eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Overall great Jiangnan and Huaiyang good! Especially recommend Xiaolongbao, smoked duck, stir fried shrimp and sesamw rice ball in wine soup. The service is quick. The place is popular, good to call in advance to book the seat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiSQ6BTqT-0IWX5Awr8oabzfMlmajPP7iSELFn&fid=0x0:0x176090eea54fd623"],"When":"2024-3-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Devi C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVGQckEvlyJkeQEJFuTg1VQJmMMvwWg5ldGYfQkiJC3QjqGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Authentic HK Food, one of my favourite spots. Lunch meals are pretty inexpensive at $16 a dish plus a drink","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJrKqhEfBoSaaEo2JEqsY5RE7yKG0VgBWPSuD0&fid=0x0:0x7a934d25e8d80b35"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Cynthia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhxI3L7sVmZ0mzwHPL_YJnyda4tLGYMZhyF2pdWOvmZjDzt1HI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came bc it was opened late. Food was so awful, I can't even call this place a restaurant. The veggie noodle and rice dishes we got was basically steamed bok choy with some type of soy sauce corn starch slurry that had no flavor. Even the included milk tea and lemon tea was not great. Don't come unless you're desperate.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzryPjSnVHKk-2A8oLnlOcR3UB-u9OzY-6Ep1r&fid=0x0:0x7a934d25e8d80b35"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Rob T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK82dsQDj3cDEylcj4AjamYKFmCJOYd3t37q9vUCEdL5V10oHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Typical HK Cafe, open late, consistent, perfect for reasonable pricing and good portion. Yes, if you get the meal set, baked rice dishes + drink + soup + tip it's about $30 per person, but you can eat for less, and for $30 I struggle to finish it all.

Compared to mcdonalds meal these days the food is 10 x better and not even double the price.

Must eat here","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkQABNxABoNZ1A7p7ON6h-E2ECdORleR7A5d_b&fid=0x0:0x7a934d25e8d80b35"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Lok L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-6wwh6fnxDmzNH3V0bB9cYiaJYEoPn-NBM8huY-rWgPejfOjDCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Strongly not recommended!

The food and soup are all very salty and taste bad. I’ve ordered Pan Fried Shredded Beef & Udon with Black Pepper Sauce, the beef are all over cooked and unable to be chewed and swallowed.
The milk tea tastes like water with milk. It has no “tea” flavour in it at all. So not Cantonese style.
Regret of coming here, would rather go for McDonald’s.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFqKiUV99K2BA9fHxY-xkRI8eZhngO5NIUyXN9&fid=0x0:0x7a934d25e8d80b35"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Rachel Chiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeMKDv8EjlhJCvhUk6MP1sv17jZTP1CTgUFAUwDJGmBnpVtKM8FA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want some good Hong Kong style food, this is the place to be. The food is delicious and portions are large. The pricing is fair and they open late so this is a good late night place to visit! The service may be a little more difficult if you don’t speak Cantonese. The servers work quickly, they focus on efficiency so you can be sure that you’ll get your food pretty fast.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAcWruSlhb6SY2VSSgNXTa_quO-xPstJIlNA8FBVmSmvTTJ-ci=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I came here after seeing a tiktok featuring their baked pork chop fried rice with tomato sauce for $17.35 with tax included. It was pretty good it could have used more sauce. In the tiktok I saw, it was overflowing with sauce but I guess you can't do that in a take out box. Personally I like tomato sauces that are more sweet and tangy. This one was more savoury and rich. The restaurant was packed to the brim even at 11pm when I picked up my order so that must mean it's good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-7RcEe1katQ2X0ICMy01cOmn4rDs3pyffxbAL&fid=0x0:0x7a934d25e8d80b35"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is definitely a go to place for junky comfort food. A hug for the weary soul after a hard day at work. By no means fancy food.. But predictable tried and true common food. Club sandwich with fries, baked pork chop over rice with tomato sauce, seafood fettuccine, creamy soups, noodles, and lemon iced tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFhMQ4YrWDGYTLpTFYBagMYCt5WgOhJBCWTMLi&fid=0x0:0x7a934d25e8d80b35"],"When":"2021-2-6"},{"Name":"Angelica Yee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcQojzbdV9sbLoihEwt6NQe8LJ9Oux6JR_irkYfLyJU1tPYS4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s true, the prices have gone up and the service is non-existent at best, but it is nostalgic and the grilled meats are really good! I always get the 2-choice set meal with grilled chicken/beef or pork, spaghetti, beef gravy, and cream soup. The cream soup is difficult to find these days and it’s really good, reminds me of the kind I had in Hong Kong. The portions are large and the set meal comes with a free drink. If you want something that is predictable and you don’t care about poor service at all, this is a semi-pricey option for you! They don’t take credit and no split bills.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2V50y2BmqOfGe5c-Z1BoXdj4qyW1PRlSEkgXL&fid=0x0:0x7a934d25e8d80b35"],"When":"2023-7-4"}]

title: Chatime
descriptions: A range of sweet & not-so-sweet bubble teas are prepared to order at this relaxed cafe.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been there by coincidence and what a good decision to walk in. The cashier, he was really nice and polite. Clean and organized which perfect for us to dine in and had such a happy  relaxing time. Thai milk tea is always my favorite and they make the best here. Will definitely drop by again if we're in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKhySOxDXDO2o6PRg7Y0aUk08kdyQ99sR41pEZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d894e865e256e8"],"When":"2023-3-19"},{"Name":"Rosalyn L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPN_5czszz6__Y7uHNz5ajvleCb97h-ssOSaZruZT2VkQnv3o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered the ChaTime favourite. It had boboa, custard and grass jelly. Very tasty and did not disappoint.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLBvQGn-wo9rNunci7_9xswnoVM2RmbnKple72\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d894e865e256e8"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Aurora Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGRLQGGQUALeU-qgLfP9ZfVtHxHxiAcKE6odkfGBG0U0QSyWUW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I like that there are options for how much sugar or ice you like for your orders. The taste is ok, price is fair. The seats need new upholstery. When we came, the lady at the counter seem to be impatient, she sounded rushed like expecting that we have memorized their menu and know exactly what to say at the counter. That would be true for regulars, how do new comers become regulars? They were served nicely during their first time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpVJjfBPSEb0o3qKDjd6-ZY5l6LQV0_QH3zb_8\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d894e865e256e8"],"When":"2019-6-4"},{"Name":"Jimmy Feng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVI2sK_QIJ3xQqD4KedXy0JfUW0yeVIGkfEe_AisEOeGdCKHeLtuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"PSA for anyone ordering from Chatime, their “regular size” is literally half the amount of every over bubble tea shop out there.\n\nNone of their marketing material reflects the true portions of their drinks. I would not recommend to anyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1Kdbyr04LNurxNnQAxhM0Md3-bNm2kWkEodeg\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d894e865e256e8"],"When":"2024-4-10"},{"Name":"David Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBII3D955VAAnrAWPW9EH0opBtWWD8Py3qSdtRsCeqdIzfnlfi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a positive experience here. Order was friendly, timely, and the milk tea and fruit tea we ordered were well made and tasted good.  Mind you, it wasn't at a peak period on a Wednesday evening with most people watching the 2018 Olympics Women's Hockey Gold Medal game. Note, they used flavoured syrups for their fruit featured drinks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-9pFbN85w7m6LYaznOAUKVim-1GjJ9uxtrGlX\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d894e865e256e8"],"When":"2018-11-9"},{"Name":"Donna Adelaine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8MLPJVbzbAJZ1CVHMVv371-9n3oUk1rwRlDQK_QVDyOyNFWiD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The people behind the counter and the one making the drinks kept on giggling while we were trying to order. We had to repeat what we wanted a couple of times. Once we received our order, 3 of the 4 drinks were wrong. Instead of apologizing, the person on the counter just looked at the drink and said that they asked us to double check our order, insinuating that it’s our fault. No sign of empathy, zero customer service. The staff were just giggling. I hope they don’t do this with anyone else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Diane (Dineoutwithdee)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJfHVJSjIKAcPEXNIfUcWAtOeYHaXavqJYPtVJZ3lhCbCbpeo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went on a Saturday night and had a really nice visit. The girl at the counter was so nice and helpful! We enjoyed a couple of their special BT21 festive drinks in the super spacious dining area. The place was clean and the atmosphere was nice. I’ll be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDa1lEtbwpoE79st0DTX0urfxOnPoZLYOPDhVv\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d894e865e256e8"],"When":"2022-11-26"},{"Name":"Keira Klose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUApvkJkCdpIxxkIj5Wkvy1pRT7jdWKpuunqtaZRRehnGKMBemo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Staff was welcoming. The brown sugar bubble tea didn’t taste too good and when you ask for less ice they charge you more so watch out everything else was perfect i don’t know if I will come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMa7p-SNB02T2JhS6Sv_QcBCIMZU6a5jTT3y6fW\u0026fid=0x0:0x1d894e865e256e8"],"When":"2020-7-12"}]

title: DAAN Korean Cuisine Restaurant
descriptions: A menu featuring an array of traditional Korean shared plates in a contemporary dining room.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"High chairs","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We came here for dinner on a weekday. The food is OK. The bimbimbap (stone rice bowl) and the fried noodle is preferred but the pork bone soup doesn't have much taste.

Service is fine and there's lots of parking. The entrance is on the north side, next to the Chinese restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOd2A8E58Nt5sYmukxGpgev50JMnHBZ_5A_MKFg&fid=0x0:0xda117bf4b80b187f"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Na","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbWRUtiYRRPvrKwMe6vdozzm8j4VVPvwRIWUtuWvW0eKAOr20j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very tasty. Pancake, tofu stew, and banchan (refill offered, which I love) were all great. Good crisp too texture on pancake and nice and puffy. Tofu stew had lots of tofu (I hate it when there isn’t enough). Also, I don’t have a huge heat tolerance and medium spicy wound up being perfect for me. Spicy enough but not crazy. Good portions. Relaxed place. Would definitely go back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Han Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKmaw2NJPB119jYgpDdApk4wCgGbhzv-tmec1kRm_L6zaws-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I went to Daan for the first time for my girlfriend who loves Korean food!!

The orders were Ttukbaegi Gamjatang, Dakgalbi, and Galbitang.

The overall taste is not strong and is very well balanced.
There were some ingredients that didn't go well with the food, but that was very minor and overall it was good.
The side dishes supported the main dish well, and the kimchi was the best among all the Korean restaurants I've been to so far.

If you want to know if a Korean restaurant is good, try their kimchi.
Places where kimchi is delicious also have good food overall.

Taste: 4.2 / 5
Atmosphere: 3 / 5
Noise: 4.3 / 5
Service: 3.5 / 5
Staff friendliness: 5 / 5
Average price: About $20-30

Since taste varies from person to person, I would like to state that this is my opinion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwCVTWjFtu8ICpwK8gXVf2oaecvzi5BsLLkj8U&fid=0x0:0xda117bf4b80b187f"],"When":"2024-4-12"},{"Name":"K Lalala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxXapcCo4AdN_zvVVlS7iYNxvR2NYgdyEcKW0mLwr4nr4QwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Been here many time usually two person, and the side dish usually give one good size for two time refill for free. But this time i bring my friends here Which is three person and the side dish is still the same size and the waiter is not a good attitude.Such a terrible experience since i come here long time. The food is amazing But the waitress make me feel so upset. She don't even smile. I don't want to tip anything since i feel bad.!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kenrick Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4Qlr-7avGGG_gw-sdMVAbZ5vTLZXDpwcJ4A7g2sjiGekUnOtm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good experience here, wasn’t too busy on the night we went so we had a non-rushed experience. The baby octopus hot plate ingredients were fresh and delicious with a good amount of spice for a cold winter night. The hot plate on its own would feed 3 easily.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzT_eOnuMkmMqbusqrbHFyav_x1PN_eif4m-Tk&fid=0x0:0xda117bf4b80b187f"],"When":"2024-1-19"},{"Name":"Jon Lo (VancityLolz)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyHXIvO6zjUGBm2q5mj88BnbYXYXFce_0_r9hk7c_P-UzKlHQRTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the spicy chicken plate, bulgogi stew, kimchi pancake, and soon tofu soup.

The bulgogi stew was very flavourful, sweet and savoury with potato noodles, a fried egg on top, rice cakes, and lots of beef. We got the mild version for my 3.5 year old daughter.

The kimchi pancake was light and soft with a good kimchi flavour. Good appetizer.

The spicy chicken plate was sizzling, the chicken wasn’t as flavourful on the inside but the spicy sauce it was coated in was great.

The soon tofu soup was spicy and excellent.

All the soups and plates come with a bowl of rice and side dishes.

The restaurant is small, seats about 20. We went on a Saturday at lunch it was about half full. It’s smokey when the kitchen is cooking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuD_lD0rXTHjTTBjA9KHt3TEqarzV-U0okkOw6&fid=0x0:0xda117bf4b80b187f"],"When":"2023-8-6"},{"Name":"Jessica Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbKN7JTB8-geSMCvSN4JUMFRJdzyUw9Zem00rFXxig6jms97b4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Overall, the place is a great place to hang out with family or friends.

Food: the food there was great, and moderately priced. I found the rice cakes there to be really great!

Service: honestly, not bad but not great. Its in the middle. They are there to take your orders, and fulfill your needs, but they don’t exactly try to converse with you. Of course, there is absolutely nothing wrong with that, as they did everything they were expected to. Hence, the 4 stars.

Atmosphere: great! The place is a little small, but it does add to the busy and homey environment. Nice 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVKsfc-TIUFgODo_0c4HPJGJys0JaZNQbf0E2W&fid=0x0:0xda117bf4b80b187f"],"When":"2024-3-19"},{"Name":"t l","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIMDadAdXgjdCR9ryJtJHb7jNI1DR0yfUG8KK9xo-KtDDcIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for the first time.  In my opinion it is one of the best Korean restaurant in Richmond.  All food came out fresh and hot.  Service was good.  Got here at 5:30 on a Friday night already 80% full.  Seated at 6pm and the wait list just about to get longer since they don't take reservation.  Nice & clean authentic Korean food you don't feel heavy after you eat!  Will return for more.

Update:  Oct 18, 2018

BEST bibimbap I've had in my life.  Forgot to take a picture of it

Update: Aug 01, 2021

Still just as good as always.  Quality has uphold well!!!  :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPoFCNXfPR6LGZ3XwbO6WVvOeKjgzywP5-E2xI&fid=0x0:0xda117bf4b80b187f"],"When":"2021-9-7"}]

title: Matsuyama Japanese Restaurant
descriptions: Spacious eatery for traditional Japanese cuisine & a discounted late-night menu.
