user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joshua Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiq_RKExmA89Du8aX-W-ZBs3qCm4qRSNgBD8pl68UG5TZxMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is very good. 100% recommend. They have tea for free (obviously), but for like $7 for chicken noodles and yummy, I would say this place is very good and they have a lot of accuracy. For $40 for 4 people? That is great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOu0U-xz11cnqqS6TRhTwH8hCvx9GZlPtSyN-t0&fid=0x0:0xce85a0905ed35026"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Steve H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeIFQ7pThVW8QAF5q4D6vr1o6Nqtpx6PxHg2w1_efmsz21zkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service, quickly got some food after ordering. Temperature hot iron skillet on the chicken, very hot Udon.  Older place, but clean and inviting.

Parking was tight as it’s in a mini mall. We paid $4.50 for 90 minutes of street parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSS4NAaC65mYobgjcrtAxhMJ0C7SQkkyIW4xVG&fid=0x0:0xce85a0905ed35026"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Joanne T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWUm5wApXaGLdrhdyLnYu0BbbvdpiPo1GB0zmazZcIdHhRZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have reasonably priced combos and bentos for hitting your sushi craving. It's not fancy but still tasty 👍 The sashimi quality was very good and fresh, no fishy smell. The rice wasn't layered too thick or mushy, and the seasoning was just right.

Went on a Saturday for dinner and we were seated quickly for 5 people. The staff were pretty busy, but they still managed to check up a few times for tea, and it wasn't too hard to get their attention for anything. There's ample seating for large groups...though because of this it can get very noisy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPd4m8iIoIlsTjdm80SesuEKNsOMO3299QOOgKy&fid=0x0:0xce85a0905ed35026"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"Chang Wun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXinnRETbtdmwq0G3dzHpocXq4c0y1kT8tCLTmXT5-MPrsCx3WH9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered unagi and beef box. The tempura is fresh and juicy. The steamed egg is good ( should order it first because it took 30 mins)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOI_hiujInpCay2-3A4fU7jmXiUdEA4OD_sQePL&fid=0x0:0xce85a0905ed35026"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Avner Moshe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYODWo2zQqgr_MzOXxMHw4WM9QwqZassGJCosgnkwj6eWjkg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good sushi for an excellent value during the evening happy hour with $5 CAD non vegetarian rolls nad $9 sashimi. The Alaskan roll was the best. There was a wait time to enter. The sushi is fresh and tasty. The ice cream had interesting and tasty flavors. The service was quick and friendly. It's not a fancy place but the atmosphere is pleasant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXp1kx7nZeSLLteLcbSW3itju-KErNgR0Os6aa&fid=0x0:0xce85a0905ed35026"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Adam Johnston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRQ0qYP9WL4FVgPAn1FjwTP7dF5mWcw2Ma8tpf7E7Sqy_-VaHm9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Would definitely recommend the hot food options as they were the highlight! The sushi options could have been better in terms of properly prepping the rice, as it was kind of overcooked and clumpy. Service could have been more attentive too, they forgot to give us plates, utensils, and napkins (and didn’t notice until we brought it up after the food came). They also took a while to address our table in comparison to others who arrived afterwards, multiple times.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyh5TbFE1gg_AlDKY_3ZbGXJHY9xl03FP3cXVE&fid=0x0:0xce85a0905ed35026"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Alexander Hunt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKntg94WsHup3cVgJBk3yO0jaRf4K-ndL2T0xGy94s_gBQtie8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Last time, my friends and I went to Matsuyama to celebrate our friend's special occasion an hour before closing. The staff at the restaurant were kind and friendly to accommodate bigger tables for us. Our group wanted to split the bill based on the table, and the staff had no problem about that. The staff was also friendly even though we were there for some time talking.

As for the food, I ordered a BC roll and it came with two pieces. The prices at the restaurant are not competitive, just similar prices across other sushi/ Japanese restaurants.

Also, there are no party- size combos available for big groups of people. Unfortunately, you will have to order the dishes individually. They also come in small portion sizes. There is also no rice or noodle combo, in case you want to eat a little bit of everything, but do not want the extra cost of ordering things separately.

Overall, the restaurant seems average sized, not too big or small. When it gets busy, I am sure it will be come very hectic. At the restaurant, there is a bar where you can order drinks. There is also a bunch of seating along the windows, as well as throughout the restaurant with different sizes. Parking is limited should the parking lot be full. The washroom is clean and tidy.

I would like to come back again to try out some more of the food before I make my final decision on the restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNfVUQiPDT-bK2tD03txwBgTYScXWHlygjd5gC&fid=0x0:0xce85a0905ed35026"],"When":"2024-2-23"},{"Name":"Chop Scallop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRhJ3jGkAW2uBW411nUhJMGWu_a1QD-kIit5y-DE4VX-IEsw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered takeout, and don't get me wrong, the food was fresh and tasted good. However, their toro sushi feels like a bit of a scam when you order multiple pieces, as half are mixed with regular tuna. The amaebi looks malnourished (see picture). Plus, the seaweed wrapped around the other sushi was soggy and chewy. I also ordered a 1/2 futomaki roll (which tasted good), but despite the person on the phone repeating my order correctly, they still charged me for and gave me a full order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdKKC5RyFzGdxaavNPN2jSUfl-njBtHKliTWyd&fid=0x0:0xce85a0905ed35026"],"When":"2024-10-24"}]

title: Pearl Castle Cafe

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"BDub 247","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTG5NYTeVC-prr_d-bcu-QDkvwa3Gqy_E00b26Ty-0tmu9VN1_uw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried this restaurant because the one we originally had targeted was too small and too busy. We are glad we gavr this place a chance.  They had a good selection of Taiwanese dishes that were well presented and nicely flavored. We recommend the beef noodle soup, noodles texture was perfect and the beef well flavored and tender.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlHNt8eGS3sK8ch6YdEUqDpN_uCCVfwvUZph5M&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Edward Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYTrZ3y9H_TYChGjolO7g9aMfEV8hcGDsa4gSml3kZwLXszA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"the worst pork rib rice I've ever had in my life.  there's no battery at all not crispy.  an oil tastes very old disgusting. the broccoli's are all cold.  either they don't have quality control in terms of who cooks.  or the other location at Richmond Centre is better.  not worth the price I expected some crispy traditional Taiwanese fried pork.   well this week and wet thing that is completely unacceptable.  I will not give any start but I have to choose one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7tWHGYW-6H8-6wo-xsUMhXS0XlwNs_bgq_a2j&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Vivian Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-009goZzhJiHZtSwlU5S0gEdtD2DCLpJdWBJ-g_5KCcg2yKcLsg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A must try if you're in Richmond. Always a yummy time at this OG Taiwanese spot! Good for gatherings/family style meal or individual sets. Very reliable, delicious food and well crafted bubble tea, the boba pearls are always fresh. Fast service and friendly staff. The milk seafood hotpot is my favourite!!! 🤤💖","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8ukgGyU_KOPAG4P_UOD6ISfU0VICaj1kGDnsh&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"TERRY CHENG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsg-oI6sco7O5Go48_oGM2GdPS9ywAc_QfXDXDKM3uhrlF3VpMxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food is okay. Nothing to rave or complain about in terms of taste. My friend rice was not hot evenly through and the fried chicken nuggets were also a little bit too fried. The service was good, staff were helpful and accommodating. The food took a long time to come. Atmosphere is very Asian, IYKYK.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3HOC-K7J9L1_8eePywggkUoTIrcCYON0b-5Jv&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2024-2-24"},{"Name":"Tammy Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWn0N2I5STxk6Dw-kQhoKTxOlHlPrvcouHiB9OgzjAG84pt3M0D_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"TL;DR: bad service, big portions and mediocre food.

Service - 0/1

Servers were rude. It’s inconvenient that we have to order food through the phone especially since we have 2 older grandparents with us. We asked a server if we could order without using the phone and she very rudely told us in Mandarin you have to order through the phone. No one gave us utensils until we asked. Only one super kind server! He had a cap on :) Props to you for being the only server here with proper service training

Food Quantity - 1/1

Big big portions, my sister and I could not finish our foods and had to bring them home for dinner. Lots of noodles and veggies in my vegetarian noodle soup!

Food Taste - 0.5/1

Food is nothing special, pretty mediocre! Loved that the squid tentacles were fried in a thin batter tho! The squid tentacles won the show :)

Overall: 2.5 stars ⭐️

TL;DR: bad service, big portions and mediocre food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR9dcfsArxhRddMaGS7JoTDOtanN3X3Urm5dlR&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2022-4-28"},{"Name":"Grace Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2Gi0ImD_jtFaRjI_I4TvVHE6110eG-TPY1JG8d59XQJNTtA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was great, the service was fast, the only down side is that they dont take credit card. (Cash and e transfer only) first time paying with e transfer @ a resturant. Ordered the pearl bubble hot pot, to be honest, the soup was was too sweet. The 3cup chicken was really good though. Big portion that you will not able to finish in one meal. Also, orders are only taken by the app.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbkYIKElfqcf4oLssqlaMV3G_yp7qxrJ9WgwFy&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2023-12-27"},{"Name":"Phillip Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDxeRsOu_38Vanl3R1pdCGsmerEkppvahiUYpCxDQNLI-FIgqgQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They renovated a while back. This is some of the best places for food in the area. My wife loves it here. We live in Aldergrove and yes we would come all the way down here to eat. Food comes out quick and the staff is very attentive. Must try.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ronald Retandy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiVTWQFKjqXe4UnsBFRIZ7GxF9tGrva9JzQ7uYayyA9RXk6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing spot for good food and good drinks, never disappoints!

This spot has been our go to place for Taiwanese food for the last 8 years at least, and throughout all the revamp and the changes, their food has always been consistently great, with excellent service all around.

So many choices for food and drinks, and I think even after 8 years or so of coming here to eat, we have yet to try every single thing on the menu.

OG spot for sure, and we will keep coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP86gIJQNsMwvppMl42359O13vBEk7OV9IsKipn&fid=0x0:0x12e4a3daadd02be3"],"When":"2021-8-1"}]

about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Hard liquor","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true},{"name":"Wine","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Brunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"High chairs","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Stuart Xue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMJR3m2m3b3A-TFm1gu2Ve7-gZIHc-nb8uoyhBCkgGuF6K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Come here on Saturday to try their Dim Sum.
Nice place to have lunch with many selection.
The Rib beef was very tender and the sou sauce chicken is tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXJv4pi2u10GOT84d9d82rs3lPfOIgy0QZyiA&fid=0x0:0x7a0ab9a4fe12fbf3"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Eddie So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISSdmRal6WEYNToT2BfCZQ0cdumKRhmtyRM82KD93UMkc0-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want a bigger and more roomy restaurant, this is a good choice for you.  The food is good and with reasonable price too.  We have a lot of choices of  dim sum here.
The dinner is also nice for a big group of family and friends. I hope they can take the dishes out more quickly in the dinner time since it is a big restaurant.
We are always eat before taking some pictures.  This time my wife remembers taking some pictures of the food before we eat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML1T8cbmoBgxqpn5EC1ZzHO6L9n2oDuIZqRpnm&fid=0x0:0x7a0ab9a4fe12fbf3"],"When":"2023-4-23"},{"Name":"Victor Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjy8xwih_Af_rbPY5CZXcMRMMEeJ9aCmjonVlZWrsSKLF5EAXw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The restaurant itself is grand and nostalgic, clinging onto the glory days of traditional Chinese diners, and the food is really cheap, but severely lacking.
The preserved egg and lean pork congee was bland and all components were flavourless.
Their custard buns were dry, the dough getting stuck on the roof of my mouth, and the custard itself being salty without much flavour.
The beef rice roll was legitimately disgusting, and though their meatballs utilised a similar meat mixture, it was slightly more tolerable. I enjoyed the bean curd wraps, and the snowy mountain BBQ pork buns were mediocre, but comparatively good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnEY51Qm4PNyokFidRv6ONnyyWtKXSl194fAUu&fid=0x0:0x7a0ab9a4fe12fbf3"],"When":"2023-10-17"},{"Name":"Stella Iu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqkYnRdEWIfhSsrvfK-MC8DnPoLCIe_qKKSWwpVcZUVr-7zhsH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tucked away on the 3rd floor of the parkade, the food is definitely high end amazing.  King Crab cooked to perfection. Portuguese style rice super flavorful. But nothing beats their warm tofu dessert. It's honestly the best I've ever had.

The super high ceilings and large floor to ceiling windows provide lots of natural lighting giving the place a very airy and open feel.  Each person gets 2 pairs of chopsticks - communal use and personal use, which I thought was brilliant since most other places have shared communal sets, if any at all.

The platters are very large.  Suitable for family style and banquets.  It would definitely be a memorable treat for banquet guests and loved ones.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMngJRihP0aD6ej4y5HkI5GHlAWww0Gdy5X8VTv&fid=0x0:0x7a0ab9a4fe12fbf3"],"When":"2022-8-8"},{"Name":"Paul Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWUZ49Ul-3bVyJjJAjiIzsDwRpD0pREaGPqHRlWfDN0XxY4lrGiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice bright newly renovated restaurant on the 3rd floor from the dark ground parking entrance.
Funny that not all dishes is always available on the menu, prepare extra dishes as a backup.

4 stars instead of 5 is because the food quality cannot keep the same level and is inconsistence, depends which day you are going to, perhaps problem is different chef.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqDTBOTZu8zHlKbGY3rWJ0Wl1zDj1Dxo9dN8L2&fid=0x0:0x7a0ab9a4fe12fbf3"],"When":"2022-10-10"},{"Name":"Henry Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhmFNsaF86cbZCyen0CMkPieS_tHSm55NOkNNeTeKiqvoVPSqI9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really enjoyed a clean tablecloth and good service in dim-sum restaurant. This is my goto place for in-n-out of VYR and Richmond. I have eaten at least five times in past two years. Once you parked on the 3rd floor entrance access is directly into the restaurant. All weather and Hustle free parking and don’t think about the chaos at the bottom ground parking. Food is very good and friendly experienced staff provide great services. The pictures of the food will speak for itself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVko0OAON4SpilCQ0HWb8Oivdc2ZvIDlqK8SH8&fid=0x0:0x7a0ab9a4fe12fbf3"],"When":"2022-12-6"},{"Name":"Hamaad Kazmi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLq1yxUWrhhaH6otOahR5Tn2feif5BVjdwAKZi6rgG_68l5TA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this seafood restaurant, I tried their seafood congee, dumplings, and beef noodles and it was the best food experience ever, totally bursting with flavors and the food was cooked extremely well, I am a big fan of their dumplings and beef noodles (a must try) overall menu had excellent options, and I will be back to try more. When we got there the restaurant was bustling, the staff was polite, friendly, and professional, and they helped us get seated and brought us delicious tea while we were looking at the menu, overall this place has a cozy feel to it and the food is high quality and mouth watering. I highly recommend it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Some good dim sum dishes and some that weren't too memorable.  The chicken feet was pretty good with a yummy sauce. And the ground beef with cilantro rice roll (although not that pretty) was quite good. Also liked the coconut and mango jello.

The siu mai was ok but nothing more. I wasn't expecting much from the xiao long bao but it was pretty juicy.

We also ordered the lobster special with efu noodles. While the lobster was ok, it was missing a bit in terms of flavour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlPM-hMXspjb_WX-5Xt1e01qINw2SN4nG6asSA&fid=0x0:0x7a0ab9a4fe12fbf3"],"When":"2022-4-7"}]

title: Mui Garden Restaurant | Richmond
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"No-contact delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true},{"name":"Vegetarian options","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"High chairs","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dave Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL544JfNo-heg8UsP95fr9shcrTY9pTTKZqcIgOMgLc7F2usw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An excellent restaurant that we have been going to for years. The service and atmosphere is wonderful. This time we had a gathering so we did a takeout. The food was great and right on time. Parking is a little limited out front but roof top is available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSlre6XALC4u188kap1CXdylHmEne8gsl7QvaJ&fid=0x0:0x2a9e7def46889dc6"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of my go to's for Chinese food, especially for dinner (lunch is good too). Prices are reasonable .. 4 dishes, soup, 1 barrel of rice, and Chinese dessert for $88 is great. Portions are a little smaller, but if you don't eat a lot, it's sufficient.

They're famous for their curry beef brisket and tendon, and Hainan chicken. The skewers are tasty as well.

They take debit without extra charge so that's nice. Make sure to reserve before hand, or you may not get a table, especially on weekends.

Main issue here is parking. While there's parking in front and up the ramp, the spots are limited given the size of the restaurant, and they are very cramped.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVCiOGy1D-AuqzymW-80LjjFJo3I_hhbDG3aue&fid=0x0:0x2a9e7def46889dc6"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Thomas Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0EkwAbGGit2kBU0zRNIMRjyq3z16xUQ3GbkLjD5gF2gWJpt4j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the Shrimp/BBQ fried rice and the Chicken Curry. Both were very good quality and quantity. I'm used to the curry beingore spicy though.
Service was good, but menu is mostly in Cantonese/Chinese w/ small English sub print. Bring your readers!
NOTE - They don't take credit cards, just debit cards and cash.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAyiyGiDfeU-Px51qI5DsEtyMY6s0etg9Zd6C6&fid=0x0:0x2a9e7def46889dc6"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"R L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDo--fdptHZ71prIhGQPJ7FahkbWrF05rgkw3OmUDlyk4sGVAj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Generous portions, good food. The Hainan chicken's skin was perfect. Oil rice is great. Curry beef brisket is super flavourful. Very satisfied. Their take-out boxes are very nice and sturdy plastic ones so I wasn't worried about spilling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuDfa9Xv-yR1a3FmGfOQnET9VzAUM7qAAjUgge&fid=0x0:0x2a9e7def46889dc6"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Jenn J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXB0I96_JYNwqpM7MHY1pixkSoBk-y5LyusqfFabQQB72HX1B7BGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I've been having their beef brisket curry on rice off and on for quite a few years and it remains my go to place for this dish. The curry is a lot more subtle than most curries (it's Malaysian style). Don't be fooled by the spice level marker - it's not spicy at all, not even by North American standards. TIP: you can save a bit of money by ordering off of the All Day Set Menu (item # 5) between 11:30 am - 9 pm, suitable portion for 1 person.

For this location, it's best to go early when they open to avoid waiting. Very friendly staff and you're greeted with a nice hot cup of Chinese tea when you sit down.

One downside is the temperature of the restaurant was quite cool so my dish got colder faster than I was expecting. Still, worth it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyRFU9c1fYG1QxL_r3S_kUms8yTgYoC7i88Q5O&fid=0x0:0x2a9e7def46889dc6"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Bernie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPXTBFQGy4UZogf6r0hGxUGZ8fvtwePPN5iicbAtQksaWtpwOP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Mui Garden has the best curry in Richmond a few years back.  Last week we got their green curry with rice, Roti dipped in curry sauce and Hongkong style milk tea. We were disappointed. Food quality is below their usual standard. The price is higher by 15-20-%.  Service is terrible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHuw83fvx2Iba6YYWh532WjRfUQT-r2LwvpBS5&fid=0x0:0x2a9e7def46889dc6"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love their curry and pork knuckle
Delicious and reasonable priced
Free parking in front of street and on roof top

Just learned that oil they used might be used for cooking peanut too so if you have peanut allergy be aware","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlnCqKePnk0bcWD3CDu67G0CKEvGjAOqqNGJ44&fid=0x0:0x2a9e7def46889dc6"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Joey Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIncJBLfbVzRO24PRdfxE4-hovZn6C_s4RV_vqsGslULP8YEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I am a fan of the original
Mui Garden on Victoria Drive, but I am. It is familiar with this location. However, this location looked nicer than the original one. It was more spacious with better tables and chairs.

I came to the area for work for a few days and almost came here for almost every meal.

All the food I ordered was very satisfying. Fujian-style stir-fried rice vermicelli, beef brisket and tendon rice noodle soup, stir-fried e-noodles, Hainan chicken, stir-fried broccoli with beef, chicken wings, toasted bun with butter and condensed milk, mix of tea and coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX7QrLwul-Dc2jj7uUNGkwj-HcQM88jEMPQShq&fid=0x0:0x2a9e7def46889dc6"],"When":"2024-6-21"}]

[{"Name":"Ray Lee (ShUwUba)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDFqrSb_xBjzS2wJjYmsdmrKu2DMjqmj4NcxavaQRzyZA3s9J_BA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"100% recommend the salmon rice and also for Pepper Lunch to spread their goodness to the rest of Canada. The staff were kind and friendly, and the vibes were enjoyable. I hope they can stick to non-covers though, the one they had for Life Is A Highway almost ruined my appetite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEl80wjvTGMFSt-8jVqzhscpiHdM7p6j4fhi5O&fid=0x0:0x216a89d9a1b8f760"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Paulina Pedrero Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoiOld2vaC2Dv18bWNi8EDRiykD7MSCRsU3RK7RESh6xQghXxb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My first time tasting this restaurant, y husband and I ordered the classic beef and rice, i add extra mushrooms and bean sprouts, we make it a combo, so it comes with miso soup and soda, the food was good, they have a garlic and a sweet sauce in the table that you can add, the service was fast and the staff was friendly, the only thing i was disappointed about was the meat portion, too small (around 6 small slices).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMspe53Vgq2qgNddW6Cv7wArdotGf4OVvIfzRoH&fid=0x0:0x216a89d9a1b8f760"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"vanto vanto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIccafqWgpXVJNz7rQf3Mi2pFoGK7saOUJlIspaNi9wlwuOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pepper lunch is a well know brand from Japan, I used to have once in Taipei. The meal comes really fast, and for non spicy foodie like me, maybe can ask for less pepper if it’s possible?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiaIQhnMYODbncN5hV0bn3xI7M6yOsGGnE9CqK&fid=0x0:0x216a89d9a1b8f760"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic food for some great prices and great portions! They've got plenty of dishes to choose from on the menu, all variations of the sizzling hot plates! We also forgot our jacket here a week prior, and they are happy to hold on to it until we came back! Definitely will be coming back here again! I highly recommend their spicy pork plate :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWQKrQaZooVWJm-gArylBIGCxiG7zf839FGTIx&fid=0x0:0x216a89d9a1b8f760"],"When":"2024-4-3"},{"Name":"Biker Jdm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIT6ln2aaSiI1Q_voAgfwzHZ4fNeyYngC9E665PHIzgjJrcMw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Good Service .
I never had bad meat like this. We literally couldn’t eat it.
I used to come here all the time but I think this is gunna be the last .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-3y6Ugttg6rRopZ-ZZ1FpduWGL32fTRrYrwhI&fid=0x0:0x216a89d9a1b8f760"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Nathan Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULis9x-C7u8jouJ6bmV-m7Mb2r-esn5uJaOqGwjwAA9z2MADUV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food and service was good. Fast and easy. I got the classic beef with rice and it was great with the sauces they provided. Would recommend trying this first.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOc2dSeHGuGxJs0d5z4SYkN7mRd4AJzuQUWOiwr&fid=0x0:0x216a89d9a1b8f760"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Brigitte wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKaaQ2l5cGTVtA63M253tCCc2SrsbKHzfP_QvdvBpgWzOwezA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"one of my go to spots! incredible food and service! staff even gave me a phone stand to use since i was playing on my phone and they always offer me soda refills !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTIWKu6Cr5tJPg5S-fcpuPbjFRQvncM5FFpu-g&fid=0x0:0x216a89d9a1b8f760"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Adrian Torino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI9dSAfw-7UTYYunGGifd3UMcpQDU3BkyOZ5dXVAmXbL6fxVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the pepper rice beef curry from here a few weeks ago. Wanted to try as I love sizzle platters.

Beef was tender and the curry ties all of the items together. Curry provides much flavor and pairs great with the beef and rice. Loved the mushrooms and egg as well. The order came with a soup as well, awesome for when its cold out.

Would love to try their other sizzling dishes in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMY9tjy8KaGcarxrxQPVuBOyelM2qooBExdupwP&fid=0x0:0x216a89d9a1b8f760"],"When":"2024-1-25"}]

[{"Name":"Ian Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIlw4lo7nBNe6mWx3elJnNKC3z8f7gTO1YWhjd14FzECUuOBLI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot for brunch. A little off the main area; but it’s easy to get to. Had the lobster max and cheese, crab benny, and all-American breakfast! Service was solid and pricing was reasonable. Even on Labour Day; it was easy to get a booth for 4.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7O5vA02Bw6edkL-s32YILxx68HfKevau7k-oX&fid=0x0:0x47505ece0f6d256a"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Celeste Paredes-Miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2LLDcRqRu9fSHgE2AOTrWFdMMetSSdQP_pAfYAjzx8gCAtMOr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Honesty this spot was amazing but I was slightly disappointed in the lobster mac and cheese. It’s more of a simple lobster pasta with some normal cheese on top. I wish it was a bit better in flavour and more traditional in mac and cheese style.
The waffles we got were super yummy, I can’t wait to come back and try more of their items I believe their food is good I just think the one selection we got wasn’t the best and underwhelming.

I don’t remember her name unfortunately but our waitress beautiful Asian young lady working on Sunday around 2pm she was absolutely amazing, really tentative and super nice and friendly to talk to it made the atmosphere very welcoming and nice. Thank you for your service I hope you read this and I hope you get 100x raises 😂❤️❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNx2yJWbyJeFCee8cAbV1hOIuRvPaP4bSEsY-8W&fid=0x0:0x47505ece0f6d256a"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Eggspectation Richmond
Location:
10551 St Edwards Dr, Richmond, BC V6X 3L8

On a pleasant morning, we decided to venture out for breakfast and chose Eggspectation, drawn by its reputation and convenient location. Upon arrival, we were warmly greeted by our waitress, whose welcoming demeanor set a positive tone for our visit.

Food:
Our meal consisted of two main dishes:

1.	Steak Frites:
A 10oz AAA steak, accompanied by herbed garlic butter, fries, and a mixed salad with balsamic dressing.
The steak was ordered rare, and while it was well-seasoned, the texture leaned toward being slightly tough. The portion size, however, was generous, which is always appreciated. The fries were passable but lacked any distinguishing features, much like the salad, which was standard fare.

Rating: 7/10

2.	Eggspectation:

This dish featured a 10oz AAA strip loin paired with two sunny-side-up eggs, toast, and Lyonnaise-style potatoes.
Once again, the steak was ordered rare, and though it was adequately seasoned, it was a bit challenging to chew. The toast was serviceable, and the eggs were prepared well, with a good balance of seasoning. The Lyonnaise potatoes were a highlight, adding depth to the dish. Overall, the meal was satisfactory, with portions that were ample and filling.
Rating: 7/10

Drinks:

•	Iced Tea:
A refreshing choice, with a sweetness that will appeal to those who enjoy their iced tea on the sweeter side.

Rating: 9/10

•	Tropical Paradise:
A vibrant blend of banana, strawberry, blueberry, raspberry, mango, and pineapple, balanced with orange juice.
While the concept was appealing, the execution left something to be desired. The drink was enjoyable but failed to leave a lasting impression.

Rating: 7/10

Ambiance:

The ambiance of the restaurant is one of its stronger points. The space is both cozy and expansive, offering comfortable seating that invites you to linger. The decor is ok yet warm, contributing to a relaxed dining experience.

Service:

The service was a standout aspect of our visit. Our waitress was attentive, accommodating, and ensured that our needs were met promptly. Her professionalism and friendliness elevated the overall experience.

Rating: 8/10

Price:
The pricing was reasonable, particularly given the portion sizes and the overall quality of the food.

Verdict:
In summary, while the steak dishes were well-seasoned and generously portioned, the texture left something to be desired, even when ordered rare. The rest of the meal, though satisfactory, did not exceed expectations. However, the pleasant ambiance and excellent service made for an enjoyable dining experience overall. I would be inclined to return to explore more of their menu offerings, as there is potential for standout dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlLK7zykKa-myAVscpuZtkI_SalNqUjQ5mQ5MW&fid=0x0:0x47505ece0f6d256a"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Isabelle M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjnyGmGPWOlMXQLMXfzyDVTGb4-cQ0NOmpHt9HtPktObHyCwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is delicious and not overpriced, their food portions are huge and I was considering ordering dessert however I could not make it through half of my food. I removed one star for service, they have a rule for only 2 hours sitting however your food takes 40 minutes to get to you, so I felt a little bit rushed and not able to properly taste the food.
The waitress was really nice and friendly, and offered us drinks right away but I felt like they need more staff since they are so busy and their staff can not keep up with how busy it was (Sunday, around 12:30pm by the way).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOu8Bpna-7xT0RmBEYGUjImcK2XyIKcbYMiVuZE&fid=0x0:0x47505ece0f6d256a"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Mary Catherine Brady","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUStg0ExGdLoBecRVHB8TP7o9lSTDgIDHNyeOAQn1axyPBZYscOJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped for brunch the day after the Eras Tour and had an amazing breakfast!!  The restaurant was the 💣 bomb and I cannot wait to go back again. The potato's were out of this world!! Love it, love it, love it!!! Breakfast is my jam!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeFnLyi8zDg70QdKrBhVyr2iNJoezmyP35ky_e&fid=0x0:0x47505ece0f6d256a"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Sandra Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS3d7aZA4lMhkB4lrjOTrDjB_p6PvngmeWQeM0VFHPfzqli2Uc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Everything tasted good. The only thing was that the sunny side up eggs were undercooked, but they gladly remade them for us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2JCGes_lvr7yapCgpDcOUlCRELhETwMdlqbXt&fid=0x0:0x47505ece0f6d256a"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Ben Berland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyKnQ0dVG2zq5Svh1qK74vKo8AB2YadR9pFDlI3HwVNmKcqxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in here after seeing the conference I was at, featured the infamous continental breakfast.  A croissant and cantaloupe slice would not do, so Google lead me to this fine place.

If you go, order the smoked salmon eggs benedict.  I promise you, you will not regret it nor forget it.  Quite simply put, it was one of the best eggs benny I've ever eaten.

Excellent service all around.  Ample coffee and smiles.

Great place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwxBoyl-zAe6DBqhGEHe-lUsdhjn6gUejbNg&fid=0x0:0x47505ece0f6d256a"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Danny Yan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLRPWWKcVdRHeoB-9RWRILXmiR2bwZnV4LcEulNAzluWALah6_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was trying it out for the first time.  Wasn’t eggspecting much.  Dining room was pretty much empty when we got there (not a good sign).  But to our surprise, the food was eggcellent!!  Prices were fair, portions were good!  Service can improve.  But overall, liked it a lot!  Will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOykaDI0m-vPQq2IOAB7RlNEJWwBM0IIuPWRpY7&fid=0x0:0x47505ece0f6d256a"],"When":"2024-5-29"}]

[{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably the most expensive bubble tea I’ve ever gotten but I got no regrets! You pay for the quality ingredients they use - from the fruit to the milk options. It was delicious 🤤! I swear they used a whole mango for my drink 🥭. I was mango’d out after! It was a whole meal.  Oh and the strawberry one was delicious as well but I’d still go for mango again next time (cause it’s my fav fruit and the drink is amazing!)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPy36mPLGwELgLkojrn8k0rJc9dNsmxCvAkiKLu&fid=0x0:0x740035c02a0621d2"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Audrey T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVt7NSeCmrDxjN6eGFiHdOku-giePvd1JuUbLyAEp6odBtHY6vv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nostalgic spot for bubble tea in Richmond. Mango drinks are always a favorite here. On the pricier side now but ingredients taste fresh. I also enjoyed the matcha mochi egg waffle - came out hot and crispy with a bouncy filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_kxuioUaraVlLpEtXCiJwjLXtiC9jc0erglMN&fid=0x0:0x740035c02a0621d2"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for the ice cream festival.   The Mango trio and the Bueno Soft Serve was pretty outstanding.   Although the mango trio was a tad overpriced,  but it was well worth it.

The service was a little slow, but it was also because they were so busy as well.  However, the cashier was not the friendliest.

Plenty of parking,  so just need to watch out for the crazy drivers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOW4o_IKJD7SqufDrGkdYHzooWvSAja_hmtiprY&fid=0x0:0x740035c02a0621d2"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Edith Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJmOen6EtIl7Ej_JFqybjeY6J0ua3WQel6_FE_xI_4sbCJAgJF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The portions are generous and the mango trio was superb. It was also quite messy, but that part can't be helped.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4QN5yWbL67m2ogX7IaLQahtRhtNl9V4Q4O8fm&fid=0x0:0x740035c02a0621d2"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Meiler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULwPxPWpWeXsZfCYlZ_s1SpG7BU2H42saEiEXpkixEPkQz42uk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very refreshing bubble tea place, I ordered the Mango Cubes Slush and it came with very sweet and ripe mangoes. Customization options for the drinks are amazing and caters to any preferred taste. The staff are also super friendly and are able to accommodate and recommend favourites.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOj3ncA2oiQqikJ6pjWJFCNXbco9idnu4b2Kn4S&fid=0x0:0x740035c02a0621d2"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"DANICA DG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj8yVKC3dNCSLVLekHGiPlGf0ppRbR1ZDLgf-FYq7onHLSuVle=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Real mango for mango cravings folks. Limited seating, the mango drinks were not as sweet. 4 of us pretty much shared everything and still had left overs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNY6PZlG9PeZgoFQ1PjNu4PLv18THQWkHv0VWbI&fid=0x0:0x740035c02a0621d2"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Bella McGregor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUetQrmjHmEpGufmH6WhVsO_zIhDzMNtz4OIwwo__pvQhdZPk0E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go to spot for mango cube slush deliciousness! Love the big chunks of ripe mango. Hubby loves the Thai iced tea. Been ordering from Bubble Queen for years, and they are always consistent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpkcy3Z92sZceDumIEr7fgSPCq-5GiLYkh-KIO&fid=0x0:0x740035c02a0621d2"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"L P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU42gHWE7kW5I8KmS2Ydkkt8bmnj0QmM6GEUt5AK_12URXrkQsGzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Wow. This place calling itself Bubble Queen obviously doesn’t know how to make bubble waffles.

On the 24th May,2024 at around 5:50pm i ordered a bubble waffle here with Portuguese tart filling. The damage was around $9.5 I didn’t have high hopes, but I didn’t expect the shells on the waffle falling apart, crumbing down the paper bag the moment I stepped out of the store. (See Picture 1)

“Oh well it sucks but guess it will suck harder as time goes by so might as well eat it now before it’s too late” I was chowing down the crumbling waffle shells and two minutes passed… the waffle got soggy (see picture 2)

I really hoped this only bubble waffle place in the grid to work… because it’s the only bubble waffle place in the grid! I’m writing this hoping you guys would make things right- do your job and give your staff proper training. I want to support this little store but tbh it will take one full refund and another test run to rebuild the trust in this place again…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiq8fCxTK3CzR3HvYh2cOi5T2uH6gpljESFdC3&fid=0x0:0x740035c02a0621d2"],"When":"2024-5-25"}]

title: Pause n’ Sip Richmond 忙里偷闲
address: 4000 Number 3 Rd unit 135, Richmond, BC V6X 0C7
open_hours: {"Friday":["12–7 p.m."],"Monday":["12–7 p.m."],"Saturday":["12–7 p.m."],"Sunday":["12–7 p.m."],"Thursday":["12–7 p.m."],"Tuesday":["Closed"],"Wednesday":["12–7 p.m."]}

about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"No-contact delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"renee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_WU070TGgPtW8TWSh1-x1L8TFwvHJh4FkvNUPfFWve6f_CnpE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is by far my favourite bubble tea spot in Richmond! The service here is always exceptional and I feel so welcomed each time ☺️The drinks are delicious and refreshing and the cozy clean environment makes it the perfect study spot! So far I’ve only tried the peach cheese slush and assam pearl milk tea but I’m looking forward to try more drinks 💕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfa57EWfs3MrIlSoOwlZmUjNp4zWBMGZMrV90t&fid=0x0:0xf1d9708e2616eca4"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Ingrid Wu (Miso_Miso)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgRJEIuhtghT7iVkULciqa6MDMg7BC9km5HTsNMMQUYPwzJz97=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Last Saturday, my friends and I ordered their pineapple lemon soda, osmanthus milk tea, and fresh taro milk tea with taro balls. I tried and loved every single one of them!
The pineapple lemon soda was incredibly refreshing and ideal for a hot day!
Osmanthus milk tea is the bubble tea that I always prefer, and they have created it with just the right balance of floral aroma and milk. I requested 30% sugar and it was just right, unlike some other bubble tea places where the drinks often remain  too sweet even though I’ve asked for the same amount of sugar. If you like taro milk tea, make sure to try their fresh taro milk tea with their taro balls! The quantity of fresh taro inside was extremely dense, and their taro balls were very chewy and perfect sweet!

They are located at ground level, outside Aberdeen station facing No. 3 road. It is somewhat  concealed near the bus station. My recommendation is to park inside Aberdeen centre when going there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNA4B8adqRDKlRtLpnXxOQ5WFOMBwFeI1Fzu9f1&fid=0x0:0xf1d9708e2616eca4"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Emily He","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURnqH_Lawdutczcou5wsiIPRF86K5yhb2vBurqT2FNA-yo4t5njQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am beyond perplexed as to why there's not enough rave for Pause n' Sip.

Their drinks are by far the best in this city, and being a local here for decade+, I don't leave reviews.
I rather just enjoy the good places I know. But this place needs its due justice.

Their ingredients sell out mid day due to demand, and my friends and I have waited for them to restock 30+ minutes several times now. In fact, we are waiting as I leave this review.

Personal recommendation: any soda drink. I've gone and tried each of them more than once all on separate occasions. Pinapple, pomegranate, lychee, you name it. Best of best.

Close friends rave their milk tea and pearls. One’s waiting for another 25 minutes for her peach pearl milk tea right this moment.

They do not disappoint. I've wished to have a bigger stomach so I could down 2 of their drinks at once several times by now.

I've ranted for too long. Honestly, go the entra mile if you must - to give this place a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO3KUr4Vefj7B5zJNzCz-4Kt5_Y8A8lAUcUgV0&fid=0x0:0xf1d9708e2616eca4"],"When":"2024-2-24"},{"Name":"Flora Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNs7etU0kW9GGBfwVoaBiTm6FX8c0FLo0Qg-rOeDW1bMeuJ0kA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I never expect amazing customer service from bubble tea stores but Pause n’ Sip is truly outstanding! The first time I went, the staff were so helpful in giving me recommendations after they saw I was having trouble choosing a drink (the menu offers more specialized / unique flavours than other places). I originally picked a topping that doesn’t go well with a type of drink I hadn’t had before and they kindly suggested one to make sure I had a good experience. When I came back another time to claim a deal I’d received, they were having issues with their POS system. It wasn’t a big deal to me at all but the staff were so sweet and accommodating and really exceeded my expectations again.

The drinks themselves are delicious; they taste as good as they look. The store is well kept, attractive, and is overall a lovely spot to hang out in. I highly recommend visiting if you’re in the area — you won’t be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOa4OJQHFz4K6e8pElRFMogMVXlwQC13h36fn83&fid=0x0:0xf1d9708e2616eca4"],"When":"2023-3-9"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There is fierce competition in the market, but this establishment stands among the top. The beverages offered here are remarkably refreshing and delicious. The mango drink, believe it or not, contains real mangos! The interior is new and provides a comfortable ambiance. The service is excellent, and I truly hope they continue prioritizing customer satisfaction because if they do, they will slay their competitors with ease.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP51IlCh21WMpNayM7Y_3PySSzj483y8udauUyg&fid=0x0:0xf1d9708e2616eca4"],"When":"2023-5-20"},{"Name":"Bianca Lok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLQf55yrLfuQpaVH5_PAPb-xLqdrIrBA83-7_og5_ndyF7MIm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This bubble tea shop is beside the entrance of Aberdeen Square on the outside, just beside the skytrain station.

The interior is aesthetically decorated. It is a clean and quiet environment, making it a good place to hang out or study.

Even though they have classic milk teas, their menu is quite unique, offering a different taste to what you would be used to when getting bubble tea.
There are milk teas, fruit teas, fruit sodas, yakult drinks, and more.

I don’t like milk teas very much but rose milk tea has me going back!!
The pomegranate lychee soda is perfectly tuned, not very sweet and very refreshing.
I also got to try their taro milk with oreo and purple yam. It’s a bit thick but worth trying at least once.

The staff and owner are all super nice, friendly, and accommodating. I went in once not knowing it was literally 2 mins before closing. They still took my order and offered an alternative topping as they were prepping to close.

They currently do not allow reusable cups. Not a crucial need, but would like to use my own cup some time.

10/10 would recommend giving their soda and specialty drinks a try. Their selection will definitely have you going back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkm2kHit9NLYg2IeE9GRmkdpfO-g3U-IwPkBIw&fid=0x0:0xf1d9708e2616eca4"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"Katie Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1s-9bqkqJTd232cNw3dAg2-iGz-_yFMyQQ-z97NTzxoPjZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friends and I had a great time here! We passed by this bbt shop on our last day in Vancouver and we really needed something to drink. The guy that was helping us with our order this afternoon was very helpful in recommending drinks to us, which left us very satisfied with our drinks. Very friendly staff and refreshing drinks. Sending love from Toronto!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEleXuMt2R75gOFT4NZTFcoRhmzZexG90aFvOy&fid=0x0:0xf1d9708e2616eca4"],"When":"2023-6-28"},{"Name":"James Kan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk_o12iCtyO0gE_QoPCj5qJ7UUQkuic2cEzUnsQvn8LpSf4EV-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fully load with fruit and real stuff in Milk Tea or Soda, refreshing tasting brings me comfort drinking experience.
Not like many milk tea drinks, after you drank you feel so rich and strong, but your body does not feel good.

The store is located beside the Sky-train station, not inside the Aberdeen building.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoXT0WgOfNJ7t_IzdLw6ns2WSvU3n_lTT9QMvd&fid=0x0:0xf1d9708e2616eca4"],"When":"2024-2-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"David Sheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLyqqdoSxO8_09hTasSMmxRKIAiD7yhaUMiugV8IG4FPeT3KDoL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Cavu Kitchen Bar in Richmond certainly knows how to draw a crowd with their National Burger Day BOGO deal.

The initial service was commendable, with a server who was both attentive and friendly, setting a positive tone for the meal.

The nachos, however, were a letdown, lacking the robust topping variety one might expect, and while the cheese quality surpassed that of Good Co, the absence of salsa left the dish feeling incomplete. The smash burgers, a highlight in theory, fell short in execution with under-seasoned patties and disproportionately large buns that detracted from the overall moisture and flavor.
The fries, too, were a disappointment, promising crunch yet delivering a softness that defied their well-cooked appearance.

As the evening progressed and the restaurant filled, the attentive service waned, with a noticeable delay in receiving the bill. Observations of other staff members attending to tasks while my server was overwhelmed suggest a potential mismanagement of duties. This experience leaves one pondering the disparity between personal experience and the glowing reviews Cavu Kitchen Bar has received.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6_X3uyaS0PsCnyoMPkXmBxzbp3rrTSI0fLxKY&fid=0x0:0x9a24da6028bc44b9"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Reilly videos Games","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDebdSxW4i3fCCuDyEg4qjUboi7kZm60BzHcCT6gi5MHuU-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I decided to throw my husband, a surprise 50th birthday party and CAVU popped up in my list. I live in Richmond which made this place super convenient and having my workplace close by I had great experience coming to this place before. With a limited budget in mind, I also don’t want to compromise the food, ambiance & overall experience for our love ones and this place had checked all the boxes for me. Dharm & Rishi communicated very well & right away each step of the way. They are so accommodating including menu options, set up and small request here & there were all assisted in a very timely and smooth fashion. Their staff was friendly & helpful and had smile on their faces the whole time, we had a lovely bartender throughout the night (shoutout to him for being so kind and generous! He was the cherry on top of our night) and everyone was as thankful as we are- such a positive environment to be! The ambience is restaurant style but had that classy vibe that makes you feel that you are in a special place. The food was all delicious, it was a buffet and the food was filled all the time, plus the staff at the carving station had this great welcoming smile when he was serving the food. Parking was free for everyone as well which is fantastic. I got a lot of compliments from my guest, thanks to Dharm , Rishi and their Cavu Restaurant team- certainly made my husband party more memorable & special than it already is. As for the price, it is unbeatable and very affordable, amazing places like this still exist! It’s definitely a hidden gem in Richmond and I highly highly recommend everyone to support restaurants like these who strives to provide amazing service while being mindful of the prices they ask from their customers. Thanks again Cavu Restaurant team, Kudos to all of you!  - MB","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgfA5tQHqmeD7PcwSc7_-abniS3wrq-c3fEGxM&fid=0x0:0x9a24da6028bc44b9"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Elvis Foster Jr.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsN6ZkhmQPh8W_5TojnQElHouzrCwY_TlKIswfxFoBKkdw96K5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I'm pleasantly surprised with the food here. Well presented. Good flavors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvZ5BDOmWLGLL7g4hPL2Ui4T499kfaFdA7r7US&fid=0x0:0x9a24da6028bc44b9"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Dorothy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2J6gxEc9-bp4oRKRy789Vjh-yJKbnbcdw-Mc_iV5gPcomB_o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The risotto is very soft and mushy. The chicken burger was mediocre, the chicken was quite thin. The pork belly and ribs was ok. Our server was nice and attentive. This restaurant is not busy so it's a good place for meetings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgKf47tip41GBMfMeJmTM_ippUxFnPPmht1sO1&fid=0x0:0x9a24da6028bc44b9"],"When":"2023-12-14"},{"Name":"Julian Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmVaZUvzqUEe4YBgOKpkfc-l6TCT14mUfdd7xJk7HbssYnUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Went for lunch on Tuesday for their BOGO special. It was half full when we arrived. It took 40 plus minutes for our burgers to arrive. I also ordered a seafood chowder.  It was bland, and it seemed like they ran out of salt and seasonings. I put salt and black pepper myself, and still no taste. I can only taste the sweetness of the onion. Both burgers were bland too. The vegan burger was soft and horrible.  It was not cheap too.  Their Signature burger was way off. A whopper would taste better than that. Don't waste your time and parking was expensive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1Xd-rkwyz16bTyW6vW2T3dJ8u4ztybF-v5EUJ&fid=0x0:0x9a24da6028bc44b9"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I visited CAVU for the BOGO burgers on #internationalburgerday and enjoyed the experience. The sautéed onions were a nice touch on the Cavu Burger, giving it a great natural taste with perfectly cooked onions, smoked cheese, and bacon. However, if you're after a saucy, messy burger, this isn't the one for you. I'd recommend the smash burgers instead. If the Cavu Burger were priced like this regularly, the place would be packed. As a frequent burger enthusiast, I'd hate to see this burger not get the exposure it deserves. That's my suggestion to management.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0pvqNNG_NBD5fdyrRW0nYDHhL10oh_h9wgu_V&fid=0x0:0x9a24da6028bc44b9"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"David","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJg_i0jcrkBGQ5zVNPxcWfY5xb8PdbtJbC3WlSVVcV_W6OPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ate dinner here, stayed at the hotel.

Was served by Hannah, very pleasant, cheerful smile and a good attitude. I sat on the corner by the street (her suggestion), good for a rainy, cloudy day.

I ordered a margarita, with a coconut rim.  Well flavored even this far from the our southern neighbors.

Also ordered a Caprese salad with goat cheese, salted pepper wings, and a salmon and Yukon gold potato chowder. All were flavorful and well seasoned.

The food came out at a reasonable pace, and my water was refilled without me asking.

Hannah was really the star with her fantastic service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDq8wWOHEXdjpyz-XWcMtGXiQHFo_ZjJlgrJy6&fid=0x0:0x9a24da6028bc44b9"],"When":"2022-6-6"},{"Name":"Sukhi Multani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNKMMuqWym9OQCRfciJHIfOr2K0hsuU8z0QdCWhKVFSU-wobba=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you Allison for the amazing service and to the chefs in the back for preparing an amazing chicken burger/ fries.

Very relaxing environment near the airport so if you’re in the area and would like to enjoy a well prepared meal, I definitely recommend this spot.

First time trying Cavu Kitchen and it won’t be the last that’s for sure!

Great work team.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ellie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzPXm7yzmjwIi7z40aX-XbcjL84D3EATyCX-2d4N01jMWZel46SQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love their Oreo mochi milk tea since it is my go to drink of choice. I wish they had 30% sugar option because 50% is still a bit too sweet. Other than that, the service here is good but there are some occasions where the staff does not notice customers entering the store because of the huge signs covering the window where the cashier normally stands.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNi3f7D-vuWqFmnfgY1PiudqPqB_nx3Q_aYvJRn&fid=0x0:0xbeca2cb01f9cf4d9"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"Toni Anne Tajanlangit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0ymDhbmyIxMZ7bUKQJTmgF2r3wn_dJCpiyPnY96pCFIpPOw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Picked up a BOGO offer from uber eats. Fleshy mango slush with coconut milk 2 for $9.35. It was good. Will come back to try more interesting flavors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRiVCX0q7r10t9bC4LGyJfSnipk_hSEZZ92J_1&fid=0x0:0xbeca2cb01f9cf4d9"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Laura Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtiSLYZ_v-k3n1J3v_J89nk8p15U4Kzr5DvU3QkqpqeGiecg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It was good until they started reducing the fruits. The same fruit tea we got during summer is now half the amount of fruit we got 10 days ago. My friend also had the same issue with their mango drink - also less mango. Just cos it’s not in season doesn’t mean the patrons should get dinged on the amount of fruit!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sweets Fanatic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKT4q9vq4bFnKURKLo-IuFZkNgSUZrYyHCHwVq7PvVTaTofHHc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered a purple sticky rice and tofu milk tea. It was surprisingly good despite the only option being either 100% sugar or 50% sugar. The sweets were a bit too expensive for my preferences but there milk teas are good in size and price.

Will come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnb11M2C-JoviitzpFNEdVSNYh8XNCro_VnO9s&fid=0x0:0xbeca2cb01f9cf4d9"],"When":"2022-9-16"},{"Name":"Ray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGVd5s-06Fr3JDo-bYWWNiziS7uiGN7g2hEorOk1Vp-qtDK_-cTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really tasty. I loved the Brulee Oreo Milk Tea, Brulee Boba Milk Tea, and Coconut Pudding Strawberry Coconut Milk. Strawberry Dorayaki is great but small for the price. Same with Matcha Mochi Cookie. Sea Salt Oreo Box cake was okay. Unfortunately I didn't like the Pumpkin Mochi at all. Would buy the drinks again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO9psHA5fJyBxybHkzn-pJnu-dOCa6ZdJkkJlT&fid=0x0:0xbeca2cb01f9cf4d9"],"When":"2023-7-20"},{"Name":"Tony H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4iwkPfc8cBtJSYR3BiViC9KJBg8yUWbPVhSbTSGqN7VfXMx-Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Used to my favourite bubble tea shop. I placed an online order yesterday, but couldn’t pickup in time. Tried to call them five times but no answer at all. It seems like their phone line exists just for fun. They just tossed my drink away at the end of day and told me to contact the platform.

I don’t think I will ever go back again and neither will my friends. What a joke.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEGhGvCVHJ0rc1yTm9UxnAOBOCqtLKZepf7_02z92wsrykmuOn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got their orange tea with BOGOF  promotion on ubereats.
It was amazing!
Their packing and cups were good, not cheaply made, and it got a lot of fresh oranges and limes inside 🥹
Very refreshing!
I'll visit in person soon to try more menue from them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6J7gTW5y3Pt9f-WR6QV0oDy4jZWEH_BIOif-L&fid=0x0:0xbeca2cb01f9cf4d9"],"When":"2023-4-11"},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The boba here is phenomenal, and there’re plenty of boba places in Richmond to compete with! Their sweetness and flavour is just right, at 100% sugar/ice, and the shop is very cute. It is a little small, and doesn’t have a table to sit at, but they also have some baked goods, which are also quite tasty! I highly recommend the oreo mochi milk tea and brûlée boba milk tea :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKr59fJi6ETZ45fwFnjq0Swi6gZ3ksybFIy2ga&fid=0x0:0xbeca2cb01f9cf4d9"],"When":"2023-4-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Moving Coffee Roastery is a true hidden gem for coffee enthusiasts. Despite its modest size, this shop offers an impressive variety of coffee beans that cater to every palate.

I opted for the iced black coffee, which was not only strong but had a delightful fruity note, making it a unique experience. Curious about their morning whisky, I plan to try that next time!

My friend had the hot black coffee and was impressed by its quality, rating it well above average.

The staff add to the charm of the place with their friendly, family-style service. I’m already looking forward to my next visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-Qd47VtLJeSwcJ6h4olMLGd20oEZ_b74ul9Fa&fid=0x0:0xdfd45837c0f45659"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Henry Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW30GbzSiz_7FsJEKsd9lDOXqxRLnC29Zisa5Fit2ZcXcZ_wxE-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always fun popping into specialty coffee shops and tasting various coffees on menu. Got a flight of three Colombians, and enjoyed the fact that I was given an opportunity to smell the grinds before the pour over. Each one had its own unique taste, and glad I went from lightest to strongest / fun tasting.

Great hole in the wall spot for specialty coffee enthusiasts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvJlj5JUbJsT4YUPlBtWbuhMAdXKXBmBBo4GgR&fid=0x0:0xdfd45837c0f45659"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Thomas Klepl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNkiLx1pYlEhknROO8rbC0zofRaR8U4AYqXiXXLowpwh5VInq1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Expensive and decent specialty coffee in an industrial area. Had high hopes but they wouldn’t grind the beans for me. I was travelling from out of town with an aeropress so I wanted good coffee but I don’t travel with a grinder. The nice woman at the counter said she wasn’t able to grind the beans for me due to owner’s policy. Said he didn’t want people to blame the shop if the flavour wasn’t good. I think the owner should stop overthinking things and let the people behind the counter handle the customer service. I ended up having to take the beans to a grocery store to grind them which was inconvenient and pretty silly considering the coffee shop has grinders sitting right there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3wEuJvtgZqP7xLxdQwAyNWtzXMd0aYuXVVSwa&fid=0x0:0xdfd45837c0f45659"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"kayu lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDsSwgzAteg_-B-4YdMH-HV2JC-Zt0FrY-UrEWX5ZkiN_UEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"READ AND THINK BEFORE YOU GO.
WORST Customer Service ever. Terribly rude and ARROGANT owner.

Their website said complimentary shipping across Canada for orders over $45.
We ordered $100 ish worth of coffee beans and have them delivered to our place. One bag was missing.

We contacted the owner. First thing they do was to asked a friend of mine (who briefly worked for them as delivery before) to just pick it up and hand it to me. We rejected and kindly asked them to use the same delivery method and drop it off at my building concierge. They first rejected and insisted bringing me the bag of coffee face to face lol And then all in a sudden texted me saying they are shipping the coffee with FedEx the next day.

A week later, I still didn’t hear anything. All I saw on fedex is that they have my package and there’s no estimate delivery date. I contacted the owner again. He said that means they lost the package.

He then said due to the complexity of the area I live, they won’t offer internal delivery again. (But I live in a condo in the central area of Metrotown and we have people at the concierge 24/7) and he doesn’t feel confident sending me with fedex either….

So he suggested to give me just store credits and asked me to swing by their “HEADQUARTER” which is the garage store to pick it up when I have time LOL (then why would I spend over a hundred to get shipping if I still have to run around just for a bag of coffee beans and that’s not even my fault in the first place )

I asked them again if it’s possible to just deliver it the way you guys always do, I don’t care whatever it is. I just need the coffee. And I ask is it true that you guys will never deliver to the same address and nearby area ever again like what they mentioned. If that’s the case then I might need a refund. Store credits won’t help if I am ordering with the same address in the future. Or else, they should figure out a delivery method.  He was reluctant to answer and said okay we will just give you a refund!

And it’s been almost three weeks, still no response on whether they will be delivering to me again, no refund, no coffee beans. Nothing. And they just simply ignore the issue.

I think their coffee is okay. Options for specialty coffee are limited here. I always wondered why do they look like they are still struggling when they have been doing business here for so long and all the bad reviews on customer service.
Now I figured. They basically just despise their customers and just don’t bother serving.

3 weeks later. I finally got my pack of coffee beans. All ripped.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOShR3vSWBhLeSaq62RvQY93yC5Ja52nrsmgGYI&fid=0x0:0xdfd45837c0f45659"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The drinks are delightful, and I savored every sip of the coffee. The pour-overs are a definite recommendation. However, I have a minor concern about the morning whiskey (Prestige Geisha varietal). Do they employ the compound chilling technique during preparation? The bottom of the glass unveils incredible sweetness and delicate bean flavors. While the top portion has a more acidic note, which is acceptable, I wish the entire glass mirrored the exquisite taste of the bottom half. I found myself tempted to savor every drop by sucking on the frozen ice ball.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPutAoEME-haFCEOXKeA6kjcjwdLk0S3NIEOKBf&fid=0x0:0xdfd45837c0f45659"],"When":"2023-11-11"},{"Name":"Henry Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcTlx45tkivdnVyW4B38kXt4WHZXtLMp6yRttTlIFdf-1gou8R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really in the middle of nowhere, wouldn’t know about this cafe if my friend didn’t recommend it.

Coffee flight is great, it is a small shop, cozy and comfortable setting. Would be nice to sit outside when sunny. I enjoyed my experience here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVytE9a4gXUop4pko5mq6M-Pr_NUb--PwzxR2d&fid=0x0:0xdfd45837c0f45659"],"When":"2024-4-11"},{"Name":"Carolyn Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZZCzio9ynHd-pLBYTPO5R-o1l1kYM9CokdbNRkFf7Rt5zPl8P=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Zero professionalism. Zero care for customer service. I’ve never been treated so poorly at any coffee shop .If you’re looking for a nice coffee shop experience, avoid this place at all costs. You'll get better service from a vending machine : ) Both the coffee and the service SUCKS.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNA0FIwiA-gsqzLMwpSpvhGT6fpWBfTp46u8GPb&fid=0x0:0xdfd45837c0f45659"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Danilo Teodoro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_rV4_xok36vIezJ6uAhpzSfyECA8ogmjA4ehyXVTr4dBqIAFv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience overall having a Pour over flight (3 different beans) and cappuccino. A friend had the espresso flight, pretty good as well! The place is small and apparently there's no food - no visible food, perhaps you can order. You can buy beans there as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpCvXG8h5rv29e9L827r0gkBngJAZ33RRU1r_8&fid=0x0:0xdfd45837c0f45659"],"When":"2023-11-12"}]
