The fries and gravy tasted great","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhsqQp4sUTbGSLBZ_BSfy2w7LUL-mFQ5d4igh1\u0026fid=0x0:0x7bc241d8320b89d8"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"victor g martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIwXCm-992z_7rus62DltQaAQn9ekxVKuyuGuB19RnT5xw43_F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is incredibly good, great for just passing by and having curly fries or a propeller fry. The curly fry poutine is really good and I suggest the propeller fry flavour that's all of the flavours combined.all in all the place is really good and the staff are friendly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"探险家Ramona","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVNVrqOQDND8IML5kfLwIR2bh_LDHY6JMIG9TSXsAZeBAYpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I loved the fact she explained what was in the gravy for the poutine. There is enough space to sit inside and outside the prices are great and the portions are manageable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNd6N2o1OvvLae2mpZCDZ4_d1d0pRS2rJa7eR9K\u0026fid=0x0:0x7bc241d8320b89d8"],"When":"2023-6-26"},{"Name":"Michel Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLd5-zrT0GLvq8Z2X69NskdonDNQ_FvldtEFNOtxwf2Tf1esw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small place for a good snack and some other treats. I got a propeller fry. Was very tasty and a good experience. Friendly staffs here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMV-xt1JTP93rFn5KP57Fauw1WmyrRGtizyIbgL\u0026fid=0x0:0x7bc241d8320b89d8"],"When":"2022-10-29"},{"Name":"Steph H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUP90F8RP-GzBNEI9tqI43_vuUAl5FUE_g3VIos2pn3hQ60HIyb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have great curly fries and chicken strips! user_reviews:
[{"Name":"David Sheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLyqqdoSxO8_09hTasSMmxRKIAiD7yhaUMiugV8IG4FPeT3KDoL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"On my quest for the ultimate nachos, I ventured to Good Co in Steveston, lured by the promising pictures online. The presentation of the nachos was decent, a beacon of hope in my search. However, the journey took a bland turn as the cheese failed to deliver the flavorful punch I craved. Despite the array of toppings, the dish remained parched, leaving my taste buds underwhelmed. On the flip side, the service shone brightly, and the view was a delightful bonus to the experience. Catching glimpses of tantalizing hamburgers on my way out, I'm tempted to return and navigate the rest of their menu. Perhaps the perfect dish awaits in a different form at Good Co.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtSsPm5fovK7Nzo_1gs3v-XV0pUA9_gmHTcrDu&fid=0x0:0x528e5e2089f5c415"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Jay R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKagpkay_tyMiZJ290grAjrZOpOEgY41rzeVSw6eYBfxe4VIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Had a mediocre experience at this location. The food was okay overall, I quite enjoyed the corn dogs, but outside of this, it felt like our chips were stale and taco shells over cooked. I had mixed feelings with the service, we waited quite long (left our name, came back an hour later) when there was plenty of seating available, our waitress was doing her best but it seemed like they were short staffed because people were waiting by the door for way too long before anyone noticed them, I saw many people just walk away frustrated. It is a beautiful location right by the water, and it has a lot of potential, but they really need to sort out their staffing and customer service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO37Pl1M0iYkwOk49XzULBARULvpr5YFb1hgPra&fid=0x0:0x528e5e2089f5c415"],"When":"2024-4-9"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Beautiful view and newly renovated restaurant
Relaxing sitting in front of blue sky and the water in this pet friendly place
I wish their service be better
Took a while before they come to greet us and then another while to take the order
We went at noon and they only have decaf coffee and coffee not fresh
Food is great tasty beef dip
Plenty of free street parking","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMK3eofp0QySzEOKe6pFhQhxRgtGErOkeK7fTG&fid=0x0:0x528e5e2089f5c415"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Romika Bains","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLY6as9-bSinq9gaUKOywKMCyiSu_BecTd5Yscu_UCRkMeN2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a private party in the back area of the restaurant, the service was incredible, app staff were great but Jose went above and beyond.  We are grateful for the amazing service he provided.  There were over 50 people and he was able to keep everyone happy.  Thank you again Jose, you did an amazing job.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melissa Goldie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxmXZaQDcvOe1mU4SUzyLX4hakDaX1d7j1GGNtS2aIUqq9C6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were at the Steveston location for a fundraiser last night, November 30, 2024, and had the most amazing service.  I wish I remembered our servers name because he was by far one of the best servers I’ve ever had.  I never had to look for him, my drink was always full and he was so engaging.  Food was great, side salad was great with my burger and the bartenders were fast and friendly.  Highly recommend this location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOc7f5SNKehOZbKDpfCcumFJlrX2_iy31I1KkjK&fid=0x0:0x528e5e2089f5c415"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Nathan Still","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_QoLY82Rt8F0zZynPofXsKzBiBHXMTScTWvtGhePvo_G-AcPs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed sitting near the window looking out at the water.  With such a great location, I'm happy to report that the price is reasonable, and the food/service great.  We especially liked the lemon pepper fries and the Thai curry although the Korean chicken salad and wings were great too  The staff were friendly and attentive.  The happy hour deals until 6pm are good also.  We will be back - recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4DxGHS48k5_VsZq0s1BZaBsg0nJNlbr5keXU&fid=0x0:0x528e5e2089f5c415"],"When":"2022-12-28"},{"Name":"Michelle Laffey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5baHRivTSTt9QDgxhhtGfdOJDsq--gvMcO0yy_36Kk1SjiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me and my friend went to good co steveston recently. We had  an amazing experience, our server Kristen was absolutely wonderful, her attention to detail and service was immaculate , her personality and sense of humour was superb and not just at our table but to other customers which is lovely to see. She definitely made our experience incredible. The food was amazing too, we could not fault any off it and we will definitely be back for sure. Thank you Kristen again, 10 stars for this server.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Babs Gordon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdFTewd287Yhm9H_DZodSgdrhTXjYHGlQvbiuqaa7RkzUVfrc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was delicious, though I found myself thinking that the name was misleading. In this day and age, I read "Good Co" and expected it to be predominantly health-minded, probably with a plant-based focus and eight dishes drizzled with green goddess dressing.
In fact, it was much more of the comfort food variety, where everything is either fried or deep fried.
I was pleasantly surprised, and have been craving their lemon pepper fries ever since!
Our party's spread included: nachos, fish and chips, fish tacos, wings, lemon pepper fries, loaded tater tots, and the shrimp fettuccine.
I've only included a photo of the nachos as I was too busy stuffing my face to take any other photos.
Of all those dishes, the only one I felt disappointed by was the tots and I can't put my finger on why.
Service was decent, and my complaints are few:
- Our table was rather sticky
- The seats for the long tables are placed with their backs too close to the next table's. Uncertain if this was due to shuffling over time or simply a crowded floor space. Honestly, it didn't feel crowded when we walked in.
- Bugs, but what can you do? It's a waterfront spot with garage door walls, so you get to enjoy the riverside air, and sometimes that means bugs! It also means having the sun shining directly into your eyes due to the absence of any kind of awning or overhang, but the breeze is still worthwhile!

Overall a lovely day","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWyJ1FaEu_XDy4qb2Tl2LyLyz5lCP4cXaR0nqS&fid=0x0:0x528e5e2089f5c415"],"When":"2023-7-24"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Wanita Mitchell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV29ii29D1W-wQKPr9WGtR1nXVOhQdKX9Wj6ZrhNRRpTPapJ25u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the onion and cheese scone and a slice of banana bread. The scone was a beautiful texture, moist and delicious. The banana bread was dense and moist just how I like it. The cafe is quaint and small. It is so clean. I will go back and I would absolutely recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOchnc4oVOitoFRAy4HBFcVy1J8b5ew4hBBRF4\u0026fid=0x0:0xcbfae4d642dc640a"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"George Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnH1TcSxr0gOFlJGC9BuOBXtMSstQevILgFkD1pJ9OP49rvDo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best bakeries in Richmond, it’s located in Steveston.  I’ve tried their scones and almond croissants, and also love their pistachio raspberry tart!  Friendly and inviting service always!  Thumbs up!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOg028nkYuasE3pCWXeTxcRclsrdtc_KmjeDqAu\u0026fid=0x0:0xcbfae4d642dc640a"],"When":"2023-5-10"},{"Name":"Stephanie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBV5KRG75WlxmWo1wuDhWSQhlZCOao4V2_9kFkOn0OqRNe45TP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"COVID protocols in place. One person taking your order and another getting your baked goods. We went almost around closing so there weren't many pastries left. Staff was super nice, quick and attentive. The lemon meringue tart was my favourite (also one of their more popular items). The lemon curd was nice and tart and the meringue helped cut through the tartness perfectly. The tart itself was the perfect texture as it broke with adequate force. Would order it again. The cheesecake was definitely outshone by the tart. The cheesecake was okay but not my favourite. Can't wait to go back and try their other goods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDpSNUNw46Y6nqUwzLay-0a2VzM245EhLRja3g\u0026fid=0x0:0xcbfae4d642dc640a"],"When":"2021-6-9"},{"Name":"Rahim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4wlgtmAJFCPZ0n_3Eyp_TfiUVd1vo8vP_cRZSDslqagrvFfLC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is really a sweet spot for the delicate sweet taste. Fine pastry is the way I would describe their pastries. It's a cozy shop so it's for to go only. Cheese smoked salmon croissant is one of the few tasty savory bakes. The peach danish and pecan bread are really good. Friendly staff and elegant presentation","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNELg3kskZKRvd8kNxkY6QtnEtmsXfZuBNyBpkM\u0026fid=0x0:0xcbfae4d642dc640a"],"When":"2022-3-16"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice bakery with both sweet and savory quality products. Tried their sun dried tomato, spinach, and feta quiche. It tasted very rich and good, but also a bit on the oily side. I guess its a once in a while treat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOW_Np2Mlfg7Sj-z6ALkt7MnltaWxJCryuKedrl\u0026fid=0x0:0xcbfae4d642dc640a"],"When":"2021-7-20"},{"Name":"Hillbillytc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV833YeKMKJfxtYeKhRHVRSrikZoFOcCapKBwyEFBOnxiCMeXAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The server was very attentive and knowledgeable. The sweets are amazing. They also have a few GF options","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBWfzOFr2gA5FG9jYKubr4dWTUSbGBbTqpiM3e\u0026fid=0x0:0xcbfae4d642dc640a"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"J D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK06enKeUKGLNE835udDYXGjgrx4d3GRW63oK66ZwU3c2BjXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very disappointed with the pavlova. This is the second time I advanced ordered and upon pick up, it was flat.\nThe bakery offered a 20% off for my next order but it's catastrophic when the pavlova is for a birthday and there's  no possible way to recover from this.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cecilia Rosell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwomk9hg14pcxT_1Pv82sThciTLOUVA0AIBBVtyCCEFbgnW0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The raspberry cake slices and the pistachio cheesecake were both amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAVUkIQstfyQeaAbFWhfHbIpPXQdAtFFFYEACS\u0026fid=0x0:0xcbfae4d642dc640a"],"When":"2024-7-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joy Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWC-_yA3p_X742W41EdNrtxi3vJwE-8nzXlxcJ1ULn4Y4bOuMMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend commented this place. It is the Taiwan’s style restaurant. My favorite dish was beef noddle soup, the meat was tender and juicy. I love the fried food and wanted to try everything. So I order D1 including many things.  The double chicken legs combo must order. The tasty or food are good flavors not salty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPAUWhUH0uyIcKY-I4kWCCVGNDpe0-tKQ8HJ6W&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Yan Jie Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWtJgsuhwRId0t1MOzd5ywiIXfrBfIFDTo7UODkLUu9At3EXtegw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service: The lady is super kind! We arrived at around 2pm, and there’s about 4 groups in front of us, she kindly asked us to walk around or wa it inside the car cause it too windy outside. And when we were dining inside she keep saying sorry for the wait, it’s very heartwarming.
Food: their Taiwanese food is truly amazing. Great selection, and very authentic. I recommend fish belly soup, fried chicken, and sausage. No wonder there’s always a line! It’s worth the wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlbT6nS8QRvE7r0EjXvN0p8UVjdaYIf2qnVItY&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Nikki c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTEI07jnFTAEaLsFO0c2_mPPfnmG0XKKHuolSSFqT8Xlgj-nIi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the most authentic Taiwanese restaurants in greater Vancouver, great for when I’m missing hime. Love the small sausage in big sausage and stinky tofu: I just wish it was more stinky lol

Of course the prices could never compare to the prices in Taiwan but it’s Vancouver 🥲

The food is great and I always bring home the frozen gyoza 🥟 鍋貼which is sooooo delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB8vLmjd-icEEX5dB4X6adZXa4xLl_CbmdtYGA&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"James Coles-Nash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkJrmtjWT371XtK4SkdD-gc4742YrtKT1KSibl27VRSYpTt9Yi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Taiwanese food at a reasonable price. We had the Taiwanese sausage, drop fried chicken nuggets and beef noodle, all of them were great and came fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOubFZ14jTdQVCHMsiH3pkkFvTCFDU8RrOYCqEm&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Percy Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpYfKBRmcbCv3QlJ6bZXmv0ly8_CocIf_lBOXCAlxRrZaEag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We will go again to order other dishes.  We enjoyed the food and the service was really good.  We had the oyster pancake, beef noodle soup, oyster vermicelli soup, pork belly on rice, fried tofu, Taiwanese sausage and rice sausage.  Looking forward to our next visit!

Pictures from our latest visit.   They had a new lamb hotpot.   They asked for our feedback...it was very good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeCdmRIVc-f6B30uuAF5MHN74iHvM7PWNa3lOd&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Albert Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLu_EXMOFkw3t7ieiosbnUm8U0dDlr8SUxo6E0Nm1EZRYvKeA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Everytime when coming back, the food elevates it flavor.  Indicating they are always seeking to improved its dishes and giving room for improvement","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcDqQQNIfKM0qk-892nM0CTf6YpdvHGtHSLHjy&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-1-6"},{"Name":"Alastair Leigh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2gspK8j66vIPaBKlAUhLSLU2O8o8CDsdJ6D5x5Th63iSt_sjDAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for a bike ride with my buddy and decided to stop by here instead of getting pizza (which has become way too expensive). The patio was lovely on a sunny Saturday afternoon. The service was friendly and prompt. The food was delicious. I really enjoyed the beef noodle soup. Popcorn chicken was good but had a bit too much batter or fat, couldn't tell. Maybe use better cuts of chicken with less fat? Not sure. Dessert was aiyu and deliciously refreshing on a summer day. The price was very reasonable. Which is funny, because if it were more expensive I would've ordered a lot less (usually I just get noodles and call it a day). But I ordered 2 appetizers and a dessert at this restaurant and ended up spending more 😅.

Keep up the good work!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLK9eHJg0oxVm0NEUtP8_tD47CkAglDTnfMvca&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Nicole Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdAow82J4tPwMSY2ca6JgSF68bASnvtD-62FnrDIFUIVzacw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything is super yummy and flavorful with an authentic taste from the southern part of Taiwan (Tainan), and their service is absolutely amazing! We got the Formosa Platter which is a great choice if you want to try several different night market snacks at once and share between 1-2 people. The plate that they used even has the shape of Taiwan! We also loved the Pan-fried Oyster Pancake as it’s loaded with tons of toppings and the oysters are huge! The Mega Meat Dumpling is really unique with a chewy texture and stuffed with a good portion of meat. Their drinks were very refreshing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-yWx-db5o2E1ryYNLAOfJu9SYAXpvfpjcK1QM&fid=0x0:0xac5a01e20501d7fa"],"When":"2022-8-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Juston Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVAYC5afCmPwosxYjKpvQBOhWlOXQMR2Uh3uL_8gJcR0rRYyPd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"G-men ramen was suggested by my family and once again going on my list of good places to eat!

Menu has lots to chose from, ranging from the tasty shoyu to spicy RCMP bowl. Also great to share their G mega X bowl where they include all toppings for an extra $10.

The place is tiny and cute and service was very attentive. I was always being checked on in case our table needed anything. Would recommend to anyone and will come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcPLDtrs6CAhg3jjvseOpgixLjZASWAUYRcI4a&fid=0x0:0x9dc44ee84a5890ca"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Francis Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUachXJf0WTzrHMSnePZ9iHmUBp8eKFhZg_hqN3cQx4lsTYkO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty good ramen. You can either get the more basic one, that's $14.50 (last photo), or if you get the $20.50 one (2nd last photo), you'll get more meat and a full soft boiled egg.

It's on the heart of Steveston so it's very convenient if you're sightseeing and you are craving for some ramen. The rice dish is pretty good as well.

The kids meal is alright at $13, although it would be even better if it's ramen instead of udon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7kU9shNU-F3-x5WK-zS3eoindncpnkLnBKOei&fid=0x0:0x9dc44ee84a5890ca"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Onyx Kahle (Onyx)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk9S46QvzBEb1FQPA_E-W1Fqq52tCsnY9at5RaMtcb-wiKapJZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food and great atmosphere. Super friendly staff and a lovely outdoor seating area! Great spot if you’re riding an electric unicycle since there are plentiful charging spots","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqVmwAsJunVevAuCIZmWzLDLUHgNJ0emRtqccv&fid=0x0:0x9dc44ee84a5890ca"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"CallsignJester","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXbpQW0qzEoMMewJxJv8oQdJqysCRY767GR7DLyKg8CiaTZgI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here recently and the ramen hands down is probably the best I've ever had. I love their limited tonkotsu ramen, the broth was rich and flavourful. 10/10 ramen spot I highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOCq7f0xz_4BBeifg23VIjMF36XCfBfCy72w0&fid=0x0:0x9dc44ee84a5890ca"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Bonnie Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnEc4L_oX33x1BIdSnyu3qIy05RmcbQP1bJwBirlW_Yv38YSLczA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service is good
Love the atmosphere esp we sat outside in nice weather.
Combo Takoyaki taste good, can be larger in size 😻
Natto Tofu don tasted good👍🏻I like it as a heslthy choice.
Shoyo Ramen tasted good if u like mild flavour and thin ramen 🍜","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvPicFvLlOw0nVjGZ8AwXoXdKRV41Jxvf-sZZQ&fid=0x0:0x9dc44ee84a5890ca"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Pat H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLG-dNH_dxDe8COit03Fl-sr5emXwBhh0GmEAMKf9ggoHF2Jw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A lovely, relaxed spot with a beautiful patio. I stayed past closing time, but the server never rushed me. The food was great, with plenty of options to choose from. (August 2024)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1CVj5mZixl27xtYAtQTE9shbl-UG5HA54jPt9&fid=0x0:0x9dc44ee84a5890ca"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Coline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbX_QKuaEf6ecbnocWzjer3WudYneLMe_JJVgbs8i0ijFAVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very creamy and delicious tan tan ramen! Lovely atmosphere and interior too! Excellent service. Great place to eat with friends. I will recommend eating outside for more privacy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR9Ya8fpirgW6inMvJJ-o2B6-g1gdXx_jmFNZT&fid=0x0:0x9dc44ee84a5890ca"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Edith Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJmOen6EtIl7Ej_JFqybjeY6J0ua3WQel6_FE_xI_4sbCJAgJF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent ramen but the broth was on the salty side. For the don, sauce was on the side, so that easier to control. Great service though!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNisbjeFl5PcXau3YdCxocP86noRtlWMMHpZlFp&fid=0x0:0x9dc44ee84a5890ca"],"When":"2024-8-12"}]

title: Anar
descriptions: Laid-back eatery serving Mediterranean & Persian fare such as grilled kebabs, salads & stews.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Abdul Rahman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1y16W-JihptuYSezk2yfyADxj7Dl7B19TPhziB_5Xa6dveCtB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down, one of the best Iranian restaurants! Loved the atmosphere and the food.
My son tried lamb shank and he loved it. I tried Joojeh and loved it.
But the award goes to the hot, fluffy, crispy bread.
Anar, I loved your painting on the wall with the woman with the violin. The message was obvious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-tUzHTlZ1oVIHNpMPKtAw3nSjlUSs-zQUa-B-&fid=0x0:0x384c38c3f1dfe367"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Abdelrahman Khalaf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2jHI4KfqcSaV3xQ_vuzOHPSCzM5tStwL7T9jnOX2wCZGamqfc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I never rated place five stars but this one absolutely earned it. I eat lamp chunk every where i go, Anar serves it in a very unique way with the spices and the whole combination. My only recommendation is to serve it with plain rice.

Big shoutout for the owner who showed Persian Hospitality and served tea to the whole team.

Thanks for the amazing experience.  Will come again for sure :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKw3_H04Zlb3iAElf9mLmHoN42zgxCcqz6Qqq0&fid=0x0:0x384c38c3f1dfe367"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Cecilia Rosell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwomk9hg14pcxT_1Pv82sThciTLOUVA0AIBBVtyCCEFbgnW0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The lamb/beef kabobs and the chicken were both incredibly juicy. Rice was flavorful and fluffy. I honestly can’t remember last time I ate rice this perfect, or meats this juicy.
The eggplant dip is also so, so amazing. This is food heaven! I clearly need to eat Persian food more often.
Also staff is so friendly and sweet.
Can’t wait to be back and try more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA1jsnBeabyBXRZvcLuTbR_hL-7cDN5wn2qcQg&fid=0x0:0x384c38c3f1dfe367"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"H Mir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKltxLfBFcp_u0TiyRkgOBXXJ0JsQNYaNf6ammLlh9LQsuUTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Anar Restaurant in Richmond, and it was an amazing experience! The food is incredibly delicious and truly authentic, bringing the real taste of Persian cuisine to the city. The ambiance of the restaurant is cool and inviting, making it a perfect spot for a great meal. A special shoutout to David, the owner, who is super friendly and fun. Thanks, David, for the wonderful food and the warm hospitality! Highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a fantastic dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2zHJepxlBFMlG8TJDhkmOJo2y_rgppS-ad5oE&fid=0x0:0x384c38c3f1dfe367"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Y L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNU1df5LXNmrErSWyQZKM2biUyNZpBpYpeIyc2OqSSiS6ANfs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow. Got the Curry chicken, logmeh and sharbat everything slapped so hard. I thought I knew what good logmeh tasted like but wow this one was juicyy af and the salad was so fresh that alone was great. The curry chicken was so zesty, perfect spice and chicken was tender. Must have is the Sharbat, beautiful presentation and a refreshing drink with a QQ taste. Saffron ice-cream also 10/10 and ON TOP of that gender inclusive bathrooms 🤓","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNq-ps_UX9h1RlJn4APqa-E2lsjOq387NOx8nLb&fid=0x0:0x384c38c3f1dfe367"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"andy a","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7Y7rwHyjfulEA1YHdfgv-xt7-eGezTRedst5phEBEmPsbXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a wonderful experience.

Never had Persian cuisine, nor did I know what to look for or expect. A parking spot opened up right up front while looking for another restaurant. Had seats open and the menu looked intriguing. Ventured in and fell in love.

A couple lovely families enjoying their evening when I was seated, normal family friendly atmosphere. Full of laughter and joy. Soon everyone else had left and I enjoyed the whole place to myself. I got to experience a few firsts.

The lamb shank was cooked perfectly, only needed my fork to pull apart what didn't fall off the bone.

The rose lemonade was out of this world.

Their eggplant appetizer and crispy soft pillowy bread was unlike any bread I have had before. Every bite was delicious.

Ended with their half and half dessert, the rose syrup was a homerun.

I will definitely be coming back to try their kebab.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObWBxaKMRaoi7cU6geR93TIG8Hti11Z2VvBcR6&fid=0x0:0x384c38c3f1dfe367"],"When":"2024-4-17"},{"Name":"Alison Campos Granados","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaEZoJf9UKAjD4SdoX8PMMm_BQ0K34JLP5KdJ9XzrtohmuE-1T=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing dining experience at Anar. The Vegan Fesenjan and Vegan Kashk o Bademjoon were phenomenal—rich, flavorful, and beautifully presented. The pomegranate dressing was a standout, adding a fresh, vibrant touch to every bite. Great ambiance and impeccable service. Highly recommended for a memorable meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3A0bwjxxnAPZIvkFQDTaBbwVfeiiAjFo2S7WX&fid=0x0:0x384c38c3f1dfe367"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Zhuge Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPo5epQpB8uJydI3sToJa66foIacZBCLIBYQ-6Z79DDQxjMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Friendly service, though longer than expected; guess it's made to order 😉

Rice stuffed in grape leaves: taste and texture on point.
Roasted 🍆 dip: truly an appetizing appetizer, especially with the freshly made bread 😋
Fesenjoon: unique (sweet/sour) taste, reminiscent of Filipino dinuguan.
Loughmeh kabob: the 🌟- order this if you only have one choice! Juicy, flavourful and tender...the jeweled rice, however, lacks in taste.
Beef ghormeh sabzi: thick, salty beef stew, nothing stands out.
Chicken curry: tender but lack the flavour the menu suggests.
South Beach fish: bit dry, saved by the dill rice and sautéed vegetables.
Faloodeh: skip it. Lemon (?) Ice cream was OK, but the blocky cubes of syrup are poor execution and presentation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhe3wezcPJzBsZk6bX1kZWcy1fYLvkEr9Odhi1&fid=0x0:0x384c38c3f1dfe367"],"When":"2024-5-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Spike Luk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVljR41LewaD1cz5kVqUD3bmc9ybJSH00GIF-DrHusS8cKNejJe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ventured over to Kove restaurant today.  If my wife did not venture to the end of the dock we would not have seen the nice patio and view Kove has.  We were greeted by friendly staff.  The drinks (Blue Kahuna and 33 Acres beer on tap) were cold and yummy.  The waffles and fried chicken were savory.   The batter on the generous 3 pieces of chicken were seasoned well.  Waffles were good.  The syrup brought it all together.   The fish and chips were good.   The pacific rougheye fish was moist and had good texture for a fried fish. The fries were well seasoned although I would prefer a thicker cut.  It seemed like I got a lot of ends.
Overall I highly recommend visiting here.  Dogs are allowed on the patio but they do limit one dog per table.
Cheers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyXPhVxVp-pgEA51kBSoVIeMWwIyGrpJN8HuxL&fid=0x0:0xacfcdfd6224879c3"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Tony C. Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWg2hItphmDzADo6eJVMoupXSGu6cUX_5BRGxO8PmcjleCK5rzk2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Laid back burger joint at the waterfront with a Ukrainian touch. Our server was super friendly and keep offering us free beer samples. Burger was tasty","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7ollQH_UDw7N0mmOdCOSnAZkmlu4chG68IKv7&fid=0x0:0xacfcdfd6224879c3"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Ada Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZS31x788z5Sx39ClFe-nCKeE-yr0DOjemrNGL0Qgq3_eJnabT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went for lunch with my mom, quick to seat us down. Amazing & attentive service! Mom ordered Steak & Frites and I got the Black Bean Veggie Burger w/ Impossible Patty. Meat was a little dry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO_L9iyFZkDfWHHT_KYN1afuxP5WEJTbee9gpB&fid=0x0:0xacfcdfd6224879c3"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Sarah K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY-JgvN5-mznvqsAYHtcaVGAhVC2l-m6xd8sNXk8E9qqKEPNzX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The fish & chips was tasty, and their cheeseburger was very good. Their clam chowder soup had too much butter flavour though, which was not my favourite. There was nice seating outside the restaurant as well as inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyEkq7heCfMe5LF6EwliV3KnKvWg-1mYUL1y5R&fid=0x0:0xacfcdfd6224879c3"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Peter M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKk-rxpOq7GwruvLmSaB76J3zaSuKi4IDBOqoO6XW92wB2_VA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice little restaurant with a fantastic view of the water. Dog friendly patio.

Super friendly and efficient service.
We had the clam chowder soup, and the one of the egg breakfast brunch meals.
The food was great.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiLWkBehUAoqecBLb-PR1WXkxDLUfUaNZAk5e7s-opHpmA48OSHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and service! Jennifer is amazing - my new favourite place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwcuvMEFfskdBh4LAkwtv_aqMQy08hOLHQdsaF&fid=0x0:0xacfcdfd6224879c3"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Alex Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4m-RrKihCXXLVuygCulk_5TFxSVm8ArERd9VI1no5NHh65w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing! The sweetest, kindest people! Beautiful views! My husband got the butter chicken and was SO happy. I got the salmon burger it was delicious! Everyone shared the calamari and yam fries it was un-beatable!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuH6IHIwGhhE28_QO9nKYG61zRWEV4EGss3_7-&fid=0x0:0xacfcdfd6224879c3"],"When":"2023-8-2"},{"Name":"Azuki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDO580thEC_aOqQ6Ey2F5p_tJwlNUQNurFMEvymExhrUJyiE5I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"What a great restaurant for group gatherings!  A semi private area on the 2nd floor for a party as big as 20 with enough space to walk around.

- Private patio with seating overlooking the waters
- A decent menu selection for 2 or 3-course set menu between $50-75/pp + 18% gratuity
- Generous portions on shared plates
- Able to order off the regular menu in addition to the set menu

Their Butter Chicken Poutine is surprisingly a very nice combination of tender chicken, thick sauce and fries... and came in a big portion!

The only downside was there was no aircon on a hot summer day.

Perfect for family gatherings, grad dinners, company events or just a ladies night!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhQDPtosNzq3HCHmCJAwpg-an8UcGZN3EJqsoS&fid=0x0:0xacfcdfd6224879c3"],"When":"2023-9-5"}]

title: Five Roads Brewing Steveston
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Bar on-site","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joey Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIncJBLfbVzRO24PRdfxE4-hovZn6C_s4RV_vqsGslULP8YEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We drove all the way from Vancouver to Steveston on a hot Friday evening. We needed a break from the heat after browsing around the area briefly. We went into this pub with no expectation. It turned out to be a good spot for watching sports. They had multiple TVs on the wall at different sections of the little pub. We could witness Canada beating Venezuela on penalty kicks. It was quite a magical afternoon. The staff who worked there seemed super young but they were very friendly. We will drop by next time when we are in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMehSv5qK5c_dHHM6yXW1zy6Qd9ijzce4OIn937&fid=0x0:0x51934f7101dab418"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Colin Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZp9_lV8pRp5vdxZ55gJhPc2X5trs5ePUFqraR0pMh47ShlBA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came to Five roads brewing all the way from West Vancouver on a hot Tuesday evening. We decided to try out the patio area and it very private and relaxing. We ordered the Moncton lobster roll. It was PACKED with lobster. Perfectly cooked and seasoned. The Caesar and beer flights were unique and delicious. Will definitely be making this a routine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAkReHUP9MUuSs-2Byi0OVDO-VoBlxu-3RmTlg&fid=0x0:0x51934f7101dab418"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Steven Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUdCMXU-vTG7wFG8ffaLxrR1rzEIZCV2d2O99a36kgQUAq2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"One of the worst lobster rolls I’ve ever had, 38$ for this, that’s disgustingly over priced. The soup was cold in the middle, the server was very nice.
We came here cause all the good reviews, but the food was really disappointing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVP95Bol4N8rAMdr_gI_M60PNvzasDzgxECTx-&fid=0x0:0x51934f7101dab418"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"i’mvicki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtvnsbbLDU8XLfOtgkf6Yb2_QNqnJ4bTxWSAtu7xvWneKydXpl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very very bad experience. Soup was cold the first time so we had to ask the waiter to reheat it.  The lobster roll is overpriced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHIb4xQLEEFPvKPYFphC3TlPrpzkZgTpsm6QzY&fid=0x0:0x51934f7101dab418"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Jolie Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbIxM1bUQ9tgjKNyRumXO2IxM64BaaQIpwnFb8fKAhTndY0Ahw-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had such a great time trying the different beers with my family! Great location and the ocean blend bisque was to die for. The owner was very sweet and we felt very welcomed. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFasvMw0Axw3gwb07nQSK2ec98ZmHqLbXO5UOx&fid=0x0:0x51934f7101dab418"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Matthew L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKc9fHn8uXVktnQv8aocHCHj44Jm3-C13gSis0GjGhXqRQXFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A great brewery in Richmond to visit. It is in a bit of a tucked away location. Be sure to try a flight to experience lots of their different beers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUz0DAJSO3HBuU21myK1VJyp8IHl9_OQOVe0GM&fid=0x0:0x51934f7101dab418"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Sarah Richardson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_FahoQBKzoW_sAhVyOAftvvYLkKcOIWVsBwi6lWnNai8UudNI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fun small place to visit in Steveston. 8 beers on tap, including stout, lagers, and a pilsner. They also had a cider on tap. It was pretty sweet, but I liked it. It would have been better if it had been carbonated. The one I had in a flight tasted rather flat, sadly.

They also sell their beer by the can in a 4 pack to go. You can mix and match for thr 4 pack.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A.J. Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Five Roads Brewing is located in the Richmond, Stevenson area. A great brewery to sit, relax and enjoy a beer after walking around the shops surrounding it. Delicious beers, patio seating, food offerings and great views. Perfectly located in the Steveston fisherman wharf shopping district. They also offer wine, cocktails and Five Roads merchandise.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHV9HNWuyGaG4AT1EyXfxWQS6ReKNb6Ddtn4j8&fid=0x0:0x51934f7101dab418"],"When":"2024-9-1"}]

title: Salmon n' Bannock On The Fly
address: 3211 Grant McConachie Wy, Richmond, BC V7B 0A4

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Dusty Martell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUshEwtFshQNdDHT8koloDcbg7aX58fP4F24oZIUzyX7mWqHKb2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very welcome site at gate D at Vancouver international Airport, international departures.. marvelled at the fresh baked gluten-free bread choices and dairy free parfait as well as regular bought some candied salmon salad and the delicious parfait. It was still fresh and wonderful four hours into the flight. I felt very nourished and had to share.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyX3hHHFZoUH4q0miy6urPLrs25PdRBqzWEpFd\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf3b17080aa904aa"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Alan Hsu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3tBxa4h8cy8gIKrmiv3g6GGVfu5sND6jxGLRpI7LlmBwWwfWpdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was excellent; got the Classic Bestwhich…very flavorful. Staff was extremely nice and helpful. Highly recommend!!! Heart Berry soda was great too; honored to support women/Indigenous- run businesses!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCdSBlQcqYCKt_7Lt7us0lreIvuj-YBigldewc\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf3b17080aa904aa"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Aye Bell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcdcR97sPHm2P2BQ1oGrs1jZLuFwECVyEGRhd6sB5JFqGqPfKO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"WOW! Food is outstanding here, and it is a really well executed modern twist blending traditional food and game foods into dishes that blow your taste buds out of the water! Complimented well with the traditional music playing over the speakers can definitely notice the unique sounds B.C has to offer. Highly recommend this place to anyone passing through, I myself had the open faced bison sandwich and wish I could have another. However, I think you'll find the portions here hit the spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdZL5kWDA9O4L8MYU5v3yv-qNXFjAXsJjE0usD\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf3b17080aa904aa"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Felix Rankin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpJ-yYQaqhIHkPOZ9xWbxX8zbVOuthsh7rV-GMj2_ucOkUKJU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ah yes. The good ol airport. Vast majority of people lined up at fast food places, ready for the inevitable flight where they feel disgusting the entire time. Sure it’s like 5$ cheaper, but what’s 5$? We’re in the damn airport 😂. I thought I would give this place a try as it is actually fairly healthy for what you get. There’s overnight oats, yogurt and granola, big salads. I got the Elk Burger and I got gluten free buns as well. They actually tasted surprisingly good. Could hardly tell they were gluten free. Didn’t have that chalky texture and the burger itself was nice and soft too. Usually elk has a much tougher gamey texture. The aioli was a nice touch as well. I’m just like everyone else. I hate spending more money at the airport too, but don’t let slightly higher prices deter you. You may as well pay a slightly higher price to not feel like you drank a cup of canola oil at some fast food place. Give it a try. I might have to give the west broadway location a try soon as well. Thanks again for serving healthy food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMynX0zGOgavt5Awg2rCExFdoMadoFZS7CgWFJ-\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf3b17080aa904aa"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Esther W.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZ44_CjQ6-wehLPc33Ng17kPOWOSFrXqo3jg5WgP7CtwNUYUeR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bread is nice and greasy. Salmon well seasoned. RAIC airport card discount available. Thank you for a good meal. Will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsJHMlCC4-NcZmU3MYByj9VxQIqlECmQV3eX03\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf3b17080aa904aa"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Isabelle Jacques","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJhDxr_TK6vFH3--5Vi3mvuyievSlj_c2odmBjpErJ4Pnge9Qk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best restaurant at YVR. Elk burger was delicious, staff is friendly, ingredients are premium and fresh.\nThe to-go salads also look fabulous.\nOrganic, fair trade, indigenous, what a treat before a long-haul flight. Will be coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzJ7NFwJW8I-LeIAoh625xGWW37-fADbRPUD91\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf3b17080aa904aa"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Marie L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBOW2fW25xA6gAQ4RB5FolyTjuTQqRfivhdKhnUuAfbKwzRBOHpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Would have not selected this spot without reading reviews, thank god I did. Just ate the lox sandwich, no onions with salad. SO HAPPY! Bannock was delicious, freshly cooked, salmon portion is generous and the waitress very lovely. Your best layover meal. 5 stars all the way!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dana Victoria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVrIKPksQfKikh-avj2uJSa02wAloRKa2cUUtBRO1Ytk5YWu_1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Not bad for a spot in the airport! Ate the BBQ salmon salad sandwich a bit too fast before taking the photo. Service was quick, others were at the bigger food chains so this worked out perfectly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8ux9scZLPygCIET3xt0rN1Dk6r3hFi7sZ3OCm\u0026fid=0x0:0xbf3b17080aa904aa"],"When":"2024-7-13"}]

[{"Name":"Daithí Kilcourse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpB0OmItsLBGGhpfNEcY_0lXbdAla_7jQ1ZQyMfHX5aboK6jFV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First coffee shop we went to in Vancouver. The lady serving was very nice. The coffees were great. We will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN707nvzyCLBDwrTF1HugBfG-jGzWsQknLJFVcX&fid=0x0:0x97310163c7b245d3"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Nargiza Toshpulatova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrTxZGmD3E6u0PngELzmCjBKQaSCBPAN9-GFbTPCK7PLRko53H=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried the Tora Latte at Trees Coffee for the first time, and it was fantastic! The flavor was smooth, rich, and perfectly balanced—definitely a unique twist on the traditional latte. The coffee shop itself has a cozy, welcoming vibe, and the staff were friendly and attentive. I’ll definitely be coming back to enjoy this drink again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKNcxbplQtCp8fUPc577lmHC1VvgLMuNQQ1C_-&fid=0x0:0x97310163c7b245d3"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Zac A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKH0x18-boXvRQW3CKdXmlcw9Ga4TtlIUfrKNoZCIhPCuaptVz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice staff formerly folks. Clean location, delicious cheesecake. True to their name. Enjoyed the tiramisu slice, next time will try the other options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTEbr2OpzOAD7kYMM2abl9raHjaW9foWmjVVGC&fid=0x0:0x97310163c7b245d3"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Karnika Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi6W8gqIEwXa9NWEvLhvNe0yuDu-KVagj1kdm-Z6tMlJwdFydnng=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very disappointed with the blueberry cheesecake. Went there to specifically try their cheesecake because of all the hype but must say there are places serving much better cheesecake. This one had such a dry top and lacked the creamy texture. Won’t recommend at least for blueberry cheesecake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPI-X49cbuPFZwjHJq5-t1ixhj-sDDI2ofIjLm9&fid=0x0:0x97310163c7b245d3"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"samira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwkQGMre8jgbaip4E0o2r4QwZ6hsRUFGFhUhbAr4O--khz6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the New York cheesecake and Tiramisu cheesecake and I loved them both. Also got an americano and a black coffee which were pretty good. The atmosphere is alright, it’s not super cozy or warm though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBNs6JwiSzNr5VWmi_ELvd_JRDiH3b7jgSCA1A&fid=0x0:0x97310163c7b245d3"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Sobhan Jahangiri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMBffo1eeVN9M9OOiD94bdNiEya-eY_A95gqPjUlrIG3ZffhFqzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Trees Organic Coffee on Granville Street is a haven for coffee lovers and seekers of cozy warmth amidst the city’s bustle. This little gem exudes character, with its inviting brick walls, soft lighting, and the comforting aroma of freshly brewed coffee that greets you the moment you walk in. The atmosphere here is both lively and serene, making it the perfect escape for an early morning ritual or an afternoon retreat.

The coffee at Trees is nothing short of exceptional, each cup crafted with care and a dedication to quality that’s palpable. Rich, robust, and smooth, every sip tells of the beans’ journey from farm to cup, with a depth of flavor that awakens the senses. But it’s their cheesecake that truly sets Trees apart—velvety, rich, and offered in an array of flavors that delight both the eyes and the palate. Each slice is a moment of indulgence, a balance of creamy texture and subtle sweetness that melts in your mouth and lingers, inviting you to savor every bite.

Whether you’re meeting friends, diving into a good book, or just taking a moment to pause, Trees Organic Coffee creates a space for connection and calm. The staff is warm and welcoming, always happy to recommend a favorite roast or cheesecake flavor. It’s more than just a coffee shop; it’s a little sanctuary in the heart of Vancouver, a place to recharge, find inspiration, or simply enjoy the art of a perfectly brewed coffee. Trees Organic Coffee is a treasure, where each visit feels like a treat and every cup brings a little joy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M Skinner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmvh_HGga4b-iIPuR9aCMeZ9msWmar_iZtXQBNZasuXFEdUwU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice (but not brilliant) coffee, good pastry and a quiet ambience. Plenty of cheesecakes in the fridge too, that looked delectable!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGH-rRx-VMa_FDtWrFTn24jxTg7rT7rkJFqECe&fid=0x0:0x97310163c7b245d3"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"rahul kashyap","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5a2EQW89AwiZuzqtXR7I0O_jl0QUttecmSH6JRPMitqDyRu-X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Well I was last minute entry when store going off so no complaints but ladies who r closing were kind enough to offer me whatever list they have and out of that I had Hot chocolate and it was yummy and the ladies made it very kindly as I know the store was going to be close  but she still got sometime from her closing and served us hot hot chocolate","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeT5mdBDvTJuGLjnIjy1U06oaXQINhad4eK30T&fid=0x0:0x97310163c7b245d3"],"When":"2024-9-16"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Nat A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnjKr4KNFAObzj2bIvH9BRInxwKsSvEg1PM25bKfvhxtWZTWHoog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I got a good deal for their High Tea two for $85. It was nice to receive 2 hours of complimentary parking as well. First impressions, the restaurant has a very casual vibe compared to other High Tea places I've been too. We were seated by the window and had a view of where the airplanes are before they take off.  Many people dressed casual with their luggages and a few kids around. The tea and the food came out fairly fast. Our server was polite, no complaints. There were more sweets compared to the savory items. Overall, the quality of the food was good but I was hoping for a more classy High Tea traditional vibe which I didn't get there. It felt more like a regular casual restaurant with just a few tables doing the High Tea. It was okay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOolinoHnUCCuW-3-2_Vc9NUDboqE7JgXa2pq9x\u0026fid=0x0:0x27da37c7443f4e3c"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Tyler Durden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJ5pU_7s7OAwPXk-_-hHp0tb-CwQmhO9k_mXw6ddXs0rhSo20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It is a nice place. It`s interesting to see airplanes and commotion in the background in the window. Free parking is available. Among the minuses are small menu choices and there was a bad smell near our table. Subjectively, the dishes we ordered did not evoke a surge of emotions in us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfpbbD9LoZT033-4l9pyFWT8xppLGPXKYnZRQb\u0026fid=0x0:0x27da37c7443f4e3c"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite part of sending off or picking up a loved one in the airport is the chance to dine at the Globe @ YVR restaurant. It's in Fairmont Hotel at the entrance to the airport. I have been here quite a few times. My daughter loves the food as well, which is a plus for me as she tends to be very picky. They do have live band/group or singers with intruments performing during happy hour and at night. The staff is very attentive as well. But the best part is that they offer free parking for your stay, so for me, I'd rather eat there and use that money you could have paid for the parking. It's a win!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnUYmTLE3PYEZJxo9LEFDFlOTCwE2XPtmc0vXa\u0026fid=0x0:0x27da37c7443f4e3c"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Stephen Khouri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5UawlGtA9rWBFK0r-VX3nz6V0UG7OH6l4ktt4nYw7u_NTVx0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Second time we enjoyed high tea at the Globe.  Quality tea, classy decor, and great attentive service.  The menu was enjoyable and the smoked salmon the best high tea savory I have ever had.  Perfectly balanced flavours, textures and taste.  The sweet options, though enjoyable were somewhat cloying.  Although whimsical the cake pop was dense and overly sweet, the Madeleine chocolate was waxy and the clotted cream was stale.\nIf you find a deal it is well worth your time and they cover your parking cost.  If not, then perhaps consider other options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi9QL3TcMPm7-UfNKwZvFzG0S94WWlZkSvgvzy\u0026fid=0x0:0x27da37c7443f4e3c"],"When":"2023-12-16"},{"Name":"Christine Guan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-Zxh1GYPlDFaXw00JjLHirgmazXR0vtgl2MXQRjuK1hMy3cwvdw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Salty! Salty! Salty! Stayed at Fairmont for an early flight next morning. Normally the airport doesn't have food court before security checkpoint. So we didn't walk around, just went to the restaurant downstairs. The food is really pricey and the taste doesn't match what you pay for. So so salty. Beautiful place though. If you don't care about the price tag and food quality, just want to enjoy the environment, it's a nice place. Otherwise Stay away from this restaurant. There're many choices in the food court at gate D entrance area. For your reference, 24$ for the muscle, cannot compare to the muscles at bonefish. $46 for the the chicken.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNODk5wPTSvbkG_VVLzZtmT7xjFCvCq-iLFMgTm\u0026fid=0x0:0x27da37c7443f4e3c"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"David Fry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbpKpgYdNQli8zNpDwHAcFas4AJ-e0rTzaU_wzqiMMvRQvt7h0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow, what a great experience. The service was a bit slow because the place was packed! Every bite of food was enjoyable, and the service was perfect. Very clean too, so I’m not sure what the other post referred to. The steak I had was the best I’ve had in awhile. The sauce it came with was too sweet, and the steak needed a little more seasoning for my taste, but that’s what table salt’s for. A+","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxp8dVvZ61OCREFUp3QRTuXH-YqmoFfLlp4qE\u0026fid=0x0:0x27da37c7443f4e3c"],"When":"2023-6-26"},{"Name":"Kate S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcomj4iSLQT5gpP27r2lFYtaRe6Bg5P0F1vbE6dqPAH3a_PoU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an afternoon tea! It was a nice experience, we got a good deal too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQrobii5dzp85dB4GuqzOlO6BvDNWDbJ-vOmNV\u0026fid=0x0:0x27da37c7443f4e3c"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Laura O'Reilly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4uxdRTY7ua22g0exar9kX6exrTa0EEolby4c1Glq-pgp5FKqb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely high tea here. When you book ahead they are able to accommodate dietary restrictions like vegan, gluten free etc. Our server Josh was pleasant and professional and even offered to take a photo for us when our beautiful food arrived. Everything was tasty and delightful. High tea done right - the Fairmont provides an excellent experience once again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcDuSPnVXk9YRw6h7i7kYIQUIxpyvfptZDFYqd\u0026fid=0x0:0x27da37c7443f4e3c"],"When":"2023-10-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kristine Cavey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzB7YyNoTZcERBq3E2sz0G5Lf3K_zwDnwVyISed2DzOoN6XOhvRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wow, I'm glad that I stumbled on this place. It's just lovely. The lighting is gentle, with a palette of muted colours throughout. Very easy on the eyes. And easy to relax into. Staff were all friendly and patient, easy to talk with. Washrooms were clean. I like the retail offerings, well made and nicely presented.

The matcha latte was deliciously smooth and the cookie was good. When I was there, only half the baked goods section has food, the other half was empty. I would love to see more options.

Will definitely return when I'm in the area again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDe3piXAwD0WLl29zpLWTDJ9r6S5jOe2zS_Vzg&fid=0x0:0xfd1ea50362786f74"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Carissa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuDCwD1GmQsZ-McdIX5yFKOjsiFzzohxCz5Qi6STLBc2mO_OLT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! Just so much goodness here. A bright, kind, inclusive coffee/treat lounge. The employees here are so happy and kind. The drinks are perfectly balanced and served in ceramic, if you have time to enjoy them in house. They have a puppuccino on the menu and dogs are welcome. Seating is arranged in several cozy areas between a couch/living room corner, a communal table and many bistro sets for more intimate conversations for 2. I only tried the Lemon Loaf from the generous bakery offerings (half of which were vegan, including the luscious lemon loaf) but I can't imagine going back for anything else. A level up experience with little pops of flavor throughout that may be due to finely shredded coconut or possibly millet? Unsure but it was really really a flavor/texture surprise that paired so perfectly with a delicately spiced oat chai. A 5 star experience on every level.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6NbEaapB8zYEggVdYYZ9NyH14rSZrIUTUZPTY&fid=0x0:0xfd1ea50362786f74"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCDMUY42ah4aAgta84ssT2DYa3PFsR3r4fbxhBdcs3AXShIgTOYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cool store/cafe hybrid concept with plenty of seating. You have to bring your own tumbler if you want to take your coffee to go, otherwise they have small take out mugs for sale. We ordered two coffees and a cookie. Sat by the window and enjoyed a bit of people watching with our coffees.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOdhAWasvYaGSGAs5iORbGqfUVv3Dt278dnmhQ&fid=0x0:0xfd1ea50362786f74"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"candy L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgq2OgnXFRsC1icGye-CTgUf_6kEV0cPoOgzI7ANMes5eDT-Xz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Since this café opened, we’ve been visiting very often with our dog to enjoy their coffee and pastries.Initially, the first three staff members we encountered were incredibly friendly and patient, answering all our questions with care. However, over time, the staff changed, and the experience started to decline.
One day, I asked one of the new employees about their rewards program and how points accumulate. Her response was shocking—she said it was a company system, and she didn’t know the details. When I expressed surprise, mentioning that as an employee, she should be familiar with it, she replied, “If you have any questions, you can call the company directly.”
Her dismissive attitude took me by surprise, and it didn’t end there. On subsequent visits, she greeted us with an unfriendly demeanor, which completely ruined the experience for me. It’s disappointing because I had initially given this café a glowing 5-star review and recommended it to many friends. However, due to this staff member’s poor attitude, I’ve decided to lower my rating .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2gBLzX_Z0k352npS12IQmyeEOfWCLc6vTFnbo&fid=0x0:0xfd1ea50362786f74"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Cameron McPhail","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2RWX9z3Hl46BN6nMtPIcJpOw1Ud74ix-exwCeF1p5LjnESRDF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In a sea of online order forms, Amazon returns, indifference and artificial importance… occasionally, a business takes a step forward and says “we can do better”. They do. The new Fable coffee shop/boutique is beautifully decorated, tastefully laid out, and emits a calmness and serenity not unlike a spa, library or wellness retreat.

My girlfriend got Mugs, and I liked them. She got me dishes… I really liked them… and she needed wine glasses, so I ordered her Fable’s version.

A slight issue with shipping time, delayed arrival for what was meant to be a birthday gift. Not a big deal, right?

Instead of the usual “f&$k you… it will get there when it gets there” we’ve grown to expect, I received a personal note from Jocelyn the manager. A sincere apology, an invitation down for a coffee, an updated ETA on the wine glasses and even a little something as a token of their appreciation for my patience.

These little gestures make an immense difference in our funny little world, and if I didn’t love Fable already, I sure do now.

Get down there, have an espresso and pick some pieces that are beautiful and curated by people who really are doing a sensational job. 11/10.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JD PRESIDENT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQiVgkhgZS0yYCA28uboWSpKFRhms8RPwBDwyonts7T6PynQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Happened upon this cafe and ordered the oat nog. I wanted to pay cash but was told they do not accept cash. Odd considering the company states they are all about employees, fair wages, not focussed in tips rather on employee culture. Do you not trust your employees w/ cash?! What about clients? Perhaps fair treatment for them to be able to use legal tender would be nice. Not everyone wants to tap for $5. The staff were lovely btw. Shame about the needless percentage you are paying to the banks which already make billions. Encourage cash usage.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bonnie G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTEZulk1PVgTQcLBkLjjb3Dso5YdlaQiU6aNIXN5M9Xup4vzw-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere was so nice, both coffee and matcha latte were amazing. I was pleasantly surprised to see the clay cups for takeout—that was such a cool touch! Really love the vibe! I’ll definitely be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"harmen k","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUE3qJRedpffMosEWeiRlm3_opTsV7XQ8-2XOHWsUXGSuTzHgxK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great coffee experience with the kindest staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsFT1BCTbXE3Cky_-HfwKlraIdsedakWo22bil&fid=0x0:0xfd1ea50362786f74"],"When":"2024-11-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Winnie So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyynzyslbrlBtQSD6Mo4wtiqwipQfd2u4afkq6TQ0HU4eh1lXVzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice market and cafe. I needed to find a place to sit down and warm up while waiting for my ride. Very good London fog and freshly made bubble waffle. Will definitely come back when I am in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWRDEHYEUqmIJNOmTkciCQitGJiGRCZuaq3feK&fid=0x0:0xbd17fbbcfa7500f8"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Tricia Pang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyVqJcEWgHydzV9a14bwq4erYV5b3SuhyDmhe7hV1wLItoiVaJbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm so excited that I discovered Bona! It's a cute little market with import products from Japan, from snacks to noodles, and sauces to skincare products. In addition, a corner is nicely furnished as a coffee shop with fresh made drinks from Paragon tea on Cambie St, and to go meals like sushi and onigiri. Friendly staff let me know they opened just 3 months ago, I'll definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMT8RRpOuuFRkDWr6RjSWvyWHCj0dWetA04kaK&fid=0x0:0xbd17fbbcfa7500f8"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s a neat market with a grocery store side and a coffee shop side. They have unique novelty Asian snacks and ready made foods including these tasty cute fruit shaped popsicles with real fruit bits in them. I tried the pineapple one and it was both cute and delicious. However, they lose a star for their ridiculous tipping culture. I literally walked into this grocery store and took a popsicle out of the freezer and went to pay and the cashier gave me a screen with minimum tipping options of 10% to 12% or something and I chose the no tip as there was literally no service but to even be asked this as a customer in a grocery store when inflation is insane and I literally did my own grocery shopping is an example of tipping culture going out of control. This, in my opinion, needs to stop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_dM9U3FbG5Od4G5qz56057iHb2MFvXdbX7K2U&fid=0x0:0xbd17fbbcfa7500f8"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cool store with Japanese snacks, drinks, and personal care products, and a coffee shop. They make their own sorbet which you can buy in individual servings! The layout is organized and not cramped. There are some tables set up by the cafe area where you can enjoy your food and drinks. The staff was very friendly.
I got some snacks from the grocery section and then went to get a bubble waffle and drink from the cafe. I got their limited egg tart bubble waffle and the seasonal pumpkin cream iced chai latte. I was especially excited about the egg tart bubble waffle and it was so good, with bites of gooey egg custard in each bubble. Very unique! The pumpkin cream iced chai was also delicious. The cream layer wasn’t too heavy, almost like a thick foam top.
I saw that they carry sushi and sandwiches but they didn’t have any available when I was there, it was just a few bentos (pork or beef I think), roll cakes, and cheesecakes. It would be nice if the desserts came in single servings instead of only in pairs!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJZtpwQBGY63ljGbx-ZPX45rgZVNMTkIe8bDs7&fid=0x0:0xbd17fbbcfa7500f8"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Shehnaz Jossan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKX6-dQdGtgjw3JhGV_Pi6Y5FwNoQsJO-Wu1rk_P7Pqzunozw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their coffee tastes amazing and i love the bubble waffles.. i usually get my morning coffee from there as i work nearby and the staff is super friendly always greet me with a smile whenever i go there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQA4eRP8iRPT3RubKlwoMH43flmwFdYnZaWebN&fid=0x0:0xbd17fbbcfa7500f8"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Cat C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZCNjT3XaeXiC6VnlKFy_lec5lMs-4ZK-XgYIM5Qq13e1F-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been excitedly waiting for this shop to open. So awesome to have a new coffeeshop in the area ! Lots of Asian snacks, desserts, and pantry items that are reasonably priced. Beautiful coffee bar and their latte was tasty. I hope there will be outdoor seating in the future! Welcome to the neighborhood:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4Yq0ExB-LgqLxE0e1SAD68zg6NEMm9H_d06nf&fid=0x0:0xbd17fbbcfa7500f8"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"Alex Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJJ7NXqeCxL6miBfuIGz1SIs5OMPzrMQN5pLVE-cUNFO3rnBLH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A new but awesome cafe with a variety of drinks and Asian teas. They also serve some Paragon Tea Room drinks and bubble waffles.

The market also has a variety of Asian food products that can be hard to find!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elaine Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqS2CVSxc15Rkht_jJFvygIM6-pTP-ekR_KWcLTwONCNcpwFgs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Omg such a huge collection of goodies! Beverages snacks cooking supplies.. you name it! They even have bento boxes and sushi lunches. If you wanna grab a quick bite / snack or something for groceries this is THE PLACE!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCf5pNAWSpKOdsQ806cnC5nTB3kz5KFkskc6lT&fid=0x0:0xbd17fbbcfa7500f8"],"When":"2024-8-20"}]
