user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Caroline Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSFUPNtjEjk9Rx5wi8mXGm3ws-QJa9m_H0MpwhrASD6BXlscCo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Definitely been here many times and today was a great experience! Lots of staff today, so no weight times. The breakfast sandwich is back to being delicious again! Watch out for the spice! Maybe they should warn about the hot sauce. But I love the soft egg and brioche bun.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNls_Q5FQR5Ox5f849_vwEIoKVvkJHNCs9znyyn&fid=0x0:0xea4001cf150c8f99"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Susan B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHKJY-EMHnWBIXlJHEFiG6OL4PYQHLkrEXigMvrfYRG5sjXf0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Strawberry lavender latte is delicious. Also loved the chicken club sandwich (the bread was a little tough though) and THOSE FRIES. Great spot to work or study. Plenty of space inside plus some outlets, and more space outside which is nice when it’s sunny. Friendly staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKU_W5k3LU_PhGGdOPUmIgpn24ovArz-aXvqih&fid=0x0:0xea4001cf150c8f99"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Neil Allen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUMtOTv7wffX3DoLTzpe4Cg3wFRslKHLwyPbihFsaXZS4MCcWK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice place. We attend a couple of times a week. The servers are lovely but I feel they are under staffed. Coffee is always great and the baked goods are always tasty. They also have a nice selection of beers but it is always too early in the day for me to partake !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Madison G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZsEld-Yz5a2Swm5LesjF83lo03ZXPGgujeQvQiLn6WLaIuGx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the vibe of this Cafe. They had classic 80s music playing today and that alone would make me want to come back. It’s a cute little place with lots of room both inside and outside to enjoy your food and study. The customer service was great. The place was very clean. The food we ordered was very delicious and warm. I will say that I did notice that the food and drink menu is more on the pricier side. My oat latte was really good, and was beautifully presented. Something I do love about this place as-well is not only is it a coffee shop, but it sells alcohol! I have never experienced a coffee shop that serves coffee, breakfast, lunch, beer and cocktails! Super cool ! Definitely worth a check out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMe4a04uUtaQOgFWi4oSBzi_BHrBNaKAKRAognI&fid=0x0:0xea4001cf150c8f99"],"When":"2022-1-28"},{"Name":"Bryn Sadownik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLq3GGMd6jztgJcmdIbtgJXooJDahTQotsH5iBxWjv0wOuOfGxp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I have been going here for years. It is a lovely place to hang out. I was pretty shocked at how bad the food is now though and how expensive it is under new management. The food they served was one of the highlights before. Hopefully they can rethink the changes they made to the menu and the very poor quality and value of what they offer now.  The burrito is especially sad, tasteless, small and expensive. They are a little understaffed given how busy they are, but that will change as more people taste the new food offerings.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Greer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPcEivM2aGRS5diuwVy3yzdezDxM7rMywfTYOYYV3x0RgHhORc8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I stopped here for lunch today. We appreciated that we could actually sit down. The upstairs area filled with light when the clouds parted a bit. We both had lunch sandwiches. My wife the beet one. I had chicken. Each was large with generous portions. We added in the salad. There were topped with sprouts, which I am not so keen on, but which my wife loves. We had a peaceful and lovely lunch together. I have had great coffee here on previous visits. The desserts look delicious, but I haven’t yet tried one. All the more reason for another visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZoImZrJt5YwyInzQJFhmOY25rqitHw4VSMBcB&fid=0x0:0xea4001cf150c8f99"],"When":"2021-3-8"},{"Name":"Gal Dekel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUudcL3hPs5CYLhr5LqDYmFQ7ZypfmQbMrznr4CLXwJsCGp4EfL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here to do some studying with a nice drink and it was great. The atmosphere is nice, not too noisy that you can’t focus but noisy enough that you can zone out and do your own things. The tomato pesto sandwich was delicious, very flavourful and a nice size. The toffee pretzel mocha was really good, not too sweet.
Overall, the service is good and the place is a nice and chill spot to hang out with others or alone !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObC-rSXxl5ChuW54faqsth-6KoLtiC4GI6OtKn&fid=0x0:0xea4001cf150c8f99"],"When":"2023-9-2"},{"Name":"David Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_gLsa6v5gySKSS_XsGUNGUH0ztQ1eI_u20fd8Bq8ufaOA8KG9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Food: 2.5/5
Service: 4/5
Price: $15-$20

The menu has changed to a lot of vegetarian things I think. Was wanting their breakfast platter but they don’t do that anymore. Also ordered two flat whites. I think the barista was in training as our drinks looked a little different from what we expected. Tasted fine though. Honestly everything was expensive for what you get.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCeSgfTuyn6b-v3aw0s-oZ14KypBWnM0YFMQNt&fid=0x0:0xea4001cf150c8f99"],"When":"2023-3-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"C Pedrosa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcMDy4tMBdT1bu6DvBAjbPuH68jW3f1qeeNrDCc5DPFdSftMlu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Been here multiple times but have never reviewed it. I’d think it’s appropriate to review this now as most restaurants have upped their prices so high that it’s now crucial to see legit reviews before going into a restaurant. The prices on most sites are also not updated.

We went a month ago for dimsum. And it didn’t disappoint. Gone are the days of $5 dimsum. I’ve included photos of the menu for references.

The BBQ pork bun , siumai , har gow , deep fried tofu, stir fried pea shoots were all good.
Prices were still reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMlB8jQPwf7L24NTW_t3zVPskAuLhUlxrs52CN&fid=0x0:0x5010fbdeb708d156"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Amy T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkawagE2k64-0mOKTa2m4RFuRQ8NwpWcpbkN_wYPhhP6KnhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent place to eat.
Eating here was nice their Shumai was good, lots of shrimp.
Price is decent. Love the 20% discount before 11
Tea and water chrage $2 person
Chrage extra for credit card usage","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqKczgHyIdVPLTbNg64JgWX0BZG6h8vHgHCi0f&fid=0x0:0x5010fbdeb708d156"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"jackie lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaAcdVrDeBuMYF3GBs532JLtLQvHmApF1OnqaGO2o1T1jOWMVtTA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"🗣️‼️MEDIOCRE FOOD; TERRIBLE SERVICE‼️🗣️

Ordered the Century Egg, Pork and Scallop Congee. Besides the fact that it was the worst congee I've ever tasted in terms of flavours and add-ins (it was gritty and unnecessarily deviated from classic and familiar tastes; a sorry excuse for a century egg and pork congee), we found a piece of plastic in the the congee to which we notified the server.

The server apologized and asked if we'd like to replace it with the same item or with a different item on the menu, to which we declined. As I was uncomfortable and expressed my disappointment, they additionally added a 10% off from gratuity to our bill, however I felt that more reparations could be done, as simply removing the item off my bill does little to win me over as a customer. Are we just collectively pretending that nothing happened when you put my health in danger? Why would I want more congee when you boiled it with the plastic? How did it even get into the food?

As I was displeased with the food and service, I left a $3.50 tip on the $53.60 bill. I honestly did not want to tip at all, but felt that the rest of the food, such as the Ginger Milk Custard, was quite good. I felt my tip was reasonable given the circumstances but their continued service left a sour taste in my mouth.

As we were leaving, the waitress who took our bill chased us down and complained that we did not leave at least a 10% tip so that we cannot leave. She said they had already taken 10% for gratuity so that the least we could do was to add to their tip so that it would be at least 10%. Outrageous. Did we forget as a society that tips were given for good service or did we become entitled to it? Not only was this tip requirement never expressed on their menu or in any fine print, it's unreasonable to treat your guests with mediocre food that had plastic in it; my expectations were not matched either. Good tips were not warranted for this type of subpar service.

I understand that the plastic was a mistake but chasing us down clearly wasn't a mistake and I found it highly unprofessional and simply just horrible customer service. Anyways, we (again) expressed that we found plastic in our food and it made the rest of the eating experience quite uncomfortable as everyone at the table lost their appetites from the experience (it was also the first thing served to us; incredible start to the meal!). Also, quite hilarious that they specifically only talked to the one man of the group when directing their complaints to us, as he believed him to be in charge. It felt a little misogynistic frankly, as I, a woman was the one with my wallet clearly visible and I was also the one that paid and complained ab the situation.

In short, there are better places to enjoy dimsum and spend your money— especially in Richmond. This had to be the worst of the worst, only good for their convenience.

‼️Reiterating again: bad service, bad food, interact at your own risk‼️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZtcDMB3amwypgql1AtLcQrn-7yl-rzRAbcZF8&fid=0x0:0x5010fbdeb708d156"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Lizzie S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5qIG1VmBASZQRSYXsIMifm6rtLhZA6xcKTGDs0bvXyJT2pXkmsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Decent dimsum with good portion and cheaper price when you placed the order before 11am. Much better than my expectations even if dimsum in Richmond is very competitive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw_KaEaS8-v8QzAIqwVDXsSopgWhCbbRo_cbSE&fid=0x0:0x5010fbdeb708d156"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"whitekaminari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVR6flZAZi5cGzy0yca_eUOfsBSKsO_LdazQ1dRHpT5lcEo-J-I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best Shumai I ever had is served here. Juicy shrimp and tender chopped pork filling wrapped in paper thin pastry skin with just the right combination of savory, sweet and richness. It is robust yet delicate. The other food items are just as memorable. I envy those who get to eat here regularly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuvTkbqnNz9uBqllmjAQagZK7uNYkGmWy6XCyz&fid=0x0:0x5010fbdeb708d156"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"J Roberts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZCK_Dwit38tgGB6wCDQgn_t0VvLEAlRjrv6_w2VfOSJRvoeNFrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Our first time here and we were pleasantly surprised. The prices are fair for dim sum, and we had some extra food because the size of the dumplings and portions of our side orders were larger than we expected. Wait staff was attentive. A good experience. Bon appétit !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSYkGEARNFKFC2yBWDRBvaiYSAQQLq2EFveBoz&fid=0x0:0x5010fbdeb708d156"],"When":"2023-9-13"},{"Name":"秋叶Keri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd18Sd72wnsijj6zXT4G0GHIk_0ZZ-qt4QG4UGeZTfA4kE0p3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Food was good, but the service was horrible!  We ordered expensive king crab set and they knew it’s the birthday lunch and after we finished lunch, they wouldn’t let us have the birthday cake. The restaurant told us that they don’t do cake cutting service for lunch.  Also they told us the king crab set is $380 something but later on they charged us $40 per pound which turned out much more expensive that we thought. Will never go back again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPE0wiUh-7O_LrrSkDoPn0uHT6T3m6k1UfR8ell&fid=0x0:0x5010fbdeb708d156"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Tommy “Powerbuilderwannabe” Xiao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfDi4iFU0b7G0chKTplbE5u7vf20zgZVI66nBpazopRw9TLzij=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the dim sum dishes they served, all of the dishes here are extremely authentic and delicious. The portions and presentation are well worth with their prices. Friendly staffs as usual. This place has been a stable spot for us for many years.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDN1LAUGgAqjbA4lDT0OvoVoKS662fx7YE0Eya&fid=0x0:0x5010fbdeb708d156"],"When":"2024-4-7"}]

[{"Name":"Lisa Vo-Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoLvTf2LT62Uz4LQzMU-zUD5GUEsqYztYxTxoro4_b7qYSL_0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend Ririmisu desserts! Not only are the treats cute, but they’re delicious!!

Got to try the Halloween mini cakes but can’t go wrong with the original tiramisu box 🤤🤤 would definitely order again 💗💗","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPfskqiP7N-K2453RmHq8NHduD8H_aDgPYsnpg&fid=0x0:0x596a825e4879668b"],"When":"2021-10-31"},{"Name":"Jennifer Yee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmcg1e6TuXAn1PNW8AvHWEtPCzd2sRCbhTzwo56gEp3pygjw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My friend bought me the original tirimisu!(no photo😔) Its just moist enough and is fairly light because there isnt too much cream. It was so good, I could eat the whole thing myself!

I bought the taro mochi and mango tirimisu for lunar new year.

The taro mochi has real taro filling and isnt too sweet. Perfect for elders. I found the lady fingers a bit dry for this one, but the mochi was still soft even after 3 days in the fridge!

The mango tirimisu was different for sure. I didn't like it as much as the original, but its a nice change especially for those who prefer a fruity flavour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNT0496QJUjw2-xPe9-8Unb_MH7oNrVL9kOToK6&fid=0x0:0x596a825e4879668b"],"When":"2022-2-3"},{"Name":"A Quinoa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIx3ajOnGANGMKFDEUP841lVNzgi-XoRb244qBUC6zn2IbrRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect basque cheesecake has been found here!!😻
We had a really great time celebrating our teammate’s birthday with the cake!!

And Christal is 120% kind and helpful 🫶🏻 she’s an angel!!

When you order from their website, the pickup location is set in Richmond 🤣 and they'll send you a confirmation email right away 🤣 So don’t go to the waterfront cafe for pickup if you didn't request it lolll","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"yumi sadano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJW8am1mLqhyMKCFOmis7oUovrhH-L5kfEp99nTugBom8UBCw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My most favorite cake shop in Vancouver!! I like cakes which aren't so sweet and Ririmisu is perfect. Their Cake boxes and cheesecakes are amazing🥺 Not only tase, their cakes look so cute😻My favorite is tiramisu cheesecake! I ordered already 3 times last 6 months and always awesome taste👏 I am so glad to find this cake shop and want more people to try Ririmisu!!!❤ Highly Highly Highly recommended❤❤❤","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJArxAV32FlwddDEk096xoVwNmT5r4lG6qJMzu1-6Qw7-I8yw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my hubby's birthday few weeks ago, and I remember he was craving for a rich tiramisu and Basque  Burnt cheesecake, so it is perfect that I found their beautiful Basque Burnt Cheesecake with Tiramisu.   They even shipped the cake all the way to my door so I could pop a surprise celebration.  They have friendly service, smooth communication and the cakes taste like heaven!!  Not even joking!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lawrence Hsu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjuoxWcApzhFgWxFEwi_xCkoMtw5M5lZuUbiQ9zpXeL6u4QG-U=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Oreo tiramisu is so delicious! I tried all kind of flavors and it tastes all good! The cream is light but with rich flavor and not too sweet. I can’t wait to try their Halloween monster cake set!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_Op0h8kgtg0PYAX1HTe_uT4QZR5PuSNbK78C3gKa-0bPCsHsK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have tried almost all of their offerings and can genuinely say that every single item has been delicious. When you see and taste each creation, it is obvious how much thought, effort and originality has been put in each dessert item. 100% recommend trying Ririmisu Desserts!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"C Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwzL3rgHRtPHlTR8pbK7TY12_9AsAbyDt4HInQ8IHLvZRUVA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always enjoy tasting sweet treats from Ririmisu. Ordered a original cheesecake as a birthday cake last week. Everyone loved the cheesecake. We will order more from Ririmisu for sure.","Images":null,"When":""}]

The barista was also nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO56p1CBgJZgEN9YzBAvgJmYonIllxS8qaU47e8&fid=0x0:0x1094d8cc03144b79"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Henry Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcTlx45tkivdnVyW4B38kXt4WHZXtLMp6yRttTlIFdf-1gou8R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A lovely coffee shop with ample seating and great view of sea and mountains. A very cozy place to relax.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM78NZ7sRXZj7tuTEoSgHa2Ny9JULqZClqMydy5&fid=0x0:0x1094d8cc03144b79"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Jenny Ng-Turner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBsFl44XkAMsYNoEA0Xxy59w6P6Q1im7VjCqp8Dpv66mTVlMs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We always love coming here for coffee! It’s delicious with great views of the water. Today we brought my parents here from Winnipeg!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTxnvOEIiEVa-yOG6nNXXKqlyn2S_c-izK5eA0&fid=0x0:0x1094d8cc03144b79"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Benj Bolasoc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtcry3F-T7rKz9QpbptGphfEfkRBo3l-HQGNu8V9sipDIMnSm0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me and my wife go here every weekend for coffee but my favorite was the Cafe Mocha with Whipped Cream and always customize it with half sweet and extra hot. The view is so beautiful and relaxing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTxTnUcwdzwIYaF6il16Cv1COYOez_tdQ_MqEw&fid=0x0:0x1094d8cc03144b79"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"bartika dutta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxjFpxrYjqtLhAuG4lm-ZcNIBbYGGduA3S5m04EChhzkLwL5L7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good food and great views! This eatery is located inside Granville Island Public Market. The omelette wrap was tasty, and the coffee was deeply rich in taste. Upstairs seating is available too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8uqVs4lAh8xaln24ShJr5QtsRzMJ5D7-pHoAI&fid=0x0:0x1094d8cc03144b79"],"When":"2023-12-26"},{"Name":"Hamid Reza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHD8HNtMzjbgukE464I3-iDKsbKkj4AdGkcK2yiZdD9BG_4oH0YQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Blue Parrot is my new favourite coffee spot! The ambiance is warm and cozy, perfect for relaxing or getting some work done. Their coffee is absolutely amazing—rich, smooth, and perfectly brewed. I tried their cappuccino, and it was one of the best I’ve ever had. They also offer a great selection of pastries and snacks, which pair wonderfully with their drinks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Soo Jin Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBnoRbd6FIbmZrfNgPOLqvha_4W3ExBUsGWwanBDgD-KXH4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I usually get a coffee for myself and snack for kids after swimming. The staffs are very friendly and their coffee is great! My kids love pizza, sandwiches, and rainbow grilled cheese...and of course ice cream! The kitchen is very clean and we all enjoy getting snacks and drinks from blue parrot!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alexia Yavicoli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5eHudlV-q8xMw6STZoUK-CG6_fUOPNPX_4u3tVrPgGGsY0lg9Fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their coffee is okay/good. They have vegetarian milk.
Their pastries are good.
What I like the most is the view from the tables around Blue parrot. Sitting there looking at the water, birds, etc.
If you want to enjoy the place, don't go during holidays or weekends,  try to avoid lunchtime too because the place is full of restaurants.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Snackshot Marpole
descriptions: Basic dessert cafe whipping up imaginative Hong Kong–style treats, along with sweet drinks.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"In-store pickup","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Erica Ngan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxiFAMX-8U6Hf7I7ySV2AT1mYgYdeBidCPp2cDYnZKccTLsR17eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's a fun place to go if you want late night and food you can take photos of. First saw this mahjong dessert at night market but found this shop here close to Richmond. They have a few fun things to try and I'll definitely return. The price was a bit high though but late night the parking is easy to find.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHGdmL-IKBhdncXem8nYqHn1UhIPxClmergyGB\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Calvin Kuah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqbTsBWnCBursGa27KALU0xx_nKsfLzVcv66Os3FNgNZjIgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a really cool place to have some dessert. I got the cold coconut sago with ice cream and mochi and it was amazing. The perfect post dinner dessert on a summer night. We ordered through a web page and it was easy to use. Our dessert came quickly as well. The shop was perfect for hanging out with friends and family as well as hanging some alone time and enjoying a nice dessert. Highly recommended for Asian dessert.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZHopPV0nonPooC2c-omnbiKWxg-UTvCIeEESv\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"JCVN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSLVtszyROwrIXO23Ocf7-_nm0i3o8Ra8Lq_5zV146VQ8GAlwgoA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For casual-hip Hong Kong style desserts I'd highly recommend visiting a Snackshot in Vancouver. They have a couple of locations and this one is conveniently located on Granville close to the Richmond/Van border. It's casual and family friendly but at the same time a fun date destination after dinner for all age groups. Checkout their refreshing drinks. Our group loved the signature mah jong red bean coconut jelly dessert and even tried bites of the HKD and USD cash made of rice paper. Owner came out to say hey and introduce himself, he's from HK and puts his heart into the menu and atmosphere here. He's having a tonne of fun running the place you can tell. By the end of the night the place was packed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKU9ubRAikeOn7s1o-aYcq7pDamV4tmmhXAbL2\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"charles bai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVivIWOvTOamsgiucoqI5EKukhiOsZqTk7nog1iV-Y1Xav6PIczow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Don’t think you can go wrong with any of their Asian desserts - just depends on what you’re in the mood for. The items we got had great flavor.\n\nJust stay away from the savory items… I ordered the popcorn chicken expecting Taiwanese style fried chicken - fragrant from the white pepper and basil and perfectly crunchy, chewy and juicy. Instead, I got a big Costco frozen food disappointment :(","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAsZ9DU5rg-WSHAgWM7oFIuvdGvr-JMOWzyKUf\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2024-4-15"},{"Name":"Auroraz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVS-aCDJklElvz2PfUhMx2uJHhCa1H4sW7TaJqX4aV6_Xjb3kaU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Snackshot in Marpole, BC, is a culinary gem that should not be missed! Their innovative take on Asian snacks is a delightful experience for the taste buds. The unique flavors and creative presentations add an exciting twist to traditional favorites.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMr34hBojxJK8dnN80cUf_cDde4oJZ5qH4Q95VR\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2023-8-21"},{"Name":"Jenny Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMGE3dR7QUUqRQ0H3D-H0cCDxLqPkeDZ7z-mFJ8SO_PBwrcc46=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The tasting platter is SO good! My friend and I liked every single dessert in the platter. We ordered the hot one and loved it. The Majong dessert (they make a limited number each day) is hilarious and so fun to take photos of. Highly recommend this place! The ambiance is nothing special but the desserts are great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8QJSKHZjxrwNuTnNydjhQlqQWSxQoTYmQkwKH\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2020-1-2"},{"Name":"Kathleen Fan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJix5mk4ZA1VeIzL-nKAr68rE3O1HbNmKZEl4HB2vLCK2NNZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"HK style desert place, famous of their platter include 9 kind of desert combination, good for more 4-6 people to try. Warm service, waiters very patient explaining the dishes, they also has created a web page for the platter so you can easily check out for the flavors. Generally good experience, will come to try other deserts next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTm0FEac8g0LYvgbdUoFE0o-ndGe2hj6oM4UmH\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2021-12-2"},{"Name":"Jen Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaL0RdeXtgs5sep6RZAPEECCWEbBdPSjyPl2-XazNd0JVBT_pLjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The barrel tofu is lovely. Very well presented and cute. A bit on the pricy side and you'll want a friend to share. Other items seem to be good as well. The buttery sweet milk toast was great - not too sweet. Decor is cute as well. During popular times be ready for a wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfviHYYW3UwvIxWvw9T1GC1EqTY7X2K8PJU-68\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2017-10-8"}]

title: Patisserie Fur Elise
descriptions: French pastries & other desserts along with afternoon tea in a Victorian house from 1893.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Just Me Traveling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX18amg9WNM9rF8Fs9axj8FE9tNtrVpXPgaMIl0yMbfuZ56ahzt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went here with a friend in a weekend. It was a nice experience. The place was not that big but it was cozy and nicely decorated for a tea time atmosphere. The service was great and the staff were really nice. I enjoyed the selection of the tea time items both sweet and savory. Initially I thought it will not be enough but we ended up taking home few pieces as we weren’t able to finish it.My favorite among all the items is the panacotta. It was so smooth and creamy, the panacotta that I’ve tried so far.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYH34p3QsdjlvDK-acGyCkQFQnrfQtYPLkArM_&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Lucy Animator","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY7brXamElnS01fAQfTXCPF3JSbsNMYZuWBhl1ILRqSsdPDqE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Omg! I can’t with the beauty of this place!! We had the high tea experience and it was amazing! The food is delicious -everything so tasty-all of it!-, the decoration is perfect, the atmosphere so enjoyable and the staff do a great job! I really have an incredible and dreamy, amazing day with my friend. The music is pleasant and at great volume for a conversation. We enjoyed the downstairs store as well, everything is so pretty!!! 😍
I’m in love and definitely will be back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmdY1jFbLnA_1y63RI44_okSEwhX9KcYA5mZc&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"leesa tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWsWaHyhzcw7kKPh9V3HkvTK5TTa81TdmCDp9IylYllx4puXIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little place to come for high tea. Love the exterior of the building as this restaurant is basically located in a house.

Overall the food quality was decent for the price as it is cheaper than other places. I liked the teacup pots as well. The peach tea was my favourite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYCHI_Ln4imSRzm47Xen3BHj7iBlS8K1NaP_Ih&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"Kwong Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRNhrcdIOQyhkpCbdjoUSwC0OqkPEp5C09o-KZX9pyAsIQioX9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"🍰☕ Enchanted Afternoon Tea at Patisserie Fur Elise with Family 🌸👨‍👩‍👧‍👧

🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 Our family's weekend afternoon tea at Patisserie Fur Elise was like stepping into a storybook. The Victorian ambiance, paired with exquisite pastries and teas, made for a magical escape in downtown Vancouver. Each treat, from the delicate sandwiches to the sumptuous sweets, was a delight to the senses. The kids were enchanted by the elegant setting and the delicious selections tailored just for them. It was a memorable experience that blended sophistication with a warm, family-friendly atmosphere. A perfect blend of culinary excellence and ambiance that we'll treasure. 🍴💖","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5OpGh-Q-O2VsOAsybvKAsddu1fiZqSEuYMOBz&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Juliet D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnoiyKu2IE_QmMxqN8laqTB256R_5tMjahRejoR1AKjSVbkXHS9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very aesthetically pleasing place to visit for afternoon tea! An oasis of Europe surrounded by high-rise buildings of a busy city.
Good service, good tea, delicious food. Not like a luxury high tea experience from London but more like a cozy afternoon tea with your grandma.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMn_jhtqS54pV8SdhFNEX2aAyrO3T9LDfD9c3tf&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-5-7"},{"Name":"G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKy_RY7OyFpWDMGpBPfEcNdhNvd_Bt7gU5qWs4wH5XumgCFAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little gem of a place. Food was good, not amazing as other high tea places I’ve been to but not bad by any means. Service is lacking for sure. I’d definitely focus on that sore spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9yH3CvLCkxI5RVd3r14sF1t5LBQbjWhP15FPl&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2023-11-30"},{"Name":"Ananda Enkhtur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkkmVVa6j0bCuttopPInRikVrpr7LXYSHoZtWk3dhng__J_lZi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Incredibly disappointing experience, even giving 1 star is generous!
We had high expectations for this place from the pictures but everyone in our group collectively agreed with how bad of an experience it was. The lack of decent customer service and hostility is a start. The lady with her hair tied back was very passive aggressive and rude with us, almost as if she wanted us to leave the moment we entered the place, which made us really uncomfortable! The atmosphere and the interior is nothing too special, there are other high tea places in Vancouver that are far better than this one. The tray that is shown in the picture is shared between 3 people but is 60$ after the mandatory service fee and taxes. You’d be expecting a lot more for the price you’re paying but sadly the tray only included 1 sandwich per person that doesn’t even taste good and the sweets were either too sour or too sweet. First and last time coming to this place!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcVdOrQNlM_2uKWafjxgLu-J5wDwi2Bnahdsb7&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-2-20"},{"Name":"D D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn-HmKGkiEXpPYEJdaFnX-Wk9npBuMky8Sv8ZSJcapzQOOPiN3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute and charming afternoon tea in a heritage building with gorgeous decor. 1pm on a weekday we were the only people there.  Food was delicious.  Service was a bit of a miss this visit ... the first server was lovely but the second server was not attentive at all.  After 2 hours we struggled to get her attention to pay for our meal as she was on the phone with someone trying to plan a large gathering.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2OxlfzKkRS5I_bv3f5wczsc2eIOij2B0R5L6w&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2023-4-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dave Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL544JfNo-heg8UsP95fr9shcrTY9pTTKZqcIgOMgLc7F2usw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little place with a nice atmosphere. Located in a central location of Steveston. Lots of seating, great bar, multiple big screen TV. Staff is very friendly and quick. Ordered the Bacon Blue Burger, very very tasty. Will be back to try something else next time. Lots of street side parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcjqUUq2GR4SAxSMh2RWE9_wQW1_UfYova5MpT&fid=0x0:0xaf3dd358d82d4a93"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Prince Poo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoxxgycgXTlCr-InOoVvNG3Q7jby-aaA_RBgIV7L29tE2RJr8O=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of Poo’s favorite gastropubs in Richmond. Locally owned, quality food and decent pricing right in touristy Steveston Village make this a win. Not a huge place to roll up with 10 of your buddies.. this joint is where to go if you want to watch the game  with a small group from the bar top, or have a nice conversation without screaming at each other.

Hot wings with delicious buttermilk dip and the beef dip standout. Staff are laid back, friendly and always helpful when it comes to the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBek0-opeGvi2raMwyuWEUWAq0KXLQG_gQdBuH&fid=0x0:0xaf3dd358d82d4a93"],"When":"2022-12-12"},{"Name":"leesa tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWsWaHyhzcw7kKPh9V3HkvTK5TTa81TdmCDp9IylYllx4puXIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place had amazing chicken wings, the batter they use was amazing however everything else was a disappointment.

The fries were too salty and the kids menu of the chicken strips were so tiny. I have never seen chicken strips this tiny in my life. Also was not a fan of the BBQ sauce that they use in their burgers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGbI0MrELVMUot-lZWlkjrRVWNY8tWP40rUslO&fid=0x0:0xaf3dd358d82d4a93"],"When":"2023-5-1"},{"Name":"Austin Day","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtmQwwdNLx8jhzhMyuMKiSGI-p4y31sHh46NnIqNhLwnUb1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of new favorite spots now. Finally found a place where you can relax, have a beer, and have a conversation without having music blasting so loud in your ears. The music is just perfect.
Though we waited a bit too long for food, it was very delicious. The prices are fair and portions are big. We all enjoyed our meals. I'd never admit this again, but I had a bite of their Beyond Veggie Burger and it tasted better than my beef Burger...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcSg6WfSP5Xx1TaQ2jspHOOsbNQP2BWZuPjRqS&fid=0x0:0xaf3dd358d82d4a93"],"When":"2018-10-16"},{"Name":"Roxann Ck","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILOyQrznnB_QjxfD2zuoh8C8xniTVPpbO_HiDCW1J9AetePg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The menu is amazing! Makes it hard to choose what to eat . Everything I saw that came from the kitchen looked soooo good! I had fish n chips my friend had steak frites both were delicious! 🤤","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdt8O-CA7EfmYfaA3SM5FJzIju3fzw-18qaPJaXOe3LtaoSo4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Service was slower than I would have preferred given that it wasn't particularly busy. Once we ordered the food came out fairly quickly. My steak was cooked a bit more on the rare side than what I ordered but was acceptable. My fries came out ice cold, which when pointed out were quickly replaced with fresh ones. My dining partners beef dip had cold cheddar on it, would be nice if they tried to melt it a bit before hand. Overall the food and service were just ok. The beer selection was decent but easily beaten by other establishments in the area. I'll give this place another try in 6 months to a year before deciding not to return again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYRBx8dc4fl64KyPj3xKK0Cfv7Il5QV9ZCgzta&fid=0x0:0xaf3dd358d82d4a93"],"When":"2018-11-11"},{"Name":"Emily Ching","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVR5-jlk6Jy9z7mqJi1OoDYBUwNEGrtSQbHbdNBPmbnyqKwfyidw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The first thing my daughter told me after we ate there: “Mommy, can we not go back there again?” It sounds harsh, but it was pretty accurate. The only saving grace was the nachos. We went there last Thursday after trying a few other spots that didn’t have room. There was only one table occupied when we got there. (We should have taken the hint?)
We had the chicken wings which mediocre. I had the Beef Melt which was very bland. My daughter had the Mac & Cheese which she only took a few bites from. I don’t think we will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgGf6Zqnb47ZsA1hGDQSgy5g1S0w2mKM3O14p0&fid=0x0:0xaf3dd358d82d4a93"],"When":"2022-8-13"},{"Name":"Music Preservation","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP5xMTBNvDTvXF15vF6LA-5zcLt_JFx5XDJ1-0RRt6m4prSIk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Good tasting food and all but outrages portion size for how much you are paying. So expensive for so little","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Vikraant Sandhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTeYE_u-jjHmOycGAMzss8kScN2fwvucCgudri1-JgMFCMQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best choice for food in Steveston! Great pizza variety and taste, the wings are a must and now serving alcohol too. Great atmosphere with some TVs to watch some live sports. Would highly recommend checking out if you’re in Steveston!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWiRwOwAF-YHOPaIa2Dr12G612nyiyGehEtk6a\u0026fid=0x0:0x14088503b48bb104"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Tom Marvan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcByMBNEit9KjWswT3pON6apoAYayce4voEhevygfF_hEjbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I have been eating pizza here for over a decade pretty sure ownership has changed a few times. What I remember about old John's Pan pizza is the amount and quality of toppings. Even though it was never the cheapest option i would gravitate here just to get that solid carnivore feeling . Unfortunately my recent experience here is very average.  The crust is not great and the toppings are sparse. I will probably try to explore other options in the area after being disappointed few times. Attached is their pepperoni premium pizza and something they call Mediterranean I think.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0adcdWZtnQosxpdLqV7si29FQg4GNRm2sPi8U\u0026fid=0x0:0x14088503b48bb104"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Joe Ji74","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4vl1PEGpRLeDtZJ_VpKmPPSov8M1kXju9xR2ergoWv0RM-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very little toppings on the pizzas. Ordered the Pepperoni Lovers and it didn’t have very many pepperonis. Slightly undercooked.  Much better pizza in the frozen section at Save-on-Foods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdPtTrR-zYrybKWgvS5zJtiuoino24TcG37h4p\u0026fid=0x0:0x14088503b48bb104"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Sukhman Boparai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVVHjijTOI_TZ4AQxqTxOLwFAd6kUwAuzmAUpZy-t9iQCXbA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"stepped into this pizza haven today and was blown away by the variety of flavours they offer, welcoming staff. I ordered one meat and one veg pizza, both were very fresh and tasted superb.  I will surely come again. Best pizza shop ever!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoa5msmaXZrY9xqbx_C-5SAYoV16_kPnDQlzzm\u0026fid=0x0:0x14088503b48bb104"],"When":"2024-2-5"},{"Name":"Kathleen Hackett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHiH7LDEy-QfyvS90GkzH2wLw9wVETFHAXYIpRkceY-V0ETMV0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food was disappointing . Staff not familiar with Mediterranean cuisine. Macaroni noodles in the lasagna underneath the lasagna noodles. Greek salad made with white onions in massive chunks and skimpy on the feta. Maybe the pizza is good?  Pleasant staff but really slow.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Remington Trinidad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNQoYECz7m1_QqzDvhY3-NTTxpJBEBL1YGNAT4c9cRY-iqCeg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Got to try this gem in Richmond. Ordered the Vegan Pizza with everything loaded then the Vegan Pasta. The pizza was absolutely delicious, but was dissatisfied with the pasta. Was expecting more veggies in the pasta. Had to dig into the noodles to find what little spinach was in there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORFX5X4pIst-gzc5O3Od-7X893M6B9iSoJds8\u0026fid=0x0:0x14088503b48bb104"],"When":"2022-5-12"},{"Name":"Bhavna Sood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlv7R_iKLechPtFR6Z-ISgj5tAXTXooxANMdaPTcZh-UG2OsLn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely loved this place! Pizza was amazing, we ordered 3 different styles, all were above par and above my expectations. Lovely ambience as well. Service was par excellent. Definitely recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The pizza here was delicious. Of note, their tomato pizza sauce was quite special and unique with a pleasant fresh tang to it not found at other pizza places. I tried the pizza by the slice which was $2.50 each. The Hawaiian pizza had nice round thinly sliced ham on it. Good stuff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcv6QbSlHJpyrnzPpCpnMb9AJFmLGZnA7DSL-3\u0026fid=0x0:0x14088503b48bb104"],"When":"2021-4-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mark Bullock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXurhNUyvU-UwJu3PIhpIoO401kmvr3NAof13pUMcZTWY-2ZCva=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great seaside restaurant with amazing seafood. Had the brussel sprout starter which was amazingly seasoned and roasted. Followed by the shrimp and scallop linguine. The only shortcomings was I wished it was a larger portion of pasta. They had blankets on all of their seats outside for your convenience too. Would dine here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZ2RVKdLXQZckACzvGg1dHNJPzzYsp7fb5VWR8&fid=0x0:0x9d5892c927caa3a3"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Lola V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1al5Yf2wMmDiwMcPERtx0uh9FAIeT9iZgDVgy1AtbJ47LLw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the Warm Seafood Salad: Seafood was very fresh, really loved the vinaigrette dressing!
Cocktails were  tasteless:(
Our server was quite forgetful and was mixing up our order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_k5MZR9m6nrzFMmP6Zjot3qIRXk36LIzdzI8v&fid=0x0:0x9d5892c927caa3a3"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Milad Oshaghi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvjtK7IvidFs0Ikmi5NW5qOuRhfrOD033R1ZNMTBgJLfFCI1WQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was there recently,, we ordered CRAB & SPINACH ARTICHOKE DIP & FRESH MUSSELS & CLAMS and fish& chips and side burgers(beef and salmon)some drinks including ceaser ans mohito ,the dip and todilas  around was really amazing the ceaser drinks amazing in compare to ones that,the view as you see was great if i get back to steveson village ofcourse catch kitchen   is a place ill go back there","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzAFbrkEdNfBy8GlYJHsAlTxsxbnO2Pm3ozsg1&fid=0x0:0x9d5892c927caa3a3"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Jam Hinkley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9aDUW4jjezO6WoO3B3Dn6cBdRfltIu9eknIJNl9zQEZuQ2Ac=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recommend by our Hotel Reception, we weren’t disappointed. Had fabulous table over looking the water. Food was great, very fresh and decent portions. Topped off by a nice cool glass of ‘Catch’ beer.
The service was excellent and the staff very friendly, talkative and quick to help. Highly recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrc85j7XX9sKAmoT0jWF2IC9TuW6vA2m6y84NN&fid=0x0:0x9d5892c927caa3a3"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Neri Matrixx","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEAsQwNwiH4aesUxpapeB6lMqfjR6zx9Ff1axtQeydaL4OQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lobster 🦞 tail is absolutely delicious. Would have it everyday. Also, got the delicious King Crab legs to take home. Only bad thing is I have to travel too far to get to Stevenson.

The service was ok, nothing special. Outside patio should have sun umbrella ⛱ for ALL tables, the sun 🌞 can really do some skin damages after sitting there for 1+ hour. We like being outside, we just don't want to get bake while out there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXvgcXZo8lxHqxC79qd4GZk7taYc1fPW9qt8pC&fid=0x0:0x9d5892c927caa3a3"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Melissa Denise","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmPJUZyg5bbjNmbLw_9Zpw5GxBBDSB1XEPNgj4DHq-_lkoMwmALg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Really great location with a nice view if you are seated near a window. The staff was also very nice although our server forgot multiple items multiple times. We asked for ice tea, butter, and extra bread which she forgot (although she was very apologetic about it).

The food was mediocre. I order sablefish at a lot of different restaurants but I did not like the sablefish here. I thought it was very plain for the amount of money you are paying. Plain rice with sablefish that was really soft and soggy. At other places I have gone to, the sablefish was soft in the inside with a crispy sweet outside.

My friends had the chowder and some pastas which they liked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMG3ySGw0fipTUmDXeY4JlyQ4HiwTrcl0dKSAjJ&fid=0x0:0x9d5892c927caa3a3"],"When":"2024-2-7"},{"Name":"Timothy Chan (TimTim)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURIoSl-5oBZzcRd91bCuWm5mXoW-rsGa8ZawpNSjddYI4bCo-k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As always, excellent customer service, food, and nice views. We especially enjoyed the tasty fresh mussels and clams that we shared. The sauce is well made and goes really well when you dip it with bread. Our family and our family friends really enjoyed the evening. Highly recommended, and we will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzh7kAliV3GS6SSpcjzvXNtgHCv9rGAPPD5Fvj&fid=0x0:0x9d5892c927caa3a3"],"When":"2023-11-5"},{"Name":"Selena Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcoguULyjIq-ui7NYg-RspfD3LetHt1NMZHIqZbej2HD4cdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We came here for dinner and was disappointed. We’ve been here before, and don’t remember the food being this bad.

We ordered calamari, black cod, and grilled chicken burger. The calamari was good, but portion was quite small for the price. The black cod was really really plain (pretty much tasteless), though the cod was quite big. The grilled chicken burger was really tiny and disappointing for that price. You can probably get a bigger burger at any fast food restaurant. At least the fries were really good.

Service was okay. Nothing special.

Atmosphere was a bit dark (they had candles on every table, but ours was out and they didn’t bother lighting it). They are right by the water though, so I guess there’s good views?

All in all, my husband and I were really disappointed this time by the food and will probably not go back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOORIGYBdaMGOUUQ7lkwkxh9UFZSDkp21nSoJ22&fid=0x0:0x9d5892c927caa3a3"],"When":"2024-2-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Adam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2I3sBFDvPW3CcvrEQqbmMyJgvl3SnmZlnDrwlytzjiiSZ-aU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After moving away from the Vancouver area, Flying Beaver was one of those restaurants that I missed so much.

It was so nice to revisit and enjoy once again!
We got the fish tacos and blackened chicken. Both were delicious!

I love to watch the seaplanes take off and land while enjoying my time here. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWT2N8bUx3rbxpaFSPkMl9lFaj7C3sqlAFsSYR&fid=0x0:0xfc702a83616425d"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Wayne Lav","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUk880jfctdjiDn4tRAvocN5rCVUdtgArCHWFDiv2yxg-QvIz4L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Flying Beaver is a vibrant restaurant and bar located in a picturesque spot along the Fraser River, offering stunning views of seaplanes taking off and landing right next to the attached terminal. The staff are always friendly, the food is delicious, and there’s a wide selection of drinks to choose from.

With great music and a lively atmosphere, it’s the perfect spot for lunch, dinner, or an evening out. Whether you’re stopping by for a drink, a meal, or a good time with friends, the Flying Beaver delivers on all fronts.

I ❤️the Beave!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNafL1kcV906XjDnSVrvwR-lZ5oWKhNM8W-cfmb&fid=0x0:0xfc702a83616425d"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"April Hendrickson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXT-dGhTHHrhaMGxBMTdvs2CeR4oKYHRRE8UJtE5kD4AtXacFf2DA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the Tuesday taco special which was fresh.  My friends ordered vege burger with fries, routine, and chicken wraps.  All of our food was fresh, the service was great and the beer was cold.  It's fun to watch the sea planes land and take off of the water.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtbtqBO35zrpQGqSMxIKTJvONr6ashO9puCOI9&fid=0x0:0xfc702a83616425d"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Jerome Mielczarek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKB2ZciZrfrntIKke_q8LXjfLCIn9T0K7WGhmSmtM26NKxPaA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We’ve had some steak bites and chicken fingers with fries as appetizers, steak bites were amazing, fries were pretty good as well. Chicken tenders were nicely fried, but a bit disappointing, tasteless. As a main course I had the Pad Thai, which wasn’t that great felt like it had no taste at all. My friends were nonetheless pretty Sara’s goes with their meals, surf n’ turf, blacked chicken, the wild salmon and the pulled pork burger. At last we had the apple pie, amazing filling, matched the ice cream but the crust was a bit dry and bitter tasting. Service was great, prices decent for an airport.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHSTieInugoBkFz6YmHL1Cl1BKF0wT7Rejv8n6&fid=0x0:0xfc702a83616425d"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Amanda Webb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8DTQWOaKI0mnWdnnLgW3X5n8PI3GzuK_wj3KklypY55IPOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent! Best way to describe my experience. The food was delicious and came out hot. The staff was friendly and attentive. The views were amazing and the sea planes flying in and out was fun to watch!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2B83XpP998XfxqreUL8CwS3eSKx3uEo7B8CGG&fid=0x0:0xfc702a83616425d"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"KentTa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9sDh51B2GR28uJKshUftP6vtMtumYW-ozVd4mMEHsPMyVCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It is a great place, just next to the check-in counter for taking sea planes.

Very nice view where we can see sea planes taking off.

The food is okay. Not amazingly good. Egg Benny was fine, but I don't really enjoy the hash brown. However, fries , which came with the burger, were good!

One good thing is that they have a kid's menu! My little one loves that.

Oh, another good thing is that breakfasts are served until 1 pm one oj weedkends and holidays!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvfdT3gYqThFD2x6kPU4_1MUTJFJs5xnGvVtGk&fid=0x0:0xfc702a83616425d"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Ingrid Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpJ7BDSOGvowBGNTTCIxIzO8iKdPQulZrzi56sGNYHPbL7Hw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We enjoyed a delightful Friday evening at this place. Despite the bustling crowd, the service remained friendly and attentive. The fish and chips were a highlight, featuring fresh-tasting fish. While the Black & Blue burger was decent and met expectations, the clam chowder was disappointing as it lacked any seafood flavor.

The ambience was wonderful, offering views of the Fraser River and seaplanes, adding to the overall experience. However, the tables were too close together, which slightly detracted from our comfort. Parking spots are limited too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0wNfhDhB29XgSny4wlGJAKOuCVS95UU6WKMq9&fid=0x0:0xfc702a83616425d"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Lizzie S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5qIG1VmBASZQRSYXsIMifm6rtLhZA6xcKTGDs0bvXyJT2pXkmsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great seaside views with good food. The portion and flavors were traditional and homey. We really enjoyed the atmosphere","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaUSotFMhqJVJ7EWKb8waNWtUxDwB0WgfRuAg_&fid=0x0:0xfc702a83616425d"],"When":"2024-11-9"}]

[{"Name":"Andy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYStB8Z1GJc0QGfDhIJmsPIQs2NpavRqZcjm96KgX5x6r1B4T9pw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious juicy chicken and incredibly friendly service, I didn't get a chance to get the name of our server but we went around 4pm on December 22nd. Server made it a really fun experience, thank you for that!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7TFFBYmn8KFviKJ0ROKTOlQ9O6KzSOHU800Al&fid=0x0:0x589bed2d35dceb19"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"LA 13","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgVDIlqYYSIoXF0M7e9nAWoEGWq9Ly0qwBkADGFNbZH7CIvjez=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I love supporting local Stevenson shops. Heard/read good things about this place, so I decided to try it for the first time today - 2 for 1 special on Tuesdays!

I had to wait 25min cause they were making a fresh batch of chicken. No problem, didn't mind the wait for fresh chicken.

I don't know what was wrong with fries but they were so salty, burnt to a crisp, and soaked in grease.

Chicken had nice flavor but undercooked. My kid was eating it! Didn't think I had to check if the chicken was cooked all the way through.

And they forgot my gravy!

First time and last time Ill be going there.

Shame","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN46_F7f_6J_TzpWImLprr9XYskXRrnwuhvg47V&fid=0x0:0x589bed2d35dceb19"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Laveen Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLRXEoPik772km4nNxtheUFjtSR4iAug5hLQd65hl4GopHvIOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic service by Joseph! Delicious, juicy, and fresh fried chicken. Tried the French fries and ube cookie too. Everything is so yummy here! Must try in Steveston

*no photo of fried chicken as we devoured it instantly! haha","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMg9SjwXqHHuZW7XfR1xMW1tHFlhotAbu93CzY5&fid=0x0:0x589bed2d35dceb19"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Lilia Cantu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTvoybN0qAcTBGA-4cDstYnttHAuP2jp89tq8quiI24ylAHikV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best fried chicken in Richmond! Always hits the spot when I’m craving something savory with just the right crunch! 😋 Also, my boys and I love the delectable ube desserts—a celebration of Filipino sweetness!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf8mFDSqbKcXRtY49AxWGxG3LuXc-FskPAR4Zr&fid=0x0:0x589bed2d35dceb19"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Kalvin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYzAZd-0_JeniSNljNxgImCwzlXWbe6PzaDeAXT6_nhg5vP5E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Missing bit of flavor for the chicken, chicken burger tasted good as the chicken was not dry and they sell ube cake","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuVtrpjod2L3kQoqMCS5XE_m8c37tUw6yFzkku&fid=0x0:0x589bed2d35dceb19"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Miriam Shim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1IdOG8jkv63SxilWkqQuBRJnn8nUYA30jpTVf-iH5v3yqSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The fried chicken was crispy and juicy on the inside. Well seasoned without it being overwhelming. The macaroni was yummy as well. They also have ube desserts which I would like to try next time
The atmosphere is casual but welcoming! & staff was very friendly. Would come here again","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joyce Ip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUl3ZRznAfpwHD4_bRT_KEw-3SQJUX5RBIz8oGQKui1baeS3scbcA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owner, Joseph, is really kind and the fried chicken is finger lickin' good! My husband and I have been going to Win Win for the past 5 years now and we've celebrated major milestones with their delicious food. They're definitely my favourite family run fried chicken joint!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIz_gZ5gBnGugtZQRGmvbISHXsQ3hs3KL8nQDLUF1_KS_1CCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Updated below for June 8 2024 Price Change and Proportions.

Original Review from April 2024:
Great little mom and pop place.
Best chicken in the lower mainland IMHO 😋
Better than , Kfc, Popeye's and Mary Brown's.

It isn't greasy, the spicy is great as is the gravy.
Prices are good too, $27 for 5 pc chicken,  fries a, gravy and 2 pops after tax.
I get this often when coming back to my hometown of Steveston.

There are a few spots to sit and eat inside but there are plenty spots outside at little parks or near the water.

Edit : Went here earlier today June 8th 2024 and I can confirm that ownership or the folks that run it changed.

The chicken was still good but somehow not as good as before, maybe more oily or as another post said old oil, not sure..

I used to get the 5pc with one side, we always choose gravy for that but the menu has changed and prices were significantly higher today.

Also we got 3 drumsticks, two large ones tbh but the rest were small pieces.

I never had to buy more food before when I had 5 pcs, today my wife and I were still hungry after the 6 and got 2 pcs of pizza around the corner.

The other thing was that they asked if it was okay to wait 15 minutes for fresh which we were okay with and went out side for a quick walk and were back in 15 but when we got back we were told that it would be another 8 minutes which turned out to be longer, not sure how long but probably another full 15 minutes...

But they now do more online orders so my sneaking suspicion is that ours was given out for an online or Uber order and made to wait again, it just felt that way.

On that note, mentioning that the prices were higher, it cost total after tax 6 pc and 2 cans of pop $35.02

So as I put above 2 months ago we got 5pcs, fries, a gravy and 2 pops for $27 after tax, now it's 6pcs, no fries but a gravy and 2 pops is $35.
Inflation and Shrinkflation.

So the better way to order so its cheaper is to use Groupon to order.
8 pcs for $22.40 through Groupon was the offer I saw at that time if that deal is available when you want to order.

I should have checked before ordering.
So I will check that before coming next time.

Photos are from June 8 2024
Dropped food and service ratings to 4 stars

I still like the place, its still better than Kfc but unfortunately the Proportions are less and costs more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipParAt6Zg941nG_t7O6ovcNgWfCIXrdKoRJznfb&fid=0x0:0x589bed2d35dceb19"],"When":"2024-6-8"}]

[{"Name":"Jinny C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJF1E0u7aAYhoG0Ugnl_mjrDGZEqbFrHAer59dj1QQcIcrSbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't believe it took me this long to get here to have their fully loaded (the storm) pizza!! On a cold winter night, they have an indoor space right next to the shop for you to enjoy the pizza while it's hot. I would totally go back again for special occasions splurge!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRBNjuYfSSfkp59zH_glIyAK24kMI8oRhuSOF5&fid=0x0:0x81adc4e87dae925e"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Nikki c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTEI07jnFTAEaLsFO0c2_mPPfnmG0XKKHuolSSFqT8Xlgj-nIi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered from here multiple times it’s my fave in the neighborhood! Recommend mist which is filled with shrimp and salmon, never got a pizza that disappointed us though 😌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm1TbTj_xPjaGSijBbYJyqX0gY23ddFcaHkacd&fid=0x0:0x81adc4e87dae925e"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"JC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWorCvbO5RYxEeXn58zCt1qpxaThFfJH8doddmh4RrxaswAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our family have been ordering pizza from them for years. I would say that they are one of the rare restaurant that have perfectly maintained their top quality pizzas. Although the price have raised tremendously, but because of their top quality pizza and increased amount of fresh seafood, we ordered it as our treat during special occasions.
Another point that we loved is how they keep up the pick up time. No matter how busy they were, which the store were usually packed of customers and piles of orders, they always make sure to have our orders ready to be picked up on timely manners. Very impressive and highly suggested to order their Butterfly pizza and Hawaiian if you are fan of pineapple on 🍕:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOH0r4YektdVtWJeUE2sxABhffte-g3Ff-XncN2&fid=0x0:0x81adc4e87dae925e"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"suga stan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZwq_G2yinCVeLJXOkCcyPB8ZORGrNnnuIq9H4z1eMNKw40Yk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a rainy day and our last day in vancouver, but getting pizza here is the best decision ever!!!! You can see the whole weekly menu and everything is very Well Priced.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle Sakai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyeopUs3rqo66tKe1Tb2UKZUfQM6nA5aEq72N5vmBoGlJco58=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Staff is friendly enough and the food is matched for the price given it targets office workers for lunch and breakfast.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Garry Self","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_LOMYygjs9wfdxPkhl5cuKavunLPQ4m1xenJjDPi5EDVA-fWf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Helpful, accommodating staff.  Good food at reasonable prices.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andy Andy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUphdIrYjTLGMaESDaQx-wr-6baBW_nXRxZ2US-D3qHQRb2Ov3y5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Highgate Medical","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIW4DtncZM-HVnYCs_swHoTbEtsZ45YOAt2jxrs1AqZxshcoA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"T M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLt-Fvkm2YpGXbiYRJdrgy9iUP8jDYJIfUR0bh78zntHQO88A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tony Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo5HnRTI7-bYPrqL5HoqcJPWIvE9RYbfS8N0qoG8ArieJTdCWV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely quaint little place that serves up some very flavorful eats and fresh fish. Presentation was on point for every dish as well.

Loved the service, waitress kept our tea cups full whenever it emptied without being overly intrusive to the dining experience.

Overall definitely recommend and I can't wait to come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP789zErrcu_9vZH7PNEkVjmpnXe1P3qXZjwA4Y&fid=0x0:0x3ff3317fbd3d1d27"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Oscar Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXB3_Fw9rNwYym37txYKrOT_uoZwbfNcOPzJ-YoMMFv9jRagenEUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is many of my friends favorite sushi place in Vancouver. I came for the lunch menu and got the sushi set and eel in broth soba set. It was really good! The eel one is something I've never seen before as it usually comes with rice, super yummy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgK8ahd8IHqbNuzVjesqTaz77us5cFyope2GZy&fid=0x0:0x3ff3317fbd3d1d27"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"김정원","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0FnACiPwplDIL_6gzoU-W7qocQKfG8BJ73jDn5Xp1hac0H4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All the food was delicious! You can be satisfied with whatever you order here. The service on the server was good, and the plates and atmosphere were perfect. I think I will visit often in the future","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmtNln5EcvGOR73rQJNqCcuBuCm-qALvMxfGkq&fid=0x0:0x3ff3317fbd3d1d27"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Y S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTmtWUtCZcs7qDdNKdjVbtcx5f5BcDfDU3YRp4zcFsXHKu1_WS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here on Friday night for dinner. The atmosphere was quiet and tables were spaced out well. Service was good and food came quickly. The sashimi was very fresh. We ordered a few dishes on the menu. It was an omakase bar but there's no set menu so you can order a la Carte.
Price is on the higher side but the quality was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZSzgAc62jRpNKVFKeWqfZKIsnFMwFrrXWvSu2&fid=0x0:0x3ff3317fbd3d1d27"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Kate Dapang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVYQcnJm3zyIOqn3sQsOrFs5W894_VWS4xs931gSO12zSelRQP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything from the atmosphere, service and quality was top notch, I would say it’s up there with miku and minami but even better in some aspects like a little bit better fish quality, prices and a more intimate experience as the chefs were right in front of us curating the dishes. The chefs choice nigiri platter was my favourite, too bad they no longer offer their omakase I would’ve loved to try more creative dishes from chef Kun! So glad we have an authentic sushi restaurant in Richmond as most isn’t even owned or made by Japanese sushi chefs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPg1UgJuMYRavgagoNvZhVn-PjJ7USiMSBsJBT&fid=0x0:0x3ff3317fbd3d1d27"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Early Sudianto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYZrpOtf3Ke4ZwsEd3ex0Pj0BrDtQKixtKd-gqwcnUI17rjtomOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely little Japanese restaurant with a nice food presentation and tasted yummy. Ordered Jun’s carpaccio and kun don along with sake. Would definitely come back to try more items on the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOydhcdmEJjX-u_XzNZJqelGAihYcPOuOcNWUwd&fid=0x0:0x3ff3317fbd3d1d27"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Danny Yan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLRPWWKcVdRHeoB-9RWRILXmiR2bwZnV4LcEulNAzluWALah6_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Service was great!  Prices were a bit high.  Food was great, and came out quick, but just lacked a little something to make it stand out from the rest.  Presentation was excellent as well.  Overall, we have a great experience there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhdeE83AmUWoELMnyKdnW0Fi1zsP-ZvIr8n81o&fid=0x0:0x3ff3317fbd3d1d27"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"long yan fan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1KiRzy86cZHzt5Yxk6F87VxILNnAy5FKsnw7N0A73HSLRKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very fresh sashimi, lots of different varieties and tasty! Excellent service and nice atmosphere. Free street parking available nearby.highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaklZHDC1jCFgHgn2VCxNPoeaC1g4reypEmLEX&fid=0x0:0x3ff3317fbd3d1d27"],"When":"2024-5-10"}]
