user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Blackberry Ginger Fizz was delicious and refreshing. The quality and taste of the Casacadian Salmon Sandwich was great. A bit pricy but you do get good quality. The only reason I took a star away from five stars is I found two fish bones in my salmon fillet while chomping down. Otherwise was a good experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzIceG74SVRQCquBo4Vl-EltqwkapYvCCAcLDU&fid=0x0:0x53edbfa4b564c1dc"],"When":"2021-7-9"},{"Name":"Manny Sahu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_KtK2ncrgl2J40CJtQY4ots5qzaZFZqE9_wZH2MXHX0WsFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited this establishment after purchasing some amazing catch at the fisherman’s wharf. This truck has a small nice menu serving the local catch. I got the grilled scallops which was very well cooked and their secret sauce was tangy and complemented the scallops well. The food in my opinion is a little pricey and there is no sitting area only standing areas. Overall with all things considered, it was nice experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0IyhYP1gKPb27E9TefF0Ktq0FyWtMvJHjdCvA&fid=0x0:0x53edbfa4b564c1dc"],"When":"2021-9-6"},{"Name":"Gent Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVleRAlZX37AckkkAYbB7Bn0I4u93eNJhJKFw0PlkmjVuYDfo0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food and two drinks at the Fisherman's Frank food truck was great until... I bit a hard piece of bamboo stick that was sharp on the end, hidden inside a piece of lettuce, rolled in. Worse was that the chef and guy at till there didn't know how to make up for it when I showed them and said "I almost choked to death" twice. All I got was a worried look and a "sorry about that".

I paid $30.00 plus 15% tips. If you worked in the food services industry, making up for it goes a long way. Unfortunately they just lost two customers who want to support local, and maybe a few hundred more of my friends' potential businesses. I should have read the reviews first, but the staff there are rude and have an unfriendly attitude towards some customers.

I could have sued but all I did was a friendly heads up because I wanted to support local. Not even a thank you for my initiative to help them be better at service. This is a warning to others to be really careful and check your food if you do choose to buy from this food truck. My stomach or throat could have been seriously scraped inside... or ended up in ER.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCSWlRNtPSH0HHPkU7hyVyB_iQFu7CwrhaKCA0&fid=0x0:0x53edbfa4b564c1dc"],"When":"2021-8-23"},{"Name":"Steven Timm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUadcu8kDjCqMBVyfYQWtNkE-vnkhAKiN0sx30B5rpyAcQHcaDS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh caught seafood at Fisherman Frank's food truck at the Steveston Warf.
Absolutely delicious fresh local seafood. Nothing deep fried at Fisherman Frank's 👍🏻💖😎","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNje7ISl4atIDu2BZaHDMYJh-ZIxBtbbUBN7kCQ&fid=0x0:0x53edbfa4b564c1dc"],"When":"2021-7-23"},{"Name":"Jana Evans","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFjmUvyv_D0C928LPFmDlM7xtJSop1GTxh4Yhc54LmpKCsxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food. We tried the Cascadian dish which is wild salmon in a bun with tomato and lettuce. All of us (3) loved it. Frank is a very pleasant guy. He is a fisherman and he is selling seafood that he catches. So everything there is very fresh. We will come back for sure . We also want to support local fishermen.
Highly recommending.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ipshi Sahu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMEVEQo8BRiV42KJaFp0ud3jh-1fhWDX_zh6qLYcpoY6naLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great food - liked everything we ordered but gave it a star less for the price. Very expensive given it is a food truck plus the seafood is sourced by Frank's boat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUSV3Xfs_SC4idYXPp4msTgg2fNdfsnEJ5Oevt&fid=0x0:0x53edbfa4b564c1dc"],"When":"2021-8-15"},{"Name":"Lynn D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOD9uEiRJVEP32o8bIEy4x3Eu9yla2rc_jTk7AWcHCPsL6r6oP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The freshness and quality are outstanding. Thank you for being local and sustainable!
I shall certainly return.

As much as I love bacon, I think I would loose it on the shrimp/crab bun.. it was too chewie paired with the delicate delectable seafood.
Salmon Berger.. perfect!
Spot prawn skewers..divine.. but I really needed a fork?!? for the lovely coleslaw?!?
Ice tea..bland!
A little disappointed in no mask on the server and cook..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Billy I","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLF_YvY3tpN9pAibZRh222xmUJ6PDXXysiHCJFPliQZR5mI-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I read an article about Frank's food truck and thought to try his food and give him a support. I love that he is serving fresh local food that either he catches or buys from local fishermen.  I tried salmon sandwich Cascadian and it was delicious.  It is not cheap but this is high end food. Will come back for sure.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Regina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgugBVDLSr_x7SQEv9dWnIKWQnIS4mbi-W32cy8juhYXxf6kpC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I initially saw all the 5 star reviews and was a bit skeptic myself. But entering the cafe, it has a cozy atmosphere with various seating (indoor and outdoor). They have a camping aesthetic which adds to the coziness. Friendly owners that will chat with you too.

I got their seasonal drink, apple cinnamon latte and it was delicious! Perfect for the fall vibes and wasn't too sweet. I easily would've drank 2 more cups if I had the time.

I got the blueberry muffin which was baked fresh, so if you come in the morning it's still warm ☺️ the interior was fluffy and light and the exterior had a nice crust with a satisfying crunch.

I was able to buy the tea bags they use for the apple cinnamon latte (tin not included, that is my own), so I am able to make it at home as well!

Overall a lovely little cafe and I will come back whenever I am in vancouver 💕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5MmHYDlEMD6XUGXfPNSsjgDCAQoJmbmDRtZ6P&fid=0x0:0x9569f56ef605f5b0"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"dhara sheth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWux95rDd0ISs4pgNRpL-VH2xRtpmrr_-LiHCEtzqithAkJeZAqHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Comma Cafe is now our favorite weekend spot! The mocha with oat milk and almond milk was fantastic, with just the right balance of chocolate and coffee. Also the croissant was delicious, nicely baked, flaky, and fresh.
The ambiance is warm and inviting, and the staff is always welcoming.
A must visit for a relaxing coffee break :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWMPL_Ui7bxp8iqaX-hlOEm3ww9IxE7bYqZgSf&fid=0x0:0x9569f56ef605f5b0"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Max Cli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLO48oNpZy20ZKJ0cWruPEH7vhSStdJTg9a0QgOlZcOkI14IQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had a latte and personally find the coffee on the dark / bitter side. Also had the seasonal apple cinnamon tea which was alright. Nice place to work or catch up with friends although today it got noisy after a party of three came in and began their work / project discussion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXUmGVbA5Wh7Dh--cl5du7ysrYebkNxvqHxLxJ&fid=0x0:0x9569f56ef605f5b0"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Mel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1Jf3TfDwlW-atP0P-0tJDy_XTYemXJs4lD5eWMMTqmOOm_SBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite places to have croissants. Plain, Chocolate, Almond and wait for it chocolate almond, it's one of these croissants that flies fast after it's put on display. I tried for the first time once beer bread and loved the savoury taste and density that I didn't expect. I am a repeat customer of over 4 times and we come from a far place to visit and now I can invite friends to meet me at Comma Cafe. The coffee is great, hot or cold. Can't wait to come again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmHFS5eWVBWAaLBX0MlRfBnTkx8cvAWtcrr3Ft&fid=0x0:0x9569f56ef605f5b0"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Danilo Teodoro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_rV4_xok36vIezJ6uAhpzSfyECA8ogmjA4ehyXVTr4dBqIAFv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The chocolate croissant was superb! I tried different variations of coffee, and they were above average, but somewhat bitter.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpT_AauyfJPDnixXj3Ag8BZnb1WFETJhq1Xpo2&fid=0x0:0x9569f56ef605f5b0"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Saerom Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtAwAO05KL1k3aum48TdibcDVpIegErqvAb0-KjrdIvFxAaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a beautiful cafe. They have delicious coffee and amazing baked. The staff was also very friendly👍 I've Never been to such a perfect cafe. Highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlMk4_FfyWsmpZdMDXDWtnDNtbGafXpyJS6LJ_&fid=0x0:0x9569f56ef605f5b0"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"Lian Konrad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0KsrUJw0tJD1AaN0Egr4iSt7GRuChLxrYoLtWSL6QNU0XavT9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"easily the best coffee shop in the neighbourhood, truly nothing compares. The owner is so kind, talkative and talented. I love the coffee, especially the latte and his wife’s baking is amazing! I definitely recommend this shop, i’ve taken my boyfriend, my friends and whoever else i’m with! Super calm, quiet and peaceful study environment too, lots of outlets for charging and a very unique set up in the back: an umbrella and lounge chairs with a lego chess board! Comma Café is a truly unique, one-of-a-kind place that i couldn’t recommend more ☕️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9mSLEWQUV27F7nekUb3X986ncPI4dZzOpqwSN&fid=0x0:0x9569f56ef605f5b0"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Yen-Wei Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAJkgig2wy7r5wnw9iaMXJ5KmMmwwfqmcW4tda0kNL7YaHBTvk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy spot with great coffee, friendly staff, and cute kids for sure kkk. Perfect for a quick pick-me-up or a relaxing afternoon. 감사합니다","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCWaHWsje-rjVdmVsLntVZbWUnVopJCNhKFvlM&fid=0x0:0x9569f56ef605f5b0"],"When":"2024-12-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kit Yee Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUy4hyLjXryzPjKJf4N3DUJBAsHtZSSuk76pvxFtVmwfHSV1Gtd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My friends and I had brunch here. It was our first time to try this cafe. The ambience was very nice and comfortable. The service was great. Staff here were friendly. Interior decor was exactly what a modern cafe should have.

We all ordered coffee and food. We tried latte and flat white as well as the apricot danish, ham sandwiches and sun-dried tomato danish/croissant. All of them tasted great.

I also purchased a loaf of sourdough. I wish the cafe could slice it for me. I had to do it at home instead.

There is street parking right outside the cafe on Cambie Street but if it’s full, there is some free street parking between west 42nd and 43rd. The residential areas require parking permit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJ45rkO7Y7nO-D_dbASFisY4NkHL6KeMuEXpBR&fid=0x0:0x697debfe1b5abc43"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Shonnah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVryghpg_5X3Yv-cncwU7OGN26KCAvVhjXajvFLZ6BLUMNFRgyF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I’m a huge fan of the location because I feel we need more good coffee shops in this area. This cafe has an open space to work with your laptop by the window or lounge chairs to socialize with others. I haven’t tried anything beyond their Oat Milk flat white, but it was pretty average. A heart of something would’ve been nice for athletics, but maybe I’m being picky.

I wish they would’ve had vegan options, but their cookies looked very indulgent. They also had a food menu that I’ve like to try in the future. Prices seemed standard to most coffee shops, I liked the vibe and would return if in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqm_Cfm9BBT1X6O-yUg2qKrdjkkNG4lf5nMAma&fid=0x0:0x697debfe1b5abc43"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Jaspreet Rodentte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlmOKHgT8-1l9rKiIaQsAUPS9RBsPV0yDDyLj-5uUW1p6gkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stumbled upon a new coffee shop/bakery. Service was great, lots of selection for baked goods and the cappuccino was made perfectly! I tried the berries and cream croissants, it was fluffy, fresh, and light. The berries were extremely fresh and even inside the croissant! I’m excited to try out their fresh breads next time I’m in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4vf3XtbW_2qvCZxfEvEfap26wPfxdiJSLH-MJ&fid=0x0:0x697debfe1b5abc43"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Sarah K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY-JgvN5-mznvqsAYHtcaVGAhVC2l-m6xd8sNXk8E9qqKEPNzX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried their latte, blueberry earl grey loaf and almond croissant. The croissant was my favourite. Coffee tasted just okay. For similar price range, I’ve had a lot better lattes elsewhere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhM9iLa7umKkFdQZ_6fQ971jIzN_P9XeK9hnEB&fid=0x0:0x697debfe1b5abc43"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Zoe Ching Yi Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrEFs9z7jmBIZq4_UMaJz8TrH2ZwH9DR3LSa5lTDnxUcXdpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today was my first day visit, I JUST LOVE THIS CAFE SO MUCH because of 4 reasons! First, I used to drink black tea so I tend to like bitter coffee, their bean is just my exact taste! Second, I didn’t expect the barista could make a super duper lovely and hard pattern on my cappuccino (she made my day!) Third, I know I am picky I cannot stay for long in a cafe where is full of “baking smell”, this cafe has their own kitchen but I couldn’t smell any kitchen smell! Fourth, free street parking and relatively accessible and even it was a Sunday morning. Btw very nice Jazz music but hopefully the music could be a bit lower, it’s not a very big deal actually:)
I WILL DEFINITELY COME BACK!
P.s. just realised they close at 4pm on Sunday but we didn’t get kicked out even at 4:30pm, I am so sorry I just didn’t check the opening hours carefully!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5hd1LhztV7qJBfzaNXS4RoO2xWSeM6-Q0xuGp&fid=0x0:0x697debfe1b5abc43"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Mark Lunney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO0sPWnzhJWrby3AWLOv5uQ4-1afBYfNsaUGaxbwugZq1OCPI3qg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice cafe located in the newly built Alliance Francais building and open to public. Good selection of freshly baked pastries and some savoury food options (baguette sandwiches, soup, salad). Plenty of seating available in a relaxed, airy space.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPb9bvpbUEl7zGDzaG-XuM5F_Ckv11bBzo9XMDg&fid=0x0:0x697debfe1b5abc43"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Conan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKONP9LZ55pWz6eE6at_ESUnF8ur4lTWEh3jE_EzN3U4qQFgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a pleasant surprise! The duck sandwich is absolutely delicious. The cozy atmosphere makes it a great spot to work. Plus, the relaxing music really adds to the vibe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-UCpBzpW-s92JVIFrXdseC7QbwbuLHmgLB7jO&fid=0x0:0x697debfe1b5abc43"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"maria angelis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWe-8SYIfT4ZxUaZjlNhTyW_PFTAs_Pv8EL2x3dwXk8C3qVYM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You walk in this cafe and you feel welcomed right away. Crème brûlée danish is one of my favourites but everything else is delicious as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNEI0EiWEErRf860lInzhisUqbIF0YnfX-vaA&fid=0x0:0x697debfe1b5abc43"],"When":"2024-11-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Wyn Maison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0SeJTwieW_zPau37u6LbDiWy7BKR8u4fY5VroAlmi0U01KqI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently had the pleasure of enjoying brunch at Yandoux Patisserie, and it was an outstanding experience from start to finish.

Ambiance:
The atmosphere was warm and inviting, with a stylish decor that made us feel comfortable and relaxed. The seating was cozy, and the flowers decorated added a pleasant touch to the overall ambiance.

Service:
The service was exceptional. The server, I can’t quite recall her name. She was attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable about the menu. They made excellent recommendations and ensured our needs were met throughout our meal.

Food:
The food was the highlight of our visit, they were delicious and beautifully presented. The flavors were well-balanced, and the ingredients were fresh and of high quality. The portion sizes were generous, making it great value for money part.

Drinks:
We also enjoyed a selection of beverages, The Peach Apricot tea was refreshing and perfectly complemented our meal.

Overall, our experience at Yandoux Patisserie was fantastic. The combination of delicious food, excellent service, and inviting atmosphere made for a memorable brunch. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a great brunch experience. We will definitely be returning!

Thank you Yandoux for a wonderful brunch!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmXEcsntTzpAkDB84zmP-hetzZ7B5nkA6IUR0v&fid=0x0:0x8ab573618998f0b4"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Hazelle Qiao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLyhW0wC-ysXS2qLQ_H2iWGRaX77GIYAX8ArTB4Jf20j3y4kg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been to Yandoux Patisserie three times now, and each visit has been something special. The first time, I ordered a birthday cake, which looked amazing and tasted just as good. On my second visit, I tried their high tea, and more recently, I checked out their Halloween menu. Every experience has been a treat!

Their cakes are the real highlight. Not only are they beautifully presented, but they’re also perfectly balanced—sweet, but not too sweet. It’s clear they put a lot of thought into both the look and taste, which makes each bite worth savoring.

I’m definitely planning to visit again and hope they keep coming up with new and exciting cakes. Can’t wait to see what they dream up next!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSDv350iaeVQGStKZRkP65L66qe-8khUrKXc4b&fid=0x0:0x8ab573618998f0b4"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"E Maw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKcKp8HPnwcd7ytVX5_G__oZpEopqrzOk6yHhaNVjvkYkOy72YF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were delighted to be the first to try their Holiday Hightea menu. Mulled wine is a must! From comfortable seating to warmth service made every bite even more enjoyable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoFBbKkAcCowOj0h2MRSaIfhnV2Mqcvc8Xqm7P&fid=0x0:0x8ab573618998f0b4"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In love with the new Yandoux in Richmond! This new location is more spacious and a lot prettier than the original location. The seasonal afternoon tea menu was also amazing as always, everything was carefully prepared and both the presentation and the taste was very unique. Definitely the best in town!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkXS8KfcX4SW_aKXVfrcNNDhC0cRGE2YEFFd-M&fid=0x0:0x8ab573618998f0b4"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Janet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDfclxt7Zsaaq_HaPyo0JfsxVuRUKjVdnclvt6lC7TSgWvYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"7/10 for overall delicious Halloween tea set and atmosphere, cozy spacious seating and modern interior design; would come back to try their regular menu. I like that they have more savoury items than sweet, but both are done well. The scones are a highlight and freshly baked. Favourite was the sablefish and salmon oshi. Desserts were not overly sweet, very uniquely made and all the flavours came together.

Cons are 1) teas are very lacking, don't order the Earl Grey Green tea, never had such bland tea before! even when l asked for a second bag, there was no flavour... but I appreciate that the server changed our tea after we requested a different one.
2) Service and timing of the food coming out was the most disappointing. We were 1 of only 2 tables and it took almost 40mins...
3) the kitchen is an open kitchen and noise from
what theyre preparing in there can be quite loud and distracting. Also it didnt help that the other table that was close to us was an extremely loud group and really hampered the relaxing atmosphere.

4)Server really needs more training, it’s like it was her first job. She is not attentive. I’ve never gone to an afternoon tea place and been given our tea without any cream/sugar or a tea spoon until we asked…. she also can't speak English well so
she had a hard time describing what we were served, 2 instances where she did not know what the particular dish included. I ended up asking her to speak Mandarin instead. Please train her to understand the menu better. It’s a $65 tea set per person so I really expect better than this, considering your price point is only $10 less than an afternoon tea at Five Sails.

The restaurant is behind Versante Hotel, and there is no free parking ($3 for 2hrs). So park on P2 and take the elevator down. Best to make a reservation online or call them in advance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyxTWRFBCRnnlYqb09IMaetxOubDLbhdGgKlLO&fid=0x0:0x8ab573618998f0b4"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Erin Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNddZXBvjo1lM53d1JsGHCCAsJEWmjzWHaoOXhqaaioyHgIgaf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for afternoon tea with a group of my friends and had a really lovely time. Parking is street parking around the corner, or paid parking in the parkade. The restaurant can be a little confusing to find because the only signage saying "Yandoux" is a sidewalk sign that leads to a very dark nameless door on West Road. When you enter it's a dim lobby, and Yandoux is on the left.

The space is bright, nicely decorated, very clean and quiet. Afternoon tea reservations are allotted 2 hours of seating time, but it was more than enough for a leisurely stay. If you are booking for 5+ people, they will call you for a deposit that you make via e-transfer.

There's a sizeable list of teas to try. I ordered an Elderberry tea, and while you can order milk and sugar to go with your teas, my friends and I found the teas fragrant and sweet enough on its own without needing to milk/sugar as we usually do. Our server continuously came by to refill our pots with hot water and that was very appreciated.

The photos show food for 2 afternoon tea sets. Everything was really nicely prepared and tasted wonderful. The sablefish, and the prosciutto burrata were my favourites of the savouries. The desserts all tasted really good, and not too sweet. My only complaint was that I found the sable in the lemon tart to be overbaked and very dry.

Each tea set is $65 excluding tax/tips, and while it's a little pricier than other afternoon teas i've experienced, the overall stay and food is worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJwvQwGo7QQZ8eYri63cHMWy75Uyz-OAhhBJiO&fid=0x0:0x8ab573618998f0b4"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Angela Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb_531iDFVKCasGm6UvuKw9uZaENkT6KFE4j7gJIfH4GYfpwM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely Delightful!
The set was stunning, with a beautiful selection of desserts and savory bites.

The ambiance was cozy and elegant, and the staff were attentive and welcoming.
A must-visit spot for dessert lovers or anyone looking to enjoy a relaxing and luxurious afternoon. Will definitely be returning soon!!!

Make sure call them in advance to reserve your spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOP92dmY01xegf6piReVDphBwkIY-esHhXnTHv0&fid=0x0:0x8ab573618998f0b4"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Kitty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhMuwg_tl1TRTc24JxH5iTo3OJVTHqCQijM2P6PldLkYJ1Idkn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful location along with very delicious food! It was approx. $65 pp before tips and taxes. It was a great experience.

If you park inside the parking lot, look for the west tower and it’s located on the ground floor. The opposite side of Bruno.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvAo1QAkG4avsj6jCXJt29Rvb6CEXLEIEyPtBm&fid=0x0:0x8ab573618998f0b4"],"When":"2024-10-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A nice and cozy cafe at the foot of Queen Elizabeth Park! We came here for lunch before visiting the Conservatory, and it was a very nice experience. It's a very small store, but has some delicious baked goods and drinks! I highly recommend their bagel sandwiches :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2DLA2M1jed2sc8oMBxurcySYqa_8XWfhDvKlB&fid=0x0:0xd939dc9f1b93e42f"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Amparo Mateos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV16SvothmJJOYQRGsxMty8YoAogZIVE0ZZBECWpHDmh-t7XlGg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"INCREDIBLE SERVICE AND COFFEE. I went there because it was raining and I loved it. Seline, the barista was very sweet and made us feel very comfortable. In addition, the coffee was incredible and very beautiful. She is an artist!! We'll repeat","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsiVJ-WNvYPtWRe45vXnf3pyAzMAa3UZe4HvqO&fid=0x0:0xd939dc9f1b93e42f"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Dee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHNcNOPaNMwoQhd4a3MaNl6j5NagLUmPpfBNlw3ukI7k88v9FP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely coffee spot with super cozy vibes and delicious coffee. Couldn’t ask for anything more than that. I was super satisfied with my flat white and pistachio macaroon.

The barista was very kind and soft spoken, I can’t wait to come back on my next visit. It is one of my favourite coffee shops to go if I am looking for a place to study or chill. Each cup is brewed to perfection, showcasing the rich and nuanced flavors of their carefully sourced beans","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORZXXzaOfnGwc0dMXXBPT9OGTpwq6KuHaI8WIS&fid=0x0:0xd939dc9f1b93e42f"],"When":"2023-12-27"},{"Name":"Elton Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_SVkVqkNe3SvSFwaZ1xrBYHObNVkTiTTXXYykf58guqGIk3qy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I came here for a light lunch in a sunny winter morning. The cafe is nearby the Cambie Street entrance of QE Park and I could park my car in a small street nearby.

The cafe has six tables. It wasn’t crowded when I were here. The room temperature was slight high as the cafe is like a greenhouse with plenty of sunlight but windows and door are not open.

I ordered Latte, London Fog, Basque Cheesecake Muffin and a chocolate croissant. The latte and London Fog were pretty good and the barista surely did a good job.

The bakery products looked nice but they were the star deducting items. The croissant was hard and so dry. The moment I poked my fork on the muffin it broke into very dry crumbles. I could see the “honeycomb” shape inside that indicated the baking powder and ingredients were not properly mixed before baking. I suspect these were the supplier quality issue. I would urge the owner to pay attention to it.

Generally the place and service are good. I would love to see the improvement to the bakery products.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyTE1O-Pjh1eVYHnJIbEmJAxCN7Sxsrm4hJ4A&fid=0x0:0xd939dc9f1b93e42f"],"When":"2023-11-14"}]
